translated_text: "Sister, don't be late. Knock on the door and see how it opens. "
secondary_translated_text: “姐姐，别迟到了。敲门，看看它如何打开。"

original_en_text: The gate... the gate! O, the Grand Gate to the Citadel stands before us!<page>We are so close! O mighty ones beyond the gate, we beg you! Open the way and let we poor, insignificant little pilgrims crawl into the light...<hpage>I see no gatekeepers to heed your plea, pilgrim, though I too seek entry to the Citadel. Have you heard of a means to open this gateway?<page>Ahh... Weapons blunt it not. No holes for keys. ‘Tis the bells, they say! The holy bells upon the path that open the way!
original_zh_text: 巨门啊……巨门！通往圣堡的巨扉圣门近在眼前！<page>咫尺之遥！门后的尊者啊，求您垂怜！开启通路，容我等卑微朝圣者遁入圣光……<hpage>看来没有守门者回应答你的祈愿。我也想进入圣堡，你可知道开门的办法？<page>唉……兵刃伤不了分毫，也不见锁孔。只有朝圣途中的圣钟可开启此门！
translated_text: The door, the door, right in front of us.<page>That thing is too close! Open the path of light, poor pilgrim. "<hpage>I also wanted to enter the castle, but I didn't see the guards calling for pilgrims.<page>Yes, right. You don't have to worry about guns, no holes in the keys, noise! The bell of the Holy Spirit will open the way for you, open the way for you.
secondary_translated_text: 门，门，就在我们面前。<page>那东西太近了！开辟光明之路吧，可怜的朝圣者。"<hpage>我也想进入城堡，但没有看到卫兵在召唤朝圣者。<page>是的，正确的。你不必担心枪、钥匙上没有洞、噪音！圣灵的钟声会为你开辟道路，为你开辟道路。

original_en_text: <hpage>I have passed several such bells, pilgrim. I know how to see them woken. Tell me what you know of their locations, and I shall seek those that still remain silent.<page>Sister? This is a mighty service you willingly perform! What a marvellous gift you would grant to your fellows. <page>Eagerly, I shall tell you of the shrines and their locations, as we have heard them spoken...
original_zh_text: <hpage>朝圣者，我途中遇到过多座此类巨钟，也知晓唤醒方法。请告知余下的位置，我这就去寻找未鸣之钟。<page>姊妹？这是何等伟大的侍奉！您对同伴的馈赠真是慷慨！<page>我会悉数告知神殿方位，将我们听闻的消息原封不动地告诉你……
translated_text: <hpage>"Dear, I have experienced some of these servants. I saw you awake." I am looking for someone who is quiet.<page>My sister? This is a great service we can provide as volunteers. This is a great gift for your partner!<page>As you have heard, I will explain the Temple and its location in detail.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>“亲爱的，我经历过其中的一些仆人。我看到你醒了。“我正在寻找安静的人。<page>我姐姐？这是我们作为志愿者可以提供的很好的服务。这是送给您伴侣的一份很棒的礼物！<page>正如您所听到的，我将详细解释寺庙及其位置。

original_en_text: The gate... the gate! O, the Grand Gate to the Citadel stands before us!<page>We are so close! O mighty ones beyond the gate, we beg you! original_zh_text: 巨门啊……巨门！圣堡巨扉圣门近在眼前！<page>门后的尊者啊，求您垂怜！开启通路，容我等卑微朝圣者遁入圣光……<hpage>看来没有守门者回应你的祈愿。但开启这道门对我也有好处，你可知道开门的办法？<page>唉……兵刃伤不了分毫，也不见锁孔。只有朝圣途中的圣钟可开启此门！
translated_text: The door, the door is right in front of us.<page>That thing is too close! Open the path of light, poor pilgrim. "The servants of the Holy Spirit are opening the way! "
secondary_translated_text: 门，门就在我们面前。<page>那东西太近了！开辟光明之路吧，可怜的朝圣者。"<hpage>清教徒，我没有看到警卫会听你的要求，但我会发现你开放的好处。<page>是的，正确的。你不必担心枪、钥匙上没有洞、噪音！“圣灵的仆人正在开路！"

original_en_text: <hpage>On my journey up, I passed many large bells housed in old shrines. Each I have struck awake, yet still this gate stays closed. What other task must be done to see us pass beyond?<page>The bells are rung? Then this sacred threshold may now be crossed, for the final task is simple! Only music, played fair and true. Music shall attune the bells, and see the gate descend.<page>It must be you to lead us, sister! You, who brought this blessing! Play or sing, and we shall follow.
original_zh_text: <hpage>上行途中，我已敲响诸多钟殿内的巨钟，但此门仍然紧闭。还需要怎样的仪式吗？<page>巨钟皆已鸣响？那这神圣门槛便可跨越！最终仪式简单，唯有真诚演奏的音乐，方能使钟声共鸣，引导大门降下。<page>必须由你来引领我们，姊妹！是你带来了这份恩典。演奏或歌唱吧，我们定将跟随你。
translated_text: <hpage>When we reached the mountain, there were many bells ringing in the temple. I woke up and the door closed. What problems do I need to solve to overcome them?<page>Is this a bell? The final task is so simple that we have exceeded this sacred threshold! The music is fair and honest, and the concert bell rings at the door.<page>"Sister, please take me there. I hope you can give us this blessing! Play, drink, and go.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>当我们到达山上时，寺庙里响起了许多钟声。我醒来，门关上了。我需要解决哪些问题才能克服它们？<page>这是铃声吗？最后的任务如此简单，以至于我们已经超越了这个神圣的门槛！音乐公平诚实，音乐会钟声在门口响起。<page>“姐姐，请带我去吧。希望您能给我们这个祝福！玩、喝、走。

original_en_text: <hpage>Master, I have communed with the shrine above. Your learnings are unique, techniques born of cogwork hearts. Their mastery will require some commitment on my part.<page>Bug-Red, you are the first organic shell to fuse our memories. S-s-s-such behaviour, my line would have believed improbable-impossible. <page>Still, your broad arsenal did suggest strong affinity with the m-m-m-mechanical craft, enough to allow access to our thought-store.<hpage>Yours is an impressive skill, Master. I am grateful for the insight.
original_zh_text: <hpage>大师，我已拜访上方圣像。你们的知识独特，源自机枢之心。需要我专注投入才能掌握。<page>红姑娘是首个融合我等记忆的血肉之躯。这种行为，按我族逻辑本应不-不-不可行。<page>不过您精通各式武具，确实与机械造诣契-契-合，因此决定开放思维秘藏。<hpage>你们的技艺令我叹服。对这份知识，我感激不尽。
translated_text: <hpage>Master, I accepted the shelter mentioned above. Its teaching is unique and an ability derived from cognitive thinking. Learning these skills requires dedication.<page>Baghdadi, you are the first person in our memory to have a shell, and our people believe such behavior is impossible. "<page>However, their large number of weapons shows that their mechanisms are very close to our ideological weapons.<hpage>Professor, your abilities are impressive.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>大师，我接受了上面提到的庇护所。它的教学是独特的，是一种源自认知思维的能力。学习这些技能需要奉献精神。<page>巴格达迪，你是我们记忆中第一个拥有贝壳的人，我们的人民相信这种行为是不可能的。"<page>然而，他们的大量武器表明他们的机制与我们的意识形态武器非常接近。<hpage>教授，您的能力令人印象深刻。

translated_text: I told you, I admit it.

original_en_text: A fine artefact you carry there, Bug-Red. That broken tool, it is Weaver-make? <hpage>I believe so, Master. A relic of their old workshop, lost in fetid caves beyond this Citadel.<hpage>The parts suggest a weapon of thread, one I would attempt to repair myself, had I endless time.<page>An Architect’s work owes much to the art of the f-f-first children. They set expert standard for the tools and talents of Pharloom eternal.<page>If you desire-demand, I can remake the tool, though my own mind-directives may produce u-u-u-nique result.
original_zh_text: 红姑娘，你身上有件特殊遗物。这残器，是织者造物？<hpage>应该是。织者的旧工坊遗物，在圣堡外的腐臭洞窟里发现的。<hpage>看这构造应该是丝刃兵器。若不是时间有限，我倒想尝试修复。<page>建筑师技艺大多继承自初代织者子嗣。他们为永恒圣堡的器-器-具设下典范。<page>如果您有要求，我可以将它重铸，但成品恐怕会带有我的独-独-独特烙印。
translated_text: You brought a beautiful craft, red worms. Is this a bad tool made of materials?<hpage>They were relics of his former laboratory, lost in the smell of the cave outside the castle.<hpage>The pieces are like a pen, so if I had time, I would repair it myself.<page>Many of the architects 'work is related to the art of early children, and they set the standard for the expertise of tools and talents who survived the Farham era.<page>You can rebuild the tool, but my psychological team will produce unique results.
secondary_translated_text: 你带来了一艘美丽的飞船，红虫。这是一个用材料制成的坏工具吗？<hpage>它们是他以前实验室的遗物，消失在城堡外洞穴的气味中。<hpage>这些碎片就像一支笔，所以如果我有时间，我会自己修复它。<page>建筑师的许多作品都与幼儿的艺术有关，他们为法勒姆时代幸存下来的工具和人才的专业知识设定了标准。<page>你可以重建工具，但我的心理团队会产生独特的结果。

original_en_text: An intricate implement of Pharloom’s first children. I can restore-repair the w-w-weapon, though it will bear some trace of my identity-idiom.
original_zh_text: 初代子嗣的精巧造物。我可修-修-复此武具，但会留下我的工造印记。
translated_text: The gun can be repaired, but it carries traces of identity.
secondary_translated_text: 枪可以修理，但它带有身份的痕迹。

original_en_text: Bug-Red. Do you ask-need our service? We shall create, as is our d-d-directive. To serve, for Pharloom eternal.
original_zh_text: 红姑娘。需要服-服-服务？我将创造，如指-指-指令所示。为永恒圣堡。
translated_text: This is a network bug service. A web bug service. Do you need it? He believed in the same thing as the D-D command: the immortality of the pharaoh.
secondary_translated_text: 这是一个网络bug服务。一个网络bug服务。你需要它吗？他相信与D-D命令相同的事情：法老的不朽。

original_en_text: Speak now. Thy confession will be heard.
original_zh_text: 说吧。你的忏悔将被聆听。
translated_text: Your request will be heard.

original_en_text: Hrrr. Hrrrrrrr. Them sounds you make. Of holy sort. When me hear such sounds, me remember of home. Me remember of be little.<page>It make it painful hard to work, such remembers. Me must keep working. Please, friend. Do not make them sounds no more.
original_zh_text: 唔。唔唔唔唔。你弄的响动。像圣歌。让咱想起老家。想起小时候。<page>这些回忆让干活揪心。咱得继续干。朋友，求你别弄这些声了。<page>求你了……别再……
translated_text: Yes, yes, yes. Your voice is sacred. When I hear it, I think of my home. I remember when I was younger.<page>This makes my job painful. I know I have to keep doing my job. Come on, man. Please don't cause trouble.
secondary_translated_text: 是的，是的。你的声音是神圣的。当我听到它时，我想起了我的家。我记得我年轻的时候。<page>这让我的工作很痛苦。我知道我必须继续做好我的工作。拜托，伙计。请不要惹麻烦。

original_en_text: My s-s-service to you, Bug-Red... As it concludes, I must speak-confess. Long now I have felt my rotors slow their s-s-spin. My limbs lift weak. An ending is felt, coming, sudden-certain...welcome.<hpage>Whatever fading you feel has not shown in your craft, Master. You have provided tools of immaculate make.<hpage>What will follow if you pass? Would another take your place? <page>One cannot. The skill to construct an Architect... That was taken by t-t-time. I am the last-final. The core remains to sustain the song, but no more Architects to tend-toil or build anew. <page>S-s-strange... ‘For Pharloom eternal,’ states the d-d-directive-cage. But how can eternity sustain without an Architect to serve? This seems e-e-error. An end? An error... welcome?
original_zh_text: 为红姑娘效-效-力的时光……临别前必须坦-坦-白。我的齿轮渐-渐缓，臂膀无力。终结将至，突然但确-确-定……真好。<hpage>即便如此，大师的技艺也并未退步。您造的器具堪称完美。<hpage>您逝去后会怎么样，有后继者接任？<page>没有。锻造建筑师的技艺……早已失-失-失传。我是最后一位。核心尚能使圣歌存续，但再无工匠维缮新建。<page>荒-荒-谬……”为永恒圣堡”的指-指-令仍在。但无工匠何谈永恒？错-错-误？终局？错谬……真好？
translated_text: "I'm waiting for you here, Red Book. Finally, I admitted this. For a while, I felt the rotation speed of the propeller drop. I couldn't lift my arms and legs. As the end approached, he suddenly re-examined it carefully.<hpage>Master, no matter how pale you become, it cannot reflect your abilities.<hpage>If they do, what will happen? Who will replace her?<page>The heart still retains the song, but it no longer requires an architect to maintain or repair it.<page>Interestingly,"for the immortality of the pharaoh"-says quantum cages. But "how can we survive without the services of architects? "You look wrong. Files? This was a mistake. Welcome
secondary_translated_text: “我在这里等你，红书。最后，我承认了这一点。有一段时间，我感觉到螺旋桨的旋转速度下降了。我无法举起我的手臂和腿。随着结局的临近，他突然仔细地重新审视起来。<hpage>大师，无论你变得多么苍白，都无法反映你的能力。<hpage>如果他们这样做了，会发生什么？谁将取代她？<page>心脏仍然保留着歌曲，但不再需要建筑师来维护或修复它。<page>有趣的是，“为了法老的不朽”--量子笼子说道。但“没有建筑师的服务，我们如何生存呢？“你看起来不对劲。文件？这是一个错误。欢迎

original_en_text: Hrr. Hrrrrr. Who is there? Me can not... can not clear see....<hpage>At ease, large one. I am no danger to you.<page>Hrrrrr? Hrrrr! Me see you now! So clean, so lively... Surely you did come from above! Me time has come at last! Me work is done. You come to bring me up! Up, up! Hrrr!<hpage>You mistake me. I am no resident of the Citadel. I am a stranger here, though no foe to you.<page>Hrrr. Hrrrrrrrrr. S-stranger? Me grave mistaken. Forgive me, thems above, for me unworthy hope! Of course, me work is not done! Harder, harder! Me must work harder!
original_zh_text: 唔。唔唔唔。谁？咱看不清……看不清……<hpage>别慌，大块头。我不是你的敌人。<page>唔唔？唔唔！看清你了！这么干净鲜活……肯定是从上层来的！咱终于等到！咱完工了！你是来接咱上去的！上去！唔唔！<hpage>你误会了，我不是圣堡居民，只是旅者。但也不是你的敌人。<page>唔。唔唔唔唔。旅……旅者？咱大错特错。宽恕咱吧，上边的大人们！咱痴心妄想！咱当然还没完工！加把劲！咱得加把劲！
translated_text: Yeah, right? Who is he? I mean, sir. I can't see him.<hpage>"Don't worry, I won't be in danger.<page>What is this? What are you doing? Oh! Oh! I just saw this! It's so clean and active that you have to stand up and "Our time has finally come!" "My job is over, and you are here to help me grow. Wake up! Wake up! Oh, Oh!<hpage>I misunderstood. It wasn't someone from the castle. I am not your enemy, but I am a stranger.<page>I'm sorry, but I hope I didn't help you. Of course, my work is not over yet! Let's go, let's go! We need more work!
secondary_translated_text: 是的，对吧？他是谁？我的意思是，先生。我看不到他。<hpage>“别担心，我不会有危险。<page>这是什么？你在干什么？哦！哦！我刚刚看到这个！它是如此干净和活跃，以至于你必须站起来说：“我们的时代终于到来了！”“我的工作结束了，你来这里是为了帮助我成长。醒醒！醒醒！哦，哦！<hpage>我误解了。不是城堡里的人。我不是你的敌人，但我是一个陌生人。<page>对不起，但我希望我没有帮助你。当然，我的工作还没有结束！走吧，走吧！我们需要更多工作！

original_en_text: Bug-Red. Do you ask-need our services, even n-now? Our duty is l-l-long, but we shall create for you, if you require it...
original_zh_text: 红姑娘。此刻仍需要服-服-服务？职责已尽，但如果您需要，仍可制-制造……
translated_text: This is a network bug service. This is a web service bug. Do you need it now? Our task is long, but we will create it as needed.
secondary_translated_text: 这是一个网络bug服务。这是一个Web服务错误。你现在需要吗？我们的任务很长，但我们会根据需要创建它。

original_en_text: If Bug-Red could prove their aptitude with our implements, and others like, I would offer my key, to grant access to the chapel-store above.
original_zh_text: 如果红姑娘能证-证-明精通我等器械，我将献上钥匙，用以开启上方圣堂库房。
translated_text: If Bug Krasu could use us and other tools to practice his skills, I would give him my keys and let him enter the church store above.
secondary_translated_text: 如果巴格·克拉苏可以使用我们和其他工具来练习他的技能，我会把钥匙给他，让他进入上面的教堂商店。

original_en_text: <hpage>Master, I seek a melody held by your line, one part of a sequence and key to ascending above the Citadel. Can you teach it to me?<page>Our melody? I r-r-recall! Yes! There was melody, once, but its sound... that I possess no longer...<page>T-t-t-too long I have worked. From my mind-vault, the imprint has f-f-faded. With many things it is like this... remembrance, dimmed...<page>But you m-m-may hear it, still. At the height of our core, there is means-s-s-system, near complete... Constructs old-built to sound our song. They need only be set to functional form.
original_zh_text: <hpage>大师，我想要你这一族保管的旋律，那是登顶圣堡的钥匙。你可愿意传授？<page>我们的旋律？确-确-曾存在！但是声纹……已遗失……<page>长-长-久劳役使我记忆缺损。许多往事……都已模糊……<page>但您仍可-可-可以聆听。核心顶端有一奏鸣构造，几近完成……启动即可重现圣歌。
translated_text: <hpage>Master, I am looking for the melody conveyed by your lines. It is part of the sequence and the key to climbing the castle.<page>Where's the melody? Please remember me! Oh, yes! Oh, yes! There is one melody, but one voice. I don't have any more.<page>This is a long period. Deep in my heart, this symbol has disappeared and there are many things as memories.<page>But, above our core, we can feel an almost complete media system. We built an old house and sang songs. You just need to install it on the function.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>大师，我正在寻找您的台词所传达的旋律。这是序列的一部分，也是攀登城堡的关键。<page>旋律在哪里？请记住我！哦，是的！哦，是的！只有一个旋律，但只有一个声音。我没有更多了。<page>这是一个很长的时期。在我的内心深处，这个符号已经消失了，还有很多东西作为回忆。<page>但是，在我们的核心之上，我们可以感觉到一个几乎完整的媒体系统。我们盖了一栋老房子，唱歌。您只需要将其安装到功能上即可。

original_en_text: Are you still to c-c-climb our grand core, Bug-Red? Within you may marvel at the work of Architects, my own, and all those passed b-b-before.<hpage>My path takes me in many directions, Master, but in due course, I will ascend the core and claim the melody atop it.
original_zh_text: 您仍要攀-攀-登伟大核心？路上可见历代建筑师的神工创造，包括我的拙作。<hpage>我有许多地方要去，但若是需要，我会登顶获取旋律。
translated_text: Baghdadi, can you still climb to the core? Inside, you can appreciate the work of architects, my architects, and all the architects who lived in the past.<hpage>Master, my journey has taken me in many directions, but at the right time, I will reach the heart and bring the melody to the heart.
secondary_translated_text: 巴格达迪，你还能爬到核心吗？在里面，您可以欣赏建筑师、我的建筑师以及所有生活在过去的建筑师的作品。<hpage>大师，我的旅程带我走向了很多方向，但在合适的时候，我会到达内心，将旋律带入内心。

original_en_text: <hpage>May I ask what you know of the Citadel above you, sir? You go to much effort to reach it.<page>Hrrrrrrrr! The Citadel! Most miracle of a place, bright and holy! Fresh water for all, much as can drink! Air so clean, can see the great rooves above! <page>When me thinks of Citadel above, me works hardest of all! Hrrrrrrrrr!
original_zh_text: <hpage>请问你对头顶的圣堡了解多少？为了上去这么煞费苦心。<page>唔唔唔唔！圣堡！神迹之地！亮堂圣洁！清水管够！空气清新能望见穹顶！<page>想着圣堡，咱就干得最卖力！唔唔唔唔！
translated_text: <hpage>Do you know how important sex is? He put in a huge effort to achieve it.<page>Ha! The castle! "The most sacred place is the brightest and most sacred place! Try drinking cold water. The weather is very cold and you can see the roof.<page>When you see the castle from above, you are working hard! Oh, yes! Oh, yes!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>你知道性有多重要吗？他付出了巨大的努力来实现这一目标。<page>哈！城堡！“最神圣的地方，就是最明亮、最神圣的地方！尝试喝冷水。天气很冷，可以看到屋顶。<page>当你从上面看到城堡时，你正在努力工作！哦，是的！哦，是的！

original_en_text: You have confessed a sin most grave and must by works cleanse yourself.<page>Return to your task and work off-cycle, neither eating nor supping until new-cycle begins.<page>By the grace of Pharloom eternal, may you never tire. Toil, and be forgiven.
original_zh_text: 你已供认重罪，须以苦役净化。<page>返回岗位持续劳作，禁食禁饮直至新周期始。<page>承永恒纺络之恩，愿你永不疲惫。劳作，方得救赎。
translated_text: We must confess our gravest sins and purify ourselves with our actions.<page>Don't go back to non-periodic tasks or activities, and don't eat or eat before a new cycle begins.<page>Let us thank God for his eternal mercy and we will never tire of it.
secondary_translated_text: 我们必须承认我们最严重的罪，并用我们的行动净化自己。<page>不要回到非周期性任务或活动中，在新的周期开始之前不要进食或进食。<page>让我们感谢上帝永恒的仁慈，我们将永不厌倦。

original_en_text: Hrr. Hrrrrr! Good, me friend, good! When us works together, is more holy! Is more work done!<page>Together, lets us work raw hard ‘til thems above see how worthy us is!
original_zh_text: 唔。唔唔唔！好，朋友，好！咱一起干，更虔诚！活干得更快！<page>来！咱们一起拼命干，让上边看看咱多卖力！
translated_text: Oh, Oh, Oh! When we work together, we become more holy.<page>We will continue to work together until people at the highest level understand our values!
secondary_translated_text: 哦，哦，哦！当我们一起工作时，我们会变得更加神圣。<page>我们将继续共同努力，直到最高层的人们理解我们的价值观！

original_en_text: <page>What’s this, Bug-Red? Even down here, I d-d-did detect its working... Have you climbed our c-c-core, and woken the voices of my l-l-line?<hpage>I have maker. Clearly it was a climb never intended for regular bugs, and fair fortune that the skills gifted within your lands allowed my ascent.<hpage>The melody, and the voices... both are fine things heard and witnessed. Even in this fading moment, their artistry shines through.<page>Impressive-industrious... eternal... You have seen a glimpse, Bug-Red, of us-s-s, how once we were. The minds of Architects inspired. What majesty we did create...
original_zh_text: <page>怎么回事，红姑娘？即便身处此地，我也感-感-感知到它的运转……莫非你已攀上我们的核-核-核心，唤醒了我族先辈的歌声？  <hpage>正是如此，大师。这段攀登本非寻常虫类所能企及，所幸这片土地赋予的技艺助我登上了顶端。  <hpage>那旋律与歌声……皆是值得聆听见证的瑰宝。即便在此衰微之际，其中匠心仍熠熠生辉。  <page>勤勉卓绝……永垂不朽……红姑娘，你已见证我族-族-族昔日的荣光。建筑师们迸发的智慧，我们曾创造的伟业何等壮丽……
translated_text: <page>What are red letters? Did you enter our C-C core and wake up my voice on the L-L line?<hpage>Fortunately, his special terrain skills allowed him to climb.<hpage>Melody, sound. Both look very beautiful. Even at this moment, his art still shines.<page>You have seen our red insects, the inspiration that builds the greatness of our creations.
secondary_translated_text: <page>什么是红色字母？您是否进入了我们的C-C核心并唤醒了我在L-L线上的声音？<hpage>幸运的是，他特殊的地形技能让他能够攀爬。<hpage>旋律，声音。两个看起来都很漂亮。即使在这一刻，他的艺术仍然闪耀。<page>您已经见过我们的红色昆虫，它们是构建我们伟大创作的灵感。

original_en_text: <hpage>Master, you seem the lone maker left in this ruined Citadel. Are you my enemy? The other constructs of this place did object aggressively to my presence. <page>Bug-Red? I am a m-m-maker. Yes. Enemy. No. I am an Architect. Only an Architect. To build-automate, it is our nature-directive-c-c-c-cage.<page>Why are you here, Bug-Red? The time is late. Do you seek-need service of an Architect? You are weave-type, yes, a first child. Rare-e-e-extinct? Or not it does so seem.<hpage>You see it true, Master. I bear the lineage of Weaver, along with other strands, equally strange.<page>Then on your r-r-request, Bug-Red, as directive demands, for Pharloom’s first children, a-a-a-and our kingdom-eternal, I shall c-c-craft.
original_zh_text: <hpage>阁下，你似乎是圣堡最后的工匠，但是要与我为敌么？这里的构造体对我很有敌意。<page>红衣虫？我是制-制-造者。敌人。不是。建筑师。只是建筑师。建造-自动化，并非选择。是本性-指-指-指令牢笼。<page>您为何在此，是寻-寻求建筑师协助？您有织者血脉，是，初代子嗣。稀-稀-稀有种？但又似乎不是。<hpage>你眼光很独到，我确实有织者血脉，但只有一半。<page>那依红姑娘要-要-要求，遵循指令，为纺络初代子嗣，为永恒圣堡，我将效劳。为您制-制-造。
translated_text: <hpage>Lord, I believe you are the only creator of this deserted castle. All the buildings are strongly opposed to my existence.<page>A red plate? I'm an architect, an architect, and in automation, it's a natural sequence- c-c - c.<page>What are you doing here? Isn't it too late to ask for help from Miss Red Architect? You are a boy in a shirt, yes, the first child, rare and extinct, or it seems.<hpage>"Lord, look at this. I have women's blood on me, other blood, and strange things. "<page>So, at your request, Rhett, at your instructions, I will make C-C - C the eldest son of our eternal kingdom of Panama.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>主啊，我相信您是这座废弃城堡的唯一创造者。所有的建筑都强烈反对我的存在。<page>红色盘子？我是一名建筑师，一名建筑师，在自动化中，这是一个自然的序列- c-c - c。<page>你在这里做什么？现在向红建筑师小姐寻求帮助还为时已晚吗？你是一个穿衬衫的男孩，是的，第一个孩子，罕见且灭绝，或者看起来。<hpage>“主啊，看看这个。我身上有女人的血，还有其他的血，还有奇怪的东西。"<page>因此，根据你的要求，瑞德，根据你的指示，我将让C-C - C成为我们永恒巴拿马王国的长子。

original_en_text: <hpage>Master, you seem the lone maker left in this Citadel. Are you my enemy? The other constructs of this place object aggressively to my presence. <page>Bug-Red? I am a m-m-maker. Yes. Enemy. No. I am an Architect. Only an Architect. To build-automate is not choice. It is our nature-directive-c-c-c-cage. <page>You are weave-type, yes, a first child. Rare-e-e-extinct? Or not it does so seem.<hpage>You see it true, Master. I bear the lineage of Weavers, along with other strands, equally strange.<page>Then on your r-r-request, Bug-Red, as directive demands, for Pharloom’s first children, a-a-a-and our kingdom-eternal, I shall serve. I shall c-c-craft.
original_zh_text: <hpage>阁下，你似乎是圣堡最后的工匠，但是要与我为敌么？这里的构造体对我很有敌意。<page>红衣虫？我是制-制-造者。敌人。不是。建筑师。只是建筑师。建造-自动化，并非选择。是本性-指-指-指令牢笼。<page>您有织者血脉，是，初代子嗣。稀-稀-稀有种？但又似乎不是。<hpage>你眼光很独到，我确实有织者血脉，但只有一半。<page>那依红姑娘要-要-要求，遵循指令，为纺络初代子嗣，为永恒圣堡，我将效劳。为您制-制-造。
translated_text: <hpage>"Doctor, I believe I am the sole creator of this castle. "Other buildings strongly opposed my existence. "<page>A red plate? I am an architect, I am an architect, automation is not an option.<page>You are a boy in a shirt, yes, the first child, rare and extinct, or it seems.<hpage>"Master, take a look at this. I have women's blood and other strange things in my system. "<page>So, Baghdad, at your request, I will serve Pharaoh's eldest son, our eternal kingdom. "C-C - C-C - C-C You can't, C-C.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>“博士，我相信我是这座城堡的唯一创造者。“其他建筑强烈反对我的存在。"<page>红色盘子？我是一名建筑师，我是一名建筑师，自动化不是一种选择。<page>你是一个穿衬衫的男孩，是的，第一个孩子，罕见且灭绝，或者看起来。<hpage>“大师，你看看这个。我的体内有女人的血液和其他奇怪的东西。"<page>所以，巴格达，应您的请求，我将为法老的长子，我们永恒的王国服务。“C-C - C-C - C-C你不能，C-C。

translated_text: Twelve generations of architects

original_en_text: Hrrrrrrr. The harder me work, the sooner it come. Thems above, them watch us, always. Work hard, work hard, and us will go up. Hrrrr.<hpage>Sir, I fear you are long forgotten by your masters. Should you not rest? The burden this toil is placing on your shell is plain to see.<page>Hrrrrr? Hrrrrrr. You speaks strange. Me can not rest. Us works, and Citadel breathes, and thems above do sing, and all is right.<page>And when us works enough, thems see it... Hrrr... thems see it, and us gets us holy reward...
original_zh_text: 唔唔唔。越使劲干，就越早离开。上边的大人们看着咱呢。使劲干，使劲干，就能上去。唔唔。<hpage>先生，恐怕你早被主人遗忘了。为何不休息？这苦役正在摧残你的甲壳。<page>唔唔？唔唔唔。你说怪话。咱不能歇。咱干活，圣堡呼吸，上边唱歌，这才对劲。<page>等咱干够活，大人们会看见……唔唔……会看见，就给咱圣赐……
translated_text: The harder you work, the faster you work, the sooner you will arrive. They focused their attention on this issue. Look, look, stand up.<hpage>Forget your teacher, are you an idiot? The weight of the shell is obvious.<page>What is this? What are you doing? We were doing our work, the castle was breathing, the theme upstairs was really singing, and everything was fine.<page>If you work hard enough, you will see it. When you see it, you receive God's reward.
secondary_translated_text: 你工作越努力，工作越快，你就会越早到达。他们把注意力集中在这个问题上。看，看，站起来。<hpage>忘记你的老师吧，你是白痴吗？外壳的重量显而易见。<page>这是什么？你在干什么？我们正在工作，城堡在呼吸，楼上的主题真的在唱歌，一切都很好。<page>如果你足够努力，你就会看到它。当你看到它时，你就会得到上帝的奖励。

original_en_text: Tools of my craft. They could be used to improve your own. Make harder, sharper.
original_zh_text: 我的工具。可以用于改进您自己的。更硬，更利。
translated_text: I have my artistic tools. You can use it to improve your personal life. It makes me stronger, stronger.
secondary_translated_text: 我有我的艺术工具。您可以用它来改善您的个人生活。它让我变得更强大，更强大。

original_en_text: A flexible shell-prosthetic. It would enhance a weave-type’s flexibility, allowing evasive options.
original_zh_text: 柔性甲壳义肢。能提升织者机动性，便于闪避。
translated_text: Flexible artificial bodies add flexibility to fabric types and allow avoidable options.
secondary_translated_text: 灵活的人造身体增加了织物类型的灵活性，并允许可避免的选择。

original_en_text: You... ... sin... ... cleanse....<page>Return... ... work... ... begins....<page>... Pharloom... ... never... ... forgiven.
original_zh_text: 你……罪……净化....<page>返回……劳作……周期始....<page>...纺络……永不……救赎。
translated_text: Who are you? Who are you? No, E. Yes, yes.<page>I'm back... ... You know I'm working. You know I'm working. He started.<page>... Pharaoh never... ... Please forgive me.
secondary_translated_text: 你是谁？你是谁？不，E。是的是的<page>我回来了... ...你知道我在工作。你知道我在工作。他开始了。<page>...法老从来没有. ...请原谅我

original_en_text: You have affinity for such radial blades? I can b-b-build upon the idea-knowledge. Make them retract. Make them force-store.
original_zh_text: 您偏爱这类机轮刃？我可基-基-据此改良。加回收装置。强化储能。
translated_text: Are you interested in radioactivity? Based on my understanding of the idea, please return this to me. Put them in mandatory deposits.
secondary_translated_text: 您对放射性感兴趣吗？根据我对这个想法的理解，请把这个还给我。把它们存入强制存款。

original_en_text: Acquire {0} more tools to prove aptitude.
original_zh_text: 再收集{0}件工具以证明资质。
translated_text: Buy this product.{0}This is a tool to demonstrate capabilities.
secondary_translated_text: 购买该产品。{0}这是一个展示能力的工具。

original_en_text: Hrrrrrr. Me can not say much more, friend. Thems is watching. Us must keep working.
original_zh_text: 唔唔唔唔。咱不能多说了，朋友。上边看着呢。咱得接着干。
translated_text: Gentlemen gentlemen, I can't say any more, we are being watched and we must keep working.
secondary_translated_text: 先生们先生们，我不能再说了，我们正在被监视，我们必须继续工作。

original_en_text: A locked gate bearing the symbol of an Architect.
original_zh_text: 一扇锁住的门，刻有建筑师徽记。
translated_text: A door, signature by the architect.

original_en_text: Raw materials, for creation. Carry them with you always, that y-y-you may be prepared.
original_zh_text: 原材料，随身携带。有-有备无患。
translated_text: Creative raw materials-we always carry them with us to be ready.
secondary_translated_text: 创意原材料-我们始终随身携带以备不时之需。

original_en_text: Acquire 1 more tool to prove aptitude.
original_zh_text: 再收集1件工具以证明资质。
translated_text: Buy other tools to showcase your skills.
secondary_translated_text: 购买其他工具来展示您的技能。

original_en_text: Those pieces of a h-h-heart-core you carry upon you, how did you acquire-recover an artefact so rare?<hpage>They were scattered about the Citadel, each seemingly laid with purpose. Someone wished the thing dismantled, but showed respect enough to see it stored safe.<page>That heart is an inspired form, conceived by the first of my line for a knight of cog and blade.<page>In it, I see my predecessor’s talent, immense, now lost-forgotten. I could never create-copy a work s-s-so fine.<hpage>And the knight that once bore the heart? Tell me of them.<page>A gleaming order, cogwork sentinels, so impressive-majestic in function they were charged-b-b-bound to the highest holy duty.<page>Long before the c-c-creation of the core, the sentinels ventured, even beyond these walls, to see all bugs brought-forced safe to serve the Citadel.<page>If the h-h-h-heart were restored within the sentinel’s shell, would it give thanks for the awakening? Or would it grieve those lands now l-l-lost?<hpage>In time, maker, I may find out...
original_zh_text: 您携带的心-心-脏残片，您是怎么找到如此珍贵造物的？<hpage>它们散落在圣堡各处，似乎是被刻意安置。虽然被拆解，却有妥善保管。<page>这心脏构造精妙，出自我的先辈之手，为机枢骑士所铸造。<page>我能在其中看到先辈才华，如今却已失-失-传。我无法复刻这份神工。<hpage>那曾经承载这颗心的骑士？我想了解详情。<page>光辉教团，机枢戍卫。他们曾经威仪赫赫，掌管圣职。<page>远在核心铸-铸-造之前，戍卫就远征墙外，强掳众虫效忠圣堡。<page>如果将此心-心-脏重新装入戍卫甲中，它会为苏醒而感激？还是为圣堡衰颓哀伤？<hpage>假以时日，大师，或许我能知晓……
translated_text: How to recycle the nuclear waste you own?<hpage>They were scattered around the castle and everyone was lying. Someone wants it but shows enough respect to keep it safe.<page>"Heart" was the inspiration for Gear and Blade Knight's original idea.<page>There, I saw the forgotten talents of my great predecessor.<hpage>"The man who took care of you told me.<page>Knights of the Wise, guardians of dog teeth, performed very impressive and valuable functions and were given the highest sacred duties.<page>Long before the center was built, guards were at risk, and even insects that penetrated these walls had to work for castle safety.<page>When your heart returns to its protective shell, are you grateful that it has been awakened? Does this mean that the earth has disappeared?<hpage>Eventually, we will discover our creator.
secondary_translated_text: 如何回收您拥有的核废料？<hpage>他们散布在城堡周围，每个人都在撒谎。有人想要它，但表现出足够的尊重以保证它的安全。<page>“Heart”是Gear and Blade Knight最初想法的灵感来源。<page>在那里，我看到了我伟大的前任被遗忘的才华。<hpage>“照顾你的人告诉我的。<page>智者骑士是狗牙齿的守护者，履行着非常令人印象深刻和宝贵的职能，并被赋予了最高的神圣职责。<page>早在中心建成之前，警卫就面临着危险，即使是穿透这些墙壁的昆虫也必须为城堡的安全而工作。<page>当你的心回到保护壳中时，你是否因为它被唤醒而感激？这是否意味着地球消失了？<hpage>最终，我们会发现我们的创造者。

original_en_text: This band of metal teeth, sharp and light-fine. It could be woven within your red outer layer? A hidden weapon.
original_zh_text: 金属齿环，轻便锐利。可编入您的红色披风？作为暗器。
translated_text: Your metal bracelet is sharp and light. Can you see the red color? Shadow of shadow.
secondary_translated_text: 你的金属手镯又锋利又轻。你能看到红色吗？影子之影。

original_en_text: <page=S>You seem displeased, Old One. We only did as you asked, yes? The snare is sprung, the creature consumed.<hpage>You bound it to that void!<page=S>Don’t play daft. You should well know our family’s fixations. Surely you had a hunch?<page=B>How else could we hope to trap one of your pale kin? Or see her consumed with such insatiable efficiency?<hpage>Then you have miscalculated, gravely. The white knight, she fell with the mother...<page=M>Oh ho... The quakes, yes? We have felt their force, even here. So the mother resists the dark... to save the child?<hpage>That is my guess. I must descend to the void below, and see clear that truth for myself.<page=M>Ohhhh. How… unfortunate. All of Pharloom will fall to her flailing.<hpage>So it may, but I will not watch idle while it crumbles.
original_zh_text: <page=S>古老者，您似乎不太高兴？我们不过照您吩咐行事罢了。陷阱已发，猎物入彀。<hpage>你们把它和虚空捆在了一起！<page=S>别装傻了。您该清楚我们家族对力量百无禁忌，难道没料到这步？<page=B>不然怎困得住您那苍白同族？又怎教她贪婪吞噬得这般彻底？<hpage>那你们可大错特错了，那苍白骑士也随其母亲一同坠落了……<page=M>哦嚯嚯……是说那些震颤？即便在这里也能感知到。所以是母亲正抵抗黑暗……为了救孩子？<hpage>我是这么猜想的。但必须亲自下去深渊，看清真相。<page=M>哎呀呀……这可……不妙。整个纺络都要被她垂死挣扎掀翻。<hpage>或许吧，但我不会坐视王国崩塌。
translated_text: <page=S>"It sounds painful, old man, and you'll do as you say. What are you doing? The trap comes out and the organism is absorbed.<hpage>Put it in an empty space!<page=S>We need to know more about how families work.<page=B>How do we contact our grandparents? Or will we be consumed by greedy efficiency?<hpage>I made a big mistake in my calculations. The knight in white fell with his mother.<page=M>It was an earthquake, right? Actually? So mothers resist the darkness to save their children.<hpage>This is my assumption: I go to heaven and see the truth.<page=M>Oh, what's that? Why? All Pharaoh's belongings were in his hands.<hpage>This may be true, but I can't escape it.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>“这听起来很痛苦，老人，你会照你说的去做。你在干什么？陷阱出来，生物体被吸收。<hpage>把它放在空的地方！<page=S>我们需要更多地了解家庭如何运作。<page=B>我们如何联系祖父母？或者我们会被贪婪的效率所吞噬吗？<hpage>我在计算中犯了一个大错误。白衣骑士和他的母亲一起倒下了。<page=M>那是一场地震，对吧？实际上？因此，母亲们抵制黑暗来拯救她们的孩子。<hpage>这是我的假设：我去天堂并看到真相。<page=M>哦，那是什么？为什么？法老的一切财物都在他手中。<hpage>这可能是真的，但我无法逃避。

original_en_text: This lump here is well heavy, and shiny too, so it’s surely worth somethin’!
original_zh_text: 这块沉甸甸的，还闪着光，肯定值点钱儿！
translated_text: Here, this part is heavy and bright, so it's worth it!
secondary_translated_text: 在这里，这部分是沉重的和明亮的，所以它是值得的！

original_en_text: Desperate times make for desperate customers, heh heh! So let’s get to tradin’, eh?
original_zh_text: 世道混乱，方便宰客！嘿嘿！赶紧的！
translated_text: Desperate moments produce desperate customers. Want to start a business?
secondary_translated_text: 绝望的时刻会产生绝望的顾客。想创业吗？

original_en_text: Again... Huu... Huu. Truly incredible!<page>Was it the course? Did I lose focus? Or are you simply the bug I have waited so long for? Her of such skill that my wish could, at last, be granted?<page>Another reward must be given for your speed, nimble bug. One deserved in full!
original_zh_text: 又输了……呼……真不可思议！<page>是我分心了？还是你太强？我的心愿终于有机会实现了吗？<page>我得再送你个奖励，你应得的！
translated_text: I'm back. Make the phone, make the phone. I can't believe it!<page>Is this a race? Have you lost your concentration? Is this the BAP we have been waiting for? I know you must have a lot of power. Will my wish come true? "<page>You must provide additional rewards for speed and agility errors.
secondary_translated_text: 我回来了打电话，打电话。我简直不敢相信！<page>这是比赛吗？你集中注意力了吗？这就是我们一直在等待的BAP吗？我知道你一定有很大的权力。我的愿望会实现吗？"<page>你必须为速度和敏捷错误提供额外的奖励。

original_en_text: Have you heard, miss grown-up? Beyond the moss, in the crumbled caverns filled with worms, much change is happening, different to the horrid, stretching dark outside.<page>What brings such bright and bold transformation? Is it a beast? Or a bug unseen? How wondrous it would be to discover them, hidden away in some deep corner!<page>You must go searching, miss grown-up! You and that sharp, sharp blade. Think of the strange and succulent shell waiting to be added to your journal?
original_zh_text: 大姐姐听说了吗？苔原深处满是蠕虫的崩塌洞窟里，正在发生剧变，与外界的恐怖黑灾截然不同。<page> 是什么带来这种鲜明蜕变？是巨兽？还是未知虫类？要是能知道它们是什么，藏在哪里，该多奇妙呀！<page> 你一定要去探索，大姐姐！带上你那锋利的针刃，给记录册里多添上几份奇异的甲壳记录！
translated_text: Your Majesty, did you hear that? On the other end of the lichen, in a cave of destructive and infectious insects, many changes are taking place, unlike the terrible darkness that is spreading.<page>Why make such bold changes? Is he a monster? An invisible mistake? If I could hide it in a deep corner, how beautiful it would be!<page>"Your Majesty, look. You and your sword. Imagine a strange juicy shell waiting to be added to your diary.
secondary_translated_text: 皇上，你听到了吗？在地衣的另一端，在一个充满破坏性和传染性昆虫的洞穴里，许多变化正在发生，不像可怕的黑暗正在蔓延。<page>为什么要做出如此大胆的改变？他是怪物吗？看不见的错误？如果我能把它藏在一个很深的角落里，那该是多么美丽啊！<page>“陛下，您看。你和你的剑。想象一下，一个奇怪的多汁的贝壳等待添加到你的日记中。

original_en_text: Now, isn’t this a wondrous place! Golden bells, for weary shells! Ha ha ha!<hpage>This settlement offers safety now, little pilgrim. Perhaps you should make a home here?<hpage>You’ve done well to make it this far, and the roads ahead will only be more dangerous.<page>Oh, dangerous they surely are! But I will gladly tread any path that holds wonders as magnificent as this, red maiden!
original_zh_text: 这地方太妙了！金钟给累瘫的虫子报时！哈哈哈！<hpage>小朝圣者，此处暂时安全，为何不在此安家？<hpage>走到这里实属不易，前方只会更加凶险。<page>凶险又如何！能见到这般奇景，刀山火海我也愿前往！
translated_text: This is not a good place, is it? The bell rings on the tired shells. Ha!<hpage>This reconciliation will ensure the safety of young pilgrims.<hpage>At this stage, the road ahead of us will only become more dangerous.<page>This is really dangerous! "I can create such a miracle, Miss Reid.
secondary_translated_text: 这不是一个好地方，不是吗？钟声在疲惫的贝壳上响起。哈！<hpage>这种和解将确保年轻朝圣者的安全。<hpage>现阶段，我们前面的道路只会变得更加危险。<page>这真的很危险！“我可以创造这样的奇迹，里德小姐。

original_en_text: <hpage>You have keen sight for my skill, bug, but my childhood has long since passed. What has happened here? I see signs of battle all around.
original_zh_text: <hpage>你的眼力不错，我确是一名战士，但早已称不上是孩子。这是怎么回事？到处是打斗痕迹。
translated_text: <hpage>You know what I can do, bugs, but my childhood is over and there are signs of struggle everywhere.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>你知道我能做什么，虫子，但我的童年已经结束了，到处都是挣扎的迹象。

translated_text: <hpage>...

original_en_text: <hpage>The time is close, Shakra. The cost was grave, and the challenge steep, but I have claimed a power that can put end to this disaster. <page>Gendaa... This is good, Hornet Wielding Needle, essential. My own strength has near reached its limit, and the dark husks continue their assault unceasing.<page>Take your final action, and let us all see the end of this.
original_zh_text: <hpage>时机到了。虽然代价惨重，但我找到了终结灾祸的方法。<page>哏嗒……太好了，小姑娘。我正好快撑不住了，黑虫的攻势永不停歇。<page>放手去干吧，让我们一起见证结局。
translated_text: <hpage>The time has come, the cost for Schalke is huge, the problem is huge, but I have the power to prevent this disaster.<page>So far, it has been... Wasps can maintain the balance of needles. Its intensity has reached its limit, and the dark shell continues to attack.<page>Let's take the final step and see how it all ends.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>时间已经到来，沙尔克的代价是巨大的，问题是巨大的，但我有能力阻止这场灾难。<page>到目前为止，已经.黄蜂可以保持针的平衡。它的强度已经达到了极限，黑暗的贝壳继续攻击。<page>让我们迈出最后一步，看看这一切会如何结束。

original_en_text: Your achievements in the games are inspiring! In time, I may have to challenge those impressive scores...
original_zh_text: 你创下的记录真令我激动！改天我要挑战看看！
translated_text: The success in the game is encouraging. Over time, you will have to face this impressive result.
secondary_translated_text: 游戏中的成功令人鼓舞。随着时间的推移，您将不得不面对这个令人印象深刻的结果。

original_en_text: <hpage>Good luck on your quest Garmond. If you hope to claim justice for your fellows passed, I suspect you’ve some challenge yet ahead.<page>Aye! Zaza and I’ll fight to cavern’s end if it need be, for the bugs held in our hearts, and our honour as knights!
original_zh_text: <hpage>祝你们好运，要找圣堡讨公道可不容易。<page>为了心中的记忆，为了骑士的荣耀！就算要杀遍每处洞穴我们也在所不惜！
translated_text: <hpage>If you want to get justice for your dead fellow citizens, I think you will still have some trouble.<page>Oh, yes! Oh, yes! If necessary, Zi and I will fight to the end of the cave for the honor of Heartworm and Knight.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>如果你想为死去的同胞伸张正义，我想你仍然会遇到一些麻烦。<page>哦，是的！哦，是的！如果有必要，我和紫将为了心虫和骑士的荣誉而战斗到洞穴的尽头。

original_en_text: Ahh, can you feel it too? The thralls of the Citadel are gathered close, in overwhelming numbers!<page>Together though, the three of us would be more overwhelming still! Would you allow us to fight by your side, brave sister?
original_zh_text: 啊哈，感觉到了吗？圣堡的傀儡在集结，非常多！<page>咱们三个联手，肯定不可阻挡！要一起战斗吗，勇敢的姐妹？
translated_text: Did you hear that too? The slaves in the castle gathered in the crowd!<page>If there were three of us, it would be even better." Honey, can you let me call? ". " "
secondary_translated_text: 你也听到了吗？城堡里的奴隶聚集在人群中！<page>如果我们有三个人，那就更好了。“亲爱的，你能让我打电话吗？". " "

original_en_text: Well, well! See what happens to nasty bully-bugs when they come after poor old Grindle? That’s a well-deserved end, we reckon.<page>We heard this old Sitty-dell was nice and quiet and burstin’ with goodies. So what’s happened, eh? Why’s it crawlin’ with bullies and busybodies?<hpage>The creature that haunts this place is stirring, little thief. The Citadel’s caste now roam the halls. You would do well to leave soon, if you mean to survive.<page>What what? You bein’ mirthful? We’re stayin’ here ‘til we’re done pilfering! You should be the one leavin’ if you’re so afeared!
original_zh_text: 啧啧！瞧瞧那些欺负格林德尔恶霸虫是什么下场？真是活该！<page>都说圣堡既清净，宝贝又多，怎么全是打手？<hpage>掌控此地的怪物正在苏醒，圣堡的守卫四处游荡，想活命就快逃吧，小毛贼。<page>怕什么！起码得等偷够本再说！你要是害怕了，那就自己逃吧！
translated_text: What happens when this evil vision reaches poor Grindell? I think this is the right ending.<page>I heard that this ancient city hall is beautiful, quiet and full of beautiful things, but why are there so many bandits and noisy people everywhere?<hpage>Creatures that invade this place will be resurrected thieves. The castle now hangs in the corridors. If you want to survive, you'd better start as soon as possible.<page>What is this? Are you smiling? I will stay until the end of the plane. If you're scared, hurry up.
secondary_translated_text: 当这个邪恶的幻象到达可怜的格林德尔时，会发生什么？我认为这是正确的结局。<page>听说这座古老的市政厅美丽、安静、充满了美丽的东西，但为什么到处都有这么多强盗和吵闹的人呢？<hpage>入侵这里的生物将成为复活的小偷。城堡现在悬挂在走廊中。如果你想活下去，最好尽快开始。<page>这是什么？你在笑吗？我会留下来直到飞机结束。如果你害怕，快点。

original_en_text: High up, above the caverns all of crust, Nuu has been told of a hole, filled with writhing things, all zipping and zapping.<page>But so sad! Nuu cannot herself see it. The lands quake and rattle. The savage threads stretch. The dangers are too much.<page>It must be you, miss grown-up, older, stiffer, a shell less precious. Seek the cave, and the things within. How else will the journal be complete?
original_zh_text: 努努听说，在布满硬壳的洞窟高处，有个满是扭动生物的洞穴，噼啪作响。<page> 但好可惜！努努不能去看。大地震动，凶暴丝线蔓延，太危险了。<page> 必须靠你了，大姐姐，你甲壳厚实，经验丰富。去探查那个洞穴吧！不然记录册怎么完整呢？
translated_text: There, Noah felt that each cave had a hole in the tree bark, filled with distorted objects.<page>But she was very sad! No one can see Noah, and no one can see him. The earth is shaking, and the traces of barbarism continue. The danger now is too great.<page>They are all newspapers. You are old and work hard, and your cover is useless. Open the cave and what's inside. How did you end it?
secondary_translated_text: 在那里，诺亚感觉每个洞穴的树皮上都有一个洞，里面装满了扭曲的物体。<page>但她很难过！没有人能看到诺亚，也没有人能看到他。地动山摇，野蛮的痕迹仍在继续。现在的危险太大了。<page>都是报纸。你老了，工作又努力，你的掩护也没用。打开洞穴和里面的东西。你是如何结束的？

original_en_text: Ahh miss grown-up, Nuu hoped you would return here. For clever Nuu can track well where you have been, she sees your cut-marks and sniffs out your fragrant trail!<page>And look where the trail has led sweet Nuu! A thick wriggler lived in this nest, rumbling and crackling in the darkness.<page>Its sour juices still line these rocky insides, and patient Nuu will gather it all up!<hpage>There is much to learn in these crusted highlands Nuu, but much danger as well. Indulge your curiosity if you must, but keep your senses trained on the darkness.
original_zh_text: 大姐姐！努努跟着你的刀痕和体香找到这啦！<page>这个巢穴住着条乱扭的胖家伙，在黑暗里咔咔响！<page>岩壁上还粘着它的酸液，努努要全部收集！<hpage>这里虽然知识多，但也很危险，别只顾着好奇，也要小心黑暗中的动静。
translated_text: "Sir, please come back here. SmartNuu can track your location. I looked at your knife, and I smelled it.<page>A huge crocodile lived in the nest, picking its nose in the dark.<page>The stone is still full of bitterness and the patient's sisters are collecting it!<hpage>There is a lot to learn in a hard-core environment, but there are also a lot of risks, so if you need to, satisfy your curiosity and train your senses in the dark.
secondary_translated_text: “先生，请回到这里。SmartNuu可以跟踪您的位置。我看着你的刀，闻到了它的味道。<page>巢穴里住着一只巨大的鳄鱼，在黑暗中挖鼻子。<page>石头仍然充满苦涩，病人的姐妹们正在收集！<hpage>在硬核环境中有很多东西需要学习，但也有很多风险，所以如果你需要的话，可以满足你的好奇心，在黑暗中训练你的感官。

original_en_text: Don’t let defeat weigh on you, nimble bug! If strength remains, simply step again to the challenge. Let us soar swift together!
original_zh_text: 别灰心！还有力气就再比一次！
translated_text: Don't fall into failure, don't fall into the mistake of flexibility, if we want to stay, we have to fight again. Come on, come on!
secondary_translated_text: 不要陷入失败，不要陷入灵活的错误，如果我们想留下来，就必须再次战斗。来吧来吧

original_en_text: Oh! Those horrible beasty-beasts are gone! Much and many thanks for you, mighty warrior!<hpage>It was a simple thing, small bug. I assume you are Tipp, the courier?<hpage>Frey, the Bellhart trader, seemed concerned for your safety... and for the cargo you carry.<page>She sent you?! Bah! She needs to learny-learn a little patience! I’m is barely been away! But still... is lucky-lucky for me you came.
original_zh_text: 哇！那些丑、丑八怪全被干掉了！多谢勇士！<hpage>举手之劳。你是蒂普？<hpage>钟心镇的芙蕾很担心你……还有你带的货。<page>她找的你？切！让她学、学着点耐心！我才离开一会儿！
translated_text: Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! The beast has disappeared! Thank you, great soldier.<hpage>You're an agent, right? Actually?<hpage>Burhart businessman Frey seemed concerned about Burhart's safety and cargo.<page>You sent him? Oh, Oh, Oh! You must learn to be patient! I hardly missed it! However, despite this... ... I am very lucky to be here.
secondary_translated_text: 哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！野兽消失了！谢谢你，伟大的士兵。<hpage>你是经纪人吧？实际上？<hpage>伯哈特商人弗雷似乎担心伯哈特的安全和货物。<page>你派他来的？哦，哦，哦！你必须学会有耐心！我几乎没有错过它！然而，尽管如此. ...我很幸运来到这里。

translated_text: Photo source: Beach Car

original_en_text: Well, I’m is be off now. That old grubly-grub in the bell will come after me herself if she not get her goods!
original_zh_text: 好吧，我这就送货去。再不回去那个老、老财迷要亲自追来了！
translated_text: If that stubborn piece of paper does nothing, it will come to me.
secondary_translated_text: 如果那张顽固的纸什么也不做，我就会找到它。

original_en_text: Now I must train, and strive, further and faster by your example. Your skill upon these tracks has roused my spirit, nimble bug. You shall forever have my thanks.
original_zh_text: 现在，我要以你为榜样加倍训练！你点燃了我的斗志！我会永远感谢你的！
translated_text: Now I have to train, follow his example, and go faster. Your skills on this track awakened my mind, agile bug. Thank you for your continued support.
secondary_translated_text: 现在我必须训练，效仿他的榜样，走得更快。你在这条赛道上的技巧唤醒了我的头脑，敏捷的虫子。感谢您的持续支持。

original_en_text: A town built within the thick vein of bells that runs through Pharloom’s core. One wonders who would craft so many, and for what purpose?
original_zh_text: 建在钟脉上的小镇。谁造的这么多钟？图什么？
translated_text: It is surrounded by deep veins that run through Faro's heart. I want to know who did what.
secondary_translated_text: 它被贯穿法鲁心脏的深静脉包围。我想知道谁做了什么。

original_en_text: Hornet Wielding Needle! With my master’s passing, I have resolved to improve my skills that, in time, I may match her prime.<page>Much work I must do to achieve that goal. I have found this wide bare stone fine ground on which to train.<page>Would you spar with me now? Raise that blade and test my rings! You may prove my greatest challenge yet.
original_zh_text: "使针的小姑娘！导师不在了，我决定要练到她巅峰水平。<page>这块裸岩地正适合特训。<page>来比划比划？亮兵器吧！你或许是我最大的挑战。"
translated_text: After my master passed away, I decided to improve my skills and eventually reach the peak of my master.<page>In order to achieve this goal, we have made great efforts. "I found this spacious place where I could crawl like a bare stone. "<page>Do you want to compete with me? Picking up the sheets and checking the rings was probably the biggest challenge I faced.
secondary_translated_text: 我的师傅去世后，我决定提高自己的技能，最终达到师傅的巅峰。<page>为了实现这个目标，我们付出了巨大的努力。“我找到了这个宽敞的地方，我可以像光秃秃的石头一样爬行。"<page>你想和我比吗？拿起床单并检查戒指可能是我面临的最大挑战。

original_en_text: <hpage>Your charts and tools show fine skill, Shakra. I’ve met few who’d match your talent.<page>Cartography! Peh. Bakallo! It is a craft-skill common amongst my tribe. Most important to keep one’s mind sharp when on a journey.<page>The charting of caverns, the memory of travel, the knowing of one’s place within the kingdom, an engaging task for a warrior’s mind.<page>An unfortunate thing that my great mentor never learnt the skill. Her talent at getting lost... I should almost be impressed...
original_zh_text: <hpage>你的图纸工具很专业，很少见过这般手艺。<page>测绘？呵！吧咔咯！这是我们部落必学的手艺，最重要的是能在旅途中保持专注。<page>记山洞、画路线、辨方位，最适合战士动脑子的活计。<page>可惜我得导师没这本事。她迷路的本事……反而令我佩服……
translated_text: <hpage>Shakra said his cards and tools show incredible skill and few can match his talent. "<page>Draw a map! Pepper Karlo! This is a common skill in our tribe and it is important to keep your hair clean while traveling.<page>Mapping caves, traveling through memories, and discovering their place in the kingdom are fascinating occupations for soldiers.<page>Unfortunately, my predecessor never learned this technique. I lost a role that I was almost impressed with.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>沙克拉说，他的牌和工具表现出令人难以置信的技巧，很少有人能与他的才华相媲美。"<page>画一张地图！佩珀卡洛！这是我们部落的一项常见技能，旅行时保持头发清洁很重要。<page>绘制洞穴地图、穿越记忆以及发现它们在王国中的位置对于士兵来说都是令人着迷的职业。<page>不幸的是，我的前任从未学习过这种技术。我失去了一个我几乎印象深刻的角色。

original_en_text: Lots of good stuff tucked away in this old prison... lovely place to bring a lucky little snitchbug like Grindle! What a favour those lugs did us! O-hoho!
original_zh_text: 这破监狱藏着不少好货呀……格林德尔就爱关在这种地方！哦嚯嚯！
translated_text: This old prison has many advantages and is the perfect place to accommodate happy whistleblowers like Greendale! Ears are very useful! Oh, Oh, Oh!
secondary_translated_text: 这座旧监狱有很多优势，是容纳像格林德尔这样快乐举报人的完美地方！耳朵很有用！哦，哦，哦！

original_en_text: Oooh, ma. Miss grown-up, you deny poor Nuu? So sour!<hpage>I am sorry, Nuu. Though I recognise the value in your wish, my own task is too pressing.
original_zh_text: 呜呜，天啊。大姐姐，你拒绝可怜的努努？好伤心！<hpage>抱歉，努努。我知道你这份祈愿的价值，但我的使命更为紧迫。
translated_text: Mommy! Would you reject the poor? It's too sour.<hpage>"I know your wish is important, but my job is very urgent.
secondary_translated_text: 妈妈！你会拒绝穷人吗？太酸了。<hpage>“我知道你的愿望很重要，但我的工作非常紧迫。

original_en_text: Come to rest here, miss grown-up? Then let Nuu see our journal, for she is eager to see your cuts!
original_zh_text: 大姐姐来这休息？那快让努努看看记录册，等不及要看你的战果啦！
translated_text: "Isn't this a place to rest?" I want to watch this video, sister. Read the newspaper!
secondary_translated_text: “这不是休息的地方吗？“我想看这个视频，姐姐。读报纸！

original_en_text: This great structure... It would have taken the lifetimes of so many bugs to build it. Now its wounds run deep, and I can hear the groaning of its final breaths.<page>Everything that grows must pass, I suppose. Still, to witness even its current state is a privilege I’ll not squander.<page>And what of you, friend Hornet? Where are your travels taking you?<hpage>They have taken me deep, and will take me yet deeper still. I have a responsibility to cut this land free of its dark fate.<hpage>That is no concern of yours though, sir. You should continue your own journey, albeit with a claw on your weapon at all times.
original_zh_text: 这宏伟建筑……不知耗费了多少代虫的心血。如今却只能发出垂死呻吟。<page>盛极必衰吧，大概。不过能见证这最后的余晖也是荣幸。<page>你呢？你的旅途通向哪里？<hpage>我要往更深处去，我有责任斩断这片土地的诅咒。<hpage>但这与你无关。继续你的旅程吧，但要记得握紧武器。
translated_text: I have made countless mistakes throughout my life, the wound has fallen off, and I begin to feel my last breath.<page>The opportunity to see it in this way is a privilege and cannot be missed.<page>"How are you, bee? "Where will your journey take you?<hpage>They love me deeply, love me deeply.<hpage>Even if your weapon is a bit 'you have to continue your journey.
secondary_translated_text: 我一生中犯了无数错误，伤口已经脱落，我开始感觉到最后一口气了。<page>以这种方式看到它的机会是一种荣幸，不容错过。<page>“你好吗，蜜蜂？“你的旅程将带你去哪里？<hpage>他们深深地爱我，深深地爱我。<hpage>即使你的武器有点‘你也必须继续你的旅程。

original_en_text: To our safe haven? Our home... This is what’s left of it after the great breaking began.<page>There was that terrible noise from above. Everything shook and fell apart, and the black threads sprung up from beneath. Many a poor pilgrim has already been lost to the destruction.<page>You might have been too, if not for some fleeing pilgrims who found you fallen and carried you back to us.<hpage>The black threads... I may understand their source.<hpage>I must speak with the old Caretaker. Do you know what has become of him? I see he has left you his garb.<page>Oh, yes. He charged me with looking after those remaining here, said he had to confer with his family down below.<hpage>Down below... Then they have slunk away to hide in their ruined chapel.<hpage>I must pay them a visit. Thank you, Sherma. Stay safe, and take care of your fellow pilgrims.
original_zh_text: 这里原本是我们的避难所……大崩塌之后就变成这样了。<page>头顶传来可怕的巨响，天花板塌了，地下还冒出黑丝，好多同袍都被卷走了。<page>要不是几个逃难的同袍发现你昏倒在路边，恐怕你也……<hpage>那些黑丝……我大概知晓其源头。<hpage>我得去找老看守者。你可知道他去哪了？你穿着他的衣服。<page>他让我照顾留下的人，说要去下面和家人商量事情。<hpage>下面……肯定是躲到破教堂里了。<hpage>我得去找他们。你多保重，照顾好大家。
translated_text: Safe port. After the fall of Pride, the house was abandoned.<page>There was a terrible noise coming from above. Everything trembled and collapsed, a black line emerged from the floor, and many poor pilgrims died of destruction.<page>If you weren't the fugitive who led us to him, maybe you are the same person.<hpage>Black lines show its origin.<hpage>I want to talk to a veteran, do you know what happened? These are her clothes. "<page>Oh, yes, I said I have to take care of the people who live here and talk to the family down there.<hpage>He walked into an abandoned church.<hpage>They have to visit. Thank you, Sherman. Please stay safe and take care of the pilgrims.
secondary_translated_text: 安全港口。骄傲节陷落后，房子被遗弃了。<page>上面传来可怕的声音。一切都颤抖了，倒塌了，地板上冒出了一道黑线，许多可怜的朝圣者死于破坏。<page>如果你不是带领我们找到他的逃犯，也许你就是同一个人。<hpage>黑线显示了它的起源。<hpage>我想和一位老兵谈谈，你知道发生了什么吗？这些是她的衣服。"<page>哦，是的，我说我必须照顾住在这里的人，并与那里的家人交谈。<hpage>他走进一座废弃的教堂。<hpage>他们必须参观。谢谢你，谢尔曼。请注意安全并照顾好朝圣者。

original_en_text: Bakkana! A battle well won! The haunted bugs have been defeated and the way forward is yours. Let us meet again soon, away from this dreadful Citadel.
original_zh_text: 啵咔呐！赢得漂亮！迷途虫都被消灭了，你可以继续前行了。后会有期，离这鬼圣堡远点。
translated_text: The battles you won in the Balkans have been lost, and the path to the future is yours. Choose this terrible castle and you will see it soon.
secondary_translated_text: 你们在巴尔干地区赢得的战斗已经失败，通往未来的道路属于你们。选择这座可怕的城堡，你很快就会看到它。

original_en_text: Huge caves ascending to Pharloom’s Citadel. The roads are slowly being devoured by sand and howling wind.
original_zh_text: 通向圣堡的巨洞，风沙正在逐渐吞噬这里的道路。
translated_text: A huge cave stretches all the way to Palham Castle. The streets were swallowed up by sand and noise.
secondary_translated_text: 一个巨大的洞穴一直延伸到帕勒姆城堡。街道被沙子和噪音吞没。

original_en_text: <hpage>Farewell, tall bug, until we cross again.<page>Or until death calmly claims us both...
original_zh_text: <hpage>再会，下次碰面……<page>或许就是我们的死期……
translated_text: <hpage>Goodbye until you come back.<page>Until death passed quietly,
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>再见，直到你回来。<page>直到死亡悄然过去，

original_en_text: Again and again you prove your mastery, nimble bug, yet still I never tire of the challenge!<page>As reward for such an impressive feat of endurance, I have only this small trophy, a memento given by my own speed teacher, now fairly passed to you.
original_zh_text: 你一次又一次证明了自己！但我永不厌倦挑战！<page>对这份惊人耐力的奖励，我只有这小奖杯了，是我师父给我的，现在传给你了！
translated_text: You have shown your skills, your agility time and time again, but I love this challenge!<page>I have this little trophy as a reward for this impressive patient result. I remember my super dominator, and now I give it to him.
secondary_translated_text: 你一次又一次地展示了你的技能和敏捷性，但我喜欢这个挑战！<page>我拥有这个小奖杯作为对这一令人印象深刻的患者结果的奖励。我记得我的超级主宰者，现在我把它交给了他。

original_en_text: <page=S>Bring us the hearts, Old One. Make’em beat, fierce and final. See for yourself the forgotten strength of this land of bugs before we burn those memories in its saving.
original_zh_text: <page=M>把心带来，古老者。通过它们的搏动，见证这片虫族土地被遗忘的伟力，再焚尽这些记忆换取救赎。
translated_text: <page=S>Dear friends, please give me your hearts. In the end, I failed. Before retaining these memories, let's take a look at the earth power of the forgotten insects.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>亲爱的朋友们，请把你们的心交给我。最后，我失败了。在保留这些记忆之前，让我们来看看这些被遗忘的昆虫的大地力量。

original_en_text: Tch... Hahahaa. Marvelous! So the spider knows something of fathomless beings, and still it hopes to stand against one, a god... <page>Where do you hide this boundless strength you claim, spider? I’ve watched your struggle towards us. Yours was a painful, broken trek. One needs grace to stand before the divine.<hpage>Then best you keep watching, child. I’ve found those who claim themselves a god can rarely match the title.<hpage>And experience tells me, even gods can fall.
original_zh_text: 哈！有意思！明知对手是神还妄想反抗？<page>你的底气在哪？爬得又慢又狼狈，谒见神明要优雅！<hpage>那你就继续看好了。自封为神的存在往往名不副实。<hpage>何况经验告诉我，即使是神也会陨落。
translated_text: His name is Haier, and he is great. Spiders know something about the unconscious, but they still want to fight God.<page>Infinite power is where I see you struggling on this journey, a painful and broken journey where one needs grace to stand before God.<hpage>I am happy to see the children, but a man who claims to be God does not deserve this title.<hpage>Experience tells me that God can fall.
secondary_translated_text: 他的名字叫海尔，他很棒。蜘蛛对无意识有所了解，但它们仍然想与上帝战斗。<page>无限的力量是我看到你们在这段旅程中挣扎的地方，这是一段痛苦而破碎的旅程，一个人需要恩典才能站在上帝面前。<hpage>我很高兴看到孩子们，但一个自称是上帝的人不配得到这个称号。<hpage>经验告诉我，上帝会堕落。

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, you look well at home in these wilds.<page>Poshanka! These scorched fields offer many paths and much combat. To leap from vantage upon the red-shells or to meet them face-front with rings ready? These are decisions to live for!<page>I am much surprised those soft pilgrims ever safely climbed this scorched and savage place.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，我看你在这荒野中自在的很。<page>啵尚咔！这片荒野多的是战斗机会。是从高处突袭红壳怪？还是正面对决？这才是战士的生活！<page>那些软脚的朝圣者能爬上这鬼地方，倒是让我吃惊。
translated_text: <hpage>Shakra, you feel peaceful in the desert.<page>Boshanka! Boshanka! This burning desert provides many roads and many battles. Should I jump into the red shells? Should I wear a ring on my forehead and say "Good Morning"? This is the choice in our lives!<page>I was surprised that language pilgrims were rescued in this burned and cruel place.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>夏克拉，你在沙漠中感到平静。<page>博尚卡！博尚卡！这片燃烧的沙漠提供了许多道路和许多战斗。我应该跳进红色贝壳吗？我应该在额头上戴一枚戒指并说“早安”吗？这是我们生活中的选择！<page>我很惊讶语言朝圣者在这个被烧毁而残酷的地方获救。

original_en_text: Here, the proof of our majesty... mark of our divine right...
original_zh_text: 这是王权之证……神授之印……
translated_text: It is a part of our greatness and a symbol of God's law.
secondary_translated_text: 它是我们伟大的一部分，也是上帝法律的象征。

original_en_text: Hoi hoi! A nimble opponent appears. At last! At last!<hpage>If you are seeking challengers, sir, you should choose a location less far afield. It is rare chance I, or any bug, would come upon this distant cavern.<page>True! Though once discovered, could there be a more perfect spot? This giant, boney body, so distant from Pharloom’s ails.<page>Here, freely, we can test our speed and our sleek shells. Here we may race!<page>You must be eager to step to the task, challenger? Fulfil my wish! Let us discover our limits together!
original_zh_text: 哟嚯！终于来个能跑的！<hpage>先生，若想找虫比试，不该待在如此偏远之地。<page>有道理，但最棒的赛道就在这！还远离纺络的破事。<page>这里能尽情展现速度与甲壳之美！来赛一场吧！<page>你也等不及了吧？快来满足我的愿望，一起测试极限！
translated_text: What is this? Flexibility, finally! Infinite (infinite)<hpage>If you are looking for a competitor, choose a place that is not too far away. The possibility of insects entering this remote cave is very small.<page>Producer!! But once you find it, what is perfect? The huge bone corpse is far from the national farm.<page>You are free to test your speed and agility. You can compete here.<page>Challenger? Do you want to do something like this? I hope my wish can come true! Let's explore the boundaries together!
secondary_translated_text: 这是什么？终于灵活了！无限（无限）<hpage>如果您正在寻找竞争对手，请选择一个不太远的地方。昆虫进入这个偏远洞穴的可能性非常小。<page>制片人！！但一旦你找到了，什么才是完美的呢？巨大的骨尸距离国家农场很远。<page>您可以自由测试您的速度和敏捷性。你可以在这里竞争。<page>挑战者？你想做这样的事情吗？希望我的愿望能够实现！让我们一起探索界限！

original_en_text: Our capital, built grand... The seat of our sovereignty... slipped from my mind...<page>Why does it fade? Why can I not recall that sacred place?
original_zh_text: 我的宏伟的都城……我的王座……为什么记不清了……<page>为什么消失了……为什么想不起圣地模样……
translated_text: Capital is wonderful. Where is sovereignty? She disappeared from my mind.<page>Why did he disappear? Why don't we remember the Holy Land?
secondary_translated_text: 资本是美好的。主权在哪里？她从我的脑海中消失了。<page>他为什么消失了？为什么我们不记住圣地？

original_en_text: Zaza and I will tarry here a little longer... These pilgrims need watching over, and we are committed to the task.
original_zh_text: 我和扎扎会在这多待一会……这些朝圣者需要照看。
translated_text: Who and I will be here for a while, these pilgrims need to be taken care of, and we are committed to this mission.
secondary_translated_text: 谁和我将在这里待一段时间，这些朝圣者需要得到照顾，我们致力于这项使命。

original_en_text: Delicious! I like you already!<page>But what a bore it would be to cut you down now, when you’re so achingly close to our grand Citadel...<page>Climb higher, little spider. I want to savour your struggle just a little longer!
original_zh_text: 有意思！我开始喜欢你了！<page>但现在杀你太无聊了，离圣堡就差一步……<page>继续爬吧小蜘蛛！让我想多看看你挣扎的样子！
translated_text: This is delicious! I know I'm in love with him!<page>However, it is very close to our beautiful castle, so dividing it up is boring. "<page>"Wake up, child. I want to call again.
secondary_translated_text: 这太好吃了！我知道我爱上他了！<page>然而，它距离我们美丽的城堡非常近，所以分割它很无聊。"<page>“醒醒，孩子。我想再打一次。

original_en_text: But Nuu is sensible, she understands. Miss grown-up has purpose, she must be away.<page>The cleaning can wait for another time. Nuu is patient... always patient.
original_zh_text: 但努努很懂事，知道大姐姐有正事要忙。<page>清洁可以等下次，努努很耐心……最有耐心了……
translated_text: Danny is smart and compassionate, and this woman has a purpose and she has to leave.<page>Next time, I wait for cleaning. I am always patient. You always have to be patient.
secondary_translated_text: 丹尼聪明又有同情心，这个女人有目的，她必须离开。<page>下一次，我等着打扫。我总是很有耐心。你必须始终保持耐心。

original_en_text: <hpage>You seem to have some familiarity with this prison and its guards. Do you know a path to escape?<page>Escape! A little jailbug like you ain’t ever escapin’ anything! Get out of here, will you? Stop bothering us! You got nothing to steal, so we got nothing to talk about!
original_zh_text: <hpage>你看起来对这里很熟，知道越狱路线吗？<page>想逃？就你？下辈子吧！别烦我们了，身上什么也没有，没资格跟爷说话！
translated_text: <hpage>He knows about prisons and guards.<page>Run, run, run! Prisoners like you will never escape!" Get out of here and don't bother me, don't steal, don't argue. "
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>他了解监狱和警卫。<page>快跑快跑像你这样的囚犯永远不会逃脱！“离开这里，不要打扰我，不要偷窃，不要争论。"

original_en_text: Though the dust has not yet settled over our battle here, Zaza and I must soon be away. The memory of our village calls us ever onward. Farewell, brave sister!
original_zh_text: 虽然战斗激起的尘埃还没落定，但我们该走啦。村里的大伙催着我们前进呢，保重，姐妹！
translated_text: Our struggle here is not over yet, but Zi and I must leave as soon as possible. People's memories lead us forward. Good luck.
secondary_translated_text: 我们在这里的斗争还没有结束，但我和子必须尽快离开。人们的记忆引领我们前进。祝你好运

original_en_text: <page>You would challenge again, nimble bug? You have proven yourself time and again.<hpage>Your course can still provide understanding, sir. Upon it, I see my own limits clearer and learn to push them further. <page>Of course! Of course! And I can learn much following behind your fair form.<page>I’d need only a moment, and the track would again be ready.
original_zh_text: <page>还要比？你已经证明实力了。<hpage>还需练习，你的赛道让我能看清自己的极限。<page>那当然好！跟在你这矫健身姿后面也能学到很多！<page>稍等，马上就能布置好新赛道！
translated_text: <page>The challenge is losing her again. I've tried it many times.<hpage>Master, your path gives us intuition. Since then, I have learned to see my limitations more clearly and push them further.<page>Of course! Yeah, no! We can learn a lot from this beauty.<page>This will take a while and the course will be ready again.
secondary_translated_text: <page>挑战是再次失去她。我已经尝试过很多次了。<hpage>大师，您的道路给了我们直觉。从那时起，我学会了更清楚地看到自己的局限性并进一步推动它们。<page>当然可以！是的，不！我们可以从这种美丽中学到很多东西。<page>这需要一段时间，课程将再次准备好。

original_en_text: <hpage>Your threats are worthless, child. If you are my foe, stay your voice and raise your blade.
original_zh_text: <hpage>不必多费口舌，孩子，要打的话，就亮兵器吧。
translated_text: <hpage>If you are my enemy, please raise your voice and raise your sword. "
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>如果你是我的敌人，请提高你的声音，举起你的剑。"

original_en_text: I can save you, little spider. All the trouble you’d face above. All the suffering. It’s so simple.<page>I’ll just skewer you here and now, pluck that flickering life right out of you.
original_zh_text: 我能救你哦~小蜘蛛。只要现在刺穿你，把那点小火星掐灭……<page>所有的苦痛，所有的折磨，就都能解脱了。
translated_text: "I can help you, spider. Every problem and every pain they face is simple.<page>I join you now to bring you a bright life.
secondary_translated_text: “我可以帮助你，蜘蛛。他们面临的每一个问题和每一个痛苦都很简单。<page>我现在加入你们，为你们带来光明的生活。

original_en_text: How sad. A little spider has fallen from its cage. So lost. So weak. Poor little morsel.
original_zh_text: 可怜的小蜘蛛从笼中跌落。多迷茫，多脆弱，真是令人心疼。
translated_text: Unfortunately, a little spider fell out of the cage and I lost it. I am a very fragile and poor child.
secondary_translated_text: 不幸的是，一只小蜘蛛从笼子里掉了出来，我把它弄丢了。我是一个非常脆弱又可怜的孩子。

original_en_text: Ooooh ma, is well-begun. Many creatures have been recorded, but many many more still to be learned of!<page>Miss grown-up, you should rest quick and venture out to hunt again soon, thinks Nuu!
original_zh_text: 哇哇，开了个好头！记了好多生物，但还有更多等着发现！<page>大姐姐赶紧休息完再去打猎呀！
translated_text: We have documented many organisms, but we need to know more.<page>I got up early to go hunting.
secondary_translated_text: 我们已经记录了许多生物体，但我们需要了解更多。<page>我起得很早去打猎。

original_en_text: Well fought sister, well fought! Though terrible and tenacious, the beast was no match for us.<page>Be proud! The bugs of this land will sing of our victory to their offspring, and their offspring’s offspring, forever more!
original_zh_text: 打得漂亮！这畜生虽然强悍，但不是我们的对手！<page>等着听这儿的虫子们传唱咱们的战绩吧！
translated_text: This beast is terrible, terrible, but it is not our enemy.<page>I am proud of you! Insects will always sing of our victory.
secondary_translated_text: 这只野兽很可怕，很可怕，但它不是我们的敌人。<page>我为你感到骄傲！昆虫永远会歌颂我们的胜利。

original_en_text: Hah... aha ha ha ha ha!<page>Congratulations, spider. Finally, I felt your sting, and you’ve bared the truth of my pathetic empty shell.<hpage>You always had the scent, child. You are no bug. Yours is a life born entirely from thread.<page>Life? You’re too generous! This weak, wasting existence. This was not life, just a husk shaped to act as a child.<hpage>Yours was life, pale one. Do not confuse your unique creation with its absence. I have seen others make the same mistake.<page>Platitudes, spider? From you? Don’t be gross.<page>Head on. Climb up, up and away. You’ve earned your audience with the divine.<page>Face the holy mother who would fashion so cruel and crude a daughter as me.
original_zh_text: 哈……哈哈哈哈！<page>恭喜啊小蜘蛛，你终于刺痛了我……也知道了我是具可悲的空壳。<hpage>我早察觉到了，孩子。你根本不是虫类，纯粹是丝线捏造的生命。<page>生命？你还真是心善！这种虚弱、日渐腐朽的身躯……这算什么生命，就是具空壳罢了。<hpage>你确实活着，苍白之子。我见过与你类似的存在……即便内里空无一物，你也是独一无二的生命。<page>少说漂亮话了，我只觉得恶心。<page>上去吧，你赢得觐见神明的资格了。<page>去面见那位造出我这般残次品的'圣母'吧……
translated_text: Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh!<page>Congratulations, spider. Finally, I felt your pain, and you found my pain.<hpage>You will always be, my daughter, you are not an insect, your life is born offline.<page>How is your life? You are so generous! "This is not life, but a body that functions like a child.<hpage>Don't confuse his white life, his white life, your only creation, with your absence.<page>Old spider? Dee? don't hurt me.<page>Get up, get up, go, you deserve a holy listener!<page>If you face the Virgin Mary, she will turn you into a cruel and violent child, just like me.
secondary_translated_text: 哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！<page>恭喜你，蜘蛛。最后，我感受到了你的痛苦，你也找到了我的痛苦。<hpage>你永远是，我的女儿，你不是昆虫，你的生活是线下诞生的。<page>你的生活怎么样？你太慷慨了！“这不是生命，而是一个像孩子一样运作的身体。<hpage>不要将他的白人生活、他的白人生活、你唯一的创造与你的缺席混为一谈。<page>老蜘蛛？迪伊？别伤害我。<page>站起来，站起来，走吧，你值得一个神圣的倾听者！<page>如果你面对圣母玛利亚，她会把你变成一个残酷暴力的孩子，就像我一样。

original_en_text: Conversing is a pleasure, but I must return to my observance. Try not to leave too much of a trail when you leave, please.
original_zh_text: 和你聊天很愉快，但我得继续去观察了。离开时注意别留太多痕迹。
translated_text: I love telling this story, but we must regain our conscience. When you leave, don't leave any traces.
secondary_translated_text: 我喜欢讲这个故事，但我们必须重新找回良心。当你离开时，不要留下任何痕迹。

original_en_text: <page=M>Enough chatting, Old One. Best you get heading below. Whatever action you’re planning, time is against you.
original_zh_text: <page=M>那么闲话少叙，古老者。赶紧下去吧，您的计划可拖不起。
translated_text: <page=M>Stop, old man, do this, no matter what you do, time will be against you.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>别说了，老头子，这么做吧，不管你做什么，时间都会对你不利的。

original_en_text: For sharing this moment I shall have you accept a gift, one I had believed I would never pass. <page>You would take these rings, and the learnings to make more.<page>They are built of a clever method devised by my master and will crush hard this kingdom’s toughest shell. Use them, and she is remembered!<hpage>My thanks, Shakra. To gain a tool so defined by its owner, I am much grateful. They shall prove a great aid on my own journey.
original_zh_text: 谢谢你陪我度过这一时刻，这些东西我本想永远留着……你当作谢礼收下吧。<page>这些环刃和制法都传给你。<page>它们是按我导师的巧思打造的，能击碎最硬的壳。希望你用得上，以此纪念她！<hpage>感激不尽，沙克拉。能继承如此珍贵的武器，对我的旅程大有帮助。
translated_text: To share this moment, you can accept gifts you have never given before.<page>I'll take the ring and find out every detail.<page>It was well built, and my master designed it to break through the hardest shell of the kingdom.<hpage>Thank you, thank you. This is the tool we describe. We thank the owners for giving us this opportunity and thank them. This was a great help for my trip.
secondary_translated_text: 为了分享这一刻，你可以接受你以前从未送过的礼物。<page>我拿着戒指去查清楚所有的细节。<page>它建造得很好，我的主人设计它来突破王国最坚硬的外壳。<hpage>谢谢谢谢这就是我们描述的工具。我们感谢业主给我们这个机会，并感谢他们。这对我的旅行有很大的帮助。

original_en_text: The warmth of these caverns keeps many smells alive! Is good for Nuu, who is always searching carefully for learnings!
original_zh_text: 洞窟里的余温保留着气味！正适合努努慢慢探索！
translated_text: The heat of this cave gives off a pleasant smell! This is good news for those who have been looking for knowledge! "
secondary_translated_text: 这个洞穴的热量散发着一种宜人的气味！这对于那些一直在寻找知识的人来说是个好消息！"

original_en_text: <hpage>Little pilgrim, these baths provide some respite from the dangers without, but even so you should not let down your guard.<hpage>You must have seen now that the bugs of this Citadel are long fallen to the Haunting.<page>Ahh... some of my brothers and sisters have seemed... lost somehow, yes. But to be lost is to be sometime found, is it not sung?<page>Yes... The Citadel will provide for them. It is a holy place indeed, that holds wonders such as this lovely warm bath!
original_zh_text: <hpage>小家伙，别因为泡澡放松警惕。<hpage>你也看到了，此地的虫民多半被丝咒侵蚀。<page>有些同袍确实……看着不太对劲。但迷途终有归时，对吧？<page>圣堡自会庇佑他们。能有这么舒服的暖泉，肯定是圣地没错！
translated_text: <hpage>A small tube, such as this bathtub, can temporarily relieve external dangers, but it cannot even relieve vigilance.<hpage>As you can see, the insects in the castle have fallen into the hands of the ghost.<page>Yes, right. Why can't they be as successful as my brothers? Will you find what you lost?<page>This is a truly sacred place, as miraculous as this beautiful hot spring!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>像这个浴缸这样的小管子可以暂时缓解外部危险，但甚至无法解除警惕。<hpage>如您所见，城堡里的昆虫都落入了鬼魂手中。<page>是的，正确的。为什么他们不能像我的兄弟们一样成功？你会找到你失去的东西吗？<page>这是一个真正神圣的地方，就像这美丽的温泉一样神奇！

original_en_text: Hoi! Let our mighty contest of shells commence again!
original_zh_text: 哟嚯！再战一轮！<page>我马上布置新的赛道！
translated_text: We started a great fish race!
secondary_translated_text: 我们开始了一场精彩的鱼比赛！

original_en_text: Hoy! We thought one of them buzzing bullies was sneakin’ up on us, but it’s just a mangy jailbug!<page>Why you in here, then? Caught thievin’ were you? Greedy, greedy!<hpage>I’ve stolen nothing. Rather, I suspect the wardens are servants of the Citadel. The cage used in my capture bore similar runes to the one that first brought me to this land.<hpage>Bound in that cage, I’d have proved a fine gift were they to deliver me to their masters.<page>Pah, there ain’t nothin’ fine about you, jailbug. We recognised a fellow thief soon as we saw you!<page>Now, don’t be lingerin’ around here. Those guards’ll be wanting to pop you back in your cage quick quick!<hpage>They’ll not get the chance. I will reclaim my belongings and leave this grim place with haste.
original_zh_text: 还当是狱卒呢，结果是只脏老鼠！<page>你是因为偷什么进来的？贪心鬼！<hpage>我没偷东西。这儿的狱卒应该侍奉于圣堡，抓我的笼子和最初那个有相同印记。<hpage>如此执着于我，看来它们真的认为我是一份献给主人的好礼物。<page>呸，你身上有什么好的！少装蒜，我一看你就一脸贼相！<page>快走快走！别在附近瞎晃悠，小心又被关回笼子！<hpage>他们没机会的，我取回自己的东西就走。
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. I knew the crowd would come, but it was just a dirty escape!<page>Why are you here? Did you catch the thief? There is greed, there is greed.<hpage>I've never stolen anything. Let us assume that a guard is a servant of the castle. I was kept in a cage with runic letters engraved on it, just like the cage that brought me to this earth.<hpage>If I were handed over to my master and locked in a cage, it would be a great gift.<page>When I saw it, I recognized the thief.<page>Guard back in the cage and run!<hpage>I want to get my luggage back and get out of this dark place as soon as possible.
secondary_translated_text: 嘿嘿。我知道人群会来，但这只是肮脏的逃跑！<page>你为什么来这里？你抓到小偷了吗？有贪婪，有贪婪。<hpage>我从来没有偷过任何东西。让我们假设警卫是城堡的仆人。我被关在一个笼子里，上面刻着符文字母，就像把我带到这个地球上的笼子一样。<hpage>如果我被交给我的主人并锁在笼子里，这将是一份很棒的礼物。<page>当我看到它时，我认出了小偷。<page>关回笼子里跑吧！<hpage>我想拿回我的行李，尽快离开这个黑暗的地方。

original_en_text: You recover quickly. Already, my ring-marks have faded from your shell. If you are prepared, let us duel again.
original_zh_text: 你恢复真快，我留下的环印都消了。准备好了我们就再战。
translated_text: Her recovery accelerated and the fingerprints on my ring disappeared from her shell. When I am ready, I will fight again.
secondary_translated_text: 她的康复速度加快，我戒指上的指纹从她的壳上消失了。当我准备好后，我会再次战斗。

original_en_text: ...Yes, communication is the heart of it. The grandest boasts and the tiniest murmurings all have their meanings...<page>...Your point is well made. Even the flowers have their stories to tell. Light can be cast anywhere...<hpage>I’ve no desire to interrupt your meditations, Herald, but I am eager to speak with you, if you would listen...<page>...Take note of it all, render it in line, you’ll be glad that you did. You can take the journey home with you...
original_zh_text: ……沟通至关重要。无论豪言壮语还是呢喃低语皆有深意……<page>……此言甚是。野花亦在诉说故事。光明无处不在...<hpage>使者大人，无意打扰冥思，但我急盼能与您交谈，您……<page>……记录所见所闻，他日必将受用。故乡之路存于心……
translated_text: ... Communication is the heart. There is a reason for big whistles and small whistles.<page>... Flowers have stories. Light can be cast anywhere.<hpage>I hate to interrupt your thoughts, Mr. Pioneer, but if you're willing to listen to me, I'd like to talk to you.<page>... If you write everything down and send it in order, you will be happy to do so.
secondary_translated_text: ...沟通是心脏。大哨和小哨是有原因的。<page>...花有故事。光可以投射到任何地方。<hpage>我不想打断你的想法，先锋先生，但如果你愿意听我说，我想和你谈谈。<page>...如果您将所有内容写下来并按顺序发送，您会很乐意这样做。

original_en_text: Oooh, but the scroll is so heavy with beautiful beasts! Could it be that the works is almost complete? Miss grown-up, you must keep your preyings up. No time for rest!
original_zh_text: 哎呀，记录册都快写满了！是不是快完成了？大姐姐不能偷懒哦！
translated_text: There are many great animals in the movie. Is your project almost complete? Children, let's keep hunting. Now is not the time to rest!
secondary_translated_text: 电影中有很多伟大的动物。您的项目即将完成吗？孩子们，我们继续打猎吧。现在不是休息的时候！

original_en_text: The myth we made... by grace... by blade...<page>All bowed before we princes green...
original_zh_text: 我们缔造的传说……凭恩泽……凭利刃……<page>万虫皆向绿王臣服……
translated_text: I appreciate your kindness. You should use a knife.<page>Everyone loves the green prince.
secondary_translated_text: 我很感激你的好意。你应该使用刀。<page>每个人都喜欢绿色王子。

original_en_text: So many moments spent simple... joyful... free...
original_zh_text: 那些简单……快乐……自由的时光……
translated_text: They are often simple: freedom and happiness.
secondary_translated_text: 它们往往很简单：自由和幸福。

original_en_text: Do you see? How crass and frail that Citadel’s machines! This one groans in pain at its very existence.<hpage>Its mechanism is likely jammed. If the gears were unstuck its clamorous complaints would soon cease, and it could become a useful place to rest.<page>A place to rest or no, I desire only for the noise to stop!
original_zh_text: 瞧见没？圣堡的破机器嘎吱乱叫，活着都费劲。<hpage>齿轮卡住了。修好应该能当个歇息的好地方，噪音也能停。<page>歇不歇息无所谓，我只想赶紧让这破响动停下来！
translated_text: Do you see this? What a simple and fragile fortress! A man groaned in front of him, in pain.<hpage>Once the equipment is removed, the noise stops and it becomes a comfortable place to rest.<page>I just want to stop making noise, whether I rest or not.
secondary_translated_text: 你看到这个了吗？多么简单而脆弱的堡垒啊！一个男人在他面前痛苦地呻吟着。<hpage>一旦设备被拆除，噪音就会停止，成为一个舒适的休息场所。<page>无论休息与否，我只是想停止制造噪音。

original_en_text: These root-woven roads show evidence of my master’s passage. A thrice-crushed bug, gouged wood, score-prints of sharp claws passing. Small signs that only I can read.<page>Though the trail is cold, it eases me to know she is still within this land.
original_zh_text: 这附近有导师踪迹：尖锐的爪痕、凿开的树木、压扁的虫尸……只有我看得懂。<page>虽然痕迹都挺久了，但知道她还在纺络我就安心了。
translated_text: This path lost in its roots is the path taken by the Master. The insect was broken three times, the tree was broken, and the nails had sharp marks.<page>The road was cold, but he breathed a sigh of relief knowing that he was still on the ground.
secondary_translated_text: 这条迷失了根源的道路，就是大师所走的道路。昆虫被折断了三次，树也折断了，指甲上有锋利的痕迹。<page>路很冷，但知道自己还在地上，他松了一口气。

original_en_text: <hpage>These are dangerous fields, young one, not for casual wandering. What task sees you brave them?<page>A treacherous quest! But a crucial one! Upon the last wish of my father, I’ve taken up the study of these wild caves.<page>These fields still display life and growth, even as the lands around erode to dust.<page>There is a hot harmony here that eludes the grey wastes above and the dry Marrow beside. With time and study, I shall uncover why.
original_zh_text: <hpage>小虫子，这片荒野很危险，你怎么有胆子进来闲逛？<page>虽然危险，但很重要！我是继承父亲遗志在研究这些洞穴！<page>即便到处都是腐蚀和灰烬，这片荒野却还显露着生机。<page>这里肯定有特殊热源维系，我要找出原因！
translated_text: <hpage>"Guys, this is a dangerous place. don't sit here.<page>This is a very dangerous mission! But this is mandatory! At my father's request, I began exploring wild caves.<page>Although the surrounding land was destroyed and turned to dust, these fields remained active and growing.<page>It has a warm harmony that avoids gray debris on the top and dry bone marrow next to it. Over time and research, we will understand why.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>“伙计们，这是一个危险的地方。别坐在这里。<page>这是一项非常危险的任务！但这是强制性的！应父亲的要求，我开始探索野生洞穴。<page>尽管周围的土地被摧毁并化为灰尘，但这些田地仍然活跃并生长。<page>它具有温暖的和谐感，避免了顶部的灰色碎片和旁边的干燥骨髓。随着时间的推移和研究，我们会明白为什么。

original_en_text: Track your location throughout these winding lands with a bone compass. Each member of our tribe can craft them. I would pass you mine, for a small price.
original_zh_text: 这个骨制罗盘能让你分辨自己的位置。我们部落都会做，付点小钱就给你。
translated_text: Use a bone compass to monitor the position of the deformed earth. Anyone in our tribe can do this.
secondary_translated_text: 使用骨罗盘来监测变形地球的位置。我们部落中的任何人都可以做到这一点。

original_en_text: Ooooh, ma ma! Even young Nuu never guessed that Pharloom held so many fascinating creatures! Soft ones, hard ones, small ones, big ones! Nuu is greedy to see what remains!
original_zh_text: 哇！连努努都没想到纺络有这么多神奇生物！软的硬的大的小的！好贪心，好想看剩下的！
translated_text: My mother, or even her sister, had no idea that the Faroe Islands had so many fascinating creatures. Hard, soft, small, big! I want to see the rest.
secondary_translated_text: 我的母亲，甚至她的妹妹，都不知道法罗群岛有这么多令人着迷的生物。硬、软、小、大！我想看看剩下的。

original_en_text: You see this idol before us, red maiden? I have passed its like before. They mark our pilgrimage well.<page>If we sing to it, a miraculous shrine will rise from the ground, and we will have a place to rest! Such a wonder!<hpage>It is not song that rouses this shrine, but payment in rosaries.<hpage>Without rosaries, the shrine remains hidden. I have encountered similar constructs on Pharloom’s paths. This kingdom does not grant rest lightly.
original_zh_text: 看见这圣像了吗？沿途都有标记。<page>对着它歌唱，圣椅就会升起供我们歇息！多神奇！<hpage>唤醒长椅的不是歌声，谢尔玛，而是念珠。<hpage>无念珠者不得休憩，纺络从不轻易施恩。
translated_text: Do you see the red woman in front of you? I remember this pilgrimage clearly.<page>As you sing, the magical temple rises and becomes a place to rest.<hpage>What awakened the temple was not a song, but a rosary.<hpage>The Rosary does not exist, the sanctuary is hidden. We found a similar building on the road to Palma. The kingdom has no rest.
secondary_translated_text: 你看到你面前的红色女人了吗？我清楚地记得这次朝圣之旅。<page>当你唱歌时，神奇的寺庙升起，成为休息的地方。<hpage>唤醒寺庙的不是一首歌，而是一串念珠。<hpage>玫瑰经不存在，庇护所被隐藏。我们在前往帕尔马的路上发现了一座类似的建筑。王国没有休息。

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>These I have fashioned from the husks of old bells. A hard task to make, so the cost reflects the extra effort.
original_zh_text: 你可以用这个在地图上标记重要地点或提醒事项。<br><br>用古钟的壳打磨成的，可费劲了。
translated_text: You can use it to display important places and memories on a map.<br><br>It's a tough job, so the cost reflects the extra effort.
secondary_translated_text: 您可以用它来显示地图上的重要地点和记忆。<br><br>这是一项艰巨的工作，因此成本反映了额外的努力。
