original_en_text: Poshanka! Here we meet, high atop this twisted steel structure. I can sense fierce enemies ahead.<page>It seems you too draw closer to your trail’s end. With my own task now resolved, my rings call for combat.<page>Hornet Wielding Needle, shall we fight forward together?
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！你好啊，又见面了。我能感受到前面有强大的敌人在呢。<page>看来你的旅途也走了很远了。现在我的任务也完成了，正手痒呢。<page>使针的小姑娘，怎么说，我们一起上吧？
translated_text: Boshanka! Boshanka! Just above this twisted steel structure, you can feel a fierce enemy in front of you.<page>Now, my mission is over and my ring must fight.<page>Will bees turn their needles to fight?
secondary_translated_text: 博尚卡！博尚卡！就在这个扭曲的钢结构上方，您可以感觉到前方有一个凶猛的敌人。<page>现在，我的任务结束了，我的戒指必须战斗。<page>蜜蜂会转动针来战斗吗？

original_en_text: All of these marvellous healing supplies... Surely they, at least, are some proof of the Citadel’s holy nature?
original_zh_text: 这么多神奇药品……至少说明圣堡还是灵验的吧？
translated_text: Are they at least one proof of the sacred character of the Church?
secondary_translated_text: 它们至少是教会神圣品格的一个证据吗？

original_en_text: H-hoy red m-maiden! Have no f-fear, ‘tis only I, Sherma!<page>I found healing supplies, b-but then the way back collapsed... and I heard moaning from the dark... oh, how thankful I am to see you!
original_zh_text: 红、红衣姑娘！是我是我！<page>我找到药，可是路塌了……又听见黑暗里有怪声……见到你太好了！
translated_text: My little red girl. "Don't worry, it's me, Sherman.<page>I am so grateful that I saw it, found the material for healing, and heard the dark whisper on the way home!
secondary_translated_text: 我的小红女孩。“别担心，是我，谢尔曼。<page>我非常感激我看到了它，找到了治愈的材料，并在回家的路上听到了黑暗的低语！

translated_text: Worm.
Should we fight together?

original_en_text: The great Citadel is so close, I can hear the voices of our brother and sister pilgrims calling out to us!
original_zh_text: 圣堡近在咫尺！兄弟姐妹的呼唤已传到我耳中了！
translated_text: There was a large castle nearby and I could hear the screams of pilgrims.
secondary_translated_text: 附近有一座大城堡，我可以听到朝圣者的尖叫声。

original_en_text: What a battle, brave warrior! You’re the first I’ve seen who could match the red-shells and emerge victorious.<hpage>They are deadly foes indeed, and seemingly keen hunters. You did well to keep yourself hidden from them, young bug.<page>I did, didn’t I? Disguise and subterfuge are skills I’ve honed keenly, all in aid of my most important work!
original_zh_text: 打得太漂亮了！我还是头回见有虫能干掉红壳怪！<hpage>它们确实是狠角色，狩猎本能很强。你躲得挺好。<page>是吧？伪装潜行可是我的绝活，都是为了伟大研究！
translated_text: What a heroic soldier, what a heroic battle! You are the first person to compete and win in red envelopes.<hpage>He looked like a deadly enemy and a greedy hunter.<page>You did it, didn't you? Actually? Costumes and stunts are the skills you need to improve to get the most important things done!
secondary_translated_text: 多么英勇的士兵啊，多么英勇的战斗啊！您是第一个参加比赛并赢得红包的人。<hpage>他看起来像一个致命的敌人和贪婪的猎人。<page>你做到了，不是吗？实际上？服装和特技是您需要提高的技能来完成最重要的事情！

original_en_text: Mind yourself while you travel this grim land. A great winged beast has been stalking the heights, swooping without warning and tearing the life out of unwary travellers!<hpage>I believe I have seen the creature you speak of. It may have marked me as prey, and followed me down onto the lower roads of the moor.<page>What what! Gurrrooo! The beast has been spotted! Once Zaza has fully rested, we’ll set to tracking it down!
original_zh_text: 当心天上，有只长翅膀的畜生专抓路人！<hpage>我见过它，多半是盯上我了，还跟到了沼泽这边。<page>你说什么！嘎噜！那畜生就在附近！等扎扎歇够了就去宰了它！
translated_text: Be careful when traveling in this challenging country, as giant predators roam the skies, hiding without warning and taking the lives of reckless travelers!<hpage>"I know what kind of creature you are," he took me out for something to eat, and then we went to the desert.<page>What is this? What are you doing? Gollum! The beast was found. When the child was completely rested, he began hunting.
secondary_translated_text: 在这个充满挑战的国家旅行时要小心，因为巨大的掠食者在天空中徘徊，在没有警告的情况下躲藏起来，并夺走鲁莽旅行者的生命！<hpage>“我知道你是什么样的生物，”他带我出去吃点东西，然后我们去了沙漠。<page>这是什么？你在干什么？咕噜！野兽被发现了。当孩子完全休息后，他开始狩猎。

original_en_text: Welcome back red maiden, and thank you again for coming to my aid.<page>I’m no healer, but with the supplies we found in the ward below even my unlearned claws can ease the suffering of our brothers and sisters.<page>That such darkness could creep into this most holy of places, even though we pilgrims kept our promise to ascend...<page>I confess, I wonder at the meaning of it all. But enlightenment does not come easily, or all at once... I should just continue my task in the meantime.
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘回来啦！再次感谢你帮忙。<page>我本来不懂医术，不过从下面拿来了药，简单包扎也能止痛。<page>我们千辛万苦爬上来，黑暗还是钻进了圣地……<page>实在想不通！但悟道要慢慢来……先做好手头的事吧！
translated_text: Welcome home, red girl, thank you for your help.<page>I'm not a therapist, but the materials I found in the room below can relieve the pain of my siblings, even if I haven't learned how to do nails.<page>We pilgrims have kept our promise to climb mountains, but darkness is rising into this most sacred place.<page>However, enlightenment is not easy and does not come suddenly, and we must continue our mission.
secondary_translated_text: 欢迎回家，红女孩，谢谢你的帮助。<page>我不是治疗师，但我在下面房间找到的材料可以减轻我兄弟姐妹的痛苦，即使我还没有学会如何做指甲。<page>我们朝圣者信守了爬山的承诺，但黑暗正在蔓延到这个最神圣的地方。<page>然而，启蒙并不容易，也不会突然到来，我们必须继续我们的使命。

original_en_text: Hrm...? Oh, hoy there! I was hoping we would meet here, red maiden.<page>Rising at last to the heights of the Citadel and being amongst so many of my brothers and sisters... it is a blessing indeed. Yes, a blessing.<hpage>Your voice belies some hesitation in that belief, little pilgrim. You have seen now the reality of this broken place. What do you make of it, truly?
original_zh_text: 嗯？红衣姑娘！没想到在这儿碰上了！<page>能登上圣堡和这么多同袍团聚……真是恩赐……嗯，是恩赐。<hpage>你听起来有些犹豫？想必你已看清此地的破败真相，有什么感想？
translated_text: What is this? What are you doing? Oh, my God, it's here. Goodbye, Red.<page>In the end, I became the high priest of the city and the mediator of many brothers and sisters. This is indeed a blessing. Yes, this is a blessing.<hpage>Little pilgrim, hide this fear in your faith. Now that you see the reality of this wilderness, what do you think?
secondary_translated_text: 这是什么？你在干什么？天哪，它在这里。再见，红。<page>最终，我成为了这座城市的大祭司和许多兄弟姐妹的中保。这确实是一种祝福。是的，这是一种祝福。<hpage>小小的朝圣者，把这种恐惧隐藏在你的信仰中。现在你看到了这片荒野的现实，你有什么想法？

original_en_text: Safely-saved is Pill! But who is this rare carer for the shell of another? Name yourself, good bug!<hpage>I am Hornet, Pill. Your brother wished for your return to Bellhart, where he waits now. I’m sure he will be eager to see you alive.<page>Young Tipp! How he worries always. Blessed I am for the care, him and you Miss Hornet! A lucky bug is me!
original_zh_text: 皮尔安、安全了！这位好心女士怎么称呼？<hpage>我叫大黄蜂。你的兄弟蒂普在钟心镇等你，快回去吧。<page>小蒂普！总是瞎操心。多谢你啦大黄蜂小姐！我运气真好！
translated_text: Drugs are safe. But who is the special person who handles other people's shells? Please tell me your name.<hpage>- Your brother said you made it back to Babate alive and that you wanted to see him.<page>I've been worried about her, and I'm lucky to take care of him and you, Miss Showitt.
secondary_translated_text: 药物是安全的。但谁是处理别人贝壳的特别人呢？请告诉我你的名字。<hpage>- 你哥哥说你活着回到了巴巴特，你想见他。<page>我一直很担心她，我很幸运能够照顾他和你，舒伊特小姐。

original_en_text: I pray my dice bring you luck on your final climb, sister. And I pray that by parting with them, my own ascent shall be made lighter.
original_zh_text: 愿骰子保佑你登顶，姐妹。送走它们，我身上的负担也轻了。
translated_text: Sister, I pray that my data will bring good luck on my last Ascension. I pray that when I am distracted, my Ascension will be easier.
secondary_translated_text: 姐姐，我祈祷我的数据能给我最后一次升天带来好运。我祈祷当我分心时，我的升天会更容易。

original_en_text: See here, this old statue. I’ve been thinking long on it, what clues it might hold.<page>The claw-work seems beyond the other structures throughout these caves. Who was she I wonder, to deserve such refined remembrance?<hpage>Hers is the form of a dancer, and the craft is indeed exquisite. There must once have been more to these ants, before the Haunting snared their shells and minds.
original_zh_text: 看这尊古雕像！我盯着它看了好久。<page>工艺比周围建筑精细多了。她到底是谁呢，值得被这样铭记？<hpage>看样子是名舞者，造型确实精美。看来蚁族被丝咒控制前肯定辉煌过。
translated_text: Looking at this ancient statue, I have been wondering for a long time what it means.<page>The cannon seemed to outperform other structures in the cave.<hpage>Her style is a form of dance and the technique is really great. Ants must do more before the ghost closes its shell and heart.
secondary_translated_text: 看着这座古老的雕像，我很长时间以来一直在想它意味着什么。<page>这门大炮似乎优于洞穴中的其他结构。<hpage>她的风格是一种舞蹈形式，而且技巧真的很棒。蚂蚁必须在鬼魂合上壳和心脏之前做更多的事情。

translated_text: Yes, right. The taste of taboo.
secondary_translated_text: 是的，正确的。禁忌的味道。

original_en_text: Holy water, nice and hot,<br>Makes a perfect swimming spot,<br>Heals your worries in a flash,<br>So jump on in... splash splash splash! Ha ha ha!
original_zh_text: 圣水暖又清，<br>泡澡好舒心，<page>烦恼顷刻散，<br>扑通跳进来！哈哈哈！
translated_text: Holy water is warm.<br>Best place to swim.<br>He immediately expressed his concerns.<br>Jump, jump!
secondary_translated_text: 圣水是温暖的。<br>最好的游泳地点。<br>他立即表达了自己的担忧。<br>跳，跳！

original_en_text: Very, very lucky little trinket we got ‘ere! Pulls ‘em little clickie-clackies right into yer waitin’ claws!
original_zh_text: 超级幸运的招财符！把叮当响都吸过来！
translated_text: These are all happy little things! Put them on your feet!
secondary_translated_text: 这些都是快乐的小事！把它们放在脚上！

original_en_text: Gurrroo! A fellow warrior braves this blighted place! Know you stand before the honoured knight Garmond, and brave companion Zaza.<page>Together, Zaza and I are wish bound to scale this Citadel, and vanquish the horrors at its heart!<hpage>Then good luck to you, sir bug. It is heartening to meet another of sound mind and fortitude enough to fight back against the many haunted husks.<page>Aye! Never-ending, these unnatural opponents! This Citadel seems its twisted source, and honour decrees we must fight on, until we rend the heart of its decay!
original_zh_text: 嘎噜！又来个勇士！我乃荣耀骑士加蒙德，这位是忠仆扎扎！<page>我们要杀上圣堡，端了诅咒的老巢！<hpage>那祝你好运。难得能遇见敢反抗丝咒傀儡的清醒者。<page>是啊，这些傀儡，杀都杀不完！圣堡似乎就藏着祸根，必须捣毁！
translated_text: Come on, come on! Come on, come on! Comrades stand bravely in this deserted land! I knew I was facing the respected knight Gamone and his brave companion Ziza.<page>Ji and I are going to the castle to dispel the fear!<hpage>Good luck, bugs. It's fascinating to see how smart, determined and ghostly others are to throw so many shells.<page>Oh, yes! Oh, yes! Forever, these unnatural enemies. This castle seems to be the source of this chaos, and we must respect the Heart Medal until we can dig out the rotten heart inside!
secondary_translated_text: 来吧来吧来吧来吧同志们勇敢地站在这片荒无人烟的土地上！我知道我面对的是受人尊敬的骑士加莫内和他勇敢的同伴齐扎。<page>我和吉要去城堡消除恐惧！<hpage>祝你好运，虫子们。看到其他人是多么聪明、坚定和幽灵般扔这么多炮弹，真是令人着迷。<page>哦，是的！哦，是的！永远，这些非自然的敌人。这座城堡似乎是这场混乱的根源，我们必须尊重心脏勋章，直到我们能够挖出里面腐烂的心脏！

original_en_text: <hpage>I found the well in the hidden chambers beyond. The power that remained at its base I have taken for myself.<page=S>Bound yourself a new nature, aye? And from the shells of our ancestors, no less, all those many who’ve called these lands their own.<page=S>You make it seem so simple-like. All o’that learning, all o’that strength... sucked up in a whirl of Silk.<page=M>We’d call you a thief, Old One, and cruel for the taking, but its all coming down soon if you can’t stop it.<page=M>If there’s advantage in your act that might see these caves safe, then it’s better you make your claim.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我在密室深处找到了那口井。已将其底部的力量纳为己用。<page=S>给自己添了一种新本源，嗯？用的还是我们先祖的躯壳——那些曾以此地为家的无数先祖。<page=S>你说得轻巧。所有学识，所有力量……都被灵丝漩涡吸走了。<page=M>我们本该骂你是小偷，古老者，如此残忍夺取……但若你阻止不了黑暗，一切马上都要崩塌了。<page=M>若你真能保全这些洞窟，那还是由你取走为好。
translated_text: <hpage>We found a well in a remote hidden room and used it as a basis to take over the remaining electricity.<page=S>Likewise, in the shell of our ancestors, every country that claims to own this land was born in the shell of our ancestors.<page=S>All knowledge and all power are absorbed in the whirlpool of silk.<page=M>"I called you a thief. "Stealing is cruel, but if you don't stop it, it will happen quickly. "<page=M>If your actions are conducive to protecting these caves, then you'd better ask your questions.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我们在一个偏远的隐蔽房间里找到了一口井，并以此为基础接管剩余的电力。<page=S>同样，在我们祖先的壳中，每个声称拥有这片土地的国家都出生在我们祖先的壳中。<page=S>所有的知识和一切的力量都被丝绸的漩涡吸收。<page=M>“我叫你小偷。“偷窃是残酷的，但如果你不阻止，事情很快就会发生。"<page=M>如果你的行为有利于保护这些洞穴，那么你最好提出你的问题。

original_en_text: Best keep your visits brief, Hornet Wielding Needle. Without swift action taken, our world’s ruin seems certain.<page>If you cannot calm Pharloom’s tortured throes, then certainly no other bug could face the task. <hpage>As you say, Shakra. I shall do what I must.
original_zh_text: 别逗留太久，小姑娘。不快点解决，世界就要完蛋了。<page>如果你都搞不定，更没虫能行。<hpage>我会尽力而为。
translated_text: The conversation was brief, and Hambleby manipulated it with a needle. Without a quick response, the world will surely be destroyed.<page>If we cannot alleviate the pharaoh's suffering, then other insects will surely not be able to complete the job.<hpage>As I said before, I am doing what I have to do.
secondary_translated_text: 谈话很简短，汉布尔比用针操纵了谈话。如果没有迅速的反应，世界肯定会被摧毁。<page>如果我们不能减轻法老的痛苦，那么其他昆虫肯定无法完成这项工作。<hpage>正如我之前所说，我正在做我必须做的事情。

original_en_text: Near the edge of those lands swept by wind and sand, Nuu has seen it, a single bug, watching, waiting.<page> Too scared was Nuu to crawl close, for fear it would wake, and its big blade might mark this perfect shell.<page>For the journal’s sake, you should seek the bug, up on edge, through a tall tunnel hidden by crust.<page>A hard find, that one, but Nuu is not worried! She knows your adult cunning will see you there quick!
original_zh_text: 在风沙之地的边缘，努努曾看见一只虫子在守望等待。<page> 努努怕它醒来，怕它的巨刃划破我的漂亮甲壳，所以不敢靠近。<page> 但为了使记录册完整，大姐姐去找它吧——就在高处边缘，穿过一段硬壳掩藏的高耸隧道就到了。<page> 虽然难找，但努努不担心！以成年虫的机灵劲儿肯定能很快找到！
translated_text: The insect crawls on the edge of the soil covered by wind and sand, waiting to see it.<page>The well was so scared that he didn't dare to get close, afraid of waking up, and the big leaves showed their perfect shells.<page>In order to keep a diary, you must walk through high tunnels hidden in shells and finally find an insect.<page>Hard to spot, but I'm not worried. I believe your maturity will be here soon!
secondary_translated_text: 昆虫在被风和沙子覆盖的土壤边缘爬行，等待着看到它。<page>井太害怕了，他不敢靠近，害怕醒来，大叶子露出了完美的外壳。<page>为了记日记，你必须穿过隐藏在贝壳中的高大隧道，最终找到一只昆虫。<page>很难发现，但我并不担心。相信你的成熟很快就会到来！

original_en_text: For my mapping stock, we have traded all the charts and tools I can provide. While this new threat remains, I shall not make more.<page>My cartography may be a simple sort, but I hope that my craft shared has made your travels easier.
original_zh_text: 我的存货都卖光了。危机不解除，我也没法做新的。<page>我绘制的图纸可能有些简略，但希望能帮上你的忙。
translated_text: In my map inventory, I exchanged all the maps and tools I could provide. As long as this new threat exists, I no longer believe in it.<page>My paintings may be simple, but I hope the craftsmen I share will make your journey easier.
secondary_translated_text: 在我的地图库存中，我交换了我能提供的所有地图和工具。只要这个新威胁存在，我就不再相信它。<page>我的画可能很简单，但我希望我分享的工匠能让你的旅程更轻松。

original_en_text: Lead on, sister! Zaza and I will be close behind!
original_zh_text: 带路吧姐妹！我和扎扎自会跟上！
translated_text: Sisters, please bring me here. I paid my taxes and looked at him.
secondary_translated_text: 姐妹们，请带我来这里。我缴了税，看着他。

original_en_text: Hoy! Did you see it, red maiden? The great gate heard my song and, in its infinite and ancient kindness, has opened the way forward for us!
original_zh_text: 瞧见没？骨门听到歌声，为我们让路了！
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. Do you see this? Red old woman, door, listen to my song, open the way for us with infinite mercy!
secondary_translated_text: 嘿嘿。你看到这个了吗？红老妇人，门，听我的歌，以无限的怜悯为我们开辟道路！

original_en_text: <hpage>Must you not press on, sirs?<page>Oh, yes! We will be off at once. Very soon. I fear though, that Zaza must rest a little longer...
original_zh_text: <hpage>二位还不出发么？<page>马上！这就出发！我就是觉得，扎扎可能要多休息一会……
translated_text: <hpage>Friends, can we continue?<page>Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh, yes! Soon, I think Jill will take a break.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>朋友们，我们可以继续吗？<page>哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦，是的！很快，我想吉尔就会休息一下。

original_en_text: Poshanka! Edges sharp and senses keen!
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！握紧兵刃，保持警惕！
translated_text: Bosna Bosna! Clear and clear!
secondary_translated_text: 博斯纳博斯纳！清晰清晰！

original_en_text: <page=M>Even knowing her motivation, it is a shock the monarch can resist so long. We’d thought none could survive that void.<hpage>She will have retreated within her protective form, that cocoon of thread. Even as the dark eats its outer, she will spin its Silk anew.<hpage>The effort would be immense and it will strain her soul thin, but what other choice remains?<hpage>This is the desperate act of a dying god. A defiance that, left unchallenged, will bring your kingdom’s ruin.
original_zh_text: <page=M>就算清楚她的动机，君主能撑这么久也是令我们惊讶。本以为生物不可能在虚空中存活。<hpage>她必是缩进了护体茧壳。这样即便外层被黑暗啃噬，也能重织新丝。<hpage>但这样耗力巨大，魂魄都将稀薄，但还有得选吗？<hpage>这是垂死神明的困兽之斗。若不阻止，必会让王国化为废墟。
translated_text: <page=M>It is shocking that the king was able to endure for so long, even though he knew his motives.<hpage>He returned to his form of protection-tube. Her appearance was concealed by darkness, but she regained her silky image.<hpage>Hard work is huge, it will absorb your soul, but what is it? What other options are there?<hpage>This is the despair of God's death. If we do not reject this resistance, God's kingdom will be destroyed.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>令人震惊的是，尽管国王知道自己的动机，但他却能忍受这么长时间。<hpage>他回到了他的保护管形式。她的外表被黑暗所掩盖，但她又恢复了丝滑的形象。<hpage>努力是巨大的，它会吸收你的灵魂，但它是什么？还有哪些其他选择？<hpage>这就是上帝之死的绝望。如果我们不拒绝这种抵抗，上帝的王国就会被摧毁。

original_en_text: <page=M>The quakes... This collapse will take Pharloom all.<hpage>If the void doesn’t claim it first. Surely you’ve seen them, the black threads that wrack your lands? The dark leeches up, possessed upon the fallen monarch’s Silk.<hpage>Pharloom’s roads were not safe before. Now they’ll prove impassable. Those pilgrims still alive in your lands best huddle and hope. <hpage>If there can be another end to this, it is up to us to discover it.
original_zh_text: <page=M>这震颤……纺络要全塌了。<hpage>怕不是会被虚空先吞了去。没见那些撕裂大地的黑丝么？黑暗正顺着坠落君王的灵丝涌上来。<hpage>纺络的道途本就不安稳，如今更是绝路，残存的朝圣者只能抱团等死。<hpage>但若还有转机，唯有靠我们能寻得。
translated_text: <page=M>Earthquakes and landslides are the main culprits<hpage>Have you ever seen a black line running through your country? The silk of a dark vampire and a fallen monarch.<hpage>I know the streets of Palau are not safe. They have not been surpassed. Pilgrims still live on their own land.<hpage>If there is another ending, you must find it.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>地震和山体滑坡是罪魁祸首<hpage>您见过一条黑线穿过您的国家吗？黑暗吸血鬼和堕落君主的丝绸。<hpage>我知道帕劳的街道并不安全。他们还没有被超越。朝圣者仍然生活在自己的土地上。<hpage>如果还有另一个结局，你一定要找到它。

original_en_text: <hpage>Why do you sing, little one? This bony gate seems like a poor audience.
original_zh_text: <hpage>小家伙，为何对着骨门歌唱？这可不是什么知音。
translated_text: <hpage>Boy, why are you singing? The narrow door seemed to be a group of poor onlookers.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>孩子，你为什么唱歌？狭窄的门似乎是一群可怜的旁观者。

original_en_text: <hpage>Can you safely make your way back to the settlement, little one? I could escort you if need be.<page>Oh no, I’ll lay no more of my troubles upon you, red maiden. With the way cleared I can return under my own guidance.<page>After all, what’s another pilgrimage, eh? Ha ha!<page>Oh! And I have something for you as well. I found it buried amongst the broken relics down here in the darkness, glowing with a pale light.<page>’Tis an odd-looking thing... not exactly holy-seeming... but I would be honoured if you accepted it all the same!
original_zh_text: <hpage>需要我护送你回去吗？<page>不能再给你添麻烦了！路通了我就自己走。<page>就当再朝圣一回呗！哈哈！<page>对了，这个送你。在黑乎乎的地方挖到的，会发光。<page>虽然看着不像圣物……但请你收下吧！
translated_text: <hpage>Can he return to the village safely? If you want, I can show you.<page>My red girl, I will never blame you again. If you clear the road, you can return under my guidance. "<page>Finally, he? What does pilgrimage mean?<page>Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! He was buried in the darkness, and in the ruins, he saw a pale light.<page>I can't believe he's not a saint, but I hope he gets it back.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>他能安全返回村庄吗？如果你愿意，我可以带你去。<page>我的红女孩，我再也不会责怪你了。如果你扫清道路，就可以在我的带领下返回。"<page>最后，他？朝圣是什么意思？<page>哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！他被埋在黑暗中，废墟中，他看到了苍白的光芒。<page>我不敢相信他不是圣人，但我希望他能找回它。

original_en_text: The challenge! The course! It shall be improved. Yes! Yes! The truest test is still to come. We shall fly fast together once more!
original_zh_text: 赛道还要改良！没错，真正的考验在后头！
translated_text: Challenger! Yeah, no! That would be better, yes. Oh, yes! Oh, yes! But the real evidence has not yet arrived. I hope they can be together again!
secondary_translated_text: 挑战者！是的，不！那会更好，是的。哦，是的！哦，是的！但真正的证据尚未到来。希望他们能再次在一起！

original_en_text: I’ve learnt too that travelling is not without its dangers... but I find myself wielding my weapon quite adeptly.<page>It’s curious, the way our instincts can guide us with such precision.
original_zh_text: 我现在知道旅途中总伴有危险……不过我武器用得倒挺顺手。<page>本能的指引竟如此精准，真奇妙。
translated_text: In addition, although they knew the trip would be safe, they were able to use weapons very skillfully.<page>It's amazing how our instincts guide us correctly.
secondary_translated_text: 此外，尽管他们知道这次旅行会是安全的，但他们能够非常熟练地使用武器。<page>令人惊讶的是，我们的直觉如何正确地引导我们。

translated_text: Bertrand's letter.

original_en_text: Un-Daak... well struck. To face the fury of your weapon in a true battle would be an experience indeed. I would gladly duel again, if you have the time for it.
original_zh_text: 唔-嗒克……打得好。跟你打一架真是受益匪浅，等你有空我们再练。
translated_text: "Wynn Doc" did a very good job. Anger, of course, is the experience of facing weapons in battle. If I had time, I would fight.
secondary_translated_text: “韦恩·博士”做得非常好。当然，愤怒是在战斗中面对武器的体验。如果我有时间，我会战斗。

original_en_text: Hoho sister, my whiskers are still quivering! That’s how you know you had a rousing battle!<page>You go on ahead. Zaza and I will keep guard here and catch any stragglers.
original_zh_text: 嚯嚯，真是一场酣畅淋漓的战斗！我的胡子都还在颤抖呢！<page>你先前进吧，我和扎扎在这守着一会，看看有没有漏网之虫。
translated_text: Beards can keep smoking knowing they are fighting an exciting battle!<page>Purple and I are here to protect and stop those behind it.
secondary_translated_text: 胡子们可以继续吸烟，因为他们知道他们正在打一场激动人心的战斗！<page>紫色和我来这里是为了保护和阻止幕后黑手。

original_en_text: Hoy, red maiden. ‘Tis a prayer answered to see you safely wake.<hpage>Little Sherma? What has happened here?
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘！圣堡庇佑，你醒了！<hpage>小谢尔玛，此处发生了什么？
translated_text: Good morning, Miss Red, I pray you will wake up peacefully.<hpage>"Little Sherman, what's wrong?”
secondary_translated_text: 早上好，雷德小姐，我祈祷你能平静地醒来。<hpage>“小谢尔曼，怎么了？”

original_en_text: Poshanka! So you found my calling ring, Child Wielding Needle. I recognised the sound of your weapon’s foreign metal against it.<page>On the hunt for my master, I am often away, but I still use this place as camp. Use the ring to call me whenever you wish to make trade.
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！发现我的传讯了？听到你武器发出的那异域的金属声就知道是你。<page>我把这当作据点，但常外出寻找导师。想找我交易就摇铃。
translated_text: Boshanka! Boshanka! The person who found my ring wore a needle and knew how foreign objects and metals could affect weapons.<page>Normally we are looking for a host, but it is still a campsite. If you want to negotiate, make a call on your mobile phone.
secondary_translated_text: 博尚卡！博尚卡！发现我戒指的人戴着针，知道异物和金属如何影响武器。<page>通常我们正在寻找主人，但它仍然是一个露营地。如果您想谈判，请用手机拨打电话。

translated_text: Map of remote areas.

original_en_text: <hpage>Gladly I will accept your aid Shakra. Let us cut closer to this Citadel’s haunted heart.<page>Garrok! Hornet Wielding Needle. Beside you, I will gladly raise my rings!
original_zh_text: <hpage>求之不得。一起杀进圣堡里去吧。<page>嘎咯克！使针的姑娘。能和你并肩作战，我的战环乐意至极！
translated_text: <hpage>Thank you for helping Shakula get closer to the ghost center of this castle.<page>"No, the foam moves with the needle. I put the ring next to me.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>感谢您帮助沙库拉更接近这座城堡的幽灵中心。<page>“不，泡沫随着针移动。我把戒指放在旁边。

original_en_text: I’d hoped to never step these hateful halls, yet here I stand, as all those hapless bugs before.<hpage>You’ve journeyed far from that damp cell, tall bug. If you would oppose the minions of this Citadel, you have my respect.<page>Hmph. Then we share a rare stance, warrior. Few others seem possessed of will enough to resist.<page>So many weak minds, drawn up and strung, in love with the great golden leech atop their lands.
original_zh_text: 我本不想踏入这憎恶之地，却还是步了前虫的后尘。<hpage>你既然从潮湿牢笼走到这里，若是想反抗圣堡，我愿助一臂之力。<page>哼，倒是难得。鲜少有虫能生出抵抗之心。<page>大多数都意志薄弱，沉溺受缚，被上头那黄金监牢所蛊惑。
translated_text: I never wanted to enter this room full of hatred, but it was like an unfortunate insect in front of me.<hpage>I walked out of a soaked room, the size of an insect. If you disagree with this castle, I respect you. "<page>We share an unusual place: soldiers, few of whom resist.<page>Many weak and nervous people fell in love with the Inca giants of their land.
secondary_translated_text: 我从来不想进入这个充满仇恨的房间，但它就像一只不幸的昆虫在我面前。<hpage>我走出一个潮湿的房间，房间大小只有昆虫。如果你不同意这座城堡，我尊重你。"<page>我们有一个不寻常的地方：士兵，很少有人抵抗。<page>许多软弱而紧张的人爱上了他们土地上的印加巨人。

original_en_text: Ho there, brave sister! What poetry has fate writ, that we should meet here at the peak of this ghastly Citadel!<page>Beasts and fiends, all here are lost to that horrid Haunting! And out from this golden corpse it seeps to plague the good bugs of the land below. Well, no more we say!<hpage>You should beware brave sirs, the creature that commands this curse is a foe far beyond bug. I would not see your lives given in vain.<page>Pah! We beware nothing! We would give our lives a hundred times over to finally cut away the evil that clutches our kingdom!
original_zh_text: 哟，勇敢的姐妹！真有缘，能在这鬼圣堡顶上见面！<page>那些被邪丝牵着走的虫兽，就是从这金色死城跑出去祸害纺络的，但到此为止了！<hpage>当心，萦绕于圣堡之上的存在远非虫类能敌，不要白白丢了性命。<page>呸！我们才不怕！只要能斩断缠住这破地方的丝线，死一百回都值！
translated_text: What is poetry about destiny? We'll meet at the top of the castle.<page>Animals and demons disappeared, like ghosts, all fear! He escaped from the golden corpse, infested by pests in good soil.<hpage>Brave gentlemen, this cursed creature is much better than the enemy insect.<page>Oh, Oh, Oh! I never really cared about anything! We will pay a hundred times our lives to eradicate evil around our kingdom.
secondary_translated_text: 什么是关于命运的诗歌？我们将在城堡顶部见面。<page>动物和恶魔消失了，就像鬼魂一样，一切都是恐惧！他逃离了金尸，金尸在肥沃的土壤中受到害虫的侵扰。<hpage>勇敢的先生们，这个被诅咒的生物比敌方昆虫要好得多。<page>哦，哦，哦！我从来没有真正关心过任何事情！我们将付出一百倍的生命来根除我们王国周围的邪恶。

original_en_text: Goodness! This is just too embarrassing! Detected even through my perfect cover! What tell? What error? Surely something gave me away!<hpage>It was no one thing, young bug. Your disguise is near faultless. I’ve merely spent a long life being watchful.<page>Gah! Then I’ll just have to hope the beasts about don’t share such keen sight. It’ll be so much harder to accomplish my work if I’m detected, or eaten!
original_zh_text: 哎呀！太丢脸了！完美伪装都被识破！哪里露馅了？<hpage>你没露出破绽，小虫子。只是我活得够久，眼神也比较好。<page>好吧！但愿怪物们没这么眼尖。万一被发现或被吃掉都会耽误我工作！
translated_text: Oh, my God! It's too hot! The cover is perfect. What did I say? What happened? Something is being displayed!<hpage>The clothes are almost perfect. We have been preparing for this for a long time.<page>Yes, right. Oh, yes! I wish the animals around me didn't have such sharp eyes. Swallow, swallow, it will make work difficult!
secondary_translated_text: 我的天啊！太热了！封面是完美的。我说了什么？发生了什么？有东西正在展示！<hpage>衣服几乎完美。我们为此准备了很长时间。<page>是的，正确的。哦，是的！我希望周围的动物没有这么敏锐的眼睛。吞下去，吞下去，这会使工作变得困难！

original_en_text: <hpage>The battle ahead may indeed be arduous. I accept your offer of aid, sirs.<page>Gurrrro! Yes! No force in the kingdom can withstand our might! Lead on, sister! Zaza and I will be close behind!
original_zh_text: <hpage>前方战斗凶险，有劳二位了。<page>嘎噜！咱们联手肯定所向披靡！带路吧姐妹！我和扎扎自会跟上！
translated_text: <hpage>From now on, the battle will be tough. Ladies and gentlemen, I will help you.<page>Come on, come on! Come on, come on! Oh, yes! Oh, yes! The kingdom cannot resist authority! Sisters, please bring me here. I paid my taxes and looked at him.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>从现在开始，战斗将是艰难的。女士们先生们，我来帮你们。<page>来吧来吧来吧来吧哦，是的！哦，是的！王国无法抗拒权威！姐妹们，请带我来这里。我缴了税，看着他。

original_en_text: Sister, sister, tired and glum,<br>We will sing, and you can hum,<br>Together we shall overcome!
original_zh_text: 姐妹同袍，圣途相聚，<br>齐声歌唱，忘却忧伤，<br>同心协力，共度难关！
translated_text: My sister, my sister, tired and depressed.<br>I can smoke and sing.<br>We failed together.“
secondary_translated_text: 我的妹妹，我的妹妹，又累又沮丧。<br>我可以抽烟和唱歌。<br>我们一起失败了。“

original_en_text: <page=M>Oh ho! Back from the depths with nary a scratch! Is it as you feared?<hpage>It is, and worse. Your snare has sunk the monarch deep, deeper than I can safely descend.<hpage>To cut Pharloom free, I must plunge below the surface of that lake of liquid nothing.<page=B> No shell survives submersion in that void, Old One, not even yours.<hpage>Not without aid, certainly. Though aid may exist. The flower that resists the dark. Do you know of it?<page=M>The Everbloom?... We’ve heard the tale, but had thought it a myth. If ever it sprouted in our lands we would surely have known?<hpage>I would not seek it in these lands. I need its power full, and it is too fragile to sustain here long. I would seek it in my memory.<page=S> Oh ho ho! So you’d have us wrench open your soul, to retrieve the fabled bloom? Can such a thing be done?<hpage>For another bug, no, but I am Weaver enough to attempt it.<hpage>In the distant past, I knew the flower. My thread still holds its faint memory. If the Everbloom was grasped strongly enough within my Silk, it could be made to manifest.<page=M>Ah! So you’re asking another spell of us? To reveal the flower clear?... But to illuminate one of your kind’s old memories, so acutely... This is no easy thing, even for us...<page=M>Old One, you must give us a moment to confer...
original_zh_text: <page=M>哦嚯！毫发无损从深渊归来！情况果真如您所料？<hpage>比预料的更糟。你们的陷阱将君主沉得极深，深过我安全下潜的极限。<hpage>要斩断纺络的枷锁，须要直入虚无之湖深处。<page=B>古老者，没有躯壳能在虚空浸泡中幸存，您也不例外。<hpage>单凭自己当然不成，但若有助力……那朵抗暗之花，你们知道吗？<page=M>永绽花？……听说过，但只当是传说。如果曾在此地绽放过，我们怎会不知？<hpage>此地当然找不到，我需要完全盛放的花，此地养不活。得去我的记忆中找。<page=S>哦嚯嚯！是要我们撕开您魂魄，取出那朵神花？这真能成功？<hpage>其他虫不行，但我有织者血脉，可以一试。<hpage>在遥远过去，我记得此花，灵丝中尚存其残影。若能在记忆中紧紧抓住，或许能使其显形。<page=M>啊！所以又要我们施法？让花影清晰？……可要照彻您这一族的古老回忆……就算是我们也……<page=M>古老者，请让我们商议一下……
translated_text: <page=M>Yes, shout! "I'm sorry, I think you're really worried.<hpage>Your trap has fallen deeper into the king's hands than I am safe.<hpage>I didn't do anything to free Farrow. I rushed into the lake.<page=B>Scorpions cannot survive in this ancient vacuum. You do the same yourself.<hpage>This doesn't really help. Do you know how to resist dark colors? Does that help you?<page=M>Eternal color? I've heard this story, but I think it's a myth. If they grew up in our country, then<hpage>I couldn't find it on earth, I needed it, but I was too weak to stay here long, and I found it in my memory.<page=S>Oh, Oh, Oh! Do you want to open your soul and announce the legendary flower? Can you do that? "<hpage>As for the other mistakes, no, but I wore them enough to try.<hpage>I have known this flower for a long time, and my memory is always fragile. If my silk is strong enough to hang on that eternal flower, it will appear.<page=M>Yes, right. Oh, yes!" You want to use magic? Should flowers be lit? However, he was clearly able to reveal old memories of his race, which was not an easy task for us.<page=M>"Dad, we need time to talk.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>是的，大喊！“对不起，我想你真的很担心。<hpage>你的陷阱已经落入国王手中，比我的安全还深。<hpage>我没有做任何事情来释放法罗。我冲进湖里。<page=B>蝎子无法在这个古老的真空中生存。你自己也这样做。<hpage>这并没有真正帮助。你知道如何抵抗深色吗？这对你有帮助吗？<page=M>永恒的色彩？我听过这个故事，但我认为这是一个神话。如果他们在我们国家长大，那么<hpage>我在地球上找不到它，我需要它，但我太虚弱了，无法在这里呆太久，我在记忆中找到了它。<page=S>哦，哦，哦！你想打开你的灵魂并宣布传奇之花吗？你能做到吗？"<hpage>至于其他的错误，没有，但我已经穿了足够多的尝试了。<hpage>我认识这朵花很久了，我的记忆总是脆弱的。如果我的丝绸足够坚固，可以挂在那朵永恒的花朵上，它就会出现。<page=M>是的，正确的。哦，是的！“你想用魔法？花应该点燃吗？然而，他显然能够透露他的种族的旧记忆，这对我们来说并不是一件容易的事情。<page=M>“爸爸，我们需要时间谈谈。

translated_text: Hunter Map

original_en_text: My wish is granted... and now everything I love is lost...
original_zh_text: 愿望实现了……可我珍视的一切都消失了……
translated_text: My wish came true and everything I loved disappeared.
secondary_translated_text: 我的愿望实现了，我所爱的一切都消失了。

original_en_text: Gara Takana! What has happened to you, Child Wielding Needle, to cause you such brutal weakening?<hpage>You are seeing the effects of a parasite, Shakra, a writhing entity implanted by force. It will not kill me, not quickly at least, but its presence wears greatly on my shell.<page>It is a horrid state you suffer. Fight yourself free, or find help with haste. I would not wish to see you defeated by such deceitful strength.
original_zh_text: 加拉塔卡纳！使针的小姑娘，你怎么了？竟变成这副惨状？<hpage>是寄生物的影响，沙克拉。它被强行植入了我的躯壳。虽不会立刻致命，但持续侵蚀着我。<page>这状态太可怕了。要么挣脱它，要么快去寻求援助。我可不愿见你败给如此诡诈的力量。
translated_text: In France, it's high! What makes you so weak?<hpage>What you see is the influence of the parasitic chakras, which is changed and strengthened by the forces of being. It may not kill me, at least not quickly, but its presence can cause a lot of wear and tear on my shell.<page>This is the terrible suffering they suffer. Get help as soon as possible! I don't want to be defeated by such a deceptive force.
secondary_translated_text: 在法国，它很高！是什么让你这么软弱？<hpage>你所看到的是寄生脉轮的影响，它被存在的力量改变和加强。它可能不会杀死我，至少不会很快，但它的存在会对我的外壳造成很大的磨损。<page>这就是他们所遭受的痛苦。尽快寻求帮助！我不想被这种欺骗性的力量打败。

original_en_text: Hoi! Let our mighty contest of shells commence again!
translated_text: We started a great fish race!
secondary_translated_text: 我们开始了一场精彩的鱼比赛！

original_en_text: You’re in the habit of craftin’ all kinds’a nasty tools’n traps, aint’cha? This kit’ll let you build ‘em even nastier, heh heh...
original_zh_text: 你这家伙成天捣鼓些工具跟陷阱，是吧？这匣子能帮你更进一步，嘿嘿……
translated_text: You're used to using all kinds of boring tools and traps, right? Actually? Will they make things worse?
secondary_translated_text: 你习惯用各种无聊的工具和陷阱，对吧？实际上？他们会让事情变得更糟吗？

original_en_text: Poshanka, Child Wielding Needle. This heart-home is cut free of its curse.<page>Tell me, was it your blade that brought its saving? My shock would be great if another here managed the feat.<hpage>I slew a tall creature above the town, a Weaver I suspect, though one twisted in purpose.<hpage>By voice and claw it aided, perhaps guided, the thread that strung the town. <page>Weaver? Those vicious old things! To our young we tell the tales, but had thought them long dead, only corpses bound in spires. <hpage>This one still lived, though if it was a Weaver, it was broken in a savage way.<hpage>Its own Silk was bound, pinned deep within its shell. A cruel punishment I’ve not before witnessed. <page>Even broken, my envy remains. A Weaver’s fabled skills... To meet one in combat means great challenge, and great pride in victory.
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔，使针的小姑娘。这镇子的诅咒解除了？<page>是你干的？别的虫可没这本事。<hpage>我斩了镇子上头的高个怪物，像是个变异的织者。<page>是它用声音和利爪操控缠绕镇子的丝线。<page>织者？那群老毒物！还以为早死绝了，只剩塔里的干尸。<hpage>这只还活着，但被折磨得不成样。<hpage>灵丝被钉在壳里，残忍的刑罚。<page>就算残了我也羡慕。织者的本事……能交手是幸运，能得胜更是荣耀。
translated_text: Children in Bosnia wield needles. The shower releases the curse.<page>Can the sword bring redemption? I would be surprised if anyone did this.<hpage>I killed a huge creature over the city. It was deliberately distorted, but I suspect it was tears.<hpage>It helps with sound and nails, and helps control the wires that connect the city.<page>Where is the theater? A long time ago, we told these stories to a young man who thought he had been dead for a long time, and in the arrow, he was just a corpse.<hpage>He is still alive, but if it were tears, he would have been seriously injured.<hpage>Her silk was tied deeply to her shell, a cruel punishment she had never seen.<page>When jealousy is broken, jealousy remains there. Research and development legendary technological battles mean being proud of winning.
secondary_translated_text: 波斯尼亚的孩子们挥舞着针头。淋浴释放了诅咒。<page>剑能带来救赎吗？如果有人这样做，我会感到惊讶。<hpage>我在城市上空杀死了一个巨大的生物。它是故意扭曲的，但我怀疑那是眼泪。<hpage>它有助于声音和钉子，并有助于控制连接城市的电线。<page>剧院在哪里？很久以前，我们向一个年轻人讲述了这些故事，他以为自己已经死了很久，而在箭头中，他只是一具尸体。<hpage>他还活着，但如果是眼泪，他会受重伤。<hpage>她的丝绸深深地绑在壳上，这是她从未见过的残酷惩罚。<page>当嫉妒被打破时，嫉妒就会继续存在。研发传奇的技术之战意味着为获胜而自豪。

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings, Shakra. You are a welcome sight amidst the sodden gloom of these caverns. <page>Child Wielding Needle, your aspect is still sharp. My respect remains. Heed a warning, many fierce bugs roost nearby.<page>On the lake beyond this cave nest a ragged horde atop an old watermound. Their mastery of flight makes them dangerous. My shell will forever carry the score of their pins.<page>If you’re seeking a safer path, head back, towards this land’s core.
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，沙克拉。能在这阴湿洞穴里见到你真好。<page>使针的小姑娘，身手还是那么利索。提醒你，附近猛虫可不少。<page>前面湖心住着群飞虫，我壳上被它们的针弄得全是伤。<page>想走安全点的路就就回头，往这地方的中心走。
translated_text: <hpage>Good morning and welcome to Shakira's Wet Cave.<page>She always looks strong on the outside. Maintain our respect. If you pay attention to the warnings, you will notice many ferocious insects nearby.<page>Behind the cave is an ancient tribe located on an ancient lake hill. Their ability to fly puts them in danger. My shells always have my symbolic ending.<page>If you are looking for a safer route, return to the center of the earth.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>早上好，欢迎来到夏奇拉湿洞。<page>她外表看起来总是很坚强。保持我们的尊重。如果您留意警告，您会注意到附近有许多凶猛的昆虫。<page>洞穴后面是一个古老的部落，位于古老的湖山上。它们的飞行能力使它们处于危险之中。我的贝壳总是有我象征性的结局。<page>如果您正在寻找更安全的路线，请返回地球中心。

original_en_text: Nuu is a long way from her safe lodging... perhaps she will stay in this nice, dark little squeezy place a little longer.
original_zh_text: 努努离家好远……暂时在这个黑暗小缝里窝会儿吧。
translated_text: You can stop for a while in this beautiful, dark and crowded place.
secondary_translated_text: 您可以在这个美丽、黑暗、拥挤的地方停留一会儿。

original_en_text: <hpage>Sherma, I bring supplies from the town of bells below. Since you are now caretaker here, I entrust them to you.<page>Oh, what a blessing! This will surely raise the hopes of our poor brothers and sisters.
original_zh_text: <hpage>小谢尔玛，我从下面镇子带了补给。既然现在你是看守者，就交给你了。<page>真是雪中送炭！兄弟姐妹们肯定会振作起来的！
translated_text: <hpage>Zeman, I brought some cargo from Belton. You are the guardian of this place." I have everything for you.<page>Oh, what a great opportunity! This gives hope to our poor brothers and sisters.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>泽曼，我从贝尔顿带了一些货物。你是这个地方的守护者。“我为你准备了一切。<page>哦，多么好的机会啊！这给我们可怜的兄弟姐妹带来了希望。

original_en_text: Red maiden, you have some great task ahead of you, do you not? If so, then I fear the time of our final parting draws near.<hpage>You sense it true, Sherma. I shall soon descend to the darkness below the kingdom and quell the source of Pharloom’s rending.<hpage>If that task is achieved, my future may take me far from Pharloom, but know I have faith that you will hold these bugs together, and see them prosper.<page>Ah! In truth, I’m still only a fool, but I’ll hold dearly to your faith in me. That warmth will help me to endure whatever challenges lie ahead!<page>Now let me pray for you, dear friend, and may my hopes follow you into the deepest darkness and beyond!
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘，您身负重大使命，对吧？若是如此，恐怕我们分别的时刻临近了。<hpage>你的直觉得没错，谢尔玛。我即将深入王国底部的黑暗，平息撕裂纺络的源头。<hpage>若使命达成，我或许会远行。但我坚信你能团结这些虫子，带领他们重建繁荣。<page>哈！说得对，说得对！毕竟我虽然攀登至此，但终究只是个愚者，而看护这些虫民同胞的生涯才刚开始。<page>现在我要为您祈祷，亲爱的红衣姑娘，静待我们齐声歌颂您凯旋的时刻！
translated_text: "We still have a lot of work to do, don't we? If so, he fears that the final moment of retreat is approaching.<hpage>"You are right, Sam. Soon I will enter the darkness of the kingdom and stifle the destruction of my motherland.<hpage>When this task is completed, my future may be far away from Farham, but I am sure I will put these mistakes together and see how I thrive. "<page>Yes, right. Oh, yes! I'm still crazy, but I believe in your trust. This warmth will help you overcome all the difficulties that bother you!<page>Dear friends, please pray for me so that my hope may survive deep in the darkness and beyond.
secondary_translated_text: “我们还有很多工作要做，不是吗？如果是这样，他担心撤退的最后时刻即将到来。<hpage>“你是对的，萨姆。很快我就会进入王国的黑暗，扼杀祖国的毁灭。<hpage>当这项任务完成后，我的未来可能会远离法勒姆，但我确信我会把这些错误放在一起，看看我如何茁壮成长。"<page>是的，正确的。哦，是的！我仍然很疯狂，但我相信你的信任。这种温暖将帮助您克服所有困扰您的困难！<page>亲爱的朋友们，请为我祈祷，让我的希望能够在黑暗深处和更远的地方生存。

translated_text: Supplier PIN

original_en_text: The way forward is yours. Let us meet again soon.
translated_text: The way forward is yours.

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, you pit yourself against the black-threaded bugs? They are dangerous foes, even for a hardened warrior.<page>I relish such danger, and have little choice besides. These creatures besiege the town within. They are relentless, and empowered. <hpage>...It is the void, stretched up into this world and its husks. I know it well, this force, its nature. If it senses soul within, it will drive voracious towards it.<page>As you say! Many bugs now huddle within the bells. Nowhere else is safe with this black threat rising.<page>Some luck, at least, that I chose to remain, and can offer my rings’ defence.<hpage>Shakra, I seek to end this new disaster, for in it I share much blame, but know, I shall need time to complete my task.<hpage>I ask you hold fast till then. This town and its bugs need a guardian, and I can think of none better.<page>Very well, Hornet Wielding Needle. A pact made strong. If you are working towards the venom’s end, I shall fight with faith renewed.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，你在独自抵挡黑灾虫群？再强悍的战士面对它们也很危险。<page>我享受这份危险，但也没得选择。它们在围攻小镇，没完没了，还有邪力加持。<hpage>……是虚空，侵入现世操纵躯壳。我很了解这东西，它的力量，和本质。它只要嗅到灵魂就会想要吞噬。<page>话是这么说，现在虫民都躲钟里……但别处更危险。<page>我选择留下已经算他们走运，至少还能挡一阵。<hpage>沙克拉，我会想办法终结这场灾难，毕竟我也有责任。但我需要时间，请你坚守下去。<hpage>小镇需要守卫，没有虫比你更合适。<page>好吧，使针的小姑娘。我答应你，只要你能解决源头，我会死守到底。
translated_text: <hpage>Chakra, can you fight against mistakes on the black line? They are a dangerous enemy, even powerful soldiers.<page>"I like to take risks and I have no choice but to do this. Creatures surround the city. They are cold and powerful.<hpage>... This is a vacuum that passes through the world and its shell. I know his strength, his nature. If you can feel the soul there, you will desire it.<page>Just as you said! This watch is full of mistakes. As this black threat grows, everything else is real.<page>Fortunately, I decided to stay and was able to provide defense on the ring.<hpage>Chakra, because of the huge responsibilities I have on my shoulders, I am working hard to end this new disaster, but I know it will take time to complete my mission.<hpage>This time, please do your best. The city and its insects need someone to take care of them. I can't think of anything better.<page>Onitto moved his needle. This is a strong agreement. If I wanted to get rid of this poison, I would fight with my new faith. "
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>脉轮，你能对抗黑线上的错误吗？他们是危险的敌人，甚至是强大的士兵。<page>“我喜欢冒险，我别无选择，只能这样做。生物包围着城市。他们冷酷而强大。<hpage>...这是一个穿过世界及其外壳的真空。我了解他的力量，他的本性。如果你能感觉到那里的灵魂，你就会渴望它。<page>正如你所说！这只手表充满了错误。随着这种黑人威胁的增长，其他一切都是真实的。<page>幸运的是，我决定留下来，并且能够在擂台上提供防守。<hpage>脉轮，由于我肩上肩负着巨大的责任，我正在努力结束这场新的灾难，但我知道完成我的使命需要时间。<hpage>这次请尽力而为。这座城市和它的昆虫需要有人来照顾它们。我想不出更好的了。<page>奥尼托移动了他的针。这是一个强有力的协议。如果我想摆脱这种毒药，我就会用我的新信仰来战斗。"

original_en_text: Let us charge on. My rings shall sing loud on the shells of our enemies.
original_zh_text: 冲吧！让我用战环在敌人的壳上奏响战歌！
translated_text: My ring sings in the bullets of the enemy.
secondary_translated_text: 我的戒指在敌人的子弹中歌唱。

original_en_text: And now, miss grown-up, the task is done! Nuu must be away.<page>But do not be sour! Just think! Pharloom is only one land. So many more must hide out there, filled full with beasts and scents and tastes, all waiting to be discovered.<page>For Nuu, her journey is only at its start. And for you, miss grown-up, Nuu wishes too your happy hunting, much and more!
original_zh_text: 任务完成了！那么大姐姐，努努要出发了。<page>别难过！纺络只是开始！外面还有无数大地等着探索呢！<page>努努的旅程刚开始，祝大姐姐也狩猎愉快！
translated_text: "Madam, you have completed your task.<page>Stop the mountain and think! The Faroe Islands are a country that must hide something. Beasts, smells, everything is waiting to be discovered.<page>Our journey has just begun.
secondary_translated_text: “女士，您已经完成了您的任务。<page>停下来思考一下！法罗群岛是一个必须隐瞒一些事情的国家。野兽、气味，一切都在等待被发现。<page>我们的旅程才刚刚开始。

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, what has happened here? For these masses to huddle so amongst such destruction?<page>The dark-spun bugs, they besiege the town, relentless. I have defended against each wave anew, but they are empowered in foul ways, and I am much fatigued.<hpage>...It is the void, stretched up into this world and its husks. I know it well, that force, its nature. If it senses soul, it will drive voracious towards it.<page>As you say! All these bugs, gathered close within the bells... but nowhere else is safe with this black threat rising.<hpage>Shakra, I seek to end this new disaster, for in it I share much blame, but know, I shall need time to complete my task. I would ask you hold fast till then.<hpage>This town and its bugs needs a guardian, and I can think of none better.<page>Very well, Hornet Wielding Needle. A pact made strong. If you are working towards the venom’s end, I shall fight with faith renewed.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，这是怎么回事？废墟里挤着这么多虫？<page>黑虫围攻小镇，击退一波又来一波。它们有邪力加持，我快顶不住了。<hpage>……是虚空，侵入现世操纵躯壳。我很了解这东西，它的力量，和本质。它只要嗅到灵魂就会想要吞噬。<page>话是这么说，现在虫民都躲钟里……但别处更危险。<hpage>沙克拉，我会想办法终结这场灾难，毕竟我也有责任。但我需要时间，请你坚守下去。<hpage>小镇需要守卫，没有虫比你更合适。<page>好吧，使针的小姑娘。我答应你，只要你能解决源头，我会死守到底。
translated_text: <hpage>What happened to Shakur? Are we involved in this disaster?<page>I protected all the waves, but I was tired because I didn't eat enough food.<hpage>... It is an emptiness that spreads into the world and its outer shell. I know his strength, his nature. "When you feel a soul, you approach it insecurely. "<page>Just as you said! When the bell rings, the insects will gather, but as this black threat increases, other places will become unsafe.<hpage>Chakra, because of the huge responsibilities I have on my shoulders, I am working hard to end this new disaster, but I know it will take time to complete my mission.<hpage>The city and its insects need someone to take care of them. I can't think of a better person.<page>Onitto moved his needle. This is a strong agreement. If I wanted to get rid of this poison, I would fight with my new faith. "
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>沙库尔怎么了？我们是否参与了这场灾难？<page>我保护了所有的波浪，但我很累，因为我没有吃足够的食物。<hpage>...它是一种空，它蔓延到世界和它的外壳。我了解他的力量，他的本性。“当你感觉到一个灵魂时，你不安全地接近它。"<page>正如你所说！当钟声响起时，昆虫就会聚集，但随着这种黑色威胁的增加，其他地方就会变得不安全。<hpage>脉轮，由于我肩上肩负着巨大的责任，我正在努力结束这场新的灾难，但我知道完成我的使命需要时间。<hpage>这座城市和它的昆虫需要有人来照顾它们。我想不出更好的人了。<page>奥尼托移动了他的针。这是一个强有力的协议。如果我想摆脱这种毒药，我就会用我的新信仰来战斗。"

original_en_text: Eugh. Is it gettin’ hotter down here? Mustier? Grindle’s been down here too long. Reckon it’s time to climb back up soon, to where all the serious treasures is!
original_zh_text: 呃。这底下是不是越来越热了？格林德尔在这底下待太久了，该上去淘真宝贝了！
translated_text: Is it hot here? No gun? "Greendale has been here for so long, I think it's time to come back as soon as possible and find all the important treasures!"
secondary_translated_text: 这里热吗？没有枪？“格林德尔已经在这里这么久了，我想是时候尽快回来，找到所有重要的宝藏了！"

translated_text: Black Market (Black Market)

original_en_text: So this is... defeat? Can it be? Huu... A shell so fast! Wonder of Pharloom! A bug whose pace could match my own.<page>Though I set a simple course, you have proven its match and more. Take this small reward, nimble bug, and remember well our grand contest!
original_zh_text: 居然……输了？怎么可能？呼……太快了！真是神奇！<page>虽然这条赛道不难，但你证明了自己！收下这个奖励，纪念我们的巅峰对决！
translated_text: Is that all, failure? Are you okay? The miracle of the pharaoh: He was an insect as fast as me.<page>We installed a simple path, but we found it to be compatible. Pay attention to these little bonuses, mistakes, and remember the great games!
secondary_translated_text: 就这样吗，失败？你还好吗？法老的奇迹：他是一只和我一样快的昆虫。<page>我们安装了一个简单的路径，但我们发现它是兼容的。注意这些小奖金、错误，记住伟大的游戏！

original_en_text: Oh, hoy there! Why, I must have dropped off to sleep as soon as I arrived!<page>Certainly, the pilgrim’s way is exhausting, but a good rest is a reward unto itself!
original_zh_text: 哎呀！刚到这地方就睡着了！<page>朝圣虽累，但一场美梦就是最好的犒赏！
translated_text: Here he comes! Why? I got dressed and went to bed.<page>Of course, the pilgrimage can be exhausting, but a good rest is a reward in itself!
secondary_translated_text: 他来了！为什么？我穿好衣服就上床睡觉了。<page>当然，朝圣之旅可能会让人筋疲力尽，但好好休息本身就是一种奖励！

original_en_text: That was a battle well-fought, Child Wielding Needle. Your master would be proud of you.<hpage>The one who trained me long ago... I never called her master. Whether she would be proud of what has become of me, I cannot say.<page>Nu-Hakkata! Whether she is dead or alive, have faith! Nothing a pupil does escapes their master’s sight!
original_zh_text: 打得好！你的导师肯定很骄傲。<hpage>教导我的……我从没叫过她导师。她会不会以我为荣……我不知道。<page>努-哈咔嗒！不管她是死是活，你都要自信！徒弟干的事，师傅都看在眼里！
translated_text: It was a wonderful battle, with the children waving needles. Your guests will be proud of you!<hpage>They trained me for a long time. "I don't call him Master. I don't know if you're proud of what happened to me.<page>Empty side! Life and death require faith. Nothing a student does escapes the teacher's attention.
secondary_translated_text: 这是一场精彩的战斗，孩子们挥舞着针头。您的客人会为您感到自豪！<hpage>他们训练了我很长时间。“我不叫他大师。我不知道你是否为发生在我身上的事情感到自豪。<page>空的一面！生与死需要信仰。学生所做的一切都逃不过老师的注意。

original_en_text: Wide, dim hollows, choked by rag and dust. The bugs who once tended these lands have clearly lost their way.
original_zh_text: 昏暗广袤的洞窟塞满破布灰尘，原本照料这里的虫早已迷失了方向。
translated_text: Of course, the huge and dark void is covered with dust and dust, and the insects that once protected the land have disappeared.
secondary_translated_text: 当然，巨大而黑暗的虚空被灰尘和尘埃覆盖，曾经保护这片土地的昆虫也消失了。

original_en_text: Red maiden! Dear sister! At last, our great pilgrimage is at its end!<page>Our faith never wavered, and now here awaits our glorious reward, the shining Citadel! Where all sing as one!<hpage>I will not tell you to turn back, for I know you will not, but I urge you at least to be cautious. Terrible things lurk within this Citadel, little pilgrim.<page>Oh, sister! There is no need for caution, and no need for fear. Let us step forward under guidance of our faith!
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘！好姐妹！我们终于到了！<page>守住信念不容易，现在终于看到圣堡了！大家齐声歌颂的地方！<hpage>我知道劝不动你回头，但千万小心。这里头藏着可怕的东西。<page>用不着小心！跟着信仰往前走就对了！
translated_text: Red girl! Dear sister! The great pilgrimage is finally over!<page>Our faith has no victory, and the reward of glory awaits us at this moment.<hpage>I thought you wouldn't come back, so I didn't tell you to come back, but at least you have to be careful. Little pilgrim, there is something terrible in this castle.<page>Good morning, sister! The road of faith is the road of faith. You don't have to be afraid, you don't have to be afraid.
secondary_translated_text: 红女孩！亲爱的姐姐！伟大的朝圣终于结束了！<page>我们的信仰没有胜利，荣耀的回报此刻等待着我们。<hpage>我以为你不会回来了，所以我没有告诉你回来，但至少你要小心。小朝圣者，这座城堡里有可怕的事情。<page>早上好，姐姐！信仰之路就是信仰之路。你不必害怕，你不必害怕。

original_en_text: This vein of gilded bells creates an effectively defended settlement. I can see it once gave a long time of peace to its bugs.<page>And yet, look at their numbers now. Stricken by cursed thread. Only a few have survived.<page>We must learn from them, Child Wielding Needle. Peace is a slow poison that would wither even the hardiest bug.
original_zh_text: 这金钟钟脉易守难攻，以前肯定十分安全。<page>看看现在，大半被丝咒侵蚀了，虫民也所剩寥寥。<page>要从这镇子上吸取教训，使针的小姑娘。安逸最腐蚀虫心。
translated_text: This golden bell is an effective defensive solution, and I have long seen it give me inner peace.<page>Looking at these numbers, are you stuck in the queue? Only a few survived.<page>We must teach our children that the world is a slow poison that spreads even the most stubborn insects.
secondary_translated_text: 这个金钟是一种有效的防御解决方案，我长期以来一直看到它给我内心的平静。<page>看看这些数字，你是不是被困在队列里了？只有少数人幸存下来。<page>我们必须教导我们的孩子，世界是一种缓慢的毒药，即使是最顽固的昆虫也会传播。

original_en_text: <hpage>Your camp here looks comfortably set, Shakra. Are you planning to stay a time?<page>Perhaps, yes. This heart-home makes a fine base for now and later if needed.<page>Still! I must take care not to rest overlong. My shell would soften and my senses dull.<page>
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，我瞧你营地布置得不错，打算长住？<page>或许吧，这镇子看来能暂时当个据点。<page> 但不能久待，会钝了爪子和脑子。
translated_text: <hpage>Chakra, camping seems very comfortable. Are you planning on staying for a while?<page>If necessary, this heart house will always be a good foundation.<page>Rest! Pay attention to make your skin soft and your emotions disappear.<page>
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>脉轮，露营似乎很舒服。您打算住一段时间吗？<page>如果有必要，这个心宫将永远是一个良好的基础。<page>休息！注意让皮肤柔软，情绪消失。<page>

original_en_text: Oh, hullo again! This time, I most certainly do recognise you! ‘Tis a pleasure to bump into you here, deep in this serene wood.<page>Do you have a name, like I do? Would you share it with me?<hpage>Certainly, sir. I am Hornet.<hpage>I notice you gazing at the buds above us... are they familiar to you, perhaps?<page>Hm? No, not at all. Very beautiful though! Perhaps I should gather some up before venturing on...
original_zh_text: 又见面了！这次绝对认得你！能在这林中深处偶遇也是缘分。<page>能告诉我你的名字吗？<hpage>我名为大黄蜂。<hpage>你在看那些苍白花苞……莫非曾经见过？<page>那倒没有，但它们很美！出发前或许该采些带着……
translated_text: God, I'm back! This time, I fully admit it. "It's nice to see you in this peaceful forest. "<page>Is your name the same as mine? Can you share this with me?<hpage>"I am a bee.<hpage>He realized he was looking at the bullet in his head.<page>What is this? What are you doing? Not everyone, but it's beautiful. Before you embark on the adventure, you may want to bring something with you.
secondary_translated_text: 天哪，我回来了！这一次，我完全承认这一点。“很高兴在这片宁静的森林里见到你。"<page>你的名字和我的名字一样吗？你能和我分享一下吗？<hpage>“我是一只蜜蜂。<hpage>他意识到自己正在看着自己头上的子弹。<page>这是什么？你在干什么？不是每个人，但它很漂亮。在开始冒险之前，您可能想带上一些东西。

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>These markers I have modelled after the sheen of my own shell. Perhaps you will think of me when you use them.
original_zh_text: 你可以用这个在地图上标记重要地点或提醒事项。<br><br>按我的壳抛光做的，用的时候会想起我吧？
translated_text: You can use it to display important places and memories on a map.<br><br>I made a sign that mimics my shell lamp and remember me when you use it.
secondary_translated_text: 您可以用它来显示地图上的重要地点和记忆。<br><br>我做了一个模仿我的贝壳灯的标志，当你使用它时记住我。

original_en_text: There are signs that pilgrims once travelled even these crumbling paths, long ago. Now only the voracious worms nest here.
original_zh_text: 这破路早年也有朝圣者走，现在只剩贪吃蠕虫。
translated_text: In the past, there were signs that pilgrims had followed an unsustainable route, but now they can only use insects to build nests.
secondary_translated_text: 过去，有迹象表明朝圣者遵循了一条不可持续的路线，但现在他们只能利用昆虫筑巢。

original_en_text: Hoi! Nimble bug! Surely you have reconsidered? Let us discover our limits together!
original_zh_text: 嘿！改变主意没？来一起突破极限！
translated_text: Hey, hey, that was a wise mistake! Are you sure you checked it? Let's explore the boundaries together!
secondary_translated_text: 嘿嘿，那是一个明智的错误！您确定检查过了吗？让我们一起探索界限！

original_en_text: You have purchased the last of my mapping stock, for now. Stay alive on your journey, and when our paths next cross we may trade again.
original_zh_text: 你把我的货买光啦，小姑娘。多保重，下次碰面再做交易。
translated_text: You can keep it in a good mood while traveling and sell it again the next time you see it.
secondary_translated_text: 您可以在旅行时保持好心情，下次看到时再次出售。

original_en_text: Don’t be lingerin’ here too long! We got snitchin’ to do and we ain’t keen on company!
original_zh_text: 别在这儿磨蹭太久！我们还要干活呢，不欢迎围观！
translated_text: I would love to say this, but my colleagues don't.
secondary_translated_text: 我很想这么说，但我的同事不这么说。

original_en_text: If you venture further and higher into these caverns, beware. The sickly air only grows thicker.
original_zh_text: 如果你要往高处的话，走小心，那儿的瘴气更浓。
translated_text: Be careful when entering the cave, as this will only make the air of pain worse.
secondary_translated_text: 进入洞穴时要小心，因为这只会让痛苦的空气变得更糟。

original_en_text: I’ll be off soon, once I’m good and rested. Beyond the wood lies the final climb, and then at last we shall reach the Citadel!<page>Which of us will reach the Grand Gate first? If it’s me, I shall wait for you so we can enter together!
original_zh_text: 歇够了我就出发，穿过甲木林就是最后攀登，圣堡就在眼前！<page>看我们谁先到巨门？要是我先到，肯定会等你一起进去！
translated_text: When he felt better, he climbed a tree and finally reached the castle on his final climb.<page>Who will be the first person to enter the stargate? If I were there, I would wait to go with you.
secondary_translated_text: 当他感觉好点时，他爬上了一棵树，终于在最后一次攀登中到达了城堡。<page>谁将成为第一个进入星门的人？如果我在那里，我会等着和你一起去。

original_en_text: If you would fight alone, I will say nothing more.
original_zh_text: 你要自己上的话，我也没意见。
translated_text: If you fight alone, I won't tell you.
secondary_translated_text: 如果你单独战斗，我不会告诉你。

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair meeting again, sir knight. I see this bell has drawn you too towards its safety.<page>Who would have guessed, sister! A safe corner, hidden so high atop Pharloom’s cursed crown!<page>Our fair village may have fallen, but for these fellows... these scared few, our honour charges us to keep them safe. Our hornlance shall raise for them! After some rest, of course.<hpage>Hold fast to your new charge, Garmond. See these bugs survive, and know I aim, in time near, to cut down this curse at its core.
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，骑士。看来这钟也把你吸引过来了。<page>谁能想到呢，圣堡顶上还有避难所！<page>村子没了，但这些吓坏了的……为了荣耀，我会拿起长枪保护好他们！不过得先歇会。<hpage>守好他们，加蒙德。我会斩断诅咒的核心，不会让你等太久的。
translated_text: <hpage>Great quote, my friend. The watch pays great attention to safety.<page>Who can guess? Hide in a safe corner, on the crown of the cursed lighthouse!<page>Our great people may fall, but that is for them. Our honor requires us to protect this terrible minority. Our horn will sound for them. A short break, of course.<hpage>Protect your new attack, Gaimon! As long as these mistakes persist, my goal is to eradicate this curse in the near future.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>很好的引用，我的朋友。手表非常注重安全。<page>谁能猜到？躲在一个安全的角落里，躲在被诅咒灯塔的王冠上！<page>我们伟大的人民可能会倒下，但那是为了他们。我们的荣誉要求我们保护这个可怕的少数派。我们的号角将为他们吹响。当然是短暂的休息。<hpage>保护你的新攻击，盖蒙！只要这些错误持续存在，我的目标就是在不久的将来根除这个诅咒。

translated_text: Book of Sinners

original_en_text: O-hoho! Into Grindle’s pockets they go! And for you, a secret to remember us by...<page>Beneath here and further on, the burly bellheads have a big, hot, gleaming hive! Full of all sorts of tasty snitchables!<page>But there’s this big gate they got down in its belly... shut tight, locked up. If you could wriggle through, you’d get your claws on all kindsa goodies!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！都进我们的口袋啦！那就送你个秘密当纪念……<page>底下更深的地方，那些钟头怪物有个又大又亮的宝库！全是好东西！<page>但最底下有道大门被锁死了。要是能溜进去就发啦！
translated_text: Oh, Oh, Oh! Carmen Greendale prays for those who remember our secrets.<page>In these turbulent times, there are big and warm glistening canyons here and elsewhere! There are many great reporters<page>But they put the door in his stomach, closed it, closed it. If you can get over it, your nails will lift everything up!
secondary_translated_text: 哦，哦，哦！卡门·格林德尔为那些记住我们秘密的人祈祷。<page>在这个动荡的时代，这里和其他地方都有巨大而温暖的闪闪发光的峡谷！有很多伟大的记者<page>但他们把门放在他的肚子里，关上了，关上了。如果你能克服它，你的指甲就会把一切都举起！

original_en_text: You see this idol before us, red maiden? I have passed its like before, they mark our pilgrimage well.<page>If we sing to it, a miraculous shrine will rise from the ground, and we will have a place to rest! Such a wonder!<hpage>I suspect it is not song that rouses this shrine, but payment in rosaries.<hpage>I have encountered similar constructs on Pharloom’s paths. It seems this kingdom does not grant rest lightly.
original_zh_text: 看见这圣像了吗？沿途都有标记。<page>对着它歌唱，圣椅就会升起供我们歇息！多神奇！<hpage>我认为唤醒长椅的不是歌声，谢尔玛，而是念珠。<hpage>我在路上曾遇到过此类长椅，看来纺络从不轻易施恩。
translated_text: Do you see the red woman in front of you? I went through the same experience as before, which gave me a good sign for a pilgrimage.<page>As you sing, the magical temple rises and becomes a place to rest.<hpage>I believe that the temple was awakened not by a song, but by the recitation of the rosary.<hpage>On the way to the pharaoh's palace, we found a similar building. The kingdom will not rest in peace.
secondary_translated_text: 你看到你面前的红色女人了吗？我经历了和以前一样的经历，这给了我一个朝圣的好兆头。<page>当你唱歌时，神奇的寺庙升起，成为休息的地方。<hpage>我相信圣殿不是被一首歌唤醒的，而是被玫瑰经的吟诵唤醒的。<hpage>在去法老宫殿的路上，我们发现了一座类似的建筑。王国不会安息。

original_en_text: O-hoho! Into Grindle’s pockets they go! And for you, a secret to remember us by...<page>There’s lots of pickings round here, right? Well, it’s all nothing compared to what they got hidden up, up above us. The great big Sitty-del they calls it!<page>A golden place, groaning with goodies! Could never steal it all in a thousand snitch-bug lifetimes they reckon!<page>Oh yes, that’s where ol’ Grindle is headin’. Don’t you dare follow us, though! We want it all for us-selves!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！都进我们的口袋啦！那就送你个秘密当纪念……<page>这附近好东西不少对吧？但跟上边的圣堡比，什么都不是！<page>听说那是金山银山，几辈子都掏不完！<page>格林德尔这就去捞个够！你可别跟来抢！
translated_text: Oh, Oh, Oh! Carmen Greendale prays for those who remember our secrets.<page>You have a lot of pickup trucks, don't you? This is nothing compared to what is hidden in our minds. It is called the "Great Castle".<page>A golden place full of beautiful scenery! One man cannot steal a thousand lives.<page>This is the fate of the witness. "Come with us! We're all doing our jobs!
secondary_translated_text: 哦，哦，哦！卡门·格林德尔为那些记住我们秘密的人祈祷。<page>你有很多皮卡车，不是吗？与隐藏在我们脑海中的东西相比，这算不了什么。它被称为“伟大的城堡”。<page>风景优美的黄金之地！一个人无法偷走一千条生命。<page>这就是证人的命运。“跟我们来！我们都在做我们的工作！

original_en_text: O-hoho! Into Grindle’s pockets they go! And for you, a secret to remember us by...<page>You know where all them dreary raggedies are camping? Back near the ol’ chapel? Well, beyond that chapel is a dirty great grave!<page>Not much in there but husks, right? But but! My sniffer tells me there’s something worth the trouble buried down at the bottom!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！都进我们的口袋啦！那就送你个秘密当纪念……<page>你知道那处破破烂烂的朝圣者营地吧？那附近的破教堂后头有个大坟场！<page>那乍一看都是尸壳对吧？但是但是！我能嗅到底下埋着值钱货，我鼻子灵得很！
translated_text: Oh, Oh, Oh! It's in Greendale's pocket for those who remember our secrets.<page>Do you know where the garbage is? Will you go back to the old church? There is a filthy tomb behind the church.<page>It's just a cover, isn't it? Actually? Mom, mom, mom! When I smelled it, I was scared.
secondary_translated_text: 哦，哦，哦！它就在格林德尔的口袋里，留给那些记住我们秘密的人。<page>你知道垃圾在哪里吗？你会回到老教堂吗？教堂后面有一个肮脏的坟墓。<page>这只是一个掩护，不是吗？实际上？妈妈，妈妈，妈妈！当我闻到它的味道时，我很害怕。

original_en_text: <hpage>The groaning docks, beyond the caverns of bone. There I have seen a vessel able to pass below, a heavy bell built for descent.<hpage>I need only gain access, and an operator to assist. I will investigate the docks, and uncover the means.<page=M>You’d be the first in an age to dive so deep, Old One. That space below remains long unseen, even to our family. <hpage>For those depths, I am more prepared than most. I will reach the base of this land, and know the truth of the new disaster we, together have wrought.
original_zh_text: <hpage>穿越骸骨洞窟，那锈蚀的深坞中停着一口沉钟，专为下潜打造。<hpage>只需寻得入口与操钟人。我会探查深坞，找出通路。<page=M>古老者，您是数个纪元以来第一个敢下潜的。那片黑暗连我们家族都未曾窥见。<hpage>对于深渊，我早有准备。我会抵达此地根基，看清你我共酿的新灾祸。
translated_text: <hpage>There was a boat that could pass under it, and a heavy watch that made it fall.<hpage>All you need is access and operator: find a door, find a path.<page=M>During this period, students will first deepen their research. The space below is not always known to families.<hpage>We will shine on earth and discover the truth about the new catastrophe we have created together.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>有一艘船可以从它下面经过，还有一只沉重的手表让它掉了下来。<hpage>您所需要的只是访问和操作员：找到门，找到路径。<page=M>在此期间，学生们将首先深化研究。下面的空间并不总是为家庭所知。<hpage>我们将照耀地球，发现我们共同制造的新灾难的真相。

original_en_text: Why does it fade? Why can I not recall that sacred place?
original_zh_text: 为什么消失了……为什么想不起圣地模样……
translated_text: Why did he disappear? Why don't we remember the Holy Land?
secondary_translated_text: 他为什么消失了？为什么我们不记住圣地？

original_en_text: <hpage>Here you lie, monarch. Sunk so deep, yet still you cling to life. <hpage>Would you let your lands be choked black... to protect just her?
original_zh_text: <hpage>苍白之主，沉沦至此也要苟活么？<hpage>你宁愿让纺络被黑暗吞噬……只为护着她？
translated_text: <hpage>God, you're a liar. If you sink deep, you are still alive.<hpage>Are you willing to protect your land?
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>天哪，你是个骗子。如果你陷得很深，你还活着。<hpage>你愿意保护你的土地吗？

original_en_text: <hpage>Take care, Garmond. Whatever dangers these lands present, I’m sure what waits in that Citadel will be worse.<page>Aye, sister! Until that Citadel is reached and justice is served, Zaza and I shall not fall.
original_zh_text: <hpage>保重，加蒙德。圣堡必然比外面更加危险。<page>你也保重，姐妹！不跟圣堡之主讨个公道，我和扎扎不会倒下的！
translated_text: <hpage>Whatever the danger awaits us in this castle on earth, I believe it will be worse.<page>Purple and I will not fall until we reach the fortress and justice is restored.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>无论这座地球上的城堡里有什么危险等待着我们，我相信情况会更糟。<page>在到达堡垒并恢复正义之前，紫色和我不会倒下。

original_en_text: Letting you live was my rebellion, spider. I’ve denied my mother your silken strength. I’ve won.<page>She can thrash, and waste, and know her pathetic, broken child caused the mortal wound.<page>Rejoice! And let it all come down.<hpage>I will not. I have already stood the sentinel for one dying land. That role... I will never play again.<hpage>While I live, and possess the strength to resist, this kingdom, and the bugs within it, shall not fall.
original_zh_text: 留着你的性命就是我的反叛。母亲得不到你的灵丝，是我赢了。<page>让她抓狂吧！知道是我这残次品带给她致命伤！<page>欢呼吧！一切都将崩塌！<hpage>恕难从命。我曾守望过一个将死的国度，同样的角色……我不想再扮第二次。<hpage>只要我还活着，还有力气反抗，这个王国与其子民就不会陨落。
translated_text: I didn't give power to Mother Spider, I won.<page>He knew that the whip was useless, that pain would break, and that children would get hurt.<page>Make us happy! Drop everything.<hpage>I am not a place of death, I am the custodian of this document, and I will never touch it again.<hpage>As long as it is alive and has the strength to resist, the kingdom and the insects that contain it will not fall.
secondary_translated_text: 我没有把力量交给蜘蛛妈妈，我赢了。<page>他知道鞭子没用，疼痛会破裂，孩子们会受伤。<page>让我们快乐！放下一切。<hpage>我不是死亡之地，我是这份文件的保管人，我再也不会碰它了。<hpage>只要它还活着，有抵抗的力量，它所在的王国和昆虫就不会灭亡。

original_en_text: Hahahhaa! Spider. Spider. What a marvellous specimen you are! You fight and fight, heedless as the world crumbles around you.<page>Pharloom and her bugs will be crushed to dust, and still you’ll be vainly swinging your blade.<hpage>...There may still be a way to prevent that fate. I will claim the hidden power, the bloom that repels the dark.<hpage>Those snails share some fault in the snare, and their callous use of the void. They shall help me now to seek its counter.<hpage>I will return, child, when I bear the strength to dive below, and cut this land finally free of your mother’s grasp.
original_zh_text: 哈哈哈哈！顽固的小蜘蛛！即便你继续挣扎，这个世界一样会崩塌！<page>一切都将化为尘埃，继续挥舞那针刃还有什么用<hpage>……或许还有转机。我会取得驱散黑暗的永绽花。<hpage>蜗牛一族滥用虚空难辞其咎，现在它们得帮我找到破局之法。<hpage>等我取得力量，就来斩断你母亲的掌控。
translated_text: Ha! Ha! When the world around us collapses, we unconsciously struggle and struggle.<page>Release yourself and your insects will be torn to pieces, and you wield your sword in vain.<hpage>... I have a hidden power, I reject the flowers of darkness.<hpage>These snail traps also have their shortcomings and always exploit loopholes. They will help me find a counterattack.<hpage>My son, when I sink into the sea, I will come back, and I finally have the strength to liberate this land from your mother's hands.
secondary_translated_text: 哈！哈！当我们周围的世界崩溃时，我们无意识地挣扎和挣扎。<page>释放你自己，你的虫子就会被撕成碎片，你的剑却徒劳地挥舞。<hpage>...我有一种隐藏的力量，我拒绝黑暗之花。<hpage>这些蜗牛陷阱也有其缺点，总是钻漏洞。他们会帮助我找到反击。<hpage>我的儿子，当我沉入大海时，我就会回来，我终于有力量将这片土地从你母亲手中解放出来。

original_en_text: After some tasty goodies? We never say no to a fair trade, heh heh! Take a look at what we’s got...
original_zh_text: 想要宝贝？只接受公平交易！随便看看吧……
translated_text: After a delicious meal? I am not opposed to fair trade.
secondary_translated_text: 吃完美餐后？我并不反对公平贸易。

original_en_text: We could add a little pocket to yer tool pouch for you. You could pack even more goodies in there! All your shards’n sharp things!
original_zh_text: 给你工具包加个兜，能多装点好宝贝。
translated_text: You can put a small pocket in your toolbox. You can dress better! Every part of you is strong.
secondary_translated_text: 您可以在工具箱里放一个小口袋。你可以穿得更好！你的每一部分都很坚强。

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, if I may, I’d ask a small task of your carving talents.<hpage>Within the halls of the Citadel, I encountered a means of travel new to me, a network of pipes traversed in vessels propelled by steam and air.<hpage>That Citadel is a labyrinth, and pins to mark each station would prove useful to me.<page>What you describe sounds as hideous and unnatural as anything in that place. Still, if it will aid you, I shall craft the pins.<page>Seek me at a moment not long from now. The pins will be carved, and we may trade.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，方便的话，借你的手艺办件小事。<hpage>圣堡里有种我没见过的蒸汽管道交通网。<hpage>但那跟一座迷宫一样，因此我需要标记站点的图钉。<page>圣堡里都是这种难看又不自然的玩意。但你要就给你做吧。<page>过阵子再来找我，图钉做好了才能交易。
translated_text: <hpage>"Shakra, I hope you can use your talent in this area to do some work.<hpage>In the living room of the castle, I discovered a strange way to travel: a network of pipes through which ships and planes pass.<hpage>The castle is like a maze, and the pine trees displayed every season are very useful.<page>What you draw sounds as scary and unnatural as the rest of this place, but if it works, I'll make a pineapple.<page>We'll find them as soon as possible. Rotation can be engraved and interchangeable.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>“夏克拉，我希望你能利用你在这方面的天赋来做一些工作。<hpage>在城堡的客厅里，我发现了一种奇怪的旅行方式：船只和飞机通过的管道网络。<hpage>城堡就像一个迷宫，每个季节展示的松树都很有用。<page>你画的东西听起来和这个地方的其他部分一样可怕和不自然，但如果它有效，我会做一个菠萝。<page>我们会尽快找到他们。旋转可以雕刻和互换。

original_en_text: These overgrown caves offer little challenge to a skilled warrior. A place for reflection, perhaps.
original_zh_text: 这长满苔藓的洞穴对高手没挑战性，适合发呆。
translated_text: These densely populated caves pose few problems for skilled soldiers. Maybe this is a place for reflection.
secondary_translated_text: 这些人口稠密的洞穴对熟练的士兵来说几乎没有什么问题。也许这是一个反思的地方。

original_en_text: Fear not, red maiden! This shrine will surely rise for us, we only need to patiently wish for it!
original_zh_text: 别担心！只要诚心祈愿，圣椅定会为我们显现！
translated_text: You have nothing to be afraid of. The Red Virgin is with us. All we have to do is pray patiently.
secondary_translated_text: 你没有什么可害怕的。红色处女与我们同在。我们所要做的就是耐心祈祷。

original_en_text: <page=M>In the heights of the great wood, nestled deep in its roots, vines and branches, find the one who sowed the first seed.<page=S>They’re the very essence of the place, the nub of it all. Ain’t really a bug, to be told, but a powerful presence nonetheless.<page=M>We’d heard the Citadel once made grudging accord with that creature, sent their servants in reverence, even built a shrine up there somewhere. Maybe it’s worth you searching for it?
original_zh_text: <page=M>甲木林最深处，根枝藤蔓之间，埋着最初播种者。<page=S>那是纺络的精华所在，虽算不得虫子，但也十分强大。<page=M>听说圣堡曾与之立约，建造圣所供奉，还派遣仆从侍奉。或许值得一探？
translated_text: <page=M>Deep in the roots and branches, he found the man who planted the first seed.<page=S>I am the essence of this place, I am the center of everything. In other words, it's not a mistake, but it's still a powerful entity.<page=M>I heard that the castle signed a treaty with this creature against his will, made his servants cry, and built a temple somewhere.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>在树根和树枝的深处，他找到了播下第一粒种子的人。<page=S>我是这个地方的本质，我是一切的中心。换句话说，这不是一个错误，但它仍然是一个强大的实体。<page=M>我听说城堡违背他的意愿与这个生物签订了条约，让他的仆人哭泣，并在某处建造了一座寺庙。

original_en_text: Old roads and passages overrun by roaches and their keepers. The ways are covered thick with filth.
original_zh_text: 被蟑螂及其饲主侵占的古道，路面上覆满污秽。
translated_text: The streets and corridors are full of roaches and their guards, and the streets are dirty.
secondary_translated_text: 街道和走廊上到处都是蟑螂和警卫，街道也很脏。

original_en_text: In this moment, I have no more items to trade. Perhaps, if we meet again on the roads ahead, I shall have crafted new goods to sell.
original_zh_text: 暂时没货了，小姑娘。下次碰面会准备好新玩意的，保重。
translated_text: There are currently no exchangeable products. If you travel, you can create and sell new products.
secondary_translated_text: 目前没有可更换产品。如果您旅行，您可以创建和销售新产品。

original_en_text: You like this gleaming spinner I snitched from the big Sitty-dell? There’s a way to make it sing to you, or so they says!
original_zh_text: 从圣堡顺来的转轮！据说用某种方法能让它唱歌呢！
translated_text: Do you like the shiny spinner I brought to the cathedral? We have a way of singing or at least talking.
secondary_translated_text: 你喜欢我带到大教堂的闪亮旋转器吗？我们有唱歌的方式，或者至少有说话的方式。

translated_text: bone marrow map; bone marrow map;

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>This dark-shell material is cold to the touch, and more resilient than it looks.
original_zh_text: 你可以用这个在地图上标记重要地点或提醒事项。<br><br>黑壳材质冷冰冰的，比看着结实。
translated_text: You can use it to display important places and memories on a map.<br><br>This deep material gives a feeling that is cooler and more elastic than it looks.
secondary_translated_text: 您可以用它来显示地图上的重要地点和记忆。<br><br>这种深层材料给人一种比看起来更凉爽、更有弹性的感觉。

original_en_text: Crumbling roads built upon the shells of ancient bugs. All of Pharloom rests upon these fragile foundations.
original_zh_text: 建在古虫壳上的破路，整个纺络都靠这些脆架子撑着。
translated_text: This unstable road is built on an ancient insect shell, and the entire lighthouse is built on this fragile foundation.
secondary_translated_text: 这条不稳定的道路建在古老的昆虫壳上，整个灯塔都建在这个脆弱的基础上。

original_en_text: Crusted heights above those howling steps. Signs suggest great warriors once ruled this winding place, though the sand has eroded much of their mark.
original_zh_text: 风蚀台阶上的矿脉高地。迹象表明曾有强族统治，现已被沙尘掩埋。
translated_text: There are signs that a great warrior once ruled this tortuous place, but the sand destroyed most of the ruins.
secondary_translated_text: 有迹象表明，一位伟大的战士曾经统治过这个曲折的地方，但沙子摧毁了大部分废墟。

original_en_text: <hpage>To search these lands so thoroughly, Shakra... I wonder, who is it you hope to find?<page>Okklu-Din... a perceptive question. I travel in search of my mentor, the greatest of my tribe. I have followed her trail throughout this kingdom, but have so far failed to catch her.<page>She will have travelled much farther by now, but if I keep moving and stay vigilant, we shall reunite.
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了。我看你把这片地区都找遍了……你到底在找谁？<page>唉……问得好。我在找导师，我们部落的最强者。我追着她的踪迹跑遍了王国，还是没找到。<page>她肯定走得更远了，但只要保持警惕总能重逢。
translated_text: <hpage>Look carefully at this land. Shakur, do you know who I want to see?<page>I kicked him out of the kingdom because he went to see my master, the supreme lord of the tribe, but I had not yet caught him.<page>Now it's going on, but if I continue to be vigilant, we may be together again. "
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>仔细看看这片土地。沙库尔，你知道我想见谁吗？<page>我把他赶出了王国，因为他去见我的主人，部落的最高领主，但我还没有抓住他。<page>现在事情正在发生，但如果我继续保持警惕，我们可能会再次在一起。"

original_en_text: The stone structures of this place suggest clear waters once ran throughout.<page>What fantasy that now seems! Even this swamp’s inhabitants seem spawned of its noxious nature.
original_zh_text: 这里的石制结构说明以前有清水流过。<page>现在呢？连原本栖居在这里的虫都像是从毒瘴里孕育出来的。
translated_text: The stones indicate that the water has dried up.<page>How big is it now? Even the residents of the swamp seem to be increasing due to its toxicity.
secondary_translated_text: 石头表明水已经干涸。<page>现在有多大了？由于其毒性，就连沼泽中的居民似乎也在增加。

original_en_text: But look here! As soon as our sacred journey begins, we are tested. This huge gate stands between us and the way forward.<page>Only holy prayer and song will open the way! In this kingdom, even mighty bone is moved by music!
original_zh_text: 可你看看！朝圣之路刚启程就遇到考验，被这道巨大骨门拦住了去路。<page>唯有圣歌能够撼动它！在纺络，最顽固的骨头都会为旋律让道！
translated_text: But you must see it! When the Holy Day begins, we will experience it. A door blocked us, blocked our path.<page>Only prayer and God's singing can open the way. Even the strongest bones in the world can play music.
secondary_translated_text: 但你一定要看看！当圣日开始时，我们就会经历它。一扇门挡住了我们，挡住了我们的路。<page>只有祈祷和上帝的歌唱才能开辟道路。即使是世界上最坚强的骨头也能演奏音乐。

original_en_text: You win again! Never have I met a luckier pilgrim...<hpage>You mistake, sir. It was skill that won me this game. One must be careful not to rely merely on luck.<page>Hmph. Fairly said, sister.<page>I must confess something though. Truth is, I already lost the last of my rosaries. I can’t pay our last wager.<page>I do have something small for you, at least. These dice. They certainly seem to have taken a liking to you. Take them, in memory of our meeting.
original_zh_text: 你又赢了！没见过运气这么好的朝圣者……<hpage>错了，我是靠技术赢的，别光指望运气。<page>哼，倒也说得在理。<page>其实……我已经输光家底了。最后这把的赌注我给不起。<page>但我可以把这些小玩意送你。这对骰子跟你有缘，收下当纪念吧。
translated_text: We will win! I have never seen such a happy pilgrim.<hpage>Technology has brought me into this industry.<page>My sister speaks very well.<page>I have to admit that I missed the last position.<page>At least I have something for you." I like this paper. " "
secondary_translated_text: 我们会赢的！我从未见过如此快乐的朝圣者。<hpage>技术将我带入了这个行业。<page>我姐姐说话很好。<page>我不得不承认我错过了最后一个位置。<page>至少我有东西给你。“我喜欢这份报纸。" "

original_en_text: <page>Who are you hoping you’ll find down there, spider? An ailing child and a Silk starved beast? <page>If so, I’m afraid we may sorely disappoint. What waits below is me no longer.
original_zh_text: <page>小蜘蛛，你指望能在下面见到谁？虚弱的傀儡还是饥渴的空壳？<page>要让你失望了，在下面等着的早已不是我。
translated_text: <page>Spiderman, who are you looking for? Sick children and hungry animals.<page>If this is the case, we will be very disappointed.
secondary_translated_text: <page>蜘蛛侠，你在找谁？生病的孩子和饥饿的动物。<page>如果是这样，我们会非常失望。

original_en_text: Hoy, you’re still hanging around then? Quiet in here. Good for hidin’ out.<page>You gots the li’l clicky-clackies on you then, eh? The rolly-roundies? What the shops like to swap for?
original_zh_text: 哟，还在附近晃悠呢？这很安静，适合躲藏。<page>带叮当响了没？就是商店爱换的那种小圆珠？
translated_text: Is it still moving? It's quiet, so you can hide.<page>Is this why forests exist? Actually? Do you want to change your store?
secondary_translated_text: 它还在动吗？这里很安静，所以你可以躲起来。<page>这就是森林存在的原因吗？实际上？您想换商店吗？

translated_text: Cup Plate

original_en_text: You... So, it is done... My wish granted before ever I arrived...<hpage>The bronze pair that danced this chamber, it is clear, tall bug, how closely they mimicked your shell. Was it you who provided their inspiration?<page>Not I, warrior. For this place, my heart holds only loathing...<page>The dancers... they were the last free act of my partner... Always hopeful. Always naive.<page>His whole he gave, in desperate trade to see our own caves left safe. His shell and soul became the mould.<page>So long, I dared not visit... Even as our lands fell to thread and ruin... Instead I wasted, a coward caged, too weak to witness his grace bound in parody so cruel.<hpage>Take some solace, tall bug. His soul is now free from that shell of iron, and the fate that befell your lands, this Citadel too has been claimed full by it.<page>Aye... Slim consolation, warrior, now that everything I loved is lost...
original_zh_text: 你……这样啊……竟然在我抵达前就完成了……<hpage>厅里那对铜像，分明是照着你的模样铸的。是你给的灵感？<page>与我无关。对这地方……我只剩恶心……<page>舞者……是我伴侣最后的自由创作……他总是满怀天真与希望。<page>为保我们故土平安，他献出了全部。躯壳和灵魂都成了铸模。<page>这么久以来，我不敢来看……哪怕故土被丝咒吞噬……懦弱地困在牢里，不敢面对他的优雅被如此践踏……<hpage>宽心吧，至少现在他的灵魂挣脱铁壳了。你们故土遭受的厄运，圣堡也逃不过。<page>是啊……但这不过是无力的安慰……如今我爱的一切都化为乌有……
translated_text: Who are you? Her wish had been fulfilled before she arrived.<hpage>The bronze companions dancing in the room were too clear and too big to imitate how close the sink was. Do you have any inspiration?<page>"Not me, soldier, I hate it here.<page>People who dance. This is the last free performance for our partners. They are always full of hope. I am always naive.<page>He did his best to ensure the safety of the cave, and his body and soul were one.<page>Although our land has become desolate and reduced to ruins, the grid of the cage is too weak to directly see its grace because of this cruel imitation.<hpage>Relax, tall insect, your soul has been freed from its iron shell, your destiny lies on your land, and the castle is occupied by it.<page>Yes, a little comfort, soldier, everything I loved is gone.
