secondary_translated_text: 你是谁？在她到达之前，她的愿望就已经实现了。<hpage>房间里跳舞的青铜同伴太清晰，太大，无法模仿水槽的距离。你有什么灵感吗？<page>“不是我，士兵，我讨厌这里。<page>跳舞的人。这是我们合作伙伴的最后一次免费表演。他们总是充满希望。我总是很天真。<page>他竭尽全力确保洞穴的安全，他的身体和灵魂是一体的。<page>尽管我们的土地变得荒凉，化为废墟，但笼子的网格却因为这种残酷的模仿而太薄弱，无法直接看到它的优雅。<hpage>放松点，高大的昆虫，你的灵魂已经从铁壳中解放出来，你的命运就在你的土地上，城堡也被它占领了。<page>是的，一点安慰，士兵，我所爱的一切都消失了。

original_en_text: <page=M>What’s this? That’s an unexpected heart you’re holding, Old One...<page=M>We can guess to its source, though we’d believed it long gone from these lands. <hpage>The heart of a graceful lord. In its taking I was able to witness his caves and kingdom as once they flourished.<hpage>A stunning sight. Unique. All gone... Lost to the pale monarch... and the system to keep her caged.
original_zh_text: <page=M>咦？这颗心出乎意料啊，古老者……<hpage>一位优雅领主的心。取心时我见到了其洞窟王国昔日繁盛景象。<hpage>真是瑰丽无双。但都消逝了……毁于苍白君主……以及囚困她的体系。
translated_text: <page=M>What is this? She has an unexpected heart.<page=M>Speculation about its origin is possible, but one can think that the earth has existed since ancient times.<hpage>This is God's grace. During the filming, I saw his caves and the prosperity of his kingdom.<hpage>They are all determined to defeat the pale monarch and the system that keeps him in a cage.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>这是什么？她有一颗意想不到的心。<page=M>关于它的起源的猜测是可能的，但人们可以认为地球自古以来就存在了。<hpage>这是上帝的恩典。在拍摄过程中，我看到了他的洞穴和他王国的繁荣。<hpage>他们都决心击败苍白的君主和将他关在笼子里的制度。

original_en_text: A beat of rosaries is our wager. Once you find enough, I’d be happy to play.
original_zh_text: 赌注是一奏念珠。等你攒够了，我很乐意再陪你玩。
translated_text: Our bet is a string of rosary beads, and if we find enough bets, we will happily play.
secondary_translated_text: 我们的赌注是一串念珠，如果我们找到足够的赌注，我们就会很高兴地玩。

original_en_text: Nimble bug, you return refreshed! And so perfectly timed, for I have a new challenge prepared.<page>The course shall remain the same as last, but length, the laps, will greatly extend.<hpage>You propose a test of endurance? I have undertaken many in my time.<page>Excellent! Excellent! Though know, for this race, I can only provide slight reward for victory.<page>What say you, nimble bug? Let us stride fast forth!
original_zh_text: 你看起来状态绝佳！正好我准备了新的挑战！<page>赛道和上次一样，但长度、圈数大幅增加！<hpage>要比耐力？我平时可没少锻炼。<page>那太好了！不过这次如果你赢了，奖励价值或许不高。<page>怎么说？一起冲刺吧！
translated_text: Smart insect, you are healthy again! Now is the best time because we are preparing for new challenges.<page>This race was the same as the previous race, but with an increased amount of time (number of laps) required.<hpage>Do I need to control resistance? I have done a lot in my life.<page>This is unbelievable! This is unbelievable! In this game, you can only get a small bonus.<page>What does speed error mean? "Go, go, go. "
secondary_translated_text: 聪明的昆虫，你又健康了！现在是最好的时机，因为我们正在为新的挑战做准备。<page>这场比赛与上一场比赛相同，但所需时间（圈数）增加了。<hpage>我需要控制抵抗力吗？我一生中做了很多。<page>这太不可思议了！这太不可思议了！在这个游戏中，您只能获得少量奖金。<page>速度误差是什么意思？“走，走，走。"

original_en_text: <hpage>Another time, Shakra. I am always eager to learn, but for now my tasks call me away. <page>Bakelo! Answer to your tasks, then. My rings shall await your return.
original_zh_text: <hpage>改天吧。虽然想锻炼技艺，但要事在身。<page>吧咔咯！那忙你的去吧！我的战环随时恭候。
translated_text: <hpage>"The next one is cherries. I always wanted to learn, but now I don't need to. "<page>All right, you do your job! I hope my ring comes back.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>“下一个是樱桃。我一直想学习，但现在我不需要了。"<page>好吧，你做你的工作！我希望我的戒指能回来。

original_en_text: Gurrroo! Fellow warrior, if you are wishing to lock blades, know you stand before the honoured knight Garmond, and brave companion Zaza. Together we will face bold to any challenge!<hpage>I have no wish to fight you, sir bug. It is heartening to meet another on these roads of sound mind, and with fortitude enough to fight back against the haunted husks.<page>Aye! Too many, these unnatural opponents! We did hope Pharloom’s vast expanse would still possess some place free of that tainted thread. <page>Alas, so far we’ve encountered only violence and decay. We greatly fear the Haunting afflicts this kingdom all.
original_zh_text: 嘎噜！想打架？先报上名来！我乃荣耀骑士加蒙德，这位是忠仆扎扎！<hpage>没兴趣比武。只是难得能遇见敢反抗丝咒傀儡的清醒者。<page>是啊！到处都是被操控的傀儡！还以为纺络如此广袤，说不定能有片净土……<page>唉，结果走到哪都是腐烂和杀戮！这诅咒怕是蔓延全境了！
translated_text: Come on, come on! Come on, come on! Comrade, if you want to draw your sword, you know you are facing the precious knight Gamon and his brave companion Gigi.<hpage>"I don't want to argue with you, Mr. Baker, it's interesting to meet another man on this wise path who has enough patience to offset the ghost shell.<page>Oh, yes! Oh, yes! These unnatural enemies are enough. I still want to have a vast blue landscape part of it, without pollution lines.<page>So far, we have only seen corruption and violence, and we fear that this obsession may affect everyone in the kingdom. "
secondary_translated_text: 来吧来吧来吧来吧同志，如果你想拔出你的剑，你知道你面对的是珍贵的骑士加蒙和他勇敢的同伴吉吉。<hpage>“我不想和你争论，贝克先生，在这条明智的道路上遇到另一个有足够耐心来抵消幽灵壳的人是很有趣的。<page>哦，是的！哦，是的！这些非自然的敌人就足够了。我仍然希望其中有一个广阔的蓝色景观，没有污染线。<page>到目前为止，我们只看到腐败和暴力，我们担心这种痴迷可能会影响王国中的每个人。"

original_en_text: Poshanka! Edges sharp and senses keen!<page>In my land, that is the way warriors greet each other. For though you are a child barely hatched, you are also a warrior. Your stance, your weapon, your movements all proclaim it so.<page>I am a navigator amongst my tribe, and have been making maps of these lands. I can trade them with you, and supplies, if you wish.
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！握紧兵刃，保持警惕！<page>在我们部落，战士们都这么打招呼。虽然你看着像个刚破卵的娃娃，但架势、武器、动作都像个战士。<page>我是部落的测绘师，一直在画这里的地图。想要可以拿物资来换。
translated_text: Bosna Bosna! Clear and clear!<page>The soldiers of our country pay tribute to us. You are a newborn, but you are also a soldier.<page>I am a pilot for a tribe who charted this land if we could exchange goods and goods.
secondary_translated_text: 博斯纳博斯纳！清晰清晰！<page>我们国家的士兵向我们致敬。你是一个新生儿，但你也是一名士兵。<page>我是一个部落的飞行员，如果我们可以交换货物和货物，他们绘制了这片土地的地图。

original_en_text: Rest below while you can. In the lands beyond these bells, it is rare to see such safety.
translated_text: I rest as much as possible, a sense of security that is rare in the country behind these species.
secondary_translated_text: 我尽可能多地休息，这种安全感在这些物种背后的国家是罕见的。

translated_text: Map of Gremoire

original_en_text: <hpage>Child, if your wish is to gain learning of this land’s creatures, why not hunt them yourself?<page>Ma? Nuu, herself to hunt? No, no! Is not Nuu’s nature to hunt, is hers to come later and learn. Such is the way of things!<page>But you... a predator! Know it from your smells can clever Nuu! So Nuu asks you to cut and record, so we both may learn!
original_zh_text: <hpage>小丫头，想了解生物怎么不自己去抓？<page>啊？努努自己去？不行不行！努努的天职是研究，这是规矩！<page>但你……是掠食者！努努闻得出来！所以拜托你砍怪记录，我们一起学习！
translated_text: <hpage>My daughter, if you want to understand the creatures of this land, why not go hunting yourself?<page>Mom, do you want to chase yourself? No, no! No, no! Nature is not for hunting, but for learning.<page>You are a predator! It can be said that they are smart odors. Modify and save to understand it.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我的女儿，如果你想了解这片土地上的生物，为什么不自己去打猎呢？<page>妈妈，你想追自己吗？不，不！不，不！大自然不是为了狩猎，而是为了学习。<page>你是掠食者！可以说它们是聪明的气味。修改并保存以了解它。

original_en_text: <hpage>Little pilgrim, these baths provide some respite from the dangers without, but there is a still safer place high on the other side of the Citadel.<hpage>A settlement has formed around the old shrine there. The bell housed within seems to provide some sanctuary from the dangers of the Haunting.<hpage>Your brother and sister pilgrims who now huddle around it would be glad of your company, I am sure.<page>Oh, how wonderful! Yes, I will make my way over there with haste... after I have bathed a little longer. I want to arrive fresh and clean to such a holy place!
original_zh_text: <hpage>小家伙，温泉虽然舒服，但圣堡另一边更安全。<hpage>老钟殿旁边有个新聚落，那里的钟声能抵御丝咒。<page>逃到那边的同伴肯定欢迎你。<page>太好了！等我泡舒服了就过去……拜见圣地前得收拾体面！
translated_text: <hpage>As a young pilgrim, the bathtub provides an opportunity to reduce external dangers, but there is a safer place on the other side of the castle.<hpage>Colonies formed around ancient sanctuaries, and internal clocks seemed to avoid the danger of invasion.<hpage>The pilgrimage brothers and sisters gathered here will be happy to be with you.<page>Oh, that's great! Yes, I will. When I have a soul, I want to go to such a sacred place.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>作为一名年轻的朝圣者，浴缸提供了减少外部危险的机会，但城堡的另一边有一个更安全的地方。<hpage>古代庇护所周围形成了殖民地，内部时钟似乎可以避免入侵的危险。<hpage>聚集在这里的朝圣兄弟姐妹将很高兴与您在一起。<page>哦，那太好了！我会的当我有灵魂的时候，我想去这样一个神圣的地方。

original_en_text: You hold many charts, Child Wielding Needle. You should consider trading for a quill.<page>With a quill in claw, your maps can be further extended from your own travels. Record enough and you may, in time, come to know this kingdom all.
original_zh_text: 你身上的图纸不少，使针的小姑娘，该买支笔了。<page>带着笔就能边走边画。画够多了，迟早能摸清纺络的全貌。
translated_text: There are many charts that make children think about how to play with needles and use pencils.<page>By mounting the handle on your feet, you can extend the map beyond your journey. If you have enough resources, you can understand the kingdom.
secondary_translated_text: 有许多图表让孩子们思考如何玩针和使用铅笔。<page>通过将手柄安装在脚上，您可以将地图扩展到您的旅程之外。如果你有足够的资源，你可以了解王国。

original_en_text: Poshanka! Child Wielding Needle. You too have discovered this haven of bells.<page>For a long time, I avoided this place for sense of something strange. Now arrived, I find it free, and its few remaining residents offering trade and welcome.<hpage>I slew a tall creature above the town, a Weaver I suspect, though one twisted in purpose.<hpage>It was her you may have sensed. A formidable force, even aged. By voice and claw she aided, perhaps guided, the haunted thread that grasps these lands. <page>Weaver? Those vicious things. To our young we tell the tales, but had thought them long dead, only corpses bound in spires. <hpage>This one still lived, though if it was a Weaver, it was broken in a savage way.<hpage>Its own Silk was bound, pinned deep within its shell. A cruel punishment I’ve not before witnessed. <page>Even broken, my envy remains. A Weaver’s fabled skills... To meet one in combat means great challenge, and great pride in victory.
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！使针的小姑娘。你也找到这镇子了？<page>之前总能察觉到这儿的古怪，就一直避开。现在诅咒没了，剩下的住民还挺热情。<hpage>我斩了镇子上头的高个怪物，像是个变异的织者。<page>你此前察觉到的应该就是它。是它用声音和利爪操控缠绕镇子的丝线，很难对付。<page>织者？那群老毒物！还以为早死绝了，只剩塔里的干尸。<hpage>这只还活着，但被折磨得不成样。<hpage>灵丝被钉在壳里，残忍的刑罚。<page>就算残了我也羡慕。织者的本事……能交手是幸运，能得胜更是荣耀。
translated_text: Boshanka! Boshanka! Children wield needles, and even this animal has a safe haven.<page>Now, when I arrived, I realized that the place was free and that the few remaining residents also provided commerce and hospitality.<hpage>I killed a huge creature over the city. It was deliberately distorted, but I suspect it was tears.<hpage>You can feel it, but you can't hear it. Elderly people also show great strength. Her voice and legs help them and may lead them to gather clues about the ghosts in the land.<page>Where is the theater? A long time ago, I told this story to a young dead man, but he thought there was only one body in the arrow.<hpage>He is still alive, but if it were tears, he would have been seriously injured.<hpage>Her silk was tied deeply to her shell, a cruel punishment she had never seen.<page>When jealousy is broken, jealousy remains there. Research and development legendary technological battles mean being proud of winning.
secondary_translated_text: 博尚卡！博尚卡！孩子们挥舞着针头，甚至这种动物也有一个避风港。<page>现在，当我到达时，我意识到这个地方是免费的，剩下的少数居民也提供商业和接待服务。<hpage>我在城市上空杀死了一个巨大的生物。它是故意扭曲的，但我怀疑那是眼泪。<hpage>你能感觉到，但你听不到。老年人也表现出了巨大的力量。她的声音和双腿帮助他们，并可能引导他们收集有关土地上鬼魂的线索。<page>剧院在哪里？很久以前，我向一个死去的年轻人讲述了这个故事，但他认为箭中只有一具尸体。<hpage>他还活着，但如果是眼泪，他会受重伤。<hpage>她的丝绸深深地绑在壳上，这是她从未见过的残酷惩罚。<page>当嫉妒被打破时，嫉妒就会继续存在。研发传奇的技术之战意味着为获胜而自豪。

original_en_text: This outpost that the shambling pilgrim-bugs have built for themselves... Dondakku!<page>Where are the armaments? The watch-poles? Never have I seen such a poorly defended encampment!<hpage>The pilgrims here seem to have no mind for war, Shakra. I suspect most depart for the Citadel soon after their arrival.<page>Hmph. If they persist in their carelessness, they will find only death in these harsh lands.
original_zh_text: 朝圣虫建的这破营地……东达库！<page>防御工事呢？瞭望塔呢？没见过这么不设防的营地！<hpage>朝圣者们不懂争斗，估计刚到就奔着圣堡去了。<page>哼！继续这么马虎，迟早死在纺络的险地里。
translated_text: This unstable base was built by pilgrims.<page>Where's your gun? How is Paul? I have never seen anything so weak!<hpage>The pilgrims here seem to have no concept of war, and most arrive as soon as they arrive at the castle.<page>If they are not careful, they will die in this desolate land.
secondary_translated_text: 这个不稳定的基地是由朝圣者建造的。<page>你的枪在哪里？保罗怎么样了？我从来没有见过这么弱的东西！<hpage>这里的朝圣者似乎没有战争的概念，大多数一到达城堡就到达。<page>如果他们不小心，就会死在这片荒凉的土地上。

original_en_text: What’s this? The little spider climbs so high, here to stand aquiver at our startling Citadel.<hpage>Pale child, you return only to mock? Neither you nor your land have proven my match. This sleeping Citadel shall be no different.<page>Spider, dear. Why must you remain so distressingly... optimistic? The power that waits above, you cannot conceive, her who would snuff that hope with barely a glance.<hpage>Fool child. You still think me blind to the form of your liege? Having come this far?<hpage>This land’s grandeur, the devotion of its bugs, and the curse that befalls them. The signs are clear.<hpage>Your kingdom is in the thrall of a creature beyond bug, one of that higher caste.<hpage>Whatever its desire for my Silk and my shell, it shall find I’m quite attached to both.
original_zh_text: 瞧瞧？小蜘蛛抖抖索索爬到圣堡脚下了。<hpage>苍白之子，你只是来废话的么？纺络没有虫能阻挡我，圣堡也不例外。<page>亲爱的，你怎么还傻乐呢？上面那位吹口气就能灭了你那点希望。<hpage>傻孩子，真以为我现在还看不出你主子的真身吗？<hpage>这地方的辉煌、虫民的虔诚、还有他们的诅咒……线索太明显了。<hpage>这个王国被超脱虫类的存在掌控，属于更高阶的存在。<hpage>但无论它多想要我的灵丝和躯壳，我都不会给。
translated_text: What is this? The little spider sat in a beautiful castle and climbed high.<hpage>He's a blue boy, isn't he? Have you reduced it again? That doesn't mean that you and your country regard me as an enemy.<page>"Honey, honey, why are you so optimistic? "I don't think I have that power; it kills hope quickly.<hpage>Foolish boy, do you think I will never see your king? Yeah, right?<hpage>The beauty of the earth, the loyalty of the insects, and the curse that surrounds them.<hpage>His kingdom is unified by one transcendent being, the worm, one of the highest castes.<hpage>No matter how much you crave silk and shells, you will find that you have a strong attachment to both.
secondary_translated_text: 这是什么？小蜘蛛坐在一座美丽的城堡里，爬得很高。<hpage>他是一个蓝色的男孩，不是吗？你又减少了吗？这并不意味着你和你的国家将我视为敌人。<page>“亲爱的，亲爱的，你为什么这么乐观？“我不认为我有那种力量;它很快就扼杀了希望。<hpage>傻孩子，你以为我永远见不到你的国王吗？是的，对吧？<hpage>地球的美丽，昆虫的忠诚，以及围绕着它们的诅咒。<hpage>他的王国由一个超凡的存在统一，那就是蠕虫，最高种姓之一。<hpage>无论你多么渴望丝绸和贝壳，你都会发现你对两者都有着强烈的依恋。

original_en_text: Aren’t those solemn judge-bugs nice? They do not speak or sing, but I sense great wisdom behind their gleaming gazes!<hpage>Beware them, little one. Wise or not, their judgements are often followed by violence. Many of your fellow pilgrims have fallen to them on these great steps.<page>Oh...? But even the fallen will sometimes stand again, and all pilgrimages will be completed, yes? That’s how I’ve heard it!
original_zh_text: 看那些肃穆的判官虫多亲切！虽然他们不言语也不歌唱，但眼中却闪着智慧！<hpage>要小心，小家伙。他们的判决常伴暴力，不知多少朝圣者倒在这些石阶上。<page>可是……倒下者终会再起，朝圣终将完成，不是吗？
translated_text: Are the judge's mistakes wrong? They cannot speak or sing, but they can feel the great wisdom hidden behind their bright eyes.<hpage>Knowledge or not, their trials were accompanied by violence, and many pilgrims were arrested among this group.<page>Yeah, right? But sometimes, even the fallen will stand up and the pilgrimage will end. Yeah, right? Actually? I've heard of it.
secondary_translated_text: 法官的错误错了吗？他们不会说话，也不会唱歌，但他们能感受到明亮的眼睛背后隐藏的巨大智慧。<hpage>无论知情与否，他们的审判都伴随着暴力，这群人中许多朝圣者被捕。<page>是的，对吧？但有时，即使是堕落的人也会站起来，朝圣之旅也会结束。是的，对吧？实际上？我听说过。

original_en_text: These twisting tunnels hide many worthy opponents, but many traps as well. Watch your footing closely.
original_zh_text: 这些弯道里藏着不少好对手，但陷阱也多。走路看着点。
translated_text: This winding tunnel not only hides many precious enemies, but also hides many traps.
secondary_translated_text: 这条蜿蜒的隧道不仅隐藏着许多珍贵的敌人，还隐藏着许多陷阱。

original_en_text: As you requested, these pins will mark the travel stations within that hideous structure of steel and steam.
original_zh_text: 按你要求的，这些图钉能标记那些铁皮蒸汽管的站点。
translated_text: As required, the pins are specified with strong steel construction and brackets on steam.
secondary_translated_text: 根据需要，销指定采用坚固的钢结构和蒸汽支架。

original_en_text: <hpage>Head fast for Bellhart, Pill. These lands are not for travelling without a sharp blade in claw.<page>Aye! Yes! To Bellhart, and my brother, I shall fly quickly-quick. If you pass that way again, stop and give greeting!
original_zh_text: <hpage>回钟心镇吧，这地方没武器别乱跑。<page>这就回！我飞得可、可快了！你要是经过钟心镇记得和我打招呼！
translated_text: <hpage>Belhard and Pills These lands are not suitable for traveling without nails.<page>Oh, yes! Oh, yes! Oh, yes! Oh, yes! I fly fast, Burhart and his brothers.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>贝尔哈德和皮尔这些土地不适合没有钉子的旅行。<page>哦，是的！哦，是的！哦，是的！哦，是的！伯哈特和他的兄弟们，我飞得很快。

original_en_text: <hpage>Who are you calling for, Shakra? Your voice echoes through the caverns.<page>I came deeper into Pharloom in search of my mentor, the greatest of my tribe. I could not keep pace though, and her trail grew cold.<page>She will have travelled much farther by now, but if I keep moving and stay vigilant I will reunite with her.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，你在喊谁？整个山洞都是你回声。<page>我来纺络深处寻找导师，我们部落的最强者。可惜跟丢了。<page>她肯定走得更远了，但只要保持警惕总能重逢。
translated_text: <hpage>This means... ... Who called? Her voice echoed in the cave.<page>I went to the lighthouse to find the best master in my tribe, my master, but he could no longer walk, his feet were cold.<page>She's past that now, but if I wake up, I'll see her again.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>这意味着... ...谁打来的？她的声音在山洞里回响。<page>我去灯塔寻找部落中最好的主人，我的主人，但他不能再走路了，他的脚很冷。<page>她现在已经过去了，但如果我醒来，我会再次见到她。

original_en_text: We must never let our shells soften, or Pharloom’s sharp teeth will sink in quick.<page>Would you duel with me, Hornet Wielding Needle? Together we shall sharpen one another’s skill.
original_zh_text: 战士不能养尊处优，纺络到处藏着危险。<page>来切磋吧？我们互相磨练技艺。
translated_text: Don't let your skin soften. If you don't do this, the eagle's sharp teeth will soon appear.<page>Marcel Niddle,"Do You Want Me?》 （ You Want Me？We will work together to improve our skills.
secondary_translated_text: 不要让你的皮肤变软。如果你不这样做，鹰的锋利牙齿很快就会出现。<page>Marcel Niddle《Do You Want Me》你想要我吗？我们将共同努力提高我们的技能。

original_en_text: I’ll wish you success in your grand task, miss, but forgive me my sadness for knowing the cruel cost...
original_zh_text: 我希望你能成功，女士。但一想到代价这么沉重，还是很难过。
translated_text: I hope you are satisfied with your excellent work. "I know the price. "
secondary_translated_text: 我希望你对你出色的工作感到满意。“我知道价格。"

original_en_text: Hurry it up, let us out quickly then! We got places to go, bugs to see, trinkets to pilfer!
original_zh_text: 快点放人！我们还要去捞宝贝呢！
translated_text: Let's go, let's go! There are places to visit, insects can see, flying scenes!
secondary_translated_text: 走吧，走吧！有地方可以参观，昆虫可以看到，飞翔的场景！

original_en_text: Warrior... I heard your approach. Why do you come? Surely you’ve no desire to see these long collapsed caves?<hpage>The way was open, sir. I merely followed the path through. Am I correct to guess you were once a resident of these borderlands?<page>Aye... and glorious they were, in their time. Pharloom’s end approaches, but my caves, these caves, fell to fate long before. <page>Of that fair land, I am the last... Now to remain till the end, and remember the splendour that was...
original_zh_text: 战士……我听见你的脚步了。来这废墟做什么？<hpage>道路通畅，我只是顺路而来。你曾是边境之民？<page>曾是……昔日辉煌……不复存在。如今纺络快完了，但我的家园……早就覆灭了。<page>我是故土最后的遗民……要守到末日，铭记曾经的荣光……
translated_text: I heard him approaching. How are you? You don't want to see that long hole, do you? Actually?<hpage>The road is open. I just started this road. Are you a resident of the border area?<page>Autumn is coming to an end, and my caves, these caves, have fallen into the hands of destiny.<page>In this beautiful world, I am the last one. You must work hard until the end and forget the glory.
secondary_translated_text: 我听到他走近了。你好吗？你不想看到那个长洞，是吗？实际上？<hpage>道路是开放的。我刚刚开始这条路。您是边境地区居民吗？<page>秋天即将结束，我的洞穴，这些洞穴，已经落入命运之手。<page>在这个美丽的世界里，我是最后一个。你必须努力到底，忘记荣耀。

original_en_text: Miss grown-up, you have hunted long with little rest, thinks Nuu.<page>Perhaps you are covered in too many juices, weighed down by beastly filth? Let sweet Nuu clean you, make you fresh!
original_zh_text: 大姐姐，你一直狩猎，好久没休息了吧？<page>是不是浑身都沾满了黏液和血液？让努努帮你清洁吧！
translated_text: His Majesty has been hunting for a long time, but he has very little time to rest.<page>Are you an animal wrapped in too much juice or mucus? Sweet Noo will make you feel fresh and fresh!
secondary_translated_text: 陛下狩猎已久，休息的时间却很少。<page>你是一只被过多果汁或粘液包裹的动物吗？Sweet Noo会让您感觉清新爽口！

original_zh_text: 有意思！我开始喜欢你了！
translated_text: This is delicious! I know I'm in love with him!
secondary_translated_text: 这太好吃了！我知道我爱上他了！

original_en_text: <page=M>We could do it. The spell can be cast, with enough power, enormous power, equal maybe to that monarch...<hpage>I cannot grant you mine, if it even were enough. My strength is still needed to face her below. Where else do you propose we seek a source?<page=M>From Pharloom! Ho ho ho! Remember, ours is a kingdom of wishes granted.<page=B>Pharloom was not born of that monarch, Old One. Power existed in these lands even before she bound them beneath her.<page=B>Grnk. Seek the old hearts of our kingdom and the last successors to bear their strength.<page=M>They’re still out there, hidden away, much faded by the pale one’s long dominion. You must make them stir.<page=M>We will teach you how, in the way befitting a Weaver, a sombre song to reach down into their memories and enliven them a final time.
original_zh_text: <page=M>我们或许能够施咒，但要有足够力量，堪比那君主的力量。<hpage>我给不了这份力，即便有也要留着对付她。还能从哪里获取？<page=M>纺络！嚯嚯！别忘了，我们的王国最擅长实现愿望。<page=B>纺络并非君主创造，古老者。在她到来之前，这片土地就存在着力量。<page=B>您该去寻找古老的纺络之心，与其最后的传承者。<page=M>虽然几乎被苍白统治消磨殆尽，他们仍在某处苟存。必须唤醒他们。<page=M>我们会教你织者的方法。用挽歌深入他们的记忆，激醒他们的力量。
translated_text: <page=M>It's a mantra that we can do, functional and powerful. Is it equivalent to a monarch?<hpage>Even so, I won't give you what's mine. You need strong power to deal with this problem. Do you think I'll find it somewhere else?<page=M>"Farum" -Oh, Oh! A kingdom is a kingdom that can be realized.<page=B>It was not the king's fault. This power existed before these lands were controlled.<page=B>Border! "He will seek the last elder and heir of our kingdom and seize power.<page=M>They are still there and hidden under the pale long reign.<page=M>We will teach you how to activate yourself at the end of melancholy songs that suit your organization.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>这是我们可以做的口头禅，实用且强大。相当于君主吗？<hpage>即便如此，我也不会把我的东西给你。你需要强大的力量来处理这个问题。你认为我会在其他地方找到它吗？<page=M>“Farum”-哦，哦！王国是可以实现的王国。<page=B>这不是国王的错。这种力量在这些土地被控制之前就已经存在了。<page=B>边境！“他将寻找我们王国的最后一位长者和继承人并夺取权力。<page=M>他们仍然在那里，隐藏在苍白的漫长统治之下。<page=M>我们将教您如何在适合您组织的忧郁歌曲结束时激活自己。

original_en_text: Owoww, what a rotten turn! Keep your nasty junk to yourself, then!
original_zh_text: 哎哟！真倒霉！你就自个儿留着这些破烂货吧！
translated_text: Wow, what a big change! Leave me the garbage.
secondary_translated_text: 哇，多么大的变化啊！把垃圾留给我。

original_en_text: O-hoho! Share some of your little clicky-clackies with us, help us fill our pockets. If you do, we’ll share a sneaky secret with you!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！分点叮当响给我们，就告诉你个秘密！
translated_text: Oh, Oh, Oh! Share your songs to fill your pockets. If so, we will share your secrets.
secondary_translated_text: 哦，哦，哦！分享您的歌曲以填满您的口袋。如果是这样，我们将分享您的秘密。

original_en_text: Miss grown-up, for your continued huntings you should climb up, up above here, above the tallest spinning towers!<page>Hidden in the dark thickets are strange bugs who call up dancing flames. So pretty! So warm!<page>But when Nuu tried to crawl near, the flames became angry and swooped all around! Poor Nuu was half roasted!<page>Nuu leaves it to you, miss grown-up, to climb up there and cut those flames apart. For our journal, such must be done.
original_zh_text: 大姐姐，要继续狩猎的话，你得往上爬，越过最高的纺塔！<page> 暗蕨丛里藏着会召唤舞焰的怪虫。好漂亮！好暖和！<page> 可努努刚靠近，火焰就发怒冲了上来！差点把努努烤焦啦！<page> 这事就交给你啦，大姐姐，上去把那些火焰斩碎吧。为了填满记录册，必须这么做！
translated_text: Sir, in order to continue hunting, we must climb to the top of the highest revolving tower.<page>A strange insect hides in the dark jungle. He calls it a flame.<page>However, when his sister tried to get closer, the flames became so fierce that they bounced everywhere. Nono<page>You have accepted your responsibility. Stand up and turn off the lights. This is essential for magazines.
secondary_translated_text: 先生，为了继续狩猎，我们必须爬到最高的旋转塔的顶部。<page>黑暗的丛林里隐藏着一只奇怪的昆虫。他称之为火焰。<page>然而，当他的妹妹试图靠近时，火焰变得如此猛烈，到处都是。诺诺<page>您已经接受了您的责任。站起来关灯。这对杂志来说至关重要。

original_en_text: Poshanka! Child Wielding Needle, have you seen trace of my master nearby? I feel she was here only recently!<hpage>I cannot say for certain, Shakra, though if she travels seeking skilled opponents, these steps would serve her well. The warriors watching over them are formidable.<page>True! Impressive guardians they are, fighting defensively and loath to leave their stations. They swing their weapons with a cold brutality that should not be underestimated.
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！见过我导师的踪迹吗？感觉她刚来过！<hpage>我不确定。但她若是想找高手过招，这台阶的守卫正合适。<page>没错！这些守卫死守岗位，出手狠辣，不能小瞧。
translated_text: Boshanka! Boshanka! I'm the boy Finn. Have you seen the master's fingerprints? Looks like we just arrived.<hpage>Chakra, I don't know, but if you are looking for an experienced opponent, this step is for you.<page>Producer!! They are impressive goalkeepers who struggle defensively and don't want to leave their position. The cruelty and cruelty of their weapons cannot be underestimated.
secondary_translated_text: 博尚卡！博尚卡！我是芬恩男孩。你看到大师的指纹了吗？看起来我们刚刚到。<hpage>脉轮，我不知道，但如果您正在寻找经验丰富的对手，这一步适合您。<page>制片人！！他们是令人印象深刻的门将，防守很困难，不想离开自己的位置。他们武器的残酷性和残酷性不容低估。

original_en_text: Poshanka, Hornet Wielding Needle. For that is your name, is it not? I have heard it spoken in this land with reverence.<page>I had hoped you would accept my summons. In these moments one is good, but two is best.<hpage>I would not deny the wish, Shakra. A sombre ceremony seemed likely at this trail’s end, and I am sadly proved correct. This then is your master?<page>The fiercest of my tribe, here she lies. I called her master, true, but she was mother just as much, more by far than the bug who bore me.<hpage>Among the many marvels of this kingdom, she found a fine place to meet her end.<page>Ended by age... My tribe would call that shame, but I see only strength unbeaten.<page>Even as her shell betrayed her, she walked this kingdom’s breadth. It was her trail followed that allowed me to share witness to its dignity.<page>Hornet Wielding Needle, you too have journeyed these many paths, as my master before us. Join me now for her song-sending.<page>It is time for her soul to walk beyond her shell...
original_zh_text: 你来啦，使针的小姑娘！你叫大黄蜂，对吧？最近可名气不小呢。<page>希望你别推辞我的请求，现在的情况，需要你搭把手，我自己一个不够。<hpage>我不会推辞的，沙克拉。看这情景，要是我没猜错……这是你的导师吧？<page>这里躺着的是我们部落的最强者。我叫她导师，但她其实更像我母亲。<hpage>她挑了个好地方长眠呢……<page>她是老死的……部落会觉得这很丢脸吧，但我只看到不败的强者。<page>拖着老旧的甲壳丈量大地，是跟着她的足迹我才能见证许多。<page>使针的小姑娘，你也走过这些路。陪我给她唱首送魂曲吧。<page>该送她的灵魂离壳了……
translated_text: You got a needle in your spine, right? I heard this in this country, and I say respectfully.<page>I hope you can understand my quote better: one good, two.<hpage>At the end of the road, there was a dark conscience, but unfortunately I found out he was right.<page>I call her teacher, and she is also a mother.<hpage>Among the many miracles of this kingdom, he found a place to end his life.<page>My tribe calls it a disgrace, but I only see invincible power. "<page>Although his body betrayed her, he returned to his kingdom. "<page>The wasp fell, and many of you came, as if you were the teacher in front of us.<page>It's time for the soul to leave the body.
secondary_translated_text: 你的脊柱里插了一根针，对吧？我在这个国家听到了这句话，我恭敬地说。<page>我希望你能更好地理解我的话：一个好，两个。<hpage>路的尽头，有一种黑暗的良心，但不幸的是我发现他是对的。<page>我叫她老师，她也是一位母亲。<hpage>在这个王国的众多奇迹中，他找到了一个结束生命的地方。<page>我的部落称之为耻辱，但我只看到不可战胜的力量。"<page>尽管他的身体背叛了她，但他还是回到了他的王国。"<page>黄蜂倒下了，你们很多人都来了，就好像你们是我们面前的老师一样。<page>是灵魂离开身体的时候了。

original_en_text: From this safe vantage, I can keep watch for threats while I work. These lowlands are brittle and dangerous. Keep your weapon close.
original_zh_text: 这位置安全，能边干活边警戒。低处危险易碎，注意武器别离手。
translated_text: In terms of security, threats to the workplace can be identified. Lower areas are fragile and dangerous. Turn the gun off.
secondary_translated_text: 在安全方面，可以识别对工作场所的威胁。较低地区脆弱且危险。关掉枪。

original_en_text: Have you tried your claw at the games? Rollicking good fun, don’t you think?<page>I wonder if I could score a little higher if I tried again...
original_zh_text: 你玩过游戏没？超有意思！<page>不知道我再试几次能不能刷新记录……
translated_text: Do you wear nails when playing? Don't you think this is interesting?<page>If you try again, your score will be higher.
secondary_translated_text: 你玩的时候戴指甲吗？你不觉得这很有趣吗？<page>如果您再试一次，您的分数会更高。

original_en_text: After all... it’s you that she wants... is it not?
original_zh_text: 毕竟……她要的是你……不是吗？
translated_text: Finally, she wants you, right?

original_en_text: Hoi! Magnificent! May our mighty contest of shells commence.<page>But a final note, nimble bug! If ever you run off course or desire a quick convene, simply play what music you’re able and my companion shall whisk you back to our starting line.<page>Now! The track calls us. Allow me a moment to assemble a course worthy to test our skill.<page>
original_zh_text: 哟嚯！太棒了！史诗对决即将开始！<page>最后提醒一下，要是跑岔道了或想集合，就随便来点音乐，我的跟班会带你回起点。<page>好了，等我布置条配得上咱们实力的赛道就开始！
translated_text: This is a great trick! The rabbit race has begun.<page>If you want to get off the ground and calm down quickly, play some music you can play. My friends will get me back to the starting line.<page>Come on, now! Over time, we will organize useful courses to test our skills.<page>
secondary_translated_text: 这是一个很棒的技巧！兔子比赛已经开始了。<page>如果你想迅速离开地面并平静下来，就播放一些你可以播放的音乐。我的朋友会带我回到起跑线。<page>快点，现在！随着时间的推移，我们将组织有用的课程来测试我们的技能。<page>

original_en_text: <hpage>Hold your gratitude, little one. The dead are stirring.
translated_text: <hpage>A little boy who died of a fever played with gratitude.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>一个发烧去世的小男孩满怀感激地玩耍。

original_en_text: <hpage>It is time, shamans. I have the hearts, enough as requested. Enough to build your spell, yes?<page=B>Aye. We’re ready. Still, it’s a sad set you’re holding there, strength such as few shall ever know... and all about to burn for Pharloom’s saving.<page=S>I’ll warn ya, Old One, this first part might not be pleasant, but we’ll get you in there, deep as needed.<page=M>Now you’ve only to ready yourself for what comes after. Lay up on the dais and we’ll begin.
original_zh_text: <hpage>时候到了，萨满们。三颗心已集齐，够施咒了吧？<page=B>足够了。唉，这几颗残心曾经承载何等伟力……如今却要为了救世燃尽。<page=S>我得提醒你，古老者。这法咒一开始可能不太舒服，但一定能把您送进记忆深处。<page=M>接下来就看你造化了。做好准备，躺在祭坛上，就可以开始了。
translated_text: <hpage>"Samon, now is the time. I'll do that, that's enough. One spell is enough, isn't it? Actually?<page=B>Yes, we are ready, but what you see is a sad performance. An almost unknown force. Everything was burned to atone for atonement.<page=S>The first part may make you uncomfortable, but you can participate if you want.<page=M>We must be prepared for what is about to happen."
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>“萨蒙，现在是时候了。我会这么做的，够了。一个咒语就足够了，不是吗？实际上？<page=B>是的，我们已经准备好了，但你看到的是一场悲伤的表演。一股几乎未知的力量。一切都被烧毁是为了赎罪。<page=S>第一部分可能会让你不舒服，但如果你愿意的话你可以参与。<page=M>我们必须为即将发生的事情做好准备。"

original_en_text: Charting the heights of this great mount would prove a mighty challenge. For now, I have seen only its base.<page>Once I have completed the search for my master, I would like to return and attempt the climb in full.
original_zh_text: 测绘这大山是个不小的挑战。现在我只探了山脚。<page>等找到导师，一定要回来爬个痛快。
translated_text: The height of the mountain is difficult, so now we can only see its foundation.<page>After finding the owner, I wanted to go on a real hiking trip.
secondary_translated_text: 山的高度很困难，所以现在只能看到它的地基。<page>找到主人后，我想去一次真正的徒步旅行。

original_en_text: Worm-ridden caverns, shaking and unstable. There remain faint signs that pilgrims once travelled these tight paths.
original_zh_text: 被蠕虫所蛀的摇晃洞穴。隐约能看出朝圣者曾走过这窄路。
translated_text: The insect-infected cave is large, with small walks of pilgrims along the narrow street.
secondary_translated_text: 这个被昆虫感染的洞穴很大，狭窄的街道上有朝圣者的小路。

original_en_text: Hooof... let us stop the duel there.<page>I... hoof... I hope in my excitement I did not... hoof... bring down my lance too heavy upon you, sister.<hpage>It was combat honourably conducted, sirs. But now, we should all of us keep moving. It will not remain quiet here for long.<page>Y-yes, of course. Our good works are never done, and we must press ever on. There is no time to waste!
original_zh_text: 呼……点到为止。<page>我……呼……希望我没……呼……下手太重。<hpage>二位打得很好，但此地不宜久留，我们该上路了。<page>对、对，正事要紧，不能浪费时间，该走了！
translated_text: I got a call asking us to end this battle.<page>I mean, sir. Emotion (Emotion)<hpage>Gentlemen, this has been a glorious battle, but now we must look to the future. This place has not been quiet for a long time.<page>Of course, our good deeds will never stop, so please continue. We have no time to waste!
secondary_translated_text: 我接到电话，要求我们结束这场战斗。<page>我的意思是，先生。情感（情感）<hpage>先生们，这是一场光荣的战斗，但现在我们必须展望未来。这个地方已经很久不安静了。<page>当然，我们的善行永远不会停止，所以请继续。我们没有时间可以浪费！

original_en_text: Don’t let defeat weigh on you, nimble bug! Simply step to the challenge. Let us soar swift together again!
original_zh_text: 别灰心，输一次不算什么！振作起来再战！
translated_text: Flexibility to mistakes to avoid conflicts of failure is a challenge. He wants to be together again!“
secondary_translated_text: 灵活对待错误以避免失败冲突是一项挑战。他想再次在一起！“

original_en_text: <hpage>What cause saw you first ascend to this Citadel, Garmond?<page>Mine is only the most sacred quest, sister! One shared with my most trusted companion, dear Zaza.<page>We sought this Citadel, to stand before its rulers, and demand their answer! By force if necessary! All for our dear village to whom we pledge our shells. <page>The fearsome haunting of thread, it overcame our fair folk.... We are all that remain, left to carry their memory, and the hope to see some justice paid.
original_zh_text: <hpage>加蒙德，你们最初来圣堡要做什么？<page>我和扎扎肩负着神圣使命！<page>我们要为了村子，向圣堡的君主讨个公道！<page>该死的丝咒毁了村子，就剩下我们俩……带着大伙的记忆。无论如何我们都要找到答案！
translated_text: <hpage>Why do you want to visit the castle?<page>"Sister, my pursuits are the most sacred, and I share one of them with my most loyal companion, my beloved son.<page>Let us investigate the castle, meet its rulers, and find answers. If necessary, we will use your power. Dear city! We will provide silk.<page>The terrible issues of the thread conquered by our beautiful people-we want to leave the people, their memories, and somehow see justice done.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>你为什么想参观城堡？<page>“姐姐，我的追求是最神圣的，我与我最忠诚的伴侣、我心爱的儿子分享其中之一。<page>让我们调查这座城堡，会见它的统治者，并找到答案。如有必要，我们将使用您的力量。亲爱的城市！我们将提供丝绸。<page>我们美丽的人民克服了线程中的可怕问题--我们想离开人民、他们的记忆，并以某种方式看到正义得到伸张。

original_en_text: Ahh, a fellow pilgrim. I’ve been praying alone here too long, with only the wind’s voice to join mine.<page>We’re so close. Our pilgrimage is almost over. Just one final, brutal climb, hm?<hpage>The Citadel is near, pilgrim. You must have had some strength in you. Few of your fellows seem to reach these heights.<page>Aye, the roads become lonelier the longer they’re travelled and the higher we climb.<page>It takes a lot of luck and a lot of faith to make it this far, though I’m sure I don’t need to tell you that.
original_zh_text: 啊，又一个朝圣者。我在这独自祈祷太久了，只有风声作伴。<page>快到终点了。朝圣之旅即将结束，只剩最后这段险途了对吧？<hpage>圣堡就在眼前。你本事不错，能走到这的朝圣者没几个。<page>是啊，这路越走越长，越往上爬同伴越少。<page>走到这需要运气和信念，不过你肯定懂。
translated_text: "My pilgrims, I prayed alone here for a long time, only the sound of the wind made my voice louder.<page>The pilgrimage is coming to an end, but is this the last step? Actually?<hpage>Few people can reach this level.<page>Yes, the longer you go, the higher you climb, the more lonely the road will be.<page>It takes a lot of luck and confidence to get here, but I don't think you should say that.
secondary_translated_text: “我的朝圣者们，我在这里独自祈祷了很长一段时间，只有风的声音让我的声音更响了。<page>朝圣之旅即将结束，但这是最后一步吗？实际上？<hpage>很少有人能达到这个水平。<page>是的，走得越长，爬得越高，路就会越孤独。<page>到达这里需要很大的运气和信心，但我认为你不应该这么说。

original_en_text: Huu... You have done it... Huu. Huu... Hoof.<page>Never would I have believed, a shell so fast in all of Pharloom! Wonder of wonders!<page>You have proven it, nimble bug, fulfilled my wish, seen my pace matched and beaten, my limits broken wide.
original_zh_text: 呼……你赢了……呼……呼……<page>难以置信！纺络还存在这般疾速！简直是奇迹！<page>你做到了！实现了我的夙愿，突破了我的极限！
translated_text: The call came, you did it, you called Calling. Feels 。<page>It was impossible for Fulham's ball to run so fast. A miracle.<page>You have tried, cunning insect, you have seen my wish come true, my steps have been united again, my boundaries have been broken.
secondary_translated_text: 电话来了，你做到了，你打了电话。感觉。<page>富勒姆的球不可能跑得这么快。奇迹<page>你已经尝试过了，狡猾的昆虫，你已经看到我的愿望成真，我的脚步再次团结起来，我的界限被打破。

original_en_text: Gurro! I have a notion for you, sister. What say we cross our weapons here before we move on? Engage in some rollicking combat together? Have no fear, I will not strike a mortal blow!
original_zh_text: 嘎噜！我有个提议，走之前要不要切磋切磋，来场友谊赛热热身？别担心，保证不打死你！
translated_text: Come on, come on! Come on, come on! "I have an idea, let's go together. "Should we fight together? "Don't worry, I won't hit you.
secondary_translated_text: 来吧来吧来吧来吧“我有一个想法，我们一起去吧。“我们应该一起战斗吗？“别担心，我不会打你的。

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir knight, I am sorry... This was the only means to free you from the cursed threads.<page>Hohhhh... fret not.... little one...<page>Be proud... you’ve grown so strong!<page>Zaza... let us just rest a little... and then we’ll be away...
original_zh_text: <hpage>骑士先生，对不起……只有这样才能斩断你身上的黑丝诅咒……<hpage>咳……别难过……小姑娘……<page>你很强大……应该骄傲……<page>扎扎……可以休息了……
translated_text: <hpage>"I'm sorry, Mr. Knight. Only in this way can we escape this damn trap.<page>Yes, right. don't worry about this man.<page>You are proud to be so strong!<page>It's him! Let's take a break and then go.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>“对不起，奈特先生。只有这样我们才能摆脱这个该死的陷阱。<page>是的，正确的。别担心这个人。<page>你为自己如此强大而自豪！<page>是他！我们休息一下然后出发吧。

original_en_text: Nuu’s wish, it is granted. But miss grown-up will continue cutting creatures and adding them to our journal, of course?<hpage>I will. Knowing a creature’s form and habits is an advantage that can decide the outcome of a battle. Recording these details is worth the effort.<page>Oh yes! Is very much worth it! Nuu hopes you will share your new learnings with her often!<page>And take a gift to help with your huntings, miss grown-up! Nuu will add a pocket to your tool pouch, for the bringing of many tools on your hunts!<page>
original_zh_text: 努努的愿望达成了，但大姐姐会继续砍怪记录对吧？<hpage>会的。了解生物习性对战斗有帮助，值得记录。<page>超值得！要经常和努努分享新发现哦！<page>送你个狩猎礼物！给你的工具包加个口袋，多装点装备！
translated_text: Noah's wish will come true, but will women continue to cut these creatures and add them to newspapers?<hpage>We know that understanding the shapes and habits of organisms is an advantage in determining the outcome of a battle.<page>Let's go, let's go! Very worth it! They often share new knowledge.<page>We have a gift to help you hunt! Net adds pockets to your kit and allows you to carry a lot of equipment while hunting!<page>
secondary_translated_text: 诺亚的愿望将会实现，但女性会继续切割这些生物并将它们添加到报纸上吗？<hpage>我们知道，了解生物体的形状和习惯是决定战斗结果的优势。<page>走吧，走吧！非常值得！他们经常分享新知识。<page>我们有一份礼物可以帮助您狩猎！Net为您的装备增加了口袋，让您在狩猎时携带大量装备！<page>

original_en_text: Just a piece of a mask, innit? Don’t ask us where the other bits are... you’ll have to sniff ‘em out for yourself!
original_zh_text: 只是一块面甲碎片。不知道剩下的在哪……自己找去！
translated_text: It's just a mask, isn't it? What are you doing? Don't ask others where you are, listen to yourself.
secondary_translated_text: 这只是一个面具，不是吗？你在干什么？不要问别人你在哪里，听听自己的意见。

translated_text: Monte Faye.

original_en_text: <hpage>Nuu, I have completed your request, recording many creatures of Pharloom in the journal.<page>Oooh, ooh! Ma ma ma! Look here at the marvelous beasts and bugs, all listed so beautifully!<page>Miss grown-up, so many creatures now you have cut and beat and smashed! Their essences linger on you, their scents mixing with your own!<page>Oooh, ma... Nuu simply must sample it for herself!
original_zh_text: <hpage>努努，你要的生态记录完成了。<page>哇！快看这些奇虫异兽，记录得好详细！<page>大姐姐砍了好多生物！它们的精华都沾在你身上，味道混在一起了！<page>啧啧……努努好想尝一口！
translated_text: <hpage>No, I agreed to your request and recorded the existence of many people in my diary.<page>Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Mommy! Mommy! Look at the monsters and insects!<page>Men and women, you have killed many creatures and killed many people. Your essence will amaze you, and your perfume will mix with your perfume!<page>Mommy! Well, you can do it yourself.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>不，我同意了你的请求，并在日记中记录了很多人的存在。<page>哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！妈妈！妈妈！看看怪物和昆虫！<page>男人和女人，你们杀死了许多生物，杀死了许多人。你的精华会让你惊叹不已，你的香水会与你的香水混合在一起！<page>妈妈！好吧，你可以自己做。

original_en_text: You go on ahead. Zaza and I will keep guard here and catch any stragglers.
original_zh_text: 你先前进吧，我和扎扎在这守着一会，看看有没有漏网之虫。
translated_text: Purple and I are here to protect and stop those behind it.
secondary_translated_text: 紫色和我来这里是为了保护和阻止幕后黑手。

original_en_text: Nuu understands, ma. To sup on such a fierce predator’s juices would be divine... but is not right to do. Such behaviour is unfriendly.<page>Nuu’s wish to see many fine beasts, though... miss grown-up, you have surely granted it! All of Nuu’s thanks goes to you!
original_zh_text: 对不起嘛……虽然掠食者的汁液很诱人……但这样不礼貌。<page>不过见识了这么多神奇生物……太感谢大姐姐了！
translated_text: I don't know, Mom, I would love to enjoy the juice of this cruel predator, but it's a lie." She's not friendly.<page>"I hope to see many beautiful animals, professor, and I agree with you. Thank you for everything you have done for me!
secondary_translated_text: 我不知道，妈妈，我很想享受这个残酷掠食者的果汁，但这是谎言。“她不友好。<page>“教授，我希望看到很多美丽的动物，我同意你的观点。感谢您为我所做的一切！

original_en_text: I will soon leave these crumbling roads, but if you stop by the settlement below we may meet again. I pass there often to trade with the pilgrims.
original_zh_text: 我马上要离开这段破路了，但我常去下面的聚落交易，或许还会碰面。
translated_text: I will soon be off this unstable path, but if I stop under the colonies, I will see you again.
secondary_translated_text: 我很快就会离开这条不稳定的道路，但如果我在殖民地下面停下来，我就会再次见到你。

original_en_text: Here, the trail of the stag touched pale... We hunted her, felled her, as none before were able...<page>Proof it became, of our majesty... mark of our divine right...
original_zh_text: 这里留有苍白苜鹿的痕迹……我们猎杀了无虫能及的传说……<page>这是王权之证……神授之印……
translated_text: The tracks of the reindeer here have turned blue, so let's hunt them and cut them. Because no one can do it.<page>This is our dignity." "Symbol of the Holy Law."
secondary_translated_text: 这里驯鹿的足迹已经变成蓝色，所以让我们猎杀它们并剪断它们。因为没有人能做到。<page>这是我们的尊严。”“神圣法律的象征。"

original_en_text: Beautiful this, a glowy little piece of somethin’. Stinks of them horrid crawling whisperers a bit, so might be dangerous. You should take it! Give us your rosaries and lighten my claws of it!
original_zh_text: 亮晶晶的，漂亮的很！就是带着点难闻的织者味儿。危险货，快买走！
translated_text: They are such beautiful and bright little things. It smells bad, so it's dangerous. You must accept this! "Give me your rosary beads and light my nails. "
secondary_translated_text: 它们是如此美丽而明亮的小东西。闻起来很难闻，所以很危险。你必须接受这一点！“把你的念珠给我，点燃我的指甲。"

original_en_text: Ho, sister! A grand victory achieved, again. The haunted might of this place cannot stand against our pure hearts!
original_zh_text: 哈！又赢一场！圣堡的空壳子挡不住我们的正义之心！
translated_text: Oh sister, the ghostly power of this place cannot stop our pure hearts!
secondary_translated_text: 姐姐，这个地方的幽灵力量无法阻挡我们纯洁的心！

original_en_text: <page=M>This task before you... This is mortal power you would claim, the hearts of bugs. It will cost their last strength to save this land.<page=M>Even we have some hesitation in this. Despite our desire to touch their power, we’d never wished to see it expended so utterly.<hpage>Better to leave your land weak in wonder, if it means your shells, and those of your fellows, stay intact.
original_zh_text: <page=M>您需要明白……这方法需要夺取凡虫之心，也会耗尽它们最后一丝力气。<page=M>即便是我们也心有不忍。虽然渴望见识这份力量，但并不希望看到它燃尽。<hpage>让这片土地虚弱而存，总好过让虫族壳裂身死。
translated_text: <page=M>This is called the power of humans, or the mind of insects. We need the last power to save the world.<page=M>We want to use its power, but we don't want it to be completely exhausted.<hpage>The best solution is to make the soil fragile. This means that there is no connection between you and your partner.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>这就是所谓的人类的力量，或者昆虫的心灵。我们需要最后的力量来拯救世界。<page=M>我们想利用它的力量，但我们不希望它完全耗尽。<hpage>最好的解决方案是让土壤变得脆弱。这意味着您和您的伴侣之间没有任何联系。

original_en_text: Gurrrooooo! Gallantly answered, sister! Prepare your weapon!
translated_text: Come on, come on! Come on, come on! Courage, brothers, prepare your weapons!
secondary_translated_text: 来吧来吧来吧来吧勇气，兄弟们，准备好你们的武器！

original_en_text: Uaahhhhh! Miss grown-up... your journal is bursting with every sort of creature! Overflowing! Surely, we can call this complete!<page>To think, that such a task could even be done! So clever is Nuu, to have set such a fierce predator onto the work!<hpage>These vast lands hold so much life, and to catalogue it all has taught me greatly. It is an effort worth continuing even after I leave this kingdom.<page>Ooh ma, such a hunger is worthy indeed! You and I are of accord, miss grown-up, hunters both. Our methods are different but our appetites have become very similar!<page>Nuu has for you this token, a symbol of all your efforts, and a marker of your true nature. It carries with it her sweet, sweet smell!
original_zh_text: 啊啊啊！记录册要满出来了！绝对算完成了吧！<page>没想到真能做完！努努真聪明，找对帮手了！<hpage>这片大地生机勃勃，记录它们让我受益匪浅。以后我会保留这个习惯。<page>哇！这才是真正的饥渴！大姐姐和我都是合格的猎手！方法不同但胃口一样大！<page>送你一个象征努力的标记，沾着努努的体香哦！
translated_text: Yes, right. Oh, yes! Your Majesty, the newspapers are full of biological leaks! You can call it completion.<page>When I think about it, I can do the job. We are smart enough to cooperate with these evil predators!<hpage>Many forms of life live in this vast land, and it is very useful to classify them. Even if you leave the kingdom, it is worth following.<page>We are all adult women, we are all hunters. Although the methods are different, the appetite is very similar.<page>"I created this symbol to symbolize his efforts and nature.
secondary_translated_text: 是的，正确的。哦，是的！陛下，报纸上全是生物泄密事件！你可以称之为完成。<page>当我想到这一点时，我可以做好这份工作。我们足够聪明，可以与这些邪恶的掠食者合作！<hpage>这片广阔的土地上生活着多种生命形式，对它们进行分类非常有用。即使你离开了王国，也值得追随。<page>我们都是成年女性，我们都是猎人。虽然方法不同，但胃口却非常相似。<page>“我创造这个符号是为了象征他的努力和本性。

original_en_text: All bowed before we princes green...
translated_text: Everyone loves the green prince.
secondary_translated_text: 每个人都喜欢绿色王子。

original_en_text: <hpage>What cause sees you travelling these blighted lands, Garmond? Do you also seek the Citadel above?<page>Aye! But do not mistake a valorous adventurer for a mere pilgrim. Mine is a sacred quest, shared with my most trusted companion, dear Zaza.<page>We seek that Citadel not for its gifts. Nay, sister! We seek its rulers, to demand their answer! By force if necessary! For our dear village to whom we pledge our shells. <page>The fearsome haunting of thread, it overcame our fair folk... We are all that remain, left to carry their memory, and the hope to see some justice paid.
original_zh_text: <hpage>加蒙德，你们因何来到这里，莫非也是要去圣堡？<page>对，但我们可不是来朝圣的！我和扎扎肩负着神圣使命！<page>我们去那圣堡，是想为村子讨个公道！<page>该死的丝咒毁了村子，就剩下我们俩……带着大伙的记忆。无论如何我们都要找到答案！
translated_text: <hpage>"Do you know why I came to this wilderness? "Are you looking for the castle upstairs?<page>Oh, yes! Oh, yes! But don't confuse brave adventurers with pure pilgrims. My mission is a sacred mission, and it will be accomplished by my most loyal companion, dear Zaza.<page>Finding the castle is not a gift, nor is it a sister! We are looking for their leaders and looking for answers! If necessary, force will be used. In the name of those we love, we put in a disguise. "<page>The terrible issues of the thread conquered by our beautiful people-we want to leave the people, their memories, and somehow see justice done.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>“你知道我为什么来到这片荒野吗？“你在找楼上的城堡吗？<page>哦，是的！哦，是的！但不要将勇敢的冒险家与纯粹的朝圣者混为一谈。我的使命是一项神圣的使命，它将由我最忠诚的同伴，亲爱的扎扎来完成。<page>找到城堡不是礼物，也不是妹妹！我们正在寻找他们的领导者并寻找答案！如有必要，将使用武力。以我们所爱之人的名义，我们乔装。"<page>我们美丽的人民克服了线程中的可怕问题--我们想离开人民、他们的记忆，并以某种方式看到正义得到伸张。

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Shakra. It was a welcome surprise to hear your call echo through these crumbling tunnels. How goes the search for your master?<page>Poshanka! It is a difficult task to track anything in these caverns while the worms ceaselessly churn the rock.<page>Still, I can see that my master has travelled here. Her path within this land winds strangely... I wonder at her intent.<page>It is no matter though. She can enlighten me when again we meet. Until then, I will continue in her shadow.
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，沙克拉。听到你喊声从塌方隧道传来很是惊喜。寻找导师有进展吗？<page>啵尚咔！虫子拱得这附近摇来晃去，追踪太难。<page>但她肯定来过这里，行踪诡异……猜不透意图。<page>无所谓。跟她重逢时自然就明白了。在此之前，先继续追。
translated_text: <hpage>Good to hear your voice through a loose tunnel.<page>Boshanka! Boshanka! As long as the worms sway over the rocks, chasing anything in this cave can be difficult.<page>I saw the teachers coming. Walking on the streets of earth.<page>It's nice to meet you, I'm hiding in your shadow.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>很高兴通过松散的隧道听到你的声音。<page>博尚卡！博尚卡！只要蠕虫在岩石上摇摆，追逐这个洞穴里的任何东西都会很困难。<page>我看到老师们来了。走在地球的街道上。<page>很很高兴认识你，我躲在你的影子里。

original_en_text: Lockin’ us up in a place like this... what a shameful act!
original_zh_text: 把我们关在这种地方……太缺德了！
translated_text: I'm sorry to be here.

original_en_text: Come now beast, let us hear your voice! Sing with me, sing with me, sing sing sing! Make caverns echo and great roads ring!
original_zh_text: 来吧大块头，亮开嗓子，与我同唱！让洞窟共鸣，让圣道震颤！
translated_text: "Come on, fool, make your voice sound. Sing together. Sing together.
secondary_translated_text: “来吧，傻瓜，让你的声音听起来。一起唱歌。一起唱歌。

original_en_text: Very well, sister. Perhaps it is better that we all just rest here a little longer.
original_zh_text: 好吧，姐妹。就在这歇会儿也行。
translated_text: "Yes, sister, you need to rest here.
secondary_translated_text: “是的，姐姐，你需要在这里休息。

original_en_text: Nimble bug! You forfeited the race? It is true that sometimes a reset is needed, for the health of mind and shell.<page>But what say you now? Surely you are eager to return to the track. Let us soar swift together again!
original_zh_text: 怎么中途退赛了？确实，有时为了身心健康，重头再来是必要的。<page>现在怎么说？你肯定渴望重返赛道，那就让我们再次一同飞驰吧！
translated_text: This was a wise mistake! Did you lose the game? In fact, restarting is sometimes necessary for heart and skin health.<page>But what are you talking about now? I want to go back to the court. He wants to be together again!“
secondary_translated_text: 这是一个明智的错误！你输了比赛吗？事实上，为了心脏和皮肤健康，重新启动有时是必要的。<page>但你现在在说什么？我想回到法庭。他想再次在一起！“

original_en_text: These black threads... they reach upwards with such a powerful longing. No wonder they can force themselves through even mighty stone!
original_zh_text: 这些黑色丝线……向上的渴求如此强烈，难怪能穿透坚岩！
translated_text: Black line. With this wish, I extended my hand. No wonder he can walk on rocks.
secondary_translated_text: 黑线。带着这个愿望，我伸出了手。难怪他能在岩石上行走。

original_en_text: Us snitchbugs can wriggle into any place we want, but with this key even a big oafy bug like you can get through a locked door!
original_zh_text: 我们虽然能钻进任何地方，但有了这把钥匙，像你这样的大块头也能开锁！
translated_text: A whistleblower can go anywhere, but with this key, even an idiot like you can walk through the door with it!
secondary_translated_text: 举报人可以去任何地方，但有了这把钥匙，即使是像你这样的白痴也可以带着它进门！

original_en_text: <page=M>Through their march, at the far border of these lowlands, seek the last queen of the ant hunters. We can sense her still... just.<page=B>In youth, her voice united the wild tribes. Gave them the strength to resist the pale monarch’s will... longer than most at least.
original_zh_text: <page=M>穿越低地边境，寻找蚂蚁猎群最后的蚁后。虽然气息微弱，但我们仍能感知到……<page=B>年轻时她一声令下，野外部落群起反抗苍白君主……虽终究不敌。
translated_text: <page=M>They found the last queen hunter crossing the border of the plain. But I can still feel it. Loneliness, loneliness, loneliness... ...<page=B>When he was young, his voice held the savage tribes together for longer than most, or at least gave them the strength to resist the will of their pale rulers.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>他们发现了最后一位穿越平原边界的猎人女王。但我仍然能感觉到。孤独，孤独，孤独……...<page=B>当他年轻的时候，他的声音比大多数部落更长地将野蛮部落团结在一起，或者至少给了他们抵抗苍白统治者意志的力量。

original_en_text: Let us head on, sister! Together we shall step forward under guidance of our faith!
original_zh_text: 走吧姐妹！咱们一起跟着信仰进圣城！
translated_text: Come on, sisters! We must guide us with faith.
secondary_translated_text: 加油，姐妹们！我们必须用信仰引导我们。

original_en_text: Needle Child. Hakk! I encountered a settlement near here, at the core of a vein of old bells. The bugs there were snared silent on a web of Silk.<page>It seemed the pernicious trap of some unseen predator. I left quickly, making sure to avoid the glimmering threads.<hpage>I passed the town myself. The thread sickness, I’ve seen its like upon the roads, but there it does not discriminate.<hpage>The curse that strikes the town, it is driven, focused. A cold use of Silk at a concerning scale.<hpage>If the path permits, I will investigate its source.
original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘！哈克！附近钟心镇被邪丝罩着，居民全中招了。<page>像是某种没见过的掠食者设的陷阱，我躲着丝溜走了。<hpage>我也路过了那里。路上丝咒多是个例，但那镇子上的邪丝却不挑目标。<hpage>这等规模和冷血手段，显然受到操纵。<hpage>我会顺路追查其源头。
translated_text: This guy is a needle, look at it! We found a property in the center of the nearby Old Bell Tower. Mosquitoes are trapped in the net.<page>Like a death trap for an invisible predator, you will run in front of the flames.<hpage>I walked around the city and saw it on the street, but there was no discrimination.<hpage>A curse hits the city and you focus. Silk of this size is used for cooling.<hpage>If the road permits, I will check the source.
secondary_translated_text: 这家伙是根针，看看！我们在附近的老钟楼中心找到了一处房产。蚊子被困在网里。<page>就像隐形捕食者的死亡陷阱一样，你会跑到火焰前面。<hpage>我在城里走了一圈，在街上看到了它，但没有歧视。<hpage>诅咒袭击了这座城市，你集中注意力。这种尺寸的丝绸用于冷却。<hpage>如果道路允许，我会查看来源。

original_en_text: What say you, nimble bug? Though no reward remains to give, I would delight to soar together with you again!
original_zh_text: 意下如何？虽然没有奖励可以赠予，但能再次与您一同疾驰，我仍乐意至极！
translated_text: What does speed error mean? Although there is no reward, I am very happy to fly with you again!
secondary_translated_text: 速度误差是什么意思？虽然没有奖励，但我很高兴再次和你一起飞行！

original_en_text: Snnnrk... Zaza... Snnnrnrrk... Look sharp my lad...
original_zh_text: 呼噜噜……扎扎……呼噜噜……盯紧点……
translated_text: M. M. M. S. S. S. S. S. A. A. A.SNRK. Snnnrrrk, my child, you are beautiful.
secondary_translated_text: M. M. M. S. S. S. S. S. A. A. A.SNRK. Snnnrrrk，我的孩子，你很漂亮。

original_en_text: You haven’t enough rosaries for trading? The mad pilgrims in the overgrown village near here always carry some with them.<page>Will you take what you need from them? Leaving them to wander their path endlessly is a false mercy.
original_zh_text: 带的念珠不够？附近那些疯癫朝圣者身上多的是。<page>去抢点？让他们继续这么晃悠才是真残忍。
translated_text: Are there many dealers that can be replaced? In the nearby green city, enthusiastic pilgrims always have something to offer.<page>Can you give me what I need? Misguided goodwill will entangle them infinitely.
secondary_translated_text: 有很多经销商可以更换吗？在附近的绿色城市，热情的朝圣者总是能提供一些东西。<page>你能给我我需要的东西吗？被误导的善意会无限地纠缠他们。

original_en_text: Ho, what clever traps the red-shells lay out in defence of their lands!<page>Impressive that you managed to survive such a brutal blow. Your shell must be mighty thick!<hpage>Thick enough, though I’d rather have avoided the trap altogether.<hpage>I’ll let it be a reminder to remain wary, even when no foes are nearby.
original_zh_text: 红壳怪的陷阱真是防不胜防！<page>你真厉害，挨了这么重的一击还能活，壳一定很厚！<hpage>厚归厚，但还是别中招为好。<hpage>吃一堑长一智，以后没敌人也得保持警惕。
translated_text: Oh, this is a great trap, the red hami protects the earth!<page>I am happy to have survived this tough battle. Skin should be cleaned regularly.<hpage>I wanted to avoid the trap completely, but it was too thick.<hpage>Be careful when there are no enemies around you.
secondary_translated_text: 哦，这是一个大陷阱，红哈米保护地球！<page>我很高兴能在这场艰苦的战斗中幸存下来。皮肤应定期清洁。<hpage>我想完全避开陷阱，但它太厚了。<hpage>当你周围没有敌人时要小心。

translated_text: ... Please forgive me.

original_en_text: Well, what a pleasure. The road has carried you back to me.<page>Care for a few games of dice, while we’re here? For the same wager, a beat of rosaries? Just sit here beside me and we’ll begin.
original_zh_text: 真是有缘，又见面了。<page>既然如此，再玩几局骰子？还是老规矩，一奏念珠？想玩的话就坐我旁边吧。
translated_text: Oh, what an honor, this road has brought you to me.<page>Do you want to play here? Can I win the lottery with the same bet? Sitting next to you. Let's start now.
secondary_translated_text: 哦，多么荣幸啊，这条路把你带到了我身边。<page>你想在这里玩吗？我可以用同样的赌注赢得彩票吗？坐在你旁边。让我们现在开始吧。

original_en_text: These docks, I thought them small when first I passed. Now I feel the structure’s true bulk hides below the molten lake.
original_zh_text: 原以为码头很小，结果熔岩湖下还藏着大家伙。
translated_text: When I visited the port, I thought it was a small port, but I realized the hidden structural volume beneath the lava lake.
secondary_translated_text: 当我参观这个港口时，我以为这是一个小港口，但我意识到熔岩湖下面隐藏的结构体积。

original_en_text: The bellways, gilded veins that run throughout the lands. Supposedly, they were once used for travel?<br><br>These pins will mark stations on your map.
original_zh_text: 遍布各地的鎏金钟道，据说以前是交通线路？<br><br>这些图钉能够标记钟脉站点。
translated_text: Earth's golden dwelling, the Bell Tower. Have you used it on travel?<br><br>Pine trees represent stations on the map.
secondary_translated_text: 地球的金色住所，钟楼。您在旅行中使用过它吗？<br><br>松树代表地图上的车站。

original_en_text: Again... to see... this land abandoned... betrayed...<page>...And a throne I could not sit alone...<hpage>You were mortal bugs, caught beneath a being pale... Devotion or destruction... these are the only fates my kind allow.
original_zh_text: 再次见证……故土荒废……王座空悬……独坐无味……<hpage>你们只是凡虫，屈身于苍白存在脚下……臣服或毁灭……是我的族群唯二的“恩赐”。
translated_text: I'm back. Look, the earth is desolate and betrayed.<page>... There is no throne, no one sitting there.<hpage>Dallog is the only destiny our people can bear.
secondary_translated_text: 我回来了看，地球荒凉，被背叛了。<page>...没有王座，没有人坐在那里。<hpage>达洛格是我们人民唯一能承受的命运。

original_en_text: The world has grown much dangerous, but still we must learn! Cut through the black threads, miss grown-up, and hunt down every beast of Pharloom!
original_zh_text: 世界变危险了，但研究不能停！大姐姐快斩断黑灾诅咒，把纺络的野兽全砍遍！
translated_text: The world is becoming more and more dangerous, but we must learn! Fight the Black Line, worship the gods, and chase all the beasts of Pharaoh!
secondary_translated_text: 世界变得越来越危险，但我们必须学习！战斗黑线，崇拜诸神，追逐法老的所有野兽！

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, you too brave these bogs? The heights of Pharloom offer harsh welcome.<page>So winds my master’s path, and so I follow. Yet true you speak! This is no place for me.<page>That Citadel’s shadow falls heavy here. I can sense its horrid bulk besides.<page>It is no surprise to see it choke these caverns dank and stagnant. That monstrosity of metal and stone cares not for the lands it consumes.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉也来闯沼泽？圣堡脚下可没好地方。<page>导师走过这，我只能跟上。但你说得对，这破地真不适合我。<page>圣堡的阴影笼罩着这里，走在路上都能感觉到它的存在。<page>把洞穴都憋得发霉了，但那堆又大又丑的石头可不会管脚下这片土地。
translated_text: <hpage>Shakur, are you brave in that bottle? We received a warm welcome above.<page>The way of my Lord is shameful, and I will follow Him. This is not my home."<page>I saw the castle and felt its scale.<page>No wonder you suffocate in a damp, stagnant cave. Metal or stone monsters don't care about the earth they absorb.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>沙库尔，你在瓶子里勇敢吗？我们受到了上面的热烈欢迎。<page>我主的道是可耻的，我将追随他。这不是我的家。"<page>我看到了城堡，感受到了它的规模。<page>难怪你会在潮湿、停滞的洞穴里窒息。金属或石头怪物并不关心它们吸收的地球。

translated_text: The man said he was.

original_en_text: My master would have found her way to these wilds, I am sure. Her warrior’s sense has no equal. Surely, I must be drawing closer to her!
original_zh_text: 导师肯定来过这片荒野。她战斗直觉无虫能及，我快追上她了！
translated_text: God found a way through the desert. Their warrior spirit is unparalleled. I should be close to her.
secondary_translated_text: 上帝找到了一条穿过沙漠的路。他们的战士精神无与伦比。我应该离她很近。

original_en_text: Leave us to our noble hunt, sister! The Citadel’s twisted bugs still infest these gilded halls. Many are their numbers, but we shall see their life’s thread severed.
original_zh_text: 姐妹不必管我们！即便圣堡余孽众多，但来多少我们也能杀多少！
translated_text: Start your noble hunt! The insects in the castle still live in the golden rooms. However, many people's lifeline has been cut off.
secondary_translated_text: 开始您的高贵狩猎吧！城堡里的昆虫仍然生活在金色的房间里。然而，许多人的生命线却被切断了。

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>The shell of the red-hunters makes for a vivid marker indeed.
original_zh_text: 你可以用这个在地图上标记重要地点或提醒事项。<br><br>用红猎手的壳做的标记，足够醒目。
translated_text: You can use it to display important places and memories on a map.<br><br>The red hunter shell is a symbol of life.
secondary_translated_text: 您可以用它来显示地图上的重要地点和记忆。<br><br>红色猎人壳是生命的象征。

original_en_text: How dank and fetid are these ancient roads, sister! My delicate whiskers are nearly overcome by the stench of evil in the air.<page>Woe betide those with delicate senses, such as poor Zaza here. The shadow of that ghastly Citadel falls heavily upon this place!<hpage>I’ve seen many mighty structures fall to decay in my time. Such places often become home to predators. Keep your sights trained on what lurks in the fog, sirs.
original_zh_text: 这破路又暗又臭！我的漂亮胡子都沾上味了！<page>像扎扎这样鼻子灵的，都快被熏坏了！<hpage>我见过不少腐朽崩塌的宏伟建筑，常沦为掠食者巢穴。当心雾里藏着的东西。
translated_text: The road was wet and smelly! My soft beard was almost hurt by the bad smell of the air.<page>Some people are sensitive to emotions, like poor children. The shadow of this terrible castle falls here!<hpage>In my time, I have witnessed the collapse of many beautiful buildings. These areas are often home to predators. Be careful not to hide in the fog.
secondary_translated_text: 路又湿又臭！空气中的难闻气味差点伤到我柔软的胡须。<page>有些人对情绪很敏感，比如贫穷的孩子。这座可怕城堡的阴影就落在这里！<hpage>在我的时代，我目睹了许多美丽建筑的倒塌。这些地区通常是掠食者的家园。小心不要躲在雾中。

original_en_text: Hoy, you been creepin’ around this dusty old place for while then, eh? You must be carryin’ a lot of goodies with you! Let a poor old snitchfly ‘ave a quick look!
original_zh_text: 哟，你在这附近转悠了半天，捞到不少好东西吧？让我瞧瞧！
translated_text: Have you been in this dusty old place for a long time? There should be a lot of good things! Let's take a look at the reporter.
secondary_translated_text: 你在这个尘土飞扬的老地方已经很久了吗？应该有很多好东西！我们来看看记者。

original_en_text: I’m Sherma, by the way. Just another humble pilgrim like yourself. If you ever need assistance on the road ahead, sing out my name and I’ll be sure to find you. Me and my lucky chime are at your service!
original_zh_text: 我叫谢尔玛，和你一样是朝圣者。路上需要帮忙就喊我！我和幸运铃铛随叫随到！
translated_text: I'm also a man as humble as Sherman is, and if you need help on the journey, please sing my name. You and I have a great job.
secondary_translated_text: 我也是一个和谢尔曼一样谦虚的人，如果您在旅途中需要帮助，请唱我的名字。你和我的工作很棒。

original_en_text: We ain’t leavin’ ‘til we’re done pilfering! You be off, if you’re so scared!
original_zh_text: 我才不走，还没偷够呢！怕死就自己跑！
translated_text: Get out and run! "If you are afraid, run.
secondary_translated_text: 出去快跑！“如果你害怕，就跑吧。

original_en_text: Please take some rosaries in exchange, red maiden!<page>Though in these dark times their promise of holy reward may never be met, still they carry with them our fondest well-wishes.
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘，请收下这些念珠吧！<page>虽然现在形势不好，但这些念珠装着我们最真诚的祝福！
translated_text: "Mr. Horn, I want to change my seat.<page>In these dark times, God's promise of reward may never be realized, but it brings us the best blessings.
secondary_translated_text: “霍恩先生，我想换个座位。<page>在这个黑暗的时代，上帝的回报承诺可能永远无法实现，但它给我们带来了最好的祝福。

original_en_text: Gate, gate, gate! Nicest gate I’ve met!<br>Gate, gate, gate! Greatest miracle yet! Ha ha ha!
original_zh_text: 骨门骨门最贴心！<br>骨门骨门真神迹！哈哈哈！
translated_text: Bevy! Courage! Courage! The door! The best door I have ever seen!<br>The door! The door! The door! The greatest miracle of all time, haha.
secondary_translated_text: 贝维！勇气！勇气！门！我见过的最好的门！<br>门！门！门！有史以来最伟大的奇迹，哈哈。

original_en_text: <page=M>Those docks, atop the lake of flame, they still possess the means to pass below, though you’d be the first in an age to dare the descent.<hpage>Then my path is clear. Remain in your sanctuary and await my return. If this land can be saved, you may have a part to play yet.
original_zh_text: <page=M>熔岩湖上的深坞仍保有通往下层的手段，但长久以来无虫敢试。<hpage>前路已明，你们就守着圣所等我归来吧。若此地尚存生机，或许还用得上各位。
translated_text: <page=M>This coastline sits at the top of Lake Flamis and there is still a canal underneath it, but you will be the first challenge of this era.<hpage>My path is clear." Put on your coat and wait for you to come back. "If we can protect this land, we can use it a little bit.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>这条海岸线位于弗拉米斯湖的顶部，下面还有一条运河，但你将是这个时代的第一个挑战。<hpage>我的道路是明确的。“穿上外套，等你回来。“如果我们能保护这片土地，我们就可以利用它一点。

original_zh_text: 要挑战飞毛腿斯威夫特吗？
translated_text: The speed of the master.

original_en_text: Ho, what clever traps the red-shells lay in defence of their lands!<page>I’ve narrowly avoided a few nasty ends myself. It certainly adds a thrill to my investigations...
original_zh_text: 呀！红壳怪的陷阱真阴险！<page>我好几次都差点中招。调查工作有点刺激过头了……
translated_text: Oh, this is a great trap, the red hami protects the earth!<page>I almost died, which made me passionate about research.
secondary_translated_text: 哦，这是一个大陷阱，红哈米保护地球！<page>我差点死了，这让我对研究充满了热情。

original_en_text: Well now! How brilliant! In all these fine games you have matched my scores and more!<page>What wonder to be here, and able to witness a display of such profound talent.<hpage>Besting your scores proved an immense challenge, Seth, and yet you seem to have achieved them yourself with relative ease.<page>You flatter me! But yes, my own aptitude continues to surprise me. So many skills I cannot recall learning... <page>But do not underplay your own achievements, for they too are significant, inspiring even!<page>In fact, for my deep respect I insist you take this small medallion. I found it within my belongings, and know not where I came upon it, but it has a most pleasant sense.<page>Let it serve as marker of a friendship I feel has only just begun.<hpage>Thank you, Seth. I shall keep it close.
original_zh_text: 太精彩了！所有游戏你都破了我的记录！<page>能在这见证这么惊艳的表演，真是幸运。<hpage>破你纪录可不容易，但你达成记录时却挺轻松？<page>我自己都惊讶！很多技巧根本不记得学过……<page>但你的成就更能激励我！<page>为表敬意，请收下这枚勋章。不知从哪来的，但带着令人安心。<page>就当我们友谊的信物吧。<hpage>多谢，我会珍藏。
translated_text: I'm okay, I'm okay! Okay, okay! Okay! It'll be great! In all these great games, your score equals my score, or even better!<page>It's nice to see such talent.<hpage>Seth, breaking the count is a huge challenge, but the results seem relatively simple.<page>They will fall in love with me! I was amazed at my talent, but I can't remember how much technology I learned.<page>So don't underestimate the results.<page>"Out of respect, please keep this little medal. I found it in my article. I don't know where I found it, but it's the best feeling.<page>As a symbol of friendship, I think this is just the beginning.<hpage>Thank you Seth, I will continue.
secondary_translated_text: 我没事，我没事！好吧，好吧！好的！这会很棒的！在所有这些伟大的游戏中，你的分数等于我的分数，甚至更好！<page>很高兴看到这样的人才。<hpage>塞斯，打破计数是一个巨大的挑战，但结果似乎相对简单。<page>他们会爱上我的！我对自己的才华感到惊讶，但我不记得我学到了多少技术。<page>所以不要低估结果。<page>“出于尊重，请保留这枚小奖牌。我在我的文章中找到了它。我不知道在哪里找到它，但这是最好的感觉。<page>作为友谊的象征，我认为这只是一个开始。<hpage>谢谢你塞斯，我会继续。

original_en_text: While we rest for the journey ahead, care to test your luck with a game of dice? You know how to play, I trust?<hpage>I’m sure I can grasp the rules quickly enough, sir. What is the wager?<page>A beat of rosaries on each roll. What say you? Sound fair? Let our worries roll away with the dice!
original_zh_text: 休息时要来玩玩骰子吗？你应该知道规则吧？<hpage>我学得快，要赌什么？<page>每次押一奏念珠。公平吧？让骰子带走烦恼！
translated_text: Why not try your luck by shaking your bones during rest?" Do you know how to play? Actually?<hpage>I will soon learn the rules.<page>There are several pearls in each row. Can you hear me? Be careful with your data!
secondary_translated_text: 为什么不在休息时摇晃一下骨头来碰碰运气呢？“你知道怎么玩吗？实际上？<hpage>我很快就会学会规则。<page>每排都有几颗珍珠。你能听到我说话吗？小心您的数据！

original_en_text: Hrm...? Oh, hoy there! ‘Tis a pleasure to meet you here at the end of our long journey, sister.<page>I am Sherma, a simple pilgrim like yourself. What a wonder to find ourselves finally here, eh?<page>Rising at last to the heights of the Citadel and being amongst so many of our brothers and sisters... it is a blessing indeed. Yes, a blessing.<hpage>Your voice belies some hesitation in that belief, little pilgrim. To have travelled this far is to have seen the reality of this broken place. What do you make of it, truly?
original_zh_text: 哎呀！姐妹！走了这么远终于碰面了！<page>我是谢尔玛，和你一样的朝圣者。能走到这儿太不容易了！<page>和这么多同袍登上圣堡……真是恩赐……嗯，是恩赐。<hpage>你听起来有些犹豫？既已走到这里，想必你也看清了此地的破败真相，有什么感想？
translated_text: What is this? What are you doing? Oh, my God, it's here. "It's nice to see you at the end of this long journey.<page>I am a shaman, an ordinary pilgrim, just like you, wouldn't you be surprised if I finally got there?<page>Over time, I climbed the castle and became one of many brothers and sisters. This is indeed a blessing. Yes, this is a blessing.<hpage>Little pilgrim, hide this fear in your faith. When I came here, I saw the reality of this desolate place. What do you think?
secondary_translated_text: 这是什么？你在干什么？天哪，它在这里。“很高兴在这段漫长的旅程结束时见到你。<page>我是一个萨满，一个普通的朝圣者，就像你一样，如果我最终到达那里，你不会感到惊讶吗？<page>随着时间的推移，我爬上了城堡，成为众多兄弟姐妹中的一员。这确实是一种祝福。是的，这是一种祝福。<hpage>小小的朝圣者，把这种恐惧隐藏在你的信仰中。当我来到这里时，我看到了这个荒凉地方的现实。你怎么看？

original_en_text: Hoy! You again? This place used to be nice and quiet, but now we can’t get a moment’s peace!
original_zh_text: 喂！又是你？这地方本来安安静静的，现在连喘口气都难！
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. You too? It used to be a peaceful place, but now it is no longer peaceful.
secondary_translated_text: 嘿嘿。你也是吗？这里曾经是一个和平的地方，但现在不再和平了。

original_en_text: Ahh, sister! You have awoken. I hope that our powerful strikes did not leave you in too weak a condition.<page>We would even be willing to duel again, if you still have the strength!
original_zh_text: 啊哈哈，姐妹，你醒啦？没打疼你吧？<page>你要还有力气想再打一轮，我们随时奉陪！
translated_text: Oh, sister! They woke up, hoping that a strong attack would not weaken them.<page>If you are strong, you will fight again.
secondary_translated_text: 哦，姐姐！他们醒来，希望强大的攻击不会削弱他们。<page>如果你坚强，你就会再次战斗。

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir Guardian... I scarcely thought we would meet again after our encounter.<page>Hm? Apologies friend, I fear I don’t recognise you. And I’m sure I would remember such a striking figure!<hpage>...Pay no heed, sir. It seems I mistook you for another.<hpage>You are... a traveller through these quaking lands, I take it?<page>I suppose I am indeed! I was born into this world not long ago, waking beside a lake with only this weapon laying beside me.<page>Seth is my name, though I know not who gave it to me.<page>The custom of the newly-born is to explore the world, is it not? So that is what I have set out to do! I will rest here a moment, then continue my journey.
original_zh_text: <hpage>守卫者先生……没想到能再见。<page>抱歉朋友，我们见过吗？像你这样的虫我肯定忘不掉。<hpage>……抱歉，是我认错了。<hpage>你是……旅行者？<page>算是吧！我刚降生不久，就在湖边，身边还有这些武器。<page>我叫赛斯，但不知谁取的名。<page>新生儿就该探索世界对吧？我休息一会儿就继续上路。
translated_text: <hpage>Since we met, I have never thought of seeing each other again.<page>What is this? What are you doing? "I'm sorry, I don't know you. "I will remember such a great man. "<hpage>... "I think you're like everyone else.<hpage>Who are you? I think you are a traveler, traveling on the trembling earth.<page>I thought it was him! "Just before I came into this world, I woke up by the lake with this gun in my hand.<page>I don't know who gave it to me, but Seth is my name.<page>Children have a habit of exploring the world, don't they? Let's start here! I will take a break and start my journey.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>自从我们见面以来，我就没有想过再见面。<page>这是什么？你在干什么？“对不起，我不认识你。“我会记住这样一位伟人。”<hpage>...“我认为你和其他人一样。<hpage>你是谁？我认为你是一个旅行者，在颤抖的地球上旅行。<page>我以为是他！“就在我来到这个世界之前，我在湖边醒来，手里拿着这把枪。<page>我不知道是谁给我的，但塞斯是我的名字。<page>孩子们有探索世界的习惯，不是吗？让我们从这里开始！我要休息一下，开始我的旅程。

original_en_text: Miss grown-up! What sweet surprise for Nuu! The world rumbles and the black threads stretch. Not safe now to wander.<page>But you! You are adult yes? Fully grown? Ready to hunt, no matter the darkness?<hpage>Certainly I am no child, young one.<page>Perfect then! Nuu must ask a wish! For her, you would seek Pharloom’s many fabulous bugs and cut them.<page>Cut them with your blade! Cut them with your mature spirit! Cut them with your savage adult heart!<page>Would you help Nuu? Before it all ends? Could you take her scroll, and fill its pages with the learnings of your cuts?
original_zh_text: 大姐姐！努努好惊喜！世界在震颤，黑灾在蔓延。现在独自游荡可不安全。<page>但你！你是成虫对吧？完全长大了？准备好狩猎了，无惧黑暗？<hpage>我显然不是个小孩子，小家伙。<page>太好啦！努努有个愿望！帮我去砍纺络的各种神奇虫子吧！<page>用你的刀砍！用长大的力气砍！用成熟的狂野之心砍！<page>帮帮努努好不好？趁着一切还没有终结，收下这本册子，用打架心得写满它！
translated_text: Your Majesty, Madam! This was a huge surprise for us! In a world where black lines stretch, walking is dangerous.<page>But we did it! Are they adults? Total growth? "Are you ready to hunt? "Are you ready to face the darkness?”<hpage>I'm not a child, of course.<page>More here. You must make a wish!" To do this, you can find a lot of fresh insects in the lighthouse and cut them.<page>You cut it with a knife! Destroy it with a mature heart and test a mature heart.<page>Do you need help Nancy? Until the end? Can you bring a scroll to fill out your editing knowledge page?
secondary_translated_text: 陛下，夫人！这对我们来说是一个巨大的惊喜！在一个黑线延伸的世界里，行走是危险的。<page>但我们做到了！他们是成年人吗？总增长？“你准备好打猎了吗？“你准备好面对黑暗了吗？”<hpage>当然，我不是一个孩子。<page>更多在这里。你必须许个愿！“要做到这一点，你可以在灯塔里找到很多新鲜的昆虫并将它们切割。<page>你用刀切它！用一颗成熟的心摧毁它，考验一颗成熟的心。<page>你需要帮助南希吗？一直到最后？你能带一个卷轴来填写你的编辑知识页吗？

original_en_text: ...Great strides move the world, but small steps shouldn’t be overlooked...<page>...One mystery leads to another. Scrutinising the belly of the thing will prove useful...<hpage>The meaning behind your musings is as opaque as ever. Would you converse with me directly, sir?<page>...Trust yourself. And each other. The solution is always within grasp...
original_zh_text: ……大变革撼动天地，但小细节亦不容忽视……<page>……谜题环环相扣。剖开事物本质方能解惑……<hpage>先生高论依旧晦涩，能否直言相告？<page>……信己信人。答案触手可及……
translated_text: ... You can touch the world with one big step, but you cannot ignore it with one small step.<page>... One mystery leads to another mystery. I suggest you study the top of something carefully.<hpage>As always, the meaning of meditation is unclear.<page>... If you believe in yourself, the reactions of others are always under your control.
secondary_translated_text: ...你可以用一大步触摸世界，但你不能用一小步忽视它。<page>...一个谜团引发另一个谜团。我建议你仔细研究一些东西的顶部。<hpage>像往常一样，冥想的意义是不明确的。<page>...如果你相信自己，别人的反应总是在你的控制之下。

original_en_text: The creatures of this wood can disguise themselves amongst the many branches. Watch for unexpected movement and be prepared to strike.
original_zh_text: 林子里虫子会伪装成树枝。注意周围动静，随时准备出手。
translated_text: Creatures in this forest can hide behind many branches. Pay attention to unexpected steps and be prepared to attack.
secondary_translated_text: 这片森林中的生物可以躲在许多树枝后面。注意意外步骤，做好进攻准备。

original_en_text: Spider dear, what a delight to have you visit! It is oh so lonely here at the bottom of the world.<hpage>I cannot share your mirth, child. Your small rebellion above now causes this kingdom’s collapse.
original_zh_text: 小蜘蛛，你来啦！真高兴，独自在这世界之底，好寂寞呢~<hpage>我可高兴不起来，孩子。你那点小小的反叛就要毁灭上方的王国了。
translated_text: "Mr. Spider, I'm so glad you're here, at the end of the world, you're alone.<hpage>I couldn't share your happiness with you, which led to a minor rebellion that led to the collapse of the kingdom.
secondary_translated_text: “蜘蛛先生，我很高兴你在这里，在世界的尽头，你是孤独的。<hpage>我无法与你分享你的幸福，这导致了一场小叛乱，导致了王国的崩溃。

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Shakra. I had a sense I would find you in these winding tunnels, filled as they are with the marks of combat.<page>Poshanka! You trust your instincts rightly. The red-shelled warriors who carved out these roads make for excellent opponents indeed.<page>I would gladly spend much time here, testing myself against their blades and cunning traps, but I must keep to my task. As should you!
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，沙克拉。看到那些打斗痕迹，我就知道能在附近碰上你。<page>啵尚咔！你直觉真准。那些红壳战士真够厉害，打得痛快！<page>真想多待会儿练练手，但任务要紧。你也别耽搁！
translated_text: <hpage>Good morning, I believe I can find it because the relics of Shakira's struggle are piled up in a winding tunnel.<page>Boshanka! Boshanka! The Red Cross is the only organization that can cross this route.<page>I am happy to have spent so long here and try to fight their swords and cunning traps, but I must continue my mission. "You should be you too.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>早上好，我相信我能找到它，因为夏奇拉斗争的遗迹堆积在蜿蜒的隧道中。<page>博尚卡！博尚卡！红十字会是唯一可以跨越这条路线的组织。<page>我很高兴在这里度过了这么长时间，试图与他们的剑和狡猾的陷阱作斗争，但我必须继续我的使命。“你也应该是你。

original_en_text: Hahhh... hahhh... oh, sister. What a toll it exacts on us... this endless combat! Certainly when peace finally comes, we will be in the right mind to appreciate it...<hpage>You place too much burden upon yourself, sir.<hpage>Though I share your ambition to free this land from its curse, I counsel you to rest, even if only for a short while.<page>Us, rest? While you, my dear sister, fight on so gallantly? Hahhhh... we cannot.<page>What would our old village think of us, were we to quit our charge? No, regardless of what you may believe, there’s strength enough still in these old shells!
original_zh_text: 哈……哈……噢，姐妹。这架打得骨头都快散架了……等太平了可得好好睡一觉……<hpage>别把担子全压自己身上。<hpage>我也想终结诅咒，但该休息还是得休息。<page>休息？你也还在拼命，我们哪能躺下？<page>要是半途而废，村里的大伙会怎么想！别看我们一身旧壳，里头可有劲呢！
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey! Ha! "Sister, this is a huge loss for us. Of course, when peace comes, we will be grateful with a righteous heart.<hpage>You have put too much burden on yourself.<hpage>Although I am as ambitious as you and want to liberate this country from its curse, I suggest you at least take a break.<page>Let's take a break, okay? How could he fight so bravely? Ha! No, no.<page>What will this ancient village think if we give up the offensive? Believe it or not, this ancient shell still has enough power!
secondary_translated_text: 嘿嘿！哈！“姐姐，这对我们来说是一个巨大的损失。当然，当和平到来时，我们会怀着正义的心感恩。<hpage>你给自己带来了太多的负担。<hpage>尽管我和你一样雄心勃勃，希望将这个国家从诅咒中解放出来，但我建议你至少休息一下。<page>我们休息一下，好吗？他怎么能这么勇敢地战斗？哈！不不<page>如果我们放弃进攻，这个古老的村庄会怎么想？不管你信不信，这个古老的贝壳仍然有足够的力量！

original_en_text: <hpage>Child, I hold the means to descend. Let us meet one final time, and quell this black ruin of our making.
original_zh_text: <hpage>孩子，我有办法下潜。我们再最后见一面，终结这黑暗吧。
translated_text: <hpage>My child, there is a way to go. Let us come back one last time and silence the black ruins we have created.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我的孩子，还有一段路要走。让我们最后一次回来，让我们创造的黑色废墟安静下来。

original_en_text: <hpage>Learning about a land’s inhabitants is a worthwhile undertaking. Perhaps you are more grown than you realise, Nuu.<page>Ma! Such delicious praise will make Nuu shrivel! Go now! Hunt, and prey, and begin our learning!
original_zh_text: <hpage>研究生态是好事，努努。或许你比看起来要成熟。<page>呀！这么夸人家要害羞啦！快去打猎，开始我们的研究！
translated_text: <hpage>It's a pleasure to meet the people of this country. You may be more mature than you think.<page>Mommy! This kind of compliment makes me feel distressed. Hunting, hunting, teaching.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>很高兴见到这个国家的人民。你可能比你想象的更成熟。<page>妈妈！这种赞美让我感到苦恼。狩猎、狩猎、教学。

original_en_text: Child Wielding Needle. What do you make of this huge, groaning structure?<hpage>The scale of it all impresses me. If this is merely an outpost of the Citadel above, then their capital must be grand beyond measure.<page>Yokkala... Perhaps so.
