They must have prized indeed the work done here, to build something so vast in such a dangerous place.
original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘，你怎么看这吱呀乱响的大家伙？<hpage>规模惊人。若这仅是圣堡的一处前哨，那主城的宏伟难以想象。<page>哟咔啦……或许吧。在这种险地修这么大工程，肯定费了不少劲。
translated_text: A child wields a needle. What do you think of this huge structure?<hpage>If it were a higher outpost, its capital would grow significantly.<page>Mr. Yoko, maybe he was grateful for doing something extraordinary in a dangerous place.
secondary_translated_text: 一个孩子挥舞着针。您觉得这个巨大的结构怎么样？<hpage>如果它是一个更高的前哨基地，它的资本就会显着增长。<page>洋子先生，也许他很感激在危险的地方做了一些非凡的事情。

translated_text: hunting sign

original_en_text: Seek swift to calm our crying land, Hornet Wielding Needle. And know that I shall remain here, to stand against these husks gone dark.
original_zh_text: 快去平息纺络的哀嚎，使针的小姑娘。我会保护这里的虫民。
translated_text: Bees waved needles, trying to quickly heal my tears, and I wanted to stay here and fight this black shell.
secondary_translated_text: 蜜蜂挥舞着针头，试图迅速治愈我的眼泪，我想留在这里与这个黑色的贝壳作斗争。

original_en_text: I’ll bring the healing supplies to the settlement with all haste, red maiden.<page>Fear not on my behalf. My fellow pilgrims are all praying for me, and thereby no harm will befall me!
original_zh_text: 我这就把药送回去。<page>别担心我！大伙都在为我祈祷，不会有事的！
translated_text: "Ms. Hong, please get the treatment materials as soon as possible.<page>"Don't worry, my pilgrims are praying that I won't get hurt.
secondary_translated_text: “洪女士，请尽快拿到治疗材料。<page>“别担心，我的朝圣者正在祈祷我不会受伤。

original_en_text: ‘Tis now my charge to care for those who stay here, including yourself. If I can aid you in any way, please let me know!
original_zh_text: 现在我负责照顾大伙，包括你在内。有什么需要尽管说！
translated_text: "My job is to take care of the people who live here, including you. "If there is anything I can help, let me know! " "
secondary_translated_text: “我的工作是照顾住在这里的人，包括你。“如果有什么我可以帮忙的，请告诉我！" "

original_en_text: Oh, what a shock! Discovered again so easily! Like a hapless little hatchling!<page>If you’re going to make a sport of tracking me, I’ll have to redouble my efforts at camouflage!
original_zh_text: 吓我一跳！又被发现了！跟刚破壳的小虫似的！<page>你要是想拿我当猎物练手，我可要升级伪装术了！
translated_text: Oh, my God, this is a shock! You can easily start over! He looks like an unfortunate child.<page>If you want to see me as a sport, I have to do more to hide it. "
secondary_translated_text: 天哪，这太震惊了！您可以轻松重新开始！他看起来像个不幸的孩子。<page>如果你想把我视为一项运动，我必须采取更多措施来隐藏它。”

original_en_text: The jagged crest looming over all of Pharloom. Its whipping winds and bitter cold would pierce the strongest shell.
original_zh_text: 俯瞰纺络的尖峰，寒风能刺穿最坚硬的外壳。
translated_text: The Rocky Mountains cover the entire Faroe Islands, with strong winds and extreme cold penetrating the strongest basins.
secondary_translated_text: 落基山脉覆盖整个法罗群岛，强风和极冷渗透到最强的盆地。

original_en_text: Ahh, the shining bench has risen for us! Pharloom’s kindness to we pilgrims is inexhaustible!<page>Please rest, red maiden, and fear not. Our kingdom watches over us all!
original_zh_text: 看！圣椅为我们升起了！纺络永远眷顾朝圣者！<page>安心歇息吧，王国在庇护我们呢！
translated_text: Give us a light! We are not an innocent pharaoh.<page>"Rest in peace, Red Girl, don't be afraid, our kingdom will protect us all.
secondary_translated_text: 给我们一盏灯！我们不是无辜的法老。<page>“安息吧，红女，不要害怕，我们的王国会保护我们所有人。

original_en_text: Join your voice with mine, red maiden! You, me, and my lucky chime will sing together until the great gate opens!
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘，快加入合唱！你我加上幸运铃铛，肯定能用歌声叩开大门！
translated_text: Join my voice, red girl! You and I, and my happy servant, we will sing together until the door opens.
secondary_translated_text: 加入我的声音，红女孩！你和我，还有我快乐的仆人，我们将一起唱歌，直到门打开。

original_en_text: Hrm? Hoy there! I was looking for somewhere to rest my weary shell and found this cosy station!<hpage>These lands are dangerous. I had thought perhaps some harm had come to you.<page>Harm? O red maiden, have faith! No harm can come to us on this holy ascent! We only need to keep our gaze upwards.<page>Isn’t this all so terribly grand? The great stone steps, the winds lifting us up like the voices of a choir, and just beyond it all is our pilgrimage’s end. The great Citadel at last!
original_zh_text: 嗯？红衣姑娘！我正在找地方歇脚，这驿站多舒适啊！<hpage>此处很凶险，我担心你遭遇不测。<page>不测？要对圣途有信心！只要仰望圣堡，灾祸自会远离！<page>这景象多壮丽啊！巨大石阶，乘着风声，宛如圣歌，终点就在眼前了！
translated_text: What is this? What are you doing? Good morning, I was looking for a place to rest my tired body and I found this comfortable resort!<hpage>Land is dangerous and can be injured. "<page>Are you accusing me? "My red boy, trust me. "In this sacred Ascension, we do nothing! Be careful, friend.<page>Is it too big? Our pilgrimage was over and we passed through a huge stone step that lifted us up like a bell in the wind.
secondary_translated_text: 这是什么？你在干什么？早上好，我正在寻找一个地方来休息我疲惫的身体，我找到了这个舒适的度假村！<hpage>土地很危险，可能会受伤。"<page>你在指责我吗？“我的红男孩，相信我。”在这个神圣的扬升中，我们什么也不做！小心点，朋友。<page>是不是太大了？我们的朝圣之旅结束了，我们走过了一个巨大的石阶，它像风中的钟一样将我们举起。

translated_text: <hpage>A little pilgrim? Are you asleep?

original_en_text: She and her like have red-rocky shells to protect their softnesses. Inside is very sweet! Very hard to crack them open though, so is best to wait. Is always best to wait!
original_zh_text: 它们用红岩壳保护内部的软肉。里面超甜！但壳太难撬，最好等自然腐烂！
translated_text: She and her companions have a red rock shell to protect their sweetness. It's very sweet inside. But, it's better to wait because it's hard to break.
secondary_translated_text: 她和她的同伴们有一个红石壳来保护他们的甜蜜。里面很甜。但是，最好等待，因为它很难打破。

original_en_text: <hpage>Gladly, Shakra. Upon this stone, let us test our shells.
original_zh_text: <hpage>求之不得。就在此石台上一较高下吧。
translated_text: <hpage>Shakira, I'm happy for you. With this stone, we will try to use shells.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>夏奇拉，我为你高兴。对于这块石头，我们将尝试使用贝壳。

original_en_text: Well met, sister. Though the beastly Citadel has finally been slain, still the lands caught beneath it suffer!<page>The evils long done by that cursed place have sunk into the kingdom’s very foundations, and now they rise up as a black sickness.<hpage>This darkness, it is a curse deadlier than the Haunting... a force from far below that will consume all if given the opportunity.<page>Hmm... Just so! And while wickedness still stalks these lands, our hornlance shall not rest!
original_zh_text: 又见面了，姐妹。圣堡祸根虽除，但下面的土地还在遭罪！<page>诅咒早已根植在纺络的各处，现在化作黑暗冒了出来。<hpage>这黑暗远比丝咒致命……来自最深的邪恶，一有机会就会吞噬一切。<page>哼……果然！只要邪恶还没除净，我们的长枪就放不下！
translated_text: The beast's castle has fallen, but the earth is still suffering.<page>The evil of this cursed land has long been buried in the roots of the kingdom, spreading like a black disease.<hpage>This darkness is a curse more deadly than ghosts, a power from below that surrounds everything when opportunity arises.<page>Yes, yes, yes... ... Oh, yes! Oh, yes! Our evil will never stop until it covers the earth.
secondary_translated_text: 野兽的城堡已经倒塌，但地球仍然在受苦。<page>这片被诅咒之地的邪恶早已埋藏在王国的根源中，像黑色的疾病一样蔓延。<hpage>这种黑暗是一种比鬼魂更致命的诅咒，一种来自下方的力量，当机会出现时，它会包围一切。<page>是的，是的，是的……...哦，是的！哦，是的！我们的邪恶永远不会停止，直到它覆盖地球。

original_en_text: Sturdy gaaaaa-aaate, I don’t ask you break or beee-eeend,<br>Just open a little for me, and my tall maiden frieeee-eeend!
original_zh_text: 骨门呀骨门，不求你折断，<br>只要开条缝让咱过，我和高个姑娘谢你恩典！
translated_text: I won't hit you, I won't hit you.<br>Open it for me and my great virgin friend!
secondary_translated_text: 我不会打你，我不会打你。<br>为我和我伟大的处女朋友打开它！

original_en_text: These waters, at land’s edge... and the shrine atop... our furtive escape... our brief retreat from rule...<page>So many moments spent simple... joyful... free...
original_zh_text: 这片水岸……我们暂时远离王权的休憩……<page>那些简单……快乐……自由的时光……
translated_text: These waters are the end of the earth, and they have priests. We have gone further and exceeded the rules.<page>They are often simple: freedom and happiness.
secondary_translated_text: 这些水是地球的尽头，他们有牧师。我们走得更远，超出了规则。<page>它们往往很简单：自由和幸福。

original_en_text: What say you, sister? Shall we join together in valiant combat?
translated_text: What did I say, sister? Should we fight bravely?
secondary_translated_text: 我说了什么，姐姐？我们应该勇敢战斗吗？

original_en_text: Oh red maiden, sorry to have lured you into such danger!<page>And those poor bugs, bewitched by the thread. No sin could possibly warrant such a fate...<hpage>Your pity is not misplaced, but better suited for another time. For now, you should look to your own care.<page>Ah... yes. I should get these healing supplies back to the pilgrims’ settlement above. My brothers and sisters have waited long enough.
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘，对不起把你卷进来！<page>那些被丝线控制的同伴……他们犯了什么错……<hpage>有怜悯之心固然好，但要先顾好自己。<page>对……我得把药送回聚落。他们等太久了。
translated_text: "Miss Hong, I'm sorry to put you in danger.<page>There is no such fate for those who commit crimes.<hpage>Her compassion is not bad, but it will be better next time. Now he must take care of himself.<page>Yes, right. Yes, treatment materials must be returned to the above-mentioned pilgrimage center. My brothers and sisters have been waiting for a long time.
secondary_translated_text: “洪小姐，很抱歉让你陷入危险。<page>犯罪的人没有这样的命运。<hpage>她的同情心还不错，但下次会更好。现在他必须照顾好自己。<page>是的，正确的。是的，治疗材料必须退回上述朝圣中心。我的兄弟姐妹已经等了很长时间了。

original_en_text: <hpage>The parasite writhing within my shell has a violent aversion to the void. <hpage>Despite the protection granted by the Everbloom, even now I can feel those wretched roots preventing my descent.<hpage>If I’m to dive, and cut this land from its black thread curse, I must first find means to extract the intruder within.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我壳里的寄生物极度抗拒虚空。<hpage>虽然有永绽花保护，但那些根须还是在阻止我下潜。<hpage>要斩断诅咒，得先除掉体内这玩意。
translated_text: <hpage>The parasites walk on shells and hate cleaning them up.<hpage>Despite the protection of eternal color, I still felt the root cause of my poverty, saving me from decline. "<hpage>If I wanted to skip and separate the earth from the curse of darkness, I had to first find a way to chase the invaders.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>寄生虫走在贝壳上，讨厌清理它们。<hpage>尽管有永恒的色彩的保护，我仍然感受到了贫困的根源，使我免于衰落。"<hpage>如果我想跳过地球并将其与黑暗的诅咒分开，我必须首先找到一种方法来追赶入侵者。

original_en_text: Many foes await us. Shall we duel with one another before moving on?
original_zh_text: 前方有不少恶战等着，先来场热身赛？
translated_text: There are many enemies waiting for us, but must we fight and move on?
secondary_translated_text: 有很多敌人在等着我们，但我们必须战斗并继续前进吗？

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Nuu. You have travelled far from your lodgings, I was not expecting to meet you in these lowlands.<page>Oh, hello again miss grown-up! Yes, Nuu is not the fastest, but she goes great distances to follow the scent of learnings.<page>And look what Nuu has found! A great big beast, cracked open and broken apart! There is much to learn from him, so Nuu will savour it all slowly.
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，努努。你跑得真远，没想到在低地遇见你。<page>大姐姐！努努虽然腿短，但跟着知识气味能走超远！<page>看努努发现了什么！这个被肢解的大家伙！慢慢研究肯定能学到好多！
translated_text: <hpage>You didn't expect to meet in this low-lying place, far away from where you live.<page>- Yes, Will is not the fastest, but there is still a long way to go in breathing learning.<page>He has a lot to learn, so Nu will taste it slowly.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>没想到会在这个地势低洼的地方见面，远离你住的地方。<page>- 是的，威尔不是最快的，但在呼吸学习方面还有很长的路要走。<page>他还有很多东西要学，所以努会慢慢品尝。

original_en_text: With this quill, you can add any new areas you discover to the maps that you own. We pluck these quills from Golpeni hunted by my tribe. Their hollowed shafts make the perfect charting tool.
original_zh_text: 用这羽毛笔能把新发现的区域补到地图上。羽毛是从我们部落猎的高尔佩尼鸟身上拔的，中空的羽管最适合拿来绘图。
translated_text: This pen can be used to add a new area to the map and discover which area it belongs to. I picked up this pen from Hull's panic, and my tribe was pursuing it. Cable is a good painting tool.
secondary_translated_text: 此笔可用于在地图中添加新区域并发现其所属区域。我从赫尔的恐慌中捡起了这支笔，我的部落正在追捕它。电缆是一个很好的绘画工具。

original_en_text: Child Wielding Needle, how far our wanderings take us! The cold air here bites through our shells as true as any blade. Warm yourself by my lantern while I call. <hpage>Pharloom is a land of harsh extremes. Perhaps that is, in part, why the pilgrims have a culture of testing themselves against it so fervently.<page>Perhaps. When I first encountered them, I had little respect for the weak, rag-bundled bugs. Too cowardly to even carry a weapon!<page>But... Dondakku. Sometimes we judge too quickly. There is a subtle strength to them, though it is difficult for me to truly understand it.
original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘，咱们跑得真远！这里寒气刺骨，来灯笼边暖暖。<hpage>纺络环境真是极端，或许这也是朝圣者们测试信仰的一部分。<page>也许吧。当初觉得他们是群软蛋，连武器都不敢带！<page>但……咚嗒库！也算是我看走眼吧，他们有种我说不清的韧劲。
translated_text: The children brought needles, and our vagrants brought us back! Cold air flows through our bathroom. When I was on the phone, they warmed me with lights.<hpage>The Faroe Islands are a cruel country, which may be one reason why pilgrims are so eager to experience this culture.<page>When I first saw it, I probably didn't like these fragile reptiles.<page>more... ... Sometimes they judge too quickly and have subtle powers that are difficult to understand.
secondary_translated_text: 孩子们带来了针头，我们的流浪者带我们回来了！冷空气流经我们的浴室。当我打电话时，他们用灯光给我取暖。<hpage>法罗群岛是一个残酷的国家，这可能是朝圣者如此渴望体验这种文化的原因之一。<page>当我第一次看到它时，我可能不喜欢这些脆弱的爬行动物。<page>更多... ...有时他们判断得太快，拥有难以理解的微妙力量。

original_en_text: Ahh, the caress of this warm water on my weary limbs is welcome indeed. As soothing as a psalm, haha!<page>Will you splishy-splash in the holy bath with me, red maiden? We can sing together to aid in our rejuvenation!
original_zh_text: 泡着热水澡真舒服！比唱圣歌还解乏，哈哈！<page>要和我一起泡吗？边泡边唱歌更解乏！
translated_text: Hot water caressed my tired arm. They are very popular. Rest is like poetry. "<page>Red girl, right? Would you like to take a sacred bath with me? Let us sing together to help you recover! " "
secondary_translated_text: 热水抚摸着我疲惫的手臂。它们很受欢迎。休息就像诗歌。"<page>红女孩，对吧？你愿意和我一起洗个神圣的澡吗？让我们一起唱歌，帮助您康复！" "

original_en_text: Want yer clicky-clackies threaded nice and tight? Old Grindle will do it gladly, if you let ‘im snitch a few for hisself...
original_zh_text: 要把叮当响串稳当？格林德尔来帮你！抽点佣金就行！
translated_text: Do you want your relationship to be better and more lasting? He would have been happy if he hadn't reported directly to Old Greendale.
secondary_translated_text: 您希望你们的关系变得更好、更持久吗？如果他没有直接向老格林德尔汇报，他会很高兴。

original_en_text: D-do not judge me a doubter! The Citadel is a holy place indeed, resplendent and vast beyond my wildest hopes!<page>But yet... the grand halls ache with silence, and I see suffering in the shadows wherever I peer too deeply.<page>Fear, and pain... why were these things allowed into our paradise? Have my brothers and sisters not yet earned their holy reward?
original_zh_text: 别当我是叛信者！圣堡确实是圣地，比我想的还壮观！<page>可是……大殿里死气沉沉，角落里到处都藏着苦痛。<page>恐惧啊伤痛啊……为什么让这些脏东西进圣地？我们还不够虔诚吗？
translated_text: Please don't think I'm a skeptic. This castle is truly a sacred place, majestic and vast, beyond my wildest hopes!<page>more... ... The large living room was silent. Although he looked into the distance, he could see the pain in the shadows.<page>Fear and sadness? Why are we allowed to enter heaven? Have my brothers and sisters not received God's reward?
secondary_translated_text: 请不要认为我是一个怀疑论者。这座城堡确实是一个神圣的地方，雄伟而广阔，超出了我最疯狂的希望！<page>更多... ...大客厅里一片寂静。尽管他望向远方，但他还是能看到阴影中的痛苦。<page>恐惧和悲伤？为什么我们可以进入天堂？我的兄弟姐妹没有得到上帝的奖励吗？

original_en_text: ...Crossed weapons, sleeping of course, but shaped unlike any you’ve seen before...<page>...To travel underneath is one thing, but travelling up above may require a different sort of sight...<hpage>Sir Herald... It seems rare coincidence for us to meet in this distant land. Unless, perhaps, you followed me here?<page>...A path that meets itself is an ill portent indeed. Those who peer sideways know well enough...<page>
original_zh_text: ……崇山深谷，却非你所熟知的形态……<page>……穿行地底是一回事，但翱翔天际需另种眼界……<hpage>使者大人……在这偏远之地重逢，是巧合还是您尾随而来？<page>……道途相逢并非吉兆。小家伙还是别多嘴了……
translated_text: ... Obviously, the crossover is designed for sleep, but it's not what it seems.<page>... What happens is one thing, what happens is another.<hpage>Meeting in a distant country seems like a strange coincidence unless you follow me.<page>... Your path is a bad sign. Everyone around me who saw me.<page>
secondary_translated_text: ...显然，跨界车是为睡眠而设计的，但事实并非如此。<page>...发生的事情是一回事，发生的事情又是另一回事。<hpage>除非你跟着我，否则在遥远的国家见面似乎是一个奇怪的巧合。<page>...你的道路是一个坏兆头。我周围所有看到我的人。<page>

original_en_text: Nice little pair of rolly-rollies we got ‘ere. Sure to bring luck to any snitchin’ expedition...
translated_text: There is an interesting little trailer that brings good luck to the plaintiff's adventure.
secondary_translated_text: 有一个有趣的小预告片，为原告的冒险带来了好运。

original_en_text: ...The elements do not conspire against you. They have their own desires...<page>...When one spies a great peak, the natural inclination is to begin climbing...<page>...The little left-behind... you’ve decided, then? A companion for the journey...
original_zh_text: ……万物并非与你为敌，它们自有渴求……<page>……望见高峰，攀爬便是本能……<page>……那个被遗弃的小家伙……你决定带他同行了？……
translated_text: ... This is not a conspiracy against you.<page>... When one encounters a mountain, the natural tendency is to start climbing it.<page>...¿So, what decision did you make? Tourist Company
secondary_translated_text: ...这不是针对你的阴谋。<page>...当一个人遇到一座山时，自然的倾向是开始攀登它。<page>...¿那么，你做出了什么决定？旅游公司

original_en_text: <hpage>Feel guilt at your absence, sir, but know the end was inexorable, the outcome set, whether you remained or not.<page>Do not seek to console me, warrior... This memory is mine alone... I’ll not brook your brutish intrusion...<page>You who dare trespass this sacred chamber, ready yourself... to see us, and know us, Verdania’s rulers, together in our finest form...
original_zh_text: <hpage>无需为自己的缺席感到愧疚，结局早已注定，无关你的去留。<page>少来安慰我……战士……这是我的回忆……容不得莽夫插嘴……<page>擅闯圣殿者……准备见证翠庭国双王的最强形态吧！
translated_text: <hpage>I feel guilty for your absence. But if not, the consequences are inevitable and even fatal.<page>"Don't comfort me, soldier. "These memories are mine, and I can't stand your barbaric attacks.<page>Get ready, get ready to enter this sacred room. You look at us, you know us. "Verdanha's leaders will be with us in the best possible form.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我为你的缺席感到内疚。但如果没有，后果是不可避免的，甚至是致命的。<page>“别安慰我，士兵。“这些记忆是我的，我无法忍受你们的野蛮攻击。<page>准备好，准备好进入这个神圣的房间。你看看我们，你就了解我们。“韦尔达尼亚的领导人将以最好的状态与我们同在。

original_en_text: If you choose to rest here, I will watch over you, Child Wielding Needle. These charts require long attention, and my own sleep is far off yet.
original_zh_text: 想休息的话，我给你放哨。我暂时不睡，还得多琢磨琢磨图纸。
translated_text: If you decide to relax here, I will take care of you. These paintings require a long time to take care of, and my dream is still far away.
secondary_translated_text: 如果你决定在这里放松，我会照顾你。这些画需要很长时间来照顾，而我的梦想还很遥远。

original_en_text: Beasty, beastly, big fat beast! Strong as a boulder, or a rock at least! Let’s sing together ‘til you’re released!<page>Oh! Look here red maiden, this poor creature is all tangled up in white bindings! Surely you know a song for unsticking such stickiness?<hpage>It will take a power greater than song to break these bindings, little one. In my current diminished state even I can not cut through them.<page>Well, worry not! If something is needed, the road will bring it to us!
original_zh_text: 大块头啊大块头，壮如磐石力无穷！与我合唱放你走！<page>红衣姑娘快看！这可怜家伙被白丝缠住了！你会解缚之歌吗？<hpage>这束缚并非歌唱能解。凭我现在的气力，也斩不断这些丝线。<page>不必担心！所需之物肯定就在圣途之上！
translated_text: Beast, beast, beast! Strong as a stone, or at least strong as a stone, we will sing together until we are free.<page>Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Look, Miss Hong, this poor little thing is tied up by a white line.<hpage>Breaking this bondage requires greater power than a song, because my weakness cannot break it.<page>Okay, don't worry! If you need anything, the path will give you.
secondary_translated_text: 野兽，野兽，野兽！像石头一样坚强，或者至少像石头一样坚强，我们会一起唱歌，直到我们获得自由。<page>哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！看，洪老师，这个可怜的小东西被一条白线绑着。<hpage>打破这种束缚需要比一首歌更大的力量，因为我的弱点无法打破它。<page>好的，别担心！如果你需要什么，道路就会给你。

translated_text: The watch is in your hand.

original_en_text: Nimble bug! You abandoned the race? Surely it was only an error?<page>In the pursuit of speed all reason can ofttimes be lost, left in the wind as it were.<page>At least you seem recovered of your lapse. And surely you are eager now?<page>We must sprint on! Let us soar swift together!
original_zh_text: 怎么中途退赛？肯定是失误了对吧？<page>专注追求速度经常会忘记思考。<page>看来你已经调整好了，继续吧？<page>让我们一起继续冲刺！
translated_text: This was a wise mistake! Have you given up the game? It was just a mistake, wasn't it?“<page>In the process of seeking speed, the entire mind often disappears, as if it is blown away by the wind.<page>At least he recovered from his mistake.<page>We're going to sprint, let's go!
secondary_translated_text: 这是一个明智的错误！你放弃游戏了吗？这只是一个错误，不是吗？“<page>在追求速度的过程中，整个心灵往往会消失，就像被风吹走一样。<page>至少他从错误中恢复过来了。<page>我们要冲刺了，出发吧！

translated_text: Selling gasoline.

original_en_text: Child Wielding Needle. These are stale roads, ill-fitted for warriors such as ourselves.<page>There is fair combat here against the roach-beasts and their keepers, but the air is sickly and the water writhes with parasites.<hpage>This environment is harsh indeed, though life seems to adapt itself to many hardships. Do you believe your master travelled these roads?<page>I had thought not at first, but upon closer search I found the fragments of a trail winding through these fetid ruins.<page>Perhaps she saw something here that I did not? Her senses are often keen where mine are clouded.
original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘。这路太安稳了，配不上咱们战士。<page>打打蟑螂和饲者还行，但空气污浊，水里全是寄生虫。<hpage>环境糟糕，但生命总能适应。你觉得你的导师来过这儿？<page>本来觉得不会，结果在废墟里找到了些许踪迹。<page>难道她发现了什么我没注意到的东西？她的眼光总是比我毒辣。
translated_text: The road is old and not suitable for soldiers like us.<page>The battle between the cockroach and its keeper is right, but the air is painful and the water is full of parasites.<hpage>Although the environment is very difficult, life seems to have adapted to many challenges. Do you think you have embarked on this path?<page>I didn't believe it at first, but when I looked closely, I noticed a winding path in the smell of the ruins.<page>If my feelings are blind, yours are often sharp.
secondary_translated_text: 路很旧，不适合我们这样的士兵。<page>蟑螂和它的饲养员之间的战斗是正确的，但空气很痛苦，水中充满了寄生虫。<hpage>尽管环境非常困难，但生活似乎已经适应了许多挑战。你认为你已经走上了这条路吗？<page>一开始我并不相信，但当我仔细观察时，我发现废墟的气味中有一条蜿蜒的小路。<page>如果我的感觉是盲目的，那么你的感觉往往是敏锐的。

original_en_text: Hold there, sister! A great beast stalks this land, swooping and screeching like an ill-mannered tyrant!<page>Zaza has been following the creature’s scent, and now I’m sure we’re almost upon it! We’re so close my whiskers are bristling!<page>Such a beast is worthy quarry for the valiant, aye? What say you, shall we hunt the creature together?
original_zh_text: 姐妹留步！附近藏着一只大家伙，俯冲尖啸，不好对付！<page>扎扎一路闻着它的味道呢，肯定就在附近！我的胡子都翘起来了！<page>那是个难得的好对手。怎么说，要不要联手干掉它？
translated_text: The huge beast jumped to the ground and fell like a screaming tyrant!<page>Zaza had been chasing the creature's scent, but it would soon disappear. As we approached, I cut off my beard.<page>Isn't such a savage beast worth dying for a brave man? Yeah, right? What do you think of these animals?
secondary_translated_text: 巨兽跳到地上，像尖叫的暴君一样倒下！<page>扎扎一直在追逐这个生物的气味，但它很快就会消失。当我们走近时，我剪掉了胡子。<page>为了一个勇敢的人，这样一只野蛮的野兽难道不值得去死吗？是的，对吧？你觉得这些动物怎么样？

original_en_text: Many of Pharloom’s bugs have useful equipment and items to trade. It would do you well to keep track of their locations with this pin.<br><br>These pins will mark vendors on your map.
original_zh_text: 达罗穆有很多虫带着好货，最好记下他们的位置。<br><br>这些图钉能够标记商贩位置。
translated_text: Many Faloma insects have useful equipment and items. Monitoring the situation with the help of the iris is a good thing.<br><br>Bars represent sellers on the map.
secondary_translated_text: 许多法洛马昆虫都有有用的设备和物品。借助虹膜监控情况是一件好事。<br><br>酒吧代表地图上的卖家。

original_en_text: Basic tool’o the job, here. Throw your big needle and scratch shinies straight off your target’s shell!
original_zh_text: 干我们这行的基础道具，直接从目标身上把宝贝钩下来！
translated_text: Use a large needle to capture light directly from the mirror housing!
secondary_translated_text: 使用大针直接从镜壳捕获光线！

translated_text: Moss Map

original_en_text: ...Oh. Wyrm child. No surprise it’s you who meets me here.<page>Following me are you? Or calling me? It is true I would not have sought the lands below if not for your grand actions within them.<page>But now, having journeyed their breadth, what singular sights I beheld... Flaming lakes, tangled woods, caves consumed by sand and frost...<page>Remarkable things all, though given their void claimed state it seems you and I may be the last to hold those memories.<hpage>I cannot allow that outcome, Herald. I act now to save that place, both for myself and for those bugs still alive within.<hpage>As one who has seen so much, tell me simply, do you believe my efforts in vain?<page>Me? Certainly you can ask, but I cannot provide good answer. I’ve no mind for outcomes. Always my vision is too clouded by the present.<page>Only the journey... the now. For myself, that is the purpose, and as far as my sight can see.<page>If any other could come to understand that state, Wyrm child, I suspect it may be you... <page>Though maybe not yet, not this present, hmmm? Maybe in a future far, when your actions might hail me so again?<page>Alas, from these quaking caves it is past time I made my swift exit. Ours each may be long and winding roads, but I hope you too come to know the many joys upon the path...
original_zh_text: ……哦。沃姆后裔。在此相遇倒也不意外。<page>尾随还是召唤？若非你在地底闹出大动静，我本不会来此。<page>如今游历四方，得见何等奇景……熔岩湖、缠藤林、冰封沙穴……<page>叹为观止，然虚空侵蚀之下，唯你我留存此间记忆。<hpage>我无法坐视，使者大人。此刻行动既为自救，也为庇佑残存生灵。<hpage>作为见证者，请您直言相告，我等努力是否为徒劳？<page>问我？答不上来。未来迷雾重重，我目光唯见当下。<page>唯有旅程……此时此刻。于我而言，此即意义，也即我目之能视。<page>沃姆之女，或许唯你能懂此心境……<page>也许尚非此时？待你功成之日再唤我来？<page>唉，该离开这震颤洞穴。前路漫漫，愿你亦能领略沿途风光……
translated_text: ...¡Oh, devil! I'm not surprised here.<page>Would you like to come with me? Or are you calling me? If it weren't for your miracle on earth, I would never have found that land.<page>But now, as I walk through the vast world, I see some strange landscapes: warm lakes, intertwined forests, caves surrounded by sand and ice.<page>Despite all these surprises, despite your claims to be in a state of emptiness, you and I are the last people to have this memory.<hpage>I tried to save this place. This is for me and for the insects that live there.<hpage>Do you think my efforts as an acquaintance are in vain?<page>What are you doing? You can ask a question, but you can't give a good answer. No matter what the outcome is, my opinion is always wrong.<page>As far as I know, one trip, that's my goal.<page>Veron's son, if anyone knows the situation, I think it's you.<page>This may not be true, but it is not a gift. Actually? In the distant future, his actions will once again be respected by me. "<page>It's time to travel through this terrible cave. It may be long and tortuous, but enjoy it.
secondary_translated_text: ...¡哦，魔鬼！我对此并不感到惊讶。<page>你愿意和我一起去吗？还是你在打电话给我？如果不是你在地球上的奇迹，我永远不会找到那片土地。<page>但现在，当我走过广阔的世界时，我看到了一些奇怪的风景：温暖的湖泊、交织的森林、被沙子和冰包围的洞穴。<page>尽管有这些惊喜，尽管你声称自己处于空虚的状态，但你和我是最后一个拥有这种记忆的人。<hpage>我试图拯救这个地方。这是为了我和生活在那里的昆虫。<hpage>你认为我作为熟人的努力是徒劳的吗？<page>你在干什么？你可以问一个问题，但你不能给出一个好的答案。无论结果如何，我的观点总是错误的。<page>据我所知，一次旅行，这就是我的目标。<page>维隆的儿子，如果有人知道情况，我想就是你。<page>这可能不是真的，但它不是礼物。实际上？在遥远的将来，他的行为将再次受到我的尊重。”<page>是时候穿越这个可怕的洞穴了。它可能漫长而曲折，但要享受它。

original_en_text: You would fight alone, sister? You would be undefeatable with me by your side! And Zaza also! You need only ask, and our hornlance would be yours.
original_zh_text: 你想单打独斗？有我和扎扎助阵肯定能百战百胜！需要帮忙就开口，我们的长枪自会跟上！
translated_text: Sister, are you alone? "If I were with you, you would be invincible. Our hatred is yours, our hatred is yours, our hatred is yours.
secondary_translated_text: 姐姐，你一个人吗？“如果我和你在一起，你就是无敌的。我们的仇恨是你的，我们的仇恨是你的，我们的仇恨是你的。

original_en_text: ...Do they realise it would only be the beginning? If they cleave themselves free, they would need to find their way anew...
original_zh_text: ……他们可知这只是开端？即使能得解脱，众生仍需寻觅新途……
translated_text: ...¿Do you know this is just the beginning? When we get rid of slavery, we must find a way back.
secondary_translated_text: ...¿你知道这只是开始吗？当我们摆脱奴隶制时，我们必须找到一条回头路。

original_en_text: My hopes go with you, red maiden. They will follow you into the deepest darkness, and beyond!
original_zh_text: 我的希望与您同在，红衣姑娘。它将随您深入至暗，直至彼岸！
translated_text: "My hope is with you, Miss Red. They will follow you into the depths of darkness.
secondary_translated_text: “我的希望与你同在，红小姐。他们会跟随你进入黑暗的深渊。

original_en_text: Fierce red-shells nest across these wide caverns. Battle with them is most intense. Impressive are the warriors of Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 红壳怪占满荒野洞穴，它们是个好对手。这里的生物也比髓骨地更凶残。
translated_text: Lighter shells nest in large caves. Our struggle with them is fierce. The pharaoh's army was impressive.
secondary_translated_text: 较轻的贝壳在大洞穴中筑巢。我们与他们的斗争是激烈的。法老的军队令人印象深刻。

translated_text: Deep Dock Station

original_en_text: <hpage>Even if only your shadow remains, to release your mother’s grip my blade would see it slain.<page>Then why hold, even this moment? Surely terror hasn’t suddenly claimed your hardened heart?<page>Take the final plunge, spider. Join us in my drowning palace, and let oblivion swallow us all.<hpage>Oblivion may take you, child. My own life, I shall not sacrifice.<hpage>I have survived the fury of your land. I have borne its barbs and its blades, and I have seen wonder behind its dangers.<hpage>But always, child, I remain a daughter of Hallownest. And the void below all things, that darkness I will fear no longer...
original_zh_text: <hpage>就算你只剩一道暗影，我也会斩断你母亲的丝线。<page>那还犹豫什么？难道你害怕了？<page>跳下来啊，小蜘蛛！和我一同沉溺，让虚无吞噬我们！<hpage>虚无或许能吞噬你，但我绝不献祭自己。<hpage>我熬过了纺络的无数荆棘，也在危机中见证过奇迹。<hpage>但我永远是圣巢之女。对万物之底的虚空……再无畏惧！
translated_text: <hpage>If the shadow still exists, my sword will kill her and release my mother from slavery.<page>Why insist now? Can fear suddenly get rid of a cold heart?<page>May you be with me, forgotten in my sunken palace.<hpage>"My child, even if you forget my life, I will not die. " "<hpage>I have endured the anger of your people, I have endured thorns and swords, I have seen the miracle behind their dangers.<hpage>"My child, I will always be Kenneth's daughter. In this emptiness, I am no longer afraid of the darkness.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>如果影子仍然存在，我的剑会杀死她，并将我的母亲从奴隶制中释放出来。<page>为什么现在坚持？恐惧能使一颗冰冷的心突然消失吗？<page>愿你和我在一起，被遗忘在我沉没的宫殿里。<hpage>“我的孩子，即使你忘记了我的命，我也不会死。" "<hpage>我忍受了你们人民的愤怒，我忍受了荆棘和刀剑，我看到了他们危险背后的奇迹。<hpage>“我的孩子，我永远是肯尼思的女儿。在这空虚中，我不再害怕黑暗。

original_en_text: Oooh! Greedy are you? Mean to poor li’l snitchbugs like us? Won’t survive out there without our secrets, oh no no!
original_zh_text: 小气鬼！欺负老实虫？没我们的秘密帮衬你在外头活不过三天！
translated_text: Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Are you your teacher? Is this a bad thing for reporters like me? I can't live without secrets.
secondary_translated_text: 哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！你是你的老师吗？这对我这样的记者来说是一件坏事吗？没有秘密我就活不下去。

original_en_text: Our last race was grand, yes? But I see now I set too mild a challenge for one as spritely as yourself!<page>I prepared only to race, but you arrived bringing destiny! In you my wish may finally be granted, the barriers of speed broken wide!<page>Are you prepared nimble bug? The time is upon us. The final test for the swift and spry!
original_zh_text: 上回比赛还不错吧？但我还是低估你了！<page>原本只想跑个痛快，但你说不定能实现我突破速度极限的愿望！<page>灵巧的虫子，时候到了！准备好突破速度的桎梏了吗？
translated_text: This game is really cool, isn't it? That's not how it works, is it? However, I find the challenge you pose to people as dynamic as you are too gentle.<page>I was preparing for the game, but fate gave it to me! In you, my wish has been realized, and the wall of speed has been broken.<page>Are you ready? It's time for the final exam.
secondary_translated_text: 这个游戏真的很酷，不是吗？事情不是这样运作的，不是吗？然而，我发现你对人们提出的挑战既充满活力，又太温和了。<page>我正在为比赛做准备，但命运却给了我！在你身上，我的愿望实现了，速度之墙也被打破了。<page>你准备好了吗？期末考试时间到了。

original_en_text: Miss grown-up has hunted much, so soon is time for Nuu to venture out, she thinks. Keep your sights keen, for to meet in the wilds would be a delight!
original_zh_text: 大姐姐这么能干，努努也该出门探险了！期待在荒野偶遇哦！
translated_text: According to him, it's time to take the risk, as adults and young women are already on a big hunt. When you open your eyes, you will be happy to find it in nature!
secondary_translated_text: 据他说，现在是冒险的时候了，因为成年人和年轻女性已经在进行大规模狩猎。当你睁开眼睛时，你会很高兴在大自然中找到它！

original_en_text: O-hoho! You’re lookin’ a little stuck there! What a pity!<hpage>Are you too a prisoner here, small bug? If we ally our efforts, escape could be made that much easier.<page>Hoho, you jestin’? There ain’t no allies in prison! Just throw yourself against the walls in there while I go sniffin’ for goodies!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！锁住了吧？真可怜！<hpage>又见面了，小毛贼。你也被关起来了？我们联手的话，越狱容易得多。<page>哦嚯嚯！想得美，监狱哪有盟友！你撞墙玩去吧，我找宝贝去咯！
translated_text: Oh, Oh, Oh! They seem a little incompatible.<hpage>"Bagh, you know? "Are you a prisoner? "They make their escape easier.<page>What is this? Are you kidding me? There are no allies in prison, and when you go to smell the smell, you hit the wall!
secondary_translated_text: 哦，哦，哦！他们似乎有点不相容。<hpage>“巴格，你知道吗？“你是囚犯吗？“他们让逃跑更容易。<page>这是什么？你在开玩笑吗？监狱里没有盟友，当你去闻气味时，你就撞到了墙上！

original_en_text: A scroll detailing the scents and tastes of Pharloom’s various bugs and beasts.
original_zh_text: 这本册子记录着纺络虫兽的气味与口感。
translated_text: The wheels depict the various smells and smells of insects and animals in autumn.
secondary_translated_text: 轮子描绘了秋天昆虫和动物的各种气味和气味。

original_en_text: Miss grown-up! Nuu had fear that the awful rumblings of the world or sticky black threads had snatched you away from her!<hpage>I have survived, Nuu, and shall fight on while my strength remains.<hpage>The kingdom has grown darkly dangerous, but this hearth-home seems to still provide some safety. I suggest you remain here for now.<page>Of course! Nuu shall stay inside. The sickening sense of those twisted threads has spoilt the joy of my venturings.<page>You though, miss grown-up... is now not the perfect time to fully complete our journal?<page>The world-rumblings will surely have scared up many creatures from their hiding places! So go and hunt, and show sweet Nuu what you learn!
original_zh_text: 大姐姐！还以为你被地震或黑灾吃掉啦！<hpage>就差一点，不过我没事。<hpage>外面愈发混乱，但这还算安全。你暂时别出去。<page>努努才不出去！那些扭曲的丝线太讨厌了，毁了探险的兴致！<page>但大姐姐……现在不正是完善记录的好时机？<page>地震肯定把怪物都吓出洞了！快去打猎给努努开眼界吧！
translated_text: Your Majesty, Madam! He was afraid that the terrible noise of the world and the black line on the necklace would take him away from her!<hpage>As long as I am alive, I will fight hard.<hpage>The kingdom is becoming increasingly dangerous, but chimneys still seem to provide security. I strongly recommend you stay here for a while.<page>Yeah, no! The unpleasant feeling caused by the twisted lines undermines the joy of adventure.<page>Isn't this the best time to write a diary?<page>The end of the world will surely scare many creatures, and they will not be able to hide. So go hunting and show us the beautiful NO you learned!
secondary_translated_text: 陛下，夫人！他担心世界的可怕噪音和项链上的黑线会把他从她身边带走！<hpage>只要我还活着，我就会努力奋斗。<hpage>这个王国变得越来越危险，但烟囱似乎仍然提供安全保障。我强烈建议您在这里住一段时间。<page>是的，不！扭曲的线条造成的不愉快感觉破坏了冒险的乐趣。<page>这不是写日记的最佳时机吗？<page>世界末日肯定会吓到许多生物，他们将无法躲藏。所以去打猎吧，向我们展示你学到的美丽的NO！

original_en_text: Why spurn a little duel, sister? Surely it would put us in good stead for the trials ahead!<hpage>If we were to duel it would doubtless be illuminating. Unfortunately, I lack the time for such frivolity. Farewell, sirs.
original_zh_text: 干嘛拒绝呢，切磋下嘛！就当战前热身！<hpage>切磋的好处……对你更多。我没空陪你玩，告辞。
translated_text: Why give up a little fight? This will facilitate future testing.<hpage>If you want to fight it, this is very exciting. Unfortunately, we don't have time to discuss these issues. Goodbye, sir.
secondary_translated_text: 为什么要放弃一点战斗？这将有利于未来的测试。<hpage>如果你想与之抗争，这是非常令人兴奋的。不幸的是，我们没有时间讨论这些问题。再见，先生。

original_en_text: <hpage>Cowards. Here you hide, even as you cause your own land’s demise.
original_zh_text: <hpage>懦夫。你们亲手葬送自己的土地，却躲在此处。
translated_text: <hpage>Cowards are hiding, but they are destroying their land.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>懦夫在躲藏，但他们正在摧毁他们的土地。

original_en_text: Ka, va! Your shell is ridden with those gruesome maggots. It was a foolish choice of yours to swim in their sickly pools.<hpage>This was by no means desired, Shakra. For now, I think it best you remain at limb’s length. <hpage>I shall not abide this infestation long. By Silk or by rest I shall soon see myself cleansed.
original_zh_text: 咔呀！你的壳上爬满了恶心的蛆虫。在那些毒水池子里游泳真是太蠢了。<hpage>我也不想这样，沙克拉。你最好离远点。<hpage>我不会让这些蛆虫待太久的，靠灵丝或休整自会清除。
translated_text: Wait, wait! Its shell is filled with terrible insects. Swimming in the pool is a stupid choice.<hpage>Sarah, this is not what I want.<hpage>Such attacks will not last long. If the silk breaks or breaks, it will be removed quickly.
secondary_translated_text: 等等，等等！它的壳里充满了可怕的昆虫。在泳池里游泳是一个愚蠢的选择。<hpage>莎拉，这不是我想要的。<hpage>此类袭击不会持续太久。如果丝绸断裂或折断，就会迅速取出。

original_en_text: Nimble bug! You seem to have lost your way upon the course. Surely it was only an error? You already seem recovered of your lapse.<page>You are eager to run again, yes, yes? Let us soar swift together!
original_zh_text: 看来你迷路了，肯定是小失误！<page>调整好了？那就再比一次吧！
translated_text: This was a wise mistake! I think I got lost, it was just a mistake, wasn't it? He seemed to recover from his mistake.<page>Do you want to run again? Come on, come on!
secondary_translated_text: 这是一个明智的错误！我想我迷路了，这只是一个错误，不是吗？他似乎从错误中恢复过来了。<page>你想再次参选吗？来吧来吧

original_en_text: ...One can visit the past, but then memories become contradictory...<page>...When the call rings out again, will you let your previous actions cloud your vision?<page>...By claw, by voice... History always rises to meet us...
original_zh_text: ……即便往昔可以重访，但记忆终将悖逆……<page>……当唤声再起，你会让昔日的抉择蒙蔽双眼么？<page>……以爪为刃，以声为引……历史永远不会等候我们……
translated_text: ... People can look back, but their memories are contradictory.<page>... When your phone rings again, are you deceived by your past actions?<page>... Through our nails, through our sound, history always stands up to welcome us.
secondary_translated_text: ...人们可以回顾过去，但他们的记忆是矛盾的。<page>...当你的手机再次响起时，你是否被过去的行为欺骗了？<page>...通过我们的指甲，通过我们的声音，历史总是站出来欢迎我们。

original_en_text: Oooh, ma. Miss grown-up, you deny poor Nuu? So sour!<page>Think of all the delectable learnings can we dig out of the creatures living here!
original_zh_text: 哎呀，大姐姐拒绝努努？好狠心！<page>想想能从这些生物身上挖出多少美味的知识啊！
translated_text: Mommy! Would you reject the poor? It's too sour.<page>Think of the interesting things you can learn from the creatures that live here!
secondary_translated_text: 妈妈！你会拒绝穷人吗？太酸了。<page>想想你可以从生活在这里的生物身上学到什么有趣的东西！

translated_text: Explosive soil (Explosive Terrain)
secondary_translated_text: 爆炸性土壤（爆炸性地形）

original_en_text: But wait! Before you depart. Your exceptional skill requires an equally fine reward!<page>This shining shard of ancient mask is yours! Take it. Cherish it. And know, you shall forever have my thanks.
original_zh_text: 等等，临走前再送个配得上你的宝贝！<page>这块远古面甲碎片归你了！谢谢你，希望你永远铭记这场较量！
translated_text: Wait, wait. Talented people need to be rewarded before leaving.<page>The mask is yours, you must accept it, care about it, and you will always be grateful for it.
secondary_translated_text: 等等等等有才华的人在离开之前需要得到奖励。<page>面具是你的，你必须接受它，关心它，你会永远感激它。

original_en_text: This is a fine shiny-shiny, ain’t it? Those dirty old raggedies like to carry these around, and we like to snitch ‘em away when we can! O-ho-ho!
original_zh_text: 亮晶晶的小玩意！那些破烂朝圣者喜欢带这个，就从他们身上顺的！哦嚯嚯！
translated_text: Dirty old people love to wear them and want to blame them as much as possible! Oh, Oh, Oh!
secondary_translated_text: 肮脏的老人喜欢戴它们，并且想尽可能地责怪它们！哦，哦，哦！

original_en_text: Ooooh ma, you make Nuu so happy! Hunt down the creatures of this land, and record them in this scroll!
original_zh_text: 哇大姐姐你真好！猎杀这里的生物，把见闻记在本子上！
translated_text: Dear mother, you have made us very happy.
secondary_translated_text: 亲爱的妈妈，您让我们非常高兴。

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings Shakra, in these drifts consumed by crust and sand.<hpage>These caverns have returned to nature, but I see evidence of bold structures buried throughout.<page>The shells of their builders rest in a tower above. A grand tribe they seemed, and strong fighters I’m sure. Alas, they exist now only as hardened husks.<page>Lament, Child Wielding Needle! We lived too late to match their claws.
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，沙克拉。这里已被沙岩吞没了。<hpage>洞穴虽然复归原貌，但岩层里似乎埋着宏伟建筑。<page>建造者的尸壳堆在上面的塔里呢。当年肯定是强盛部落，也有不少勇士。可惜都只剩下空壳了。<page>可惜啊，使针的小姑娘，我们生不逢时，无缘与他们较量。
translated_text: <hpage>Among these swimmers absorbed by tree bark and sand was a beautiful Sacayar tribute.<hpage>Although the cave has returned to nature, evidence of the bold structures hidden in the cave can still be seen.<page>The architects stood on the top of the tower, they were like a great tribe, and I think they were powerful warriors." It's like a shell.<page>Poor needle, your nails are too late.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>在这些被树皮和沙子吸引的游泳者中，有一个美丽的萨卡亚致敬。<hpage>尽管洞穴已经回归自然，但仍然可以看到隐藏在洞穴中的大胆结构的证据。<page>建筑师们站在塔顶，他们就像一个伟大的部落，我认为他们是强大的战士。“它就像一个壳。<page>可怜的针，你的指甲已经太晚了。

original_en_text: Don’t despair, pilgrim frieeeee-eeend,<br>Lift your sight and raise your voice!<br>Have no fear, pilgrim truuuuu-uuuuue,<br>Believing is a happy choice!<page>Hoy there! Aren’t these fields marvellous? And above us are the bountiful moors, where every pilgrim can fill their belly!<hpage>These hot fields are a wonder indeed, but hunters prowl the long grass. Playing your instrument will only alert them to your presence.<page>Well then, alert them I shall! For where many gather, great songs are sung!
original_zh_text: 莫沮丧啊朝圣友，<br>昂首放歌莫踌躇！<page>别畏惧啊同道虫，<br>心怀信念最幸福！<page>看这原野多壮美啊！上方沼地还能让每个朝圣者饱腹！<hpage>原野虽好，长草中却有猎手潜伏。奏乐只会暴露行踪。<page>暴露又何妨！聚在一块，正好一起高歌！
translated_text: "Don't worry, my pilgrim.<br>Open your eyes and raise your voice!<br>Don't be afraid, pilgrim Truuu@u<br>I think this is a happy choice!<page>Good morning, huh? How is this place? Above us is a fertile desert where pilgrims can fill their ships.<hpage>The warm fields are a real miracle, but hunters wander through the long bushes, playing instruments, just remembering their presence.<page>I will remember you. "Many people sang a beautiful song!
secondary_translated_text: “别担心，我的朝圣者。<br>睁开眼睛，提高声音！<br>不要害怕，朝圣者Truuu@u<br>我认为这是一个幸福的选择！<page>早上好，嗯？这个地方怎么样？我们上方是一片肥沃的沙漠，朝圣者可以在那里装满他们的船只。<hpage>温暖的田野是一个真正的奇迹，但猎人们在长长的灌木丛中漫步，演奏着乐器，只记得他们的存在。<page>我会记住你。“很多人唱了一首美妙的歌！

original_en_text: <hpage>Some pilgrims have made an encampment in a safer place than this, high on the other side of the Citadel.<hpage>They would surely allow you to stay there, if you could resist causing them mischief.<page>An en-camp-ment, eh? Sounds like a jolly place for old Grindle! Mayhaps we’ll have a sniff around later.<page>That’s a good tip, that. And you’ve just done given it to us for free! O-hoho, head fulla muck you got!
original_zh_text: <hpage>圣堡另一边的高处，朝圣者们新建了安全营地。<hpage>你老实点的话，他们应该能留你。<page>朝圣者的营地？听着像个能偷光光的好地方！<page>这情报不赖，还是白送的！你个蠢脑袋！
translated_text: <hpage>Some pilgrims camp on the other side of the castle, which is safer there than here.<hpage>If you play with me, they'll let me stay.<page>What about summer camp? Looks like a happy old place Grindle! Bye, girl.<page>This is a beautiful memory, you pass it on for free! There is shit in my head.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>一些朝圣者在城堡的另一边扎营，那里比这里安全。<hpage>如果你和我一起玩，他们就会让我留下来。<page>夏令营怎么样？看起来像一个快乐的老地方Grindle！再见，女孩。<page>这是一段美好的回忆，您免费传承下去！我脑子里有屎。

original_en_text: Well well! Seems I won the last of your rosaries. Luck is granted to the faithful, it is sung, so I must be very faithful indeed.<page>If you happen on any more rosaries though, I’d be well happy to play you again.
original_zh_text: 哎呀！赢光你的念珠了。都说运气眷顾虔诚者，看来我够虔诚。<page>等你再带着念珠的时候，我很乐意跟你再玩几局。
translated_text: You have this! I understand! I got the last rose. With faith and good luck songs, I must be loyal. "<page>When I return to Rosario, I want to play with him again.
secondary_translated_text: 你有这个！我明白了！我得到了最后一朵玫瑰。有了信仰和好运歌曲，我必须忠诚。"<page>当我回到罗萨里奥时，我想再次和他一起踢球。

translated_text: Marking metal pencil

original_en_text: <hpage>Already, I have cut down many of this lands inhabitants, but I agree, documenting those creatures is a worthwhile undertaking.<hpage>If time still permits, I shall do as you wish.<page>Ma! How wonderful for Nuu! Go now! Hunt, and prey, and begin our learning!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我的确已斩杀这片土地上的许多住民，但记录这些生物是值得的。<hpage>若时间允许，我会尽力帮你。<page>好呀！努努太高兴啦！去吧！狩猎吧，掠食吧，开始我们的研究吧！
translated_text: <hpage>I have killed many residents of this land, but I agree that documenting these creatures is something worth doing.<hpage>If I had time, I would do what you like.<page>Mommy! Enjoying it is wonderful. Come on, come on! Hunting, hunting, teaching.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我杀死了这片土地上的许多居民，但我同意记录这些生物是值得做的事情。<hpage>如果我有时间，我会做你喜欢的事。<page>妈妈！享受它真是太棒了。来吧来吧狩猎、狩猎、教学。

original_en_text: Hoho, free at last! Locked up in here much too long, we was. Nasty place to keep a poor little snitchbug like Grindle.<page>Hoy, you’re smellin’ fancy! You got some pockets under your cloak? Hidin’ away some goodies for us to pilfer?<hpage>Beware your greed, thief. You’d be dead before your claw reached my cloak.<page>O-hoho! Never mind then, bully. Plenty of tasties lying around for us down here. We smells ‘em!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！终于自由啦！这破牢房关了格林德尔大爷太久啦！<page>你身上有股阔气味儿！斗篷里藏啥好东西了？<hpage>管好你的爪子，小偷。碰到我斗篷前你就会没命。<page>哎哟！开个玩笑嘛！底下好东西够多了，犯不着冒险！
translated_text: Finally free! This is a great place to educate whistleblowers like Greendale.<page>Hey, how smelly! There is a pocket under the jacket that hides good things you can steal.<hpage>Greedy thief, you were dead before your fingernails touched my coat.<page>Oh, Oh! A lot of delicious things are waiting for you. I can smell it!
secondary_translated_text: 终于自由了！这是教育像格林德尔这样的举报人的好地方。<page>嘿，好臭啊！夹克下面有一个口袋，可以隐藏你可以偷的好东西。<hpage>贪婪的小偷，你的指甲还没碰到我的外套，你就死了。<page>哦，哦！很多好吃的东西在等着你。我能闻到！

translated_text: Shell Map (English version)

original_en_text: <hpage>Your master has been found, Shakra. Your task in these lands is finished. Will you now return to your tribe? <page>I shall not return, Hornet Wielding Needle... I cannot. To leave my tribe’s nest-plains, that journey has only one direction. <page>This has always been our way, our long leaving, for those few who survive till age seeks to claim their shell, and those fewer who choose to send them on.<page>But these lands, Pharloom... My nest-plains I once saw so grand, now they become small. A place for birth, and growing, but a place too narrow to live a bug’s life full.
original_zh_text: <hpage>既然你已经找到导师，任务完成，打算回部落吗？<page>回不去了……离开部落只有一条路可走。<page>这是我们传统，我们的远行。活够了的年长者自行出走，少数选择送行的亲属也不能再回。<page>从前觉得部落很大，但到了纺络，才知道部落有多小。那是我出生、成长的地方，但容不下虫活一辈子。
translated_text: <hpage>"Chakra, the master found him. Our mission on earth has been accomplished. Do you want to go back to the tribe?<page>I will not go back to the nest. I can't, sir. I will leave my tribal nest and enter the plains. "<page>We were separated, separated for a long time. Some of the living people wanted to give the body back to them, so they decided to give it to them.<page>The pharaohs 'people once saw my nests in the Great Plains, but now they are getting smaller and smaller. This is where you were born and raised, but it's too small for insects to fully survive.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>“脉轮，大师找到了他。我们在地球上的使命已经完成。你想回到部落吗？<page>我不会回到巢穴。我不能，先生。我要离开部落巢穴，进入平原。"<page>我们分开了，分开了很长一段时间。有些活着的人想把尸体还给他们，所以他们决定把尸体还给他们。<page>法老的人民曾经在大平原看到过我的巢穴，但现在它们变得越来越小。这是你出生和长大的地方，但它太小了，昆虫无法完全生存。

original_en_text: This giant, old ant... Her death seems recent, but her presence here... <page>Was it her? Could it be? The strength that sustained these caves? If so, what will happen now?<hpage>They will wither and fade... And you may sadly know it was my needle that brought her end.<page>You, miss? But why? Why destroy something so vital? <hpage>It is a difficult thing to explain simply... Her strength was needed, what was left, to cut Pharloom free of its black thread threat. It was a savage act, no doubt, but the reason was just.<hpage>Know, in time, these caves may see opportunity to regrow, flourish even, though that rebirth is itself a task enormous... longer than a lifetime, many lifetimes.<hpage>For that task to succeed, it will fall to bugs like you to sow the first seeds.
original_zh_text: 这只巨型古蚁才刚死不久……但她的存在……<page>难道是她？是她在维持这里的生态？……但既然她死了，接下来会怎么样？<hpage>会枯萎，并消逝……而她是死在我针下。<page>你？为什么？为什么要杀掉这么关键的存在？<hpage>这说来话长……我需要她的力量来斩断黑灾诅咒。这虽然残忍，但有必要。<hpage>假以时日，这些洞穴或许能重生、繁盛……但需几代虫的努力。<hpage>这份重任，就要靠你这样的小虫播撒下第一颗种子了。
translated_text: Death seems to have occurred recently, but it is here.<page>Is that you? Yeah, right? What forces support this cave? If so, what will happen in the future?<hpage>They disappeared, they disappeared, and unfortunately, my needle killed her.<page>"Is that you, miss? "Why? Are you looking for something so important?<hpage>You need your strength to eliminate the threat of Black Line Farm, which is difficult to explain simply. There is no doubt that this was barbaric behavior, but the reasons are obvious.<hpage>Over time, the cave sees an opportunity to grow and prosper again, but regeneration can be a difficult task.<hpage>If you want to succeed, you must rely on insects like you to plant the first seed.
secondary_translated_text: 死亡似乎是最近发生的，但它就在这里。<page>是你吗？是的，对吧？是什么力量支撑着这个洞穴？如果是这样，将来会发生什么？<hpage>他们消失了，他们消失了，不幸的是，我的针杀了她。<page>“是你吗，小姐？“为什么？您正在寻找如此重要的东西吗？<hpage>你需要你的力量来消除黑线农场的威胁，这很难简单解释。毫无疑问，这是野蛮的行为，但原因是显而易见的。<hpage>随着时间的推移，洞穴看到了再次成长和繁荣的机会，但再生可能是一项艰巨的任务。<hpage>如果你想成功，就必须依靠像你这样的昆虫来播下第一颗种子。

original_en_text: <page=M>Hold it, Old One! That intruder writhing within your shell... <page=S>Our ritual ain’t gonna work while that cruel creature’s present. We’d be tugging at its memories as much as your own.<hpage>Then free me of the affliction. Surely you have the skill?<page=S>Not for this! Our power’s all of soul and that thing’s all physical. You’re gonna need more traditional tools of healing.<page=B>Seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out into those soaked moors, last I heard.<page=B>She’d have the tools for the task, and the cunning to have survived till now.
original_zh_text: <page=C>慢着！古老者，您壳里那扭动的异物……<page=S>有这东西在，仪式会同时拽出它的记忆。<hpage>那就替我除了它，你们不是擅长各种法术吗？<page=S>治不了！我们擅灵魂之术，这东西却是实体。您得去找传统医具。<page=B>去灰沼找被钟心镇放逐的小雅纳碧，听说她在那片湿地里苟活。<page=B>她有工具，也足够机灵，肯定能活到现在。
translated_text: <page=M>Waiting for the elderly. The killer hanged himself on the shell.<page=S>If a violent creature appears, your consciousness will stop working and you will regain your memory, just as you will regain your memory.<hpage>To get me out of my pain, you need these skills, right? Actually?<page=S>All power comes from the soul, all power comes from the body.<page=B>She sought refuge, looking for Balhart, and as far as I know, she was driven out of the humid desert.<page=B>He has the tools to fulfill his mission and the cunning to survive in the present.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>等待老人。凶手在贝壳上上吊自杀。<page=S>如果出现暴力生物，你的意识就会停止工作，你就会恢复记忆，就像你会恢复记忆一样。<hpage>为了让我摆脱痛苦，你需要这些技能，对吧？实际上？<page=S>一切的力量都来自灵魂，一切的力量都来自身体。<page=B>她寻求庇护，寻找巴尔哈特，据我所知，她被赶出了潮湿的沙漠。<page=B>他拥有完成使命的工具和在当下生存的狡猾。

original_en_text: When travelling in unfriendly lands, it is important to remember safe places to camp.<br><br>These pins will mark benches and other rest spots on your map.
original_zh_text: 在险地旅行要记好安全营地。<br><br>这些图钉能够标记长椅和休息点。
translated_text: When traveling in hostile countries, it is important to remember to camp safely.<br><br>This bar chart represents a series of maps and other areas.
secondary_translated_text: 在敌对国家旅行时，记住安全露营很重要。<br><br>该条形图表示一系列地图和其他区域。

original_en_text: Nuu takes time with her creatures, she must inspect closely. Thick arms, flakey hair, delicate eyes... Nuu will inspect it all!
original_zh_text: 努努研究可仔细了！粗胳膊、鳞片毛发、精致眼睛……全要检查！
translated_text: You have to spend time with animals and study them carefully. Thick hands, dirty hair, long eyes, no one can control all this.
secondary_translated_text: 你必须花时间和动物在一起，仔细研究它们。粗手，脏头发，长眼睛，这一切谁也管不了。

original_en_text: Maiden, strong, wreathed in red,<br>Shield her shell, bless her thread!<br>She fights for us until the end,<br>Please protect my dearest friee-end!
original_zh_text: 红绸披身的坚强战士啊，<br>为我们奋战至最终时刻！<br>护佑她的甲壳，祝福她的灵丝，<br>我们的辉光，我的宝贵挚友！
translated_text: The girl with the red crown.<br>Protect your skin and bless your lines!<br>He fought until the end.<br>Protect my friends.
secondary_translated_text: 戴着红王冠的女孩。<br>保护您的皮肤，祝福您的线条！<br>他战斗到最后。<br>保护我的朋友。

original_en_text: If chance allows, visit the tower above. It is an impressive sight, not overgrown by the crust upon these caverns, but rather formed full of the material itself. <page>If the old tribe of this place were able to guide its growth to such grand degree... then they possessed a power to rival even that Citadel.
original_zh_text: 有空的话去上面塔楼看看，挺壮观的。那可不是岩壳自然生长形成的，而是用整块材料塑造而成。<page>如果这里的古老部落能引导砂岩生长至这等规模……那他们拥有的力量不逊于圣堡。
translated_text: If you have the opportunity, you can visit the tower. This is an impressive scenery. The crust of this cave is not lush green, but full of matter.<page>If this ancient tribe can continue to develop to this point, its power will be comparable to that of the fortress.
secondary_translated_text: 如果有机会，您可以参观塔。这是令人印象深刻的风景。这个洞穴的地壳并不是郁郁葱葱的绿色，而是充满了物质。<page>如果这个古老部落能够继续发展到这一步，其实力将堪比堡垒。

original_en_text: These strange, shuffling pilgrims... In the camp below they were docile enough, but up here they seem to have lost their senses. They cry out to the darkness and attack their fellow travellers.<page>Yakkanesh! Keep your weapon drawn and your bearings true! The way ahead is winding, and to lose one’s way invites only death.<page>I am a navigator amongst my tribe and have been making maps of these lands. I can trade them with you, and supplies, if you wish.
original_zh_text: 那些朝圣者……在下面还算安分，到这上面就发疯了。对着黑暗哭喊，还攻击路人。<page>雅卡内什！握紧你的武器，可别走神了！前面的路曲折危险，迷路就是死。<page>我是部落的测绘师，一直在画这里的地图。想要可以拿物资来换。
translated_text: These strange pilgrims retreated into the fields below and followed them, but here they seemed to lose their hearts, attacked their companions, and shouted in the darkness.<page>He took out his pistol and pointed it in the right direction. If you get lost, you will die.<page>I am a pilot for a tribe who charted this land if we could exchange goods and goods.
secondary_translated_text: 这些奇怪的朝圣者撤退到下面的田野里并跟随他们，但在这里，他们似乎失去了心，攻击了他们的同伴，并在黑暗中大喊大叫。<page>他掏出手枪，指着正确的方向。如果你迷路了，你就会死。<page>我是一个部落的飞行员，如果我们可以交换货物和货物，他们绘制了这片土地的地图。

original_en_text: Ma, ma! Much hunting has you done, and so many sweet little creatures in our records!<page>Nuu is drooling from such excess of learnings! Please keep working, miss grown-up!
original_zh_text: 呀呀！砍了这么多可爱小生物！<page>知识多到流口水！大姐姐继续努力呀！
translated_text: Mommy! Mommy! There is a lot of hunting here and there are many beautiful creatures on our register!<page>"Madam, continue your work.
secondary_translated_text: 妈妈！妈妈！这里有很多狩猎活动，我们的登记册上有很多美丽的生物！<page>“女士，继续工作。

original_en_text: In my land, that is the way warriors greet each other. For though you are a child barely hatched, you are also a warrior. Your stance, your weapon, your movements all proclaim it so.
original_zh_text: 在我们部落，战士们都这么打招呼。虽然你看着像个刚破卵的娃娃，但架势、武器、动作都像个战士。
translated_text: The soldiers of our country pay tribute to us. You are a newborn, but you are also a soldier.
secondary_translated_text: 我们国家的士兵向我们致敬。你是一个新生儿，但你也是一名士兵。

original_en_text: O-hoho! You’re lookin’ a little stuck there! What a pity!<hpage>We meet again, little thief. Are you familiar with this place?<hpage>If we ally our efforts, our escape could be made that much easier.<page>Hoho, you jestin’? There ain’t no allies in prison! You can just throw yourself against the walls in there while I go sniffin’ for goodies!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！锁住了吧？真可怜！<hpage>又见面了，小毛贼。你对这里很熟么？<hpage>我们联手的话，越狱容易得多。<page>哦嚯嚯！想得美，监狱哪有盟友！你撞墙玩去吧，我找宝贝去咯！
translated_text: Oh, Oh, Oh! They seem a little incompatible.<hpage>"Hello, sir, do you know this place?”<hpage>They make their escape easier.<page>What is this? Are you kidding me? He had no allies in prison, so he climbed up the wall to sniff.
secondary_translated_text: 哦，哦，哦！他们似乎有点不相容。<hpage>“您好，先生，您知道这个地方吗？”<hpage>他们让逃跑变得更容易。<page>这是什么？你在开玩笑吗？他在监狱里没有盟友，所以他爬上墙嗅。

original_en_text: <hpage>Safe journey, tall bug.<page>This is Pharloom, warrior. Safety is a myth.
original_zh_text: <hpage>祝你一路平安。<page>此地是纺络，战士。安全只是虚妄。
translated_text: <hpage>Good morning, travel safely.<page>He was a pharaoh and soldier, and security was a myth.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>早上好，一路顺风。<page>他是一位法老和士兵，安全是一个神话。

translated_text: Kanka Pin (English)

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Seth. It is a welcome surprise to see you here amongst these festivities.<page>Hullo, hullo! Yes, my wandering was long, and I began to fear I would meet my end in those sticky swamps below.<page>How lucky I was to stumble upon the home of these friendly revellers!<page>They said I could be a flea here with them, so of course I agreed. Seems as good a place as any to call home, at least for a time.<page>Now I just need to grow a little fur and sprout some wings, eh? Ha ha!
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，赛斯。没想到在庆典能遇见你。<page>是啊！之前在下面粘糊沼泽差点没命了。<page>幸亏遇到这群办庆典的好心虫！<page>他们说我可以当个跳蚤住下，我当然同意！这地方看着很适合安家<page>现在就只差长点毛和翅膀了！哈哈！
translated_text: <hpage>Good morning, nice to see you at Seth's party.<page>Hey, hey, yeah, after all this time, I started to be afraid of dying under the shining swamp.<page>We are so lucky to see this beautiful house!<page>They said I could make chips here, so of course I accepted it. This is a wonderful place for everyone, at least for a while.<page>You need wings and shells, right? Ha!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>早上好，很高兴在塞斯的派对上见到你。<page>嘿嘿，是的，这么长时间过去了，我开始害怕死在闪闪发光的沼泽下。<page>我们很幸运能够看到这所美丽的房子！<page>他们说我可以在这里制作薯条，所以我当然接受了。这对每个人来说都是一个美好的地方，至少在一段时间内是这样。<page>你需要翅膀和贝壳，对吧？哈！

original_en_text: Swamps born in the Citadel’s shadow. There is evidence the waters here once ran clear.
original_zh_text: 圣堡阴影下的沼泽，这里的水曾经清澈过。
translated_text: Water was born in the shadow of the castle. The evidence is that the water is clean.
secondary_translated_text: 水诞生于城堡的阴影中。证据是水是干净的。

original_en_text: Tangled roads choked beneath bramble and root. The flora is often as deadly as the creatures who call this place home.
original_zh_text: 荆棘盘踞的险路。这里的植物和住民一样要命。
translated_text: This road is full of thorns and roots. These plants are often as deadly as the organisms they inhabit.
secondary_translated_text: 这条路充满荆棘和根源。这些植物通常与它们栖息的生物一样致命。

original_en_text: What say you, nimble bug? The test of endurance remains at your ready! Let us stride fast forth!
original_zh_text: 要比赛吗？耐力测试随时恭候！
translated_text: What does speed error mean? Be prepared to test your patience. "Go, go, go. "
secondary_translated_text: 速度误差是什么意思？准备好考验你的耐心。“走，走，走。"

original_en_text: Zaza and I will fight through these cursed lands until every last one of the black-twisted fiends has been cut down!
original_zh_text: 扎扎和我会杀遍这些鬼地方，直到怪物一个不剩！
translated_text: I and I will kill all black and twisted demons in this cursed land!
secondary_translated_text: 我和我将杀死这片被诅咒的土地上所有黑色和扭曲的恶魔！

original_en_text: <page=M>Hurry, Old One. The ritual can’t commence while you remain host to that writhing root.<page=B>Seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out into those soaked moors, last I heard.<page=B>She’d have the tools for the task, and the cunning to have survived till now.
original_zh_text: <page=C>快去吧，古老者。有那根须在你体内，仪式没法开始。<page=B>去灰沼找被钟心镇放逐的小雅纳碧。她有工具，也足够机灵，肯定能活到现在。
translated_text: <page=M>"Come here, old man, consciousness will not begin when you skillfully bend the roots.<page=B>She sought refuge, looking for Balhart, and as far as I know, she was driven out of the humid desert.<page=B>He has the tools to fulfill his mission and the cunning to survive in the present.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>“过来，老头，当你熟练地弯曲根时，意识就不会开始。<page=B>她寻求庇护，寻找巴尔哈特，据我所知，她被赶出了潮湿的沙漠。<page=B>他拥有完成使命的工具和在当下生存的狡猾。

original_en_text: The red-shells, hiding through the fields, stalking the boney beasts. They are part of it, somehow, the life that flourishes here.<page>Even haunted, they seem to lose less of themselves... What anchor allows them to retain such strength?
original_zh_text: 红壳怪潜伏猎杀骨兽，是这里生态的一部分。<page>被丝咒侵蚀，它们却还能基本保持神智……靠的是什么？
translated_text: A red beast hides in a field, chasing a bone beast. For some reason, they are part of life's prosperity.<page>Even if you were a ghost, you wouldn't get lost often, so what would you do? Who will have power?
secondary_translated_text: 一只红色野兽躲在田野里，追赶一只骨兽。出于某种原因，它们是生活繁荣的一部分。<page>即使你是鬼，你也不会经常迷路，那么你会怎么办？谁将拥有权力？

original_en_text: Oh, but of course I sing! I am Sherma, a pilgrim just like you. I hear the call of the great Citadel just like every other devout soul.
original_zh_text: 当然要唱！我是谢尔玛，和你一样的朝圣者。圣堡在召唤每个虔诚信徒，你我都听见了！
translated_text: Of course, I can sing. I am a shaman, a pilgrim, just like you, and like other happy souls, I hear the call of the great castle.
secondary_translated_text: 当然，我会唱歌。我是一个萨满，一个朝圣者，就像你一样，和其他快乐的灵魂一样，我听到了伟大城堡的召唤。

original_en_text: Hoy! Hoyyyy! You there! Get us out of here! Since when’s a little light thievery worth a lifelong sentence?
original_zh_text: 喂！喂喂！那边的！快放我们出去！偷点小东西至于关一辈子吗？
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. I'm here! "Throw me out! "When can theft be sentenced to life imprisonment?
secondary_translated_text: 嘿嘿。我在这里！“把我扔出去！“盗窃什么时候可以判处无期徒刑？

original_en_text: Our great Citadel has lost its voice, and now the black threads rise up to tear its shell apart. I fear holy Pharloom is truly dying...<page>But I still have hope, red maiden! Though kingdoms may fall, life endures still, and we bugs can build our lands anew!<hpage>I share your hope, Sherma. Remember though that whatever is built next belongs not to the past, but to you.<hpage>Your instincts are strong. Let it be those that guide you, rather than any reverence toward a kingdom’s corpse.<page>Oho, you flatter me so! But it is my fellows who shall guide me, those whose voices sing out still, even in these ruined times...
original_zh_text: 我们伟大的圣堡已失却歌声，如今黑丝翻涌要撕裂它的躯壳。恐怕神圣的纺络真要灭亡了……<page>但我仍怀希望，红衣姑娘！王国可以倾覆，但生命将延续，我们虫子能重建家园！<hpage>我与你同怀希望，谢尔玛。但记住，新建之物不属于过去，而属于你们。<hpage>你的直觉很强。让它指引你和这些虫子，别再膜拜王国的残骸。<page>噢，您过誉了！但指引我的该是我的同胞们——那些在废墟中仍放声歌唱的同胞……
translated_text: Our great castle is losing its sound, and the black line is rising, breaking its shell.<page>A kingdom may die, but life still exists and insects can rebuild the earth.<hpage>Sherman, I'm just like you, but what you create later is yours, not what was in the past.<hpage>He has strong instincts. Don't be afraid of the bodies of those who guide you on the ground.<page>You will admire me! My companions lead me. Their voices sing in this moment of destruction.
secondary_translated_text: 我们伟大的城堡正在失去声音，黑线正在升起，打破它的外壳。<page>一个王国可能会消亡，但生命仍然存在，昆虫可以重建地球。<hpage>谢尔曼，我和你一样，但你后来创造的是你的，而不是过去的。<hpage>他有很强的直觉。不要害怕那些在地面上指导你的人的尸体。<page>你会钦佩我的！我的同伴引领我。他们的声音在这毁灭的时刻歌唱。

original_en_text: Hahhh... well met, sister. The task of hunting down these black-twisted fiends is no small one, eh? Still, we must not rest! Not while the cries of the innocent echo from every corner of the kingdom!
original_zh_text: 哈……又见面了。清剿这些黑怪可不轻松，对吧？但只要王国还有哭喊声，我和扎扎就不能歇！
translated_text: Yes, yes! Is it easy to kill demons? But you can't rest! When the cries of innocent people can be heard throughout the kingdom!
secondary_translated_text: 对，对！杀死恶魔容易吗？但你不能休息！当整个王国都能听到无辜者的哭声时！

original_en_text: Sign yourself as a snitch! And scoop up more rosaries from your bested foes. Just watch it when you’re snitchin’ that you don’t lose sum’a your own...
original_zh_text: 带上这个我们就是一伙的了。打赢了多赚，打输了赔本！
translated_text: Register as a whistleblower! The roses were once again taken away by the enemy. Be careful when you say you missed something.
secondary_translated_text: 注册为举报人！玫瑰花再次被敌人夺走。当你说你错过了一些东西时要小心。

original_en_text: What’s this? The spider arrives at last, here to stand acquiver at our startling Citadel.<hpage>Pale child, you return only to mock? Your lands have yet to prove my match. This sleeping Citadel shall be no different.<page>Spider, dear. Why must you remain so distressingly... optimistic? The power that waits above, you cannot conceive, her who would snuff that hope with barely a glance.<hpage>Fool child. You still think me blind to the form of your liege? Having come this far?<hpage>This land’s grandeur, the devotion of its bugs, and the curse that befalls them. The signs are clear.<hpage>Your kingdom is in the thrall of a creature beyond bug, one of that higher caste.<hpage>Whatever its desire for my Silk and my shell, it shall find I’m quite attached to both.
original_zh_text: 瞧瞧这是谁？小蜘蛛终于到了，在伟大的圣堡面前瑟瑟发抖。<hpage>苍白之子，你只是来废话的么？纺络没有虫能阻挡我，圣堡也不例外。<page>亲爱的，你怎么还傻乐呢？上面那位吹口气就能灭了你那点希望。<hpage>傻孩子，真以为我现在还看不出你主子的真身吗？<hpage>这地方的辉煌、虫民的虔诚、还有他们的诅咒……线索太明显了。<hpage>这个王国被超脱虫类的存在掌控，属于更高阶的存在。<hpage>但无论它多想要我的灵丝和躯壳，我都不会给。
translated_text: What is this? Spiders are finally the buyer of this beautiful castle.<hpage>He's a blue boy, isn't he? Have you reduced it again? "Your country has not been proven to be my enemy, and the sleeping saint has not changed.<page>"Honey, honey, why are you so optimistic? "I don't think I have that power; it kills hope quickly.<hpage>Foolish boy, do you think I will never see your king? Yeah, right?<hpage>The beauty of the earth, the loyalty of the insects, and the curse that surrounds them.<hpage>His kingdom is unified by one transcendent being, the worm, one of the highest castes.<hpage>No matter how much you crave silk and shells, you will find that you have a strong attachment to both.
secondary_translated_text: 这是什么？蜘蛛终于成为这座美丽城堡的买家。<hpage>他是一个蓝色的男孩，不是吗？你又减少了吗？“你们的国家还没有被证明是我的敌人，沉睡的圣人也没有改变。<page>“亲爱的，亲爱的，你为什么这么乐观？“我不认为我有那种力量;它很快就扼杀了希望。<hpage>傻孩子，你以为我永远见不到你的国王吗？是的，对吧？<hpage>地球的美丽，昆虫的忠诚，以及围绕着它们的诅咒。<hpage>他的王国由一个超凡的存在统一，那就是蠕虫，最高种姓之一。<hpage>无论你多么渴望丝绸和贝壳，你都会发现你对两者都有着强烈的依恋。

original_en_text: Is hard work, learning so much from creatures, but for Nuu is very fulfilling. Now go and hunt, and prey, miss grown-up!
original_zh_text: 研究生物很辛苦，但努努超满足！快去打猎吧大姐姐！
translated_text: I learned a lot about biology, which was very useful for Nova. "Let's go hunting. " "
secondary_translated_text: 我学到了很多生物学知识，这对Nova非常有用。“我们去打猎吧。" "

original_en_text: Hoy there, fancy bug! How you farin’, now that the ‘ole world’s creakin’ and crackin’ around us? Desperately needin’ some supplies, I’ll wager! Heh heh!<hpage>You seem in good spirits, thief. Are you not disturbed by the great rending of the kingdom?<page>Heh, end of the world don’t bother ol’ Grindle none. We’ll just go find another one to plunder, won’t we?
original_zh_text: 哟！阔气虫来啦！外面世界要完蛋了，急需补给吧？哦嚯嚯！<hpage>你看着倒挺精神，不怕王国崩塌？<page>王国崩塌关我们屁事！大不了换个地方偷！
translated_text: What a lovely dog! Now, an "old world" is unfolding around us, and we urgently need supplies.<hpage>"Thief, you look good. "Are you afraid of the collapse of your kingdom?”"<page>"Hey, it's the end of the world, don't worry, are you looking for the Grindell Trophy?”"
secondary_translated_text: 多么可爱的狗啊！现在，一个“旧世界”正在我们周围展开，我们迫切需要物资。<hpage>“小偷，你看起来不错。“你害怕你的王国崩溃吗？”"<page>“嘿，世界末日了，别担心，你在寻找格林德尔奖杯吗？”"

original_en_text: <page=M>Our spells’re woven, our parts prepared. Whenever you’re ready, lay up on the dais and we’ll begin.<page=M>Best you don’t dawdle now. Pharloom’s time is short, and those hearts won’t go on beating forever.
original_zh_text: <page=M>我们已经准备好施咒，您躺上祭坛便可开始。<page=M>劝您别再耽搁了，纺络时日无多，这些心也跳不了多久。
translated_text: <page=M>Our order is complete and our part is ready. When you are ready, sit on the stage and go.<page=M>Faro's time is short, and his heart will not beat forever.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>我们的订单已经完成，我们的零件也准备好了。准备好后，坐在舞台上出发。<page=M>法罗的时间很短，他的心不会永远跳动。

original_en_text: No more talk, warrior. Permit me this final moment of memorial.<hpage>As you wish, sir. I shall disturb you no longer.
original_zh_text: 别说了，战士。让我在这最后时刻安静怀念吧。<hpage>如你所愿，不再打扰。
translated_text: - Don't tell me, remember the last moment of your illness.<hpage>Anyway, I won't bother you again.
secondary_translated_text: - 别告诉我，记住你生病的最后一刻。<hpage>反正我不会再打扰你了。

original_en_text: <hpage>Another time perhaps, sir. My own tasks cannot be easily ignored.<page>Then I shall continue to train in anticipation of that future moment!<page>Having met, it is inevitable. Fate calls us to compete!
original_zh_text: <hpage>下次吧，我有要事在身。<page>我会继续特训等着比赛那天！<page>命运注定我们要一决高下！
translated_text: <hpage>"Next time, his work will not be easily ignored.<page>Continue our journey!<page>Destiny requires competition.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>“下次，他的工作不会轻易被忽视。<page>继续我们的旅程！<page>命运需要竞争。

original_en_text: Oh, welcome miss grown-up! Come to inspect the red-rocky creatures, like Nuu? We have found a very big one. Fresh, but not too fresh!<hpage>A pair of beasts attacked me here, burrowing through the stone with their spiral shells. I cut this one down, and the other fled.<page>Ooooh ma! Really? Nuu wishes that she had the pair! She could have studied much. Unlucky, to miss such a big feast of learnings!
original_zh_text: 噢！欢迎大姐姐！也来研究红石头吗？我发现个大家伙！还算新鲜！<hpage>两只带螺旋壳的怪物用石头攻击我。斩了一只，跑了一只。<page>哎呀！努努好想要一对！能学好多东西呢！真可惜！
translated_text: Welcome, gentlemen. Look at those red stone creatures, like Nu. I found something cool. It's fresh, but not very fresh.<hpage>Two wild beasts attacked me and used their spiral shells to drill a hole in the stone. One was cut and the other was hidden.<page>Oh, mom!- Actually? I hope you have a couple. I miss this academic event very much.
secondary_translated_text: 欢迎，先生们。看看那些红石生物，比如Nu。我发现了一些很酷的东西。很新鲜，但不是很新鲜。<hpage>两只野兽袭击了我，用螺旋壳在石头上钻了一个洞。一个被剪掉，另一个被隐藏。<page>哦，妈妈！-实际上？我希望你有一对。我非常怀念这次学术活动。

original_en_text: We must press on... There is so much more... for us to do...
original_zh_text: 必须继续……我们还有……很多事要做……
translated_text: If we don't move forward, others will.
secondary_translated_text: 如果我们不前进，其他人就会前进。

original_en_text: I see much wasted effort in these docks. There is too much flourish to the form of it all. The ways of others are strange indeed...
original_zh_text: 码头修得花里胡哨，净是浪费。外族人的路子真怪……
translated_text: There is a lot of prosperity in this form, and we consume a lot of energy.
secondary_translated_text: 这种形式有很多繁荣，我们消耗了很多能源。

original_en_text: Nimble bug! We both know our previous run was only warm-up, yes? Only a tiny test to prepare for the real match, Hoi hoi!<page>Well that match is now! A new track worthy of your skill, and mine. No longer merely a test!<page>Meet the challenge and my speed full. Let us break through our limits and see what waits beyond!
original_zh_text: 上次只是热身对吧？真正的好戏现在开始！<page>新的挑战，新的赛道！配得上你我的实力！<page>接受我的全速挑战，一起冲刺突破极限吧！
translated_text: This was a wise mistake! The last game was hot, wasn't it? Preparing for a real game is a test, isn't it? Actually?<page>Come on, the game starts! This song is worthy of her talent. This is no longer just a test.<page>We must challenge it with all our strength. Let's go abroad and see what happens!
secondary_translated_text: 这是一个明智的错误！上一场比赛很火爆，不是吗？为真正的游戏做准备是一次考验，不是吗？实际上？<page>来吧，游戏开始了！这首歌配得上她的才华。这不再只是一个测试。<page>我们必须全力以赴挑战它。让我们出国看看会发生什么！

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>With these I often mark the locations of worthy foes.
original_zh_text: 你可以用这个在地图上标记重要地点或提醒事项。<br><br>我常用它标强力敌人的位置。
translated_text: You can use it to display important places and memories on a map.<br><br>It is often used to evaluate others.
secondary_translated_text: 您可以用它来显示地图上的重要地点和记忆。<br><br>它经常被用来评价他人。

original_en_text: Hoi hoi! A nimble opponent appears. At last! At last!<hpage>I was intrigued by the challenge you issued on the bell settlement’s wishwall, sir, though having reached this place I wonder at your choice of location.<hpage>If you seek challengers you should choose somewhere less far afield. It is rare chance any bug would journey to a cavern so distant.<page>True, perhaps. Though once discovered, could there be a more perfect spot? This giant, boney body, so distant from Pharloom’s ails.<page>Here, freely, we can test our speed and our sleek shells. Here we may race!<page>You must be eager to step to the task, challenger? Fulfil my wish! Let us discover our limits together!
original_zh_text: 哟嚯！终于来个能跑的！终于啊！<hpage>先生，我对您在钟心镇祈愿墙下的战书很感兴趣。不过抵达此地后，倒对您选的位置有些疑惑。<hpage>若想找虫比试，不该待在如此偏远之地。<page>有道理，但最棒的赛道就在这！还远离纺络的破事。<page>这里能尽情展现速度与甲壳之美！来赛一场吧！<page>你也等不及了吧？快来满足我的愿望，一起测试极限！
translated_text: What is this? We have a flexible partner. Infinite (Infinite)<hpage>I am very interested in challenging the walls of colonial ambition. We have arrived at this place, but I would love to know where you chose.<hpage>If you are looking for a competitor, choose a place that is not too far away. Few insects can climb into caves so far.<page>This may be true, but once you understand, what is the ideal? The huge bone corpse is far from the national farm.<page>You are free to test your speed and agility. You can compete here.<page>Challenger? Do you want to do something like this? I hope my wish can come true! Let's explore the boundaries together!
secondary_translated_text: 这是什么？我们有一个灵活的合作伙伴。无限（无限）<hpage>我对挑战殖民野心的高墙非常感兴趣。我们已经到达了这个地方，但我很想知道您选择了哪里。<hpage>如果您正在寻找竞争对手，请选择一个不太远的地方。到目前为止，很少有昆虫能爬进洞穴。<page>这可能是真的，但一旦你明白了，理想是什么？巨大的骨尸距离国家农场很远。<page>您可以自由测试您的速度和敏捷性。你可以在这里竞争。<page>挑战者？你想做这样的事情吗？希望我的愿望能够实现！让我们一起探索界限！

original_en_text: Uahhhhh... So close... Nuu could almost taste it.
translated_text: Yes, it's very close and you can walk.
secondary_translated_text: 是的，非常近，你可以步行。

original_en_text: Ho! Are you observing them too, hunter? The red-shells are plentiful here, stalking these vast grassy plains and the last of its bony beasts.<page>Compared to the caves below, this lush growth feels even greater. Have we crawled close to the source of their sustenance?<page>I must discover its secret! I will! By my father’s wish, and for hope that our dying lands might find means to endure.<hpage>Just be careful, young one. I urge you. Here you’ve reached the ants’ heart-domain.<hpage>There may be discoveries worth making, but a single mistake will see your shell’s sharp end.
original_zh_text: 嘿！你也在观察红壳怪吗？它们在这片原野上猎杀最后的骨兽。<page>这里的植物比下面的洞穴更茂盛，难道接近能量源了？<page>我必须找到源头！对！不止是为了父亲的遗愿，也是为了这片大地存续的希望！<hpage>要小心，小虫子。此处是蚁族的核心区域。<hpage>或许能有宝贵发现，但走错一步就会丢了性命。
translated_text: Oh, Oh, Oh! "Are you looking at hunters? "Between the broad pasture and the last bone beast, there was a red shell.<page>This dense growth feels much better than the caves below.<page>We must expose this secret! You have to do this! With the will and hope of the Father, we control the land of death and can find the way to survive.<hpage>We have come to the heart of the ant.<hpage>You may find some valuable discoveries, but mistakes can sharpen the shell.
secondary_translated_text: 哦，哦，哦！“你在看猎人吗？“广阔的牧场和最后一只骨兽之间，有一个红色的贝壳。<page>这种茂密的生长物比下面的洞穴感觉好得多。<page>我们必须揭露这个秘密！你必须这样做！凭借父亲的意志和希望，我们控制了死亡之地，并能够找到生存之路。<hpage>我们已经来到了蚂蚁的心脏。<hpage>你可能会发现一些有价值的发现，但错误会使外壳变得锋利。

original_en_text: Hoy! Did you see it, red maiden? The great gate heard my song and, in its infinite and ancient kindness, opened the way forward for us!<page>What luck for us to meet at this moment! We can set off on the great road together!<page>Or p’raps I’ll tarry here just a little longer. I want to sing a song of gratitude to this noble gate!
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘快看！骨门听见歌声，为我们让路了！<page>能在这相遇多有缘呀！我们可以结伴踏上圣途！<page>不过我想再再待会儿，给这好骨门唱首感恩曲！
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. Do you see this? Red old woman, door, listen to my song, open the way for us with infinite mercy!<page>I'm lucky to see you now! We had a great journey together!<page>Let us sing a song of thanks for this noble gate!
secondary_translated_text: 嘿嘿。你看到这个了吗？红老妇人，门，听我的歌，以无限的怜悯为我们开辟道路！<page>我现在很幸运见到你！我们一起度过了一段美好的旅程！<page>让我们为这座高贵的大门唱一首感谢之歌！

original_en_text: In these lands names are given freely, are they not? I am Shakra, Wielding Rings. If our hunts intertwine again, I will have new maps to trade.<page>Until then, farewell, Child Wielding Needle.
original_zh_text: 在这地方，名字都起的很随意，对吧？我是沙克拉，驭环者。要是能再碰上，会准备好新地图卖给你。<page>后会有期，使针的小姑娘。
translated_text: Don't you say your name too freely in our country? You are a chakra, a ring. When hunting resumes, you will receive a new map.<page>Say goodbye to the child with the needle.
secondary_translated_text: 在我们国家你说自己的名字是不是太随意了？你是一个脉轮，一个戒指。当狩猎恢复时，您将收到一张新地图。<page>和拿着针的孩子说再见。

original_en_text: This place is holy, yes... but I worry at the suffering of our fellow pilgrims. So many are hurt or exhausted!<hpage>Your doubts and worries will not heal them, little one.<hpage>If you would aid your fellows, you can start by dressing their wounds. The simple rags found around the settlement will do for bandages.<page>Oh, that’s an excellent idea, red maiden! Normally I’d think a song would suffice, but... yes, more direct action is certainly needed.<page>And the Citadel itself shall provide the materials! Praise be to this holiest of holy places!
original_zh_text: 这里虽然是圣地……可看着同袍受苦真难受！<hpage>光着急没用。<hpage>若想帮忙，可以先从包扎开始。找点破布当绷带吧。<page>好主意！我平常就知道唱歌……这次得动真格了！<page>材料圣堡里随便找！圣地就是灵验！
translated_text: It is sacred, but we are worried about our pilgrims.<hpage>Your doubts and worries will not cure you, son.<hpage>If you want to help a friend, start by healing the wound. Use a simple cloth around your knees as a seasoning.<page>Usually, I think one song is enough, but I need more direct action.<page>The fort will order blessings on this sacred place.
secondary_translated_text: 它是神圣的，但我们担心我们的朝圣者。<hpage>你的怀疑和担忧无法治愈你，儿子。<hpage>如果你想帮助朋友，就从治愈伤口开始。在膝盖上用一块简单的布作为调味料。<page>通常，我认为一首歌就足够了，但我需要更直接的行动。<page>堡垒将祝福这个神圣的地方。

original_en_text: Fear not, brothers and sisters! If we work hard and keep our faith, the Citadel will provide for us... I have no doubt!
original_zh_text: 兄弟姐妹别怕！只要我们勤勉且守住信念，圣堡不会亏待我们……肯定不会！
translated_text: Brothers and sisters, don't be afraid. If we work hard and stay faithful, God will nourish us.
secondary_translated_text: 兄弟姐妹们，不要害怕。如果我们努力工作并保持忠诚，上帝就会滋养我们。

original_en_text: <page=M>The hearts you seek, we can share their locations as best we know.<page=M>Three will be needed to construct our spell and draw clear memory of the flower from your Silk.<page=S>Bring us the hearts, Old One. Make’em beat, fierce and final. See for yourself the forgotten strength of this land of bugs before we burn those memories in its saving.
original_zh_text: <page=M>我们会把知道的古心位置尽数相告。<page=M>我们需要三颗心来施咒，从您的灵丝中抽出花影。<page=S>把心带来，古老者。通过它们的搏动，见证这片虫族土地被遗忘的伟力，再焚尽这些记忆换取救赎。
translated_text: <page=M>If you are looking for a heart, we will do our best to share this place with you.<page=M>You need three people to build our mantra and bring vivid memories to your silk flowers.<page=S>Dear friends, please give me your hearts. In the end, I failed. Before retaining these memories, let's take a look at the earth power of the forgotten insects.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>如果您正在寻找一颗心，我们将尽力与您分享这个地方。<page=M>您需要三个人来建立我们的咒语，并为您的丝绸花朵带来生动的回忆。<page=S>亲爱的朋友们，请把你们的心交给我。最后，我失败了。在保留这些记忆之前，让我们来看看这些被遗忘的昆虫的大地力量。

translated_text: Here comes the ring.

original_en_text: This giant, old ant... Her death seems recent, but her presence here... <page>Was it her? Could it be? The strength that sustained these caves? If so, what will happen now?<hpage>They will wither and fade... And you may sadly know it was my needle that brought her end.<page>You, miss? But why? Why destroy something so vital? <hpage>It is a difficult thing to explain simply... A test was needed, to ensure my strength before a greater challenge soon to come.<hpage>Know, in time, these caves may see opportunity to regrow, flourish even, though that rebirth is itself a task enormous... longer than a lifetime, many lifetimes.<hpage>For that task to succeed, it will fall to bugs like you to sow the first seeds.
original_zh_text: 这只年迈的巨蚁……她刚死没多久，可她却出现在这里……<page>那是她本人吗？难道真是她？支撑这些洞穴的力量究竟是什么？若真如此，如今会发生什么？<hpage>它们终将枯萎凋零……你也许会含泪明白，是我手中的针了结了她的生命。<page>这位姑娘，你？可为什么？为什么要摧残这般珍贵的东西？<hpage>这事难以三言两语解释……在更大的考验来临前，我必须通过试炼，证明自身的力量。<hpage>终有一日，这些洞穴或许能重新焕发生机，甚至繁盛昌荣。但那重生之路，漫长艰难，超越一生又一生。<hpage>而这份重任，便要靠你这样的小虫播撒下第一颗种子。
