translated_text: This giant ant appears to have died recently, but here it is.<page>Is that you? Yeah, right? What forces support this cave? If so, what will happen in the future?<hpage>They disappeared, they disappeared, and unfortunately, my needle killed her.<page>"Is that you, miss? "Why? Are you looking for something so important?<hpage>It's hard to explain simply, but faced with the huge challenges we face, we need testing to show our strength.<hpage>Over time, the cave sees an opportunity to grow and prosper again, but regeneration can be a difficult task.<hpage>If you want to succeed, you must rely on insects like you to plant the first seed.
secondary_translated_text: 这只巨型蚂蚁似乎最近死了，但它就在这里。<page>是你吗？是的，对吧？是什么力量支撑着这个洞穴？如果是这样，将来会发生什么？<hpage>他们消失了，他们消失了，不幸的是，我的针杀了她。<page>“是你吗，小姐？“为什么？您正在寻找如此重要的东西吗？<hpage>这很难简单解释，但面对我们面临的巨大挑战，我们需要测试来展示我们的实力。<hpage>随着时间的推移，洞穴看到了再次成长和繁荣的机会，但再生可能是一项艰巨的任务。<hpage>如果你想成功，就必须依靠像你这样的昆虫来播下第一颗种子。

original_en_text: Burrowed paths of the red-shells. Their stores and shrines are frequent throughout. These tunnels must grant them swift passage about the fields below.
original_zh_text: 红壳怪的隧道网。到处是他们的仓库和冥想室，方便在野地快速移动。
translated_text: The caves on Hongbei Road are dotted with shops and shrines, and the tunnel quickly cuts through the fields below.
secondary_translated_text: 洪北路上的洞穴里点缀着商店和神社，隧道很快穿过下面的田野。

original_en_text: <hpage>If I’m to dive, and cut this land from its black thread curse, I must first find means to extract the intruder within.
original_zh_text: <hpage>要下潜并斩断诅咒，得先除掉体内这玩意。
translated_text: <hpage>If I wanted to skip and separate the earth from the curse of darkness, I had to first find a way to chase the invaders.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>如果我想跳过地球并将其与黑暗的诅咒分开，我必须首先找到一种方法来追赶入侵者。

original_en_text: So I am freed, despite no request of mine for aid.<hpage>And I do not ask gratitude. The key merely fit the lock. If you choose, stay in here and wait till your shell hardens to crust.<page>No. I shall depart shortly. With my way clear, my wish again propels me, though I tried to avoid it.<hpage>Then safe journey, tall bug. I’ll not pry further. Clearly you bear your own burden.
original_zh_text: 我未曾求救，倒也被放出来了。<hpage>不必道谢，钥匙碰巧能用罢了。若想留在这，请自便。<page>不，我这就走。前路已通，纵使逃避，他的遗愿仍会推着我前行。<hpage>那便祝你一路顺利。看得出你有重担在身，我无意深究。
translated_text: I was released without seeking help.<hpage>This key will only open the lock and you must stay here until your sink closes.<page>My path was clear and I tried to avoid it, but my wish brought me back.<hpage>Great trip, lovely insects! I won't study anymore. You carry your weight on your shoulders.
secondary_translated_text: 我在没有寻求帮助的情况下被释放。<hpage>这把钥匙只能打开锁，您必须留在这里直到水槽关闭。<page>我的路很明确，我试图避免它，但我的愿望把我带回来了。<hpage>很棒的旅行，可爱的昆虫！我不会再学习了。你的体重扛在肩上。

original_en_text: Mm, mrm? Oh, hoy again!<page>I hadn’t meant to drop off like that. It’s hard to stay awake in such a cosy place, isn’t it?
original_zh_text: 唔嗯？哎呀又睡着了！<page>这地方太舒服了，让人犯困，你说是吧？
translated_text: What is this? Hey, they're back!<page>It's hard to wake up in such a comfortable place, isn't it?
secondary_translated_text: 这是什么？嘿，他们回来了！<page>在这样舒适的地方醒来很难，不是吗？

original_en_text: Oh hear me pray, please hear me sing,<br>My path’s ahead, but here’s the thing,<br>I can’t squeeze past, o gate of bone,<br>So please wake up, and help...oh?
original_zh_text: 听我祈祷，听我歌唱，<br>前路虽近骨门却挡，<br>求您醒来助我闯荡……哦？
translated_text: Listen to my prayers, listen to my songs.<br>My path is right in front of me, but he is there.<br>You cannot enter through the bone door.<br>"Get up and help me." Actually?
secondary_translated_text: 听我的祈祷，听我的歌曲。<br>我的路就在我面前，但他就在那里。<br>你无法从骨门进入。<br>“起来帮助我。“实际上？

original_en_text: <page=M>Up top of those caves lost to wind and sand rests a crusted old ruler, a once great warrior king.<page=M>In their prime, they and their order held half of Pharloom under hardened claw. Some bugs relished that strength. Most lived in fear of it.
original_zh_text: <page=M>在风沙侵蚀的洞窟顶端，藏着位甲壳斑驳的老暴君。<page=M>全盛时他与部族以铁爪统治半个纺络。有人仰慕其强权，更多则活在恐惧中。
translated_text: <page=M>At the top of the sand-covered cave, there was a tired old monarch who had been a great soldier and king.<page=M>At their peak, they and their commanders controlled half of Param with their claws. Insects love this energy. Most people live in fear and terror.
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>在布满沙子的洞穴顶部，有一位疲惫不堪的老君主，他曾是一位伟大的士兵和国王。<page=M>在鼎盛时期，他们和他们的指挥官用爪子控制了半个帕拉姆。昆虫喜欢这种能量。大多数人生活在恐惧和恐怖中。

original_en_text: Oooh ma! Sweet surprise for Nuu! You are adult, yes? Fully grown? Ready to hunt?<hpage>Certainly I am no child, young one.<page>Perfect then! Nuu must ask a wish! For her, you would seek Pharloom’s many fabulous bugs and cut them.<page>Cut them with your blade! Cut them with your mature spirit! Cut them with your savage adult heart!<page>Would you help Nuu? Could you take her scroll, and fill its pages with the learnings of your cuts?
original_zh_text: 哇哦大姐姐！努努好惊喜！你已经长大了对吧？完全体？能打猎了吧？<hpage>我显然不是个小孩子，小家伙。<page>太好啦！努努有个愿望！帮我去砍纺络的各种神奇虫子吧！<page>用你的刀砍！用长大的力气砍！用成熟的狂野之心砍！<page>帮帮努努好不好？收下这本册子，用打架心得写满它！
translated_text: Oh, mom! The U. N. Surprise is great. You're an adult, right? Actually? Total growth? "Are you ready to hunt?”»<hpage>I'm not a child, of course.<page>More here. You must make a wish!" To do this, you can find a lot of fresh insects in the lighthouse and cut them.<page>You cut it with a knife! Destroy it with a mature heart and test a mature heart.<page>Do you need help Nancy? Can you bring a scroll to fill out your editing knowledge page?
secondary_translated_text: 哦，妈妈！联合N.惊喜是伟大的。你是成年人了吧？实际上？总增长？“你准备好狩猎了吗？”»<hpage>当然，我不是一个孩子。<page>更多在这里。你必须许个愿！“要做到这一点，你可以在灯塔里找到很多新鲜的昆虫并将它们切割。<page>你用刀切它！用一颗成熟的心摧毁它，考验一颗成熟的心。<page>你需要帮助南希吗？你能带一个卷轴来填写你的编辑知识页吗？

original_en_text: Guurroooo! Scoundrel! Fiend! Who dares wake brave Garmond from his well needed kip?<hpage>I’ve no intent to disturb, sir bug. I am merely passing these towers and sought to better understand the lay of the place.<page>Hmmph! Knowing the battlefield? A warrior’s reason! Just look at you! Your stance and blade, almost alone they declare a fight.<page>As the bravest of knights, if direct challenge were offered, honour would see noble Garmond accept!<page>Fortunate that seems not your intent. In truth, I’m still sleeping off something of an altercation myself. Had our meeting called for a knightly duel, you’d not have had the luck to behold my finest form.
original_zh_text: 嘎噜！歹徒！谁敢打扰勇者加蒙德的美梦？<hpage>无意冒犯，只是路过这座塔想探探路。<page>哼！勘察战场？战士的借口！看你这架势就是来找架打的！<page>作为最勇猛的骑士，要决斗我奉陪！<page>算你走运，我还没睡醒。真要决斗你可打不过全盛期的我！
translated_text: Master! Oh, my God. Oh, my God! Demon! Who will wake brave Hammond from the sleep he desperately needs?<hpage>Without interruption, Mr. Enseto, I walked through the tower in order to better understand the place.<page>Oh, my God! Do you know the battlefield? But a soldier has a reason, and his position and blade are the only reason to declare war.<page>As the bravest knight, if he had ever challenged him, Lord Hammond would have agreed!<page>Anger is not your intention, it is not your intention. In fact, I fell asleep during this discussion. If this were a knight's duel, you wouldn't see me better.
secondary_translated_text: 大师！天啊天哪！恶魔！谁来把勇敢的哈蒙德从他迫切需要的睡眠中叫醒？<hpage>恩塞托先生，我没有打扰地穿过塔楼，以便更好地了解这个地方。<page>我的天啊！你了解战场吗？但士兵是有理由的，他的立场和刀刃是宣战的唯一理由。<page>作为最勇敢的骑士，如果他曾经挑战过他，哈蒙德勋爵一定会同意的！<page>愤怒不是你的意图，也不是你的意图。事实上，我在这次讨论中睡着了。如果这是一场骑士决斗，你不会更好地看到我。

original_en_text: Hoy then, what’s a fancy-prancy bug like you creepin’ into Grindle’s cosy little nook for?<page>Heard we had some nice stuff, did ya? O-hoho! All kinds of tasty goodies find their way here, that’s for sure.<hpage>I care little for how you procured your goods, thief. If you have something worth trading, I may part with my rosaries.<page>Well, we never say no to a fair swap, heh heh! Now take a look at what we’s got...
original_zh_text: 哦嚯！阔气虫，你溜进格林德尔的宝窝想干嘛？<page>是不是听说我这有好货？哦嚯嚯！那可不，宝贝们都是自己溜进来的！<hpage>我不在乎你的货怎么来的，如果有好东西，我拿念珠来换。<page>成交！不过我们可不做赔本买卖，嚯嚯！你先随便看看吧……
translated_text: Hey, what do you think? What does the wonderful insect look like when you climb into the comfortable corner of Greendale?<page>I hear you have a nice boy, don't you? Really? Oh, Oh, Oh! Here, you will find a lot of delicious food.<hpage>No matter how you buy it, if there is anything worth exchanging, you can throw it away.<page>No one says "no" to fair trade. Let's see what we have.
secondary_translated_text: 嘿，你觉得怎么样？当你爬进格林德尔舒适的角落时，这只奇妙的昆虫是什么样子？<page>我听说你有一个好儿子，不是吗？真的吗？哦，哦，哦！在这里，你会发现很多美味的食物。<hpage>无论你怎么买，如果有什么值得交换的东西，你都可以扔掉。<page>没有人对公平贸易说“不”。让我们看看我们有什么。

original_en_text: Now I shall remain, and train. And know! Though I have no more rewards to give, you are welcome to grace my track, as many times as you wish.
original_zh_text: 我要继续训练了！不过记着，虽然没其他奖品了，但随时欢迎你来赛道上奔跑！
translated_text: I will do it, I know. There is nothing better than this, but if you want, please join us.
secondary_translated_text: 我会这么做的，我知道。没有什么比这更好的了，但如果您愿意，请加入我们。

original_en_text: The sharp-faced bugs of these drizzled caves love to swoop and play, don’t they? If only I could understand their beautiful language...
original_zh_text: 这些尖脸虫就爱在雨里扑腾。要是能听懂它们的语言多好……
translated_text: Acid insects in fog holes like to dive and play, don't they? Actually? I wish I could understand your beautiful language.
secondary_translated_text: 雾洞里的酸性昆虫喜欢潜水和玩耍，不是吗？实际上？我希望我能理解你美丽的语言。

original_en_text: ...At the bottom of a well, you can only look up. The past is hidden from those who look forward...<page>...Those echoes may guide you still. Yes, that’s true. For the kind-hearted, a weapon can also be a friend...<page>...You’re so eager to follow in her footsteps. But what are you leaving for those who come next?
original_zh_text: ……身居井底唯见上方。沉湎过往者难窥前路……<page>……余音仍可指明方向。善者手中，利器亦可为友……<page>……你执着追随她的足迹。可曾为后来者留有余地？……
translated_text: ... Deep in the well, you can only see the past that is hidden by those who see the future.<page>... This feeling moves you. Yes, yes, yes. A good person can have a gun as a friend.<page>... He really wanted to follow in his footsteps. What do you want to leave for the next one?
secondary_translated_text: ...井深处，你只能看到那些看到未来的人所隐藏的过去。<page>...这种感觉会感动你。是的，是的。好人可以有枪当朋友。<page>...他真的很想追随他的脚步。你想为下一个留下什么？

translated_text: Bilworth Map

original_en_text: Hoof... Always you impress... nimble bug...<page>As many times as you may, let us speed forth! Gladly will I strive to match your spritely grace.
original_zh_text: 呼……每次都被你惊艳……<page>想再比赛的话随时奉陪！我一定要追上你！
translated_text: I feel it. You are always impressive, it is a very fast insect.<page>Hurry as quickly as possible. I want to be as good as you.
secondary_translated_text: 我感觉到了。你总是令人印象深刻，这是一种速度非常快的昆虫。<page>尽快。我想和你一样好。

original_en_text: This poor traveller finds her resolve waning. When I first greeted her, her voice was so hoarse I scarcely heard it!<page>’Tis no cause for worry, though. My song will lift her from her torpor! Join your voice with mine, red maiden, and together we shall rouse our fellow pilgrim!
original_zh_text: 这位同袍意志消沉，初遇时她嗓音沙哑，几乎听不见！<page>莫慌！我的歌声能唤醒她！红衣姑娘一起唱，唤起这位同路人！
translated_text: The poor traveler noticed that his determination had weakened. When I first greeted her, I could hardly hear her.<page>Don't worry, my concert will save you from paralysis. Red woman, you and I, we will awaken the pilgrims!
secondary_translated_text: 可怜的旅行者注意到他的决心已经减弱。当我第一次和她打招呼时，我几乎听不到她的声音。<page>别担心，我的音乐会会让你免于瘫痪。红女人，你和我，我们将唤醒朝圣者！

original_en_text: In time, even these great steps will be swept away by the sands. Nothing is immovable.
original_zh_text: 再大的台阶也迟早被风沙埋了，没有什么是永恒的。
translated_text: Over time, even this huge ladder will be dragged into the sand.
secondary_translated_text: 随着时间的推移，就连这把巨大的梯子也会被拖进沙子里。

original_en_text: Ooh ma ma! Look here, miss grown-up! Very fascinating creature here, all dead in bits now, but still good!<page>She takes the shape of the woods for her body, and her hair like bitter leaves! Clever, thinks Nuu!<hpage>This creature staked its territory here and attacked as I passed through.<hpage>You should not linger long. Her tribe remains hidden amongst the branches, disguised and waiting to strike.<page>Oooh! So the cutting-up was done by you? Nuu gives her warm thanks! Now Nuu can inspect this creature well, all its gooey insides and crunchy shell!
original_zh_text: 哇！大姐姐快看！这只死透的怪物超有趣！<page>身体像树干，头发像苦叶子！努努觉得它超聪明！<hpage>这生物占据此处，袭击路人。<hpage>别久留，它的同族还在树丛里埋伏呢。<page>哇！是你干掉的？太感谢啦！现在可以好好研究它的粘液和脆壳了！
translated_text: Mom, sir, everyone. "The charming creatures here are dead, but they are still fine! "<page>Your body is like a forest, and your hair is like a fallen leaf.<hpage>These creatures create territory here, and when they pass by, they attack.<hpage>His tribe hid among branches, waiting to be attacked.<page>Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Did you cut it? Thank you for coming! Light from the mantle allows us to study this creature well, including its sticky interior space and fragile outer shell.
secondary_translated_text: 妈妈，先生，大家。“这里的迷人生物已经死了，但它们还好好的！"<page>你的身体像森林，你的头发像落叶。<hpage>这些生物在这里开辟领地，当它们经过时，就会发起攻击。<hpage>他的部落躲在树枝之间，等待着受到攻击。<page>哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！你剪了吗？感谢您的到来！来自地幔的光线使我们能够很好地研究这种生物，包括它粘性的内部空间和脆弱的外壳。

original_zh_text: 攀登圣堡，直面萦绕纺络的灾厄。
translated_text: Go to the castle and face the people who pollute the farmland.
secondary_translated_text: 去城堡，面对污染农田的人们。

translated_text: A terrible tyranny
elastic fission;

original_en_text: Pale glaze used in the preparation and protection of bone masks.
original_zh_text: 用于骨甲面甲制备和防护的苍白涂料。
translated_text: A lightweight enamel used to prepare and protect bone masks.
secondary_translated_text: 一种用于制备和保护骨面具的轻质瓷釉。

original_en_text: Give the collected components to the Caretaker of Songclave.
original_zh_text: 将收集的组件交给圣歌盟地看守者。
translated_text: He gave the money to the buyer.
The darkness of the ground.
The pressure of distance;

original_en_text: A lotta repairs to be done around here, but I need more materials! All I wish for is some shell shards so I can get to work. Not asking too much, am I?
original_zh_text: 这里有很多东西要修理，但我需要更多材料！我只想要些甲壳碎片来开工，这要求不过分吧？
translated_text: There is enough space for repairs. I need more materials! I hope you have some small things to start with.
secondary_translated_text: 有足够的空间进行维修。我需要更多材料！我希望你能从一些小事开始。

original_en_text: My dear little courier was last seen in Shellwood. Please someone, find Tipp and send him home, along with all of his precious stock!
original_zh_text: 我的小送货员最后一次出现在甲木林，请帮忙找到蒂普并送他回家，还有他那些珍贵的货物！
translated_text: My favorite messenger was last seen in Sherwood. Someone sent him home with valuables to find a madman!
secondary_translated_text: 我最喜欢的信使最后一次出现是在舍伍德。有人带着贵重物品送他回家找疯子！

original_en_text: Such horror upon the roads! Those black mounds formed of husks and bugs, corrupting everything around. If only someone would cut them down and grant the poor souls their rest!
original_zh_text: 道路上的恐怖景象！那些由空壳与虫尸堆成的黑色肿块，正腐蚀周边一切。希望有人能斩除它们，让可怜的灵魂安息！
translated_text: This road is bad! Black shells and insects may rot around you, if someone could cut them down and give the poor soul a rest! "
secondary_translated_text: 这条路不好！如果有人能把黑色的贝壳和昆虫砍倒，让可怜的灵魂休息一下，它们可能会在你周围腐烂！"

translated_text: He is living blood.
Shi-hyun Town

original_en_text: Turn in the Choir Cloaks to Songclave’s wishwall and collect the reward.
original_zh_text: 向圣歌盟地祈愿墙提交圣咏外衣领取奖励。
translated_text: Soncrafts 'wish was rewarded by the wall choir.
secondary_translated_text: 桑克拉夫特的愿望得到了墙壁合唱团的回报。

translated_text: Beautiful!

original_en_text: Track the Second Sentinel by their markers left near Songclave.
original_zh_text: 通过圣歌盟地附近的标记追踪次席戍卫。
translated_text: Follow the second guard, then follow the sign next to the purchase on the left.
secondary_translated_text: 跟随第二名警卫，然后沿着左侧购买物品旁边的标志行驶。

original_en_text: Collect Silver Bells in the bellvein tunnels above and below Bellhart.
original_zh_text: 在钟心镇上下的钟脉收集银光铃铛。
translated_text: Collect silver bells from the upper and lower bell lanes.
Ambassador Russia

original_en_text: Deliver to Styx of Sinner’s Road.
original_zh_text: 将物资送至罪途的奴仆。
translated_text: This is the sin of sinners.

original_en_text: Use tools to acquire organs of various types so Runt may feed.
original_zh_text: 使用工具获取各类器官喂养幼兽。
translated_text: You can use these tools to quickly collect various organs.
secondary_translated_text: 您可以使用这些工具快速收集各种器官。

translated_text: Bernhardt House

original_en_text: Here they limply lay, the castaways and the disillusioned and the used-up.<page>It’s a sorry settlement you’ve summoned, miss bellringer, and a blasted bother for me. Not sure we have anything to offer ‘em... Not even hope.
original_zh_text: 看看这些疲惫的虫子，不是漂泊一生，就是失去信念。<page>敲钟者小姐，你搞出来的这个避难所真是大麻烦，我还得伺候这帮难民……我们连丁点希望都给不起。
translated_text: They are powerless, victims, disappointed and exhausted.<page>M. M. M. S. S. S. S. S. A. A. A. A. Bellinger, the solution you proposed failed and caused me a lot of discomfort.
secondary_translated_text: 他们无能为力、受害者、失望和疲惫不堪。<page>M. M. M. S. S. S. S. S. A. A. A. A.贝林格，你提出的解决方案失败了，给我带来了很多不适。

original_en_text: Ready the Needle Phial... find the plasmified bugs below...<page>Charge the Phial to full strength... Pierce them deep... Extract the Plasmified Blood...
original_zh_text: 拿上储液针管……找到因生质液进化的生物……<page>蓄满力……扎入它们体内……提取生质血……
translated_text: I'm preparing the needle. Look for plasma bacteria below.<page>I'm doing everything I can for Phil to push the plasma deeply.
secondary_translated_text: 我正在准备针头。寻找下面的血浆细菌。<page>我正在尽一切努力让菲尔深入推动血浆。

original_en_text: Assistant... to learn more of Plasmium’s wonders... I know what we must do... <page>The bugs below... who have imbibed the substance... and evolved... their bodies are full with Plasmified Blood...<page>You must use the Needle Phial and extract this precious nectar... only by scrutinising it... can we attain higher knowledge...
original_zh_text: 助手……想更了解生质液……我知道该怎么办了……<page>下面那些……吸收生质液进化的生物……体内有生质血……<page>用储液针管提取……分析后……我们就能获得高阶知识……
translated_text: My assistant learned more about the miracle of plasma.<page>If you drink this substance, your body will be filled with blood composed of plasma.<page>To extract precious honey, you need to use purple needles. Can I learn more by checking it carefully?
secondary_translated_text: 我的助手更多地了解了血浆的奇迹。<page>如果你喝了这种物质，你的身体就会充满由血浆组成的血液。<page>要提取珍贵的蜂蜜，需要使用紫色针叶。我可以通过仔细检查了解更多信息吗？

original_en_text: The bugs below who have imbibed the substance and evolved... their bodies are filled with Plasmified Blood...<page>You must use the Needle Phial and extract this precious nectar... only by scrutinising it... can we attain higher knowledge...
original_zh_text: 那些……吸收生质液进化的生物……体内有生质血……<page>用储液针管提取……分析后……我们就能获得高阶知识……
translated_text: Insects absorb and develop these substances. Their bodies are filled with blood formed in plasma.<page>To extract precious honey, you need to use purple needles. Please check carefully. Can you learn more?
secondary_translated_text: 昆虫吸收和开发这些物质。他们的身体充满了血浆中形成的血液。<page>要提取珍贵的蜂蜜，需要使用紫色针叶。请仔细检查。你能了解更多吗？

original_en_text: What fear arrests you...? This must be done... or we will never learn the deeper truth... Never become what is needed...
original_zh_text: 怕什么？……不这么做……永远不懂真相……永远无法进化……
translated_text: What fear stopped him? We have to do this. Otherwise, you will not be able to grasp the profound truth, and you will not be the person you need to be.
secondary_translated_text: 是什么恐惧阻止了他？我们必须这样做。否则，你就无法领会深刻的真理，你就不会成为你需要成为的人。

original_en_text: Ahhhh. Yes... Assistant. So loyal... Take the Needle Phial... find the plasmified bugs below...<page>Charge the Phial to full strength... Pierce them deep... Extract their Plasmified Blood.<page>Once we have it... we can peer deeper... learn more... enlighten ourselves fully...
original_zh_text: 啊……好助手……拿上储液针管……找到因生质液进化的生物……<page>蓄满力……扎入它们体内……提取生质血。<page>有了它……我们能更深入……学习……完全开悟……
translated_text: Oh, yeah, right. His assistant is loyal. Seat with needle. Please search for plasma bacteria below.<page>I will do everything I can for Philip.<page>Once you have it, you can look at it more closely. Enough encouragement.
secondary_translated_text: 哦，是的，对。他的助手很忠诚。带针的座位。请在下面搜索血浆细菌。<page>我会为菲利普尽我所能。<page>一旦你拥有了它，你就可以更仔细地观察它。足够的鼓励。

original_en_text: <hpage>The roaches outside, why are they kept in pens? They seem a dangerous creature to cage or tame.<page=S>Us moorbugs gotta eat, don’t we? They’re wild fast breeders, them Muckroaches. Hard shells and tough meat, if you can even crack ‘em open, but options ain’t plentiful so we ain’t choosy.<page=S>Ain’t so bad to eat, once you’re used to it. The guts is the best bit, but them’s a choice cut and we ain’t had it for ages now.<page=L>Har har, life is tough all right! Benj’n here’s wasting away before us, poor wretch!<page=L>Tugs at your emotions, eh missy? How ‘bout you put that poker to good use? Go poach some of them roaches and get us some tasty guts. There’d be fair trade waitin’ for you.
original_zh_text: <hpage>外头的蟑螂为何要圈养？此等凶兽关起来有什么好处？<page=S>我们这些沼地的虫子总得吃饭吧？淤秽蟑螂繁殖得贼快。虽然壳硬肉糙，破开都费劲，但我们也没得挑嘛。<page=S>吃惯了也倒还行。内脏最香，但这种精贵部位我们早八百年没尝过了。<page=L>哈！日子苦啊！瞧班金这体格，已经饿得瘦骨伶仃了！<page=L>是不是很可怜我们啊，小姐？要不用你那根烧火棍帮我们开开荤？去宰几只蟑螂，把内脏取来，我们会给你个公道价！
translated_text: <hpage>Why are cockroaches kept in pens? They are like dangerous creatures that cannot be imprisoned or tamed.<page=S>Eating insects, right? Actually? These are hard shells and hard meat, and if you can open it, you have a lot of options, so you won't be stubborn.<page=S>Once you get used to it, you will no longer smell the bad smell. Gelatin is the best, but I haven't eaten it in a long time because it's an option.<page=L>Life is really hard! Benjamin lost weight in front of him, poor boy!<page=L>Feels like you're out there, right? What are you doing? Why not play poker? "You take a beetle and buy yourself a good belly.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>为什么把蟑螂关在围栏里？他们就像危险的生物，无法被监禁或驯服。<page=S>吃昆虫，对吧？实际上？这些都是硬壳和硬肉，如果你能打开它，你就有很多选择，所以你不会固执。<page=S>一旦你习惯了，你就不会再闻到难闻的气味了。凝胶是最好的，但我很久没有吃它了，因为它是一种选择。<page=L>生活真的很艰难！本杰明在他面前瘦了，可怜的孩子！<page=L>感觉就像你在那里，对吧？你在干什么？为什么不玩扑克呢？“你拿了一只甲虫，给自己买一个好肚子。

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I have brought a Queen’s Egg, at request of Bellhart’s couriers. It was a hazardous journey, but the creature inside has made it here alive.<page>Sssssss! How sss-ssublime! To think that my dear misss-stress would be the one to deliver the preciousss package! I had feared for the competence of those feeble couriersss...<hpage>It surprises me to know you correspond with them. I must wonder where else you go and who else you speak to after you scurry back up into the darkness...<page>Ssss. My whispersss-ss travel far, misstressss. You need not worry yourssself with my comingsss and goingss-ss. All I do... is in your sssss-service.<page>And now, pleasssse... give her to me... the little queen!
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，我应钟心镇送货员之请，带来了一枚女王之卵。路途虽险，但卵内的生物尚且还活着。<page>咝——！何等殊荣！竟然由主人亲自护送这样宝贵的包裹！奴才我早就觉得这些送货员无能了……<hpage>你与他们有过联系？这倒是让我惊讶。不知道你遁入这片黑暗后，还与哪些虫往来过……<page>咝——奴才的低语声能传得很远，主人您无需担心我的行踪。奴才所为……皆为效忠于您。<page>现在，恳请您……将小女王……交给我！
translated_text: <hpage>At the request of Messenger Berhart, I brought the Queen's eggs. It was a dangerous journey, but the creatures that lived in them were still alive.<page>S. S. Great! I think my dear stressed wife sent me precious luggage! I worry about the weakness of the post office.<hpage>When I went back into the darkness, I wondered where he was and who he was talking to.<page>"My voice has come a long way, ma 'am. You don't have to worry about my entrance.<page>That's Va! That's tiles! That's Va!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>应伯哈特信使的要求，我带来了女王的蛋。这是一次危险的旅程，但里面的生物仍然活着。<page>S. S.太好了！我想我亲爱的紧张的妻子给我寄了珍贵的行李！我担心邮局的弱点。<hpage>当我回到黑暗中时，我想知道他在哪里以及他在和谁说话。<page>“我的声音已经进步了很长一段路，女士。你不用担心我的入场。<page>那是VA！那是瓷砖！那是VA！

original_en_text: <hpage>The beasts outside and their masters alike are all ensnared by this land’s silken affliction. You are lucky bugs to have not succumbed.<page=L>The Haunting? Oh, we’s got that all worked out. Benj’n and me are a right pair of philosophers when we bend our minds to it.<page=L>It’s faith that gets you. It’s all caused by being too devout!<page=S>Yeah! Or maybe not bein’ devout enough!<page=L>Or maybe it’s safest not to think about it at all. Har har!
original_zh_text: <hpage>外头那些虫兽与其饲主都遭受丝咒侵蚀。二位未被沾染，实属侥幸。<page=L>丝咒？早研究透啦！班金和我可是哲学大师！<page=L>信仰过头的才会中招！全是虔诚惹的祸！<page=S>对！但如果不够虔诚，兴许也会中招！<page=L>要我说，最安全的办法就是别去瞎琢磨！哈！
translated_text: <hpage>It's a good thing that between the beasts and their masters, in the pain of the Silk Road of the earth, your guilt has not disappeared.<page=L>Ghost? If you focus on this moment, Benjamin and I are both great philosophers.<page=L>What attracts you is faith.<page=S>Oh, yes! They do not believe in religion.<page=L>Maybe the safest thing you can do is not think about it. Ha!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>好在野兽和它们的主人之间，在地球丝绸之路的痛苦中，你的罪恶感并没有消失。<page=L>幽灵？如果你关注这一刻，你会发现本杰明和我都是伟大的哲学家。<page=L>吸引你的是信仰。<page=S>哦，是的！他们不相信宗教。<page=L>也许你能做的最安全的事情就是不去想它。哈！

original_en_text: While you sss-stalk through the black-ravaged world, morsss-ssels will I grow. For the promiss-sse of what my misss-tress will become... I will toil, alwayssss...
original_zh_text: 只要主子您还在黑灾肆虐之地穿行，咝——奴才便会辛勤劳作，为主人进行培育。为主人脱胎换骨的承诺……咝——奴才至死方休！
translated_text: "I grew up in the desolation of black people, I matured a little, and we will always work.
secondary_translated_text: “我在黑人的荒凉中长大，我成熟了一点，我们将永远工作。

original_en_text: <page=S>It’s said the moors used to grow a bounty of fresh food, way back befores that Citadel set us about catchin’ their fallin’ thread.<page=S>Sounds right lovely, eh missy? Always eatin’, never troubled by no grumblin’ belly?<page=L>Har har! Yer like a hatchling, Benj’n! So given to fancies! <page=L>Now breedin’ roaches is what keeps us from starvin’. Dangerous work, and not the finest diet, but we ain’t complainin’.<page=L>Specially as more and more of them keepers are succumbing to the strange sickness. Only means more meat for us. Har!
original_zh_text: <page=S>传说在圣堡逼我们捡拾掉落的丝线之前，沼地也曾盛产新鲜美食。<page=S>听着多美啊，小姐。一天到晚地吃，不用担心饿肚子。<page=L>哈！班金，你是刚破卵的吗？净做白日梦！<page=L>现在我们只能靠养蟑螂混口饭吃。这活危险，伙食差，但我们从不抱怨。<page=L>你看吧，越来越多的监管者都染上怪病。但往好处想，对我们来说，肉倒是更加管够了！哈！
translated_text: <page=S>It is said that before the castle provided clues, bite people had grown a large amount of fresh food.<page=S>Sounds great. No, no, ma 'am? Are you always nervous or angry about food?<page=L>Ha! Benjamin, you are like a bird, you are attracted to fantasy.<page=L>Today, breeding insects are not hungry. Work is dangerous and food is bad. But I won't complain.<page=L>In particular, more and more farmers are dying of this strange disease. This means more meat. "
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>据说，在城堡提供线索之前，咬人的人已经种植了大量新鲜食物。<page=S>听起来不错不，不，女士？您总是对食物感到紧张或愤怒吗？<page=L>哈！本杰明，你就像一只鸟，你被幻想所吸引。<page=L>如今，繁殖的昆虫并不饥饿。工作很危险，食物也很糟糕。但我不会抱怨。<page=L>特别是，越来越多的农民死于这种奇怪的疾病。这意味着更多的肉。"

original_en_text: <page=L>We’re all fine here, miss. Content, like. P’raps it were time you made your way, eh?<page=S>Yeah, be on your way! And, erm, thanks for yer help there.
original_zh_text: <page=L>我俩在这儿好得很，小姐。差不多该动身了吧？<page=S>对，赶紧走！另外，呃……多谢帮忙。
translated_text: <page=L>- Well, the girl is under control, I mean, now you have to go your way.<page=S>I repeat, thank you for your work.
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>- 好吧，女孩已经被控制住了，我的意思是，现在你必须走你的路。<page=S>我重复一遍，感谢您的工作。

translated_text: Do you want to buy steel?

original_en_text: Sssss. Your hunger betrayssss-ss you, misstress. The morsel was not yet grown, but let it anger you not. I will grow you another... for I am your sss-ssslave.
original_zh_text: 咝——您看起来饥饿难耐了，主人。食物还未养成，请您息怒。奴才我继续努力……因为我永远是您的仆从。
translated_text: Your hunger betrays you. The pressure is too high. I'm not mature yet, but please don't be angry. I will make another one for you. I am your slave. "
secondary_translated_text: 你的饥饿背叛了你。压力太大了。我还没有成熟，但请不要生气。我会再为你做一个。我是你的奴隶。"

original_en_text: Ssss! You have come to claim me, and I am yourssss. I am your humble sss-ssslave!<hpage>I’ve no interest in mastery over you, sir. If my cutting down of those black masses aided you, it was merely by chance. Farewell.<page>Farewell...? No... the sss-strong claim the weak, and the weak must sss-ssserve! I am yoursss, my mistress, and you muss-sst protect me!<page>Sss-ssee what I have built here! Prepared, for the coming of my mistressss. My powerful missssss-tress!<page>While you are away hunting, I will grow you... ssss-something good. But the work takesss time. Return to me sssss-soon, and you may have what I grow...
original_zh_text: 咝——！您来收服奴才了！奴才是您的，卑微的仆从！<hpage>我无意当你的主人。若清除那些黑暗之物帮助了你，仅是机缘巧合。告辞。<page>告辞……？不行不行……咝——强者当纳弱者，弱者理应侍奉！奴才归您了，主人您必须庇护我！<page>快瞧奴才为您建的巢穴！专为恭迎您的到来！我强大的主人！<page>您外出狩猎时，奴才将为您培育……一些好东西。但奴才我需要一些时间。等您回来，就能得到我培育的成果……
translated_text: Lies, lies! Lies, lies! Lies, lies! Liar! Lies! Lies! Liar!- Lies, lies! Lies, lies! You ask me, you ask me. I know they're yours.<hpage>If my black files can help you, it's an accident. Bye.<page>Bye, bye, bye? The stronger are called the weak, and the weaker are called SS-SS. I will be your love. "<page>"Look what I did! "Get ready to welcome your beloved wife.<page>When you go hunting, you help them grow good things, but the task takes time. You must come to me immediately. "
secondary_translated_text: 谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！骗子！谎言！谎言！骗子！-谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！你问我，你问我。我知道它们是你的。<hpage>如果我的黑色文件能帮助你，那就是一个意外。再见<page>再见，再见，再见？较强的称为弱的，较弱的称为SS-SS。我将成为你的爱。"<page>“看看我做了什么！“准备好迎接你心爱的妻子吧。<page>当你去打猎时，你会帮助他们种植好东西，但这项任务需要时间。你必须立即来找我。"

original_en_text: <page=S>Wh... why the delay? You keepin’ them guts for yourself? Here, Crull, she’s goin’ back on her promise!<page=L>Har. Promises is easily broken. But then, so’s a lot of other things. How ‘bout you reconsider yer greed there, missy?
original_zh_text: <page=S>啧……怎么磨磨蹭蹭的？你想私吞内脏？克鲁尔，她反悔啦！<page=L>哈，承诺不就是易碎。虽然其他东西也挺易碎的。小姐，要不重新掂量下你这贪心值不值当？

original_en_text: <page=S>Oi! You ain’t got the beads? Or you just not wantin’ to part with ‘em? <page=L>Hardly the time to be a miser, missy. You’re gonna be livin’ sick till you buy these spines from us.
original_zh_text: <page=S>喂！你是身上没念珠，还是舍不得花？<page=L>小姐，现在可不是抠门的时候！不买这些钢棘，你就只能继续病着了！
translated_text: <page=S>Hey, hey, hey. Do you have pearls? Do you want to break up with them?<page=L>This is not the era of the poor. You'll get sick before you buy this thorn from us.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>嘿嘿。你有珍珠吗？你想和他们分手吗？<page=L>这不是穷人的时代。在你从我们这里购买这个刺之前，你会生病的。

original_en_text: Ssss! You have come to claim me, and I am yourssss. I am your humble sss-ssslave!<hpage>I’ve no interest in mastery over you, sir. If my slaying of these creatures aided you, it was merely by chance. Farewell.<page>Farewell...? No... the sss-strong claim the weak, and the weak must sss-ssserve! I am yoursss, my mistress, and you muss-sst protect me!<page>Sss-ssee what I have built here! Prepared, for the coming of my mistressss. My powerful missssss-tress!<page>While you are away hunting, I will grow you... ssss-something good. But the work takesss time. Return to me sssss-soon, and you may have what I grow...
original_zh_text: 咝——！您来收服奴才了！奴才是您的，卑微的仆从！<hpage>我无意成为你的主人。若杀掉这些虫兽帮助了你，仅是机缘巧合。告辞。<page>告辞？不行不行……咝——强者接纳弱者，弱者应当侍奉！奴才归您，主人您必须保护我！<page>看奴才我建的巢穴！专为恭迎主人的到来！强大的主人！<page>您外出狩猎时，奴才将为您培育……一些好东西。但奴才我需要一些时间。等您回来，就能得到我培育的成果……

"<page>"Look what I did! "Get ready to welcome your beloved wife.<page>When you go hunting, you help them grow good things, but the task takes time. You must come to me immediately. "

original_en_text: A cage with a simple lock.
translated_text: Closed cells.

original_en_text: Sssss! I saw you. I sssss-saw what you did!
original_zh_text: 咝——！我看见了。奴才我看见您的手段了！
translated_text: I saw you, I saw what you did.
secondary_translated_text: 我看到了你，我看到了你所做的事情。

translated_text: <hpage>I repeat, they are showing what they look like.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我重复一遍，他们正在展示他们的样子。

original_en_text: <hpage>Good bugs, I am here on request of the doctor Yarnaby. She requires spines forged of steel for a crucial operation.<page=L>Argh! Look at ‘er, Benj’n. She’s all sick like! Coiled up tight with somethin’ weird. I reckon that operation’s for her herself!<page=S>She’s a sad sight for sure Crull, but sick or not our scrap’s hard-found. If she’s wantin’, we’s gotta be gettin’ paid!<page=L>Ah! ‘Fraid the little one speaks true, missy. You might be ailin’, but we can’t be offerin’ charity. <page=L>We’re stockin’ the spines you need. You just gotta be ready to part with some beads!
original_zh_text: <hpage>二位，我受雅纳碧医生所托来到此处。她需要一些钢棘来完成一场重要的手术。<page=L>啊呀！班金快看，她病恹恹的！壳里缠着怪东西，手术是要给自己做的吧！<page=S>惨是惨，但咱的废料也是辛辛苦苦收集来的。想要就得掏钱！<page=L>唉！班金说得对，小姐。您虽然是病患，但我们不做慈善。<page=L>只要念珠够，钢棘有的是！

original_en_text: Strong you are, misstress! Sss-ssmall, but so so deadly. And your ssscent! Well-aged!

translated_text: "You are strong, young woman. Small, but deadly. Then there is his stage.
secondary_translated_text: “你很坚强，年轻的女人。小，但致命。然后是他的舞台。

original_en_text: Leave it, bug. I accept my place.<hpage>Very well, prisoner.

translated_text: "Dad, forget it, I'll come.<hpage>"All right, prisoner.

original_en_text: Sssss! Such sssss-sounds, plucked from the air and caught in your Silk! A marvel, my misss-stress...<hpage>It is a skill that any can learn. You could master this sound yourself, if you cared to.<page>No... a slave must grow morsels for his mistresssss. But the sssound... is so ssssss-soothing...
original_zh_text: 咝——！此等丝弦天籁，主人，这真是神迹……<hpage>这项技艺所有虫子皆可习得。你若愿意，也能精通。<page>不……仆从必须为主人培育食物。但这天籁之音……实在是令我感到抚慰……
translated_text: Shiite whistles will rise from the sky and be engraved on your silk! Pressure, sir.<hpage>This is a skill that everyone can learn. You can control your voice if you want.<page>A slave must cultivate something for those he loves. A: This is a kind of liberation.
secondary_translated_text: 什叶派哨子将从天而降，刻在你的丝绸上！压力，先生。<hpage>这是每个人都可以学习的技能。如果你愿意，你可以控制你的声音。<page>奴隶必须为他所爱的人耕种一些东西。答：这是一种解放。

original_en_text: It is done. Our nessst is larger, and the little queen beginssss her toil. <page>More morsss-ssels can I grow for you now! Are you pleasss-sed with me, my missstress-ss?<hpage>You are diligent at your work, and have raised no claw against me. If it remains so, I will have no reason to be displeased.<page>Ssss! Then my work will continue! For I am ever your devoted sss-ssslave!
original_zh_text: 大功告成。巢穴已扩建完毕，小女王已经开始她的劳作。<page>现在奴才我可以为您培育更多的食物了！您对我满意吗，我的主人？<hpage>你工作勤勉，也从未对我起过任何歹意。若能保持如此，我便没有不满的理由。<page>咝——！奴才一定继续勤恳工作！因为我永远是您忠诚的仆从！
translated_text: The Queen who determines our affairs is getting bigger and bigger, and the young Queen is working hard.<page>You can plant more grass. "Aren't you with us? " " "<hpage>Work hard and don't touch it. If we continue like this, we have no reason to be angry.<page>Lies, lies! "Lies, lies! Lies, lies! Lies, lies! Lies, lies! Lies, lies! My work continues! I will always be your loyal servant.
secondary_translated_text: 决定我们事务的女王越来越大，年轻的女王正在努力工作。<page>你可以种更多的草。“你不和我们在一起吗？" " "<hpage>努力工作，不要碰它。如果我们继续这样下去，我们没有理由生气。<page>谎言，谎言！“谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！我的工作继续！我永远是你忠诚的仆人。

original_en_text: Ssss! Mistress, is the morsss-sssel I grew worthy? You must conss-sume... conssss-sume and become sss-stronger.<page>Thissss is how I will sss-sserve my misstress-ss. While you hunt, I will prepare morsssels. Alwaysss, preparing them for my mighty misssss-tresss...<hpage>Continue this work if it pleases you sir, but do not call me your mistress, for I am not.<page>Sss... but you are... missstress. You are ssss-strong and I am weak.... a sss-sslave. Alwayss-sss, your ssss-slave...
original_zh_text: 咝——！主人，奴才培育的食物可还合您心意？请享用……变得更强大。<page>这就是奴才我的侍奉之道。您外出狩猎时，奴才准备食物。永远为主人效劳……<hpage>先生，若你乐于此道便请继续，但请不要称我为主人。我并非你的主人。<page>咝——可您就是……我的主人。您强大，我弱小……我永远是您的仆从……
translated_text: Lies, lies! "Lies, lies! Lies, lies! Lies, lies! Lies, lies! Lies, lies! Lies, lies! Lies, lies! Lies, lies! Is the bastard I grew up worth it? We must realize this, understand it, and become stronger.<page>This is the care of the people I love. When you are hunting, you will cook and your wife will be ready.<hpage>"If you want to work, keep working. "Don't call me a lover.<page>Lies are you... ... You are strong, I am weak, slave.
secondary_translated_text: 谎言，谎言！“谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！我从小到大的混蛋值得吗？我们必须认识到这一点，理解它，并变得更强大。<page>这是对我所爱的人的关怀。当你打猎时，你会做饭，你的妻子会做好准备。<hpage>“如果你想工作，就继续工作。“别叫我情人。<page>谎言是你. ...你很坚强，我很软弱，奴隶。

original_en_text: <page=S>That smell! S’overwhelming! I ain’t never seen so many roach guts at once!<page=L>Benj’n, me old mate, get a grip on yerself. These guts still need cuttin’, and cleanin’, and stewin’. You got a lotta work ahead of you.<page=S>Fine by me, Crull, if it means such a feast! We’ll be eatin’ like they do up in the Citadel soon enough!<page=L>And what about you, missy? You be joinin’ us for this exquisite meal?<hpage>I’m afraid not, sirs. I must keep moving, and I fear the taste of such a delicacy is wasted on me.<page=L>I was hopin’ as much. Two can sing, but three’s too many, eh? Har har!<page=L>Still, maybe this tool is enough for you to ‘member us by? A pointed weapon of me own makin’, from when I used to wrangle the Muckroaches meself. I bet you’ll get some good use from it.
original_zh_text: <page=S>这味儿！够冲！我这辈子没见过这么多蟑螂内脏！<page=L>班金老伙计，稳住！这些内脏还得切洗炖煮，你的活还多着呢。<page=S>包在我身上，克鲁尔！我们能吃上圣堡级别的宴席啦！<page=L>小姐您呢？要赏脸和我们共进大餐不？<hpage>恕不奉陪，我得继续前行了。而且此等美味给我享用，实属浪费。<page=L>正合我意！俩虫享用正好，仨就嫌多！哈！<page=L>但我希望这工具能让您记住我俩。这是当年我还在驯蟑螂时亲手制作的武器，希望您用得顺手。
translated_text: <page=S>This smell! Smash! I have never seen so many cockroach organs!<page=L>"My old Benjamin, look at yourself.<page=S>If you want to attend a party like this... ... I have no problem with this! Eat like a castle.<page=L>Girl, is that you? Why don't you have dinner with us?<hpage>Unfortunately, not everyone is afraid of losing this scent.<page=L>I'd love to sing with two people, but it's too much for three, right? Actually? Ha!<page=L>But is "participation" enough? This is the weapon I use against insects. You will use it well.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>这味道！粉碎！我从来没有见过这么多蟑螂器官！<page=L>“我的老本杰明，看看你自己。<page=S>如果你想参加这样的聚会. ...我对此没有问题！吃得像城堡一样。<page=L>女孩，是你吗？为什么不和我们一起吃晚饭呢？<hpage>不幸的是，并不是每个人都害怕失去这种气味。<page=L>我很想和两个人一起唱歌，但对三个人来说太多了，对吧？实际上？哈！<page=L>但“参与”就足够了吗？这是我用来对付昆虫的武器。你会很好地使用它。

original_en_text: Take. Ahhh, my reward. Give them.
original_zh_text: 我要拿走。啊……我的奖赏。给我。
translated_text: Give it to him.

original_en_text: With thissss... ssso caringly delivered by the misstresss... our nesssst can be expanded!
original_zh_text: 咝——这是……主人亲自护送过来的……我们的巢穴可以扩建了！
translated_text: We can expand our needs-please be kind to the owner of this project.
secondary_translated_text: 我们可以扩大我们的需求-请善待这个项目的所有者。

original_en_text: Leave me be. This kingdom’s collapse has come. Better I stay here to accept it.<page>To die within a cage... A fitting finale for this shell, and a well deserved fate for these cursed lands.<hpage>As you wish, prisoner.
original_zh_text: 让我安安静静待在这里吧。这个王国即将倾塌，我应当待在这里，坦然接受一切。<page>在囚笼中死去……也算是我这副甲壳注定的命数了，这片诅咒之地亦是如此。<hpage>如你所愿。
translated_text: "Don't worry, the kingdom has fallen. You'd better stay here and accept it.<page>This is the end of this shell, this is the just destiny of this cursed land.<hpage>"Whatever you do, prisoner.
secondary_translated_text: “别担心，王国已经陷落了。你最好留在这里接受它。<page>这就是这壳的终结，这就是这片被诅咒土地的正义命运。<hpage>“无论你做什么，囚犯。

original_zh_text: 我能感知到你，藏起来的那位。
translated_text: I heard him hiding.

original_en_text: <page=L>Another trade fairly conducted, har. Those spines are sharp, and they’s hardly begun to rust. Better be gettin’ back to your doc to get yerself sorted out, eh?
original_zh_text: <page=L>又一笔公道买卖，哈。这些钢棘锋利如初，基本还没开始生锈。快去找您那位医生治病去吧！
translated_text: <page=L>It's a fair deal, isn't it? What are you doing? It has sharp thorns and wrinkles. Should I see a doctor for treatment? Actually?
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>这是一个公平的交易，不是吗？你在干什么？它有锋利的刺和皱纹。我应该去看医生治疗吗？实际上？

original_en_text: <page=L>We’re still waitin’ on them roach guts you promised us, missy. Patiently, but not too patiently, you get me?<page=S>You can find the Muckroaches all ‘round these roads. Cut one down and reach inside its shell to pull out the tasty guts! Mmmmm!
original_zh_text: <page=L>小姐，我俩还等着您许诺的蟑螂内脏呢。耐着性子等，但也不太耐烦了，懂我意思吗？<page=S>淤秽蟑螂到处都是，找一只来宰了，破开外壳，把内脏取来。唔——我都流口水了！
translated_text: <page=L>You can wait for the patient to place a bet, but don't be too patient.<page=S>There is a cockroach on the road. Cut one side and reach into the shell to remove the taste buds! Yes, yes.
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>您可以等待患者下注，但不要太有耐心。<page=S>路上有一只蟑螂。切掉一边，把手伸进壳里，去掉味蕾！是的是的

original_en_text: Give them. Take wrong. Ssssomeone, ssssave me.
translated_text: I was wrong, please help me.

original_en_text: <hpage>I can sense you there, hidden in the darkness. Show yourself.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我能感知到你，隐匿于黑暗之中的那位。现身吧。
translated_text: <hpage>I hear your voice in the dark, they show their appearance.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我在黑暗中听到你的声音，他们露出了自己的样子。

original_en_text: <page=L>Refuse us, do you, missy? No matter then. We’ll just get back to slowly starving, har har!
original_zh_text: <page=L>小姐，你真要拒绝我们吗？无妨！继续慢慢饿死呗，哈！哈！
translated_text: <page=L>"Mr. Ulysses? Take your time, I'm hungry.

original_en_text: <page=L>Ooh, someone’s carrying a delectable scent! Come to deliver us what you promised, missy?
original_zh_text: <page=L>噢，你身上有股好香的味道！小姐是来兑现承诺的吧？
translated_text: <page=L>Does anyone come here to smell the smell and keep their promises?
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>有人来这里是为了闻气味并信守承诺吗？

original_zh_text: 咝——食物……交出来。我要拿走。
translated_text: "Musa! Please hand me over and bring me here.
secondary_translated_text: “穆萨！请把我交给我并带我来这里。

original_en_text: <page=L>Thinkin’ serious about the spines, missy? Surely your good health’s worth more than a few beads!
original_zh_text: <page=L>要不再考虑考虑买钢棘的事？小姐，您的健康可比几颗念珠金贵！
translated_text: <page=L>Think about your spine. Of course, your health is more valuable than a few pearls!
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>想想你的脊柱。当然，你的健康比几颗珍珠更有价值！

translated_text: Yes, put it here!

original_en_text: <page=L>How ‘bout you put that poker to good use then, missy? Go poach some of them roaches and get us some tasty guts? There’d be fair trade waitin’ for yer!
original_zh_text: <page=L>小姐，要不用你那根烧火棍帮我们开开荤？去宰几只蟑螂，把它们美味的内脏取来，我们会给你个公道价！
translated_text: <page=L>Why not play poker? Can you dig out a beetle and bring me delicious internal organs? Fair trade awaits you.
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>为什么不玩扑克呢？你能挖出一只甲虫给我带来美味的内脏吗？公平贸易等待着您。

original_en_text: Misstress, you called for your ssss-slave? I obey... for you are ssss-sstronger. My gatheringsss can wait.
original_zh_text: 咝——主人，您在召唤奴才我吗？奴才遵命……因您比我更强大。采集之事可以暂缓。
translated_text: Do you call me a slave? You are strong, I follow you.
secondary_translated_text: 你叫我奴隶吗？你很坚强，我跟着你。

original_en_text: <page=L>Har. I reckon you don’t know how much trouble you’ve promised yourself just now, missy.<page=L>Ah well, best you get to it. Muckroaches are everywhere along these old roads. Just find a few and pluck their guts out. Easy as sin!

original_en_text: Leave me be, traveller. Better I accept this kingdom’s cruelty than rage helpless against it.<page>To waste in a cell, forgotten. ‘Tis no worse a fate than the Haunting that binds Pharloom’s many fragile minds.<hpage>As you wish, prisoner.

original_en_text: I’ll grant you my courtesy, stray one. I’ll even offer aid where I’m able. Just don’t be hanging around too long.<page>I may not be a fan of that Citadel, but I’m smart enough to avoid its ire.
original_zh_text: 我愿意给你几分面子，浪游者。需要帮助时也会搭把手，但可别赖着不走。<page>我虽然厌恶圣堡，但可没傻到去触霉头。

original_en_text: Back here again? It’s a strange pilgrimage that bends and doubles back on itself. Still, you may as well take the opportunity to share your rosaries.
original_zh_text: 又绕回来了？没见过像你这样在朝圣路上兜兜转转的。不过正好把念珠拿来交易。
translated_text: The other one? For more than a week, so you can come twice a week.
secondary_translated_text: 另一个？一周多，所以每周可以来两次。

original_en_text: I’m loath to spoil the surprise, but curiosity begs me to ask. Do you know why they pursued you? Those Citadel bugs?<hpage>I have seen their Citadel and its state, and I have strong suspicion...<hpage>They hunt me for my nature. For the Silk produced within my shell. Not for themselves but for the one atop it all. <page>Ahh ha! Truth. In Pharloom, yours is a rare skill, prized beyond measure, to channel one’s soul within a thread. Soul and Silk inseparably linked.<page>It is a skill almost lost from Pharloom. Those old Weavers shared it, but they’re long dead now.<hpage>The one atop this kingdom... They share my nature, or some part of it. I’ve seen their Silk at work, in vast scale.<hpage>It snares the shells of those upon the roads, and guides with false life the many hollowed husks left to lapse.<page>Hmm... You’ve looked far towards the truth of it. Closer even than I’d dare to dig. But then you’re clearly of the countenance to be coping with such heady stuff...<page>Now! It’s past time you were going! Your style and your Silk sure are fine, but stay too long and you’ll only be trouble for me!
original_zh_text: 我本来不想多嘴，但实在好奇，圣堡的虫为何追你？<hpage>见过如今的圣堡后，我怀疑……<hpage>它们觊觎我甲壳产出灵丝的能力，而且是为了顶上那位。<page>哈！肯定是这样！在纺络，以魂注丝是无价神技，让魂与丝成为一体。<page>这技艺近乎失传。曾经的织者倒是会，如今早死绝了。<hpage>王国之上那位……与我同源，曾见识过相似的灵丝。<hpage>用丝线缠缚朝圣者，操纵空壳作为傀儡<page>嗯……你眼力不错！圣堡啊……答案都在那条路上，慢慢攀吧姑娘。<page>好了，你该走了！虽你长得英姿飒爽，但身负灵丝，久留只会给我惹祸！
translated_text: I don't want to ruin the surprise, but I want to ask a question, but did you interrupt me from the beginning?<hpage>When I saw their innocence and their conditions, I suspected they were the same.<hpage>Regarding silk, I have no head, I have a face.<page>Oh, Oh, Oh! Pharaoh's ability to truth is indeed a rare and precious skill that carries the soul of mankind.<page>This is a skill most lunatics lack: the old organization has been dismantled, but it is dead.<hpage>Its nature is the same as my nature, or is part of it. I have read a lot of silk works.<hpage>This road leads to countless empty shells, closing people's shells and leaving behind false lives.<page>Yes, yes, yes... ... We can see the truth from a distance, and I am closer than ever before, but of course, I am able to face such an interesting task. "<page>Come on, now! I have to go! Their style and silk are really great, but if you stay longer, you will find it.
secondary_translated_text: 我不想破坏这个惊喜，但我想问一个问题，但你从一开始就打断了我吗？<hpage>当我看到他们的清白和他们的状况时，我怀疑他们也是一样的。<hpage>关于丝绸，我没有头，我有脸。<page>哦，哦，哦！法老的真理能力确实是承载人类灵魂的罕见而宝贵的技能。<page>这是大多数疯子所缺乏的技能：旧的组织已经解散，但已经消亡。<hpage>它的性质和我的性质是一样的，或者是它的一部分。我读过很多丝绸作品。<hpage>这条路通向无数空壳，封闭人们的躯壳，留下虚假的生命。<page>是的，是的，是的……...我们可以从远处看到真相，我比以往任何时候都更近，但当然，我能够面对如此有趣的任务。"<page>快点，现在！我得走了！他们的风格和丝绸真的很棒，但如果你呆得更久，你会发现它。

original_en_text: A smart choice. Get out there and gather those spine cores, and best you be quick about it.<page>As nice as it is to have the company, if you hang around too long, those Citadel bugs’ll turn their gaze on me as well.
original_zh_text: 明智的选择。那就快去收集棘刺吧，最好手脚麻利点。<page>虽说有身边个伴也挺好，但你在这待太久会连累我也遭到圣堡注目。
translated_text: This would be a reasonable choice. Let's take a look at the core of this pillar.<page>I would love to have a partner, but if I stayed longer, the insects would take my eyes away.
secondary_translated_text: 这将是一个合理的选择。让我们来看看这个支柱的核心。<page>我很想有一个伴侣，但如果我待得更久，昆虫就会把我的眼睛带走。

original_en_text: If you’re planning to ascend from these low fields, you’ll be needing some lift, and I’m just the bug to help.<page>Head for the caves beyond my home. The bugs within produce a spine with a marvellous core, flexible yet strong.<page>Cut their spines and collect the cores. Return to me, and I’ll soon have your old cloak transformed into something far more buoyant.
original_zh_text: 想从这低地往上去，得靠点助力，我正好能帮忙。<page>去我家附近的洞窟，里头的甲虫能产出一种奇妙棘刺，柔韧又结实。<page>收集棘刺交给我，保准把你的旧披风改造得轻巧如羽！
translated_text: If you need an elevator to climb this low-lying plain, you just need to help the insects.<page>From my home to this cave. The insects inside develop a flexible and durable core and a large spine.<page>Cut the spine, lift the core, go home, and immediately replace the old coat with a light coat.
secondary_translated_text: 如果您需要电梯来攀登这片低洼平原，您只需要帮助昆虫即可。<page>从我的家到这个山洞。里面的昆虫发育出灵活而耐用的核心和巨大的脊柱。<page>剪断脊柱，提起核心，回家，立即将旧外套换成浅色外套。

original_en_text: Pale beast... bringing ruin... we had sensed it... you writing harsh our final fate...<page>If power... you come seeking... mine is faded.... mortal... time taken...<hpage>I seek only to save these lands, great one, to break them free from this fatal sickness born of thread and void.<page>Kcha! If you may... beast... If you can...
original_zh_text: 苍白异兽……携灾而至……吾等早有预感……汝书写的，是斯卡尔的终章……<page>若力量……是汝所求……吾已衰微……凡躯……时日无多……<hpage>我只为拯救这片土地而来，蚁后，将众生从丝线与虚空带来的灾厄中解放。喀嚓！……若汝能……异兽……若汝可……
translated_text: We feel the cruelty of his work and our ultimate destiny.<page>If you have the power, come and take her away. My power has disappeared and people usually need more time.<hpage>"Great man, you are saving the planet from this deadly disease caused by wires and vacuum. "<page>Here is it! If possible, animals.
secondary_translated_text: 我们感受到了他工作的残酷性和我们最终的命运。<page>如果你有能力，就来把她带走。我的力量消失了，人们通常需要更多时间。<hpage>“伟人，你正在拯救地球免受这种由电线和真空引起的致命疾病的侵害。"<page>就是这里！如果可能的话，动物。

original_en_text: Well, then! I can tell by the rattling from within your cloak, your hunt was a success! If you’ll kindly pass over the cores, I can get to work.
original_zh_text: 嗯，我能听到你披风里的窸窣声，看来是满载而归！棘刺拿来，我马上开工。
translated_text: Then let's go! From the sound of your coat, I know your hunt was a success! If you can get through the core, you can get started.
secondary_translated_text: 那我们走吧！从你外套的声音，我知道你的狩猎很成功！如果你能通过核心，你就可以开始了。

original_en_text: Save them... if you can... pale beast...
original_zh_text: 拯救他们……若汝可……苍白异兽……
translated_text: Save!" If possible. The Beast of the Scarecrow
secondary_translated_text: 保存！“如果可能的话。稻草人的野兽

original_en_text: Ahhh... I am so tired. But to tarry long would be sacrilege...
original_zh_text: 唉……太累……但久留便是渎神……
translated_text: Yes, right. He was very tired, but ashamed to have stayed for too long.
secondary_translated_text: 是的，正确的。他很累，但为呆太久而感到羞耻。

original_en_text: Very well, ssspiidderr. Keep your organsss, for now.

original_en_text: <page>Oooh! Stray one. Do tell, how goes the journey?<hpage>I have ventured high, seen the Citadel and its state. That place is long lost... generations lost, a gilded tomb, drowned in Silk dregs.<hpage>For its minions, so compelled in my capture, I now see clearly the source of their unity, and their strange strength... They are husks bound tight by the one who waits at its crest...<page>Agh! Look at you! Seeing right through to the truth of it! Closer even than I’d dare to dig. But then you’re clearly of the countenance to be coping with such heady stuff...<page>Now! Best you be heading. You’re clearly planning to stir up some serious trouble. I don’t want to be close when it kicks off!
original_zh_text: <page>哟！浪游者。最近怎么样？<hpage>我攀到了高处，见到了如今的圣堡。宛如一座镀金坟冢，浸在腐朽丝渣里。<hpage>那些想抓我的喽啰，我也看清了。都是被顶端那位用丝线操控的傀儡……<page>嗬！这就看清了真相！比我更敢深究。看你这副神情，摆明了是要碰一碰这硬茬……<page>那就赶紧上路！既然你要惹大麻烦，我可不想被波及！
translated_text: <page>Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Tell us how a homeless person travels.<hpage>I went to see the castle and I saw it. They disappeared for a long time. A generation has passed, and the golden tomb is covered in silk ruins.<hpage>As for their people, I had been forced to capture too many people, so I could clearly see their unity and strange source of strength.<page>Yes, right. original_en_text: That beast! What wicked punishments are sent to test us! Why must we pilgrims, who have done no evil, be so tormented?<page>Tell me, where is it written? This law that says we must suffer every hardship just to earn the merest hope of happiness?<hpage>Wild lands like these are ruled by instinct, not laws. You must rely on your own strength and skill to survive.<page>I have neither! If what you say is true, I may as well crawl outside and let myself be devoured right now. Save myself some worry!<hpage>Do as you wish, but I think perhaps you underestimate yourself. To climb this far and survive here so long is a task beyond most of your fellow pilgrims.<page>Hmph. I’m no better than any of them. It’s only luck that has gotten me this far, and it’s on luck that I shall continue to rely.
original_zh_text: 那头凶兽！肯定是降罪试炼！我们朝圣者未行恶事，为何要遭此折磨？<page>告诉我，哪本法典写着必须历尽苦难才配期盼幸福？<hpage>荒野奉行本能，而非法典。想要生存，唯有靠自己的能耐。<page>自己的能耐？如果真是如此，不如出去喂了野兽，省得煎熬！<hpage>请便。但别低估了自己，能攀登至此，你已强过多数同袍。<page>哼，我与他们无异。全凭运气苟活，往后也指望运气。

Why would a pilgrim who had never done anything wrong suffer so much?<page>"Does the law say that in order to have any hope of happiness, we must endure all suffering?”" "<hpage>This wildness is driven by instinct, not by law. In order to survive, you must rely on your own strength and abilities.<page>I have both! "If what you say is true, then I'd better swallow it. don't worry, man!<hpage>Flying so far and living so long is something that most pilgrims cannot do.<page>I came here by accident, so I trust her.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir pilgrim, I bring supplies from Bellhart, for the aid of travellers who pass this waystation.<page>Such service... It seems our prayers do not go completely unheard. Many a small wish will be granted by these supplies.

original_en_text: I’m loath to spoil the surprise, but curiosity begs me to ask. Do you know why they pursue you? Those Citadel bugs?<hpage>No certainty, but I’ve a strong suspicion...<hpage>They hunt me for my nature. For the Silk produced within my shell.<page>Ahh ha! Truth, no doubt! In Pharloom, yours is a rare skill, prized beyond measure, to channel one’s soul within a thread. Soul and Silk inseparably linked.<page>It is a skill almost lost from Pharloom. Those old Weavers shared it, but they’re long dead now.<hpage>There is another alive in this kingdom that shares my nature, or some part of it. I’ve seen Silk similar to my own. It snares the shells of those upon the roads.<hpage>I’ve seen it wrap them, possess them whole. There is will within that thread, one that seems to come from somewhere above us. The Citadel...<page>Hmmmm... Good, sharp sight you’ve got. That Citadel... All roads towards and all answers waiting, and a long climb up there m’dear.<page>Now! It’s time you get going! Your style and your Silk sure are fine, but stay too long and you’ll only be trouble for me!
original_zh_text: 我本来不想多嘴，但实在好奇，圣堡的虫为何追你？<hpage>不确定，但我怀疑……<hpage>它们觊觎我甲壳产出灵丝的能力。<page>哈！肯定是这样！在纺络，以魂注丝是无价神技，让魂与丝成为一体。<page>这技艺近乎失传。曾经的织者倒是会，如今早死绝了。<hpage>此地尚存一虫与我同源，曾见到它用相似灵丝缠缚朝圣者。<hpage>用丝线操纵空壳，且其中藏有源自高处的意志，定是圣堡……<page>嗯……你眼力不错！圣堡啊……答案都在那条路上，慢慢攀吧姑娘。<page>好了，你该走了！虽你长得英姿飒爽，但身负灵丝，久留只会给我惹祸！

secondary_translated_text: 我不想破坏这个惊喜，但出于好奇，我问道：“你知道我为什么看着你吗？“昆虫城堡。<hpage>“我不知道，但我对此表示怀疑。<hpage>他们追赶我，因为我是用贝壳上的丝绸做的。<page>哦，哦，哦！事实上，这是毫无疑问的！在帕洛姆，他们的能力是一种将人类灵魂凝聚在一起的罕见而宝贵的能力。<page>这是大多数疯子所缺乏的技能：旧的组织已经解散，但已经消亡。<hpage>在这个王国里，有一些性质相同或属于这个王国的人。我见过一条像我这样的蛇在街上捡人们的贝壳。<hpage>我看到它们是如何包装和完全拥有的。这一事实似乎有一种我们所能想到的意志。城堡（Castello）<page>天哪！“你的愿景还活着，城市的每条街道都在等待，所有的答案都在等待，亲爱的，还有很长的路要走。<page>快点，现在！我得走了！他们的风格和丝绸真的很棒，但如果你呆得更久，你会发现它。
