original_en_text: Oho? You linger here still? Perhaps, like myself, you have been bewitched by the Plasmium’s beautiful glow?<page>Then join me, you must! A new assistant is needed. Together we shall unlock the secrets of this wondrous substance!
original_zh_text: 哦哟？你还没走呢？难道你也迷上生质液的蓝光了？<page>那就加入我吧！正好缺新助手，我们一起揭开这宝贝的秘密！
translated_text: What are you doing? Yeah, right? Do you want to play with me? Like me, you are also fascinated by the beautiful mountain light.<page>Stay with us! Follow me, please! I need a new assistant. Let's discover the secret of this magical material together!
secondary_translated_text: 你在干什么？是的，对吧？你想和我玩吗？和我一样，你也被美丽的山景迷住了。<page>和我们在一起！请跟我来！我需要一个新助理。让我们一起探索这种神奇的材料的秘密！

original_en_text: There, you are replete with wonderful Plasmium once more! You can begin injecting it at once. Now, off with you!
original_zh_text: 拿好，神奇生质液又重新装满了！你又可以注射了，快出发吧！
translated_text: Besides, you also have a great dish! You can start the injection immediately. Yes, yes, yes!
secondary_translated_text: 另外，你还有一道很棒的菜！您可以立即开始注射。对，对，对！

original_en_text: Assistant... You will help, yes? The buds have ripened... The Plasmium harvest can begin...
original_zh_text: 助手……你会帮忙的对吧？花苞熟了……该收集生质液了……
translated_text: "Please, assistant, can you help me? "Really? "The ball has been played. The recovery of plasma has begun.
secondary_translated_text: “拜托，助理，你能帮帮我吗？“真的吗？“球已经打了。血浆的回收已经开始。

original_en_text: Leave your fear behind... Cast it off like an old shell. Give me what I need...
original_zh_text: 抛开恐惧……像蜕壳一样扔掉。把东西给我……
translated_text: Throw it away like old shells and give them what you need.
secondary_translated_text: 像旧壳一样扔掉它，给他们你需要的东西。

original_en_text: Bring the Pure Plasmium. It must be tested... ingested.<page>Ready the Needle Phial to full charge... Strike deep the ripened buds. Return that precious liquid life to me... Assistant.
original_zh_text: 带纯净生质液来……必须测试……吸收……<page>把储液针管蓄满力……扎进成熟花苞……把生质液带回来……
translated_text: Obtaining clean plasma requires inhalation testing<page>Get ready to install the pins and deeply enjoy the mature buttons. Let precious life flow.
secondary_translated_text: 获得清洁血浆需要吸入测试<page>准备好安装别针，尽情享受成熟的按钮吧。让宝贵的生命流淌。

original_en_text: Excellent! With two bugs at the task, the rate of discovery shall greatly increase!<page>Now! Before he up and vanished, my previous assistant seeded the warrens below with Plasmium buds.<page>The buds should be ripening as we speak, and the nectar within must be extracted before they reach maturity.<page>With the right tool in claw, collecting the nectar is an easy process. I’ll even lend you my own Needle Phial for the job.<page>Once you locate a bud, simply charge the Phial until readied, then release its needle into a bud’s core. Do it right, and it’ll suck out the nectar in one clean pop!<page>Return them to me when you’ve retrieved the necessary samples. With the right nectar, and the right testing, Plasmium can reveal even more of its wondrous properties!
original_zh_text: 太好了！效率翻倍！<page>我那前任助手在下面虫道种了生质液花苞。<page>现在应该快成熟了，得在成熟前提取生质液。<page>用储液针管采集，很简单的，我把我用的借给你。<page>找到花苞后蓄满力，把针头扎进核心，嗖的一下就能抽出来！<page>把带样本回来。有了它们做实验，生质液会更神奇！
translated_text: This is unbelievable! Two errors in the mission will greatly speed up detection.<page>Come on, now! Before I woke up and disappeared, my former assistant cultivated a parasitic microbe in the cabin below me.<page>As mentioned earlier, the button must be ripe and the honey it contains must be extracted before ripening.<page>With the right nail tools, honey collection is a simple process. I will lend you a needle.<page>When you find the button, fill it with the needle until it is ready, then place the needle in the center of the button. Once you leave it, it will look clean and suck honey.<page>After collecting the required samples, please return the samples to me. With the right honey and the right testing, the plasma shows even more amazing properties.
secondary_translated_text: 这太不可思议了！任务中的两个错误将大大加快检测速度。<page>快点，现在！在我醒来消失之前，我的前助理在我下面的小屋里培养了一种寄生微生物。<page>如前所述，纽扣必须成熟，其中所含的蜂蜜必须在成熟前提取。<page>使用合适的美甲工具，蜂蜜收集就是一个简单的过程。我借给你一根针。<page>当您找到按钮时，用针填充它直到准备好，然后将针放置在按钮的中心。一旦你离开它，它就会看起来干净并吮吸蜂蜜。<page>收集完所需的样本后，请将样本退还给我。通过正确的蜂蜜和正确的测试，血浆显示出更令人惊叹的性能。

original_en_text: Assistant, that odour... aahhh... you have the Plasmified Blood...
original_zh_text: 助手……这气味……你拿到生质血了……
translated_text: It has a smell, but it has plasma.

original_en_text: Keep using the Plasmium Phial, and enjoy all the wonderful effects it has on your body. Once your Plasmium reserve runs dry, visit me again.<page>I’ll charge a few rosaries for refills, but you can be confident that every bead goes towards our vital studies!
original_zh_text: 尽管用，好好感受生质液的神奇。用完再来找我。<page>如果要重新装满生质液，我得收点念珠当经费，都是为科研做贡献！
translated_text: Keep using the plasma flame and enjoy all its wonderful effects on your body. If you don't have plasumium, please contact us.<page>We are collecting some accounts, but we believe each account will be used for important research!
secondary_translated_text: 继续使用等离子火焰，享受它对您身体的所有美妙影响。如果您没有血浆，请联系我们。<page>我们正在收集一些帐户，但我们相信每个帐户都将用于重要的研究！

original_en_text: Do you fear the Plasmium, even now? Ahhh... Assistant... open your mind to the possibilities...
original_zh_text: 现在还怕生质液？啊……助手……敞开心扉接受可能……
translated_text: Are you afraid of heights? Oh, yes! His assistant opened his heart and seized the opportunity.
secondary_translated_text: 你恐高吗？哦，是的！他的助手敞开心扉，抓住了机会。

original_en_text: Assistant... What we might become... together.
translated_text: Help us understand who we are and who we are.
secondary_translated_text: 帮助我们了解我们是谁以及我们是谁。

original_en_text: Ahhhh. Yes... Assistant. So loyal... Take the Needle Phial... find the buds below. They are ripe...<page>Charge the Phial to full strength... Pierce them deep... Extract that Pure Plasmium.<page>This shell shall become what you need it to be... Plasmium can cure all.
original_zh_text: 啊……对……助手……真忠诚……拿着储液针管……去下面找熟透的花苞……<page>蓄满力……扎透核心……提取纯净生质液……<page>这副躯壳将完成蜕变……生质液会治愈一切……
translated_text: Oh, yeah, right. His assistant is loyal. Replace the position of the needle. Please press the button below to search. They mature.<page>I've done my best, Phil, to dig deeper into pure plasma.<page>Plasma can cure everything.
secondary_translated_text: 哦，是的，对。他的助手很忠诚。更换针的位置。请按下面的按钮进行搜索。他们成熟了。<page>菲尔，我已经尽了最大努力来深入研究纯血浆。<page>血浆可以治愈一切。

original_en_text: Assistant! You’re still dallying about here? I’ve an eager need for pure Plasmium, fresh from the bud.<page>Just one fully charged stab of my Needle Phial straight into a ripe bud! You’ll suck the Plasmium right up!<page>Now, pop down into those worm warrens and extract it for me! What could possibly be more important?
original_zh_text: 助手！怎么还在这磨蹭？我要花苞里的新鲜生质液！<page>用储液针管扎成熟花苞，把生质液抽出来就行！<page>好了，快去虫道干活！还有什么比这更重要的？
translated_text: Assistant! Do you want to play with me? I need a clean plasma button.<page>All you need to do is fully load the needle and press the maturity button directly. It absorbs plasma.<page>Enter the kingdom of worms and dig it for me! What is important?
secondary_translated_text: 助理！你想和我玩吗？我需要一个干净的等离子按钮。<page>您需要做的就是将针头装满并直接按下成熟按钮。它吸收血浆。<page>进入蠕虫的王国，为我挖掘它！什么是重要的？

original_en_text: <hpage>I am curious about the equipment you have here, and the blue liquid contained within. What study consumes you?<page>Ahh yes! So this miraculous substance intrigues you too! A wonder beyond wonders, miracle made material!<page>Plasmium! A naturally occurring elixir with no equal! It heals wounds and strengthens shells! I suspect it can even defy death itself!<hpage>Plasmium, you call it? I have encountered its like before, or else a substance of remarkable similarity...<page>Highly unlikely! The grey and barren soil of the mainland could never produce something as singular as this, and that is undisputable fact!<page>Plasmium was discovered by my master at the farthest edge of Pharloom, hidden deep in salt-stricken waters. I brought it to these caves under her direction, to study how it flourishes in a foreign place.<page>Perhaps, like myself, you have been bewitched by the Plasmium’s beautiful glow? Would you assent then, to assisting me in my studies?
original_zh_text: <hpage>我对这些仪器和蓝色液体有点好奇，你在研究什么？<page>啊哈！你也对这神奇物质感兴趣！这是奇迹中的奇迹，实体化的魔法！<page>生质液！无与伦比的天然灵药！疗伤健体，说不定还能起死回生！<hpage>生质液？我好像见过类似的……<page>不可能！纺络那贫瘠的灰土地产不出这种宝贝，这是铁的事实！<page>最初是我的导师在王国边陲的咸水深处发现了它。我奉命带到这山洞研究异地培育。<page>难道你也迷上生质液的蓝光了？要不要当我的研究助手？
translated_text: <hpage>I'm interested in your equipment and the blue liquid there. What kind of research consumes energy?<page>Yes, right. Yes, yes, this amazing material will fascinate you too! Miracles beyond surprises, wonderful materials!<page>Plasma. An unprecedented natural wonder heals wounds and strengthens the shell. I believe I can endure death.<hpage>What is the name of this mountain? Have you seen him before? They look very similar.<page>It is an undeniable fact that the gray and desolate land of this continent has never produced anything so strange.<page>The plasmas were found hidden deep in the water near the edge of the Faroe Islands, and under his guidance they were taken to a cave to study how they thrive in unknown places.<page>You may be fascinated by this beautiful passage as I am.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我对你们的设备和那里的蓝色液体很感兴趣。什么样的研究消耗能源？<page>是的，正确的。是的，是的，这种令人惊叹的材料也会让你着迷！超越惊喜的奇迹，精彩的材料！<page>等离子体前所未有的自然奇观可以治愈伤口并增强外壳。我相信我能忍受死亡。<hpage>这座山叫什么名字？你以前见过他吗？他们看起来非常相似。<page>不可否认的事实是，这片大陆灰色而荒凉的土地从未产生过如此奇怪的东西。<page>这些等离子体被发现隐藏在法罗群岛边缘附近的深水中，在他的指导下，它们被带到一个洞穴中研究它们如何在未知的地方繁衍生息。<page>你可能和我一样对这段美丽的段落着迷。

original_en_text: Plasmium is a marvel of nature! And a new assistant is sorely needed. Together, let us unlock its secrets!
original_zh_text: 生质液是自然奇迹！正好缺新助手，我们一起揭开它的秘密吧！
translated_text: The plateau is a natural wonder. I need a new assistant. Let's discover this secret together!
secondary_translated_text: 高原是一个自然奇观。我需要一个新助理。让我们一起发现这个秘密吧！

original_en_text: Oho? A new face! Not here to bother, I hope? I’ve critical studies underway in these twisting tunnels and can afford no distractions!<page>You haven’t met Zango, my assistant, by chance? An indolent sort? Short, slovenly, rather unreliable-seeming?<hpage>In a dark cave below here, I encountered a shell not dissimilar from your own. I suspect your assistant may have met an unfortunate end.<page>Ah ha! That careless buffoon. No surprises then. That lump never shone with the talent for true discovery.<page>Now! To my work I must return! With my assistant so rudely dying on me, I’ve tasks enough for two bugs.<page>Unless you have further interest in my precious Plasmium, kindly leave me in peace!
original_zh_text: 哦哟？新面孔！不是来捣乱的吧？我在这些弯弯绕绕的洞里搞重大研究，可经不起分心！<page>有见过我助手赞戈吗？懒骨头一个，矮个子邋遢样，看着就不靠谱？<hpage>我在下方一黑暗洞窟里见到过和你挺像的尸壳，看来你的助手可能遭遇了不幸。<page>哈！那个冒失鬼。一点也不意外，废物本来就没科研天赋。<page>好了！我得赶紧开始研究了！现在死了助手，我得干双份活。<page>除非你对生质液感兴趣，否则别打扰我！
translated_text: What are you doing? Yeah, right? New faces!" You don't want to bother me, do you? Actually? We are conducting a rigorous study of this winding tunnel.<page>You've never met an assistant, have you? What kind of rest? Speed, speed, reliability.<hpage>In the dark cave below, I found something no different from its shell.<page>Oh, Oh, Oh! It is not surprising that the public has never shown a gift for discovery.<page>Come on, now! I have to get back to work! My job can tolerate two mistakes because my assistant is dead and he disrespects me.<page>If you don't care about my precious plasma, let me rest. "
secondary_translated_text: 你在干什么？是的，对吧？新面孔！“你不想打扰我，是吗？实际上？我们正在对这条蜿蜒的隧道进行严格的研究。<page>你从未见过助理，是吗？什么样的休息？速度、速度、可靠性。<hpage>在下面黑暗的洞穴里，我发现了一些与它的壳没什么不同的东西。<page>哦，哦，哦！公众从未表现出发现的天赋，这并不奇怪。<page>快点，现在！我得回去工作了！我的工作可以容忍两个错误，因为我的助理死了，他不尊重我。<page>如果你不关心我珍贵的血浆，那就让我休息吧。"

original_en_text: Oh? Those who hesitate learn nothing, you know! The wondrous bright glow of Plasmium makes all things clear!
original_zh_text: 哦？犹豫可学不到新知识！生质液的美丽蓝光会照亮一切！
translated_text: What are you doing? Really? I don't know the suspect. The incredibly bright light of the plasma will reveal everything!
secondary_translated_text: 你在干什么？真的吗？我不认识嫌疑人。等离子体令人难以置信的明亮光线将揭示一切！

translated_text: as Suri Gran

original_en_text: <hpage>I have retrieved the Pure Plasmium, as requested. Know that, in your current state, I feel some reservation passing it to you.<hpage>This path your research takes... The final result may not be pleasant.<page>Pure Plasmium? No... Assistant... You must not doubt... It is precious. Perfect. It was needed... You have done well. As always...
original_zh_text: <hpage>你要的纯净生质液。但要交给这样状态的你，我有点犹豫。<hpage>你的研究方向……结局可能不太妙。<page>纯净生质液？不……助手……别怀疑……这是珍宝……完美……必须的……干得好……
translated_text: <hpage>I will pick up the plate when needed. I'm worried about you about your current situation.<hpage>Schools continue to do this, and the end results may not be pleasant.<page>The plasma is clean. No, we cannot doubt that. Yes, I said.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>需要的时候我会拿起盘子。我很担心你现在的情况。<hpage>学校继续这样做，最终的结果可能并不令人愉快。<page>血浆干净。不，我们不能怀疑这一点。是的，我说了。

original_en_text: These lands have taken the Plasmium well... the soil has drunk it deep, and the creatures bloom so beautifully... have you seen them?<hpage>The effect of your Plasmium on the beasts here is all too evident. Great change has been inflicted upon them.<hpage>There is an echo also of other infections I have witnessed. I wonder at the meaning of it all... or if I am perhaps imagining similarities where there are none.<page>Assistant, ahhh... you grow more inquisitive... We both seek deeper insight...<page>Could we... peer deeper inside somehow...? Let us think on it...
original_zh_text: 这片土地吸收了生质液……深入土壤，深入生物，花苞绽放……看见了吗？<hpage>你的生质液让野兽变异，影响太明显了。<hpage>这让我想起以前见过的其他感染，不知是巧合还是……<page>助手啊……你也变好奇了……想深入探索……<page>或许……我们该更进一步研究？……让我想想……
translated_text: The soil was so saturated that I saw these creatures blooming beautiful flowers.<hpage>The impact of tables on animals is very obvious here.<hpage>It is similar to other infections I have seen. "I want to know what you mean. You can imagine one place being like another.<page>You're getting more and more curious, and we're all looking for ideas.<page>Can you take a look for me? Let's think about time.
secondary_translated_text: 土壤是如此饱和，我看到这些生物盛开美丽的花朵。<hpage>桌子对动物的影响在这里非常明显。<hpage>这和我见过的其他感染很相似。“我想知道你的意思。你可以想象一个地方和另一个地方一样。<page>你越来越好奇，我们都在寻找想法。<page>你能帮我看看吗？让我们想想时间。

original_en_text: Ahhhh... Assistant... greed was ever your greatest failing. Do not guard your discoveries so jealously...
original_zh_text: 啊……助手……贪婪是你的弱点……别独占成果……
translated_text: Oh, Oh... The greed of his aides was his biggest failure. Don't risk the consequences.
secondary_translated_text: 哦，哦.助手们的贪婪是他最大的失败。不要冒后果的风险。

original_en_text: For you... dear assistant... drink deep my liquid life...
original_zh_text: 喝吧……亲爱的助手……饮下我的生命精华……
translated_text: Dear assistant, drink the liquid of my life.
secondary_translated_text: 亲爱的助手，喝我生命中的液体吧。

original_en_text: Since you have proven yourself a capable assistant, take this delightful implement of my own invention, a Plasmium Phial.<page>With it, you can inject precious Plasmium straight into your body. Almost painlessly!<hpage>Your tool certainly looks sharp enough to pierce my shell, sir, but why should I want to do so?<page>Because filling your body with Plasmium is so beneficial! It protects you from harm! And it feels so exquisitely good!<page>My assistant and I have been injecting Plasmium into the local flora and fauna since we arrived. No ill effects have been observed, and so we can conclude that the process is utterly, completely safe.<page>Keep using the Plasmium Phial, and enjoy all the wonderful effects it has on your body. If you ever run out of Plasmium, visit me again.<page>I’ll charge a few rosaries for refills, but you can be confident that every bead goes towards our vital studies!
original_zh_text: 既然你够格当助手，送你个好东西——生质液瓶！<page>有了它，就能直接往甲壳里注射生质液，几乎不疼！<hpage>这工具确实足够扎穿我的外壳，但我为何要这么做？<page>因为注射生质液好处多多！不仅能防止受伤，而且感觉非常好！<page>我和助手给本地动植物都打过，没出现任何副作用，完全安全！<page>尽管用，好好感受生质液的神奇。用完再来找我。<page>如果要重新装满生质液，我得收点念珠当经费，都是为科研做贡献！
translated_text: Now that you have proven you are a skilled assistant, you have brought me an interesting tool, the plasma bottle, which I invented.<page>With its help, we can introduce precious plastic directly into our bodies.<hpage>Your instrument looks sharp enough to break my shell, doesn't it? Why are you doing this? "<page>Supplementing your body's blood pressure is very beneficial! He will protect you from evil. I feel much better!“<page>Since I arrived, my assistants and I have seen plasma injected into local flora and fauna. Since no side effects were observed, we can conclude that the process is absolutely safe.<page>Keep using the plasma flame and enjoy all its wonderful effects on your body. "If you have been to plasma, please come back to me.<page>We are collecting some accounts, but we believe each account will be used for important research!
secondary_translated_text: 既然你已经证明了你是一名熟练的助手，你给我带来了一个有趣的工具，那就是我发明的血浆瓶。<page>在它的帮助下，我们可以直接将珍贵的塑料引入我们的体内。<hpage>你的乐器看起来足够锋利，足以打破我的外壳，不是吗？你为什么这样做？"<page>补充身体的血压非常有益！他会保护你免受邪恶的侵害。我感觉好多了！“<page>自从我到达后，我和我的助手看到血浆被注射到当地动植物中。由于没有观察到副作用，我们可以得出结论，该过程绝对安全。<page>继续使用等离子火焰，享受它对您身体的所有美妙影响。“如果你去过血浆，请回到我身边。<page>我们正在收集一些帐户，但我们相信每个帐户都将用于重要的研究！

original_en_text: Ahh, and exactly the required amount! A satisfactory effort, assistant!<page>With this pure Plasmium extract, I may finally come to understand this wondrous substance.
original_zh_text: 啊，分量刚好足够！干得不错！<page>有这纯净生质液，终于能破解奥秘了！
translated_text: This is the amount we need. All right, sir.<page>With the help of this pure plasma extract, I was finally able to understand this surprising substance.
secondary_translated_text: 这是我们需要的数量。好的先生.<page>在这种纯血浆提取物的帮助下，我终于能够理解这种令人惊讶的物质。

original_en_text: Assistant... You will help, yes? The buds have ripened... The Plasmium harvest can begin...
original_zh_text: 助手……你会帮忙的对吧？花苞熟了……该收集生质液了……
translated_text: "Please, assistant, can you help me? "Really? "The ball has been played. The recovery of plasma has begun.
secondary_translated_text: “拜托，助理，你能帮帮我吗？“真的吗？“球已经打了。血浆的回收已经开始。

original_en_text: <hpage>Take it, sir, though what insight it will grant you I cannot say.<page>Have faith, dear assistant... After all this I understand... the greatest knowledge comes only from faith... faith in Plasmium.<page>This blood you have collected... sparkles... I see it! A glorious form... a glorious future, shimmering back at us...
original_zh_text: <hpage>拿去吧，虽然不知能研究出什么。<page>要有信念，好助手……我现在明白了……真理源自信念……对生质液的信念……<page>你收集的血……在发光……我看见了！辉煌形态……辉煌未来……等着我们……
translated_text: <hpage>You don't know what it means to you, but you have to accept it.<page>Dear friends, after all this, I have learned that the greatest knowledge can only come from belief in plasma.<page>The blood he collected glistened. A bright future lies before us.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>你不知道这对你意味着什么，但你必须接受它。<page>亲爱的朋友们，经过这一切，我了解到，最伟大的知识只能来自于对血浆的信仰。<page>他收集的血液闪闪发光。光明的未来摆在我们面前。

original_en_text: You decline, Assistant? You cannot. The buds... The harvest. It must occur... For the source, and your saving...
original_zh_text: 你拒绝？花苞……必须收割……为了源头，也为了救你……
translated_text: Assistant, did you say "no"? We can't, we need to reap, your income and your savings.
secondary_translated_text: 助理，你说“不”了吗？我们不能，我们需要收获，你的收入和储蓄。

original_en_text: You would refuse?! There is much work to be done, and it is all so achingly slow when I have no aid!
original_zh_text: 你要拒绝？！这么多活要干，没助手进度太慢了！
translated_text: You will refuse to do this! There is a lot of work to do, but if you don't help, everything will slow down.
secondary_translated_text: 你不会答应的！有很多工作要做，但如果你不帮忙，一切都会变慢。

original_en_text: Ohhhhh... Assistant? Is that you?... You return at last, my friend?<hpage>Sir, you are in a disturbing state. This substance sprouts from within your shell. Time will see it consume you entirely. Would you seek aid?<page>No... No... Assistant... you are confused. A wonderful thing, we become. The Plasmium, our great research... We have progressed.<page>The research must continue. Soon... I shall become a source.
original_zh_text: 呃啊啊……助手？是你吗……终于回来了……<hpage>先生，你身体状态异常。某种物质在你壳内滋生，迟早会吞噬你。需要帮助吗？<page>不……不……助手……你错了。我们在进化……生质液……研究大突破……<page>研究必须继续……很快……我将成为源头……
translated_text: Yes, right. Assistant? Is that you? Friends, are you finally back?<hpage>This substance is produced by perception. Over time, it will tell you that you are completely exhausted. Do you need help?<page>No, research on plasmas is increasing.<page>The investigation will continue soon... ... I will be the source.
secondary_translated_text: 是的，正确的。助理？是你吗？朋友们，你们终于回来了吗？<hpage>这种物质是由感知产生的。随着时间的推移，它会告诉你你已经完全精疲力尽了。你需要帮助吗？<page>不，对等离子体的研究正在增加。<page>调查将很快继续. ...我将成为源头。

original_en_text: Assistant! Have you come to refill your reserve of Plasmium?
original_zh_text: 助手！你是来补充生质液的？
translated_text: Assistant! Are you here to hold plasma?
secondary_translated_text: 助理！你是来装血浆的吗？

translated_text: Restoration of plasma accumulation.

original_en_text: Oho? A new face! Not here to bother, I hope? I’ve critical studies underway in these twisting tunnels and can afford no distractions!<page>You haven’t met Zango, my assistant, by chance? An indolent sort? Short, slovenly, rather unreliable-seeming?<hpage>I have not, sir. I am curious though, about the equipment you have here, and the blue liquid contained within. What study consumes you?<page>Ahh yes! So this miraculous substance intrigues you too! A wonder beyond wonders, miracle made material!<page>Plasmium! A naturally occurring elixir with no equal! It heals wounds and strengthens shells! I suspect it can even defy death itself!<hpage>Plasmium, you call it? I have encountered its like before, or else a substance of remarkable similarity...<page>Highly unlikely! The grey and barren soil of the mainland could never produce something as singular as this, and that is indisputable fact.<page>Plasmium was first discovered by my master at the farthest edge of Pharloom, hidden deep in salt-stricken waters. I brought it to these caves under her direction, to study how it flourishes in a foreign place.<page>Now! To my work I must return! Unless you have further interest in my precious Plasmium, or chance upon my truant assistant, kindly leave me in peace!
original_zh_text: 哦哟？新面孔！不是来捣乱的吧？我在这些弯弯绕绕的洞里搞重大研究，可经不起分心！<page>有见过我助手赞戈吗？懒骨头一个，矮个子邋遢样，看着就不靠谱？<hpage>没见过。不过我对这些仪器和蓝色液体有点好奇，你在研究什么？<page>啊哈！你也对这神奇物质感兴趣！这是奇迹中的奇迹，实体化的魔法！<page>生质液！无与伦比的天然灵药！疗伤健体，说不定还能起死回生！<hpage>生质液？我好像见过类似的……<page>不可能！纺络那贫瘠的灰土地产不出这种宝贝，这是铁的事实！<page>最初是我的导师在王国边陲的咸水深处发现了它。我奉命带到这山洞研究异地培育。<page>好了！我要继续工作了！除非你对生质液感兴趣，或者碰见我那翘班助手，否则别打扰我！
translated_text: What are you doing? Yeah, right? New faces!" You don't want to bother me, do you? Actually? We are conducting a rigorous study of this winding tunnel.<page>You've never met an assistant, have you? What kind of rest? Speed, speed, reliability.<hpage>But I am interested in this device and blue liquid, what kind of research consumes energy?<page>Yes, right. Yes, yes, this amazing material will fascinate you too! Miracles beyond surprises, wonderful materials!<page>Plasma. An unprecedented natural wonder heals wounds and strengthens the shell. I believe I can endure death.<hpage>What is the name of this mountain? Have you seen him before? They look very similar.<page>There is no doubt that the gray and barren soil of the African continent could produce something so strange.<page>The plasmas were found hidden deep in the water near the edge of the Faroe Islands, and under his guidance they were taken to a cave to study how they thrive in unknown places.<page>Come on, now! I have to get back to work! If you are not in my precious plasma, or know that I have no assistant, please let me rest. "
secondary_translated_text: 你在干什么？是的，对吧？新面孔！“你不想打扰我，是吗？实际上？我们正在对这条蜿蜒的隧道进行严格的研究。<page>你从未见过助理，是吗？什么样的休息？速度、速度、可靠性。<hpage>但我对这个设备和蓝色液体很感兴趣，什么样的研究消耗能源？<page>是的，正确的。是的，是的，这种令人惊叹的材料也会让你着迷！超越惊喜的奇迹，精彩的材料！<page>等离子体前所未有的自然奇观可以治愈伤口并增强外壳。我相信我能忍受死亡。<hpage>这座山叫什么名字？你以前见过他吗？他们看起来非常相似。<page>毫无疑问，非洲大陆灰色贫瘠的土壤会产生如此奇怪的东西。<page>这些等离子体被发现隐藏在法罗群岛边缘附近的深水中，在他的指导下，它们被带到一个洞穴中研究它们如何在未知的地方繁衍生息。<page>快点，现在！我得回去工作了！如果你不在我珍贵的血浆中，或者知道我没有助手，请让我休息一下。"

original_en_text: There... more. Let it seep deep into your shell... do not begrudge the pain...
original_zh_text: 灌满了……让液体渗入甲壳深处……别怕疼……
translated_text: You left... ... Don't be jealous of pain.
secondary_translated_text: 你离开了. ...不要嫉妒痛苦。

original_en_text: The Pure Plasmium... you have it. I can... smell it on you.
original_zh_text: 纯净生质液……你带来了。我闻到了……
translated_text: Plasma-I can smell you.
secondary_translated_text: 等离子体-我能闻到你的味道。

original_en_text: Through consumption of the blood... we shall at last attain enlightenment...<page>For your reward... take the gland from within my shell... my gift to you.<page>I have no more need of it... and it shall grant you... unending reserves of Plasmium...<page>Yes... Plasmium. Pure... beautiful... Plasmium...
original_zh_text: 吸收生质血……我们终将开悟……<page>给你的奖励是……拿走吧……我壳里的腺体……<page>我不需要了……它会给你……无限生质液……<page>没错……生质液……纯净……美丽……
translated_text: They will eat blood and will be revealed in due course.<page>As a reward, please remove the iron from my skin.<page>We no longer need it, and we will give you an unlimited mountain reserve.<page>"Yes, sir. Li said... About Plasma
secondary_translated_text: 他们会吃血，并在适当的时候被揭露。<page>作为奖励，请把我皮肤上的铁除掉。<page>我们不再需要它，我们将为您提供无限的山地保护区。<page>“是的，先生。李说.关于血浆

original_en_text: Assistant! How goes your work? Have you extracted a sufficient amount of Plasmium for me?
original_zh_text: 助手！进展如何？提取到足够生质液了吗？
translated_text: Assistant! How is your job? Is there enough plasma?
secondary_translated_text: 助理！你的工作怎么样？血浆是否足够？

original_en_text: Excellent! With two bugs at the task, the rate of discovery shall greatly increase!<page>Now! Before he went and died, my previous assistant seeded the warrens below with Plasmium buds.<page>The buds should be ripening as we speak, and the nectar within must be extracted before they reach maturity.<page>With the right tool in claw, collecting the nectar is an easy process. I’ll even lend you my own Needle Phial for the job.<page>Once you locate a bud, simply charge the Phial until readied, then release its needle into a bud’s core. Do it right, and it’ll suck out the nectar in one clean pop!<page>Return them to me when you’ve retrieved the necessary samples. With the right nectar, and the right testing, Plasmium can reveal even more of its wondrous properties!
original_zh_text: 太好了！效率翻倍！<page>我那死鬼助手在下面虫道种了生质液花苞。<page>现在应该快成熟了，得在成熟前提取生质液。<page>用储液针管采集，很简单的，我把我用的借给你。<page>找到花苞后蓄满力，把针头扎进核心，嗖的一下就能抽出来！<page>把带样本回来。有了它们做实验，生质液会更神奇！
translated_text: This is unbelievable! Two errors in the mission will greatly speed up detection.<page>Come on, now! Before I passed away, my former assistant used plasma to raise mosquitoes in his basement cabin.<page>As mentioned earlier, the button must be ripe and the honey it contains must be extracted before ripening.<page>With the right nail tools, honey collection is a simple process. I will lend you a needle.<page>When you find the button, fill it with the needle until it is ready, then place the needle in the center of the button. Once you leave it, it will look clean and suck honey.<page>After collecting the required samples, please return the samples to me. With the right honey and the right testing, the plasma shows even more amazing properties.
secondary_translated_text: 这太不可思议了！任务中的两个错误将大大加快检测速度。<page>快点，现在！在我去世之前，我的前助理在他的地下室里用血浆饲养蚊子。<page>如前所述，纽扣必须成熟，其中所含的蜂蜜必须在成熟前提取。<page>使用合适的美甲工具，蜂蜜收集就是一个简单的过程。我借给你一根针。<page>当您找到按钮时，用针填充它直到准备好，然后将针放置在按钮的中心。一旦你离开它，它就会看起来干净并吮吸蜂蜜。<page>收集完所需的样本后，请将样本退还给我。通过正确的蜂蜜和正确的测试，血浆显示出更令人惊叹的性能。

original_en_text: Are you so enchanted by the Plasmium that you will not part with it? You are more like that dolt Zango than I first thought!<page>Its enlightenings are beyond your meagre mind! Give me the phial, assistant, or the deeper secrets of this substance will never be revealed!
original_zh_text: 舍不得交出来？你和赞戈那蠢货一个德行！<page>你这脑子参不透其中奥秘的！不交出生质液就永远别想知道秘密！
translated_text: You don't want to give up because you are attracted to this beautiful country? Corals look more than they seem.<page>Please give me a bottle and help. Otherwise, the deepest secrets of this issue will never be revealed.
secondary_translated_text: 你不想因为被这个美丽的国家吸引而放弃吗？珊瑚看起来比看起来更重要。<page>请给我一瓶并帮助。否则，这个问题最深的秘密永远不会被揭露。

original_en_text: Aahhh... and you have been using your Plasmium... good. Let me replenish your reserve...
original_zh_text: 啊……你一直在注射生质液……很好。让我给你补满……
translated_text: Yes, right. The utilization rate of plasma is high. We will respect your reservation.
secondary_translated_text: 是的，正确的。血浆利用率高。我们将尊重您的预订。

original_en_text: Now. Share the discovery... Take this Plasmium Phial... Plunge it deep. Feel its vigour soak your shell...<page>If more is needed... If the Plasmium runs dry... return. Visit me again... That you may live, long... my loyal assistant.
original_zh_text: 现在，分享成果……拿着生质液瓶……扎进去……感受活力渗透……<page>用完再来找我……这样你才能……活得长久……我的好助手……
translated_text: Share results quickly. Vial Plate: Feel the vitality of your skin and you will feel it.<page>If you need more. When your plasma dries up, look at me again, you will live a long time.
secondary_translated_text: 快速分享结果。小瓶板：感受皮肤的活力，你就会感受到它。<page>如果您需要更多。当你的血浆枯竭时，再看看我，你会活很长一段时间。

original_en_text: Grant the Herald’s wish and finish the game
original_zh_text: 成全使者的心愿，终结这场宿命
translated_text: Grant Gerrard's wishes and the game are over.
secondary_translated_text: 格兰特·杰拉德的愿望和比赛结束了。

translated_text: Cradle game
fanatics.
I bought my first Christina.
secondary_translated_text: 我买了我的第一个克里斯蒂娜。

translated_text: The soul of steel.

original_zh_text: 击败“斯卡尔歌后”卡梅莉塔
translated_text: The Ska Singa Camerita
Gray ghost.

original_zh_text: 30小时内达成100%完成度并通关游戏
translated_text: 100% game within 30 hours
We have the first technology.
Defeat the defeated player.
You are a virgin.

original_zh_text: 击败原罪者，并利用缚丝夺取其力量
translated_text: He defeated the first sinner.
I beat the judge.

original_en_text: Defeat Lost Lace and free Pharloom
original_zh_text: 击败失心蕾丝并解放纺络
translated_text: Defeat the lost race and release the pharaohs.
secondary_translated_text: 击败失败的种族并释放法老。

original_en_text: Defeat Grand Mother Silk while cursed
original_zh_text: 在畸芽之咒状态下击败苍白之母
translated_text: Shit, grandma.
Pick up the first tool.
Create a triangle.

original_en_text: Achieve 100% game completion and finish the game
original_zh_text: 达成100%完成度并通关游戏
translated_text: Make sure you play 100% completely.
Collect all icons.

original_en_text: Defeat Grand Mother Silk and bind her power
original_zh_text: 击败苍白之母，并利用缚丝夺取其力量
translated_text: He defeated his mother and tied her strength.
secondary_translated_text: 他击败了他的母亲，并巩固了她的力量。

original_en_text: Collect all Mementos and display them in your Bellhome
original_zh_text: 收集全部忆痕并在钟居展示
translated_text: Please put your memories in your suitcase.
secondary_translated_text: 请将您的回忆放入您的手提箱。

original_en_text: <hpage>Very well. This final rite... what would you have me do?<page>The time... of birth is close. Now give... its shell. Host... the final rite.<page>The time of birth... is near.
original_zh_text: <hpage>好吧。这最终仪式……需要我做什么？<page>诞生……之时。献出……甲壳。宿主……终仪。<page>诞辰……已至。
translated_text: <hpage>Okay, okay, it's a ritual. What do you want me to do?<page>What is time? The moment of birth is coming, and now let me tell you that he was the last guest at the banquet.<page>The time of birth is getting closer and closer.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>好吧，好吧，这是一种仪式。你想让我做什么？<page>时间是什么？出生的时刻即将到来，现在让我告诉你，他是宴会上的最后一位客人。<page>出生的时间越来越近了。

original_en_text: You may rest here in this sacred place, but know, if you choose to step further, you shall see my weapon raised.
original_zh_text: 你可以在此处休息，但记住，越界意味着面对我的兵刃。
translated_text: You can rest in this sacred place, but if you decide to go further, you will see my hand coming.
secondary_translated_text: 你可以在这个神圣的地方休息，但如果你决定走得更远，你会看到我的手降临。

original_en_text: The time... the time of birth approaches. The bud cries. Yearning. The final rite may begin.<page>White shell. Red cloak. Bug strong and old. The time of birth is near. Aid now the final rite.
original_zh_text: 时刻……诞生之时将至。花苞啼哭。终仪可启。<page>白面红袍。古老强虫。诞生之时已至，此刻助我终仪。
translated_text: Now is the time, the moment of birth has arrived, lies are screaming, and voting has begun.<page>White skin. Red coat. Insects are strong and ancient. The time of birth is getting closer and closer. I will help you complete the final ritual.
secondary_translated_text: 现在是时候了，出生的时刻已经到来，谎言在尖叫，投票已经开始。<page>皮肤白皙。红色外套。昆虫强大而古老。出生的时间越来越近了。我会帮助你完成最后的仪式。

original_en_text: P... Pollip Hearts. Gathered. Gathered all. All that is needed, is given.
translated_text: P.C. Sir, I don't know. The polyp heart binds you together and gives her everything she needs.
secondary_translated_text: P.C.先生，我不知道。息肉心脏将你们联系在一起，并为她提供她需要的一切。

original_en_text: <hpage>I hear your request, but I must decline. My travels will take me far beyond this wood.<page>Decline. No. Decline, not. The time of birth approaches. The first rite must begin.
original_zh_text: <hpage>很遗憾，我有要事在身，没法帮忙。<page>拒绝。不可。诞生之时将至。仪式必启。
translated_text: <hpage>I listened to your request, but I had to refuse. "My journey goes far beyond these woods.<page>He has not fallen, he has been rejected, and the time for childbirth has come. The first ceremony began.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我听了你的请求，但我不得不拒绝。“我的旅程远远超出了这些树林。<page>他没有跌倒，他被拒绝，分娩的时候已经到来。第一场仪式开始了。

original_en_text: <hpage>If you have knowledge or power to grant, I will aid you. These Pollip Hearts you desire... they can be found about the wood?<page>P... Pollip Hearts. Found in the wood. Yes, bug.<page>Seek out the purple blooms. Inside... the hearts.<page>The time of birth approaches. Pollip Hearts are needed. Bring them, bug, and power will be shared.
original_zh_text: <hpage>若你能分享只是，我愿意帮忙。哪里能找到花芯？<page>花……花芯。树林间，对。<page>寻找紫花。芯……在其中。<page>诞生之时将至。带来花芯，共享力量。
translated_text: <hpage>If you have any knowledge or skills, we can help you. Can you find the polyethylene you want in the tree?<page>P.S. I don't know. I am the heart of Polyphemos. I found him in the woods.<page>I'm looking for pink flowers. Heart, heart, heart.<page>I need a carp spirit to carry them, insects and power to share.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>如果您有任何知识或技能，我们可以帮助您。你能在树上找到你想要的聚乙烯吗？<page>P.S.我不知道我是波利菲莫斯的核心。我在树林里发现了他。<page>我正在寻找粉红色的花。心，心，心。<page>我需要鲤鱼灵魂来承载它们，昆虫和力量来分享。

original_en_text: Bug. Cloaked by red. The time of rebirth approaches.<page>First rite is completed. Prepared. For the time of birth.<page>Take... take. The refuse of the rite.
original_zh_text: 红袍虫。重生之时将至。<page>初仪完成。准备。迎接诞生。<page>收下……仪式残渣。
translated_text: Put on a red coat and it's time to recover.<page>After the first ceremony, they prepared to give birth.<page>Revo... ... Yes, I firmly refuse.
secondary_translated_text: 穿上红色外套，是时候恢复了。<page>第一次仪式结束后，他们准备分娩。<page>雷沃. ...是的，我坚决拒绝。

original_en_text: Rrrr... rite. The first rite must begin. Pollip Hearts are needed.
original_zh_text: 呃……仪式。初仪必启。需要花芯。
translated_text: Yes, yes, yes... ... Start toasting. You need a big heart.
secondary_translated_text: 是的，是的，是的……...开始干杯。你需要一颗宽广的心。

original_en_text: <hpage>I am unable to help you. Not now. Perhaps another traveller will offer aid.<page>None... none come now. Once times, many bugs. Many. Now none. The final rite... the time of birth approaches...
original_zh_text: <hpage>我现在无法帮助你，或许会有其他旅者伸出援手。<page>无虫……曾有许多……如今无虫。终仪……诞生之时将至……
translated_text: <hpage>You can't help yourself, but you can help other travelers.<page>There are many mistakes that no one will make, some will make, but so far there is no final incident.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>您无法帮助自己，但您可以帮助其他旅客。<page>有很多错误是没有人会犯的，有些人会犯的，但到目前为止还没有最终的事件。

original_en_text: Bug. Red cloak. Far-travelled. Bring it here... the bud.<page>It calls. It cries for the rite. Offer it.
original_zh_text: 虫。红袍虫。远旅者。你带来了……花苞。<page>它在呼唤。呼唤仪式。献上吧。
translated_text: The red dress is far away from here, please bring it here.<page>We need awareness, and we provide it.
secondary_translated_text: 红色连衣裙离这里很远，请把它带到这里。<page>我们需要意识，我们提供意识。

original_en_text: Then go no further, that peace may remain between us.
original_zh_text: 那请就此止步，不必打破这份和平。
translated_text: You don't have to go anymore. There is peace between us.
secondary_translated_text: 你不必再去了。我们之间有和平。

original_en_text: The bud... weak. New. It must be nourished.<page>Nnn... nourished. It will be nourished.
original_zh_text: 花苞……孱弱。新生。需要滋养。<page>滋……滋养。得到滋养。
translated_text: This is a weak news... ... They need to be fed.<page>Oh, my God! "You can feed us.
secondary_translated_text: 这是一个弱消息. ...他们需要被喂食。<page>天哪！“你可以养活我们。

original_en_text: Seek out the purple blooms. Inside... the precious hearts.<page>The time of birth approaches. Pollip Hearts are needed. Bring them, bug, and power will be shared.
original_zh_text: 寻找紫花。内有……珍贵花芯。<page>诞生之时将至。带来花芯，共享力量。
translated_text: I'm looking for pink flowers. baby Baby<page>I need a carp spirit to carry them, insects and power to share.
secondary_translated_text: 我正在寻找粉红色的花。宝贝宝贝<page>我需要鲤鱼灵魂来承载它们，昆虫和力量来分享。

original_en_text: Bug. Only you are left. None more tread here. None.<page>For the rite. The Pollip Hearts. They are needed. Bring them here, for the rite.
original_zh_text: 只剩你。无虫来此。<page> 仪式需要花芯。带来此处。
translated_text: This bug is you, no one can put it in, the number is<page>During the accident. I am the heart of Polipu. You must participate in the event here.
secondary_translated_text: 这个bug是你的，没有人能把它放进去，号码是<page>事故期间。我是波利普的心脏。您必须在这里参加活动。

original_en_text: The first rite. Rite of the pollip. The first rite can begin.
original_zh_text: 初始仪式。花芯仪式。初仪可启。
translated_text: The first police ceremony began.

original_en_text: The precious hearts... Give them. For the time of birth, for the rite, they must bleed...
original_zh_text: 珍贵花芯……交付。为了诞生，为了仪式，它们必须流血……
translated_text: "Ladies, blood was shed during the childbirth ceremony. "

original_en_text: The... the time of birth approaches. Now, the rite of the pollip.<page>Bug. Only you are left. None more tread here. None.<page>For the rite. The Pollip Hearts. They are needed. Bring them here, for the rite.
original_zh_text: ……诞生之时将至。现在，花芯仪式。<page>虫。只剩你。无虫来此。<page>仪式需要花芯。带来此处。
translated_text: What is this? It's time to be born, and it's a police ceremony.<page>You are the only one left, and no one can come in.<page>During the accident. I am the heart of Polipu. You must participate in the event here.
secondary_translated_text: 这是什么？出生的时候到了，这是一个警察仪式。<page>只剩下你一个人了，没有人能进来。<page>事故期间。我是波利普的心脏。您必须在这里参加活动。

original_en_text: Shhhh... shell. White mask, red cloak.<page>Bug. A living bug.<hpage>A bug I am, at least in part, but you are something quite different. I apologise if I have roused you from some deep slumber.<page>Slumber. Long sleep. But now is the waking.<page>Growth. Time of birth. The time of birth approaches.<page>Heed, bug. The time of birth approaches.
original_zh_text: 嘘……甲壳。白面甲，红袍子。<page>虫。是活虫。<hpage>我算是半虫，但你倒是截然不同。若吵醒你的长眠，我道歉。<page>长眠。苏醒时分已至。<page>生长。诞生之时。诞生之时将至。<page>听着，诞生之时将至。
translated_text: Red Mask (Red Mask)<page>The insect god is still alive!<hpage>I am a dancer, at least to a certain extent, but you are so different.<page>It's been a long dream, but now it's time to wake up.<page>Now is the time for childbirth.<page>"Be careful, Bob. It's time for childbirth.
secondary_translated_text: 红面具（红面具）<page>虫神还活着！<hpage>我是一名舞者，至少在某种程度上是这样，但你太不同了。<page>这是一个漫长的梦想，但现在是时候醒来了。<page>现在是分娩的时候了。<page>“小心，鲍勃。该分娩了。

original_en_text: Th... the bud. It must be offered. It calls for it... for the rite.
original_zh_text: 花苞……必须献上。它在呼唤……呼唤仪式。
translated_text: What is this? It will give you an indispensable seed.
secondary_translated_text: 这是什么？它会给你一颗不可或缺的种子。

original_en_text: The time will come... Soon. The time of birth approaches.
original_zh_text: 时刻将至……诞生之时将至。
translated_text: The time is up and labor is here.

original_en_text: Halt, stranger. I am charged forever to guard the sacred shrine beyond.<page>Any who wish to pass must cross their weapon with my own.
original_zh_text: 止步，陌生的虫。我奉命永远守护后方圣所。<page>想要过去，先问过我的兵器。
translated_text: "Stop, stranger, my duty is to guard that distant temple forever.<page>No matter who walks by, he must hold my hand. "
secondary_translated_text: “停下来，陌生人，我的职责就是永远守护那座遥远的寺庙。<page>无论谁走过，他都必须牵着我的手。"

original_en_text: You may remain here and rest, if you choose. I am no enemy of yours. Only if you try to step beyond will I raise my weapon against you.<hpage>Then tell me, warrior, of the shrine you guard. These caves on wood’s edge seem long forgotten.<page>Some things may be hidden, but never forgotten. The shrine remains to remember the wood’s first seed, her that once was and always is.<page>I am the last bound to protect it. Sadly, in that service, many have fallen to my blade.
original_zh_text: 你可以在此处休息，只要不越界，我就不是你的敌人。<hpage>那就说说这处圣所吧。这深林边缘的洞窟似乎早已被遗忘。<page>事物或许会被被隐藏，但不会被遗忘。最初之种记得这处圣所，而她永恒存在。<page>我是最后一位守卫者。很遗憾，至今已有无数试图越界的亡魂。
translated_text: I am not your enemy. I will only be in your hands when I want to come to you.<hpage>"Soldier, which temple are you guarding? "The caves on the edge of the forest seem long forgotten.<page>There is something hidden that you will never forget. The first seed in the forest is always celebrated in the temple. He always does this, even though he is used to it.<page>Unfortunately, in this incident, many people were knocked down by my sword.
secondary_translated_text: 我不是你的敌人。我只会在我想去找你的时候在你的手中。<hpage>“兵哥哥，你在哪座寺庙守着？“森林边缘的洞穴似乎早已被遗忘。<page>有一些隐藏的东西，你永远不会忘记。森林中的第一颗种子总是在寺庙里庆祝。他总是这样做，尽管他已经习惯了。<page>不幸的是，在这起事件中，很多人都被我的剑击倒了。

original_en_text: <page=S>Miss courier! Pharloom’s bugs are wishing, waiting, sad and scared. The deliverings are needed, now more than more!
original_zh_text: <page=S>救星小姐！纺络的虫子们又怕又急，都等着物资呢！现在送货是十分要紧的事！
translated_text: <page=S>Delivery is lost! The falling insects are full of hope and expectation, pain and fear, and now they need to be delivered, but that's not all.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>快递丢失！坠落的昆虫充满了希望和期待，痛苦和恐惧，现在它们需要交付，但这还不是全部。

original_en_text: But what’s this?! I smell something on you right now! You have a relic for me!
original_zh_text: 慢着！你身上有味儿！揣着古董呢！
translated_text: What is this? Now I hear your voice!" You have a legacy. "
secondary_translated_text: 这是什么？现在我听到你的声音了！“你有一份遗产。"

original_en_text: Aha! The spines! Specimen, you have them! Then it is time, indeed! Bzzt! To free you of your wriggling torment, and show my genius clear!
original_zh_text: 啊哈！棘刺到手！病患，该手术了！滋滋！让你摆脱痛苦，见证本神医天才手段吧！
translated_text: Oh, Oh, Oh! Season championship, now is the time. M.M.M. It frees you from the pain of hallucination and allows you to see my genius clearly!
secondary_translated_text: 哦，哦，哦！赛季冠军，现在是时候了。M.M.M.它让你摆脱幻觉的痛苦，让你清楚地看到我的天才！

original_en_text: Oh my, what a state you’re in! You look like you’re one breath away from keeling over dead!<hpage>I will continue to live, madam, but I am indeed afflicted. A parasite has taken root within my shell... Perhaps you have something that could help me? A medicine?<page>Mmm, not so sure I stock anything like that. You should ask Pavo there. It’s his job to give directions and such, so he may have some useful advice.<page>In the meantime... shopping itself is a type of medicine, isn’t it? You should buy something now. Given your condition, this might be your last chance!
original_zh_text: 圣堡在上！你这模样看着像要咽气了似的！<hpage>还死不了，女士，但确实抱恙。甲壳遭受寄生……可有药能治？<page>唔，我这不卖药。去问帕沃吧，他管指路，或许有招。<page>话说回来……购物也算疗愈嘛！趁还能动快买点，过了这村没这店！
translated_text: Who are you? You look like you're going to die!<hpage>I am still alive, but I am not happy. Has the parasite taken root in my shell? Is there anything I can do for you? How's your medicine?<page>I don't know if there is such a thing. I asked about the package. Your job is to provide guidance, etc., so that you can provide useful advice.<page>At the same time, at... Shopping is a drug in itself, right? Actually? Given the current situation, this may be our last chance.
secondary_translated_text: 你是谁？你看起来好像快要死了！<hpage>我还活着，但我不高兴。寄生虫在我的壳里扎根了吗？有什么我可以为你做的吗？你的药怎么样了？<page>我不知道是否有这样的事情。我询问了包裹的情况。你的工作是提供指导等，以便您可以提供有用的建议。<page>同时，在.购物本身就是一种毒品，对吧？实际上？鉴于目前的情况，这可能是我们最后的机会。

original_en_text: <page=S>Ughhh! What-what is this? Your body is all twisting, creaking! Horrid fiend inside! <hpage>A parasite has lodged deep inside my shell. It has taken some strength of will to keep its thrashing at bay.<page=T>With a shell like such, you cannot be taking no deliverings! Infect the goods you would-would!<hpage>Very well, couriers. If I somehow manage to remove the parasite, I may return to offer aid.
original_zh_text: <page=S>呃！什、什么东西？您甲壳里在扭动！有怪物！<hpage>是寄生体，暂时压制住了。<page=T>这样可不能送货！会污、污染货物！<hpage>有道理，若我能除掉它，或许再来帮忙。
translated_text: <page=S>Oh! Oh! What are you doing? Your body is spinning and burning! There is a terrible demon.<hpage>The parasite is trapped in my shell, and I must have the will to stop.<page=T>With a box like this, it is impossible to stop delivery. You may have been infected with the product you want.<hpage>Delivery is good. If you can get rid of the parasite, please come back and help.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>哦！哦！你在干什么？你的身体在旋转燃烧！有一个可怕的恶魔。<hpage>寄生虫被困在我的壳里，我必须有停止的意愿。<page=T>有了这样的盒子，就不可能停止送货了。你可能已经感染了你想要的产品。<hpage>送货很好。如果你能除掉寄生虫，请回来帮忙。

original_en_text: What do you want, slave?<hpage>Slave? I am a traveller, stranger, not a slave.<page>Grnk. Exactly what a slave would say. Begone!
original_zh_text: 你来做什么，奴隶？<hpage>奴隶？我是旅者，不是奴隶。<page>哼，奴隶都这么说。滚！
translated_text: "Know, what do you want? " "<hpage>Are there still slaves? "I am a traveler, a stranger, not a slave.<page>January! What did the slaves say? Run, run, run!
secondary_translated_text: “知道了，你想怎么样？" "<hpage>还有奴隶吗？“我是一个旅行者，一个陌生人，不是奴隶。<page>一月！奴隶们说了什么？快跑快跑

original_en_text: <hpage>Soon, Pavo, I shall calm the chaos. Please guard these bugs safe till then.<page>Of course, dear resident! Of course! Know all our faith, and our wishes go with you.
original_zh_text: <hpage>帕沃，我会尽快平息混乱。在此之前，请守护好这些虫子。<page>放心吧，亲爱的居民！请带上我们全体的信念与祈愿前行吧。
translated_text: <hpage>Sooner or later, Paavo, I will end the chaos.<page>Dear residents! Yeah, no! All our hopes and expectations are with you.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>帕沃，我迟早会结束混乱。<page>亲爱的居民！是的，不！我们所有的希望和期望都与您同在。

original_en_text: Loose rosaries will escape your pockets at the worst of times, and I’m a deft claw at stringing them tight! I can string you a whole necklace, safe and stylish.
original_zh_text: 危急时刻念珠易失，但我能将其编成项链！既牢靠又时髦！
translated_text: In the worst case scenario, roses will slip into your pocket. I can tie my nails! You can bind all necklaces safely and gracefully.
secondary_translated_text: 在最坏的情况下，玫瑰会滑进你的口袋。我可以系指甲！您可以安全优雅地绑住所有项链。

original_en_text: <hpage>I have taken your wish, Tipp. If I find your brother safe, I’ll be sure to send him back this way.<page>My many thanks, miss saving! You are brave-brave. Same as brother! My faith goes all with you!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我接下了你的祈愿，若找到皮尔，会让他回这里。<page>多谢救星小姐！您和皮尔一样勇、勇敢！祝您好运！
translated_text: <hpage>If I see my brother is okay, I'll take him back.<page>"Thank you, Salvador, you are as brave as your brother. "My faith is with you."
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>如果我看到我哥哥没事，我就带他回去。<page>“谢谢你，萨尔瓦多，你和你的兄弟一样勇敢。“我的信仰与你同在。"

original_en_text: Up there, in that Citadel, the fabled oil is waiting. Bestow it upon this fine pinmaster, and your blade shall sing louder yet.<hpage>I will find the oil, pinmaster. Keep your skills sharp.
original_zh_text: 圣堡藏着秘油。取来此油，你的针鸣将响彻纺络！<hpage>我会寻得此油，请针匠磨好利爪等候。
translated_text: Leave it to this gentle instrumentalist, and his sword will sing louder.<hpage>Find oil and polish Finmaster technology.
secondary_translated_text: 把它交给这位温柔的器乐家，他的剑就会唱得更响。<hpage>寻找石油并抛光Finmaster技术。

original_en_text: Now now! What’s all this? Infested are you, bzzt?<page>Do you even know who I am? Why, ‘tis the great Yarnaby, genius physician, unfairly outcast, who now towers before you!<hpage>I apologise for intruding upon your work, but if you are the skilled physician you claim, I ask your assistance.<hpage>A parasite has wormed its way inside of me. Its roots twist and pull inside my shell, draining my strength. If you possess the skills and tools, I would see it removed.<page>Bzzt! Well, well! So you’re a special, sickly specimen, are you?! That changes matters, yes. Turns them on their head!<page>Let me see. Hm. Not haunted, indeed. No Silk-sickness. But something strange has certainly clawed its way in!<page>These “roots” that torment you so... I’m not altogether familiar with them, but it matters not!<page>If there’s something nasty inside a shell that must come out, we use great Yarnaby’s Extricator! It’s your only hope, bzzt!<page>...Hmmm, but to crack your stiff shell we’ll first need some extra strength. The healing can be done, yes! But before that my mighty Extricator needs an upgrade!
original_zh_text: 哟哟！这是什么情况？被寄生了，滋滋？<page>知道我是谁吗？伟大的雅纳碧！遭庸才排挤的天才医师！<hpage>冒昧打扰，但若您真如自称般医术高明，还请相助。<hpage>有寄生体钻入了我的躯壳，在体内扎根生长，吸收气力。若您真有本事，请帮我去除。<page>滋滋！哎哟！特殊病例啊？！这就另当别论了！<page>让本神医瞧瞧。嗯……非邪咒非丝病。但确实有怪东西钻进去了！<page>折磨你的'根须’……虽然不常见，但无所谓！<page>只要是壳里有脏东西，就用本神医的剥离机！这是你的唯一希望，滋滋！<page>……但想撬开你这硬壳，得先升级机器！
translated_text: Come on, come on! Come on, come on! What are you doing? Are you infected?<page>Do you know what they are? A great Arab, a great doctor, had an injustice, but now he is greater than you.<hpage>I'm sorry to bother you, but if you're a qualified doctor, I wish I could help you.<hpage>The parasite invaded our bodies, twisted its roots in my shell, consuming my strength. "With these skills and tools, you will be eliminated.<page>M. M. Yes, yes. This change is very important, please look again!<page>In fact, there are no ghosts, no silk bottles, and strange things are happening!<page>My roots hurt. I don't know the details, but it's gonna be okay.<page>If you need to remove annoying things from your cabinets, you can use the Yarnavi extruder! This is my only hope. Shh!<page>... However, to break the shell, extra strength is first needed. Healing is possible, but before that, you need to update your powerful supplier!
secondary_translated_text: 来吧来吧来吧来吧你在干什么？你被感染了吗？<page>你知道它们是什么吗？一个伟大的阿拉伯人，一个伟大的医生，有过不公正的经历，但现在他比你更伟大。<hpage>很抱歉打扰你，但如果你是一名合格的医生，我希望我能帮助你。<hpage>寄生虫入侵了我们的身体，在我的壳里扭动了根，消耗了我的力量。“有了这些技能和工具，你就会被淘汰。<page>M. M.是的是的这个变化非常重要，请再看看！<page>事实上，没有鬼魂，没有丝瓶，奇怪的事情正在发生！<page>我的根很痛。我不知道细节，但会没事的。<page>如果您需要从橱柜中取出烦人的东西，可以使用Yarnavi挤出机！这是我唯一的希望。嘘！<page>...然而，要打破外壳，首先需要额外的力量。治愈是可能的，但在此之前，您需要更新您强大的供应商！

original_en_text: Travellers should always keep spare shards close by. We Bellharters were once praised for our fine claw-work. An art lost on most modern pilgrims... excepting yourself I’m sure.
original_zh_text: 旅者该随身带碎片。钟心镇的虫昔年以各种技艺闻名，如今朝圣者都不懂……你除外。
translated_text: Passengers must carry spare parts at all times. Behart admired their beautiful nails. Most modern pilgrims believe they have lost art and have nothing but themselves.
secondary_translated_text: 乘客必须始终携带备件。贝哈特欣赏他们美丽的指甲。大多数现代朝圣者认为他们已经失去了艺术，除了自己一无所有。

original_en_text: What a persistent little worm you are. Amuse me then. Why did you cut those poor bugs from their comforting curse?<hpage>There was old power in the creature that guided the thread, and a talent of Silk, now taken, that shall prove useful to me.<hpage>That the town is freed and its service returned is a benefit too. I may ofttimes feel myself apart from these bugs, but even I recoil to see Silk strung in such sickening service.<page>Grnk. To free them was no favour. But the gathering of power... In that goal, we may understand each other some.
original_zh_text: 真是阴魂不散的虫子。行啊，陪我解个闷。为何要把那些可怜虫从舒坦的诅咒里拽出来？<hpage>操控丝咒的古兽有我要的力量，它的灵丝天赋现已归我。<hpage>顺带让镇子回复往常也算好事。我虽与这些虫子不同，但见到灵丝被这般滥用也觉得恶心。<page>哼……蠢材才会解救他们！不过夺取力量这点……咱们倒是臭味相投。
translated_text: You are a stubborn little insect. original_zh_text: <hpage>我会把油取来，针匠。往后旅途愈发凶险，这针刃还多有用处，你的手艺对我大有助益。<page>我这祈愿确实太过危险，希望您别为此送了命。
translated_text: <hpage>I will find oil, spices and my needles that play an important role in this cruel kingdom. " "<page>Accepting the wishes of this poor Lutheran athlete is dangerous for you. I hope this man's professional ambitions will not come at the expense of his life.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我会找到油、香料和我的针，它们在这个残酷的王国中发挥着重要作用。" "<page>接受这位可怜的路德运动员的愿望对你来说是危险的。我希望这个人的职业野心不会以牺牲生命为代价。

original_en_text: If you insist on surviving your infestation, seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out, high up into the moors, last I heard.
original_zh_text: 非要治这寄生物，就去找被钟心镇放逐的雅纳碧。听说她被赶到灰沼了。
translated_text: If you claim to have survived the invasion, look for Yunawi, who was expelled by Balkhart.
secondary_translated_text: 如果你声称自己在入侵中幸存下来，那就去找尤纳维，他被伊格哈特驱逐了。

original_en_text: I’ll waste no more words on a slave. Begone.
translated_text: Don't waste your time on slaves! He has me.
secondary_translated_text: 别把时间浪费在奴隶身上！他有我。

original_en_text: <page=T>More deliverings for those sad survivors in their cave below. <page=S>Deliver them quick-quick, miss courier! They will help much.
original_zh_text: <page=T>再给下面洞穴里那些可怜虫送趟货吧。<page=S>快点送去吧，救星小姐！能帮大忙呢！
translated_text: <page=T>It provides added comfort to the mourning survivors in the cave below.<page=S>Delivery service, I'll send you. They will provide a lot of help.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>它为下面洞穴里悲伤的幸存者提供了额外的安慰。<page=S>送货服务，我会寄给你的。他们会提供很多帮助。

original_en_text: That cry upon you, sister! Those are the sour sobs of a grey and twisted thing.<hpage>You speak of the bud? It is a mysterious thing indeed. In the dank swamps above the moor, I sought towards its plaintive wails, and found it resting there... Waiting, it almost seemed.<hpage>But you speak of its form, without sighting it upon me. Is it a thing familiar to you?... Have you heard these cries before?<page>Aye, yes! Not your own specimen, surely, but way back, other travellers did sometimes carry similar. Odd types they all were. Offerings they’d call the crying things, and towards the core of Shellwood they would trek.<page>Never I did see one again, not the buds nor the bugs that brought the gift...<page>If you’re planning to follow their path, I’ll wish on your safety, but ‘tis an ill omen to hear such sad sounds returned after so long.
original_zh_text: 旅者小姐，你身上那哭声！是灰色扭曲之物发出的哀鸣。<hpage>你是说那花苞？确实神秘。我在沼泽深处追寻它的哀鸣，发现它就躺在那里……仿佛在等待着什么。<hpage>可你未见过实物却知其形态，莫非你认得此物？……或是曾听过这哭声？<page>啊，没错！以前确实有旅者携带过类似之物，尽是些怪客。他们称这哭嚎之物为祭品，然后向着甲木林深处进发。<page>此后我再未见过那些花苞，也没再遇见过献祭之虫……<page>如果你要去寻找它们的踪迹，愿你平安。但这悲哭声重现，实属不祥之兆。
translated_text: Sister cried! It was gray and deformed, but suspiciously acidic.<hpage>Are you on the bumper? It was a mystery, and in the desert swamp I searched for a sad sigh and found him lying there. I just saw him.<hpage>I gave him a form, but he didn't put it in it. Did you hear that scream?<page>Oh, yes! Oh, yes! Of course, this is not his specimen, but other ancient travelers have similar specimens, all with strange faces. They cried "what" and then marched towards downtown Sherwood.<page>I can no longer see, I can no longer see the bouquet of flowers, I can no longer see the insects with gifts.<page>If you are willing to follow his path, let us pray for peace, but listening to the sounds of pain for a long time is a warning sign.
secondary_translated_text: 姐姐哭了！它是灰色的，变形的，但可疑的酸性。<hpage>你在保险杠上吗？这是一个谜，我在沙漠沼泽中寻找悲伤的叹息，发现他躺在那里。我刚刚看到他了。<hpage>我给了他一张表格，但他没有放进去。你听到那尖叫声了吗？<page>哦，是的！哦，是的！当然，这不是他的标本，但其他古代旅行者也有类似的标本，都有奇怪的面孔。他们大喊“什么”，然后向舍伍德市中心游行。<page>我再也看不到了，我再也看不到那束花，我再也看不到那些带着礼物的昆虫。<page>如果你愿意追随他的道路，让我们祈祷和平，但长时间聆听痛苦的声音是一个警告信号。

original_en_text: What? What, what? Who is it? What’ve you got? What do you want?<hpage>I am just a traveller, one hoping you were not too badly affected by the cursed snare set upon this town.<page>Pah! What binds them outside means nothing to me. None of them have my keen sense, my respect for the past!<page>You seem able, though. Sneaky, too. If you find any fine old stuff, anything with a history to it, bring it here. I’ll take it.
original_zh_text: 干嘛？要干嘛？你是谁？带了什么来？想要什么？<hpage>过路客而已，想看看你有没有被镇上的邪咒祸害。<page>嘁！外头虫子中招关我屁事！他们没我这眼力见儿，不懂敬重历史！<page>但你倒像块料，鬼精的。要是找到老物件，有年头的，就往这儿送。我收！
translated_text: What is this? What are you doing? What are you doing? Who are you? What are you doing? What do you want?<hpage>I'm just a traveler and I hope I won't be severely affected by this town's traps.<page>Oh, Oh, Oh! What is closed has no meaning to me, no knowledge or respect for my past.<page>You are very capable here. "Come on, you've been kidnapped. If you have something good, don't forget to bring it with you. I bought them.
secondary_translated_text: 这是什么？你在干什么？你在干什么？你是谁？你在干什么？你想要什么？<hpage>我只是一名旅行者，我希望我不会受到这个小镇陷阱的严重影响。<page>哦，哦，哦！封闭的东西对我来说没有意义，对我的过去没有任何了解或尊重。<page>你在这里很有能力。“来吧，你被绑架了。如果你有什么好东西，别忘了带在身上。我买了它们。

original_en_text: And now! This pinmaster must work! Let the sharpening begin!
original_zh_text: 好了！针匠该干活了！纺络许久未见的锋芒该再现了！
translated_text: It's time! Pingmaster is running. Let's start cleaning up!
secondary_translated_text: 时间到了！Pingmaster正在运行。让我们开始清理吧！

original_en_text: Hff. The noise from above has returned, that pitiful clamour. The threads have been cut.<page>You... It was you who cut them. Do not deny it!<hpage>Why should I deny it, sir? I defeated the cruel creature above the town, and awoke the old bell stilled by Silk. Are you displeased?<page>Displeased! If I breathe, if I live, I am displeased. Only the dead are satisfied.<page>You are a slave, and a nuisance... begone.
original_zh_text: 嗤，上头又闹腾了，可怜虫们吵吵嚷嚷。丝线被斩断了。<page>你……就是你干的！别想抵赖！<hpage>何必抵赖？我斩了镇子上头的恶兽，敲醒了被灵丝封禁的古钟。你不满意？<page>满意？喘气的活虫哪有满意的！只有死虫才消停。<page>你是奴隶，是瘟神……滚。
translated_text: The noise is back. Too young, the children lost touch.<page>Who are you? Do not cut it off or deny it.<hpage>Why did he deny this? I threw cruel creatures over the city and awakened a dilapidated silk clock.<page>Unhappy! If you are still alive and you are still breathing, then you are not happy. Only the dead are happy.<page>"You're a slave, bitch, let's go.
secondary_translated_text: 噪音又回来了。孩子们太小了，就失去了联系。<page>你是谁？不要切断或否认它。<hpage>他为什么否认这一点？我把残酷的生物扔到了城市上空，唤醒了一座破旧的丝绸时钟。<page>不高兴！如果你还活着，还在呼吸，那么你就不快乐。只有死者才快乐。<page>“你是奴隶，婊子，我们走吧。

original_en_text: Resident! What a marvel you are, continuing to dare the wilds and darkness, and returning home to us unscathed.<hpage>I return with hope worth sharing, Pavo. I have seen a way to calm this chaos, one I now work swiftly towards.<hpage>The chance remains slim, but if this town can hold, and my efforts succeed, Pharloom may see a future yet.
original_zh_text: 居民！您真是奇迹般的存在，外面如此黑暗危险，不仅仍旧只身闯荡，还能安然无恙地回来。<hpage>我是带着值得分享的希望回来的，帕沃。我已找到平息混乱之法，正全力推进。<hpage>虽然希望渺茫，但只要你们能继续坚守，只要我的努力能成功，纺络或许仍有未来。
translated_text: Surprisingly, despite the wildlife and darkness, and illegally returned to their homes.<hpage>I came back with the hope of sharing and finding a way to calm the chaos, and now I am working hard.<hpage>There is no chance yet, but if the city persevere and my efforts succeed, then Faro will be able to see the future.
secondary_translated_text: 令人惊讶的是，尽管野生动物和黑暗，却非法返回家园。<hpage>我带着分享并找到平息混乱的方法回来了，现在我正在努力工作。<hpage>目前还没有机会，但如果这座城市坚持下去，我的努力成功，那么法鲁就能够看到未来。

original_en_text: The Citadel crafted some marvellous machines, and this looks to be one of its finest! Apparently sent by some creepy slitherer hidden away up there, for sale only to you!
original_zh_text: 圣堡精工杰作！据说是上头阴森爬行的家伙带来的，这宝贝我只卖给你！
translated_text: The castle created a great machine, and I think it's the best. Of course, crazy scientists are lurking there. This is for you!
secondary_translated_text: 城堡创造了一台伟大的机器，我认为它是最好的。当然，疯狂的科学家就潜伏在那里。这是给你的！

original_en_text: It’s my calling it is, to gather the relics of the past. If you find any fine old stuff, anything with a history to it, bring it here. I’ll take it.
original_zh_text: 我活着的念想就是收罗老古董！要是找到老物件，有年头的，就往这儿送。我收！
translated_text: My job is to collect remnants of the past. If you find a beautiful old object, don't forget to bring it here. I bought them.
secondary_translated_text: 我的工作是收集过去的遗迹。如果您发现一件美丽的旧物品，不要忘记将其带到这里。我买了它们。

original_en_text: <hpage>I can not aid you, couriers. Not now. My own tasks are too pressing to consider taking on your deliveries. <hpage>With luck, some pilgrims may pass with sound mind and strength remaining. They may choose to promise your wishes.<page=T>Then we shall pray they come, miss saving! Our thanks go muchly with you, still.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我帮不了，有要事在身。<hpage>若有神志清醒的朝圣者路过，或许他们会帮忙。<page=T>那就祈祷他们快来！还是谢谢您！
translated_text: <hpage>I can't help you, I can't help you, I can't help you. My work is too fast to finish. "<hpage>If you are lucky, there will be pure and energetic pilgrims who agree with your intentions, but this is not the case.<page=T>Come here, I need help, thank you!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我不能帮助你，我不能帮助你，我不能帮助你。我的工作太快了，无法完成。"<hpage>如果你幸运的话，会有纯洁而充满活力的朝圣者同意你的意图，但事实并非如此。<page=T>过来，我需要帮助，谢谢！

original_en_text: Hff. The noise from above has returned, that pitiful clamour. The threads have been cut.<page>You... It was you who cut them down. Do not deny it!<hpage>Why should I deny it, sir? I severed the thread and defeated the creature guiding the curse upon the town. Are you displeased?<page>Displeased! If I breathe, if I live, I am displeased. Only the dead are satisfied.<page>You are a slave, and a nuisance... begone.
original_zh_text: 嗤，上头又闹腾了，可怜虫们吵吵嚷嚷。丝线被斩断了。<page>你……就是你干的！别想抵赖！<hpage>何必抵赖？我斩了丝线，灭了给镇子下咒的怪物。你不满意？<page>满意？喘气的活虫哪有满意的！只有死虫才消停。<page>你是奴隶，是瘟神……滚。
translated_text: The noise is back. Too young, the children lost touch.<page>Who are you? If you cut it, please don't cut it.<hpage>Why did he deny this? They killed the creatures that ruled this cursed city.<page>Unhappy! If you are still alive and you are still breathing, then you are not happy. Only the dead are happy.<page>"You're a slave, bitch, let's go.
secondary_translated_text: 噪音又回来了。孩子们太小了，就失去了联系。<page>你是谁？如果你剪了它，请不要剪。<hpage>他为什么否认这一点？他们杀死了统治这座被诅咒城市的生物。<page>不高兴！如果你还活着，还在呼吸，那么你就不快乐。只有死者才快乐。<page>“你是奴隶，婊子，我们走吧。

original_en_text: <page=T>We’s heard the word! Many fleas together, settled high in Pharloom, calling out their wants of us!<page=T>Clever grubbers, fleas, but theys too need-need our deliverings. See them served, miss courier! Always goodly-good to gain the thanks of fleas.
original_zh_text: <page=T>听说跳蚤们在上面建了窝！找我们要货！<page=T>跳蚤们都很机、机灵，送货交朋友准没、没错！
translated_text: <page=T>I heard these words! Many fleas gathered on the plateau on our arms and shouted for us!<page=T>These insects and fleas can become smarter, but they also need our help. "Get in the car, it's always nice, thank you for the fleas. "
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>我听到了这些话！许多跳蚤聚集在我们怀里的高原上，为我们大喊大叫！<page=T>这些昆虫和跳蚤可以变得更聪明，但它们也需要我们的帮助。“上车吧，这总是很好，谢谢你的跳蚤。"

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, shopkeeper. I’d ask to trade, but your store seems a little bare.<page>Ahem! Well, yes. Our little town’s seen some dire times, and now my courier’s gone and got themself lost.<page>But don’t worry! I’ve a few small things, still! And if that courier ever makes it safely back, we’ll have plenty more treasures to haggle over.
original_zh_text: <hpage>日安，店主。本想交易，但货架有点空。<page>咳！时局艰难，送货虫又跑丢了。<page>别急！还有点小玩意！等那小子平安归来，货品管够。
translated_text: <hpage>Good morning, merchants. I wanted to open a company, but the store was empty.<page>You have a cough! Yes, our city has gone through a terrible period. Now, the mail is gone and I am lost.<page>But don't worry! I have a small one! Even if the lion returns illegally, there is still a lot of treasure.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>早上好，商人们。我想开一家公司，但商店空无一人。<page>你咳嗽了！是的，我们的城市经历了一段可怕的时期。现在，邮件不见了，我迷路了。<page>但别担心！我有一个小的！即使狮子非法回归，宝藏仍然很多。

original_en_text: Bzzt! Leave me in peace! The great Yarnaby treats the sick! Not those that benefit from their afflictions. Enjoy its advantage and leave me in peace!<hpage>Very well, madam. I did not mean to waste your time.
original_zh_text: 滋滋！别烦我！本神医只医病患！享你的福去！<hpage>好吧，女士。无意浪费您的时间。
translated_text: Well, please, close it! Beautiful Yanabi cures diseases! They are not the ones who profit from pain.<hpage>"No, I don't want to waste your time.
secondary_translated_text: 好吧，请关闭它！美丽的Yanabi可以治愈疾病！他们不是从痛苦中获利的人。<hpage>“不，我不想浪费你的时间。

original_en_text: Bonva! It is done, brave warrior. By my expert claw, your strange blade has received some fast-sharp shine. It shall cut cleaner than ever before.<hpage>Your efforts provide great aid, pinmaster. You have my thanks.
original_zh_text: 好了！完活啦勇士！经我利爪打磨，您这针刃寒光逼人，削铁如泥啊！<hpage>有劳了，针匠。感激不尽。
translated_text: Rescue, rescue, rescue. Thanks to my professional skills, its strange leaves quickly gained a shiny luster.<hpage>Your work has been very helpful to me.
secondary_translated_text: 救援，救援，救援。凭借我的专业技术，它奇怪的叶子很快就焕发出了闪亮的光泽。<hpage>你的工作对我很有帮助。

original_en_text: <page=T>Miss courier! What horror here! The caves shake-shake, crying pain of hurt most savage.<page=T>And see all our poor friends below, newly found, crowded inside this home of bells, hearts fast for fear.<page=S>But what-what for you? You are here to help, yes-yes? The deliverings, they are needed now at most! When caves turn dark, the deliverings are essential, more than more.
original_zh_text: <page=T>救星小姐！这儿太可怕了！洞窟震得像在惨叫！<page=T>钟居底下挤满了可怜的新朋友，全都吓坏了。<page=S>但您、您是来帮忙的对吧？现在最需要送货了！情况越危险，送货就越要紧！
translated_text: <page=T>Delivery is lost! How terrible! The cave trembled, screaming for the most barbaric wounds.<page=T>When I saw a poor friend gathered in a house full of servants, my heart beat with fear.<page=S>What happened? Are you here to help me? Actually? Give up on us, we need you! As caves darken, structure becomes more important.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>快递丢失！多么可怕啊！洞穴颤抖着，尖叫着寻找最野蛮的伤口。<page=T>当我看到一个贫穷的朋友聚集在满是仆人的房子里时，我的心因恐惧而跳动。<page=S>发生了什么？你是来帮助我的吗？实际上？放弃我们吧，我们需要你！随着洞穴变暗，结构变得更加重要。

original_en_text: <page=T>The deliverings! They are broken-broke! Gone and spilled!<page=T>Do not lose hearty-heart, miss courier! This is Pharloom! Danger, deadly. In times as these, is a rarer thing for goods to get to their goings.<page=S>Would you try-try again? For the bugs so much in need of their deliverings?
original_zh_text: <page=T>货毁、毁了！全丢了！<page=T>别灰、灰心！纺络现在处处凶、凶险，能送到才是稀罕事！<page=S>要再试一次吗？那么多虫等着货救、救命呢！
translated_text: <page=T>Delivery! It broke! He's already gone.<page=T>Buy it, don't be disappointed! This is a light. It is dangerous and deadly. At this time, almost no goods arrived.<page=S>Why didn't you come back? This is a mistake you must avoid.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>送货！断了！他已经走了。<page=T>买吧，不要失望！这是一盏灯。这是危险且致命的。此时几乎没有货物到货。<page=S>你为什么不回来？这是你必须避免的错误。

original_en_text: Those bugs, cowering in their gleaming bells. Grnk. They claim a common calling, to serve the pilgrims as they make their path upwards.<page>Such a crucial role they award themselves, surely worthy of praise!<page>A sweet lie, of course. They, like their predecessors, are simply too weak and fearful to venture any farther. A settlement born from indolence.
original_zh_text: 那些缩在亮堂钟屋里的怂包，哼。自诩要侍奉攀登圣堡的朝圣者。<page>给自己戴高帽，真当是个人物！<page>甜美的谎言罢了。他们和前代一样，不过是没胆往上爬的懦夫。这镇子就是怠惰的产物。
translated_text: Insects ring light bells, claiming they have a common mission to serve the pilgrims.<page>There is no doubt that you yourself play an important role in this!<page>That's a sweet lie, of course. Like their predecessors, they are no longer too weak to take risks. Born of lazy choices!
secondary_translated_text: 昆虫敲响了钟声，声称它们有一个共同的使命，那就是为朝圣者服务。<page>毫无疑问，你自己在其中发挥着重要作用！<page>当然，这是一个甜蜜的谎言。像他们的前辈一样，他们不再太软弱而无法冒险。诞生于懒惰的选择！

original_en_text: <hpage>He would have been wise to do so. If, on my travels, I happen upon the errant bug, I’ll make sure to send him your way.
original_zh_text: <hpage>他倒是聪明。要是在路上遇见那迷途虫，我会让他来寻你。<page>那就谢谢了！敢闯荒野帮助同类的虫可不多见。
translated_text: <hpage>If I make a mistake while traveling, I will bring it to you.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>如果我在旅行中犯了错误，我会向您提出来。

original_en_text: By claw! Are you then our saviour in the shell? Standing so calm and cool on entrance to Plinney’s bellhome!<hpage>What clue, sir, tells of my part in your town’s liberation?<page>Why your blade, fierce warrior! Any fine pinmaster would detect the sign of deadly work upon that needle’s edge.<page>T’was a vile curse that struck here. No simple bug, nor basic pin could have granted our release. No!<page>That blade though, so expertly clutched in claw. That could welly have met the task. It was you who cut us free, yes?<hpage>I’ll grant you’ve sharp sight, pinmaster, and your saving is fortuitous. This blade that restored your town would now benefit from your service.<page>Welly, yes! I’ve a busy backlog of pins to tend, but your gracious heroism decrees that unique weapon receives my care this very moment! What’s say I take a look?
original_zh_text: 利爪啊！您就是我们的大救星？踏进普林尼的华美钟居还这般气定神闲！<hpage>先生怎么知道我插手了镇子的事？<page>看你的针刃啊勇士！但凡有点眼力的针匠都认得出这针尖染过血。<page>那邪咒凶恶得很，寻常虫和寻常针可破不了。但您这把利刃……<page>握爪稳当，做工精良！肯定是您救了我们，对不对？<hpage>眼力不错，针匠。你既然得救，这针刃也该由你照料了。<page>好嘞！虽然我手上活计不少，但英雄的面子最大，立马给您开小灶！这就让我看看针刃？
translated_text: Are nails the savior of our skin? Standing at the entrance to Pliny's Bell Tower, it's very quiet!<hpage>What role did I play in liberating your city?<page>Why is he carrying a sword? A good needle can find traces of death at the tip of the needle.<page>Attack is a curse. A simple bug or basic pin cannot get a version. No, no!<page>Now that the task has been completely completed, you will be free. Actually?<hpage>Lord, your eyes are sharp, and I know that your salvation is accidental. The Lama was taken back to his village.<page>"Yes, Willie, yes, I have a lot of tough issues to deal with, but thanks to your elegant heroism, I have decided to take responsibility for this unique weapon! "" Let's take a look here.
secondary_translated_text: 指甲是我们皮肤的救世主吗？站在普林尼钟楼的入口处，非常安静！<hpage>我在解放你们的城市的过程中扮演了什么角色？<page>他为什么带着剑？一根好针可以在刀尖找到死亡的痕迹。<page>攻击是一种诅咒。简单的错误或基本pin无法获取版本。不，不！<page>现在任务已经完全完成，您就自由了。实际上？<hpage>主啊，你的眼睛是敏锐的，我知道你的救恩是偶然的。喇嘛被带回他的村庄。<page>“是的，威利，是的，我有很多棘手的问题要处理，但感谢你优雅的英雄主义，我决定为这件独特的武器承担责任！”“我们来看看这里。

original_en_text: More, then! Bring me more relics of the past! Records, seals, idols! Let’s gather up the history of the world and hoard it all here, nice and safe!
original_zh_text: 继续！多找点老物件！典籍、印玺、神像！把全纺络的过往都放在这儿才安稳！
translated_text: There are more! Movies, series and idols! I don't think it's a good idea. Collect the history of the world and be safe here!
secondary_translated_text: 还有更多！电影、电视剧和偶像！我认为这不是一个好主意。收集世界历史，在这里安全！

original_en_text: <page=S>Many deliverings still need making, miss courier! We is much needing your help, when you is ready for the giving of it-it!
original_zh_text: <page=S>还有好多货要送呢！等您有空了一定帮帮忙！
translated_text: <page=S>When you are ready to help, Miss Messenger. We really need your help.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>当您准备好提供帮助时，信使小姐。我们真的需要您的帮助。

original_en_text: Done, it is! Marvel of Pharloom! See how it gleams, your long, fine blade. Havast! That the pins of our land all once held such shine. So much we have lost...<hpage>This is fine service, pinmaster. It has been a long age since I have seen my needle such. I had not remembered the finesse of its forging.<page>Welly, ho! It is certain! Yours is a blade of finer make than most, one of few that could bear even more sharpening.<page>If ever upon your long road more oil is acquired, seek my service with haste! Who knows what form we could find deeper within your weapon’s sharpened steel!
original_zh_text: 成啦！纺络的奇迹！瞧这寒光，长刃如新。唉！想当年万针皆有如此锋芒，如今……<hpage>针匠果然手艺精湛。此针许久未曾焕发如此神采，几乎快忘了它的锻造之精良。<page>哎呀呀！没错！您这针刃底子绝佳，还能更锋利！<page>要是再得到秘油，就来找我！谁知这针还能磨砺出何等锋芒！
translated_text: It's over, that's it! The miracle of Farham, look at the light of its beautiful leaves. Hawass once upon a time, the thorns of the earth shone brightly. We lost too much.<hpage>Well done, Pat. I haven't seen a needle like this in a long time. I don't remember what he's capable of.<page>- Its blade is thinner than most blades and is one of the few blades that can support the sharpest blades.<page>If there is a lot of oil on the road, please contact my service department as soon as possible! You never know what shape you will find deep in the sharp steel of the gun.
secondary_translated_text: 结束了，就是这样！法勒姆的奇迹，看看它美丽的叶子的光芒。哈瓦斯曾几何时，大地的荆棘闪闪发光。我们失去了太多。<hpage>干得好，帕特。我已经很久没有见过这样的针了。我不记得他有什么能力。<page>- 它的刀片比大多数刀片都薄，是为数不多的能够支撑最锋利刀片的刀片之一。<page>如果路上有很多油，请尽快联系我的服务部门！你永远不知道你会在枪的锋利钢铁深处发现什么形状。

original_en_text: <hpage>For the moment, I can not aid you, couriers. My own tasks are too pressing.<page=T>Then we shall hope you see them soon achieved! If the deliverings are not made, Pharloom’s bugs will suffer muchly-much!
original_zh_text: <hpage>眼下实在帮不了，有要事在身。<page=T>希望您早日达成目标！要是货送不到，大伙可遭、遭殃咯！
translated_text: <hpage>The prophet will not help you.<page=T>You will reach your goal as soon as possible, and if you don't, you will suffer a lot of insect damage.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>先知不会帮助你。<page=T>你会尽快达到你的目标，如果你不这样做，你会遭受很多昆虫的伤害。

original_en_text: <hpage>It is fortune to see you returned, pinmaster. The roads between here and that deep woods’ grave crawl with violent foes. I had concerns for your safety.<page>Brave warrior, my hero! T’was indeed a fearful scramble home, but safe I now am! And a warmly pleasure to see you too, for the world has darkened indeed!<page>In such times, the task for a pinmaster is clear, to polish and sharpen and refine, suchly that the glimmer of your blade may pierce through the encroaching murk!
original_zh_text: <hpage>能见你平安归来真是万幸，针匠。从深林墓穴到此地的路上遍布凶险，我确实有些担心你的安危。<page>勇敢的战士，我的英雄！回家路上确实惊险万分，但我现在安全了！在这愈发黑暗的世道能遇见您真是令我欣慰！<page>在这危难时刻，针匠的职责再清晰不过——打磨、淬锋、精炼，让您的兵刃锋利到足以刺破这渐浓的黑暗！
translated_text: <hpage>It's nice to meet you, Pete, the road from there to the tomb is deep in the forest, full of cruel enemies, and I'm worried for your safety.<page>Good soldier, my hero. I was scared to go home, but now I am safe.<page>In this era, the mission of the needle is clear: polish, polish, refine, and the light of the blade penetrates the eroding darkness.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>很很高兴认识你，皮特，从那里到坟墓的路在森林深处，到处都是残酷的敌人，我担心你的安全。<page>好士兵，我的英雄。我害怕回家，但现在我安全了。<page>在这个时代，针的使命很明确：打磨、打磨、精炼，刀锋之光穿透侵蚀的黑暗。

original_en_text: <page=S>We is got requested times a’many for this, a queeny egg of those eaters of Silk. Wish from big, sticky creature, near many roaches caged. Wants it muchly! <hpage>The creature, I have met them, a timid, fawning sort. Nonetheless, their tending of Silkeaters can be a benefit for me.<hpage>If a queen delivered could improve their harvest, I too would gain from the trade.<page=S>Miss courier, and big, sticky creature? Both are like to liking things so grossly-gross? We think yous are muchly strange...
original_zh_text: <page=S>接了个怪单！蟑螂笼子旁的黏糊大块头想、想要噬丝蛆女王的卵！<hpage>我见过那大块头，是个怂包。他们养蛆虽然恶心，但对我有利。<hpage>要是能提高他们的产量，倒也划算。<page=S>救星小姐和黏糊怪都好重口！真搞不懂……
translated_text: <page=S>We ate a lot of eggs at the Silk Queen's dinner party. Blessing this huge sticky creature next to the many snails in the cage. I want them! "<hpage>I have met him before, he is a shy and kind person, but taking care of silk is a good thing for me.<hpage>If the Queen can increase the harvest, then I can also benefit from trade.<page=S>Do you have fat and sticky creatures? Do you hate me? I think you're weird.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>我们在丝绸女王的晚宴上吃了很多鸡蛋。祝福笼子里许多蜗牛旁边的这个巨大的粘稠生物。我想要他们！"<hpage>我以前见过他，他是一个害羞又善良的人，但照顾丝绸对我来说是一件好事。<hpage>如果女王能够增加收成，那么我也可以从贸易中受益。<page=S>你有脂肪和粘稠的生物吗？你恨我吗？我觉得你很奇怪。

original_en_text: <page=T>Miss saving! We thought us safe, brothers together at last, but what horror even here! The caves shake-shake, crying pain of hurt most savage.<page=T>And see all our poor friends below, newly found, crowded inside this home of bells, hearts fast for fear.<page=S>But what-what for you? You are here to help, yes-yes? The deliverings, they are needed now at most! Alas, for our shells to survive we cannot now leave this home of bells. No more. Heres we must remain.<page=T>But we instead did plan, together, clever! Yes-yes. Those strong ones, like yourselfs, maybes they will help? For small reward as we have?<page=S>Our savings is done, and the caves turn dark. Now the deliveries are needed, desperate. Now is time for miss courier!
original_zh_text: <page=T>救星小姐！本以为我们兄弟团聚就安全了，谁知这里也遭了灾！洞窟震、震个不停，像在惨叫似的。<page=T>您看钟居底下这些可怜的新朋友，全都挤作一团，心都快吓跳出来了。<page=S>但您、您是来帮忙的对吧？现在最需要送货了！可我们这副样子……实在不敢离开钟居了。只能守在这儿。<page=T>不过我们想、想了个聪明主意！像您这样的强者，说不定愿意帮忙？酬劳虽然不多……<page=S>我们的积蓄都花光了，洞窟也危在旦夕。现在送货是救命的事！该您出马了，救星小姐！
translated_text: <page=T>I know my brothers will eventually be reunited safely, but they will also be here! The cave trembled, screaming for the most barbaric wounds.<page=T>When I saw a poor friend gathered in a house full of servants, my heart beat with fear.<page=S>What happened? Are you here to help me? Actually? Give up on us, we need you! Unfortunately, due to the survival of shells, leaving home at this time is impossible. I don't have any more. I know you're here, friend.<page=T>We are very happy. Can a strong person like you help me? Small tables like ours.<page=S>All my savings were spent, and the cave was dark. It's finally time to deliver!
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>我知道我的兄弟们最终会安全团聚，但他们也会在这里！洞穴颤抖着，尖叫着寻找最野蛮的伤口。<page=T>当我看到一个贫穷的朋友聚集在满是仆人的房子里时，我的心因恐惧而跳动。<page=S>发生了什么？你是来帮助我的吗？实际上？放弃我们吧，我们需要你！不幸的是，由于贝壳的生存，此时离开家是不可能的。我没有更多了。我知道你在这里，朋友。<page=T>我们很高兴。像你这样坚强的人能帮助我吗？像我们这样的小桌子。<page=S>我所有的积蓄都花光了，山洞里一片漆黑。终于到交货的时候了！

original_en_text: What? What, what? Who is it? What’ve you got? What do you want?<hpage>I am just a traveller. May I ask, though, what work occupies you here?<page>What occupies me, you ask? The past! The voices of ages gone by, they speak to me through what is left behind.<page>Those outside, those dreary pilgrims and bell-adorned dullards... none of them have my keen sense, my respect for the past!<page>You seem able, though. Sneaky, too. If you find any fine old stuff, anything with a history to it, bring it here. I’ll take it.
original_zh_text: 干嘛？要干嘛？你是谁？带了什么来？想要什么？<hpage>过路客而已，请问您在忙什么？<page>忙什么？忙着挖掘历史！这些老物件都会跟我诉说过往呢！<page>外头那些呆瓜朝圣者和钟里的蠢货……没一个懂行！<page>但你倒像块料，鬼精的。要是找到老物件，有年头的，就往这儿送。我收！
translated_text: What is this? What are you doing? What are you doing? Who are you? What are you doing? What do you want?<hpage>I'm just a traveler, I have a question, what are you doing here?<page>What's your problem? Things of the past! Time tells us.<page>They are boring pilgrims and stupid servants who have no respect for my vision and my past! "<page>You are very capable here. "Come on, you've been kidnapped. If you have something good, don't forget to bring it with you. I bought them.
secondary_translated_text: 这是什么？你在干什么？你在干什么？你是谁？你在干什么？你想要什么？<hpage>我只是一名旅行者，我有一个问题，你在这里做什么？<page>你有什么问题？过去的事情！时间告诉我们。<page>他们是无聊的朝圣者和愚蠢的仆人，不尊重我的愿景和过去！"<page>你在这里很有能力。“来吧，你被绑架了。如果你有什么好东西，别忘了带在身上。我买了它们。

original_en_text: Your continued help to Bellhart has not gone unnoticed, miss traveller.<page>In these terrible times, it’s rare enough to see any wish granted. Now to see such care come from a stranger! Why, that’s simply unheard of!<hpage>I have seen the scale of suffering wrought across Pharloom, Pavo. And I will admit, fulfilling these requests may do little to affect the cause... Even still, I have found it a rewarding task.<hpage>To aid another... The small warmth of it, I had almost forgotten.
original_zh_text: 您对钟心镇的援助有目共睹，小姐。<page>这世道，能实现祈愿已是奇迹，更何况还是出自外乡客！闻所未闻！<hpage>我也目睹纺络遍地疮痍。实现祈愿虽难以撼动其根源，但总能得到些许慰藉。<hpage>助虫为乐……这份悸动，我几乎忘却。
translated_text: "Ladies and gentlemen, our continued support for Burhart cannot be ignored.<page>In these difficult times, wishes are rarely realized, and I have seen fear of strangers! Why? Why? This is an unforgettable moment!<hpage>He chose the situation of a Turkish farm. Meeting these requirements will have little impact on your career. However, I think this is a useful job.<hpage>It's a little hot, I forgot.
secondary_translated_text: “女士们、先生们，我们对伯哈特的持续支持不容忽视。<page>在这个困难时期，愿望很少实现，我也见过对陌生人的恐惧！为什么？为什么？这是一个难忘的时刻！<hpage>他选择了土耳其农场的情况。满足这些要求对您的职业生涯影响不大。不过，我认为这是一项有用的工作。<hpage>有点热，我忘了。

original_en_text: It’s my calling it is, to gather the relics of the past. Look at my collection, if you fancy! Look, look!
