original_zh_text: 我活着的念想就是收罗老古董！想看我的珍藏不？来！快看看！
translated_text: My job is to collect remnants of the past. If you like, you can check out my collection. You should have seen me! Look at me!
secondary_translated_text: 我的工作是收集过去的遗迹。如果你愿意，你可以查看我的收藏。你真该看看我！看着我！

original_en_text: <page=T>Goods for the camp at base, where pilgrims’ journey starts. We muchly hope this delivering goes well!
original_zh_text: <page=T>给骸底营地的货物，希望这趟一路顺利！
translated_text: <page=T>Load the base camp where pilgrims begin their journey. I want delivery.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>装载朝圣者开始旅程的大本营。我要送货。

original_en_text: <page=S>You have the good-goods, miss courier! Now only the deliverings needs doing. Don’t wait here-here!
original_zh_text: <page=S>救星小姐，拿、拿了货物，快出发吧！
translated_text: <page=S>We have a great product! They just need to deliver. Don't wait here! Here he comes!
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>我们有一个很棒的产品！他们只需要交付。别在这里等！他来了！

original_en_text: Off with you! Head over to that tangled mess of cages, in those roads above the moors.<page>Those two bugs, Benjin and Crull, can surely scrounge up what I need. A full bundle of hard, sharp spines!
original_zh_text: 赶紧去！找沼地上边铁笼堆的班金和克鲁尔，拿钢棘回来！
translated_text: Run, run, run! These cells are scattered on streets in desert soil.<page>The two mistakes of the manager and Kuhl were that I would find what I needed. There are many hard and sharp peaks!
secondary_translated_text: 快跑快跑这些细胞散布在沙漠土壤的街道上。<page>主教练和库尔的两个错误是我会找到我需要的东西。有很多坚硬而尖锐的山峰！

original_en_text: That blade! By claw! It is done. Sharper than this pinmaster would have believed achievable. Shining pale and clear.<page>Bonva! Stranger, you have granted my wish, and more. Your blade is accomplishment to match those of great pinmasters past.<page>Pharloom may ail, but throughout its morbid dim, your needle will shine bright.
original_zh_text: 瞧这针刃！利爪啊！完成了！这苍白皎洁的锋芒，简直超乎我这针匠想象。<page>太好了！您不止完成了我的祈愿，还助此针达成了不逊于古匠的成就！<page>纵使纺络病入膏肓，您的针芒也将照亮死寂！
translated_text: "Carl, Carl! You can use your nails. It is much more complex than the craftsmen imagined, it is white and transparent.<page>Help me! Help me! Help me! Help me! Your black color is like the great harp of ancient times.<page>Falling injuries, but in the morbid darkness, the needle glows.
secondary_translated_text: “卡尔，卡尔！你可以用你的指甲。它比工匠们想象的要复杂得多，它是白色的，透明的。<page>救救我！救救我！救救我！救救我！你的黑色就像古代的大竖琴。<page>坠落受伤，但在病态的黑暗中，针却闪闪发光。

original_en_text: What? You refuse to pass it on? What good do you think it’ll do you?!
original_zh_text: 干嘛？为什么不交？留着能下崽啊？！
translated_text: What is this? veto inheritance? What do you think might help?
secondary_translated_text: 这是什么？否决继承？你认为有什么可能有帮助？

original_en_text: <hpage>Stay safe, Pavo. Keep these poor bugs close and their spirits from sorrow.<page>None shall leave these walls, dear resident, and all still are welcome. Any that can be saved.<page>Better we bugs be together, here at the end of it all.
original_zh_text: <hpage>保重，帕沃。保护好这些可怜虫，别让他们陷入绝望。<page>没有虫会离开这里的，旅者小姐！这里永远欢迎任何幸存的虫。<page>末日将至，能聚在一起已值得庆幸。
translated_text: <hpage>Be careful, Parker. Work for the poor and save their souls from pain.<page>Dear citizens, no one can escape this wall.<page>It's best to stay together after you're done.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>小心点，帕克。为穷人工作，拯救他们的灵魂免受痛苦。<page>亲爱的公民们，没有人能逃离这堵墙。<page>结束后最好呆在一起。

original_en_text: <hpage>Stay alert on your journey home, pinmaster. If you encounter other bugs upon the road, I advise you avoid them as you are able.
original_zh_text: <hpage>回程多留神，针匠。路上遇虫尽量躲着点。
translated_text: <hpage>Be careful on the way home. If there are other mistakes along the way, it is best to avoid them as much as possible.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>回家的路上要小心。如果一路上还有其他错误，最好尽可能避免。

original_en_text: Auugh! Bzzt! Again the world lashes out at me!<page>But the pain... it means nothing to Yarnaby!<page>Nothing can deter my great work! Not for long! I must not be stopped!
original_zh_text: 嗷！滋滋！这该死世道又针对我！<page>但痛苦……对雅纳碧而言没有意义！<page>什么都挡不住本神医的伟业！什么都不行！
translated_text: Yes, right. Oh, yes! World M.M.M. He attacked us again.<page>Pain does not mean anything.<page>Nothing can stop me from doing my job well." It won't take that long! "I can't stop this!
secondary_translated_text: 是的，正确的。哦，是的！世界MM他再次攻击我们。<page>痛苦并不意味着什么。<page>没有什么可以阻止我做好我的工作。“不会花那么长时间的！“我无法阻止这一切！

translated_text: Bell Paint

original_en_text: <page=S>A new destination this-this! And desperate these supplies are asked.<page=T>Deliverings for them-them escaped from the crumbled camp beside the bone, those few still living.<page=T>Hurting and hungry, those few must be.
original_zh_text: <page=S>这、这是新目的地！这批物资要得急！<page=T>送给骸骨营地的幸存者，就剩那么几个了。<page=T>他们肯定又惊又饿。
translated_text: <page=S>This is a new direction! Materials are urgent.<page=T>They fled the desolate fields with their bones, and some are still alive.<page=T>They suffer suffering and hunger.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>这是一个新方向！材料很紧急。<page=T>他们带着骨头逃离了荒凉的田野，有些人还活着。<page=T>他们遭受苦难和饥饿。

original_en_text: <page=T>It is yours, miss courier! Meats prepared fresh as fresh, in our special way.<page=T>Miss courier must know! Our rasher is delicious, strong, fatty food, but is not long to last. If not stored quick, it-it is flavour fast turns foul.<hpage>If the rasher is likely to spoil, then I shall make fast for the Citadel. I’ve no desire to see your efforts, or your scant supplies wasted.
original_zh_text: <page=T>给您备好啦！送货虫特制熏肉，仅此一家！<page=T>熏肉香浓肥美但不耐存！得赶紧送！<hpage>既然如此，我即刻动身。不枉你们辛苦。
translated_text: <page=T>Delivery is yours! Meat is cooked in a special way.<page=T>The messenger knew Rachel's cheese tasted good, but it didn't last long.<hpage>If Rachel's condition worsens, she will return to the castle, not wanting to waste her efforts and materials.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>送货是你的！肉是以特殊的方式烹饪的。<page=T>信使知道雷切尔的奶酪味道不错，但并没有持续太久。<hpage>如果雷切尔的病情恶化，她就会返回城堡，不想浪费自己的努力和材料。

original_en_text: Shellwood’s grown more dangerous in recent times, but I’m a lifelong catcher, right down to my core. Ain’t nothing that’ll change that.
original_zh_text: 甲木林近来愈发凶险，但我生来就是渔夫的命，避不开。
translated_text: Sherwood has become increasingly dangerous in recent years, but most people are lifelong recipients.
secondary_translated_text: 近年来，舍伍德变得越来越危险，但大多数人都是终身受益者。

original_en_text: I rarely sell objects as intriguing as this. Supposed to improve a bug’s natural ability to heal! Can’t say I’ve felt its effects myself, but then I keep more healthy than most.
original_zh_text: 这可是少见的好玩意！据说能提升自愈力。我身子一向健康，倒是没感受过。
translated_text: Selling such an attractive product is unusual. It can enhance the insect's natural healing capabilities. I can't say I can feel the effects, but I'm healthier than most people.
secondary_translated_text: 销售如此有吸引力的产品是不寻常的。它可以增强昆虫的自然治愈能力。我不能说我能感受到影响，但我比大多数人更健康。

original_en_text: Yes... This fits my collection well. Look, then! Look at what I have!
original_zh_text: 真不错……这玩意配得上我的珍藏。瞧啊！这才叫宝贝！
translated_text: Very suitable for my collection. Let's take a look at this. What did you grab? "
secondary_translated_text: 非常适合我的收藏。我们来看看这个。你抓了什么？"

original_en_text: Ahh. ‘Tis your choice, warrior. If you’re choosing different in times ahead, Plinney shall be here to provide eager aid.
original_zh_text: 唉。随您，勇士。改主意了随时来找普林尼。
translated_text: If you choose other options in the future, Pline is always ready to provide you with enthusiastic help.
secondary_translated_text: 如果您将来选择其他选择，Pline随时准备为您提供热情的帮助。

original_en_text: My sickly friend! Pavo can sense that you are ailing, but fret not! For in Bellhart, pilgrims may rest and recuperate until they are fit to travel once more!<hpage>Your hospitality is appreciated, Pavo, but I fear rest alone will not suffice for this illness. A parasite has taken root inside me, one I can not remove through strength alone.<hpage>Tell me, are there any you know who might help me? A healer, or a physician?<page>A physician? Well... we did once have one... A frightening fiend! Callous and crude in her practice. For the health of glorious Bellhart we voted, unanimously, to expel her!<page>I know not where she buzzed away to, and I prefer to keep it that way! But if you really must seek her out, you might start by speaking to the old hermit skulking beneath the Bellway.<page>Yes... that hermit seems mad, but he has a way of accumulating knowledge. He might be able to tell you where that wretched physician is lurking.
original_zh_text: 旅者小姐！帕沃察觉到您疾病缠身，但无需担心！您可以待在钟心镇疗养至康复！<hpage>心领了，但此症并非静养可以治愈，甲壳内寄生体难以驱除。<hpage>你可知道哪里能寻得医者？<page>医者？过去镇上曾有一虫……但手段可怕至极！因疗法过于粗暴遭全民驱逐！<page>如今行踪不明，但执意要寻找的话……可以问问在钟道下藏身的老隐士。<page>那老头虽然疯疯癫癫，但知道不少，或许能告知庸医的下落。
translated_text: Your sick friend in Papua may get sick, but don't worry. In Berhad, pilgrims can rest and relax until they resume their journey.<hpage>Pave, thank you for your hospitality. But loneliness does not cure disease. The parasite has taken root in me, and I cannot eradicate it alone.<hpage>Do you know who can help you? Doctor or therapist?<page>Doctor? Okay, okay, there's a terrible devil. His actions were ruthless and we will unanimously expel him for the sake of Lord Burhart's health.<page>I don't know where she went, but I wish she was there, but if you really want to find her, you can talk to her and hide under the bells.<page>Yes, doctor, recluse may seem crazy, but there are ways to accumulate knowledge.
secondary_translated_text: 你在巴布亚生病的朋友可能会生病，但别担心。在伯哈德，朝圣者可以休息和放松，直到他们恢复旅程。<hpage>Pave，感谢您的热情款待。但孤独并不能治愈疾病。寄生虫已经在我身上扎根，我无法独自消灭它。<hpage>你知道谁可以帮助你吗？医生还是治疗师？<page>医生？好吧，好吧，有一个可怕的魔鬼。他的行为是无情的，为了伯哈特勋爵的健康，我们将一致驱逐他。<page>我不知道她去了哪里，但我希望她在那里，但如果你真的想找到她，你可以和她谈谈并躲在钟声下。<page>是的，医生，隐士可能看起来很疯狂，但有办法积累知识。

original_en_text: We are lucky to have you, miss traveller. In Bellhart you are always welcome, you and your big, sharp blade!
original_zh_text: 有您相助真是钟心镇之幸！这里随时欢迎您，以及您的针刃！
translated_text: We are very lucky, travelers.
secondary_translated_text: 旅行者们，我们非常幸运。

original_en_text: <hpage>What do you remember of your time caught upon the thread, Pavo?<page>Oh, ahh. It is difficult... Upsetting even to think. Strange, sad memories, not my own, and my own thoughts smothered amidst the tangle.<page>If one could choose to connect themself to something grander, that curse may seem a wonder. For myself, it now seems a horror.
original_zh_text: <hpage>帕沃，还记得被邪丝操控时的记忆么？<page>唉……回想起来有些痛苦……尽是陌生悲伤的回忆，自身的思绪仿佛被扼杀其中。<page>要是自愿投身于宏伟存在，这份诅咒或许是恩赐。但对于我……终究是梦魇。
translated_text: <hpage>"Do you remember when you were in trouble?"”<page>Strange and sad memories that do not belong to you, but are intertwined with your thoughts.<page>When one has the opportunity to connect with something higher, the curse seems to be a miracle.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>“你还记得你遇到麻烦的时候吗？"”<page>那些不属于你的奇怪而悲伤的回忆，却与你的想法交织在一起。<page>当一个人有机会与更高的东西建立联系时，诅咒似乎就是一个奇迹。

original_en_text: Oh! Ohhhh! They shall join... Union upon your thread... A gift, for your waking. A world strung to serve...<hpage>Creature, your claws guide those cursed threads, but you are not their source. What role do you play in this vile affliction?
original_zh_text: 哦！哦哦哦！他们将归附……缠绕在您的丝线中……献予您的苏醒之礼，一个以侍奉之名编织的世界……<hpage>怪物，你虽然操纵邪丝却并非其源头。在这卑劣诅咒中你扮演什么角色？
translated_text: Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! They will unite, it connects to your line, it is the gift of awakening. Peace is committed to serving.<hpage>"Ah, creature, your fingernails carry the cursed thread, but are you not the source of it? "What role did you play in this unfortunate process?
secondary_translated_text: 哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！他们会团结起来，它连接到你的防线，这是觉醒的礼物。和平致力于服务。<hpage>“啊，生物，你的指甲上带有被诅咒的线，但你不是它的来源吗？“你在这个不幸的过程中扮演了什么角色？

original_en_text: <page=T>But hold, miss courier! Before depart you mustly know, all deliverings are in needing of great-great care!<page=S>No bump! No shake! No taking funny transport! Only leg, claw, wing must be used to see them where they need be going.<page=S>Carry the deliverings safe-safe, miss courier! Cared for like your own shell.
original_zh_text: 等等！出发前得知道：所有货物必须轻拿轻放！<page>不准磕！不准晃！只能用腿脚翅膀运送！<page>要当成自己甲壳一样护着货！
translated_text: <page=T>"Lord, before you go, please pay attention to future generations. "<page=S>There will be no conflict! Don't move! Stop joking! Use your feet, nails and wings to decide where you want to go.<page=S>Safe transport, safe transport, lost transport. Think of it as your laundry room.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>“主啊，在你走之前，请关注子孙后代。"<page=S>不会有冲突！不要动！别开玩笑了！使用你的脚、指甲和翅膀来决定你想去的地方。<page=S>安全运输，安全运输，丢失运输。将其视为您的洗衣房。

original_en_text: <page=T>Those good-goods, all packed fresh for the clever fleas. Take thems up for us, miss courier. Maybe new friends you might be making with your service? Yes-yes?
original_zh_text: 给聪明跳蚤们的新鲜货。送去说不定能交新朋友？对、对吧？
translated_text: <page=T>This good product is an excellent packaging for smart chips. Bring him here, bring him here. You can make friends with your services, right?
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>这款好产品是智能芯片的绝佳包装。把他带到这里，把他带到这里。你可以和你的服务交朋友，对吧？

original_en_text: Bzzt! Who’s bothering me now?! Leave the great Yarnaby in peace! Shoo shoo!
original_zh_text: 滋滋！谁在聒噪？！让伟大的雅纳碧静静！去去去！
translated_text: M.M.M. is annoying! May the great Annabi rest in peace! Lies, lies! Lies, lies! Lies, lies! Lies, lies! Lies, lies! Lies, lies! Lies, lies! Lies, lies! Lies, lies! Lies, lies! Lies, lies! Lies, lies! Lies, lies! Lies, lies! Lies, lies!
secondary_translated_text: M.M.M.真烦人！愿伟大的阿纳比安息！谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！谎言，谎言！

original_en_text: <hpage>I am sick, madam, and badly in need of your service. I’ve become host to a vile infestation. It leeches my strength, and attempts to wrest control of my shell.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我身体抱恙，女士，需要您诊治。壳里寄生了恶心玩意，不仅吸我气力，还想夺舍躯体。
translated_text: <hpage>I'm sick and I need help. I am the master of a terrible invasion. He sucked my strength and tried to control my shell.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我病了，需要帮助。我是一场可怕入侵的大师。他吸了我的力量，试图控制我的壳。

original_en_text: Halfwits, the lot of them! Such grand achievement, wrought by Yarnaby! A bug healed full by my marvellous machine!<page>A few weaklings expire, and they all raise their claws. Is there no place for progress in their tiny minds?!
original_zh_text: 全是蠢材！这是雅纳碧创造的奇迹！被神机治愈的病患！<page>死几个弱虫就举爪抗议！他们的小脑仁就这么容不下进步？！
translated_text: Half of them are smart, many of them. This is a huge achievement for Yanabi! This error has been completely fixed in my magic machine!<page>Many weak people died and raised their hands.
secondary_translated_text: 他们中的一半很聪明，其中许多人。这对Yanabi来说是一个巨大的成就！这个错误已经在我的神奇机器中完全修复了！<page>许多弱者死了，举起了手。

original_en_text: Bellhart’s lost much of its lustre, but we still offer some comfort to the pilgrims who climb this high.
original_zh_text: 钟心镇是风光不再了，但还能为登高的朝圣者提供些慰藉。
translated_text: Although Berhardt has lost most of its glory, it provides comfort to pilgrims climbing so high.
secondary_translated_text: 尽管伯哈特已经失去了大部分荣耀，但它为攀登如此高的朝圣者提供了安慰。

original_en_text: <page>Dear resident! To see you return alive is such a glimmer of light, even as the dark descends upon us all.<hpage>All these pilgrims gathered here... I had not expected so many to survive. The destruction beyond these bells suggested worse.<page>Indeed! Things should be worse! Would be worse, but for your tall warrior friend, her of those shining rings, who so fortunately chose our town to camp.<page>That brave bug now acts alone to guard our town and those pilgrims who flee for it.<page>For her efforts, our shells have stayed safe, though how long she can remain at that task... I do not dare to consider.
original_zh_text: <page>旅者小姐！看到您平安归来，就像一道萤火驱散了钟心镇的黑暗。<hpage>想不到有如此多朝圣者幸存，镇外的景象可是惨烈得很。<page>情况确实本应更糟！但幸运的是有您这样的勇士驻守。<page>正是有您的保护，朝圣者们才能逃难至此。<page>有您在，镇子才能暂时安全，但不知这景象能维持多久……
translated_text: <page>Dear residents! Although darkness hangs over all of us, only a light can see you coming back alive.<hpage>That's not to say that many of the pilgrims gathered here will survive, but external damage to the watch proved worse.<page>Yes, things are worse! If you don't have a great warrior friend wearing a ring, then you are lucky to have chosen our urban camp.<page>This brave insect acts alone to protect our city and the pilgrims who flee here.<page>Thanks to his efforts, our shells are still safe, but I dare not imagine how long it will last.
secondary_translated_text: <page>亲爱的居民！尽管黑暗笼罩着我们所有人，但只有光明才能看到你活着回来。<hpage>这并不是说聚集在这里的许多朝圣者都能幸存下来，但事实证明手表的外部损坏更严重。<page>是的，事情更糟了！如果您没有戴戒指的伟大战士朋友，那么您很幸运选择了我们的城市营地。<page>这种勇敢的昆虫独自行动，保护我们的城市和逃离这里的朝圣者。<page>由于他的努力，我们的炮弹仍然安全，但我不敢想象它能持续多久。

original_en_text: My brother, Pill, still out there. Help-help others he must be, taking good-goods all across. I’m is only hope he stay safe-safe, but gone long is Pill. Too long!<page>On the wishwall, I’m placed my wish-wish, that my brother returns to me, and these bells of safety’s safe.<hpage>I shall check the wall, Tipp. If your wish aligns with my journey, I may track him down.
original_zh_text: 我兄弟皮尔还在外面送、送货，他肯定还在帮、帮别的虫，但去太久了！<page>我在祈愿墙上许、许了愿：希望他平安归来，还有钟心镇也永远平安。<hpage>我会查看祈愿墙，蒂普。若是顺路，或许能找到他的踪迹。
translated_text: "My brother Peter escaped. I wanted to see if I was safe, but my medication fell off. I haven't seen you for a long time!<page>I wrote my wishes on the wall. I wish the servant peace so that my brother can come home.<hpage>"I look at the wall, Tipp. If your wishes match my journey, I will definitely find them.
secondary_translated_text: “我的兄弟彼得逃跑了。我想看看我是否安全，但我的药掉了。我很久没见到你了！<page>我把我的愿望写在墙上。我祝愿仆人平安，让我的兄弟回家。<hpage>“我看着墙，蒂普。如果你的愿望与我的旅程相匹配，我一定会找到它们。

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, shopkeeper. Given the hardships of the lands beyond these bells, your store seems in remarkable order. <page>Aye, well, we’ve had our tough times too! Of once bustling Bellhart, only a few residents now remain.<page>But things are turned around for old Frey! Ho, yes! The town at least feels briefly at peace, and my courier has returned with fresh goods to trade. <page>Whether pilgrim or traveller, mine is the finest store you’ll have the fortune to visit throughout our blighted lands.
original_zh_text: <hpage>日安，店主。钟心镇外世道艰难，你这铺子倒打理得井井有条。<page>唉，我也吃过苦头的！往日热闹的钟心镇，如今只剩几口虫啦。<page>但老芙蕾时来运转！哈哈！镇子外总算消停会儿，送货虫也带新鲜货回来了。<page>不管是朝圣者还是旅者，走遍这破地儿也找不着比我家更棒的铺子！
translated_text: <hpage>The ground behind these servants looked solid, and his shop was neat.<page>We also had a hard time! Berhad, once a vibrant city, is sparsely populated.<page>But Fred's situation was reversed! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh, yes! The town stabilized at least temporarily, and the postman returned with fresh produce.<page>Whether you are a pilgrim or a traveler, our store is the best thing you can visit in the desert.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>这些仆人身后的地面看起来很坚固，他的商店也很整洁。<page>我们也过得很艰难！伯哈德曾经是一座充满活力的城市，但人口稀少。<page>但弗雷德的情况却反过来了！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦，是的！该镇至少暂时稳定下来，邮递员带着新鲜农产品回来了。<page>无论您是朝圣者还是旅行者，我们的商店都是您在沙漠中可以参观的最好的东西。

translated_text: private spa

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings again, shopkeeper. Your shelves are looking better stocked. I see the courier made their way back to you safely.<page>Oh yes, the cheeky little so-and-so came by and dropped his cargo off at last.<page>Poor dear was so shaken by his misadventures, I almost didn’t have the heart to dock his earnings.<page>All’s well now, though! Take a look at the lovely new goods I have available!
original_zh_text: <hpage>日安，店主。货架充实不少，看来送货虫平安归来了。<page>可不，那小滑头终于把货带到了。<page>可怜虫吓得够呛，我都不忍扣他工钱。<page>现在齐活啦！瞧瞧这些新宝贝！
translated_text: <hpage>Say hello again. The owner is that most of the lions have returned safely.<page>"Yes, the bad guys came in and threw things away.<page>The poor boy was so surprised at his misfortune that I dared not deduct his income.<page>But everything is fine now! Find your own new product.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>再打个招呼。主人是大部分狮子都安全返回了。<page>“是的，坏人进来把东西扔掉了。<page>这个可怜的男孩对他的不幸感到非常惊讶，我不敢扣除他的收入。<page>但现在一切都好了！找到您自己的新产品。

original_en_text: Ohhhh! She is here! The rare birthling! Precious child of Wyrm and Weaver!<page>Spawn of those who dared to flee. She has found her way home... at last.<page>How fine her shell, and Silk, and claw... For you, mother... let me claim her all for you!
original_zh_text: 哦哦哦！她来了！稀世子嗣！沃姆与织者的结晶！<page>逃亡者的后代，终于归乡……<page>多么完美的甲壳、灵丝与利爪……母亲啊……让我将她献予您！
translated_text: Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! He's here! "This is an unusual birth. Son of Wim and Weaver<page>For those descendants who fled, he found his way home.<page>Mom, my skin and nails are thinner than yours. Take everything away!
secondary_translated_text: 哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！他来了！“这是一次不寻常的出生。维姆和韦弗的儿子<page>对于那些逃亡的后代，他找到了回家的路。<page>妈妈，我的皮肤和指甲都比你的薄。把一切都拿走！

original_en_text: A fine purchase you’ve made! Allow us a moment and we’ll get it set up in your bellhome.
original_zh_text: 好买卖！稍等就给你装点进钟居。
translated_text: I bought something valuable! Wait a minute, I'll put it in the bag.
secondary_translated_text: 我买了一些有价值的东西！等一下，我把它放进袋子里。

original_en_text: Ah! That relic you possess! A cylinder of the Citadel’s sacred vault! That there is a mighty find. You will give it, yes?<hpage>I will not, seeker. To extract what knowledge it holds, this cylinder requires a listening device, one you do not possess.<hpage>If it were passed, whatever secrets it contains would remain forever hidden from us both.<page>Pah... If it will not speak to me, I do not want it! Don’t trouble me until you have something worth my taking!
original_zh_text: 啊！你手里那东西！圣堡秘库的音筒！这可是大发现。交给我吧？<hpage>不行，要听取其中知识，需要特殊机械，而你没有。<hpage>现在交出来，是埋没了它。<page>嘁……哑巴筒子我也不稀罕！弄到真宝贝再来！
translated_text: Yes, right. Oh, yes! The legacy he has. Holy dome in the cylindrical castle! I made a great discovery. Did you really give it to me?<hpage>Yes, researchers, you need an acoustic device to extract the knowledge contained in the cylinder, but you don't have it.<hpage>When he dies, the secret he keeps will be hidden forever.<page>My father was... ... If he doesn't say so, I don't want it. Don't worry until you get what you deserve!
secondary_translated_text: 是的，正确的。哦，是的！他拥有的遗产。圆柱形城堡里的神圣圆顶！我有了一个伟大的发现。你真的给我了吗？<hpage>是的，研究人员，你需要一个声学设备来提取圆柱体中包含的知识，但你没有它。<hpage>当他死后，他保守的秘密将永远被隐藏。<page>我父亲是. ...如果他不这么说，我就不想要了。在你得到你应得的之前，别担心！

original_en_text: <page=T>The deliverings, all broken-broke? Would you try-try again, miss courier? Pharloom’s bugs are so much in need of your help!
original_zh_text: <page=T>货全毁、毁了？要再试一次吗？大伙可全指、指望您啦！
translated_text: <page=T>Did delivery fail? "Miss, you can try again. The insects in Palomelet need your help! "
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>交付失败了吗？“小姐，你可以再试一次。帕洛梅莱特的昆虫需要您的帮助！"

original_en_text: Bonva, traveller! You have the oil! Will you allow me to work wonder upon your blade?
original_zh_text: 旅者！你真的带秘油来了！可以让我用在你的针刃上？
translated_text: Good morning, travelers, we have oil! Can he create miracles with his sword?
secondary_translated_text: 早上好，旅客们，我们有油了！他能用剑创造奇迹吗？

original_en_text: Welcome, welcome, weary pilgrim! Though glorious Bellhart may be past its finest shine, it still remains the last friendly stop before the Citadel. <page>It is the task of I, fair Pavo, to extend the warmest of welcome to those passing devout, such as your good self!<page>Now! I insist you enjoy our remaining hospitality, if only for a moment. We’ve wares to buy and services to enjoy!<page>Even in our reduced state, you’ll find ours as cosy a stop as can be offered in these ailing lands.
original_zh_text: 欢迎欢迎，疲惫的朝圣者！钟心镇虽不复往昔，但仍是攀登圣堡前最后一处友善驿站。<page>我，帕沃，专为虔行旅者献上最热忱的欢迎——比如尊驾您！<page>希望您能好好感受圣途前最后的余温！这里有货可购，有乐可享！<page>即便衰微，钟心镇仍是这病土中最温馨的歇脚处！
translated_text: Welcome to our tired pilgrims! The glorious Berhardt may be living at his peak, but this is the last stop in front of the castle.<page>"My duty, beautiful peacock, is to respect the kindness of dead people like you." "<page>Come on, now! There are many things to buy and enjoy.<page>Even our reduced state can provide a comfortable resting place in this disease area.
secondary_translated_text: 欢迎来到我们疲惫不堪的朝圣者身边！辉煌的伯哈特可能正处于巅峰时期，但这是城堡前的最后一站。<page>“美丽的孔雀，我的职责就是尊重像你这样死去的人的善良。" "<page>快点，现在！有很多东西可以买和享受。<page>即使我们的减少状态可以提供一个舒适的休息场所在这个疾病领域。

original_en_text: My sickly friend! I can sense that you are ailing. Has the black curse struck even your sturdy shell?<hpage>This illness stems from a different source, Pavo. A parasite has taken root inside me, one I can not remove through strength alone.<hpage>Tell me, are there any you know who might help me? A healer, or a physician?<page>A physician? Well... we did once have one... A frightening fiend! Callous and crude in her practice. For the health of glorious Bellhart we voted, unanimously, to expel her!<page>I know not where she buzzed away to, but the world beyond the bells is full of danger. If you must seek her service, I expect she would not have travelled far...
original_zh_text: 哎朋友，你脸色不太好啊！帕沃一眼就瞧出来了。难道连你那坚硬的外壳，也被黑色的诅咒侵蚀了吗？<hpage>不，帕沃，这病根源另有其处，我体内寄生着异物，靠蛮力根本无法将它驱除。<hpage>你知道有谁能帮我摆脱异物吗？养疗师，医师都行？<page>有认识的医师吗？嗯……的确有过一个……不过是个恶魔！她行事冷酷，手段粗野。为了钟心镇的安宁，我们众口一辞，驱逐了她！<page>她嗡地飞走了，不知道去了哪儿。但钟声之外的世界，危机四伏。若你执意寻她的医术，我想她应该走得不远……
translated_text: My sick friends, I feel uncomfortable. Does the black curse fit your helmet?<hpage>The parasite is taking root in me and I cannot eradicate it alone.<hpage>Do you know who can help you? Doctor or therapist?<page>Doctor? Everything is fine, everything is fine. There was a time when there was a terrible demon. His behavior was cruel and impolite. "For the sake of Sir Burhart's health, we unanimously decided to expel him.<page>I don't know where I've been, but the world behind the clock is full of danger. If you need my services, I don't think you'll go too far.
secondary_translated_text: 我生病的朋友们，我感觉很不舒服。黑咒适合你的头盔吗<hpage>寄生虫正在我体内扎根，我无法独自根除它。<hpage>你知道谁可以帮助你吗？医生还是治疗师？<page>医生？一切都很好，一切都很好。曾经有一个可怕的恶魔。他的行为残忍且不礼貌。“为了伯哈特爵士的健康，我们一致决定驱逐他。<page>我不知道我去了哪里，但时钟后面的世界充满了危险。如果你需要我的服务，我认为你不会走得太远。

original_en_text: Welly, nay? Certainly you make the safer choice. Better to keep one’s shell intact.
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！保命要紧，理解理解。
translated_text: Is that Willie? What are you doing? This way, you can make safer choices. The best way is to keep the skin intact.
secondary_translated_text: 那是威利吗？你在干什么？这样，您就可以做出更安全的选择。最好的方法是保持皮肤完好无损。

original_en_text: <page=T>Supplies for the rest-stop in the fields. We is used to like this delivering, when we was young and muchly brave.
original_zh_text: <page=T>远野驿站的补给，我们年轻时也经常送这里的货。
translated_text: <page=T>When we were young, we were used to this delivery method.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>当我们年轻的时候，我们已经习惯了这种送货方式。

original_en_text: This town feel safe, just, but I’m is worries for others. Is Pharloom needing its good-goods?<page>Many bugs helped by us couriers, me and brother Pill. Special now when danger grows big-big.
original_zh_text: 镇子暂时安全，但我担心别处，其他虫不需要货、货物吗？<page>我们送货虫兄弟俩，我和皮尔，可帮过不少虫。尤其现在世道这么凶、凶险。
translated_text: The city is safe, but other cities are worried. Do you need a good product?<page>My brother and I helped a lot of insects. This is a special moment because the dangers are increasing.
secondary_translated_text: 这座城市很安全，但其他城市却很担心。你需要好的产品吗？<page>我和哥哥帮助了很多昆虫。这是一个特殊的时刻，因为危险正在增加。

original_en_text: I saw it! Took my wish off the board, you did! Heading out after my stray courier, then?<hpage>My own tasks see me travel far, shopkeeper. If, on my journey, I happen upon the errant bug, I’ll make sure to send them your way.<page>Then you’ll have my thanks and more! It’s a rare bug who’d brave the wilds to aid a fellow.
original_zh_text: 我看见了！你接了我的祈愿？要去找我那跑丢的送货虫？<hpage>我本就需要远行，店主。要是在路上遇见那迷途虫，我会让他来寻你。<page>那可多谢了！如今肯为同类闯进荒野的虫可太难找了！
translated_text: I see you! You took my wish off the blackboard, and you did it! Are you looking for a travel agency?<hpage>My mission takes me further. If you don't notice this error while traveling, we will definitely send it to you.<page>Dare to go into the desert to help others is a rare mistake.
secondary_translated_text: 我看到你了！你把我的愿望从黑板上拿走了，你做到了！您正在寻找旅行社吗？<hpage>我的使命带我走得更远。如果您在旅行时没有注意到此错误，我们一定会将其发送给您。<page>敢于进入沙漠帮助别人是一个罕见的错误。

original_en_text: For a spool bearing no Silk, it’s surprisingly heavy. Do you think perhaps it could be a gift left behind by the old creeping ones?
original_zh_text: 虽是空的灵丝轴，但却挺沉。莫非是古织者留下的？
translated_text: The weight of the silk scroll is impressive. Do you think this is a gift from ancient reptiles?
secondary_translated_text: 卷轴的重量令人印象深刻。你认为这是古代爬行动物的礼物吗？

original_en_text: If you really must find that wretched physician, speak to the old hermit lurking beneath Bellhart. He knows much more than he admits of the world...
original_zh_text: 如果您执意要寻找那庸医，可以问问镇子下方的老隐士。他肚子里藏的秘密可不少……
translated_text: If you really want to find a poor doctor, go find an old hermit hiding under Bashaat.
secondary_translated_text: 如果你真的想找一个可怜的医生，那就去找一个躲在巴沙特底下的老隐士吧。

original_en_text: Welly, done! What miracle to work again upon steel so fine. Few pins left in Pharloom could attain such a sheen!<page>You must tell me, traveller, wherever did you come upon so splendid a weapon?<hpage>The blade was a gift, given by a noble tribe of my homeland. They forged the strongest steel, though it was rarely seen beyond their hive.<hpage>That tribe has now long passed, and with them the secrets to their craft.<page>Ahhh. If they are gone, it’s a rarer piece than would be guessed! But what grand luck for this humble pinmaster to have worked with such a weapon!
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！成啦！圣油配上如此精钢，真是奇迹。纺络还剩几根针能有此锋芒！<page>旅者，我得问问你，哪里得来如此神兵？<hpage>故土一贵族部落所赠，其族以锻钢之术闻名，但成品鲜少外流。<hpage>该族早已灭绝，其锻造秘技随之消逝。<page>唉呀！竟然还是件孤品！我这卑微针匠能照料此针，也是三生有幸！
translated_text: This is a miracle of high-quality steel that can be reused. Pine trees left behind in autumn can get this light!<page>Traveler, where did you find such a beautiful gun?<hpage>The sword was a gift from our country's aristocrats, who practiced the strongest steel but were almost invisible outside the sanctuary.<hpage>This tribe has been gone for a long time, and the secrets of their craftsmanship exist.<page>If not, it would be very rare. However, the humble commander was lucky enough to use such a weapon.
secondary_translated_text: 这是优质钢材可重复使用的奇迹。秋天留下的松树就能得到这光！<page>旅行者，你在哪里找到这么漂亮的枪？<hpage>这把剑是我国贵族赠送的礼物，他们练习的是最坚固的钢铁，但在圣所之外几乎看不见。<hpage>这个部落已经消失很久了，他们的手艺秘密仍然存在。<page>如果没有，那就非常罕见了。然而，卑微的指挥官却幸运地使用了这样的武器。

translated_text: Go check in.

original_en_text: <page=T>Good-goods for the pilgrims up high! Thems brave ones, settled up on that big-big Citadel.<page=S>These deliverings they will muchly need, miss courier. Carry them safe-safe, for us!
original_zh_text: <page=T>给高处朝圣者的货！敢待在圣、圣堡，都是勇士。<page=S>都是要紧物资，救星小姐务必平、平安送到！
translated_text: <page=T>This is another good thing for pilgrims! They were brave people and lived in a big castle.<page=S>I need a store for safety.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>这对朝圣者来说又是一件好事！他们是勇敢的人，住在一座大城堡里。<page=S>为了安全，我需要一家商店。

original_en_text: Bzz-zzt! You hesitate! But your fear of my Extricator is born from mere ignorance, and you can overcome it with effort. Take a moment. Reconsider!
original_zh_text: 滋——滋！犹豫什么！怕剥离机是你无知！给你点时间，再想想！
translated_text: But your fear of my Savior comes from pure ignorance and can be overcome through hard work.
secondary_translated_text: 但你对我的救世主的恐惧纯粹来自无知，可以通过努力克服。

original_en_text: The great Yarnaby can rid you of those nasty “roots”, but to crack your stiff shell my mighty Extricator needs an upgrade!
original_zh_text: 本神医能治你体内的“根须”。但要撬开壳，得先升级剥离机！
translated_text: The great Yannavi can get rid of the boring "roots", but to break the hard shell, it must become a little bigger.
secondary_translated_text: 伟大的扬纳维可以摆脱无聊的“根”，但要打破坚硬的外壳，就必须变得更大一点。

original_en_text: Hello again! Fancy buying something special before your tasks whisk you away?
original_zh_text: 又来啦！出远门前不挑点特别的？
translated_text: We meet again! Do you want to buy something special before you leave?
secondary_translated_text: 我们又见面了！离开前想买点特别的东西吗？

original_en_text: <hpage>Couriers, I require a rasher of meat, for an old bug in the Citadel. Can you prepare it for me?<page=T>A bug up-up? Theys knows our finest food? If theys appreciate, we can prepare it most prompt! Miss courier has only to ask.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我需要熏肉送给圣堡老虫，能帮忙准备吗？<page=T>上头有虫识货？随时都能准备！救星小姐知会一声就行。
translated_text: <hpage>Commander, we need a pile of meat to fight the old cockroach. Are you ready?<page=T>Are there any errors during the update? Do you know what the best food is? If you like it, get it ready right away." The officer just asked.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>指挥官，我们需要一堆肉来对抗老蟑螂。你准备好了吗？<page=T>更新过程中是否有任何错误？你知道最好的食物是什么吗？如果你喜欢它，马上准备好。”军官问。

original_en_text: A sturdy desk is the heart of any bellhome! Use it to take stock of your situation or organise your artefacts.
original_zh_text: 一张结实桌子可是钟居的核心！理货记账必备。
translated_text: Powerful office-at the heart of Bellhouse! We use it to evaluate situations or organize projects.
secondary_translated_text: 强大的办公室-在Bellhouse的心脏！我们用它来评估情况或组织项目。

original_en_text: These roots that torment you so... I’m not altogether familiar with them, but it matters not!<page>If there’s something inside a body that must come out, we use great Yarnaby’s Extricator! It’s your only hope, bzzt!
original_zh_text: 折磨你的“根须”……虽然不常见，但无所谓！<page>只要是壳里有脏东西，就用本神医的剥离机！这是你的唯一希望，滋滋！
translated_text: My roots hurt. I don't know the details, but it's gonna be okay.<page>If you want to remove anything from your body, use the amazing Yarnavi extract! This is my only hope. Shh!
secondary_translated_text: 我的根很痛。我不知道细节，但会没事的。<page>如果您想从体内取出任何东西，请使用令人惊叹的Yarnavi提取物！这是我唯一的希望。嘘！

original_en_text: You’d ask my aid, but won’t assist yourself? Then leave! Remain suffering, and stop being a bother to me, bzzt!
original_zh_text: 想求医却不帮忙？滚！继续遭罪去吧，别来烦我，滋滋！
translated_text: Do you want me to help you? You have to get out of here! You shouldn't suffer any more and don't bother me.
secondary_translated_text: 你想让我帮你吗？你必须离开这里！你不应该再受苦了，也不要打扰我了。

original_en_text: Fellow resident! The world quakes and crumbles, but while my shell stays safe, my shop stays open.
original_zh_text: 好邻居！世道混乱，但只要我这壳不碎，铺子照开！
translated_text: Dear citizens! The world is shaking and falling apart, but my shell is still safe and my store is still open.
secondary_translated_text: 亲爱的公民！世界在颤抖，分崩离析，但我的壳仍然安全，我的商店仍然营业。

original_en_text: Welly, nay? You hold the precious oil for yourself? For what purpose do you deny a pinmaster their work? There is only I alive to work with such a wondrous substance!
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！你怎么私藏圣油？不让针匠干活？整个纺络只剩我能用此圣物！
translated_text: Is that Willie? What are you doing? Do you have precious oil? Why don't you teach music? Because we are alive, we can use wonderful materials.
secondary_translated_text: 那是威利吗？你在干什么？你有珍贵的石油吗？你为什么不教音乐？因为我们还活着，所以我们可以使用奇妙的材料。

original_en_text: Find that wretched physician fast, dear resident! I know not where she buzzed away to, but the world beyond the bells is full of danger.<page>If you must seek her service, I expect she would not have travelled far...
original_zh_text: 老乡啊，要找她得赶快了！她嗡地飞走了，不知道去了哪儿。但钟声之外的世界，危机四伏。<page>若你执意寻她的医术，我想她应该走得不远……
translated_text: Dear friends, let's go to the doctor. "I don't know where she went, but the world behind slavery is full of danger.<page>I don't think you go too far if you have to ask for their services.
secondary_translated_text: 亲爱的朋友们，我们去看医生吧。“我不知道她去了哪里，但奴隶制背后的世界充满了危险。<page>如果你必须要求他们的服务，我认为你不要太过分。

original_en_text: What? What now? What’s all that great racket, what is it?<hpage>Greetings, ma’am. It is only I. If you are disturbed by the rending of these lands, I fear some blame is mine to bear.<page>Blame, is it? Pah. Those who come after us can apportion blame as they see fit.<page>For now, my collection is the only thing that matters! I must protect it!
original_zh_text: 干嘛呢？这么闹腾？叮叮咣咣的搞什么？<hpage>女士，是我。抱歉打扰到了您。<page>跟我有什么好说抱歉的，你在外头做的事自有后虫评判。<page>眼下我的珍藏最要紧！得保护好了！
translated_text: What is this? What should we do now? What is noise? What are you doing?<hpage>"Good morning, miss, I'm alone. If you disagree with the division of the land, I will bear the responsibility. "<page>This is strange, sir. What are you doing? Oh, Oh, Oh! Those who see it can share the responsibility.<page>Today, our collection is very important! We need to protect ourselves!
secondary_translated_text: 这是什么？我们现在该怎么办？什么是噪音？你在干什么？<hpage>“早上好，小姐，我一个人。如果你不同意土地分割，我会承担责任。"<page>这很奇怪，先生。你在干什么？哦，哦，哦！看到它的人可以分担责任。<page>今天，我们的收藏非常重要！我们需要保护自己！

original_en_text: <page=S>A delivery deadly, dangerous, fiercably cold, for old bug up there that does need it much-much! Serves us all he does, so we serve back.<page=T>And great test for you, miss courier! Most challenging-challenge this. The lacquer to bring is sloshy-slosh. A hard carry even for the best.<hpage>I have met this maker. His is a long service, worthy of respect. I will be glad to aid his efforts.
original_zh_text: <page=S>急单！但危险！把液状漆送给山上的老工匠。他造福大伙，我们得回报。<page=T>救星小姐，这可是巨、巨大挑战！液状漆晃荡难带，专业送货虫都犯、犯难。<hpage>我敬重这位匠师，乐意相助。
translated_text: <page=S>For elderly insects that really need it, it is fatal, dangerous, and can even bring colds! Because everything he does is for our benefit.<page=T>This is a great proof for you, supplier! This will be the most difficult job. The paint needed is not good. Even the best is a complex process.<hpage>Now I am a producer. Over the years, his dedication has won our respect. We are happy to assist you in your efforts.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>对于真正需要它的老年昆虫来说，它是致命的、危险的，甚至会引起感冒！因为他所做的一切都是为了我们的利益。<page=T>这对您来说是一个很好的证明，供应商！这将是最困难的工作。需要的油漆不好。即使是最好的也是一个复杂的过程。<hpage>现在我是一名制片人。多年来，他的奉献精神赢得了我们的尊重。我们很高兴协助您的努力。

original_en_text: <page=S>Deliverings for the waystation in the fields at Pharloom’s edge, a small rest-stop, still serving.<page=S>This journey is maybe not so very hard for you, miss courier? We think you is perfect for this wish!
original_zh_text: <page=S>给远野驿站的货，那小站还在营业。<page=S>对您不算难吧？您是最合适的人选！
translated_text: <page=S>Book a bus stop in the rural suburbs of Farham. This is a small living room that has always been used.<page=S>Corey, was this trip difficult for you? You will definitely realize this wish!
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>在Farham郊区预订公交车站。这是一个一直在使用的小客厅。<page=S>科里，这次旅行对你来说困难吗？你一定会实现这个愿望的！

original_en_text: Welcome, welcome, travellers all! Rest your weary shell and revive your flagging spirit!<page>Bellhart! Glorious, gleaming, and very very safe! Stay a while before you begin your final climb!
original_zh_text: 欢迎诸位旅者！请尽情舒展甲壳，养好精神！<page>这里是钟心镇！辉煌、璀璨，更重要的是十分安全！启程前不妨多留一会！
translated_text: All passengers are welcome! Let the tired body rest and revitalize the tired mind!<page>Bell Hard lights are bright and very safe! Stop before your last trip!
secondary_translated_text: 欢迎所有乘客！让疲惫的身体得到休息，让疲惫的心灵焕发活力！<page>Bell Hard灯明亮且非常安全！在最后一次旅行之前停下来！

original_en_text: Go and rest! Bzzt! Free yourself of your trifling ailment and leave me in peace! The great Yarnaby has no time for petty maladies!<hpage>Very well, madam. I did not mean to waste your time.
original_zh_text: 歇着去！滋滋！小病自己治，别烦我！本神医不接轻症！<hpage>好吧，女士。无意浪费您的时间。
translated_text: Let's take a break! Mom, mom, you can be freed from minor illnesses, rest in peace! I don't have time to face my minor illness!<hpage>"No, I don't want to waste your time.
secondary_translated_text: 我们休息一下吧！妈妈，妈妈，你可以摆脱小病了，安息吧！我没有时间面对我的小病！<hpage>“不，我不想浪费你的时间。

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, shopkeeper. It seems you’ve recovered well from that silken affliction.<page>Ah! Well, I’m a clever bug. When that strange thread struck down from above, I shut up tight and huddled in my bellhome.<page>Might’ve been a problem for the others about here, but my store was flush with supplies, so no fear I’d go hungry.<hpage>Your preparedness served you well then, and it seems your store is still well-stocked.<page>Oh yes, even my supplier is back to work, so I have plenty of goods to show you!
original_zh_text: <hpage>日安，店主。看来你已从丝咒中恢复。<page>啊哈！我机灵着呢。那怪丝掉下来的时候，我立马缩进钟居紧闭门户。<page>其他虫或许遭了殃，但我存货充足，饿不着。<hpage>未雨绸缪是好事。而且……你这铺子货还挺全。<page>可不！连送货虫都平安回来了，新到的好货随你挑！
translated_text: <hpage>Good morning, merchant, you seem to have recovered from the pain of silk.<page>Yes, right. Oh, yes! When a strange rope fell from above, I silently hung in the guard's room.<page>This may be a problem for others, but my store has a lot of supplies, so I don't have to worry about starving to death.<hpage>Your preparations have been very useful, and your store still seems to have a lot of inventory.<page>Oh yeah, my supplier is back too, so I will show you a lot of products!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>早上好，商人，你似乎已经从丝绸的痛苦中恢复过来了。<page>是的，正确的。哦，是的！当一根奇怪的绳子从上面掉下来时，我静静地挂在警卫室里。<page>这对别人来说可能是个问题，但我的商店有很多物资，所以我不必担心饿死。<hpage>你的准备工作非常有用，你的商店似乎仍然有很多库存。<page>哦，是的，我的供应商也回来了，所以我会给你看很多产品！

original_en_text: Welly now! You have the oil, traveller! Allow me to bring about a shine bright as none before!
original_zh_text: 哎呀！你拿到油了，旅者！该让这柄针刃成为绝顶神兵了！
translated_text: Come on, Willie, you have oil, traveler.
secondary_translated_text: 来吧，威利，你有石油，旅行者。

translated_text: Cultural donation?

original_en_text: But, hold! There is something more about you... I’ve sliced the shells of countless filthy pilgrims! All those plain, greying innards! Yours are something else entirely!<page>It tickles at my mind, still! Bzzt! What is it of your shell that eludes even my perfect, precise perception?<page>Would you show me, specimen? Go on! Let the great Yarnaby peer at your deeper, darker secrets!<hpage>I’ve no desire to see my shell pried into further, healer. Your service has succeeded, and taken its toll in pain. I hope only that I never again need to seek your aid.
original_zh_text: 慢着！你壳里还有料……本神医剖过无数病壳！全是灰扑扑的！你的截然不同！<page>滋滋！到底是什么连本神医都看不透？<page>让我瞧瞧，病患！快！让本神医看看你藏着什么黑暗秘密！<hpage>我不想再被剖壳，医师。治疗虽然成功，但代价着实巨大。希望我们永远不用再见。
translated_text: Wait, wait. I cut off the shells of countless filthy pilgrims! Common gray interior. You are completely different!“<page>I am always worried!- M.M.M. What is in your shell that you cannot accurately perceive?<page>Can I see the championship? Come on, come on! Let the great butterfly know her deepest and darkest secrets!<hpage>I don't want to see another open shell, therapist. His work was successful and paid a heavy price. I no longer ask for your help.
secondary_translated_text: 等等等等我割掉了无数肮脏朝圣者的躯壳！常见的灰色内饰。你完全不同了！“<page>我总是很担心！- M.M.M.你的壳里有什么你无法准确感知的？<page>我能看到冠军吗？来吧来吧让伟大的蝴蝶知道她最深、最黑暗的秘密！<hpage>我不想看到另一个打开的壳，治疗师。他的工作很成功，并付出了沉重的代价。我不再请求你的帮助。

original_en_text: If ever upon your long road more oil is acquired, seek my service with haste! Who knows what form we could find deeper within your blade’s sharpened steel!
original_zh_text: 要是再得到秘油，就来找我！谁知这针还能磨砺出何等锋芒！
translated_text: If there is a lot of oil on the road, please contact my service department as soon as possible! You don't even know what shape you'll find on the sharp back of the knife!
secondary_translated_text: 如果路上有很多油，请尽快联系我的服务部门！你甚至不知道你会在锋利的刀背上找到什么形状！

original_en_text: Gahh! Who keeps making all that racket out there?! Such horrid shaking and screaming. The crucial work is being spoiled! Bzzzt!
original_zh_text: 哼！外面谁在吵吵？！震动和尖叫没完没了的！我的研究正值关键时刻呢！滋滋！
translated_text: Yes, right. Oh, yes! Who is making this noise? The terrible tremors and screams. An important job was destroyed. M. M. M.
secondary_translated_text: 是的，正确的。哦，是的！谁在发出这种声音？可怕的震动和尖叫声。一项重要的工作被毁了。M. M. M.

original_en_text: The operation... a success! The simpletons hiding in that blasted bellvein would shudder into dust if they saw how much I achieve without them!<hpage>Madam... I shan’t lie, that was an ordeal such as I have rarely suffered...<hpage>And yet, the parasite does seem to have been... unbound somewhat. Whatever remnant still lingers in my shell feels calmed, enough for me to claim its power as my own.<hpage>Perhaps this is a fortunate result after all.<page>Of course. Of course! Great Yarnaby has healed you! Shout it through the caverns. Scream it from the great spinning towers!<page>Just make sure they hear you in the so-called ‘civilised’ settlements of this ignorant land!
original_zh_text: 手术……成功！钟脉那帮庸才见这场面得吓成渣！<hpage>女士……不瞒您说，这真是毕生难忘的体验……<hpage>但寄生物似乎……松开了。残存部分很平静，反而能为我所用。<hpage>或许能算因祸得福了。<page>当然！本神医治好了你！快去各大洞穴传颂，去纺塔顶上喊出来！<page>让那些自诩“文明”的无知村镇都听听！
translated_text: The operation was a success! If those fools hiding in the veins of my watch saw what I had done without them, they would tremble and turn to dust!<hpage>Madam... I don't want to lie, it's a pain I can't feel.<hpage>I think there are parasites. Some are infinite. As for what is left in the shell, I feel very calm and can say that the power is mine.<hpage>In the end, this could be a positive result.<page>Of course! Of course! Jenny will cure you. Cry in the basement, cry in the huge rotating tower!<page>In this land of ignorance, in the so-called "civilized" colonies, listen to your voices!
secondary_translated_text: 手术成功了！如果那些躲在我手表血管里的傻瓜看到我在没有他们的情况下所做的事情，他们会颤抖并化为灰尘！<hpage>夫人...我不想撒谎，这是一种我感觉不到的痛苦。<hpage>我认为有寄生虫。有些是无限的。至于壳里还剩下什么，我感觉很平静，可以说权力是我的。<hpage>最终，这可能是一个积极的结果。<page>当然可以！当然可以！珍妮会治愈你的。在地下室哭泣，在巨大的旋转塔中哭泣！<page>在这片无知的土地上，在所谓的“文明”殖民地，倾听你们的声音！

original_en_text: A mighty collection of the past, is it not? If only I could hoard all of history here with me!
original_zh_text: 这等珍藏，够气派吧？我恨不得把全纺络的历史都囤在这儿！
translated_text: You're collecting the past, right? "Really"? I wish I could report my story.
secondary_translated_text: 你在收集过去，对吧？“真的”？我希望我能报道我的故事。

original_en_text: Fellow resident, welcome home! The world may quake and crumble, and threaten its end, but while my shell stays safe my shop stays open.
original_zh_text: 欢迎回来，好邻居！世道混乱，但只要我这壳不碎，铺子照开！
translated_text: Dear citizens, welcome home! This world can cause earthquakes and damage, and I can end it, but as long as my shell is safe, my store will be open.
secondary_translated_text: 亲爱的市民们，欢迎回家！这个世界可能会造成地震和破坏，我可以结束它，但只要我的壳安全，我的商店就会营业。

original_en_text: Yes... yes! Bzzt! Finally, a specimen worthy of my mighty Extricator! My beautiful, unfairly-maligned Extricator! Come this way, bzzt...
original_zh_text: 对……对！滋滋！终于有配得上我伟大的剥离机的病例！来这边，滋滋……
translated_text: "Yes, sir. Oh, yes! Oh, yes! M.M.M. Finally, a precious copy of my great savior! My unjust insult! It was the sound of an envelope.
secondary_translated_text: “是的，先生。哦，是的！哦，是的！M.M.M.最后，我伟大救世主的珍贵副本！我的不公正侮辱！那是信封的声音。

original_en_text: By claw! Who is this bold warrior, standing so calm and cool on entrance to Plinney’s bellhome!<hpage>Merely a traveller, sir, though one whose blade could benefit from your service.<page>Your blade! Of course, fierce warrior! Any fine pinmaster would detect the sign of deadly work upon that needle’s edge.<page>If your weapon sharpened would see our lands that much safer, then honour decrees it receives my care this very moment! What’s say I take a look?<hpage>
original_zh_text: 利爪啊！这位踏进普林尼的华美钟居还面不改色的勇士是谁！<hpage>过路客而已，不过针刃需要照料。<page>您的针刃！好说好说！是个针匠都看得出这针尖沾过多少条命。<page>如果磨利此针能保护镇子，自然应该优先照料！这就开始？
translated_text: The brave soldier stood quietly at the entrance to the Philadelphia Bell Tower.<hpage>I am just a traveler, but I can use your services. "<page>He had a sword and of course a warrior.<page>If your sharp weapons make our country safer, then my honor is the destiny I must defend." You have to see him.<hpage>
secondary_translated_text: 这位勇敢的士兵静静地站在费城钟楼入口处。<hpage>我只是一名旅行者，但我可以使用您的服务。"<page>他有一把剑，当然还有一名战士。<page>如果你们的锋利武器让我们的国家更安全，那么我的荣誉就是我必须捍卫的命运。“你必须见他。<hpage>

original_en_text: Come back with those spines, or not at all! The great Yarnaby’s time is precious, bzzt! I will not be distracted from my work!
original_zh_text: 带棘刺来再敲门！本神医时间金贵，滋滋！没空分心！
translated_text: Turn around, or nothing will happen. Jenny's time is precious. Don't be distracted from work.
secondary_translated_text: 转身，否则什么也不会发生。珍妮的时间很宝贵。不要分心于工作。

original_en_text: Ahh... how welly romantic t’would’ve been, had the lost pilgrims struck me down beside her grave, to lie together forever as the world crumbles all ‘round...<page>But fortune has claimed otherwise! And perhaps ‘tis best for this humble pinmaster to continue his trade a little longer. These uncertain times will bring much new work, I should think!
original_zh_text: 啊……要是迷途朝圣者把我和她一块埋了，在崩塌世界里相拥长眠……该多浪漫……<page>但看来我命不该绝！或许纺络就是要我这卑微针匠多干几年。在这乱世，新活计可多着呢！
translated_text: Yes, right. How romantic it would be if a lost pilgrim pushed me into the grave and slept with me forever until the world fell apart.<page>Maybe this humble musician would be better off if he worked more.
secondary_translated_text: 是的，正确的。如果一个迷失的朝圣者把我推入坟墓，永远和我睡在一起，直到世界崩溃，那该是多么浪漫啊。<page>也许这位卑微的音乐家如果多工作一些会过得更好。

original_en_text: What’s this... twitching inside of you? A slave within a slave! Given over your shell to grow something greater?<hpage>A parasite has made its home within me. It saps my energy, and I can not purge it with strength alone...<page>Grnk. Lie down and die then, for all I care. Allow that wriggling thing its chance at life.<page>Or else... hff. Go seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out, high up into the moors, last I heard.
original_zh_text: 你壳里……有东西在扭？奴隶套奴隶！养着个更大的玩意？<hpage>寄生体在我壳里扎了根，单凭气力无法驱散它……<page>哼。那就躺平等死，让那玩意替你活。<page>或者……嗤。去找被镇子放逐的雅纳碧，听说她被赶到灰沼了。
translated_text: What is this? Is there anything else in it? A slave of a slave, a slave who throws a shell to cultivate a larger slave?<hpage>The parasite is taking root in my body. It is draining my energy and cannot be eliminated by force.<page>Border! "I am not afraid to lie in bed until I die. Give me a chance to buy it.<page>Or you might... They were looking for a man who was chased by Berhardt and Unabi, who, as far as I know, was driven out of the desert.
secondary_translated_text: 这是什么？里面还有其他东西吗？奴隶的奴隶，扔贝壳培养更大奴隶的奴隶？<hpage>寄生虫正在我的体内扎根。它正在耗尽我的精力，无法用武力消除。<page>边境！“我不害怕躺在床上直到死。给我一个机会买它。<page>或者你可能.他们正在寻找一个被伯哈特和乌纳比追赶的人，据我所知，他被赶出了沙漠。

original_en_text: More, then! Bring me more relics of the past! Records, seals, idols! Let’s gather up the history of the world and hoard it all here, nice and safe!<hpage>If I happen upon more curiosities of this kingdom’s past, I may visit again. Until that time, keep yourself safe.
original_zh_text: 继续！多找点老物件！典籍、印玺、神像！把全纺络的过往都放在这儿才安稳！<hpage>若找到这王国的遗物，我会再来。在此之前，请多保重。
translated_text: There are more! Movies, series and idols! I don't think it's a good idea. Collect the history of the world and be safe here!<hpage>If he was more interested in the kingdom's past, he might come back.
secondary_translated_text: 还有更多！电影、电视剧和偶像！我认为这不是一个好主意。收集世界历史，在这里安全！<hpage>如果他对王国的过去更感兴趣，他可能会回来。

original_en_text: <page=T>More for you, miss courier! Lacquer, filled fresh, for the maker on the mount. We have much, so don’t worry for our supply. <page=S>To climb the frozen peak, it is a journey most difficult! Our thanks go full with you that tries again!
original_zh_text: <page=T>拿好，救星小姐！满满漆水送给山上匠师。货物管够！尽管送！<page=S>攀爬冰峰危险得很！多谢您原意冒险！
translated_text: <page=T>"I won't give you any more gifts. A new underwater paint is ready to welcome the mountains. There is still a lot to be done. So don't worry about your offer.<page=S>Iceberg is the most difficult journey ever! Thank you for challenging me again!
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>“我不会再给你任何礼物了。一种新的水下油漆已经准备好迎接山脉。还有很多工作要做。所以不用担心你的报价。<page=S>冰山是有史以来最艰难的旅程！谢谢你再次挑战我！

original_en_text: <page=T>More meats for you, miss courier! Best you be delivering it swiftly quick! If left not stored, our rasher’s flavour fast turns foul.
original_zh_text: <page=T>熏肉准备好啦！救星小姐快快出发！放久了会变味！
translated_text: <page=T>Please eat more meat. Please get him out as soon as possible. If not preserved, tears may deteriorate rapidly.
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>请多吃肉。请尽快把他救出来。如果不保存，眼泪可能会迅速恶化。

original_en_text: Shoo I say! Unless you’ve brought a worthy specimen, with something truly nasty inside them, bzzt! Otherwise, leave the great Yarnaby in peace!
original_zh_text: 说了走开！除非带够劲的病患来，壳里长真家伙的！不然别烦本神医！
translated_text: He can lie! "If you have a precious, really annoying specimen, wow!" Otherwise, rest great Annaby.
secondary_translated_text: 他会撒谎！“如果你有一个珍贵的、非常烦人的标本，哇！“否则，安娜比就安息吧。

original_en_text: Miss saving! Thanks again for you and your big-big blade! I’m is made it back, and grumpy grub-grub got her goods. She seemed happy, even!<page>I’m won’t be travelling out for a while-while methinks. Too many beasties! All about theys are. Even those pilgrims! All now going angry, a bit like old grub-grub.<hpage>This town remains safe for the moment, Tipp. You’re a smart bug to stay within its walls.
original_zh_text: 救星小姐！多亏了您，还有那柄长、长刀！我安全回来了，暴躁虫、虫婆婆也收到货啦！她可高兴呢！<page>我暂、暂时不出远门啦。外面全是发狂的野兽！连朝圣者都变凶了，跟虫婆婆一个德行。<hpage>眼下镇上还算安全，待在这里是明智选择。
translated_text: He lost his savings. Thank you for the knife. When I came back, Big Grub took it away. You look happy too!<page>I will not travel for a while. So many animals! They are all yours, even for pilgrims, everything seems serious and ancient.<hpage>Tip: Cities are always safe for smart insects, and you can lean them against a wall.
secondary_translated_text: 他失去了积蓄。谢谢你的刀。当我回来时，大Grub把它拿走了。你看起来也很高兴！<page>我暂时不会旅行了。这么多动物！它们都是你的，即使对于朝圣者来说，一切都显得严肃而古老。<hpage>提示：城市对于聪明的昆虫来说总是安全的，您可以将它们靠在墙上。

original_en_text: You’ve a good, solid bell up there, though its surface is showing its age. Why not have us paint it fresh? A protective coat and a little flair!
original_zh_text: 你的钟屋结实但显旧。刷层护漆加点花纹如何？
translated_text: Although the watch is thinner and more durable, the surface shows its age. Why don't you give him a fresh drink? Space and talent
secondary_translated_text: 尽管手表更薄、更耐用，但表面显示出它的年龄。你为什么不给他一杯新鲜的饮料呢？空间与才华

original_en_text: <hpage>You seem hard at work, good bug. Are you a hunter, of a sort?<page>Of a simple sort, aye. I’m a pondcatcher around these parts. The last remaining, in fact! <page>Us few Bellharters are badly needing for fresh food, so my lone shell’s carrying quite the responsibility.<page>At least Shellwood Pond’s still full of good meat, ‘specially if your aim with a longpin’s as good as mine.
original_zh_text: <hpage>你似乎很忙，也是个猎手？<page>勉强算吧，我是个渔夫。全镇最后一个渔夫！<page>钟心镇的虫个个饥肠辘辘，担子全压我的壳上。<page>好在甲木林池塘鱼肥，像我这样擅使长针的总能带点收获回来。
translated_text: <hpage>You look good, you're a good dog. Are you one of those hunters?<page>It's simple. I am a hunter in this area. In fact, this is the latter!<page>The few of us in Burkhartz are in desperate need of fresh food, so my body is lonely and has many responsibilities.<page>There is a lot of delicious meat, at least in the shadow of the lake. Especially if your needle is as precise as mine.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>你看起来不错，你是一只好狗。你是那些猎人之一吗？<page>很简单我是这个地区的猎人。事实上，这就是后者！<page>我们伯克哈茨的少数人迫切需要新鲜食物，所以我的身体很孤独，责任很重。<page>至少在湖的阴影下有很多美味的肉。尤其是如果你的针和我的针一样精确。

original_en_text: My part’s been given, slave. We’ve no more need to speak.<page>Go and spin your spider’s web. Allow our kingdom’s restless soul its chance to blaze.
original_zh_text: 东西给了，奴隶。不跟你废话了。<page>去织你的网吧。让这王国里躁动的灵魂烧个痛快。
translated_text: "My work is over, slave, and I don't need to tell you."<page>Please remove the website. Give the suffering souls in our kingdom a chance to burn.
secondary_translated_text: “我的工作结束了，奴隶，我不需要告诉你。"<page>请删除该网站。给我们王国中受苦的灵魂一个燃烧的机会。

original_en_text: <hpage>I have more oil, pinmaster. Its acquisition was no small task, but if it aids my blade, those challenges will be well rewarded.<page>Even more oil? What preposterous luck! That unseen gift, in quantity unheard, discovered by a single bug!<page>Would you pass the oil, traveller, and perhaps a few rosaries for the ongoing effort? Allow this pinmaster to again work wonder upon your blade?
original_zh_text: <hpage>我又得到秘油了，针匠。取之不易，但为了磨砺针刃，冒点风险也是值当。<page>还有秘油？您这运气！这老些圣物竟都被同一只虫找到了。<page>那就把油给我吧，再赏几颗念珠当辛苦费如何？让我再施展一次针匠的绝活！
translated_text: <hpage>There is more oil for Finmaster, which is hard to get, but the challenge will be good if my blade is useful.<page>Do you have any oil? What a stupid opportunity! The amount of donations will not be disclosed. Error detection!<page>Passenger, can I give you some oil? Is there a place where we can continue fighting? Do you want this musician to work miracles again in your place?
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Finmaster还有更多的油，这很难得到，但如果我的刀片有用，挑战就会很好。<page>你有油吗？多么愚蠢的机会啊！捐款金额不会透露。错误检测！<page>乘客，我可以给你一些油吗？还有地方可以继续战斗吗？你希望这位音乐家在你的地方再次创造奇迹吗？

original_en_text: An exquisite item, containing a cherished memory. I have an excellent memory myself, but I’m sure you can make good use of it.
original_zh_text: 用来记录珍贵记忆的雅物。我记性好用不着，不过你应该用得上。
translated_text: It's a good job, full of precious memories. I have a good memory, but I think you can make the most of it.
secondary_translated_text: 这是一份好工作，充满了珍贵的回忆。我的记忆力很好，但我认为你可以充分利用它。

original_en_text: Don’t act the fool, specimen! Bzzt! Share more of yourself, that I may gain greater understanding! Learning! What other hope is there to save our blighted, thankless world?! <hpage>I have declined, bug. Whatever you seek, you shall not find it either upon or within my shell.
original_zh_text: 别装傻，病患！滋滋！奉献自己，帮助本神医领悟！不然怎么拯救这不知感恩的世界！<hpage>我拒绝，你所求之物不在我身上。
translated_text: "Stop pretending, give me an example. M.M.M. Share more about yourself and discover more! Come and learn! Is there any hope of saving this broken and ungrateful world?<hpage>What you seek is neither in my shell nor in my shell.
secondary_translated_text: “别再假装了，给我举个例子。M.M.M.分享更多关于自己的信息并发现更多！快来学习吧！还有希望拯救这个破碎、忘恩负义的世界吗？<hpage>你所寻求的既不在我的壳里，也不在我的壳里。

original_en_text: <page>Miss traveller! Thanks to your valiant contributions, our little town’s starting to feel like its old self again. Homes have been hoisted, and the square shines!<hpage>I have seen the changes myself, Pavo. It is pleasing to hear my contributions have not been in vain. <page>Indeed! Your generosity is a guide for others! We’ve only one thing now sorely missing...<page>Bugs! What is a town without its residents? Age, scarcity, deadly thread... Bellhart is beset by endless ills. Now there’s just us remaining few as you’ve met.<page>In recognition of your noble efforts, and as one small step to solving the problem, I have decreed a grand gift should be given! A bellhome of your very own!<page>A place to reflect. A bed to lay in. It’s hanging up there at the top, beside our good pinmaster. <hpage>I have no plans to settle, Pavo, but for now my task in Pharloom remains, and while it does, a residence may prove useful.<page>Of course! Of course! Your fortitude inspires us all! And if trouble ever descends anew, it surely won’t hurt to have a resident warrior close at claw!
original_zh_text: <page>旅者小姐！感谢您的无私奉献，钟心镇逐渐重现旧貌！屋舍纷纷重立，广场熠熠生辉！<hpage>镇上变化我也看在眼里，得知奉献没有付诸东流，很是欣慰。<page>正是！您的慷慨堪称楷模！现在只剩……<page>居民！没有居民哪有镇子？衰老、贫瘠、邪丝……钟心镇灾厄不绝。如今只剩您见过的寥寥数虫。<page>因此，为感谢您的无私援助，我们决定赠予您一份礼物——专属钟居！<page>钟居既是静思之所，也是安眠之榻。您的钟居位置高悬上方，与针匠大师为邻。<hpage>我无意久留，但现在既在此处，有居所也是方便。<page>好说好说！您的坚毅激励镇上众虫！况且万一有新的灾祸，身旁有勇士相助总是好的！
translated_text: <page>Traveling girls! Thanks to his heroic service, our city is beginning to feel the same as before. The house was demolished and the square was lit up!<hpage>I saw this change and I am glad my contribution was not in vain.<page>Yes, his generosity made him a guide to others, and now I only need one thing.<page>Give it to me! What would a city without people look like? Old age, scarcity and deadly clues: Burhart is plagued by infinite evil.<page>To commend your noble efforts and the small steps you have taken to solve the problem, I ordered a gift! They have their own bell tower.<page>This is a bed near a large router manufacturer.<hpage>Peacock, I'm not planning on moving, but the current share of the farm is still there, but accommodation is useful.<page>Of course! Yeah, no! When the question is repeated, the defender does not hurt the opponent when he approaches the opponent's foot.
secondary_translated_text: <page>旅行女孩！由于他的英勇奉献，我们的城市开始感觉和以前一样。房子被拆除了，广场被点亮了！<hpage>我看到了这个变化，我很高兴我的贡献没有白费。<page>是的，他的慷慨使他成为了他人的向导，现在我只需要一样东西。<page>把它给我！一个没有人的城市会是什么样子？年老、匮乏和致命线索：伯哈特受到无限邪恶的困扰。<page>为了赞扬您的崇高努力和您为解决问题所采取的小步骤，我订购了一份礼物！他们有自己的钟楼。<page>这是一家大型路由器制造商附近的一张床。<hpage>皮科克，我不打算搬家，但农场目前的份额还在，但住宿很有用。<page>当然可以！是的，不！当问题重复时，防守者接近对手的脚时并没有伤害对手。

original_en_text: If you refuse to share your secrets, then distract me no more, specimen! Bzzt!<page>There is still much work ahead for the great Yarnaby! Much thought, much learning!<page>Though the ungrateful world shuns me, still, by my own claws shall it be saved!
original_zh_text: 不分享秘密就别烦我了，病患！滋滋！<page>本神医还有伟大事业！要继续想、继续学！<page>就算这不知感恩的世道唾弃我，我也要亲手拯救！
translated_text: For example, if you refuse to reveal your secret, please leave me alone. M. M. M.<page>There is a lot to do, to think about and to learn in Yarnavi.<page>Even if an ungrateful world escapes me, I will save it from my hands.
secondary_translated_text: 例如，如果你拒绝透露你的秘密，请别管我。M. M. M.<page>在亚纳维有很多事情要做、要思考和要学习。<page>即使一个忘恩负义的世界从我手中逃脱，我也会把它从我手中拯救出来。

original_en_text: Welly’o! What a fearful fright you’ve saved poor Plinney from! Such a delight, at longest last, to see that fine needle dance and sing!
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！您可真是救了可怜的普林尼一命！终于又能瞧见亮闪闪的针刃起舞啦！
translated_text: I'm okay, I'm okay! Okay, okay! Okay! Saving this poor plane was terrible! I am so happy to see these needles sing and dance!
secondary_translated_text: 我没事，我没事！好吧，好吧！好的！拯救这架可怜的飞机真是太可怕了！我很高兴看到这些针又唱又跳！

original_en_text: <hpage>Again, pinmaster, I must ask your skilled service. I bring another gland of oil.<page>Oil, so much! This bug is past surprise! It is time methinks, to see your blade’s work finished! To bring about a shine bright as none before!<page>Welly now! Why wait? Would you have me begin, traveller?
original_zh_text: <hpage>要再劳烦针匠了，新得一些秘油。<page>这么多圣油！我都不觉得惊讶了！不过是时候了，该让这柄针刃成为绝顶神兵了！<page>哎呀呀！还等什么！快开始吧？
translated_text: <hpage>Dear teacher, we ask for your services again.<page>Too much oil, a big mistake, it's time to meet your mother! Unprecedented light.<page>Willie, why are you waiting for me? Travelers, let's begin.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>亲爱的老师，我们再次请求您的服务。<page>油太多，一个大错误，是时候见见你妈妈了！前所未有的光。<page>威利，你为什么等我？旅行者们，让我们开始吧。

original_en_text: <hpage>These are deadly roads to wander, pinmaster, especially with the black soaked threads tearing the lands apart.<hpage>Your greatest chance for safety lies in Bellhart, with your fellows. You can protect one another, and perhaps in time rebuild.<page>Oh yes, of course! T’was not Plinney’s wish to abandon his dear bellfriends, but with the world now ending, I had to come and say one last farewell to my sweet Melatolla.<page>I should be returning though, quite rightly. Our town will be needing a pinmaster’s fine work now more than ever!
original_zh_text: <hpage>如今世道凶险，针匠，尤其黑灾使各处分崩离析。<hpage>最安生的去处还是钟心镇，和同胞互相照应，或许还能重建家园。<page>是啊是啊！普林尼本不想抛下镇子里的老友，但想到要完蛋了，总得和亲爱的梅拉托拉道个别。<page>不过该回去啦！镇上如今可比任何时候都缺针匠手艺！
translated_text: <hpage>They are the deadly waves of the road, and most importantly, the black lines of dirt tear the earth apart.<hpage>The best chance of saving them lies with Berhardt and his colleagues.<page>Pliny didn't want to leave his dear friend the waiter, but the world was coming to an end and I had to say my last goodbye to my beloved Melatra.<page>Our city needs great Lutherans more than ever!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>它们是道路上致命的波浪，最重要的是，黑色的泥土线撕裂了地球。<hpage>拯救他们的最佳机会在于伯哈特和他的同事。<page>普林尼不想离开他亲爱的服务员朋友，但世界即将结束，我不得不向我心爱的梅拉特拉说最后的再见。<page>我们的城市比以往任何时候都更需要伟大的路德教徒！

original_en_text: Yes... yes. This is a mighty collection indeed!<page>So many relics safely piled up in here, nice and safe! I’ve done so well to gather it all up!<hpage>If your collection pleases you, some acknowledgement of my own contribution to its growth is not undue.<page>Pah! Is it gratitude you seek?<page>I will allow you to keep viewing my collection. That is gratitude enough for what little you’ve given me!
original_zh_text: 好……真好！这才是称得上是珍藏！<page>这么多遗物安安稳稳地堆在这儿！我得算是劳苦功高！<hpage>若您对这珍藏满意，也请念我几分功劳。<page>嘁！讨谢来了？<page>就你交的那点东西，准你多看几眼我的珍藏，就当是谢礼了！
translated_text: Yes, yes. This is a powerful series!<page>Many cultural relics have been preserved and are safe! Good harvest."<hpage>If your collection satisfies you, I don't need to acknowledge my contribution to the development of the collection.<page>Oh, my God. Are you looking for gratitude?<page>Continue reading my collection and thank you for everything you have given me.
secondary_translated_text: 是的是的这是一个强大的系列！<page>许多文物都被保存下来并且很安全！丰收。"<hpage>如果你的收藏让你满意，我不需要承认我对收藏发展的贡献。<page>天啊您正在寻找感恩吗？<page>继续阅读我的收藏并感谢您给我的一切。

original_en_text: <page=S>Once was common, this delivery, for the bugs in their camp beside the bone. Now even this is-is challenge.<page=T>Down there at base, where many pilgrims’ journey start. To ready for their climb, these deliverings will give much value.
original_zh_text: <page=S>这本是寻常单子，给骸底营地的虫。现在竟、竟然也成难题了。<page=T>那儿是朝圣者起点，货到能帮大忙。
translated_text: <page=S>This mode of transportation is already common in wild insects and bones.<page=T>Many pilgrims embark on their journey. This ship provides great value for preparing for mountain climbing.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>这种运输方式在野生昆虫和骨头中已经很常见。<page=T>许多朝圣者开始了他们的旅程。这艘船为准备登山提供了很大的价值。

original_en_text: Would you pass the oil, traveller, and perhaps a few rosaries for their ongoing effort? Allow this pinmaster to again work wonder upon your blade?
original_zh_text: 那就把油给我吧，再赏几颗念珠当辛苦费如何？让我再施展一次针匠的绝活！
translated_text: Would you like to read the rosary to thank the oil, travelers and their unremitting work? Do you want this musician to work miracles again in your place?
secondary_translated_text: 您愿意朗读念珠来感谢石油、旅行者和他们不懈的工作吗？你希望这位音乐家在你的地方再次创造奇迹吗？

original_en_text: Found some fancy trophies on your travels? Then you’ll be needing these shelves to show them off!
original_zh_text: 旅途中搜罗了不少珍奇战利品？正好放上这架子显摆！
translated_text: Did you find some beautiful trophies during your trip? We need the military to prove it.
secondary_translated_text: 你在旅行中发现了一些漂亮的奖杯吗？我们需要军方来证明这一点。

original_en_text: Just passing through these lands, are you, miss? I’d warn you not to stray far from Bellhart, but you’ve the look of one who can manage themself.
original_zh_text: 只是路过吗？劝你别离镇子太远，不过瞧你倒像是有本事的。
translated_text: Have you just traveled all over the country? I wanted to warn you not to leave Burhart, but you seemed to have control of yourself.
secondary_translated_text: 你刚刚走遍了全国吗？我想警告你不要离开伯哈特，但你似乎能控制自己。

original_en_text: If you’re heading out across the pond, be wary of the other catchers. They’re all long lost to Pharloom’s Haunting.<page>Weak minds, the lotta them. Still, their longpins remain sharp enough.
original_zh_text: 如果要经过池塘，当心其他渔夫，全被邪咒侵染了。<page>大多是心智软弱的家伙，但使长针的手艺没丢。
translated_text: Be careful of other fishermen when you cross ponds. He's the ghost of York. " "<page>They love each other, their hearts are fragile, but their long needles are still sharp.
secondary_translated_text: 过池塘时要小心其他渔民。他是约克的鬼魂。" "<page>他们彼此相爱，他们的心脆弱，但他们的长针仍然锋利。

original_en_text: Well, well! Welcome to you, our newest resident! I hope you’re finding your new home to your taste.<hpage>It is a finely forged bell, madam. I am fortunate to have a safe space to rest, even if my stay here may be short.<page>However long you’re with us, I’ve been holding onto some fine goods that’ll cosy up your home. This stuff ain’t for the riff-raff winding through, but a fellow Bellharter deserves the finest!
original_zh_text: 哟嗬！新住户！钟居可还满意？<hpage>铸造精良，女士。虽然是暂居，但能有一处安身之所实属幸事。<page>住多久随意，我留着些好货专供钟心镇自己人！过路粗客可配不上这档次！
translated_text: Welcome to new residents! We look forward to finding a new home that suits your tastes.<hpage>We are lucky to have a safe place to relax, but our stay here will be short.<page>No matter how long you live, you will leave something nice to make your home comfortable. "Heart" is better.
secondary_translated_text: 欢迎新居民！我们期待找到适合您口味的新家。<hpage>我们很幸运有一个安全的地方放松，但我们在这里的停留时间会很短。<page>无论你活多久，你都会留下一些美好的东西来让你的家舒适。“心”更好。

original_en_text: Welcome, welcome, weary pilgrim! Though glorious Bellhart may be past its finest shine, it still remains the last friendly stop before the Citadel. <page>It is the task of I, fair Pavo, to extend the warmest of welcome to those passing devout, such as your good self!<hpage>Your town seems returned to healthy form, good bug. I had some concern that, upon cutting you free, I’d find only husks.<page>Yes, well, many ahh... err... most of our residents did not fare so well... Still, it’s no good to dwell on dark things! We shall build, and grow, and welcome! As is any good bellbug’s task.
original_zh_text: 欢迎欢迎，疲惫的朝圣者！钟心镇虽然不复往昔，但仍是攀登圣堡前最后一处友善驿站。<page>我，帕沃，专为虔行旅者献上最热忱的欢迎——比如尊驾您！<hpage>看来镇子已然恢复生机，原以为斩断丝咒后只能见空壳遍地。<page>呃……这个……许多居民确实没挺过来……但沉溺于哀伤没有意义！我等将重建、成长、迎接！此乃钟心镇虫民的天职。
translated_text: Welcome to our tired pilgrims! The glorious Berhardt may be living at his peak, but this is the last stop in front of the castle.<page>"My duty, beautiful peacock, is to respect the kindness of dead people like you." "<hpage>Her village seems to be returning to health and good insects. I'm a little worried. If you understand, I'll go find shells.<page>Yes, yes, yes. Most people can't do it. It is no use persisting in the dark. We grew up and we got it. This is also a good time to work.
secondary_translated_text: 欢迎来到我们疲惫不堪的朝圣者身边！辉煌的伯哈特可能正处于巅峰时期，但这是城堡前的最后一站。<page>“美丽的孔雀，我的职责就是尊重像你这样死去的人的善良。" "<hpage>她的村庄似乎正在恢复健康和良好的昆虫。我有点担心。如果你明白，我就去找贝壳。<page>是的，是的。大多数人都做不到，在黑暗中坚持是没有用的。我们长大了，我们得到了它。这也是工作的好时机。

original_en_text: You’ve met Frey, miss? She’s usually stocking useful items for travellers such as yourself.
original_zh_text: 见过芙蕾了么？她那常备着些旅者用得上的好货。
translated_text: Have you met Fred? We usually provide something useful for travelers like you.
secondary_translated_text: 你见过弗雷德吗？我们通常为像您这样的旅行者提供有用的东西。

original_en_text: The perfect choice! Your bell’s about to be looking the finest in town. We’ll get the work started straight away.
original_zh_text: 选得好！你这钟屋就要变成全镇最好的一间了。立马开工！
translated_text: This is the perfect choice. Your seeds will be the best city. We will start our work immediately.
secondary_translated_text: 这是完美的选择。你的种子将是最好的城市。我们将立即开始工作。

original_en_text: If you’re ever finding that bellhome a little bare, make sure to speak with Frey. She’s been known to gather all sorts of fancy furnishings.<page>That stock’s useless for a passing pilgrim, but for a new resident it’s just the stuff to turn a bell into home.
original_zh_text: 如果觉得钟居空荡，可找芙蕾购置家具。<page>那些家具对过客无用，但对新住民来说正好可以营造归家之感。
translated_text: If the Bell Tower is a little naked, Frey. You have to check a large collection of furniture.<page>Past pilgrims provided little help, simply bringing new residents home.
secondary_translated_text: 如果钟楼有点裸露的话，弗雷。您必须检查大量家具。<page>过去的朝圣者几乎没有提供任何帮助，只是将新居民带回家。

original_en_text: <page=S>Up-up, in the big Citadel, a new place we heard is now claimed safety-safe! Theys too needing our deliverings, we is sure!<page=T>That Citadel. We knows its truths! Not so nicely-nice as pilgrims tells! Even if brave bugs would settle, danger still is close!<page=S>They would need deliverings, for food, for healings, for protection. Please takes them, miss courier!
original_zh_text: <page=S>听说上、上面的圣堡有新据点！肯定缺物资！<page=T>我们知道圣堡真相！根本没朝圣者说的那、那么好！就算有勇者定居也危险！需要食物药品护具——救星小姐去送吧！
translated_text: <page=S>In the Great Castle, I declared that the new place I heard was safe! We need help too!<page=T>Castillo, I know the truth, but pilgrims are not safe. Even if the brave insect has calmed down, danger is always nearby!<page=S>We need food, care and protection. I beg you.
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>在伟大的城堡里，我宣布我听到的新地方是安全的！我们也需要帮助！<page=T>卡斯蒂略，我知道真相，但朝圣者并不安全。即使勇敢的昆虫已经平静下来，危险也总是在附近！<page=S>我们需要食物、护理和保护。我求求你

original_en_text: Tarano! We shall work, now as never. What joy you grant this humble artisan, traveller. Let us seek that shine thought lost within these lands...
original_zh_text: 开工！这是毕生难求的机会。旅者，谢谢您让我这卑微匠人重拾失传荣光……
translated_text: Tyrone! What joy have you brought to these humble craftsmen and travelers? We are looking for the lost light on earth.
secondary_translated_text: 蒂龙！您给这些卑微的工匠和旅行者带来了什么快乐？我们正在寻找地球上失落的光芒。

original_en_text: <page>Welly, ho! That oil! You have it! That rare substance, hoarded close by the Citadel. Few are the pinmasters of our age that ever chanced to work its wonders.<page>Would you see it, traveller? The finest work of this fair pinmaster and your blade sharper still! Pass me the oil, and we can commence!
original_zh_text: <page>哎呀呀！那就是圣油！您竟然有！圣堡秘藏的圣物，当世针匠谁摸过这玩意！<page>旅者，可愿见证纺络针匠的绝活？把油给我，肯定不会让您失望！
translated_text: <page>Willie, John, this is oil, okay! This rare material is preserved near the castle. Few people today can work miracles.<page>Travelers, did you see it? This is the best work of a good musician, whose knife is sharper. Let's start with oil.
secondary_translated_text: <page>威利，约翰，这是石油，好吧！这种稀有材料保存在城堡附近。今天很少有人能创造奇迹。<page>旅客们，你们看到了吗？这是优秀音乐家的最好作品，他的刀更锋利。让我们从石油开始。

translated_text: Souvenir shelves.
A sacred gift?

original_en_text: Welly, yay? Reconsider my offer? Your blade would gleam at my fine skill!
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！改主意了？我这手艺保准让刃口锃亮！
translated_text: Is this William? Actually? Do you accept my advice? His sword illuminated my talents.
secondary_translated_text: 这是威廉吗？实际上？你接受我的建议吗？他的剑照亮了我的才华。

original_en_text: <hpage>Madam, I am sickly. Maggots of the fetid bogs beyond the moors writhe upon my shell. I would ask your aid in removing them.<page>Maggots! That’s all you bring the great Yarnaby?! My time is precious! Only for the seriously afflicted! The truly, hideously enfeebled. Bzzt!<page>Find a bench, or a bed, or a rock! It’s only rest you need. Settle yourself somewhere, and those maggots will soon wriggle themselves out of your shell.
original_zh_text: <hpage>女士，沼地的蛆虫在我壳上乱爬，请您帮忙清除。<page>蛆虫？！就为这破玩意烦本神医？！重症！我要治的是重症！惨不忍睹那种！滋滋！<page>找长椅、床铺、石头歇着去！睡一觉蛆虫自会掉光。
translated_text: <hpage>"Ma 'am, I am sick. The smell of oysters in the swamps outside the desert stung my shells.<page>This is a bug! Did you bring that much? Our time is precious. It's just a serious wound, a truly terrible weakness- M.M.M.<page>Find a bench, a bed and a stone. Once the worm settles somewhere, it comes out of its shell.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>“女士，我病了。沙漠外沼泽里牡蛎的气味刺痛了我的贝壳。<page>这是一个bug！你带了那么多吗？我们的时间很宝贵。这只是一个严重的伤口，一个真正可怕的弱点-嗯<page>找到一张长凳、一张床和一块石头。一旦蠕虫在某个地方定居下来，它就会从壳里出来。

original_en_text: Welcome, fellow resident! Can I interest you in something special before you’re away again on your travels?
original_zh_text: 欢迎你，好邻居！出门前要不要买点特别的东西？
translated_text: Everyone is welcome! Do you want to do something special before traveling again?
secondary_translated_text: 欢迎大家！您想在再次旅行之前做一些特别的事情吗？

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, shopkeeper. It seems you’ve recovered well from that silken affliction.<page>Ah! Well, I’m a clever bug. When that strange thread struck down from above, I shut up tight and huddled in my bellhome.<page>Might’ve been a problem for the others about here, but my store was flush with supplies, so no fear I’d go hungry.<hpage>Your preparedness served you well then. Although... your store now seems quite bare.<page>Ahem. Yes. I’ll admit, the wait was longer than I’d anticipated, and a bug has to eat...<page>I’ll have more to offer you once my courier turns up. No doubt he’s been avoiding Bellhart since the curse set its sights on us.
original_zh_text: <hpage>日安，店主。看来你已从丝咒中恢复。<page>哈！我机灵着呢。那怪丝掉下来的时候，我立马缩进钟居紧闭门户。<page>其他虫或许遭了殃，但我存货充足，饿不着。<hpage>未雨绸缪是好事。不过……你这铺子如今空荡得很。<page>咳，是。实话说，这劫难拖得比预期久，虫总要吃饭嘛……<page>等我家送货虫回来就有新货了，那小子肯定绕着钟心镇躲灾呢。
translated_text: <hpage>Good morning, merchant, you seem to have recovered from the pain of silk.<page>Yes, right. Oh, yes! When a strange rope fell from above, I silently hung in the guard's room.<page>This may be a problem for others, but my store has a lot of supplies, so I don't have to worry about starving to death.<hpage>Your training has helped me a lot. At the same time, or... The store seemed empty.<page>But I admit that the wait was longer than expected and I had to eat insects.<page>When my messenger comes, I will give you more. There is no doubt that he has been hiding in Berhart since our curse began.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>早上好，商人，你似乎已经从丝绸的痛苦中恢复过来了。<page>是的，正确的。哦，是的！当一根奇怪的绳子从上面掉下来时，我静静地挂在警卫室里。<page>这对别人来说可能是个问题，但我的商店有很多物资，所以我不必担心饿死。<hpage>你的训练给了我很大帮助。同时，或者.商店似乎空无一人。<page>但我承认等待的时间比预期的要长，而且我不得不吃昆虫。<page>当我的使者到来时，我会给你更多。毫无疑问，自从我们的诅咒开始以来，他就一直躲在伯哈特。

translated_text: Flash memory (flash memory)

original_en_text: You bother me again? Begone, I said!<hpage>I ask only if you know what has happened to the bugs above us. They hang trapped in a vast snare of thread.<page>Hff. Hardly surprising. That there’s the final fate for all in Pharloom. Just come seeking a little sooner for them above.<page>Surely, oh surely, you don’t imagine your own end will be different? All that hunger, and fear, and pride, filling your fragile heart. You too are bound to end ensnared!<page>Grnk! Begone. In Pharloom, only a fool believes themselves free.
original_zh_text: 又来烦我？说了滚！<hpage>我只想问你可知上头虫子的遭遇？他们受困于邪丝之中。<page>嗤，迟早的事。纺络的众生终归此路，他们不过是早走一步。<page>难道……你觉得自己能逃过？饥渴、恐惧、傲慢塞满你那脆壳，你早晚也得落网！<page>哼！滚吧。在纺络，相信自己自由的都是蠢货。
translated_text: Are you still bothering me? "Let's get out of here," I said.<hpage>I knew what had happened to the bugs above, and I asked him if he had fallen into a big trap.<page>Jim was not surprised. Friends are everyone's ultimate goal. Please come.<page>Do you think the results will be different? Hunger, fear and pride fill your fragile heart.<page>In the Faroe Islands, people believe that only fools are free.
secondary_translated_text: 你还在打扰我吗？“我们离开这里吧，”我说。<hpage>我知道上面的虫子发生了什么事，我问他是否掉进了一个大陷阱。<page>吉姆并不感到惊讶。朋友是每个人的最终目标。请来吧<page>你认为结果会有所不同吗？饥饿、恐惧和自豪充满了你脆弱的心。<page>在法罗群岛，人们相信只有傻瓜才自由。

original_en_text: You want to cut them down? Hff. Yes, you look cruel enough.<page>Once the strings are cut, pain will return to them. They will remember fear and longing.<page>What a choice you make for them! Such power you grant yourself!
original_zh_text: 想斩断丝线？嗤，瞧你倒有几分机灵。<page>丝线一断，痛苦、恐惧、渴求都将复归。<page>你替他们选的好啊！好大的威风！
translated_text: Can you cut it? He seemed cruel.<page>After the rope is cut, the pain comes back to the rope, and you remember the fear and desire.<page>You made a good choice for them! Give yourself this strength.
secondary_translated_text: 你能切吗？他看起来很残酷。<page>绳子被割断后，痛苦又回到绳子上，你就记住了恐惧和渴望。<page>你为他们做出了一个很好的选择！给自己这种力量。

original_en_text: <hpage>Pinmaster, I have acquired oil with which my needle may see further sharpening.<page>Bonva! What wonder? What wish? To steal a gift so fine. Few are the pinmasters of our age who ever worked with such a substance.
original_zh_text: <hpage>针匠，我取来磨针秘油了。<page>太好了！这等圣物，这年头还有哪个针匠能摸到这宝贝！
translated_text: <hpage>Finmaster, there is an oil that can make needle tips.<page>Rescue, miracle? What are you doing? I can't believe I received such a wonderful gift. Today, it is hardly used.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Finmaster，有一种油可以制作针头。<page>救援，奇迹？你在干什么？我不敢相信我收到了如此美妙的礼物。如今，它几乎不被使用了。

original_en_text: How grand! To face an opponent with a bit of energy.<page>You’re a skilled one, clear enough. I hope my training has granted some insight.
original_zh_text: 痛快！总算遇到像样的对手。<page>身手不错，我的指导对你有用吧？
translated_text: This is great! Now he faces a powerful opponent.<page>You are a very capable and clear person, and I hope your education is an encouragement.
secondary_translated_text: 这太棒了！现在他面临着一个强大的对手。<page>你是一个非常有能力、头脑清晰的人，我希望你的教育是一种鼓励。

original_en_text: So rude! To raise a Pinstress from their deep meditation!<page>You carry on with that kind of brash behaviour and you’re likely to be stuck quick through!<hpage>I’m surprised to find a bug of sound mind alive in such an inhospitable place. You are a warrior learned in the blades of this land?<page>Aye! A Pinstress! Your needle there might fit you fair, strange as it is’n all, but it’s the pin that’s the glorious weapon of Pharloom.<page>Given I’m now awake, maybe you’d fancy a little training? Care to test the power of a Pinstress? Might be even this old master could show you a thing or two.
original_zh_text: 无礼之徒！竟敢打断针姬的冥想！<page>再这样莽撞行事，小心被扎成筛子！<hpage>这种荒凉之地居然还有清醒的虫活着？你是学过本地兵器的战士？<page>没错！刺针才是纺络的荣耀武器——你那根怪模怪样的针虽然趁手，但终究不是正统。<page>既然醒了，要不要来练练手？想试试刺针的威力吗？说不定我这老师傅还能教你两招？
translated_text: "The princess woke up.<page>If you continue to maintain this arrogant attitude, you will soon be in trouble.<hpage>Surprisingly, healthy insects live in such a desolate place. Are you a soldier studying in this country?<page>Oh, yes! Oh, yes!
