Your needle may suit you, but strange as it is, it is the glorious weapon of the pharaoh.<page>Now that you're awake, why don't you practice? Discover the power of witches. This teacher will teach you something.
secondary_translated_text: “公主醒了。<page>如果你继续保持这种傲慢的态度，你很快就会遇到麻烦。<hpage>令人惊讶的是，健康的昆虫生活在如此荒凉的地方。你是在这个国家学习的士兵吗？<page>哦，是的！哦，是的！你的针可能适合你，但尽管它很奇怪，它却是法老光荣的武器。<page>既然你醒了，为什么不练习呢？发现女巫的力量。这个老师会教你一些东西。

original_en_text: It’s a right long time since I’ve felt so vigorous. All those dulled pilgrims were useless for testing my talents.<hpage>Your blade proved an impressive challenge, Pinstress. I’ve travelled the length of this kingdom, yet the strength and skills hidden throughout continue to surprise me.<page>You bear your own strange strengths, needle bug. If only we’d met in less troubled times, just think of all we could have learned from one another!
original_zh_text: 好久没这么热血沸腾了！那些呆滞的朝圣者根本不配当陪练。<hpage>你的技艺令我惊叹。即便我走遍整个王国，仍为这里隐藏的实力感到惊讶。<page>你身上带着奇特的力量。要是我们生在太平年代，本可以互相学习！
translated_text: For a long time, I haven't had that much energy. This is not a test of my talent.<hpage>Princess Yuya Black was a huge challenge for me, but she still surprised me with her hidden strength and abilities.<page>You have a strange power, needle worm. Think about it, if you already know each other, then you probably already know each other!
secondary_translated_text: 很长一段时间，我都没有那么多精力了。这不是对我才华的考验。<hpage>尤雅·布莱克公主对我来说是一个巨大的挑战，但她隐藏的力量和能力仍然让我惊讶。<page>你有一种奇怪的力量，针虫。想一想，如果你们已经认识了，那么你们可能已经认识了！

original_en_text: Bold choice, needle bug. Let’s get our shells a’shaking!
original_zh_text: 有胆识！让我们战个痛快！
translated_text: Good luck, insect. create a shell
secondary_translated_text: 祝你好运，昆虫。创建一个shell

translated_text: Fin stress training

original_en_text: <hpage>These sands mark the edge of Pharloom’s territory. I was brought to this land through the caverns beyond.<hpage>Something at this kingdom’s height still hungers for me. Were I to flee now, I would again be pursued.<hpage>Until I find the source of that hunger, and slay it, I will not be free.
original_zh_text: <hpage>这片沙原是纺络的边界。我是穿过远处洞窟被带到此地的。<hpage>纺络的顶端仍有存在渴求着我。若此刻逃离，必将再次受到追捕。<hpage>唯有找到源头并将其斩杀，我才能获得自由。
translated_text: <hpage>Sand marks the boundary of the blue area. I came to this land and walked through a distant cave.<hpage>In this kingdom, greater things await me. If you run now, they will chase you again.<hpage>I will never be free until I discover the root cause of hunger and eradicate it.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>沙子标记了蓝色区域的边界。我来到这片土地，穿过一个遥远的洞穴。<hpage>在这个王国里，更伟大的事情等待着我。如果你现在逃跑，他们会再次追赶你。<hpage>在我找到饥饿的根源并消除它之前，我永远不会自由。

original_en_text: Back again, needle bug? Surely you’ve more important places calling than these sandy steps?<hpage>I shan’t stay long, Pinstress. Your home and your skills offer a sense of safety rare about these lands.
original_zh_text: 还不走？没有更要紧的事要做吗？<hpage>我不会久留。不过有你这般身手，待在这里反而安全。
translated_text: "You're back, God? "Is there anything more important than this staircase?”" "<hpage>Your home and technology give you a sense of security that is hard to find in these countries.
secondary_translated_text: “你回来了，上帝？“还有什么比这楼梯更重要的吗？”" "<hpage>您的家和技术能给您带来一种在这些国家很难找到的安全感。

original_en_text: Find the vassal... pale It. Return them to us... Save us both from the Masters’ wrath.
original_zh_text: 找到仆从……苍白者。将其归还……平息主人怒火。
translated_text: Save him from the wrath of the Lord.

original_en_text: Needle bug! With those black quakes, Pharloom’s finale is fast arriving.<page>Raise your blade! Let’s see at least one of us end true to our nature!
original_zh_text: 看这黑色震动，纺络的终局将至了。<page>举针吧！至少让我们中的一个死得其所！
translated_text: With this black earthquake, the end of the lighthouse is imminent.<page>Raise the knife! Let's see if there is at least one person who is true to our nature!
secondary_translated_text: 随着这场黑色地震，灯塔的终结迫在眉睫。<page>举起刀！让我们看看是否至少有一个人忠于我们的本性！

original_en_text: Ah ha! Needle bug! Who else would dare wake a Pinstress with such force?!<page>Saw my wish, I’m guessing? Here hopin’ to fulfill it?<hpage>I know what you are seeking, Pinstress... a death duel, an end from battle, not cavern’s collapse.<hpage>I can oblige... to a point... But a greater challenge still awaits me below.<page>Whatever else you’re about, you might be finding it futile now, needle bug. The black quakes... Pharloom’s finale arrives.<page>So let’s stop the yapping, aye! How’s ‘bout we begin? Let’s see at least one of us end true to our nature!
original_zh_text: 哈！是你！除了你谁敢这么粗暴地吵醒一名针姬！<page>看到我的祈愿了？想来帮我实现？<hpage>我知道你在渴求什么……一场死斗，你想战死而非被沙土掩埋。<hpage>我可以满足你……但下面还有更大的挑战在等着我。<page>不管你要做什么，可能都是徒劳。这黑色震动……纺络的终局将至。<page>少废话！开打吧！至少让我们中的一个死得其所！
translated_text: Oh, Oh, Oh! Who can use this power to awaken the princess?<page>Do you see my wish? Why don't you stay here?<hpage>I knew what I was looking for: not the end of the battle, not the collapse of the cave, but a death duel.<hpage>I could have said "yes". "But to some extent, it's a bigger challenge.<page>No matter what you do, you will think it's a waste. This was a black earthquake. This was the end of Pharaoh.<page>Let's stop these stupid things. What are you doing? Let's see if there is at least one person who is true to our nature!
secondary_translated_text: 哦，哦，哦！谁能用这种力量唤醒公主？<page>你看到我的愿望了吗？你为什么不留在这里？<hpage>我知道我在寻找什么：不是战斗的结束，不是洞穴的倒塌，而是一场死亡决斗。<hpage>我本可以说“是”。“但在某种程度上，这是一个更大的挑战。<page>无论你做什么，你都会认为这是浪费。这是一次黑色地震。这就是法老的结局。<page>让我们停止这些愚蠢的事情吧。你在干什么？让我们看看是否至少有一个人忠于我们的本性！

original_en_text: Creature, higher... It has been sent... by Masters served... to retrieve Zi’s vassal lost?
original_zh_text: 上位者……主人派你来……回收失联仆从？
translated_text: Biology, let it serve. The lost prince returns
secondary_translated_text: 生物学，让它服务。失落的王子回来了

original_en_text: No. No. No... My saviour slain!<page>Why do you do this, cruel slasher? Why must I stay, and serve, so long, long, long?<hpage>That void must not be called, bug. Already it attacks these lands with enough force to end them. To summon it stronger will only hasten that fall.<hpage>For this moment at least, your shell is saved. It was only by wish of your steel companion, and fear of her Masters’ punishment, that I arrived in time.
original_zh_text: 不，不……我的眷属被毁了！<page>你为什么这么残忍？为什么要我永世为奴？<hpage>虚空不可被召唤。纺络已然深受其害，再度召唤只会使情况更糟。<hpage>若不是你的钢铁同伴祈愿，我又及时赶到，你必死无疑。
translated_text: No, no.<page>Murderer, why would you do this? Why does it take so long?<hpage>This bug is not empty. They will attack the earth with enough force. Simply taking power will accelerate recession.<hpage>At least this time, the shell was saved, the will of my iron friend and the fear of my master's punishment, I arrived in time.
secondary_translated_text: 不不<page>凶手，你为什么要这样做？为什么要花这么长时间？<hpage>这个错误不是空的。他们将以足够的力量攻击地球。仅仅掌权就会加速衰退。<hpage>至少这一次，壳保住了，铁友的意志和对主人惩罚的恐惧，我及时赶到了。

original_en_text: Gah! Bested fair, and yet you choose to stay the killing blow?<hpage>I can test you, Pinstress, and myself for what’s to come, but I will not cut you down.<hpage>Despite its quakes, Pharloom’s demise is not as certain as it seems. I shall act to change that fate.<hpage>If I succeed at my task, the land that remains will require the watch of strong bugs like you.<page>Well, ain’t you an inspiration! Makin’ me seem a right fool, here thinkin’ only on the end while you’re looking to a future fair...<page>Seems you’ve beaten me twice, needle bug, both my pin’s edge, and my heart’s resolve...
original_zh_text: 咳！你已经赢了，为什么还不动手？<hpage>我可以与你比试，但不会杀你……<hpage>纺络的命运尚有转机，我要改变它。<hpage>若我成功，幸存的世界需要你这样的强者守护。<page>你可真是乐观！显得我像个只想着末日的蠢货……<page>你赢了我两次，无论是武艺还是觉悟……
translated_text: Yes, right. Oh, yes! Is it the right choice to accept the fatal blow?<hpage>You and I, Burns and I may test ourselves, but I will not forgive you.<hpage>Despite the earthquake, the farm's death was not as certain as it seemed.<hpage>If I succeed, the rest of the earth will have to be protected by powerful insects like you. "<page>No inspiration? You made me look like a fool, here for the last time, seeking justice in the future.<page>I felt as if I had been hit twice and the needle broke my needle, and I decided.
secondary_translated_text: 是的，正确的。哦，是的！接受致命打击是正确的选择吗？<hpage>你和我，伯恩斯和我可能会考验自己，但我不会原谅你。<hpage>尽管发生了地震，农场的死亡并不像看起来那么确定。<hpage>如果我成功了，地球上的其他地方将不得不由像你这样强大的昆虫来保护。"<page>没有灵感？你让我看起来像个傻瓜，在这里最后一次，在未来寻求正义。<page>我觉得自己好像被打了两下，针头折断了我的针头，我决定。

original_en_text: <hpage>Not for your Masters, but by my own will I may aid you, Zi, as long as the path permits.<hpage>Of your vassal, I have met one before, a scurrilous, scheming sort, and well able to remain hidden.<hpage>If your own servant shares similar disposition, they may prove hard to retrieve. Where would you advise I begin my search?<page>Zi has sensed their movement... She knows their places of rest. For pale It... Zi shall mark their chart.<page>Seek the vassal... Retrieve them, or their corpse... either is appropriate... either will aid... to avoid the Masters’ wrath.
original_zh_text: <hpage>若是顺路，我会你一臂之力。但并非为了你主人，而是为了我自己。<hpage>至于那仆从，我曾遇过同类。卑劣狡诈，极善藏匿。<hpage>若你的仆从也是如此，搜寻将很困难。你觉得该从何处下手？<page>梓能感知其动向……知晓其方位……苍白者，梓会在地图标记。<page>找到仆从……无论死活……皆能平息怒火……
translated_text: <hpage>I can help you, not for your master, but if the road permits.<hpage>He looked at one of his servants. Dirty, sinister, well hidden.<hpage>If your servant has similar tendencies, recovery may be difficult.<page>He heard it and rested. The children drew a map.<page>Customers either bury them or search for their bodies: both qualify. Or they can help you. To avoid the owner's anger.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我可以帮助你，不是为了你的主人，而是如果道路允许的话。<hpage>他看着他的一个仆人。肮脏、险恶、隐藏得很好。<hpage>如果你的仆人有类似的倾向，康复可能很困难。<page>他听到了就休息了。孩子们画了一张地图。<page>顾客要么埋葬他们，要么寻找他们的尸体：两者都符合资格。或者他们可以帮助你。为了避免主人生气。

original_en_text: So rude! To raise a Pinstress from their deep meditation!<page>You carry on with that kind of brash behaviour and you’re likely to be stuck quick through!<hpage>I’m surprised to find any bug still alive in such an inhospitable place. You are a warrior learned in the blades of this land?<page>Aye! A Pinstress! Your needle there might fit you fair, but the pin that’s the glorious weapon of Pharloom, least it was... It’s sure starting to feel like Pharloom doesn’t have long left.<page>Well, given I’m now awake, and time’s suddenly short, maybe you’d fancy a little training? Might be even this old master could show you a thing or two?
original_zh_text: 无礼之徒！竟敢打断针姬的冥想！<page>再这样莽撞行事，小心被扎成筛子！<hpage>这种荒凉之地居然还有活虫？你是学过本地兵器的战士？<page>没错！刺针曾是纺络的荣耀武器……虽然这王国恐怕撑不久了。<page>既然醒了又时日无多，要不要来练练手？让我这老师傅最后教你两招？
translated_text: "The princess woke up.<page>If you continue to maintain this arrogant attitude, you will soon be in trouble.<hpage>I was surprised to find that insects lived in such a desolate place. Are you a soldier studying in this country?<page>Oh, yes! Oh, yes! Poet, your thorns may be good for you, but thorns are the weapon of Pharaoh's glory, and Pharaoh seems to have been away for a long time.<page>You just woke up, time has passed, hasn't it? Do you want to practice for a while? Maybe your teacher will teach you this.
secondary_translated_text: “公主醒了。<page>如果你继续保持这种傲慢的态度，你很快就会遇到麻烦。<hpage>我惊讶地发现昆虫竟然生活在如此荒凉的地方。你是在这个国家学习的士兵吗？<page>哦，是的！哦，是的！诗人，你的荆棘可能对你有好处，但荆棘是法老荣耀的武器，而法老似乎已经离开很久了。<page>你刚刚醒来，时间已经过去了，不是吗？你想练习一会儿吗？也许你的老师会教你这个。

original_en_text: Off with you now, needle bug. I’ve respect for you and your sharp blade, but my hospitality shouldn’t be abused.
original_zh_text: 走吧！我敬重你和你的利刃，但别滥用我的善意。
translated_text: I respect you and your nails, but you should not abuse my hospitality.
secondary_translated_text: 我尊重你和你的指甲，但你不应该滥用我的热情好客。

original_en_text: Dunno if you’ve heard it, needle bug, but supposedly there’s a gleaming secret hidden at this mountain’s core.<page>Meant to be a marvel, or so my sisters past once told, a giant cavern all of crystal.<hpage>I have visited the core, Pinstress. It was a remarkable site indeed. I only hope that it shall not soon be lost.<page>Course you’ve seen it! Master at the blade and at the seeking. You’ve proven yourself an imposing talent. <page>Well, given you seem done up here, maybe it’s time you get back to your all important business?
original_zh_text: 你听说过吗？山脉核心处藏着一份闪亮的秘密。<page>据前辈说是个水晶巨洞奇观。<hpage>我去过那，确实是奇观。希望它不会很快消失。<page>你果然去过！看来你找东西的本事和打架一样好。<page>既然这里的事忙完了，你该去忙正事了吧？
translated_text: You may have heard of it, but in the heart of this mountain, there is a bright secret.<page>At least that's what the sisters said."It's a miracle," he said,"A huge cave full of crystals.<hpage>I looked at the center. This is a very beautiful place. I hope it will not disappear in the near future.<page>Of course you know! He is a master of swordsmanship and learning. They have shown their talents.<page>Maybe it's time to get back to the most important thing.
secondary_translated_text: 你可能听说过，但在这座山的中心，有一个明亮的秘密。<page>至少姐妹俩是这么说的。“这是一个奇迹，”他说，“一个充满水晶的巨大洞穴。<hpage>我看了看中心。这是一个非常美丽的地方。我希望它在不久的将来不会消失。<page>你当然知道！他是一位剑术和学问的大师。他们展示了自己的才华。<page>也许是时候回到最重要的事情上了。

original_en_text: <page>But the seer knows nothing! Nothing of the pain. All small Sula’s to bear... To watch, watch these lands dying, slow, the bugs suffering, falling, while our shell sustains...<page>The steelhearts feel so little... but we forced to serve, we endure it all. We alone. Why?<hpage>...Others may know that pain, small bug... Or at least something similar.<page>So will you chain me again? Herd me by point of your blade, and knowingly return me to that pain?<hpage>...I will not. I will inform the child of steel of what has transpired here, but I cannot force any bug to return to a task so cruel.<page>Then, then... Sula is free? At least to run? By your mercy, bug, these legs must move, quick, quick and far, far!
original_zh_text: <page>但先知不懂痛苦！苏拉独自承受……看着大地衰亡……虫民受苦……<page>钢铁之心没有痛觉……而我们独自承受一切……为什么？<hpage>……会有其他虫了解这份痛的，小虫……或类似的苦楚。<page>你要再次禁锢我吗？用针刃逼我回到那里？<hpage>……我不会。我会告知钢铁之子真相，但不会强迫任何虫回去受苦。<page>那么……苏拉自由了？至少能逃亡？谢谢你的慈悲！我要快逃，越远越好！
translated_text: <page>The prophet does not know what is not suffering. Watching the earth slowly dry up, insects fall miserably, our crustaceans survive.<page>In a steel mind, it doesn't matter, but we must serve and endure it. "<hpage>... Others feel pain and insects, or at least something similar.<page>Will he go to prison again? Did you pull me out with a knife and make me suffer?<hpage>... You won't tell children what's happening here, but you can't force insects to do something so cruel.<page>Is the South free? Do I need to run? Poor bug, this foot must go faster, farther, farther!
secondary_translated_text: <page>先知不知道什么是痛苦。看着地球慢慢干涸，昆虫悲惨地倒下，我们的甲壳类动物生存下来。<page>在钢铁般的头脑中，这并不重要，但我们必须服务并忍受它。<hpage>...其他人感到疼痛和昆虫，或者至少是类似的东西。<page>他会再次入狱吗？你用刀把我拉出来让我受苦吗？<hpage>...你不会告诉孩子们这里发生了什么，但你不能强迫昆虫做如此残酷的事情。<page>南方自由了吗？我需要跑步吗？可怜的虫子，这只脚必须走得更快，更远，更远！

original_en_text: Zi must watch, record... and wait... Always she is true to her function... Ore-bound... To duty.
original_zh_text: 梓必须观察、记录……等待……恪守职责。
translated_text: Violets are always visible or recorded. He is always true to his savings.
secondary_translated_text: 紫色总是可见或记录。他总是忠于自己的积蓄。

original_en_text: A mighty battle we had, my friend... Time now you get to your all important business. I’ll be wishing for your success.
original_zh_text: 真是场激战啊朋友……快去忙你的事吧。祝你成功。
translated_text: Gentlemen, gentlemen, we have fought an uphill battle, and now it is time to start important work.
secondary_translated_text: 先生们，先生们，我们打了一场艰苦的战斗，现在是开始重要工作的时候了。

original_en_text: ...Creature, higher... Its meeting. Zi’s awakening... It is not chance... It has been sent to Zi, yes? By Masters served?... To retrieve her vassal lost?
original_zh_text: ……上位者，相遇……梓苏醒……并非偶然……是主人派你来？……回收失联仆从？
translated_text: ... A conference on advanced biology is underway." Violet woke up. It's not a coincidence, it's purple, right? Actually? Master's service. How to recover lost customers?
secondary_translated_text: ...高级生物学会议正在进行中。“维奥莱特醒了。这不是巧合，是紫色的，对吧？实际上？大师的服务。如何挽回失去的客户？

original_en_text: <hpage>Pinstress, why do you choose to live amidst these storm-swept caverns? Surely there are more hospitable places?<page>Somewhere gentler? Warmer? I’d only go soft! How else is one expected to maintain their wits?<hpage>Then this is not a place of hiding? That Citadel up top seems no friend to the free, or the strong who’d choose to remain apart.<page>...Aye. Well, yes. That too’s a reason, though one that shames me some.<page>Our grand Citadel learnt well from the training of Pinstresses past. Then it went and turned those teachings upon us!<page>Despite our superior skills, our numbers have always been few, and their strength overwhelmed.<page>Of my once revered order, only two of us remain, wormed away in Pharloom’s forgotten corners, and my pin-sibling, she’s lost herself to more peaceable pursuits.
original_zh_text: <hpage>针姬，为何要住在风暴肆虐的洞窟？没有更舒适的地方吗？<page>更舒适？更温暖？那样只会让我变迟钝！<hpage>难道是在躲避什么？圣堡似乎容不下自由的强者。<page>……确实有这个原因，说来惭愧。<page>从前圣堡向我们讨教技艺，学成后却反过来对付我们！<page>我们虽然技艺高超，但终究寡不敌众。<page>曾经备受尊崇的教团，如今只剩两个。我躲在这遗忘角落，另一位更是彻底放弃了战斗。
translated_text: <hpage>Why did you choose to live in a cave destroyed by a storm? Is there a more popular place?<page>Do you want to go somewhere quieter? Warm? I am just weak! How can we remain wise?<hpage>Isn't this a hiding place? The castle above seems unfriendly to the free and powerful people who decide to leave.<page>...”Yes, that's one of the reasons. There are many people here.<page>Our magnificent castle learned a lesson from the actress's past training, and he imposed this lesson on us!<page>Our skills are excellent, but our numbers are small and our strength is unbearable.<page>Following orders I followed, we were trapped in a forgotten corner of Param, our brothers and sisters lost in search of a more peaceful peace.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>为什么你选择住在一个被风暴摧毁的洞穴里？还有更受欢迎的地方吗？<page>你想去安静的地方吗？温暖的？我只是软弱！我们怎样才能保持智慧？<hpage>这不是藏身之处吗？上面的城堡对于决定离开的自由而强大的人们似乎并不友好。<page>...”是的，这是原因之一。这里人很多。<page>我们宏伟的城堡从女演员过去的训练中吸取了教训，他把这一教训强加给了我们！<page>我们的技术很出色，但人数少，实力难以承受。<page>按照我所遵循的命令，我们被困在帕拉姆一个被遗忘的角落，我们的兄弟姐妹在寻找更和平的和平中迷失了方向。

original_en_text: <hpage>I cannot yet leave this land. Until I slay its source, this kingdom’s hunger for me will never abate.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我还不能离开。只要源头尚存，这国度对我的渴求不会消退。
translated_text: <hpage>If we do not eliminate the source of this country, our desire for this country will never be satisfied.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>如果我们不消灭这个国家的根源，我们对这个国家的愿望就永远不会得到满足。

original_en_text: Pale It... You would reject the role? Are you not tamed, bound, by Masters?... You would know... obedience is essential.<page>Recall, the fate of those who defy... Even you higher... Especially you higher...<page>...Compression... We have suffered it. We would never wish it upon another.
original_zh_text: 苍白者……你要违抗？你未被主宰驯服？……你该明白服从的重要性。<page>想想违抗者的下场……即便是上位者……尤其是上位者……<page>……压缩之苦……我们经历过……不愿它降临他者。
translated_text: Would you give up the role? Do you have any contact with the master? As you know, listening is important.<page>Look at the fate of those who resist. Although you are old. Especially when you are old.<page>... They were oppressed. I'm done. I don't want others to suffer the same pain.
secondary_translated_text: 你会放弃这个角色吗？你和大师有联系吗？如你所知，倾听很重要。<page>看看那些抵抗者的命运。虽然你老了。尤其是当你老了。<page>...他们受到压迫。我受够了我不希望其他人遭受同样的痛苦。

original_en_text: Ahh, is your needle too shy to show its edge? What a shame.
original_zh_text: 呵，你的针不敢出鞘吗？真没劲。
translated_text: Are you ashamed to show your face? Unfortunately, he believed
secondary_translated_text: 你羞于露面吗？不幸的是，他相信

original_en_text: Even my welcome has limits, needle bug.<page>I’ve become well accustomed to solitude, and it’s unnerving to play host to your strange strength overlong.
original_zh_text: 我的耐心有限。<page>独居惯了，你这种异常存在让我不安。
translated_text: Hospitality also has its limitations.<page>He was used to being alone. I'm sorry I've accepted your strange powers for so long.
secondary_translated_text: 好客也有其局限性。<page>他已经习惯了孤独。很抱歉我接受了你奇怪的力量这么久。

original_en_text: Planning to hang about are you, needle bug?<page>Fancy a little training? Care to test the power of a Pinstress? Might be even this old master could show you a thing or two?
original_zh_text: 暂时不打算走吗？<page>那要不要来场训练，试试刺针的威力？说不定我这老师傅还能教你两招？
translated_text: Play Needle Worms?<page>Do you want to train me? Discover the power of witches. Maybe your teacher will tell you what to do.
secondary_translated_text: 玩针虫？<page>你想训练我吗？发现女巫的力量。也许你的老师会告诉你该怎么做。

original_en_text: Having second thoughts on our bout, needle bug? Good! I’ll not hold back my blade, and I’ll expect the same from you.
original_zh_text: 回心转意了？很好！我不会手下留情，希望你也一样！
translated_text: Have you ever changed the date, worm? Okay, okay! Okay! "I don't want to give up my sword, I want you to give up.
secondary_translated_text: 你更改过日期吗，虫子？好吧，好吧！好的！“我不想放弃我的剑，我希望你放弃。

original_en_text: ...Bug... Higher... It has come seeking... Zi is found... She is awoken.<hpage>Greetings, child of steel. I have known your type, in past. From your presence, it is clear this land too has caught the long gaze of your Masters.<page>Masters... Yes... For them, Zi observes... obedient... always...<page>And you... a creature in half... Pale It... Bug It... old... stubborn... alone... You too are observed.
original_zh_text: ……虫……上位者……它来寻找……梓被发现了……她苏醒了。<hpage>钢铁之子，我见过你的同类。你的到来说明你的主人已将目光投向此地。<page>主人……是的……梓侍奉他们……永远服从……<page>而你……半身者……苍白者……虫身者……古老……固执……独行……你也被注视着。
translated_text: ... Insects are tall. I went to find the boy.<hpage>It is clear that in its existence, the land also attracts long-term interests of its owners.<page>Teacher, Mom<page>you... Half man, half animal. They are transparent. In the classic, I put together a very stubborn and stubborn insect. You will observe it too.
secondary_translated_text: ...昆虫很高。我去找那个男孩。<hpage>显然，土地的存在也吸引了其所有者的长期利益。<page>老师、妈妈<page>你...半人半动物。它们是透明的。在经典中，我把一只非常顽强、顽强的昆虫放在一起。你也会观察到它。

original_en_text: ...Creature, higher... Its meeting, Zi’s awakening... It is not chance... It has been sent, by Masters served?... To retrieve her vassal lost?<page>But no... pale It cannot.. First, a chart is needed. Pale It must acquire one. Only then can Zi provide the marks... Their vassal’s location sensed strong.
original_zh_text: ……上位者，相遇……梓苏醒……并非偶然……是主人派你来？……回收失联仆从？<page>不……苍白者……须先有地图……梓才能标记其方位……仆从感知强烈。
translated_text: ... Without a higher form of existence, encounters and awakening are accidental. How to recover lost customers?<page>No, it's too subtle to understand. First, you need a table. There is a blue one, and it should be. Purple is the only mark. Your life will make you feel strong.
secondary_translated_text: ...如果没有更高的存在形式，遭遇和觉醒都是偶然的。如何挽回失去的客户？<page>不，它太微妙了，难以理解。首先，你需要一张桌子。有一个蓝色的，它应该是。紫色是唯一的标志。你的生活会让你感到坚强。

original_en_text: <hpage>Zi, your vassal is gone, alive, fled beyond these lands.<hpage>I chose to allow their escape, even if your wish may not be granted.<page>The wish? No... pale It... Zi sensed clear your meeting... The rite... The vassal is tarnished. They have touched the dark. By the Masters, they will now be hunted... no matter the distance fled.<hpage>Perhaps, for your vassal, that is preferable? Waste here in servitude or flee free. They made their choice, and proclaimed it clear by their black action.<hpage>Their dark champion is slain, but luck or guile may yet see them survive.<page>Hope!.. Pale It... For a vassal who defies the Masters?... You give Zi a thought, complex...<page>The outcome is different... and Zi must now observe alone... but this may be the better way?<page>Zi shall accept the happening... shall pray the Masters still see her loyal... and Zi too will share the hope... that her vassal lives long unbound.
original_zh_text: <hpage>梓，你的仆从已叛逃出境。<hpage>我选择放他们走，即使这样会违背你的愿望。<page>愿望？不……苍白者……梓很清楚……仪式……仆从已玷污，触及黑暗……逃不过主人追猎。<hpage>或许他们觉得这样更好？与其在奴役中腐朽不如自由逃亡。<hpage>其黑暗眷属已除，但或许能凭机遇存活。<page>希望？……苍白者……给背叛主人的仆从？……这想法……令梓困惑……<page>结果不同……梓将独自观察……或许这是更好结局？<page>梓将接受现实……祈祷主人知晓梓忠诚……但梓也希望……她的仆从能自由活着。
translated_text: <hpage>"Your servant survived.<hpage>Even if their wishes are not realized, I will choose to leave.<page>What do you wish for? No, no, he's pale. I felt his encounter. A good person is dirty and she touches me in the dark.<hpage>Is this good for customers? They made the choice and proved it with black behavior.<hpage>Their dark warriors are dead, but luck or trickery will save them.<page>I hope it is! It's hard to imagine a man resisting his master.<page>The results are different. Violet should be considered alone, but is it the best way?<page>The son agreed with this. The praying Lord always sees His faithfulness. Roses have hope. His people didn't stay long.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>“你的仆人活了下来。<hpage>即使他们的愿望没有实现，我也会选择离开。<page>你许什么愿？不，不，他脸色苍白。我感受到了他的遭遇。好人是肮脏的，她在黑暗中触摸我。<hpage>这对客户有利吗？他们做出了选择，并用黑人的行为证明了这一点。<hpage>他们的黑暗战士死了，但运气或诡计会拯救他们。<page>我希望是！很难想象一个人会反抗他的主人。<page>结果有所不同。紫罗兰应该单独考虑，但这是最好的方式吗？<page>儿子对此表示同意。祈祷的主总是看到他的信实。玫瑰有希望。他的人民没有停留太久。

original_en_text: For your talents, needle bug, in blade and strength... and restraint, take this emblem of my order.<page>Hadn’t ever thought another’d be joining our slim ranks, but you’re as deserving a member as’s ever come before.
original_zh_text: 为你的武艺、觉悟……和克制，收下我们教团的徽章吧。<page>没想到还会有新成员加入，但你当之无愧。
translated_text: Your talent lies in sword and strength.<page>"No one thinks you're part of an elite team, but you deserve to be part of that team more than ever. " "
secondary_translated_text: 你的才华在于剑和力量。<page>“没有人认为你是精英团队的一员，但你比以往任何时候都更值得成为这个团队的一员。" "

original_en_text: <hpage>I will not flee. I cannot abandon the kingdom to a collapse of my making.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我不会逃走。不能任由下方王国因我而崩塌。
translated_text: <hpage>I don't want to run away, I don't want to. "I cannot give up my kingdom for my creatures.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我不想逃跑，我不想。“我不能为了我的生物放弃我的王国。

original_en_text: Creature, higher... return when a chart is acquired. A chart is needed, essential, to serve the Masters... to aid Zi.
original_zh_text: 上位者……取得地图再来……图是侍奉主人……协助梓的必要之物。
translated_text: Advanced biology. Please give me this letter. To serve the Master, maps are indispensable. Help me, please.
secondary_translated_text: 高级生物学。请把这封信给我。为了服务大师，地图是不可或缺的。请帮助我。

original_en_text: Ahh... Shame. Surely battle’d be the better end, no?<page>If not by blade, we’ll just have to accept whatever conclusion this new quaking calamity flings upon our heads.
original_zh_text: 唉……真遗憾。战死本是更好的结局不是吗？<page>既然不能战死，我们就只能接受这黑暗带来的结局了。
translated_text: Yes, right. This battle will have a better ending.<page>Without a leaf, we have no choice but to accept the conclusion that this shocking new disaster has befallen us.
secondary_translated_text: 是的，正确的。这场战斗会有一个更好的结局。<page>没有一片叶子，我们别无选择，只能接受这样的结论：这场令人震惊的新灾难已经降临到我们身上。

original_en_text: <hpage>Cease your summoning, fool bug!<hpage>Though you may yearn for freedom, that saviour you hope to call will bring only death.
original_zh_text: <hpage>停止召唤，蠢虫！<hpage>即便你渴求自由，那救赎者也只会带来死亡。
translated_text: <hpage>Please don't say I'm a fool again.<hpage>But the Savior you call for will only bring death.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>别再说我是傻瓜了。<hpage>但你所呼求的救主只会带来死亡。

original_en_text: It’s a right long time since I’ve felt so vigorous. All those dulled pilgrims are useless for testing my talents.<hpage>Your blade proved an impressive challenge, Pinstress. The strength and skills hidden about this kingdom continue to surprise me.<page>You bear your own strange strengths, needle bug. More I think than you’d be willing to reveal to me.<page>What, I wonder, are you planning to turn all that power towards?
original_zh_text: 好久没这么热血沸腾了！那些呆滞的朝圣者根本不配当陪练。<hpage>你的技艺令我惊叹。这王国暗藏的实力总是出乎意料。<page>你身上带着奇特的力量，用针的。远不止你愿意展示的这些吧？<page>我很好奇，你打算用这力量做些什么？
translated_text: I haven't had that much energy in a long time, so not all boring pilgrims can experience my talent. "<hpage>Your Sword Princess is a huge challenge and you will continue to be amazed at the power and abilities hidden in this kingdom.<page>You have a strange power, needle worm.<page>Where will we transfer power?
secondary_translated_text: 我已经很久没有那么多精力了，所以不是所有无聊的朝圣者都能体验到我的才华。"<hpage>你的剑公主是一个巨大的挑战，你会继续惊讶于这个王国隐藏的力量和能力。<page>你有一种奇怪的力量，针虫。<page>我们将权力转移到哪里？

original_en_text: No. No. No... My champion slain!<page>Why do you do this, cruel slasher? Why must I stay, and serve, so long, long, long?<hpage>That void must not be called, bug. Not ever. None can control it, though many have tried. <hpage>Any strength you hoped it offered would fast be proven false.<hpage>Consider yourself fortunate I arrived in time. Your shell is saved, all by wish of your steel companion, and fear of her Masters’ punishment.
original_zh_text: 不，不……我的眷属被毁了！<page>你为何如此残忍？为何要我永世为奴？<hpage>虚空不可驾驭，故不可召唤，这是无数血泪换来的教训。<hpage>无论你指望能从它身上获取什么力量，你都会后悔。<hpage>你该庆幸我来得及时。若不是你的钢铁同伴祈愿，你必死无疑。
translated_text: They weren't dead, the soldiers were dead.<page>Murderer, why would you do this? Why does it take so long?<hpage>Please note that this error cannot be null. Many people have tried it, but no one has been able to control it.<hpage>The power you try to give will quickly go wrong.<hpage>I'm glad we arrived in time. His body was rescued. It was the wish of his iron partner and the fear of God's punishment.
secondary_translated_text: 他们没有死，士兵们死了。<page>凶手，你为什么要这样做？为什么要花这么长时间？<hpage>请注意，此错误不能为空。很多人都尝试过，但没有人能够控制它。<hpage>你试图给予的力量很快就会出错。<hpage>我很高兴我们及时到达。他的尸体获救了。这是他铁伙伴的愿望，也是对上帝惩罚的恐惧。

original_en_text: <hpage>If I chose to head beyond, I would abandon Pharloom to a collapse of my making.<hpage>While I live, and still possess the strength to act, I will not allow that end to come to pass.
original_zh_text: <hpage>若我选择逃离，下方王国将因我而崩塌。<hpage>只要力气尚存，我绝不容许这样的结局。
translated_text: <hpage>If I decide to go further, I will give up Falun and my career will collapse.<hpage>As long as I am alive and as long as I can play, I will not let this happen. "
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>如果我决定走得更远，我就会放弃法轮，我的事业就会崩溃。<hpage>只要我还活着，只要我还能打球，我就不会让这种事发生。"

original_en_text: Dunno if you’ve heard it, needle bug, but supposedly there’s a gleaming secret hidden at this mountain’s core.<page>Meant to be a marvel, or so my sisters past once told, a giant cavern all of crystal.<page>If you’re hanging around these heights, and time’s allowing, maybe you’ll get to seeking it?<page>Course you’d first have to find the entrance, but you’ve certainly shown the skills to wriggle up in there, provided you’re so inclined.
original_zh_text: 你听说过吗？山脉核心处藏着一份闪亮的秘密。<page>据前辈说是个水晶巨洞奇观。<page>要是有时间不妨去找找？<page>当然得先找到入口，不过以你的身手肯定没问题。
translated_text: You may have heard of it, but in the heart of this mountain, there is a bright secret.<page>At least that's what the sisters said."It's a miracle," he said,"A huge cave full of crystals.<page>If you have ever been to this height, if time permits, you can look for it.<page>Of course, first you have to find a path, but if you have to do that, you will definitely test your tracking skills there.
secondary_translated_text: 你可能听说过，但在这座山的中心，有一个明亮的秘密。<page>至少姐妹俩是这么说的。“这是一个奇迹，”他说，“一个充满水晶的巨大洞穴。<page>如果你去过这个高度，如果时间允许的话，你可以去寻找。<page>当然，首先你必须找到一条路径，但如果你必须这样做，你肯定会在那里测试你的跟踪技能。

original_en_text: <page>A small gift for you, pale It... for the thought, complex... rock of the home spear... and of Zi’s birth. May it aid your further action in this land.
original_zh_text: <page>苍白者，赠礼……为感谢你给的希望……梓诞生故土的岩石……愿它助你在此地的行动。
translated_text: <page>A small gift will make you feel better. Think about the complexity. The birth of Lance Rock and his son will help us take another step in this country. "
secondary_translated_text: <page>一份小礼物会让你感觉更好。想想复杂性。兰斯·洛克和他儿子的出生将帮助我们在这个国家迈出新的一步。"

original_en_text: Off with you now, needle bug! A Pinstress of my substantial talent requires their deep meditation, especially after such a satisfying bout.<hpage>Goodbye, Pinstress. May your blade remain sharp.
original_zh_text: 走吧！针姬需要继续冥想——激烈战斗后更需要静修。<hpage>再会，愿你的锋芒永不褪色。
translated_text: A talented singer like me needs deep meditation. Especially after such a start.<hpage>Good morning, princess. Check the knife.
secondary_translated_text: 像我这样有才华的歌手需要深思。尤其是在这样的开端之后。<hpage>早上好，公主。检查刀。

original_en_text: Ho, miss! How’s all this then? Lotta dials to be trackin’, but at least the controls seem in good order.<page>From here, I can guide your bell down, best as any bug.<page><hpage>Then you’ve no prior experience with this type of transport?<page>No one does, miss! Them’s who used to dive’re all long dead, or cursed ta half life. An’ there ain’t no bug left alive’s been brave or stupid enough to try... ‘til now, at least.<page>I’ll work it best’s I can. Can’t do much more, I’m afraid. At least the forgings of these docks were built to last. Now we’s only gotta pray they hold for you.<page>Here’s the key that’ll see you inside its metal belly. Pop in there once you’re feelin’ good and ready. In the meantime, I’ll get to seeing things set up here.
original_zh_text: 嚯，小姐！这玩意儿够复杂的！仪表盘多得数不过来，好在操控装置还算正常。<page>我能在这儿引导潜钟下潜，保准比任何虫子都靠谱。<page><hpage>这么说，你从没操作过这种器械？<page>谁都没这种经验，小姐！以前开潜钟的早死绝了，剩下的也半死不活。活着的虫里，就没有哪个又疯又蠢的敢用这玩意……直到现在。<page>我会尽力而为，但别的可不敢打包票。好在码头造的这家伙够结实，现在只能祈祷它下潜后不会出什么故障。<page>这是这个大铁肚子的钥匙。等你准备好了就钻进去。我这就去把装置整备妥当。
translated_text: Oh, my God! What happened? Ratanov keeps moving, but at least the team looks good.<page>From there, I can defeat your slaves.<page><hpage>"Have you ever used this car?<page>"No one will, ma 'am. Anyone who falls into the water will be cursed, either dead or half-alive. The worm was not alive, so he challenged it boldly and foolishly. least for now,<page>At least the port is sustainable and you just have to pray that they will support you.<page>This is the key to breaking metal. Try it when you feel good. Until I saw everything inside.
secondary_translated_text: 天哪！发生了什么？拉塔诺夫不断前进，但至少球队看起来不错。<page>从那里，我可以击败你的奴隶。<page><hpage>“你用过这辆车吗？<page>“没有人会，女士。任何掉进水里的人都会受到诅咒，要么死。这条虫子不是活的，所以他大胆而愚蠢地挑战它。至少目前，<page>至少港口是可持续发展的，你只需要祈祷他们会支持你。<page>这是打破金属的关键。当你感觉好的时候试试。直到我看到里面的一切。

original_en_text: <hpage>Forge Daughter, I have acquired a power that will enable me to end this black madness. Soon I will act to stop the quakes and save this land.<page>Excellent, pointy bug. Your drive, and your vigour, both have proven surprisingly large for one so small.<page>Know we have heard from Ballow, who told of his repair efforts upon the diving bell below. By now, that task is likely completed.<page>If you are hoping to put his work to the test, then we shall wish again on your survival. And if our own service can aid your critical task, know we will continue to provide it gladly.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，我已获取终结这场黑灾所需的力量。终结动荡、拯救这片地区就在此一举。<page>啧，好家伙！小尖头虫，没想到你个头不大，魄力和干劲倒是真不小。<page>听巴洛说，他底下那口老破钟修得差不多了。这会儿多半已经完工。<page>想试试那家伙的成果？那咱还得再一次祝你好运。要是咱这熔炉里的功夫能帮上忙，甭客气，照旧伺候着！
translated_text: <hpage>Thanks to my daughter's training, I have the ability to end this black madness. We will take immediate action to prevent earthquakes and save the planet.<page>For such a small person, I found their energy, and the energy was unbelievably huge.<page>When he learned he had received a letter from Barrow, he described his work on repairing the clock underwater as follows: "At this point, the work is complete. "<page>If you want to try your job, you have to try it again. If our professional services can meet your basic needs, we will continue to provide them.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>多亏了我女儿的训练，我才有能力结束这场黑色的疯狂。我们将立即采取行动，防止地震，拯救地球。<page>对于这么小的一个人，我找到了他们的能量，而且能量是令人难以置信的巨大。<page>当他得知自己收到了巴罗的一封信时，他描述了自己在水下修复时钟的工作如下：“至此，工作已经完成。"<page>如果你想尝试你的工作，你必须再试一次。如果我们的专业服务能够满足您的基本需求，我们将继续提供。

original_en_text: Erm, you may notice your prize there is a little light, my lady...<page>Awful truth is, you’ve cleaned us out. We’ve not a single measly rosary left between us. Turns out we were just no match for you!<hpage>It was a game fairly played, sir, though I’ve no wish to see you destitute. Would you like to make another kind of wager, perhaps?
original_zh_text: 呃，您可能会觉得这次的奖品有点寒酸，女士……<page>实话说，您把我们家底都赢光了。半颗念珠都不剩！我们根本不是您对手！<hpage>先生，游戏确实公平公正，但我也不想见你倾家荡产。要不要换个赌注？
translated_text: As you may have noticed, the price is a bit high.<page>The terrible truth is, you stole the space between us. "<hpage>It was a fair game, but I don't want it to go bankrupt.
secondary_translated_text: 正如您可能注意到的那样，价格有点高。<page>可怕的事实是，你偷走了我们之间的空间。"<hpage>这是一场公平的比赛，但我不希望它破产。

original_en_text: Grfff... So it’s gotten that bad, aye? I guess... If that’s how it is, I’ll be your bug.<page>Meet me below, at the diving bell. We’ll see if I can get you ready for the drop.
original_zh_text: <page>嘶……已经糟到这地步了？行吧……如果真是这样，那我帮你。<page>去潜钟底下碰头，我看能不能给你整备好。
translated_text: Then it got worse. Actually? I think it's... ... If so, that's your BAP.<page>Please refer to the table below. I'll help you prepare the plane.
secondary_translated_text: 然后情况变得更糟。实际上？我认为这是. ...如果是这样，那就是你的BAP。<page>请参阅下表。我会帮你准备飞机。

original_en_text: Holler when you’re ready, miss. The upgrades are done. That bell’s as ready as it’ll ever be.
original_zh_text: 准备好了就喊我一声，小姐。升级已经完成，这只潜钟现在状态绝佳。
translated_text: When you are ready, the call update is complete and the sound is ready.
secondary_translated_text: 当您准备好后，通话更新就完成了，声音也准备好了。

original_en_text: Ahhh... Can you feel it yet? All your troubles dripping away...
original_zh_text: 啊哈……感觉到了吗？烦心事都在随着汗液滴落……
translated_text: Yes, right. Did you hear that? All your worries will disappear.
secondary_translated_text: 是的，正确的。你听到了吗？你所有的担忧都会消失。

original_en_text: The deposits around here, those long-burning rocks. They’re useful to the Citadel, in whatever their shadowy business, but useless if you require tools of us!<page>We need finer material. Rare metal. Pharloom would provide a bounty to the able explorer. Find us some, and we’ll build your violent aids.
original_zh_text: 储备在附近的长效燃烧石？圣堡那帮虫子拿去搞些见不得虫的勾当倒合适，对我们来说屁用没有！<page>去找些更好、更稀有的金属！只要你有本事，纺络遍地都是是宝贝。找着了，我们就有办法给你造那些家伙什。
translated_text: The surrounding sediments are stones that were burned long ago. Even in the castle, your secret business is useful, but if you don't need our tools!<page>The Light Metal Lighthouse rewards capable researchers. Find something for us that helps violence. "
secondary_translated_text: 周围的沉积物都是很久以前烧毁的石头。即使在城堡里，您的秘密生意也很有用，但如果您不需要我们的工具！<page>轻金属灯塔奖励有能力的研究人员。为我们找到一些有助于暴力的东西。"

original_en_text: Ola, ola! Our lady has missed her mark, and so thusly ends our challenge!
original_zh_text: 哎哎！这位女士脱靶了，挑战结束！
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. We missed the goal and the challenge is over!
secondary_translated_text: 嘿嘿。我们错过了进球，挑战结束了！

translated_text: ... The International Space Station is... Always, always, learn, be a citizen.
secondary_translated_text: ...国际空间站是.永远，永远，学习，成为一名公民。

original_en_text: My lady, I pray you reconsider! T’would be an honour to see those strong limbs of yours in action, truly!
original_zh_text: 女士，再考虑考虑吧！要是能见识到您矫健的风姿，定会是我们的荣幸！
translated_text: Request your comment! I am very happy to see the large amount of participation!
secondary_translated_text: 请求您的评论！很高兴看到大量参与！

original_en_text: A respectable enough effort, truly. You didn’t earn enough rosaries to make a profit off us, but that should only spur you on to try again!
original_zh_text: 表现非常不错！虽然赚的念珠还不够回本，或许正好能激励您再试一次！
translated_text: "We haven't won enough sleeves to take advantage of us, but it will be a challenge again!
secondary_translated_text: “我们还没有赢得足够的袖子来占我们的便宜，但这将再次是一个挑战！

original_en_text: An old diving bell. Its door is shut tight by an ornate clamp.
original_zh_text: 一具古旧的潜钟，钟门被一只华丽的夹钳紧紧锁闭。
translated_text: A nice old clock door is closed with a nice clip.
secondary_translated_text: 一个漂亮的旧时钟门用一个漂亮的夹子关闭。

original_en_text: The diving bell’ll be ready again soon, miss. Once this new shield-shell is fitted, it’ll surely withstand the drop!.. Surely!
original_zh_text: 潜钟很快就能再用，小姐。新护壳装好后绝对能扛住下坠！绝对！
translated_text: The watch was ready in a short period of time and with a new protector, it was able to withstand falls.
secondary_translated_text: 手表在短时间内就准备好了，并且有了新的保护器，它能够承受坠落。

translated_text: ... This street. Arnold, Associated Press. Let go, Ollie. From the International Space Station.
secondary_translated_text: ...这条大街阿诺德，美联社。放手，奥利。来自国际空间站。

original_en_text: Ola, ola, time to play! Take these straight pins and strike the target when you see it!
original_zh_text: 哎哎，游戏要开始咯！拿好这些掷针，见靶就扎！
translated_text: Hey, it's time to play! When you see the target, grab the nail directly and hit it!
secondary_translated_text: 嘿，该玩了！当你看到目标时，直接抓住钉子并击中它！

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I require a moment. Please unlock the bell for me.<page>Aye. Can do, miss. Hail me again when you’re ready to travel.
original_zh_text: <hpage>巴洛先生，我还需要点时间。麻烦打开钟门。<page>没问题，小姐。等您准备妥当了，再喊我一声就行。
translated_text: <hpage>I need time to ring the bell.“<page>Be happy when you are ready to travel.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我需要时间敲钟。“<page>当您准备好旅行时，请保持快乐。

original_en_text: Here to sweat away your sorrows, miss? The steam does wonders for a mind set sullen, or a shell gone stiff.<hpage>I’ve found these lowlands hot enough already, and mine is a shell more resilient than most.<hpage>To challenge that further seems a unique sort of madness.<page>Aye, well, this is Pharloom, miss! Madness is catching. I’d say this here’s the smallest form of it.
original_zh_text: 有烦心事吗，小姐？来蒸桑拿吧，蒸汽对郁结的心绪或僵硬的甲壳有奇效。<hpage>我倒觉得这里已经够热了，何况我这副甲壳比多数虫子都硬实。<hpage>热上加热，怕不是疯得别致。<page>哎，这儿可是纺络，小姐！疯病是会传染的。要我说，在这蒸桑拿算最轻的症状了。
translated_text: "Are you here to sweat? Steam is suitable for people with depression and people with stiff skin.<hpage>These plains are quite warm and my sink is more flexible than most places.<hpage>More discussions will be crazy.<page>Crazy attraction, this is the smallest form.
secondary_translated_text: “你是来出汗的吗？蒸汽适合抑郁症患者和皮肤僵硬的人。<hpage>这些平原相当温暖，我的水槽比大多数地方更灵活。<hpage>更多的讨论将会疯狂。<page>疯狂的吸引力，这是最小的形式。

original_en_text: What an honour it was to play with you, my lady! I hope you’ll think of us whenever you feel those rosaries rattling around in your pockets.
original_zh_text: 与您同乐实乃荣幸！希望您摸着兜里的念珠时能想起我们。
translated_text: I am so happy to play with you! Whenever you feel the pain of rosary beads in your pocket, please think of us.
secondary_translated_text: 我很高兴和你一起玩！每当你感到口袋里的念珠的痛苦时，请想想我们。

translated_text: Do you want to cancel the boat?

original_en_text: There is no choice! Not for us. We cannot leave, not ever. We are a Forge Daughter, fixed to this forge and its service. Ours is a duty lifetime bound.
original_zh_text: 没得选！从来就没得选。咱是熔炉之女，生来就和这熔炉缔结了契约。使命在身，至死方休。
translated_text: We have no choice. We don't deserve it. We will educate our daughters and dedicate them to this leader and his service.
secondary_translated_text: 我们别无选择。我们不值得这样做。我们将教育我们的女儿，并将她们奉献给这位领导人和他的服务。

original_en_text: If you’re planning passage below, Ballow’s the one to assist you. We must remain by the forge, always.
original_zh_text: 若想下潜，去找巴洛帮忙。咱得永远守着熔炉。
translated_text: If you are on the ground, Barolo can help you.
secondary_translated_text: 如果您在现场，巴洛洛可以帮助您。

original_en_text: Oh! Pointy bug, why do you bother us at our work? The world cracks and quakes to some grave new calamity, surely you should seek somewhere safer?<hpage>As far as I might flee, I suspect no such place exists, and in any case, I would not see this land’s bugs abandoned to their end.<hpage>What of you? Why do you choose to remain so diligent at your task, given the fell state of your lands?
original_zh_text: 哟！小尖头虫，干嘛打扰咱干活？外面又闹起什么灾祸，搞得地动山摇，你该找个安全地儿躲躲才对啊？<hpage>恐怕无论逃到哪里，都无处可避。更何况，我不愿抛下此地生灵，让它们无力地面对终结来临。<hpage>你们呢？既然明白此地危在旦夕，为何还要死守这熔炉？
translated_text: Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! It's a bug, isn't it? Why interfere with our business? The world is collapsing, earthquakes are occurring, and new disasters are emerging.<hpage>I suspect there is no such place until I can escape, but even then, I will not see the insects on this land abandoned until the end.<hpage>What should I do? Why is it so hard to work when the country is in decline?
secondary_translated_text: 哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！这是一个错误，不是吗？为什么要干涉我们的业务？世界正在崩溃，地震正在发生，新的灾难正在出现。<hpage>我怀疑在我能逃脱之前没有这样的地方，但即使如此，直到最后我也不会看到这片土地上的昆虫被遗弃。<hpage>我该怎么办？为什么国家衰落时工作这么难？

original_en_text: Oh! Small pointy bug, why do you bother us at our work?<hpage>The sound of your craft called me to investigate. What is your duty here? Are you a smith of some kind?
original_zh_text: 嘿！小尖头虫，干嘛打扰我们干活？<hpage>你们的锻打声引我前来。你们在这儿做些什么？可是铁匠？
translated_text: Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Small acute insects: Why do they interfere with our work?<hpage>The noise of the boat asked me to check. What is your mission here? Smith?
secondary_translated_text: 哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！小型急性昆虫：为什么它们会干扰我们的工作？<hpage>船的声音让我检查一下。你在这里的使命是什么？史密斯？

original_en_text: Ola, ola, time to play! Take these straight pins and strike the target when you see it!<page>If you can strike the target fifteen times, the prize is yours!
original_zh_text: 哎哎，游戏要开始咯！拿好这些掷针，见靶就扎！<page>击中靶子十五次，奖品就是您的！
translated_text: Hey, it's time to play! When you see the target, grab the nail directly and hit it!<page>When you reach your goal 15 times, the prize is yours!
secondary_translated_text: 嘿，该玩了！当你看到目标时，直接抓住钉子并击中它！<page>当您实现目标15次时，奖品就是您的！

original_en_text: A smith? Hardly so crude! We are Forge Daughter! How can a pointy bug not tell?<page>Ours is the ancient line and honoured role. These docks and lands around are fortunate to have our skills.<hpage>If you are as talented as you suggest, would you lend me your aid? I’ve lacked for my usual tools, and I suspect you could craft fine replacements.<page>Blades and traps, no doubt? We know your type!<hpage>Of sorts, but maybe strange to this land? Some would likely prove fine challenge for your craft.<page>Hmph! Then we’ll construct them. But! You’ll provide the materials, and compensation for our time.
original_zh_text: 铁匠？太掉价了！我们可是熔炉之女！你竟然不认识我们？我们祖传的手艺让整个深坞都沾光！<hpage>若你们的技艺真如你所夸耀那样好，可否帮我个忙？我的一些工具没有了，我想你们应该能打造合用的替代品。<page>要做刺针还是陷阱？你这种客人我见多了！<hpage>有些可能是你没见过的款式，对你们的工艺应该是不小的挑战。<page>哼！那咱就造出来给你看。但材料你得自备，工钱也得结清。
translated_text: How about Smith? Not too popular. We are the children of creation. Why can't I see insects?<page>Our journey is an ancient journey, a document of honor. This port and the surrounding land are our experience.<hpage>If you have this talent, can you help me? Due to the lack of universal tools, we were unable to find a good replacement.<page>Trap in Latvia Do you know my boyfriend?<hpage>Is this rare in our country? Some of them created serious problems in the process.<page>Oh, my God! But I will! They reward us with our equipment and time.
secondary_translated_text: 史密斯怎么样？不太受欢迎。我们是创世之子。为什么我看不到昆虫？<page>我们的旅程是一次古老的旅程，是一份荣誉的文件。这个港口和周围的土地是我们的经验。<hpage>如果你有这个天赋，你能帮助我吗？由于缺乏通用工具，我们无法找到好的替代品。<page>拉脱维亚的陷阱你认识我男朋友吗？<hpage>这在我们国家很少见吗？其中一些人在这个过程中造成了严重的问题。<page>天哪！但我会的！他们用我们的设备和时间奖励我们。

original_en_text: Ola, ola, time to play! Take these straight pins and strike the target when you see it!<page>If you can strike the target twenty-five times, the prize is yours!
original_zh_text: 哎哎，游戏要开始咯！拿好这些掷针，见靶就扎！<page>击中靶子二十五次，奖品就是您的！
translated_text: Hey, it's time to play! When you see the target, grab the nail directly and hit it!<page>If you reach your goal 25 times, the prize is yours!
secondary_translated_text: 嘿，该玩了！当你看到目标时，直接抓住钉子并击中它！<page>如果您实现目标25次，奖品就是您的！

original_en_text: Well, perhaps that’s enough games for now, eh?<page>We’ll need to come up with a much trickier challenge to best you, my lady!
original_zh_text: 好吧，我想就先玩到这里为止？<page>我们得琢磨个更刁钻的挑战才能赢过您，女士！
translated_text: This game is enough, right? What are you doing?<page>You will have to face more difficult tasks to defeat yourself. "
secondary_translated_text: 这个游戏已经够了吧？你在干什么？<page>你将不得不面对更困难的任务来击败自己。"

original_en_text: This world may not have long, but we shall face its end still delivering our duty.
original_zh_text: 这世界或许时日无多，但咱就算直面末日也要把活干完。
translated_text: Peace may not last long, but we will take responsibility and take responsibility.
secondary_translated_text: 和平可能不会持续太久，但我们会承担责任，承担责任。

original_en_text: To maintain one’s tools is a constant task. These shards should be kept close when you travel, that you can repair and replenish as the need arises.
original_zh_text: 保养工具需要持之以恒。旅程中应当随身携带这些碎片，以便随时进行修理和补充。
translated_text: Since maintenance of equipment is a continuous task, when necessary, keep it nearby during repair and delivery.
secondary_translated_text: 由于设备的维护是一项持续的任务，因此必要时在维修和交付期间将其放在附近。

original_en_text: Pop inside the diving bell once you’re feelin’ good and ready. In the meantime, I’ll get to seeing things set up here.
original_zh_text: 这是这个大铁肚子的钥匙。等你准备好了就钻进去。我这就去把装置整备妥当。
translated_text: When you feel good and ready, you can jump on the diving bell.
secondary_translated_text: 当您感觉良好并准备好时，您可以跳上潜水钟。

original_en_text: A vicious stabbing trap? We can build it. Just know, it disturbs us, these devious implements you conceive to kill.
original_zh_text: 带尖刃的陷阱是吧？能造。但你得知道，我们可不喜欢鼓捣这些阴险的杀戮工具。
translated_text: Bad wound? I know you will anger us with the invisible tools you want to kill.
secondary_translated_text: 伤口不好？我知道你会用你想杀死的隐形工具激怒我们。

original_en_text: Ola, ola! Welcome, my lady, so glad you found us here! I can see you’re blessed with strong limbs and keen sight.<page>Fond of frolics are you? Keen to test your aim? We’d be right honoured to play a little game with you. A little test of skill we’ve set up.<hpage>I’ve no need to test my skills, sir, nor do I have time for frivolities.<page>Oh, but we’d make it worth your while! A prize awaits you, if you can meet our challenge!<hpage>If you offer a prize, that changes matters. I can meet any challenge if the reward is sufficient. What are the rules of your game?<page>Exceedingly simple, my lady! I’ll provide the pins for throwing, and my associate will provide a target. Hit the target fifteen times and you’ll earn yourself a worthy prize!
original_zh_text: 哎哎！欢迎大驾光临！真高兴您找到这儿！一看您就是肢强目锐的虫。<page>喜欢玩游戏吗？要不要来试试准头？我们设计了个小游戏，可以考验您的技巧。<hpage>先生，我无需试炼技艺，更无空闲嬉闹。<page>别呀！奖品丰厚着呢！只要完成挑战，奖品就是您的！<hpage>既然有奖品，倒可以尝试。只要奖励足够丰厚，任何挑战都能接受。游戏规则是什么？<page>简单至极！我将为您提供掷针，我的伙计会提供靶子。击中靶子十五次，奖品就归您了！
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. Welcome, I'm so glad you found us! He has strong arms and legs and good vision.<page>Do you like playing with it? Want to see your goals? I am honored to play with him. We will conduct a competency test.<hpage>You don't need to test your skills, you don't have time to learn your intelligence.<page>But we deserve it. If you accept the challenge, you will be rewarded!<hpage>If I win, everything will change. If there is a reward, the challenge is not important. What are your rules of the game?<page>It's simple, girl. I will provide the launcher and my partner will provide the target. Hit the target 15 times and you will receive a valuable reward!
secondary_translated_text: 嘿嘿。欢迎，我很高兴你找到了我们！他有强壮的四肢和良好的视力。<page>你喜欢玩它吗？想看看你的目标吗？我很荣幸能和他一起打球。我们将进行能力测试。<hpage>你不需要测试你的技能，你没有时间学习你的智力。<page>但我们应得的。如果你接受挑战，你就会得到回报！<hpage>如果我赢了，一切都会改变。如果有奖励，挑战并不重要。你的游戏规则是什么？<page>很简单，女孩。我将提供发射器，我的合作伙伴将提供目标。击中目标15次，您将获得宝贵奖励！

original_en_text: A heavy door chained with a simple padlock.
original_zh_text: 一扇厚重的门扉，挂着一只简易挂锁。
translated_text: The heavy door was closed with a simple lock.
secondary_translated_text: 沉重的门用一把简单的锁关上。

original_en_text: <hpage>This bell could carry me below, but it will first require a key, and an operator to aid its descent.<hpage>I cannot complete this task alone. Someone upon these docks will have to assist me.
original_zh_text: <hpage>此钟可载我下沉，但需要钥匙开启，还需要操作员协助下潜。<hpage>我自己难以达成此事，需要得到码头上某位清醒者的帮助。
translated_text: <hpage>You may fall on this watch, but first, the key and operator will help you remove them.<hpage>You can't do it alone." The people on the island will help us.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>您可能会掉在这款手表上，但首先，钥匙和操作员会帮助您将它们取下。<hpage>你一个人做不到。“岛上的人民会帮助我们。

original_en_text: Oi! What’s with all these tremors? This smelt still need shovelling, and the shakes’re only making it harder.
original_zh_text: 啊喂！这震天动地的，到底是怎么回事？晃荡个没完，还让不让干活了？
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. Why are you shaking so much? "Also, pumpkins require shovels, so mixing the pumpkin makes it harder to taste.
secondary_translated_text: 嘿嘿。你为什么抖得这么厉害？“而且，南瓜需要铲子，所以混合南瓜会更难品尝。

original_en_text: <hpage>Though tied by charge, would you provide me your service, Forge Daughter? I have need of tools that your skills could likely provide.<page>Blades and traps, no doubt? We know your type!<hpage>Of sorts, but maybe strange to this land? Some would likely prove fine challenge for your craft.<page>Hmph! Then we’ll construct them. But! You’ll provide the materials, and compensation for our time.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，你们虽有使命在身，但可否为我打造些工具？你们的手艺应该能胜任。<page>要做刺针还是陷阱？你这种客人我见多了！<hpage>差不多，有些可能是你们没见过的款式，对你们的工艺应该是不小的挑战。<page>哼！那咱就造出来给你看。但材料你得自备，工钱也得结清。
translated_text: <hpage>Would you provide services to deceive your daughter at a limited cost? You need tools to develop your skills.<page>Trap in Latvia Do you know my boyfriend?<hpage>Is this rare in our country? Some of them created serious problems in the process.<page>Oh, my God! But I will! They reward us with our equipment and time.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>您会以有限的费用提供欺骗您女儿的服务吗？您需要工具来发展您的技能。<page>拉脱维亚的陷阱你认识我男朋友吗？<hpage>这在我们国家很少见吗？其中一些人在这个过程中造成了严重的问题。<page>天哪！但我会的！他们用我们的设备和时间奖励我们。

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I need to return above. Please ready the bell for me.<page>Aye, miss. Sit on the bench, and let’s get you hauled up.
original_zh_text: <hpage>巴洛先生，我需要返回地面。请准备上浮。<page>好嘞，小姐。坐稳扶牢，这就把你拽上来。
translated_text: <hpage>I have to go back. Press the bell.<page>She sat on the bench to help them.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我得回去按门铃<page>她坐在长凳上帮助他们。

original_en_text: Quite a lot of targets struck, and quite a lot of rosaries earned! Our lady never fails to impress us!
original_zh_text: 击中了非常多目标，念珠赚得盆满钵满！女士，您总能让我们大开眼界！
translated_text: He scored a lot of goals and got a lot of roses! Women always have painful feelings.
secondary_translated_text: 他进了很多球，得到了很多玫瑰！女人总是有痛苦的感觉。

original_en_text: Ola, ola! Have to stop you there. That’s three times now you’ve missed your mark! I’m afraid that makes you the loser of our little game, with all due respect.<page>Fret not though, for we never tire of playing! Step over here, and we can start another game.
original_zh_text: 哎哎！得叫停啦。您已脱靶三次！恕我直言，这局算您输。<page>没关系，我们的游戏永远欢迎您！请移步这边来，我们再开一局。
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. You have to give up, you lost three times! "Sorry, we will lose a small game.<page>Don't worry, you'll never get bored! Once you arrive, you can start a new game.
secondary_translated_text: 嘿嘿。你必须放弃，你输了三次！“抱歉，我们会输掉一场小比赛。<page>别担心，你永远不会感到无聊！到达后，您可以开始新游戏。

translated_text: Cancel the price increase?

original_en_text: This trinket is our own invention. It wards against the deadly lava and heat around these docks. The workers used to request them of us. Now they’ve lost the mind to care.
original_zh_text: 这宝贝可是我们的独家发明，可以用来抵御深坞致命的熔岩与高温。往日工虫们争相求购，如今它们却连心智都已涣散。
translated_text: Decoration is an invention. They endured the deadly lava and the heat near this coast. The staff asked me over and over again. He lost interest, I think.
secondary_translated_text: 装饰是一项发明。他们忍受着海岸附近致命的熔岩和高温。工作人员一遍又一遍地问我。我想他失去了兴趣。

original_en_text: Farewell, then. If you require our craft, this forge is always hot.
original_zh_text: 慢走不送，需要造东西的话随时过来。
translated_text: Goodbye If you need our process, this stove is always hot.
secondary_translated_text: 再见如果您需要我们的流程，这个炉子总是热的。

original_en_text: The new shell-shield’s all bolted on tight, miss. If you’re planning another descent, head down, holler, and I’ll get you where you’re goin’.
original_zh_text: 我把新护壳加固得很严实，小姐。如果你打算再下潜一次，就下来喊一声，我会帮你启程。
translated_text: New boxes and shields will be locked, and when you fall again, wash your hair and shout.
secondary_translated_text: 新的盒子和盾牌会被锁上，当你再次跌倒时，洗头发并大喊。

original_en_text: <hpage>The behaviour of your fellow workers, I’ve seen similar... agitation upon the roads. These docks are not alone in the strangeness of their occupants.<page>’Tis odd behaviour to be sure, but not for Ballow and us to know. Ours is busy work, and we keep to ourselves.<page>Whatever the goings on of the world outside, no bother to us, as long as our craft can continue.
original_zh_text: <hpage>你同僚的这般行径，我在路上也见过类似的……狂躁。这码头的住民并非孤例。<page>这种行为确实奇怪，但我们和巴洛可懒得深究。我们只管埋头干活，少管闲事。<page>外头天塌地陷都与我们无关，只要这门锻造手艺能传下去就行。
translated_text: <hpage>I saw similar behavior among his colleagues and was shocked on the street that the port was not the only place locals didn't know about.<page>It was a very strange behavior, but neither Barrow nor I knew about it. "I'm too busy to take care of you. "<page>No matter what happens, as long as our ship continues, we will not interfere with it.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我在他的同事中看到了类似的行为，并在街上感到震惊，因为港口并不是当地人唯一不知道的地方。<page>这是一种非常奇怪的行为，但巴罗和我都不知道。“我太忙了，没时间照顾你。"<page>无论发生什么，只要我们的船还在，我们就不会干涉它。

original_en_text: <hpage>How did you come to serve these docks, Forge Daughter?<page>Sent from our Forgehome we were, at request of those holy bugs above.<hpage>The Citadel dwellers? The veiled bugs? They ordered you here?<page>Yes! An age ago that. Such is duty! We Forge Daughters live to hone the craft, and aid the line.<page>By the Citadel’s patronage, and our long duty upon these docks, our Forgehome would swell in holy esteem.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，你们为何来此码头效力？<page>是上头那些圣虫召我们来的，我们在熔炉乡收到了调令。<hpage>圣堡的住民？那些覆面虫？是他们下令调遣你们来这儿的？<page>正是！都是陈年旧事了。职责所在嘛！我们熔炉之女活着就为磨砺手艺，延续传承。<page>靠着圣堡的庇佑和在这些码头长年累月的苦工，熔炉乡的名望自会愈发神圣。
translated_text: <hpage>How did he get to the port?<page>At the request of the aforementioned sacred insect, we were kicked out of Vogel's house.<hpage>Who are the residents of your city? Hidden mistakes? Are you here on orders?<page>Oh, yes! Oh, yes! We helped our daughter build her life, improve her skills, and build a production line.<page>Over the years, with the protection of the castle and the responsibility of these ports, our captains have been treated with sacred respect.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>他是如何到达港口的？<page>应上述神圣昆虫的要求，我们被赶出了沃格尔的家。<hpage>谁是您所在城市的居民？隐藏的错误？你是奉命来的吗？<page>哦，是的！哦，是的！我们帮助女儿建设生活，提高技能，建造生产线。<page>多年来，在城堡的保护和这些港口的责任下，我们的船长受到了神圣的尊重。

original_en_text: <hpage>I’d expected this workshop too would contain only combative types, but you seem composed, Forge Daughter.<page>You’ve met the workers? They’re all wound up! They still work at their tasks, in a simple way, but they’re useless for conversation. It’s only ourselves and young Ballow with any sense left.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我原以为这工坊里全是些好斗之徒，但你们倒是沉着清醒，熔炉之女。<page>见过那些工虫没？个个跟上了发条似的！它们没日没夜机械式地干活，但早就不会聊天了。如今只剩咱和那边的巴洛还保留着些清醒。
translated_text: <hpage>I thought this seminar was for aggressive people, but it was very quiet and helped me raise my daughter.<page>Do you see the workers? Everyone is very nervous! It was always easy to do homework at home, but for whatever reason, it was only young Barrow and I who were not helpful in the conversation.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我以为这个研讨会是为好斗的人举办的，但它非常安静，帮助我抚养了我的女儿。<page>你看到工人了吗？大家都很紧张！在家做作业总是很容易，但无论出于何种原因，只有年轻的巴罗和我在谈话中没有提供帮助。

original_en_text: Miss! Errr... Ullo... I see you’ve survived... somehow... Thought that last plunge must’a been your end.<hpage>It was not. I survived the fall, and managed a treacherous return.<hpage>For the diving bell’s failure, the risks were clear to me. The fault lies not with you.<page>Aye! As you say! This bell’s old. And time has a way of breaking things even as fine forged as this.<page>And see below, for its failure I’ve been workin’ hard at improving the design! Your last journey ended up being a valuable test... ahem.<hpage>Good. That return path is long closed to me, and your bell is now needed again.<page>Again? We’ll if you’re game enough to try a second time... A shell-shield’s been fitted, and the bell’s like new. Better’n new!<page>If you’re planning another descent, head down, holler, and I’ll get you goin’.
original_zh_text: 小姐！呃……那个……你居然还活着……真行啊……我以为那趟下潜准要了你的命。<hpage>还好，坠落时侥幸生还，又爬过险路回来。<hpage>潜钟故障本在意料之中，错不在你。<page>没错！你说得对！这钟老掉牙了。再好的锻造也经不起岁月折腾。<page>你瞧，因为这次事故，我已经在改进设计了！权当这回是一次有价值的测试……咳。<hpage>很好。从湖底回来的路已经行不通了，若我再次下潜仍需用到此钟。<page>还来？你要真有胆量再试……护壳已经装好了。现在这只潜钟跟全新的一样！不，比新的还强！<page>如果你打算再下潜一次，就下来喊一声，我会帮你启程。
translated_text: Yes, Missy. Yes, yes, yes... ... How did he survive? The last jump was his end.<hpage>I survived the accident and returned to my adventure.<hpage>I can understand the malfunction of the water meter.<page>Oh, yes! Oh, yes! Just as you said! "Time will find a way to break down what is done well. "<page>Please see the content below. When we fail, we try to improve our design! The last trip was a very valuable experience.<hpage>Well, well, my road has been closed for a long time, so I need your servant.<page>Here again? If I had a second try, I would. After the lid is closed, the bell is new. The best update!<page>When you come down again, lower your head and scream. If you do this, I'll take you on the street.
secondary_translated_text: 是的，米西。是的，是的，是的……...他是如何活下来的？最后一跳是他的终点。<hpage>我从事故中幸存下来，继续我的冒险。<hpage>我能理解水表的故障。<page>哦，是的！哦，是的！正如你所说！“时间会找到一种方法来分解做得好的事情。"<page>请参阅下面的内容。当我们失败时，我们会尝试改进我们的设计！最后一次旅行是一次非常宝贵的经历。<hpage>好吧，好吧，我的路已经封闭很长时间了，所以我需要你的仆人。<page>又在这里？如果我再试一次，我会的。盖上盖子后，铃就是新的。最好的更新！<page>当你再次下来时，低下头尖叫。如果你这样做，我就带你上街。

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I am ready. Please prepare the bell for departure.<page>S’time to take the plunge, aye, miss? Just sit on the bench, and I’ll see you strapped in tight.
original_zh_text: <hpage>巴洛先生，我已就绪。请准备下潜。<page>好嘞，小姐，跳水时间到了。在椅子上坐稳，我来给你捆严实咯。
translated_text: <hpage>I'm ready, I'm ready.<page>Now is the time to take a risk, isn't it? What are you doing? He was sitting on a bench, seemingly tied tightly.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我准备好了，我准备好了。<page>现在是冒险的时候了，不是吗？你在干什么？他坐在长凳上，看起来绑得很紧。

original_en_text: An old mechanism with a keyhole.
original_zh_text: 一个带钥匙孔的老旧机关。
translated_text: Old equipment with closed holes.

original_en_text: It’s done, miss! I’ve fitted the shell-shield. Bell’s like new. Better’n new even!<page>If you’re planning another descent, head down, holler, and I’ll get you goin’.<hpage>Your work is appreciated, sir. Know that, with luck, the threat from below might soon be quelled, and your lands shall rest calm.<page>Well... Good! I’m only really wishin’ to return to the forge, and my regular duties... A little purpose, routine...<page>Frankly, miss, all this action’s more’n a bit overwhelming for bugs like me. I’ll be glad when it’s all over... Providing we survive, of course.
original_zh_text: 搞定啦小姐！护壳装好了。现在这只潜钟跟全新的一样！不，比新的还强！<page>如果你打算再下潜一次，就下来喊一声，我会帮你启程。<hpage>辛苦你了。若是运气好，下面的威胁很快便会平息，此地也能重回安宁。<page>那敢情好！我只盼着早日回熔炉干回老本行……有点奔头，按部就班……<page>说真的，小姐，这种大场面对我这种小虫子来说太刺激了。等这一切都结束后，我们……当然，前提是我们能活下来。
translated_text: It's over, girl! I wear a shield, and the new bells are new, new and better.<page>When you come down again, lower your head and scream. If you do this, I will take you off the street.<hpage>If you are lucky, potential threats will soon be eliminated and your land may become peaceful.<page>Well, back to the Big Bang, I want to do my routine. Small path, small path.<page>To be honest, sir, it's all a bit far away for an insect like me. Survival is a prerequisite.
secondary_translated_text: 结束了，女孩！我戴着盾牌，新的钟声又新又新，更好。<page>当你再次下来时，低下头尖叫。如果你这样做，我就把你从街上带走。<hpage>如果你幸运的话，潜在的威胁很快就会被消除，你的土地可能会变得和平。<page>好吧，回到大爆炸，我想做我的例行公事。小路，小路。<page>说实话，先生，对于像我这样的昆虫来说，这一切都有点遥远。生存是先决条件。

original_en_text: Miss! Errr... Ullo... I see you’ve survived... somehow... Thought that drop must’a been your end.<hpage>It was not. I survived the fall, and managed a treacherous return.<hpage>For the diving bell’s failure, the risks were clear to me. The fault lies not with you.<page>Aye! As you say! This bell’s old. And time has a way of breaking things even as fine forged as this.<page>And you can see here, for its failure I’d already been workin’ at improving the design! Ended up being a useful test... ahem.<hpage>Good. That return path is now closed to me, and your bell may still be needed if I choose to descend again.<page>Again? Well, if you’re game enough to try a second time...Once this new shield-shell is fitted, it’ll surely withstand the drop!.. Surely!
original_zh_text: 小姐！呃……那个……你居然还活着……真行啊……我以为那趟下潜准要了你的命。<hpage>还好，坠落时侥幸生还，又爬过险路回来。<hpage>潜钟故障本在意料之中，错不在你。<page>没错！你说得对！这钟老掉牙了。再好的锻造也经不起岁月折腾。<page>你瞧，因为这次事故，我已经在改进设计了！权当这回是一次有价值的测试……咳。<hpage>很好。从湖底回来的路已经行不通了，若我再次下潜仍需用到此钟。<page>还来？你要真有胆量再试……等新护壳装好，保准能扛住下坠！绝对没问题！
translated_text: Yes, Missy. Yes, yes, yes. They survived." One drop, I think, anyway, it's over.<hpage>I survived the accident and returned to my adventure.<hpage>I can understand the malfunction of the water meter.<page>Oh, yes! Oh, yes! Just as you said! "Time will find a way to break down what is done well. "<page>As you can see, our project has failed, so we are working hard to improve it! This is a useful test. Are you coughing?<hpage>Everything is fine, everything is fine, the return is over. If you decide to go down again, you may still need a bell.<page>Here again? If you want to try again, once installed, this new protective cover will never fall off! Yeah, no!
secondary_translated_text: 是的，米西。是的，是的。他们活了下来。“我想，一滴，无论如何，就结束了。<hpage>我从事故中幸存下来，继续我的冒险。<hpage>我能理解水表的故障。<page>哦，是的！哦，是的！正如你所说！“时间会找到一种方法来分解做得好的事情。"<page>如您所见，我们的项目失败了，所以我们正在努力改进！这是一个有用的测试。你咳嗽吗？<hpage>一切都好，一切都好，回归结束了。如果您决定再次下去，您可能仍然需要一个铃。<page>又在这里？如果您想再试一次，安装后，这个新的保护套永远不会脱落!是的，不!

original_en_text: A smith? Hardly so crude! We are Forge Daughter! How can a pointy bug not tell?<page>Ours is the ancient line and honoured role. These docks and lands around are fortunate to have our skills.<hpage>If you are as talented as you suggest, would you lend me your aid? I’ve lacked for my usual tools, and I suspect you could craft fine replacements.<page>Blades and traps, no doubt? We know your type!<hpage>Of sorts, but maybe strange to this land? Some would likely prove fine challenge for your craft.<page>Hmph! Then soon, yes! I may accept. But not now! Now there is much work to be done, and we cannot afford to be bothered so.
original_zh_text: 铁匠？太掉价了！我们可是熔炉之女！你竟然不认识我们？我们祖传的手艺让整个深坞都沾光！<hpage>若你们的技艺真如你所夸耀那样好，可否帮我个忙？我的一些工具没有了，我想你们应该能打造合用的替代品。<page>要做刺针还是陷阱？你这种客人我见多了！<hpage>有些可能是你没见过的款式，对你们的工艺应该是不小的挑战。<page>哼！那行，你过阵子再来！咱会造出来给你看！这会儿活儿太多，咱忙不过来！
translated_text: How about Smith? Not too popular. We are the children of creation. Why can't I see insects?<page>Our journey is an ancient journey, a document of honor. This port and the surrounding land are our experience.<hpage>If you have this talent, can you help me? Due to the lack of universal tools, we were unable to find a good replacement.<page>Trap in Latvia Do you know my boyfriend?<hpage>Is this rare in our country? Some of them created serious problems in the process.<page>Oh, my God! Yes, now! I was recognized, but not now. We have a lot of work to do, so we don't have to worry.
secondary_translated_text: 史密斯怎么样？不太受欢迎。我们是创世之子。为什么我看不到昆虫？<page>我们的旅程是一次古老的旅程，是一份荣誉的文件。这个港口和周围的土地是我们的经验。<hpage>如果你有这个天赋，你能帮助我吗？由于缺乏通用工具，我们无法找到好的替代品。<page>拉脱维亚的陷阱你认识我男朋友吗？<hpage>这在我们国家很少见吗？其中一些人在这个过程中造成了严重的问题。<page>天哪!是的，现在!我被认出了，但不是现在。我们有很多工作要做，所以我们不必担心。

original_en_text: Oh! Small pointy bug, why do you bother this Forge Daughter at their work?<hpage>These black quakes that wrack your lands, I am seeking to see them quelled at their source, below the lakes of flame.<page>You would wish to descend so deep?... It is true these docks possess the means. Alas, we ourselves cannot help. Whether Pharoom’s health or fall, our charge ties us to this forge, always.<page>Ballow there’s the bug to ask, and if our fate is as dire as your action suggests, we are sure he is only needing of some quick convincing.
original_zh_text: 嘿！小尖头虫，干嘛打扰我们熔炉之女干活？<hpage><hpage>如今黑灾震动大地，我想深入熔岩湖之底，将其从源头平息。<page> 小尖头虫，你想潜那么深？……码头那边倒是有法子能办到。<page>唉，可惜咱帮不上忙。不管纺络是死是活，咱都得守着这熔炉。<page> 去找码头那边的巴洛吧。若局势真如你所说那般危急，你随便吓唬两句他就会服软。
translated_text: Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Bug, why are you interfering in business?<hpage>These black earthquakes have destroyed your land, and you want to see them disappear from the fountains under the lake of fire.<page>Why not jump deeper? There is a solution for these ports, but we cannot solve it alone. Whether we are a healthy company or a dead company, our responsibility always lies with this model.<page>I think Barrow has doubts that if our destiny is terrible, we must determine it immediately, as his actions imply.
secondary_translated_text: 哦!哦!哦!哦!哦!哦!哦!哦! Bug，你为什么干预生意？<hpage>这些黑色地震摧毁了你的土地，你希望看到它们从火湖下的喷泉中消失。<page>为什么不跳得更深呢？这些港口有一个解决方案，但我们无法单独解决。无论我们是一家健康的公司还是一家死去的公司，我们的责任始终在于这种模式。<page>我认为巴罗怀疑，如果我们的命运很可怕，我们就必须立即决定它，正如他的行为所暗示的那样。

original_en_text: Return later, pointy bug! Now there is much work to be done, and we cannot afford to be bothered so.
original_zh_text: 过阵子再来，小尖头虫！眼下正忙着呢，少添乱！
translated_text: "I will be back, honey. We have a lot of work to do, so we don't have to worry.
secondary_translated_text: “我会回来的，亲爱的。我们有很多工作要做，所以我们不必担心。

original_en_text: <hpage>Forge Daughter, I have acquired a power that will enable me to end this black madness. Soon I will act to stop the quakes and save this land.<page>Excellent, pointy bug. Your drive, and your vigour, both have proven surprisingly large for one so small.<page>We shall remain here, still. If our service can aid your critical task, know we will continue to provide it gladly.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，我已获得终结黑灾的力量。很快便将行动，平息震动，拯救此地。<page>干得好，小尖头虫。你这小身板里的劲头倒是大得出奇。<page>咱还会守在这儿。若咱这手艺能助你成事，尽管开口便是。
translated_text: <hpage>Thanks to my daughter's training, I have the ability to end this black madness. We will take immediate action to prevent earthquakes and save the planet.<page>For such a small person, I found their energy, and the energy was unbelievably huge.<page>If our services can help you complete important work, we will be happy to continue to help you.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>多亏了我女儿的训练，我才有能力结束这场黑色的疯狂。我们将立即采取行动，防止地震，拯救地球。<page>对于这么小的一个人，我找到了他们的能量，而且能量是令人难以置信的巨大。<page>如果我们的服务可以帮助您完成重要工作，我们很乐意继续帮助您。

original_en_text: <hpage>Stay safe, Forge Daughter. If I require your aid, I shall return.<page>Our wishes go with you, pointy bug. Calm the raging of our world, that our task can continue.
original_zh_text: <hpage>保重，熔炉之女。若是需要帮助，我自会再来。<page>祝你好运，小尖头虫。平息这外头的狂乱，咱才能继续安心干活。
translated_text: <hpage>If I really need help raising my daughter, I will come back.<page>Mr. Sharpberg, I wish you all the best. Our mission can only continue if it stops the destruction of the world.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>如果我真的需要帮助抚养女儿，我会回来的。<page>夏普伯格先生，我祝你一切顺利。只有阻止世界的破坏，我们的使命才能继续下去。

original_en_text: <hpage>These controls are complex. If I’m to descend within the bell below, I will first require an operator.<hpage>Someone upon these docks will have to assist me.
original_zh_text: <hpage>此操控装置颇为复杂。若想要乘潜钟下潜，需要有操作员协助。<hpage>需要得到码头上某位清醒者的帮助。
translated_text: <hpage>If you want to go under the doorbell, you need an operator first.<hpage>The Port Authority will help you.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>如果你想按门铃，你首先需要接线员。<hpage>港务局会帮助您。

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I wish to depart. Please ready the bell for travel.<page>Sure thing, miss. Sit on the bench, and I’ll send you down.
original_zh_text: <hpage>巴洛先生，我可以出发了。请整备好潜钟。<page>好嘞，小姐。在椅子上坐稳，我这就送您下潜。
translated_text: <hpage>I want to leave, but please pack your bags.<page>"Okay, ma 'am, sit on the bench. I'm going to hit you.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我想离开，但请收拾好行李。<page>“好吧，女士，坐在长凳上。我要打你。

original_en_text: Interested in our little game, my lady?<page>If you can hit the target fifteen times you’ll earn yourself a worthy prize!
original_zh_text: 对我们的小游戏感兴趣吗，女士？<page>击中靶子十五次，奖品就归您了！
translated_text: Are you interested in our games?<page>If you reach the goal 15 times, you will win a prize!
secondary_translated_text: 您对我们的游戏感兴趣吗？<page>如果您达到目标15次，您将获奖！

original_en_text: Oh! Pointy bug, you return? Our world cracks and cries from some grave new calamity.<page>Nevertheless, we must remain, fixed to this forge and its service. Ours is a duty lifetime bound.
original_zh_text: <page>嘿！小尖头虫，你回来了？外面又闹起什么灾祸，搞得哭天抢地的。<page>不过无所谓，咱还得守着熔炉干活。使命在身，至死方休。
translated_text: Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Smith: Are you back? Our world has been destroyed and we face another serious disaster.<page>But we must continue to support this factory and its services.
secondary_translated_text: 哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！史密斯：你回来了吗？我们的世界已经被摧毁，我们面临着另一场严重的灾难。<page>但我们必须继续支持这家工厂及其服务。

original_en_text: If you need something, talk to the boss. I’m busy.
original_zh_text: 有事找老板说去。我正忙着呢。
translated_text: If you need anything, contact your boss. I'm very busy.
secondary_translated_text: 如果您需要任何东西，请联系您的老板。我很忙。

original_en_text: A control panel with various levers and gauges.
original_zh_text: 布满操纵杆与仪表的控制台。
translated_text: Control panel for multiple obstacles and tools.
secondary_translated_text: 多个障碍物和工具的控制面板。

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I have need to head below the lakes of flame.<hpage>There is a diving bell at the base of this structure that seemed fit for the task. I require it opened, and an operator to send it deep.<hpage>As one of few upon these docks with mind still sound, that role must fall to you.<page>Can’t you see I’m busy, miss? Ain’t got time for naught else while the shovelling needs doing.<hpage>Choose to aid me, or all your efforts will soon be wasted. This kingdom crumbles. Its collapse is inevitable. If you wish for your work, and your life to continue, you must help me, now.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，我需要潜入熔岩湖之下。<hpage>此建筑底部有座潜钟可用。我需要把它打开，并有个操作员送我下沉。<hpage>如今码头清醒者寥寥无几，此事只能由你来办。<page>没看我正忙吗，小姐？眼下铲矿石的活还干不完呢。<hpage>这王国正在崩塌，覆灭无可避免。你不帮我，就等着一切辛劳付诸东流。若你还想活命，还想每天有活干，就立刻帮我。
translated_text: <hpage>I want to go to the lake of fire.<hpage>There is an underwater watch at the bottom of the design that looks great for work. Let the operator open it and push it deep.<hpage>This letter falls on you as one of the people who thought of us in this port.<page>Don't you think I'm busy? When you dig into the ground, you don't have time to do anything else.<hpage>If you don't help me, your efforts will soon be in vain. The kingdom collapsed. Collapse seems inevitable. If you want to continue your work and life, you must help me now.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我想去火湖。<hpage>设计底部有一块水下手表，看起来非常适合工作。让操作员打开它并将其推入深处。<hpage>这封信是写给您的，您是在这个港口想到我们的人之一。<page>你不觉得我很忙吗？当你挖到地下时，你没有时间做其他事情。<hpage>如果你不帮我，你的努力很快就会白费。王国崩溃了。崩溃似乎不可避免。如果你想继续你的工作和生活，你现在必须帮助我。

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I have need to head below the lakes of flame. Can you aid me in this task?<hpage><page>Hmmm... Well if you head down below to the very base of the docks, there’s an old diving bell built for just what you’re askin’. <page>Thing is, you can ride it, but it takes an operator stood dockside to send it. I might be capable, but I ain’t got time for naught else while the shovelling still needs doing.<hpage>Choose to aid me, sir, or all your efforts will soon be wasted. This kingdom crumbles. If you wish for your work, and your life to continue, you must help me, now.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，先生，我需要潜入熔岩湖之下。能否请你助我一臂之力？<hpage><page>唔……如果您是往深坞最底层去，那边倒是有口老潜钟专门干这活的。<page>可这玩意儿需要有另一只虫在地面操作才能下水。我虽然会弄，但眼下铲矿石的活儿堆成山，实在没闲工夫管别的啊。<hpage>这王国正在崩塌。你不帮我，就等着一切辛劳付诸东流。若你还想活命，还想每天有活干，就立刻帮我。
translated_text: <hpage>"I want to go to Fire Lake. Can you help me?”"<hpage><page>Yes, yes, yes... ... When you get down to the bottom of the dock, you will find an ancient underwater watch made specifically for anything you want.<page>The problem is that it can be installed, but it has to be sent by an operator on the dock. I can, but I don't have time to do anything else.<hpage>If you want to keep your job, I have to help you now.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>“我想去火湖。你能帮助我吗？”"<hpage><page>是的，是的，是的……...当您走到码头底部时，您会发现一块专门为您想要的任何东西制作的古老水下手表。<page>问题是它可以安装，但必须由码头上的操作员发送。我可以，但我没有时间做其他事情。<hpage>如果你想保住工作，我现在就必须帮助你。

translated_text: Are you ready for the challenge?
secondary_translated_text: 你准备好迎接挑战了吗？

original_en_text: Oi! Who’sat? Whoever’s down there, if you’re feelin’ mad enough to try and travel, best meet me up at the controls, and we can chat.
original_zh_text: 喂！谁在那儿？不管你是谁，如果想要下潜，最好来操控台找我聊聊。
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. Who's sitting? No matter who you are, if you're angry and want to travel, let me wait on the console to talk to you.
secondary_translated_text: 嘿嘿。谁坐着？无论你是谁，如果你生气并想旅行，让我在控制台上等着和你说话。

original_en_text: Well. Well. Still alive! You have proved yourself made of the hardiest stuff, pointy bug.<page>Ballow did tell, shamefully, of complications with your diving bell, and of your absence upon its retrieval.<page>He had feared you lost to the flame, but we ourself had slight guessed otherwise.<hpage>To return from below proved as difficult a climb as ever I have faced, and yet, in time near, I will need to descend again.<page>Then twice mad you are, bug! Or brave beyond measure. We shall wish on your continued survival, even if you seem intent on ending it.
original_zh_text: 啊哈！瞧瞧这是谁还生龙活虎的！小尖头虫，你可真是命硬。<page>巴洛支支吾吾地交代了潜钟的意外——打捞起来后，你已经不见了。<page>他以为你被火焰吞噬了，但咱倒隐约觉得不然。<hpage>从底下爬回来确实是个不小的挑战，但很快我又得再下去一趟了。<page>哈！？你这虫子，不是疯到顶了就是勇到没边了！尽管你像在自寻死路，咱还是祝你多活些时日。
translated_text: Well, well, he's still alive, and he shows you the most difficult things you can do.<page>Barlow apologized for the complexity and loss of the underwater watch.<page>He was afraid of being trapped in the fire, but let me guess.<hpage>Coming back from the bottom was the most difficult climb in history, but in the near future we will have to climb again.<page>"You're crazy, Bob. She was also brave. Although I want this to end, I want it to continue.
secondary_translated_text: 好吧，好吧，他还活着，他向你展示了你能做的最困难的事情。<page>巴洛为水下手表的复杂性和损失道歉。<page>他害怕被困在火里，但让我猜猜。<hpage>从底部回来是历史上最困难的攀登，但在不久的将来我们将不得不再次攀登。<page>“你疯了，鲍勃。她也很勇敢。虽然我希望这一切结束，但我希望它继续下去。

original_en_text: The frolics haven’t ended, my lady! If you’d like to really test yourself, we should play again!<page>Hit the target twenty-five times and you’ll earn yourself a beautiful necklace of rosaries! What say you?
original_zh_text: 游戏还没完全结束，女士！想真正挑战自己一把吗？再来一局如何？<page>击中靶子二十五次，这条精美的念珠项链就是您的！意下如何？
translated_text: "The game is not over yet, ma 'am. If you really want to prove yourself, go ahead and play.<page>If you hit the target 25 times, you will get a beautiful Rosalie necklace! What did you say?
secondary_translated_text: “比赛还没有结束，女士。如果你真的想证明自己，那就去玩吧。<page>如果您击中目标25次，您将获得一条美丽的罗莎莉项链！你说什么？

original_en_text: <hpage>Keep well, Forge Daughter. I shall return if I require your aid.<page>Yes! Or no. Either is fine by us, as long as the craft continues.
original_zh_text: <hpage>保重，熔炉之女。若是需要帮助，我自会再来。<page>行！不来也行。只要手艺没断，咱都没意见。
translated_text: <hpage>Get my daughter up, and if she needs your help, she will come back.<page>Oh, yes! Oh, yes! As long as this process continues, we will be fine.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>把我女儿扶起来，如果她需要你的帮助，她会回来的。<page>哦，是的！哦，是的！只要这个过程继续下去，我们就会没事。

original_en_text: Hesitate not, my lady! Take aim and throw true!
original_zh_text: 别犹豫，女士！瞄准了就狠狠地扎过去！
translated_text: Don't hesitate to set a goal and achieve it.
secondary_translated_text: 不要犹豫，设定目标并实现它。

original_en_text: If you add the implements from this set to your own, the quality of your crafting will increase. You will produce finer, sharper, and deadlier tools... if that is your wish.
original_zh_text: 若将此套器具与你的工具结合，你的制作水准将更上一层楼。你将打造出更精、更利、更致命的器械……只要你想。
translated_text: You can add this toolset to tools to improve production quality. Thinner, sharper, and more deadly tools were created.
secondary_translated_text: 您可以将此工具集添加到工具中以提高生产质量。更薄、更锋利、更致命的工具被创造出来。

original_en_text: Planning to lay a carpet of spikes? These would surely slow your prey. We’d never have considered using such common tools for combat.
original_zh_text: 用布满尖刺的毯子让敌人减速？如此普通的工具还能在战斗中应用，我们可从没想到过。
translated_text: Are your nails broken? I never thought I could fight with such a common tool.
secondary_translated_text: 你的指甲断了吗？我从来没有想过我可以用这么普通的工具战斗。

original_en_text: Ola, ola, ola! Perhaps I neglected to tell you not to cross past those markers? It’s a law of the game, and we all abide by laws here, don’t we?<page>Your actions have disqualified you, my lady, but we harbour no ill will! Step over here and we can begin a new round at once!
original_zh_text: 哎哎！我可能忘了告诉您别越过那个标记？游戏规矩总得遵守，对吧？<page>您犯规出局，但我们之间绝不会因此产生芥蒂！请移步这边来，我们马上新开一局。
