translated_text: Oh, Oh, Oh! Maybe I forgot to tell him not to exceed instructions.<page>Your actions will be disqualified, but I have not offended you. Once you get here, you can start a new round immediately!
secondary_translated_text: 哦，哦，哦！也许我忘记告诉他不要超出指示。<page>你的行为将被取消资格，但我没有冒犯你。到达这里后，您可以立即开始新一轮！

original_en_text: Ola, ola! That’s it then. Our lady has struck the target fifteen times! A beautiful victory!<page>Hopefully you enjoyed yourself! A little levity is a balm in these troubled times, don’t you think?<hpage>I’d have thought such games best saved for times of peace, but perhaps there is truth in what you say.<hpage>And now that I have bested your challenge, you will produce the prize I have earned?<page>Oh... o-of course! I see you have a tool pouch of your own there. Full to bursting with baubles and trinkets, no doubt!<page>I’ll fit another pocket onto it, so you can carry even more tools and shards with you. A fair prize, wouldn’t you say?
original_zh_text: 哎哎！成了！这位女士成功击中靶子十五次，完美胜出！<page>玩得开心吧？在这病怏怏的世道里找点乐子也算是良药，您说是不是？<hpage>我原以为这类游戏该留在太平年月，但或许你说的也有道理。<hpage>现在我已完成挑战，是否该兑现奖品了？<page>当……当然！我看您自带工具袋，里面准是塞满了各种零碎小玩意！<page>我给您的工具袋上加个新口袋，能多装点工具。这奖品公道吧？
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. This woman has achieved 15 goals! What a great victory!<page>Enjoy it! In difficult times, even a little bit of relief can give you comfort, right? Actually?<hpage>I think this game saves you normal time better, but you may be telling the truth.<hpage>Now that I have won your challenge, will you accept the reward I received?<page>Yes, right. Yeah, no! They have their own team, they have a lot of little things!<page>You can put a separate pocket on top so you can carry more tools and garbage.
secondary_translated_text: 嘿嘿。这个女人已经实现了15个目标！多么伟大的胜利啊！<page>享受它！在困难时期，哪怕是一点点的解脱也能给你带来安慰，对吧？实际上？<hpage>我认为这个游戏更好地节省了你的正常时间，但你可能说的是实话。<hpage>既然我赢得了你的挑战，你会接受我收到的奖励吗？<page>是的，正确的。是的，不！他们有自己的团队，他们有很多小东西！<page>您可以在上面放一个单独的口袋，这样您就可以携带更多的工具和垃圾。

original_en_text: Ola, ola! We’ve devised a final challenge for you, my lady, if you’re interested.<page>Hit the target as many times as you can without missing. The more targets you hit, the more rosaries you’ll win from us! Care to try?
original_zh_text: 哎哎！我们给您准备了终极挑战，女士！<page>连续击中靶子次数越多，赢取的念珠越多！敢试试吗？
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. If you are interested, this is your challenge.<page>Don't miss as many goals as possible. The more goals you achieve, the more sleeves you will win! Do you want to do an experiment?
secondary_translated_text: 嘿嘿。如果您感兴趣，这就是您的挑战。<page>不要错过尽可能多的目标。你实现的目标越多，你赢得的袖子就越多！你想做实验吗？

original_en_text: <hpage>Forge Daughter, within an old Weaver nest I discovered a weapon. Though much damaged by age, I believe your skills could see it restored.<page>Ho. An impressive tool that, and a fine challenge. We can reforge the weapon, if the price fits.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，我在一处古老织巢中发现了这件武器。虽年代久远损毁严重，但以你们的手艺应该能修复。<page>嚯，好东西！这活儿够意思，只要报酬合适，咱就帮你重铸。
translated_text: <hpage>The general manager's daughter found a gun in an old cloth. Aging may hurt a lot of people, but I think we can restore our abilities.<page>It's an impressive tool, but it's also a huge challenge. If the price is good, you can rebuild your weapon.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>总经理的女儿在旧布里发现了一把枪。衰老可能会伤害很多人，但我认为我们可以恢复我们的能力。<page>这是一个令人印象深刻的工具，但也是一个巨大的挑战。如果价格好，你可以重建你的武器。

original_en_text: A fair exchange made, pointy bug. Now our work calls. Return again if you find need of our trade and talent.
original_zh_text: 交易愉快，小尖头虫。眼下我们的活儿还多着呢，有需要再来。
translated_text: Fair exchange is a big mistake. The mission has now been recalled. If you can meet our business and human resource needs, please come back.
secondary_translated_text: 公平交换是一个大错误。该任务现已被召回。如果您能满足我们的业务和人力资源需求，请回来。

original_en_text: We hope Ballow serves you well, pointy bug. In our long time serving these docks, he’s the finest assistant we’ve found.
original_zh_text: 希望巴洛能帮上忙，小尖头虫。在码头干了这么多年，他是咱见过最得力的助手。
translated_text: Spike Bug, I hope Ballow can work for you.
secondary_translated_text: 斯派克·巴格，我希望巴洛能为你工作。

translated_text: Strengthen?

original_en_text: Well. Well. Still about, pointy bug! You have proved yourself made of the hardiest stuff.<page>Ballow did tell, shamefully, of complications with your diving bell, and of your absence upon its first retrieval.<page>He had feared you lost to the flame, but we ourself had slight guessed otherwise.<hpage>To return from below proved as difficult a climb as ever I have faced, and yet I now need to descend again.<page>Then twice mad you are, bug! Or brave beyond measure.<page>Know we have heard from Ballow, who told of his repair efforts upon the diving bell below. By now that task is likely completed.<page>If you are hoping to put his work to the test, then we shall wish again on your survival. And if our own service can aid your critical task, know we will continue to provide it gladly.
original_zh_text: 啊哈！瞧瞧这是谁还生龙活虎的！小尖头虫，你可真是命硬。<page>巴洛支支吾吾地交代了潜钟的意外——打捞起来后，你已经不见了。<page>他以为你已经葬身火海了，但咱倒隐约觉得不然。<hpage>从底下爬回来确实是个不小的挑战，但很快我又得再下去一趟了。<page>哈！？你这虫子，不是疯到顶了就是勇到没边了！<page>听巴洛说，他底下那口老破钟修得差不多了。这会儿多半已经完工。<page>想试试那家伙的成果？那咱还得再一次祝你好运。要是咱这熔炉里的功夫能帮上忙，甭客气，照旧伺候着！
translated_text: Everything is fine, this is a big mistake! You have proven that you did the most difficult thing.<page>Barlow spoke candidly about the complexity of diving and his lack of diving during his first rehab.<page>He was afraid of being trapped in the fire, but let me guess.<hpage>Coming back from the bottom was a tough climb that I had never experienced before, but I had to go back.<page>"You're crazy, Bob. And very brave.<page>When he found he had received a letter from Barrow, he described the restoration of the underwater clock as follows:<page>If you want to try your job, you have to try it again. If our professional services can meet your basic needs, we will continue to provide them.
secondary_translated_text: 一切都很好，这是一个大错误！你已经证明你做了最困难的事情。<page>巴洛坦率地谈到了潜水的复杂性以及他在第一次康复期间缺乏潜水。<page>他害怕被困在火里，但让我猜猜。<hpage>从底部回来是我以前从未经历过的艰难攀登，但我必须回去。<page>“你疯了，鲍勃。而且非常勇敢。<page>当他发现自己收到了巴罗的一封信时，他将水下时钟的修复描述如下：<page>如果你想尝试你的工作，你必须再试一次。如果我们的专业服务能够满足您的基本需求，我们将继续提供。

original_en_text: And not a single target was struck... a right shame, that! We can’t reward you with any rosaries, my lady, but we’d love to see you test your aim once more!
original_zh_text: 一次都没中……太可惜啦！我没法给您念珠，女士，但欢迎随时再来试试准头！
translated_text: Not aiming at the target is a sin. I didn't reward Rosario, but I can't wait to try another goal! "
secondary_translated_text: 不瞄准目标是一种罪过。我没有奖励罗萨里奥，但我迫不及待地想尝试另一个进球！"

original_en_text: A weapon from a long distant past. We can combine the Weaver components with our own mouldings to repair the tool.
original_zh_text: 远古时期遗留下来的武器。可以将织者的部件与我们自造的铸件结合，修复这件工具。
translated_text: You can combine fabric components with your molds to repair weapon tools from the distant past.
secondary_translated_text: 您可以将织物部件与模具结合起来来修复遥远过去的武器工具。

original_en_text: <hpage>Forge Daughter, these black quakes that now wrack your lands, I am seeking to see them quelled at their source, below the lakes of flame.<page>You wish to descend so deep, pointy bug?... It is true these docks possess a craft capable.<page>Alas, we ourselves cannot help. Whether Pharloom’s health or fall, our charge ties us to this forge, always.<page>Ballow there’s the bug to ask, and if our fate is as dire as your action suggests, we are sure he is only needing of some quick convincing.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，如今黑灾震动大地，我想深入熔岩湖之底，将其从源头平息。<page> 小尖头虫，你想潜那么深？……码头那边倒是有法子能办到。<page>唉，可惜咱帮不上忙。不管纺络是死是活，咱都得守着这熔炉。<page> 去找码头那边的巴洛吧。若局势真如你所说那般危急，你随便吓唬两句他就会服软。
translated_text: <hpage>These black earthquakes are destroying your land, and we will see them settling in the springs below the Lake of Fire.<page>Do you want to jump into such a deep, sharp insect? May Space Shuttle<page>We have no such power. "Whether the pharaoh is healthy or weak, our duty is always in the cradle.<page>I think Barrow has doubts that if our destiny is terrible, we must determine it immediately, as his actions imply.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>这些黑色地震正在摧毁你们的土地，我们将看到它们沉淀在火湖下方的泉水中。<page>你想跳进这么深、锋利的昆虫吗？五月航天飞机<page>我们没有这样的权力。“无论法老健康还是虚弱，我们的责任始终在摇篮里。<page>我认为巴罗怀疑，如果我们的命运很可怕，我们就必须立即决定它，正如他的行为所暗示的那样。

original_en_text: Crafting by claw alone produces inferior results. With this kit, you can craft finer, sharper, and deadlier tools... if that is your wish.
original_zh_text: 单凭你的肢爪，只能造出粗劣的工具。有此匣相助，你便可打造更精、更利、更致命的器械……只要你想。
translated_text: Nail alone does not work well. This tool set makes it thinner, sharper and more deadly. This is what you want, sir.
secondary_translated_text: 仅靠指甲效果不佳。这套工具使其更薄、更锋利、更致命。这就是您想要的，先生。

translated_text: Desperate?

original_en_text: My lady, you left our game in such a hurry! No doubt some task of great import pulled you away.<page>That’s an instant disqualification, of course. You understand. But we don’t hold it against you, not at all! Care to play again?
original_zh_text: 女士，您离开得很匆忙！肯定是有要事要忙吧。<page>这局只能直接判负，希望您理解。但我们不会计较这种小事！要不要再来一局？
translated_text: Playing quickly some important tasks in the game will free you.<page>This is an immediate disqualification. I understand, but I have no opinion. Do you want to play again?
secondary_translated_text: 快速执行游戏中的一些重要任务会让您解放。<page>这是立即取消资格。我明白，但我没有意见。你想再玩一次吗？

original_en_text: <hpage>I need a moment, sir. Please unlock the bell that I may exit.<page>Seein’ some sense? Can’t blame ya if you’re thinkin’ on backin’ out. It’s a mad hope that old bell’d even survive the trip.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，我还需要一点时间。打开钟门让我出来。<page>总算清醒了？打退堂鼓也不怪你。那破钟能撑到湖底本就是个疯念头。
translated_text: <hpage>It will take a while, and the bell rings.<page>What do you mean? If you want to leave, I won't blame you. People are anxious to hope that the ancient species will survive the trip.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>这需要一段时间，钟声响起。<page>你什么意思？如果你想离开，我不会怪你。人们迫切希望这个古老物种能够在这次旅行中幸存下来。

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, if you can hear me, there has been an accident during the descent.<hpage>In this broken state, the bell is unfit for travel. Retrieve it if you may, but I shall not return within.<page>...iss...istake...erwhelm...retrie...a...ssible...
original_zh_text: <hpage>巴洛先生，能听见吗？下潜途中出了点故障。<hpage>钟体已损坏，无法继续下潜。你可试着把它打捞上岸，但我无法乘它返回。<page>……错……错误……过载……无法……打捞……
translated_text: <hpage>If you are listening, there was an accident on the road.<hpage>In this route state, the bell is not suitable for travel. If I could, I would tell you, but I'm not going in there again.<page>... The International Space Station is... Always, always, learn, be a citizen.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>如果您正在听，路上发生了事故。<hpage>在这种路线状态下，铃声不适合出行。如果可以的话，我会告诉你，但我不会再进去了。<page>...国际空间站是.永远，永远，学习，成为一名公民。

original_en_text: Oh no... no, not at all. Wouldn’t do us any good, would it? No, it seems like this little frolic of ours is well and truly finished.<page>Oh, but what an honour it was to play with you, my lady! I hope you’ll think of us whenever you feel those rosaries rattling around in your pockets.
original_zh_text: 不不……不用。我们玩得起，也输得起。看来我们的游戏需要告一段落了。<page>但与您同乐实乃荣幸！希望您摸着兜里的念珠时能想起我们。
translated_text: Yes, right. I know it wouldn't be good for all of us if you weren't there. Actually? My Mini games are over.<page>I am honored to play with you! Whenever you feel the pain of rosary beads in your pocket, please think of us.
secondary_translated_text: 是的，正确的。我知道如果你不在那里，这对我们所有人都没有好处。实际上？我的小游戏结束了。<page>很荣幸能和你一起玩！每当你感到口袋里的念珠的痛苦时，请想想我们。

original_en_text: Ola! That’s... that’s twenty-five times the target has been struck!<page>My lady... I thought perhaps you’d have a little more trouble with this round, but you’ve emerged victorious again.<page>I’ll have to speak to my associate. I don’t think he provided you with enough of a challenge, truth be told.<hpage>It was challenge enough. My prize, sir?<page>
original_zh_text: 哎！这……命中二十五次了！<page>女士……本以为这局能让您吃点苦头，结果您又赢了。<page>我得找我的伙计谈谈，说实话他给您设的挑战不够难。<hpage>我觉得够难了。那么奖品呢，先生？
translated_text: Hey, hey, hey. What is this? This goal has been achieved 25 times.<page>I think there will be more problems in this round, but we won again.<page>Frankly, I don't think there are enough challenges.<hpage>It's too complicated, isn't it? Is this my price?<page>
secondary_translated_text: 嘿嘿。这是什么？这一目标已实现25次。<page>我认为这一轮会出现更多问题，但我们再次获胜。<page>坦率地说，我认为挑战还不够。<hpage>这太复杂了，不是吗？这是我的价格吗？<page>

original_en_text: Urk! A prize, of course! My lady must have a prize!<page>Here then... a lovely necklace full with rosaries. I’d been hanging onto this for a while, but you’ve earned it fairly.<page>I just hope you think of me when you wear it, my lady!
original_zh_text: 啊！当然有！必须有！<page>给您……缀满念珠的漂亮项链。我私藏好久了，但您赢得实至名归。<page>希望您佩戴它时能想起我，女士！
translated_text: Oh! Oh! Of course, the price! Women will pay the price.<page>That's why I'm here, it's a beautiful necklace covered with roses. I've been here a long time, and I deserve it.<page>I just want you to think of me when you use it.
secondary_translated_text: 哦！哦！当然，价格！女性将付出代价。<page>这就是我来这里的原因，这是一条美丽的、布满玫瑰花的项链。我已经在这里很长时间了，这是我应得的。<page>我只是想让你在使用它时想到我。

original_en_text: Leave us! My great master needs time to reflect, and I must ponder on flavours anew!
original_zh_text: 快走吧！主人还要好好回味，我也要构思新菜式了！
translated_text: Get away from us! Owners need time to reflect, but they also need to rethink their tastes.
secondary_translated_text: 离我们远点！业主需要时间反思，但他们也需要重新思考自己的品味。

original_en_text: Pilgrim who would hold our song within your shell, rise above.<page>Offer your most devout self unto our sacred heart.
original_zh_text: 心怀圣歌的朝圣者，升华吧。<page>将虔信之魂献予圣心。
translated_text: Pilgrims hide our songs in shells.<page>Please dedicate your most sacred to our sacred heart.
secondary_translated_text: 朝圣者把我们的歌曲藏在贝壳里。<page>请将您最神圣的奉献给我们神圣的心。

original_en_text: ...ilgrim!... ast aside those many sinful hopes for rest ...d reward... remain pure... within our midst... sk for nothing! <page>See... Citadel’s simple stone, bare an... dorned. See h...ain our garb, how sparse o... meal. Know that... excess is sin!<page>Stay vigil... ys, for tho... wretched pilgrims... dare relen... their base desi... Left unpunish... thin our pure chorus... eir seductive sin... pread like flame...
original_zh_text: ……朝圣者！……抛弃休憩与奖赏的邪念……保持纯洁……在我们中间……无欲无求！<page>看这圣堡素石……无华无饰。看这粗布麻衣……清汤寡水。须知奢侈即罪！<page>保持警惕……因那些堕落朝圣者……放纵卑劣欲望……若不惩戒……污秽将如野火蔓延……
translated_text: ...¡Bad guys! I gave up hope of rest. 1. Award. Between us. Don't listen to me!<page>Please listen to me. It just looks like a stone. How scattered our clothes are, how scattered our clothes are, excessive is a sad thing.<page>"Yes, be careful of those poor pilgrims. Then he had the courage to do it again. Basic design. Fortunately, he escaped punishment. They have a clean choir; it's an external temptation. It spread like a flame.
secondary_translated_text: ...¡坏人！我放弃了休息的希望。1.奖我们之间别听我的！<page>请听我说。它看起来像一块石头。我们的衣服多么散落，我们的衣服多么散落，过度是一件悲伤的事情。<page>“是的，小心那些可怜的朝圣者。然后他有勇气再次这样做。基本设计。幸运的是，他逃脱了惩罚。他们有一个干净的合唱团;这是一种外部诱惑。它像火焰一样蔓延。

original_en_text: Accept, a t-t-token of the sentinel’s order.<page>As friends... let us p-part.
original_zh_text: 收下，哨卫信、信物。<page>以友、友人之谊……告别。
translated_text: The signal was received and the security guard gave the order.<page>As friends, we share p.
secondary_translated_text: 收到信号后，保安下达了命令。<page>作为朋友，我们分享p。

original_en_text: <hpage>I would view your collection, Vaultkeeper.<page>She may see it. A perfect set. This Vaultkeeper is rich with insights. Jealous its fellows would be... If still their minds remained.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我要看看你的收藏，管理员。<page>可以。看这完美收藏。羡慕死其他管理员……如果它们还有脑子的话。
translated_text: <hpage>Treasure, check your collection.<page>Leaders have foresight, and I envy my companions, but my heart is still there.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>宝藏，检查一下你的收藏。<page>领导有远见，我羡慕我的同伴，但我的心还在。

original_en_text: Aaaahh. What’s this? The rasher of a courier, tied up tight! I can see its fat still dripping fresh!
original_zh_text: 送货虫的熏肉！瞧瞧这油脂，还在滴汁呢！
translated_text: Yes, right. What are you doing? The post office is closed. You can see some fresh fat!
secondary_translated_text: 是的，正确的。你在干什么？邮局关门了。你可以看到一些新鲜的脂肪！

original_en_text: This stew, of Mossberries stirred thick. Good. Good! It shall form the base once set in mould.
original_zh_text: 德鲁伊的苔莓浓汤，够稠，够味！冻成型就能当基底。
translated_text: Prepare the pigeons, mix very thick, okay! Once you put it on the shape, it becomes the foundation.
secondary_translated_text: 准备鸽子，拌得很稠，好的！一旦你把它放在形状上，它就会成为基础。

original_en_text: Ahh... you have brought song again, though perhaps it is wasted on one as unworthy as I.<hpage>You needn’t satisfy my curiosity if it pains you, sir, but I must ask, for what crime or sin did the Citadel imprison you?<page>My sin? A grave transgression, the cause of much pain for many. But to speak of a sin... is to invite its return. I will say no more.
original_zh_text: 啊……你又带来歌声，可惜我这罪躯不配聆听。<hpage>若勾起你伤痛可以不答，但我必须问：圣堡因何罪囚禁你？<page>我的罪过？我犯的错带来了许多伤痛。但罪过……是请它归来。我不想多说。
translated_text: Yes, right. For someone like me, this song may not have helped, but it came back to me.<hpage>If you suffer, you don't have to satisfy my curiosity, but I am a pious person.<page>You don't have your own, do you? This is a serious violation that has caused great suffering to many people. When we say "no", remember it and don't say anything.
secondary_translated_text: 是的，正确的。对于像我这样的人来说，这首歌可能没有帮助，但它又回到了我身边。<hpage>如果你受苦，你不必满足我的好奇心，但我是一个虔诚的人。<page>你没有自己的吧？这是一种严重的违法行为，给许多人带来了巨大的痛苦。当我们说“不”时，记住它并且什么也别说。

translated_text: What does the national anthem mean?

original_en_text: By the purity of your will... the c-c-clarity of your intent... you are innocent of the silken curse.<page>Failed, has this sentinel. Your j-judgment, will it accept.<hpage>Is this truly failure, gilded one? You meant to test me and have done so. I would expect nothing less of a true guardian.<hpage>The matter is resolved. There is no need for death. Stand, and let us part as friends.
original_zh_text: 凭纯、纯粹意志……清明本心……你未受魂丝侵蚀。<page>哨卫失、失职。甘受裁、裁决。<hpage>真有失职吗？你完成了测试，我认为已经尽了守卫之职。<hpage>此事到此为止，无需生死相搏。起身吧，你我以友相别。
translated_text: Pure will. His intentions are clear. You are an innocent silk curse.<page>"You failed, guard. "<hpage>Is the gold medal a failure? Our expectations for real defenders have not been lowered.<hpage>The problem is solved, you don't have to die. Stand up and let's be friends.
secondary_translated_text: 纯粹的意志。他的意图很明确。你是无辜的丝绸诅咒。<page>“你失败了，警卫。"<hpage>金牌失败了吗？我们对真正后卫的期望并没有降低。<hpage>问题解决了，你不必死。站起来，让我们成为朋友。

original_en_text: Seek out a Pickled Muckmaggot, the sacred treat revered and reviled for its intensity. It was a specialty of the chef Lugoli, long ago banished for culinary sacrilege.<page>Rumours sing that the great chef retreated to their home-caves in the dank midlands below...
original_zh_text: 找一份腌淤秽蛆。那是被放逐的卢戈利大厨的招牌菜。<page>听说那混蛋躲到中部地区的潮湿洞穴了……
translated_text: Find Kimchlamet, the joy of God, the power to be worshipped and condemned. It was the work of a chef who was imprisoned for poor cooking.<page>The great chef is said to be hiding in the damp central cave of his hometown.
secondary_translated_text: 找到Kimchlamet，上帝的欢乐，被崇拜和谴责的力量。这是一位因烹饪不善而入狱的厨师的作品。<page>据说这位伟大的厨师躲在家乡潮湿的中央洞穴里。

original_en_text: <hpage>With this I have fulfilled my promise, sir. The ingredients have all been delivered. I trust now the meal can be made, and the oil awarded for my efforts?<page>You’ll have your oil, whelp! Firstly learn some patience! The dish must be prepared perfectly, enough to rouse my master and see them sated. <page>Now! Permit me to work my skill, and you’ll stand to see a meal of scent and taste that would dazzle Pharloom in her prime!
original_zh_text: <hpage>现在食材已备齐，该给我油了吧？<page>你这小虫急什么！得先把菜做得完美才能唤醒主人。<page>在这好好看着！见证这飘香万里的盛宴是怎么诞生的！
translated_text: <hpage>I kept my promise. All the food has arrived. I can really cook.<page>"You will eat butter, my child. "This dish has to be prepared well enough to wake up my guests and see that their stomachs are full. "<page>Come on, now! Find out for yourself which foods attract Farroom!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我信守了我的承诺。所有的食物都到了。我真的会做饭。<page>“你会吃黄油的，我的孩子。“这道菜必须准备得足够好，才能叫醒我的客人，看到他们的胃已经饱了。"<page>快点，现在！亲自找出哪些食物吸引了法鲁姆！

original_en_text: Hrm? Oh, ‘tis merely the livid red bug. I was expecting some word from those above to explain the meaning of all this rumbling and shaking.<page>They fail in their holy duties! My master must be shielded from such inconveniences, else their digestion be disrupted.<hpage>There are worse fates than indigestion, sir. You are fortunate to be unharmed.<page>Fortune has nothing to do with it. I am simply of a hardier breed than the insipid young servants of these recent, wretched times!
original_zh_text: 嗯？是你这红衣虫啊，我还以为上面有虫来解释地震是怎么回事呢。<page>上面那帮渎职的家伙！惊扰主人的消化谁担待得起！<hpage>比起消化不良，你该庆幸自己没有受伤。<page>跟运气可没什么关系，我这把老骨头比现在那些软脚虾仆从硬朗多了！
translated_text: What is this? What are you doing? I wish the people above would say something to explain the meaning of this roar and trembling.<page>My teachers should try to avoid this inconvenience. "<hpage>I'm glad you weren't hurt. This is because indigestion is more serious.<page>I am a more powerful race than the boring young servants of the tragic past!
secondary_translated_text: 这是什么？你在干什么？我希望上面的人能说些什么，解释一下这种咆哮和颤抖的含义。<page>我的老师应该尽量避免这种不便。"<hpage>我很高兴你没有受伤。这是因为消化不良更严重。<page>我是一个比悲惨过去的无聊年轻仆人更强大的种族！

original_en_text: Rkkt! I know she has it. Keeps it. Carried coveted in her cloth. This one searched for it. Give it! Give it to us!
original_zh_text: 咔！我知道她藏着。揣在披风里。本管理员找了好久。交出来！立刻交出来！
translated_text: He said he always hides under his clothes. I see him, you can come.
secondary_translated_text: 他说他总是躲在衣服下面。我看到他了，你可以来了。

original_en_text: Divine music... The soul of Pharloom eternal laid bare... That our cursed age could still receive such blessing...<page>So, Weaver-spawn, our melody is yours now, held in mind to carry beyond our walls. Was the learning worth its thieving? <hpage>It was, Vaultkeeper. And know to me your service continues. Keep the cylinder safe, along with any others I may bring.
original_zh_text: 神圣旋律……纺络永恒之魂的具现……这黑暗时代竟能重现荣光……<page>织者坏种，圣歌归你了，带出圣堡吧。这番追寻值得吗？<hpage>值得，而你将继续为我效命。保管好音筒，包括我以后带回来的。
translated_text: The soul of the pharaoh has been revealed, and even in this cursed era, we can receive such blessings.<page>So, Weber children, our melody is yours. Don't forget to take it off the wall.<hpage>Yes, Treasury Secretary. Let us know that our services will continue. Make sure your cylinder and other cylinders are safe.
secondary_translated_text: 法老的灵魂已经显露出来，即使在这个被诅咒的时代，我们也能得到这样的祝福。<page>所以，韦伯的孩子们，我们的旋律就是你们的。别忘了把它从墙上取下来。<hpage>是的，财政部长。让我们知道我们的服务将继续下去。确保您的气瓶和其他气瓶安全。

original_en_text: ...Dear... grim... Dark it seems now... et these word... become your guide...<page>Hear our voice... Let it... your own! Give... of yourself... for great Pharloom, for... first-children who bequeath it to us... for our salva... sure to come!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的……朝圣者……黑暗笼罩时……谨记这些箴言……<page>倾听吾声……化为己念！为纺络献身……为赐予我们一切的初代子嗣……为即将到来的……救赎！
translated_text: ... Dear... Now we can darken it, and we'll have a guide.<page>Save the eldest son of the great pharaoh Sarba. "Please come here.
secondary_translated_text: ...亲爱的...现在我们可以把它变暗，然后我们就有了一个指南。<page>拯救伟大法老萨尔巴的长子。“请过来。

original_en_text: For a sweet simmer, find me some Vintage Nectar. A rare brew, treasured by bugs with a keen scent for excellence.<page>There’s slim chance such an old yield might still exist. Alas! Its depth of flavour is a necessity for the holy dish!
original_zh_text: 甜味得用陈年蜜露，嗅觉敏锐的老饕才懂欣赏。<page>这陈酿怕是失传了……唉！可圣宴缺不得这醇香！
translated_text: If you want a sweet tequila, look for the back of honey, which is a rare beer, admired for refined insects and the pursuit of perfection.<page>There is little chance that this ancient return will still exist. Oh! Oh! Its depth of flavor is indispensable for a sacred dish!
secondary_translated_text: 如果您想要一杯甜龙舌兰酒，请寻找蜂蜜的背面，这是一种罕见的啤酒，因精致的昆虫和对完美的追求而受到推崇。<page>这种古老的回归仍然存在的可能性很小。哦！哦！它的浓郁风味是一道圣菜不可或缺的！

original_en_text: Hark! ...ilgrim! You... climb... our eternal embrace... who stand stru... the threshold... our stark Citadel of stone... kno... true service may now commence.<page>Forget... your weary shell. Forgo... urge to still... arloom commands... give... greatest gift! Join our chor... Raise... shell... voice... and sing!
original_zh_text: 哈！……朝圣者！……你已攀至……永恒怀抱……立于圣堡石阶……须知……真正侍奉现在开始。<page>忘却……疲惫躯壳……摒弃……休憩之欲……纺络……命你……献上……最珍贵礼物！加入合唱……抬起躯壳……放声高歌！
translated_text: Listen, friend! Bad guys! Who are you? Standing in the arms of eternity, who can stand up? In the stone castle, real service begins.<page>I forgot about them. We gave up and the momentum continued. Arom's orders are... ... The most beautiful gift! Join the choir. His neck has improved. Her voice... Bevy!
secondary_translated_text: 听着，朋友！坏人！你是谁？站在永恒的怀里，谁能站起来？在石堡里，真正的服务开始了。<page>我忘记了他们。我们放弃了，势头仍在继续。阿罗姆的命令是. ...最美丽的礼物！加入合唱团。他的脖子有所改善。她的声音.贝维！

original_en_text: For the core of the meal, find that marvellous meat... The rasher of a courier, those spritely bugs who once arrived at the toll of every second bell.<page>I saw many a courier gorge upon this fatty snack. Where are they all? Have they abandoned their holy toil?
original_zh_text: 主菜要送货虫的熏肉，那群按点报时的家伙最爱吃。<page>往日时常能在这看见他们，如今连个虫影都没了！
translated_text: At the center of the food are lively insects, and every time they ring the bell, they look for delicious meat and garbage.<page>I have seen many postmen eat fat snacks. Have you given up on sacred efforts?
secondary_translated_text: 在食物的中心是活泼的昆虫，每次它们摇铃，它们寻找美味的肉和垃圾。<page>我见过很多邮递员吃油腻的零食。你放弃了神圣的努力吗？

original_en_text: The master has a mighty endurance, yet all of this rumbling and breaking makes me fearful for their safety.<page>Fear not. I will stay by their side until my old shell crumbles away.
original_zh_text: 虽说主人铜肠铁胃，但这动静也太吓人了。<page>不过不用怕，我就算拼了命也会保护主人！
translated_text: Owners are very sturdy, but noise and cracks can make you worry about safety.<page>"Don't worry, I'll stay with them until my old shells are broken."
secondary_translated_text: 业主非常坚固，但噪音和裂缝会让你担心安全。<page>“别担心，我会和他们在一起，直到我的旧壳被打破。"

original_en_text: Eggy, eggy, hee hee! I’ll eat a lot, grow big and fat. Then I’ll lay a lot of eggies!<page>They bring me plenty of food, so they must want plenty of eggies.<page>And plenty they shall have, if they’re nice to me! Hee hee!
original_zh_text: 蛋蛋，生蛋蛋！吃饱饱，长胖胖，就能下好多蛋蛋！<page>他们给我这么多吃的，肯定想要好多蛋蛋！<page>只要对我好，要多少有多少！嘻嘻！
translated_text: Eggs Most of the time, I am fat, fat. I tried to put more eggs.<page>Eggs provide us with a lot of food, so we want it.<page>If everyone is good, there will be many people.
secondary_translated_text: 鸡蛋大多数时候，我很胖，很胖。我试图放更多的鸡蛋。<page>鸡蛋为我们提供了很多食物，所以我们想要它。<page>如果每个人都好，人就会很多。

original_en_text: <hpage>I had thought I was answering your summons as a friend, or at least an ally, but now that we stand together in this place I can sense your intent.<hpage>You mean to raise your blades against me. Am I your enemy, then?<page>D-defence of the sacred Citadel, and the voices that fill it-t-t, is the eternal duty of the sentinels.<page>Termination, is the n-n-necessary fate of all those enthralled by the whispering Silk.<hpage>You believe me haunted, a slave to the pale threads? I think you are more perceptive than that. My Silk is my own, as is my will.<page>Unsure, is this sentinel. B-both haunted and innocent, you seem. With regret, this sentinel must t-t-test the strength of your will.
original_zh_text: <hpage>原以为响应的是友军召唤，但此刻感知到你的意图。<hpage>你要兵刃相向？视我为敌？<page>保卫圣、圣堡，守护其中圣、圣音……哨卫永恒之职。<page>清、清除所有被魂丝蛊惑者……是必要使命。<hpage>你认为我被苍白丝线操控？恐怕你错了，我的灵丝与意志皆属于我。<page>判、判断存疑。你似被侵蚀又似清白。遗憾……哨卫必须测、测试你的意志。
translated_text: <hpage>I thought I had answered his call as a friend, or at least as an ally, but now that I am here, I can feel his intentions.<hpage>They will attack me with the sword. Am I your enemy?<page>The keeper's eternal mission is to protect the castle and satisfy the sounds there.<page>The ending is the inevitable fate of all those attracted by the whisper of silk.<hpage>Do you think I'm a ghost? Slaves of white silk? Sirnak is mine, that's my opinion.<page>I don't know. He's a bodyguard. He seemed innocent. Unfortunately, the bodyguard had to test his will.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我以为我作为朋友，或者至少作为盟友，已经响应了他的号召，但现在我在这里，我能感受到他的意图。<hpage>他们会用剑攻击我。我是你的敌人吗？<page>守护者的永恒使命是保护城堡并满足那里的声音。<page>结局是所有被丝绸之语吸引的人不可避免的命运。<hpage>你以为我是鬼吗？白丝绸的奴隶？瑟纳克是我的，这是我的观点。<page>我不知道他是一名保镖。他看起来很无辜。不幸的是，保镖不得不考验他的意志。

original_en_text: An ornate lock mechanism with a keyhole at its centre.
translated_text: A beautiful closed body with a closed hole in the center.
secondary_translated_text: 一个美丽的封闭体，中心有一个封闭的洞。

original_en_text: The nectar! To think, such an aged extract still exists! What an exquisite tragedy that I cannot taste it myself. My master must have every drop!
original_zh_text: 陈年蜜露！没想到真的还存在，这等陈酿我都没福品尝，全都得给主人留着！
translated_text: Manna! Where? Mana! Where? Where? Where? Let's imagine that such an ancient thing exists, it's a beautiful tragedy, and I can't enjoy my tragedy.
secondary_translated_text: 曼娜！在哪里？玛娜！在哪里？在哪里？在哪里？让我们想象一下，有这样一件古老的东西存在，这是一场美丽的悲剧，而我却无法享受我的悲剧。

original_en_text: Yes! Yes! She gives... It is ours! <hpage>I have passed the relic, Vaultkeeper. Now uphold your promise and aid me with your insight.<page>Fool! Demanding of a Vaultkeeper. Hers is impudence enough to bring death... If she did not carry the scent of Weaver-spawn.<hpage>So you know something of my ancestry, learned bug. If it gains me favour here, then I’ll expect your service in full.<page>Bleg! Dead! Dead, your vicious kind are meant to be. Better methinks to stay as such... <page>Gkkkt. But this one was taught. It shall fold its claws. It shall pass its knowledge, as much as is gleaned.<page>Only to a first child must a Vaultkeeper defer.
original_zh_text: 好！好！她交出了……归我们了！<hpage>遗物给你了，管理员。该兑现承诺了。<page>蠢货！竟敢命令本管理员。这般傲慢本该处死……若不是你带着织者的味道。<hpage>看来你知晓我的血脉，学者虫。若此地以我血脉为尊，我要求你为我效劳。<page>哼！早该灭绝的坏种……还是死干净为好……<page>咳，但本虫受过训诫。它会收起利爪，会分享知识，尽其所能。<page>唯有初代子嗣，能让本管理员低头。
translated_text: Oh, yes! Oh, yes! Oh, yes! Oh, yes! "You gave it to me, it's ours. "<hpage>Now, please keep your word and help you realize your vision.<page>If his swelling didn't bring the smell of cloth eggs, it would be enough to kill him.<hpage>We acknowledge the mistakes of our ancestors and if you will find my preferences here, I can't wait for your full service.<page>Fresh! His bad partner died and was sentenced to death, but I thought it would be better to keep him in his place.<page>GKKT 。This is what they taught me. Fill it with your nails.<page>The treasure belongs only to the eldest son.
secondary_translated_text: 哦，是的！哦，是的！哦，是的！哦，是的！“你把它给了我，它是我们的。"<hpage>现在，请信守诺言，帮助您实现您的愿景。<page>如果他的肿胀没有带来布蛋的味道，就足以杀死他。<hpage>我们承认我们祖先的错误，如果您能在这里找到我的偏好，我迫不及待地想要您的全面服务。<page>新鲜的！他的坏搭档死了，被判处死刑，但我想最好把他留在原处。<page>GKKT。这就是他们教我的。用你的指甲填满它。<page>宝藏只属于长子。

original_en_text: Oh drab and trembling squib, you who timidly step upon the Great Stage, fate has seen you chosen!<page>Cast away your fear and join me as my partner. Pharloom’s flame may flicker, but together we shall spark it ablaze!<page>Let us enliven this Citadel lost to silence! Let us rouse the soul of this once great land!
original_zh_text: 怯懦的可怜虫啊，既踏上伟大舞台，便是命运所选！<page>抛却恐惧，与我共演！重燃纺络将熄的火焰！<page>唤醒沉寂的圣堡！唤醒这片土地的魂魄！
translated_text: Oh, monotonous and trembling pants, coward on the big stage, fate sees a choice!<page>Let go of your fears, be my friend, ride together, the fire may burn!<page>Rebuild the tranquil castle! Let us awaken the spirit of this great country!
secondary_translated_text: 哦，单调而颤抖的裤子，大舞台上的懦夫，命运看到了选择！<page>放下你的恐惧，做我的朋友，一起骑行，火可能会燃烧！<page>重建宁静的城堡！让我们唤醒这个伟大国家的精神！

original_en_text: <hpage>Vaultkeeper, I am seeking a melody held by your vaults, part of a set to open a path above. Tell me what you know of it.<page>The Weaver-thing would claim our sacred melody?! How grim the age we survive to see... Vile sacrilege for it to pass to an outsider...<page>Only our pontiff, lived long and low within our vault, they held the melody, jealously, covetously... A learning for the highest Vaultkeeper, and them alone.<page>A truth they were told to have found... There in the dark. Something within the melody, or the words. Something to set them silent... <hpage>I am not afraid of what I’ll hear, Vaultkeeper. If your pontiff and their melody wait below, I shall find them both.
original_zh_text: <hpage>管理员，我在寻找书库的旋律，用于开启上层通路。把你知道的告诉我。<page>织者竟想染指圣歌？！……何等黑暗的时代……异乡客妄图窃取圣律……<page>唯有深居书库之底的主教知晓……最高机密，独享的学识……<page>据说他们在地底发现了什么……旋律或歌词中的真相……令其沉默的真相……<hpage>我不惧真相，管理员。若你的主教在底下等着，我会找到他们。
translated_text: <hpage>Ministry of Finance, I am looking for a melody to download onto tape as part of the above-mentioned open path. "<page>Is there anything that makes you lose your sacred melody? How difficult life is, how contemptuous it is to pass it on to a stranger!<page>Only this father, who lived a long and humble life in our graves, understood this melody with evil and greed.<page>They say they found the truth because something in the melody, words in the dark, can help you calm down.<hpage>"I'm not afraid to hear it, honey. If Dad and Melody are waiting for you, I will find you. "
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>财政部，我正在寻找一首旋律下载到磁带上，作为上述开放路径的一部分。”<page>有什么事情会让你失去神圣的旋律吗？生活是多么艰难，将其传递给陌生人是多么蔑视！<page>只有这位在我们坟墓里度过了漫长而卑微的一生的父亲，才怀着邪恶和贪婪理解了这首旋律。<page>他们说他们找到了真相，因为旋律中的某些东西、黑暗中的文字可以帮助你平静下来。<hpage>“我不害怕听到它，亲爱的。如果爸爸和梅洛迪在等你，我会找到你。"

original_en_text: Yes! A fair gift, Weaver-spawn. This Vaultkeeper shall glean what knowledge a great mind can.
original_zh_text: 好！公平交易，织者坏种。本管理员将用智慧解析其中奥义。
translated_text: Oh, yes! Oh, yes! This is a gift from Weaver. We collect knowledge so that professionals can have great ideas.
secondary_translated_text: 哦，是的！哦，是的！这是韦弗的礼物。我们收集知识，以便专业人士能够有伟大的想法。

original_en_text: As it was sung, our song sustains.<page>For Pharloom eternal, we shall guide.
original_zh_text: 歌咏不息，圣域不堕。<page>为永恒纺络，我等引领。
translated_text: When the music ends, the music continues.<page>Because of the false eternity we drive.
secondary_translated_text: 当音乐结束时，音乐就继续。<page>因为我们驾驶的虚假永恒。

original_en_text: Grkkt. What has she brought it? More treasures waiting on a Keeper’s insight, yes? The sacred cylinders of our holy Citadel? Pass them. Give them. Now! She must!
original_zh_text: 咔！她带了什么？更多需要解读的圣物？圣堡的圣咏音筒？快交出来！必须立刻交出来！
translated_text: Question: What did you bring? There are many treasures waiting for the steward's instincts, the treasures of the Holy Castle. "It should be! "
secondary_translated_text: 问：你带来了什么？有许多宝藏等待着管家的直觉，圣城的宝藏。“应该是！"

translated_text: <hpage>"I'm here, Goldman.

original_en_text: Eternal, is the Citadel. Et-t-ternal, is the devotion of the sentinels.<page>While its shell is f-f-functional, this sentinel will hold true to its duty.
original_zh_text: 圣堡永存，哨、哨卫的忠诚也永存。<page>只要机能尚存……职责不怠。
translated_text: Eternal loyalty is the loyalty of the guardian.<page>Despite its fully functional hull, the Sentinel faithfully carried out its mission.
secondary_translated_text: 永恒的忠诚是守护者的忠诚。<page>尽管其功能齐全的船体，哨兵忠实地履行其使命。

original_en_text: Pilgrim of Pharloom eternal, you rare chosen who hath ascended to this final threshold, listen to our wish, deliver it, that you may rise above and see your pilgrimage end.
original_zh_text: 永恒纺络的朝圣者啊，荣登终阶的稀世天选。聆听我等祈愿，实现我等祈愿。方可升华，得见朝圣终焉。
translated_text: His unusual choice, the signature of the eternal pilgrim, enabled us to reach this final entrance, hear our oath, fulfill it, and see the end of his pilgrimage.
secondary_translated_text: 他不寻常的选择，永恒朝圣者的签名，使我们能够到达这个最后的入口，听到我们的誓言，履行它，并看到他朝圣之旅的结束。

original_en_text: Interloper! On you, our pontiff’s sacred melody! You have found it, hold it, and now you dally, lost like a mite in our shelves!<page>Return to the listening room below! The sacred cylinder can be played, and the melody of our vaults heard at last in this damned age stretched long.
original_zh_text: 入侵者！你已经找到主教圣歌，却还在此游荡！<page>回下层聆听室去！圣音筒可以演奏了，圣歌终将在此黑暗时代重现！
translated_text: You are the sacred melody of our Father! You found it, you already had it, but now you linger among our companions.<page>Go back to the listening room below. We touched the sacred pillar and finally heard the melody of our treasure at this damn moment.
secondary_translated_text: 你是我们父亲的神圣旋律！你找到了它，你已经拥有了它，但现在你徘徊在我们的同伴中。<page>回到下面的收听室。我们触摸到了圣柱，终于在这该死的时刻听到了我们的宝藏的旋律。

original_en_text: Taste, smell, texture... It is done! A meal to rival Pharloom’s finest.<page>Mighty master, how long you have waited to set your jaw upon so perfect a dish! Join us, and dine!
original_zh_text: 色、香、味……俱全！纺络的绝世盛宴！<page>我的主人，让您久等了！快醒醒，开饭啦！
translated_text: The food is full of flavor, smell and consistency, and can rival the most delicious food on the farm.<page>Shifu, how long have you waited to eat such delicious food? Let's have dinner!
secondary_translated_text: 这种食物充满了味道，气味和一致性，可以媲美农场上最美味的食物。<page>师傅，你等了多久才吃到这么美味的食物？一起吃饭吧！

original_en_text: Yummy, yummy... oh! Are you here to serve me?<hpage>I am merely a visitor here, little one. Have you made this place your home, then?<page>My home? Oh yes! Lovely and warm. The big ones, they bring me food whenever I’m hungry. And I’m hungry now!
original_zh_text: 饿饿……咦？你是来喂我的吗？<hpage>我只是路过，小家伙。你把这当作巢穴了？<page>巢穴？对呀！又暖又舒服。大个子们总给我带吃的！现在就好饿！
translated_text: Good, oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! Oh! "Are you here to serve me?”<hpage>I'm just a visitor, a little person, but do you think this is your home?<page>My home? Oh, yes! He was so nice and warm that when I was hungry, he gave me some food.
secondary_translated_text: 好的，哦！哦！哦！哦！哦！“你是来服侍我的吗？”<hpage>我只是一个访客，一个小人物，但你认为这是你的家吗？<page>我的家？哦，是的！他是如此的善良和温暖，当我饿了，他给我一些食物。

original_en_text: <hpage>I have more pressing tasks, sir. Perhaps your master should content themself with a humbler meal?<page>Blasphemy! My master shall have the holy indulgence they deserve, even if I must douse my shell in oil and climb onto a dish myself!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我有要事在身，让你主人先将就吃点吧？<page>放肆！就算把我榨成油膏摆上桌，也要让主人享用圣宴！
translated_text: <hpage>We have a direct task. Do you want your guests to eat well? "<page>My master deserves God's forgiveness, even if he had to soak my shell in oil and climb onto the plate.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我们有一个直接的任务。你想让你的客人吃得好吗？"<page>我的主人值得上帝的宽恕，即使他不得不把我的壳浸在油里然后爬到盘子上。

original_en_text: To season a meal such as this... only a Crustnut will do. Once, scores of them could be gathered, high atop those coral crusted caves beyond the Grand Gate.<page>Surely some must still grow within that sand-ravaged land?
original_zh_text: 调味……一定得用硬壳果。珊瑚川里以前满地都是，现在就算只剩沙堆，应该也能刨到几颗。
translated_text: The taste of this plate. Nuts are made from shells. Dozens of birds gathered on the top of a cave once covered by coral.<page>Will it grow in the sand?
secondary_translated_text: 这个盘子的味道。坚果是由贝壳制成的。数十只鸟聚集在曾经被珊瑚覆盖的洞穴顶部。<page>它会在沙子里生长吗？

original_en_text: As it was sung, our song sustains.<page>For Pharloom eternal, we shall teach.
original_zh_text: 歌咏不息，圣域不堕。<page>为永恒纺络，我等教化。
translated_text: When the music ends, the music continues.<page>I teach you to be eternal disciples.
secondary_translated_text: 当音乐结束时，音乐就继续。<page>我教导你们成为永远的门徒。

original_en_text: We would hear the voice of the Keepers, within their grand vaults.<page>They who guard our history, our prayers and our secrets, across the ages.
original_zh_text: 我等欲闻典藏司铎之音，回荡宏伟书库。<page>他们守护历史、祷文与秘辛，跨越无尽纪元。
translated_text: You will hear the voice of the keeper in your beautiful chest.<page>It contains our history, our prayers and eternal secrets.
secondary_translated_text: 你会在你美丽的胸膛里听到守护者的声音。<page>它包含我们的历史、我们的祈祷和永恒的秘密。

original_en_text: Pickled Muckmaggot! So that banished chef’s recipes outlived them after all!<hpage>Not so, sir. I claimed the maggot from the chef themself. Their brutish work continued, even with their shell claimed by cursed thread.<page>Incredible! A bug so devout, they could cook with mind expunged. This Citadel was far too hasty to expel such brilliance.
original_zh_text: 腌淤秽蛆！卢戈利的秘方居然没失传！<hpage>我从他本人手里抢的，那家伙变丝傀了还在做菜。<page>厉害！没脑子还能掌勺，圣堡当初就不该赶他走！
translated_text: Kimchomwe: Why refugee recipes last longer<hpage>I don't think that's true. Insects were removed from the sink. Although the sink is covered with cursed silk, their brutal work continues.<page>This is unbelievable! With such a loyal insect, you may not think of cooking. The castle longed for such a reputation.
secondary_translated_text: Kimchomwe：为什么难民食谱持续时间更长<hpage>我不认为那是真的。昆虫被从水槽中移走。尽管水槽上覆盖着被诅咒的丝绸，但他们的残酷工作仍在继续。<page>这太不可思议了！有了这么忠诚的昆虫，你可能就不会想到做饭了。城堡渴望这样的声誉。

original_en_text: <hpage>I could track down any ingredient you desire, for a price. The oil you keep here may be of some use to me.<hpage>Promise it as reward, and your master shall have his meal.<page>Hrmph! Such a squalid bargain ill befits a holy servant... but so be it. Fetch me the ingredients and you shall have that pale condiment for yourself!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我不能白白替你跑腿，拿这瓶油当酬劳吧。<hpage>答应的话，你的主人说不定能如愿吃上大餐。<page>哼！卑劣的交易……罢了，找回食材，苍白油就归你！
translated_text: <hpage>Depending on the price, you can find the materials you like. Butter may help.<hpage>As a reward, the owner will give the owner a reward.<page>Oh, my God! This dirty shell is not suitable for samurai, but you can skip the ingredients and enjoy the soft atmosphere!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>根据价格，您可以找到您喜欢的材料。黄油可能会有所帮助。<hpage>作为奖励，业主会给业主奖励。<page>天哪！这个肮脏的外壳不适合武士，但你可以跳过食材，享受柔软的氛围！

original_en_text: What an awful clattering! Would you kindly conduct yourself a little more carefully?<page>And why are you adorned in such an awful, livid red? By my oath, those above must make a sport of sending me the most wretched servants they can find!<hpage>I am no servant, sir, rather a guest of sorts, invited by the Citadel. Tell me, is this vial of oil on display your own?<page>Nothing here is my own, you impertinent young mite! This sacred hall, and all the food contained within, belong to my most exalted master.<page>The Great Gourmand! The finest connoisseur who has ever lived, the one whose tastes transcend the ages!<page>None are left now who venerate them as they deserve, save for the loyal, lonely bug who stands before you.<page>That oil is merely a small savoury to whet their appetite for the grand meal to come. A spectacular, Pharloom spanning dish that I have been planning for an age.<page>But alas, those above seem to have forsaken my poor master! And I have grown so old. Now I can never hope to gather the necessary ingredients. Blast their indolence!
original_zh_text: 叮叮咣咣吵死了！能安静点吗？<page>还有你为什么穿这身鲜红刺眼的装扮？上面那些混蛋专派些歪瓜裂枣来侍奉我！<hpage>我可不是仆从，算是圣堡的客人。这瓶油是你的藏品？<page>当然不是我的，你这没耐心的小虫！这里一切都属于我尊贵的主人——大胃王！<page>那是空前绝后的美食家！品味超越时代的存在！<page>如今只剩我忠心耿耿侍奉主人，其他虫早忘了本分。<page>那点油不过是开胃小菜，我筹备的可是横跨纺络的盛宴！<page>可恨上面那帮懒鬼断了供给，我这把老骨头哪凑得齐食材！
translated_text: This is a great CM song. Will you be careful? "<page>"Why are you dressed so badly? "People swore to give me the happiest servant they could find.<hpage>"I am not a ruler, I am just a guest in the palace. Are the bottles in the exhibition yours?<page>"Not me, Little King Kong. "This sacred room and all the food in it belong to my Supreme Lord.<page>Great food. Taste has no time.<page>No one gets the respect they deserve except a loyal and lonely insect in front of them.<page>Butter has a slightly salty taste and can stimulate the appetite for the next meal. I have been cooking delicious food in the Faroe Islands for a long time.<page>But, oh, everyone there has my poor teacher. I know I'm getting old. I haven't collected the necessary materials yet. Shit, race.
secondary_translated_text: 这是一首很棒的CM歌曲。你会小心吗？"<page>“你为什么穿得这么差？“人们发誓要给我他们能找到的最幸福的仆人。<hpage>“我不是统治者，我只是皇宫里的客人。展览中的瓶子是你的吗？<page>“不是我，小金刚。“这个神圣的房间和里面所有的食物都属于我的至尊主。<page>食物很棒。品味没有时间。<page>没有人得到应有的尊重，除了一个忠诚而孤独的昆虫在他们面前。<page>黄油有轻微的咸味，可以刺激下一餐的食欲。我长期以来一直在法罗群岛烹饪美味佳肴。<page>但是，哦，那里的每个人都有我可怜的老师。我知道我老了。我还没有收集必要的材料。妈的，种族。

original_en_text: Horrid she! What fool dares strike a holy Vaultkeeper! It has knowledge! Insight! As much as any could possibly retain in our fallen age.<page>Would she cast it all aside just to create more death? If so, she is Weaver to the core!
original_zh_text: 疯婆子！竟敢袭击本管理员！本管理员可是掌握着末世最全的学识！<page>你要为了杀戮抛弃这些知识？果真是纯血织者！
translated_text: You are terrible! "You are a fool, attacking the guards, I know. We're checking! Save as much as possible during this period.<page>Can he give up everything and cause more deaths? If so, this is the perfect platform!
secondary_translated_text: 你太可怕了！“我知道，你是个傻瓜，攻击警卫。我们正在检查！在此期间尽可能节省。<page>他能放弃一切并造成更多死亡吗？如果是这样，这就是完美的平台！

original_en_text: So be it, impudent louse! Deny our kingdom’s agony. Refuse its touch upon your fickle shell!<page>Carve your hapless path. Stalk, and strike, and fight, but know your foe is fate herself, and she has risen raging!
original_zh_text: 那就这样吧，狂妄的虱子！拒绝感受王国的苦痛。让你善变的甲壳隔绝这一切！<page>走你的死路吧。即便你能潜伏、突袭、战斗，但记住你的敌人是命运本身——而她已怒火滔天！
translated_text: t be shy. Do not touch the capricious shell of my kingdom and deny the pain.<page>Hunt, fight, fight, your enemy is destiny itself. Then, he became angry!
secondary_translated_text: 别害羞。不要触摸我王国反复无常的外壳，也不要否认痛苦。<page>狩猎、战斗、战斗，你的敌人就是命运本身。然后，他就生气了！

original_en_text: Pain! Pain! Do you hear her cries, cursed spider-spawn!? Pharloom suffers for our pathetic, mortal ignorance! We fail it and it falls! <page>Knowledge is needed. More and more! It must be hoarded, sought! Strength to understand, to calm and quell.<hpage>It is action now that needs taking, Vaultkeeper, by myself and those left alive who would aid me.<hpage>Seek solutions in your texts and psalms as you may, but they alone will not be enough to heal a pain so great.
original_zh_text: 痛苦！痛苦！听见她的哀嚎了吗，该死的蜘蛛坏种！？纺络正因我们可悲的愚昧受苦！我们辜负了它，它要灭亡了！<page>需要知识。无穷无尽的知识！必须囤积，必须追寻！需要力量去理解，去安抚，去镇压。<hpage>现在需要的是行动，管理员。由我，以及其他愿意相助的生者来执行。<hpage>你尽管在经卷圣歌中寻求解法，但光靠这些不足以治愈如此深重的伤痛。
translated_text: This will hurt you! It hurts! I hear you crying, spider! Palau is a man, a man.<page>We need more and more knowledge! Rescue and search! Understanding, calm, the power of calm.<hpage>Guardians are the action that must be taken now to help me and those who are still alive.<hpage>Find answers as much as you can in the Bible and Psalms. However, this alone is not enough to cure the tremendous suffering.
secondary_translated_text: 这会伤害你的！好痛！我听到你哭了，蜘蛛！帕劳是一个人，一个人。<page>我们需要越来越多的知识！救援和搜索！理解，冷静，冷静的力量。<hpage>守护者是现在必须采取的行动来帮助我和那些还活着的人。<hpage>尽可能在圣经和诗篇中找到答案。然而，仅靠这一点不足以治愈巨大的痛苦。

original_en_text: Yessss! See them all! Its collection gleams complete. Such sacred understanding, stored safe.<page>You have performed your part, Weaver-spawn... The agreement is concluded. Knowledge and rosaries, all were passed fair. No more between us.<page>Leave this Keeper to its treasures and their insights. It has given its service. Now this Keeper wants its time alone!
original_zh_text: 好极了！看啊！藏品终于完整了。如此神圣的智慧，安然封存。<page>你完成了约定，织者坏种……交易结束。知识与念珠，两清。你我两不相欠。<page>让本管理员独享珍宝与真知吧。职责已尽。现在我只想独处！
translated_text: Oh, yes! Guys, look at him! This performance was so wonderful. God's knowledge is still true.<page>You have completed your duties, or your generation. We reached an agreement. Knowledge and logic are good communication. There's nothing between us.<page>Leave this bodyguard to your treasure and instincts. They already provide services. Now, this man wants his time!
secondary_translated_text: 哦，是的！伙计们，看看他！这场表演太精彩了。上帝的知识仍然是真实的。<page>你们已经完成了你们的职责，或者你们这一代人的职责。我们达成了协议。知识和逻辑是很好的沟通。我们之间没有什么。<page>把这个保镖留给你的宝藏和直觉吧。他们已经提供服务了。现在，这个人想要他的时间！

original_en_text: <hpage>Show me your collection, Vaultkeeper.<page>Grkt, Weaver-spawn! She is a bother! Nuisance! Bring more gifts. The collection still has gaps!
original_zh_text: <hpage>展示你的收藏，管理员。<page>咔！烦人的坏种！拿更多贡品来！本管理员的收藏还有空缺！
translated_text: <hpage>Please show me your collection.<page>Come on, beaver. I'm in trouble! This is cool! Please give me another gift. This series has some shortcomings.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>请给我看看你的收藏。<page>加油，海狸。我有麻烦了！这很酷！请再给我一份礼物。这个系列有一些缺点。

original_en_text: <hpage>Gilded one, what remained of the Citadel has been torn apart by the black threads. Still you keep to your duty?<page>While voices still fill the g-g-great chambers... the sacred task of the sentinels continues.<page>To defend... To p-p-protect.
original_zh_text: <hpage>金甲虫，圣堡残骸已被黑丝撕裂。还不放弃职责么？<page>只要圣、圣殿……仍存余音，哨卫之职……不止。<page>守、守卫……守护。
translated_text: <hpage>The remnants of a golden fortress broke through the black line.<page>His voice is always Mr. G, I can't. - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -<page>Protection is for protection.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>金色堡垒的残余部分冲破了黑线。<page>他的声音总是G先生，我不能。- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -<page>保护就是为了保护。

original_en_text: You dally, still? If you wish to earn your reward, you should be hunting down those ingredients! Or do you need directions from a serving-bug with some experience?
original_zh_text: 还磨蹭什么？想要报酬就赶紧的！还是说要本大厨给你指点指点方向？
translated_text: Are you whispering? If you want to buy this product, please buy this product! Do you need professional advice to resolve your business mistakes?
secondary_translated_text: 你在低声说话吗？如果您想购买该产品，请购买该产品！您需要专业建议来解决您的商业错误吗？

original_en_text: The Weaver-spawn, she has found it! Our pontiff’s sacred cylinder, stolen from the dark below...<page>Never! States our law. Never must our melody pass to a bug not Keeper! But you, fool Weaver, would shatter those tenants with reckless ease.<hpage>Your pontiff is gone, Vaultkeeper. Your fellows have fallen to husk or thread. What laws once bound these vaults died with them.<page>Ackk! Fine, cursed she. Claim the sacred song, and pain to you if we both are damned forever for it!
original_zh_text: 织者坏种，她得手了！她夺走主教的圣音筒……<page>休想！律法规定，圣歌绝不可外传！但你这坏种竟然轻易践踏戒律。<hpage>你的主教死了，管理员。同僚都化作空壳或丝偶，昔日的律法也随他们入土了。<page>咳！随你便，诅咒你。带走圣歌吧，愿我们永堕地狱！
translated_text: The Pope's Ark was stolen in the darkness.<page>There is nothing we can do! The legal interpretation says: Our melody cannot touch insects and guards! But your stupid loft can easily crush tenants.<hpage>Your partner falls on shells and ropes, and the way to manage these resources disappears.<page>I'm okay, I'm okay! Sing this hymn. If you are cursed forever, you will be punished.
secondary_translated_text: 教皇的方舟在黑暗中被盗。<page>我们无能为力！法律解释说：我们的旋律不能碰昆虫和卫兵！但你愚蠢的阁楼很容易压垮租户。<hpage>你的伴侣陷入困境，管理这些资源的方法也就消失了。<page>我没事，我没事！唱这首赞美诗。如果你永远被诅咒，你就会受到惩罚。

original_en_text: <hpage>I return, bug, and ask to hear your melody again, that I may lock it clear in my mind.<page>Very well, good pilgrim. For one so fiercely devout as yourself, gladly will I give this gift.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我回来了，请你再演奏一遍旋律，我要记牢。<page>好，虔信者。为了你这般赤诚，我很乐意演奏。
translated_text: <hpage>I'm back, Bug, and I want to listen to my music again so I can keep it clearly in my mind.<page>A beautiful pilgrim like you, I give you this gift. ".
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我回来了，Bug，我想再次听我的音乐，这样我就可以把它清楚地留在脑海里。<page>像你这样美丽的朝圣者，我送给你这个礼物。".

original_en_text: <hpage>Your master seems satisfied, sir. It is time you gave what was promised.<page>Yes. Yes! It has been done! Made and served. A dish to match my master’s refined desires.<page>The pale trifle is yours. Take it and leave! My master needs time to reflect, and I must ponder on flavours anew!
original_zh_text: <hpage>你的主人看来很满意，该兑现承诺了吧？<page>对，对！主人吃得很满意！<page>苍白油是你的了，拿走吧！主人还要好好回味，我也要构思新菜式了！
translated_text: <hpage>The owner seemed satisfied with this. Now is the time to fulfill the promise.<page>Oh, yes! Oh, yes! We are ready, and the meal is prepared according to the needs of the guests.<page>Xiaobai is yours. Teachers need time to think. You will have to rethink your preferences.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>店主似乎对此很满意。现在是兑现承诺的时候了。<page>哦，是的！哦，是的！我们准备好了，饭菜是根据客人的需要准备的。<page>小白是你的。老师需要时间思考。您必须重新考虑您的偏好。

original_en_text: <hpage>Vaultkeeper, I bring the psalm cylinder recovered from the dark chambers below here. I would learn its melody.<page>Kak! Then pass it, filthy Weaver-spawn! A cylinder so sacred should not remain a moment longer in your grubby claws!
original_zh_text: <hpage>管理员，我带来了下层密室的圣咏音筒，要学习其中旋律。<page>咔！交出来，肮脏的织者坏种！此等圣物岂能在你脏爪中多留一秒！
translated_text: <hpage>I picked up the national lute I found in the dark room below the safe and learned the melody.<page>Here is it! Such a sacred cylinder no longer fits your dirty nails!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我拿起在保险箱下面的暗室里找到的国琴，学习了旋律。<page>就是这里！如此神圣的圆柱体不再适合你肮脏的指甲了！

original_en_text: Hold them, will she? Covet them? Can she not part with such a small prize?<page>Remain blind fool she. This Keeper’s understanding stays with itself.
original_zh_text: 她想私藏？如此贪婪？连这点小礼都吝啬？<page>她就继续当瞎子吧。本管理员的智慧自会保留。
translated_text: Can I take her with me? Do you want this? Don't you want this price?<page>If you continue to lie blindly, the way your parents think of you will not change.
secondary_translated_text: 我可以带她一起吗？你想要这个吗？你不想要这个价格吗？<page>如果你继续盲目撒谎，你父母对你的看法不会改变。

original_en_text: Weaver-thing! Does she hope to spy upon our treasured records?<page>Within our vast store, always more there is to know, the old methods of prayer, to this land, to its rulers, and to the strength at its heart.
original_zh_text: 织者坏种！她想窥探我们的珍贵典籍？<page>在我们的浩瀚典藏中，有古老祷文，有统治之术，还有……核心力量的秘辛。
translated_text: Geneva wants to steal some precious documents?<page>In our vast warehouses and our ancient forms of prayer, there is always something to learn about the earth, its rulers and core forces.
secondary_translated_text: 日内瓦想窃取一些珍贵文件？<page>在我们巨大的仓库和古老的祈祷形式中，总有一些关于地球、它的统治者和核心力量的东西需要了解。

original_en_text: She carries a precious cylinder! She must give it! Share it! Claw to claw!<page>Pass it! And this Vaultkeeper shall grant their wisdom. Just a small taste! A trickle! A glimmer! Of our Citadel’s sacred understandings.
original_zh_text: 她带着圣咏音筒！必须交出来！分享！交出来！<page>递过来！本管理员便赐予智慧。只需浅尝！一滴！一缕！圣堡的至高真知！
translated_text: I have a great bottle of wine that is worth having. Let's share this! Padapa<page>Through it all! Wealth gives you wisdom, buzzer! A lamp! God's understanding of sex.
secondary_translated_text: 我有一瓶值得拥有的好酒。让我们分享一下这个！帕达帕<page>经历这一切！财富给你智慧，蜂鸣器！一盏灯上帝对性的理解

original_en_text: Woken, is this sentinel. F-f-f-functional, is its shell.<page>Still devoted, is this s-s-sentinel, and awaiting your commandment.<hpage>You speak, gilded one? I’ve no command for you, but my curiosity is piqued.<hpage>You call yourself a sentinel. What is it you are charged with protecting?<page>Defence of the sacred C-c-citadel, and the voices that fill it-t-t, is our eternal duty.<hpage>I had assumed as much. Yet look around you, gilded one. During your slumber, the Citadel has fallen, and its voices lay silent. This place is dead, or very nearly.<hpage>Some would argue that standing guard over a kingdom’s corpse is a foolish task, empty of meaning. I wonder then, will you still hold true to your charge?
original_zh_text: 苏、苏醒，本哨卫。功、功能正常。<page>忠、忠诚依旧，静候指令。<hpage>金甲虫，你会说话？我无意下令，但很好奇。<hpage>你自称哨卫，是在守护何物？<page>保卫圣、圣堡，守护其中圣、圣音，是哨卫的永恒之职。<hpage>意料之中。但环顾四周吧，圣堡已然倾颓，圣音皆已沉寂。此地已是坟冢。<hpage>守卫已死的王国已没有意义，你依然要恪守职责么？
translated_text: A guard woke up. The f-f - f function is a shell.<page>The guards are loyal and await your orders.<hpage>You mean O? Although I didn't receive an order, I was very interested.<hpage>They are called guardians, what do they protect?<page>Maintaining the sanctity of C-C and the voice that fills it is our eternal responsibility.<hpage>That's what I thought, but look around. While you were asleep, the castle fell down and you couldn't hear anything. This place is dead, or almost dead.<hpage>Some people believe that protecting the body of the kingdom is useless and useless.
secondary_translated_text: 一名警卫醒了。f-f - f函数是一个shell。<page>卫兵们忠诚，等待您的命令。<hpage>你是说O？虽然没有收到订单，但我很感兴趣。<hpage>他们被称为守护者，他们保护什么？<page>维护C-C的神圣性及其声音是我们永恒的责任。<hpage>我就是这么想的，但看看周围。当你睡着的时候，城堡倒塌了，你什么也听不到。这个地方已经死了，或者几乎死了。<hpage>有些人认为保护王国的身体是无用的、无用的。

original_en_text: One must not wander idle between these sacred shelves! This is a holy place. Reverence! It is demanded.<page>If the fool she wishes to view this Keeper’s collection, head to the listening room below.
original_zh_text: 休要在圣架间闲逛！此处是圣地，需心怀敬畏！<page>想看本管理员的收藏？去下层聆听室。
translated_text: You cannot walk on these sacred platforms, these are sacred places, please respect me, it is necessary.<page>Fools who want to view the Guardian collection can go to the auditorium below.
secondary_translated_text: 你不能在这些神圣的平台上行走，这些都是神圣的地方，请尊重我，这是必要的。<page>想要观看《卫报》系列的傻瓜可以前往下面的礼堂。

original_en_text: <hpage>My choice is made. I cannot leave. I must descend again, and see Pharloom freed.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我意已决，不能就这样离开。必须重返地底，解放纺络。
translated_text: <hpage>I couldn't walk anymore, I saw the lights released and then fell down again.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我再也走不动了，我看到灯亮了，然后又摔倒了。

original_en_text: <hpage>The signs of battle here are clear, gilded one. Is it your charge then to hunt the haunted, even if they be of the Citadel’s ruling castes?<page>Defence of the sacred Cit-t-tadel, and the voices that fill it, is the eternal d-duty of the sentinels.<page>Termination, is the n-n-necessary fate of all those enthralled by the whispering Silk.
original_zh_text: <hpage>此地战斗痕迹明显，金甲虫。你的职责包括猎杀圣堡贵族中的被蛊惑者？<page>保卫圣、圣堡，守护圣音……哨卫永恒之职。<page>清除受魂、魂丝蛊惑……...是必要使命。
translated_text: <hpage>The traces of the battle were clearly golden. Even if you belong to the ruling class of a province, you know? Is hunting your job?<page>The eternal mission of the guardians is to protect the holy city of Tadr and meet its din.<page>The ending is the inevitable fate of all those attracted by the whisper of silk.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>战斗的痕迹清晰可见。即使你属于一个省份的统治阶级，你知道吗？正在寻找你的工作吗？<page>守护者的永恒使命是保护塔德尔圣城并迎接它的喧嚣。<page>结局是所有被丝绸之语吸引的人不可避免的命运。

original_en_text: <hpage>Out there lie the endless wastes... If I cross them now, Pharloom shall fall to a black fate of my making.<hpage>My choice is made. I will not abandon its bugs to that grim end. I must descend again, and cut them free.
original_zh_text: <hpage>若现在越过那片荒原，纺络将因我堕入黑暗……<hpage>我意已决，不能抛下纺络的虫民。必须折返，斩断丝缚。
translated_text: <hpage>If you go through this now, Falun will fall into the dark destiny I have created for you.<hpage>We will not give in to the mistakes that led to this difficult ending. We need to save them again.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>如果你现在经历这一切，法轮就会陷入我为你创造的黑暗命运。<hpage>我们不会屈服于导致这一艰难结局的错误。我们需要再次拯救他们。

original_en_text: <hpage>Keep safe, Vaultkeeper. I may expect your service in future, and I’d not have you pass before that task is complete.<page>Gyak... No fool this Keeper. It has lived long, watched its fellows wither, but it shall not die, not yet, not while knowledge needs be sought.<page>This pact is made, Weaver-spawn, insight for us, both she and it.<page>This holy Citadel, in glory and fall, there are holes in its history, even to a Keeper’s knowledge, even to the vaults.<page>Seek the cylinders, she must, those objects of intricate insight. Bring more for this Keeper and only this Keeper, for in this Citadel none are left possessed of such sound, sharp mind as it.
original_zh_text: <hpage>好好活着，管理员。你还有用，别早早死去。<page>咔……本管理员不傻。活了很久，目睹同僚凋零。但只要尚有知识未明，就不会死。<page>契约成立，织者坏种。你我今后各取所需。<page>荣耀与衰落并存的圣堡，藏着连浩瀚书库都未记载的空白。<page>去找音筒吧，那些智慧的结晶。只献给本管理员，因圣堡再无这般敏锐之脑。
translated_text: <hpage>You can keep an eye on the guards and wait for the next task, but don't pass before completing the task.<page>He lived for many years, watching his companions disappear, but he did not die in search of knowledge.<page>For Weaver's descendants, this is the contract between us and her and Insight.<page>Whether in glory or decline, there is a loophole in the history of this sacred castle, and although its guardians knew it, so did its times.<page>Join more than one guardian. No one in this city has such a strong voice and such a strong heart.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>您可以密切关注警卫并等待下一项任务，但在完成任务之前不要通过。<page>他活了很多年，看着同伴消失，但他并没有为寻找知识而死。<page>对于韦弗的后代来说，这是我们和她以及洞察之间的合同。<page>无论是辉煌还是衰落，这座神圣城堡的历史都存在漏洞，尽管它的守护者知道这一点，但它的时代也知道这一点。<page>加入多个守护者。这座城市没有人有如此强烈的声音和如此坚强的心。

original_en_text: Pilgrim of Pharloom eternal, regale us with our Threefold song, that you may rise above and worship before our kingdom’s divine heart.
original_zh_text: 永恒纺络的朝圣者啊，献上三重圣歌，方可升华，觐见王国圣心。
translated_text: Eternal pilgrims in heaven support us with our three songs, reverence us, beyond the heart of our kingdom.
secondary_translated_text: 天堂里永恒的朝圣者用我们的三首歌支持我们，在我们王国的核心之外尊敬我们。

original_en_text: Still you tarry here, bug who calls herself a guest? If your idle claws need work, put them to service for our exalted Great Gourmand!<page>I must remain by my master, so you will need to leave the Citadel and gather the ingredients for their meal in my stead!
original_zh_text: 还杵在这呢？既然你闲着也是闲着，就帮我伟大的主人搜集食材吧！<page>我得守着主人，去圣堡外收集食材的任务就交给你了！
translated_text: Are you still here, calling yourself an insect guest? If your nails need work, let them work for our dear friends.<page>I must live with my master, and you must leave the castle to collect materials for me.
secondary_translated_text: 你还在这里，自称昆虫客人吗？如果您的指甲需要工作，让它们为我们亲爱的朋友工作。<page>我必须和我的主人住在一起，你必须离开城堡为我收集材料。

original_en_text: A rusted statue of a pilgrim.
original_zh_text: 一尊朝圣者的锈蚀雕像。
translated_text: Statue of pilgrim.

original_en_text: <hpage>To learn the melody upon this cylinder will require a working listening device. This one here has long ceased to function.<hpage>That last keeper still sane, in the vaults above... Their chambers hold just such a machine. I need only return.
original_zh_text: <hpage>播放音筒需要完好的设备，这台已经坏了。<hpage>之前在上层遇到的清醒管理员……他们的密室就有这种机器。我得回去一趟。
translated_text: <hpage>To understand the melody in this column, you need a functional hearing aid that will not work properly for a long time.<hpage>The last guard was always smart and had one of these cars in his room.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>要理解本专栏中的旋律，您需要一款功能性助听器，该助听器将长期无法正常工作。<hpage>最后一名警卫总是很聪明，他的房间里有一辆这样的车。

original_en_text: <hpage>Vaultkeeper, I recovered a psalm cylinder in the dark chambers below here. I believe it contains the melody unique to these vaults. I would have you play it for me now.<page>Kakrt! She has visited the pontiff’s depths and stolen the sacred song! Where is your respect, Weaver-spawn?! Our venerable dead deserve better than to have their chambers transgressed by your filthy foraging!<hpage>In this moment, Vaultkeeper, I’ve slim patience for your impudence. Either prepare the cylinder and stay silent, or ready yourself to learn regret.
original_zh_text: <hpage>管理员，我在下层密室找到了圣咏音筒。里面应存有此书库的专属旋律，我要你立即为我演奏。<page>咔！你擅闯主教密室窃取圣歌！织者坏种毫无敬畏！先贤安息之地岂能容你玷污！<hpage>管理员，我的耐心有限。要么闭嘴准备播放音筒，要么准备明白什么叫后悔。
translated_text: <hpage>I think these treasures include unique melodies that you can see in the dark room under the box, in the pipes of the national anthem.<page>Carly!! He entered the heart of the Pope and stole the country! Dusky, where is the respect? Our glorious deaths deserve better than dirty food in the corridors! "<hpage>Now, Treasury Secretary, I have no patience for your evil. Keep silent in the prepared gasoline bottle.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我认为这些宝藏包括独特的旋律，你可以在盒子下的暗室中、在国歌的烟斗中看到。<page>卡莉！！他进入了教皇的心中，偷走了国家！Dusky，尊重在哪里？我们光荣的死亡应该比走廊里肮脏的食物更好！"<hpage>现在，财政部长，我对你的邪恶没有耐心。在准备好的汽油瓶里保持安静。

original_en_text: Eggy, eggy! I want to lay a lot of pretty eggies! So tell the big ones, bring me more food!
original_zh_text: 蛋蛋！我要下漂亮蛋蛋！叫大个子们多送吃的来！
translated_text: Eggs, eggs, I want to grow more eggs, and I ask you to bring me more food. "
secondary_translated_text: 鸡蛋，鸡蛋，我想种更多的鸡蛋，我请求你给我带更多的食物。"

original_en_text: <hpage>Your chambers are surely grand, sir bug, but it is plain to see you are no sovereign here.<page>Is our state so bare, pilgrim?... “By the will of the Conductors,” we once boomed, and this Citadel shook at our decree.<page>But the words... How hollow they echoed. The mantle of rule, claimed greedily from Pharloom’s fading first children, those bitter Weavers... it was yoke, not crown.<page>Now, in our Citadel’s silence, we share their truth. Only one monarch’s claws ever clutched this kingdom, though we raised our voices to cry otherwise.<page>Would you see her, pilgrim? Up there at our Citadel’s crown? Reach those heights we’d hoped to hide and bow before this land’s true ruler.<hpage>In time near, sir bug, I shall indeed climb to meet your monarch...
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生的居所虽大，却不像是贵族风格。<page>看着如此寒酸吗？当年我们高喊着"遵指挥家之命"，整座圣堡都为之震颤。<page>但激昂的呼喊现在也只剩空洞的回响。从垂死织者手中夺来的权柄，实际上却是枷锁。<page>如今在圣堡的寂静中，我们才真正明白……坐在王座上的从来只有那位。<page>想觐见她吗？登上圣堡之巅，向真王跪拜吧。<hpage>很快我就会登顶的，先生……
translated_text: <hpage>Your room is really beautiful, Mr. Berger, but you are certainly not the king here.<page>Is the earth really that naked? "At the commander's order, we attacked once, and at our order, the castle was trembling. "<page>Pharaoh's first fallen son, a craft wrestler, was stripped of his kingdom's coat due to greed. This is not a crown, but a chain.<page>Now, in the silence of the castle, we share his truth. Despite our cries, only the real Griffin can conquer the kingdom.<page>"You want to see it, Perry? "We have reached a point where we want to hide and bow to the real leaders of this country.<hpage>"Sooner or later, Mr. Baker, I will surely meet your master. "
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>伯杰先生，你的房间真的很漂亮，但你肯定不是这里的国王。<page>地球真的那么赤裸吗？“按照指挥官的命令，我们发动了一次进攻，按照我们的命令，城堡都在颤抖。"<page>法老的第一个堕落的儿子是一名手工摔跤手，由于贪婪而被剥夺了王国的外衣。这不是王冠，而是链条。<page>现在，在城堡的寂静中，我们分享了他的真相。尽管我们哭泣，但只有真正的格里芬才能征服王国。<page>“你想看吗，佩里？“我们已经到了想要躲藏并向这个国家真正的领导人鞠躬的地步。<hpage>“贝克先生，迟早我会见到你的主人。"

original_en_text: Cleansed, is this place. Eternal, is the d-d-duty of the sentinels.
original_zh_text: 净、净化完成。哨卫之职……永存。
translated_text: Cleanliness is a place, and eternity is the responsibility of the guardian.
secondary_translated_text: 清洁是一个地方，永恒是守护者的责任。

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I bring ingredients for the dish.<page>At last! My master is withering away from hunger! Let us see what gifts you bring.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我带食材来了。<page>终于！主人快饿扁了，快呈上来！
translated_text: <hpage>I found the ingredients for this dish.<page>Of course! Your master is hungry.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>我找到了这道菜的原料。<page>当然可以！你的主人饿了。

original_en_text: <hpage>Will you tell me of those who guard this structure? They are servants of the Citadel, are they not?<page>Servants...? They too are penitents. In a past age, that caste committed their own sacrilege against the Citadel.<page>A sin long forgotten, but so grave that their offspring and the offspring of their offspring carry the guilt with them still. To serve here is their only hope of absolution.
original_zh_text: <hpage>可以说说这里的守卫么，他们是圣堡仆从？<page>仆从？不，都是赎罪者。祖辈犯下亵渎圣堡的重罪。<page>虽被遗忘，但其后代仍然在此服役，这是唯一的赎罪之道。
translated_text: <hpage>Who will protect this building? They are servants of the castle, aren't they?<page>"Service? ". In the past, the castle has committed atrocities against the castle.<page>This is a long forgotten sin, but serious enough for future generations to endure.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>谁来保护这座建筑？他们是城堡的仆人，不是吗？<page>“服务？".过去，城堡曾对城堡犯下暴行。<page>这是一种早已被遗忘的罪过，但严重到足以让子孙后代忍受。

original_en_text: Pilgrim of Pharloom eternal, regale us with our Threefold song, that you may rise above and worship before our kingdom’s divine heart.
original_zh_text: 永恒纺络的朝圣者啊，献上三重圣歌，方可升华，觐见王国圣心。
translated_text: Eternal pilgrims in heaven support us with our three songs, reverence us, beyond the heart of our kingdom.
secondary_translated_text: 天堂里永恒的朝圣者用我们的三首歌支持我们，在我们王国的核心之外尊敬我们。

original_en_text: <hpage>If this place was holy once, no evidence remains. Even as a prison, it has been neglected.<hpage>If you wish, I can free you. You can descend through the caverns below until you find a settlement.<page>You... are asking me to leave this place? Wh-what a strange, fearful thought! Such a sin would never... no.<page>By the grace of the Citadel, I am here as a penitent. Here, I can hide from the shame of my sins until they are withered away by time.<page>Leave this place...? Please! Strike me down dead before you speak such blasphemy again!
original_zh_text: <hpage>若这里曾是圣地，如今也面目全非，连监狱都称不上。<hpage>想走的话，我可以放你下去，直到找到聚居地。<page>离……离开？多么可怕的想法！这等罪孽万万不可……<page>承蒙圣堡慈悲，我在此忏悔。直到时光洗刷罪孽。<page>求你了！再说这种渎神之言就杀了我吧！
translated_text: <hpage>This is a sacred place, but there is no evidence to prove it.<hpage>If you want, I will drive you. You can walk through the caves until you find a settlement.<page>Who are you? "Do you want to leave this place? "What a strange and terrible idea! Such a crime has never occurred.<page>Thanks to the grace of God, I was able to come here as a confessor and hide the shame of my sin until time ran out. "<page>Leave this place... ... "Kill me before you tell me this. "
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>这是一个神圣的地方，但没有证据证明这一点。<hpage>如果你愿意，我可以开车送你。您可以穿过洞穴，直到找到定居点。<page>你是谁？“你想离开这个地方吗？“多么奇怪和可怕的想法啊！这样的犯罪从未发生过。<page>感谢上帝的恩典，我能够以忏悔者的身份来到这里，隐藏我罪恶的耻辱，直到时间耗尽。"<page>离开这个地方. ...“在你告诉我这个之前先杀了我。"

original_en_text: The mantle of conductor weighs heavy. Had I known the cost before its bearing, would I have accepted the duty?
original_zh_text: 指挥之职重若千钧。如果早知这份代价，我还会接过这担子吗？
translated_text: The driver's coat was heavy. If you knew about it before it happened, would you be responsible?
secondary_translated_text: 司机的外套很重。如果你在事情发生之前就知道了，你会负责吗？

original_en_text: S... song, is it? You have brought song? You are of the Citadel, then? How... how many of you?<hpage>I am alone, sir. You needn’t fear, I am no servant of the Citadel. Are you a prisoner of theirs?<page>P... prisoner? I understand you not. There is no prison here.<page>This is a holy place of forgiveness. Please, speak with reverence.
original_zh_text: 歌……歌声？你带了歌？是圣堡的？来了……来了多少？<hpage>就我一个。别怕，我不是圣堡的走狗。你是他们的囚犯吗？<page>囚……囚犯？听不懂。<page>这儿是赎罪圣地，请怀着敬畏之心说话。
translated_text: What is this? It's a song, right? Actually? Did you bring a song? Are you from the castle? This is... How many?<hpage>I'm just a man. "Don't worry, I'm not a prisoner. "<page>"I don't know, but he's a prisoner. "I don't know, there is no prison.<page>This is the sanctuary of forgiveness. Please speak carefully.
secondary_translated_text: 这是什么？这是一首歌，对吧？实际上？你带了歌吗？你是城堡里的吗？这是...有多少？<hpage>我只是一个男人。”别担心，我不是囚犯。"<page>“我不知道，但他是个囚犯。“我不知道，没有监狱。<page>这是宽恕的圣所。请仔细说话。

original_en_text: As it was sung, our song sustains.<page>For Pharloom eternal, we shall build.
original_zh_text: 歌咏不息，圣域不堕。<page>为永恒纺络，我等筑造。
translated_text: When the music ends, the music continues.<page>We created eternity.
secondary_translated_text: 当音乐结束时，音乐就继续。<page>我们创造了永恒。

original_en_text: We would hear the song of the Architects, at the core of our Citadel.<page>They who sustain our realm, its walls, its floors and its voice, even as others fall silent.
original_zh_text: 我等欲闻建筑匠团之歌，响彻圣堡核心。<page>他们维系疆域、高墙、楼宇与圣音，纵使万籁俱寂。
translated_text: In the center of the castle, the songs of the architects can be heard.<page>They will guard our kingdom, its walls, its beds, and its sound.
secondary_translated_text: 在城堡的中心，可以听到建筑师的歌声。<page>他们将保卫我们的王国、它的墙壁、它的床和它的声音。

original_en_text: A Crustnut! Stale and dull, you’ll be thinking, yes? But ground to finest powder, that’s when its tart taste blooms!
original_zh_text: 硬壳果！你是不是觉得又干又不新鲜？得磨成粉才有酸香味！
translated_text: Local! I think it's old and boring, but if you transfer it to the best powder, its flavor will bloom!
secondary_translated_text: 本地！我认为它又旧又无聊，但如果你把它转移到最好的粉末上，它的味道就会绽放！

original_en_text: <hpage>If I’m to learn the melody upon this cylinder, I’ll first need to find a working device to play it. This one here has long ceased to function.<hpage>The vaults above would surely hold another such device. I must search thoroughly.
original_zh_text: <hpage>要解读音筒旋律，先得找到能用的设备。这台早就坏了。<hpage>上层书库肯定还有，我得仔细寻找。
translated_text: <hpage>To understand the melody of this cylinder, you first need to find an instrument to play it.<hpage>The box at the top should have another device. We must study it deeply.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>要理解这个圆柱体的旋律，你首先需要找到一种乐器来演奏它。<hpage>顶部的盒子应该有另一个设备。我们必须深入研究它。

original_en_text: You! Mite or mourner! Fell fated chosen left till last!<page>Relent! Submit! The fatal blow was struck. Fair Pharloom wails its end.<page>We woe befallen few remained, let us join here, at last, and show our fires fierce.<page>Together to share our kingdom’s pain, feel it scorch our shells, and know clear its suffering, its sorrow!
original_zh_text: 你！蝼蚁或悼亡者！最后的倒霉蛋！<page>认命吧！致命一击已出，纺络在哀嚎！<page>让我们这些余孽在此共赴末路！<page>共品王国的灼痛，让烈焰焚尽甲壳！
translated_text: It's you! Insects are people who always cry. Fate chose the left until the end.<page>Sorry! Great War: A fatal blow is coming. Fair Farm's final episode<page>Our misfortune falls on what remains, and we are finally gathered here to demonstrate the power of our fire.<page>We share the pain of our kingdom, feel our burning shells, and we understand your pain and suffering.
secondary_translated_text: 是你！昆虫是总是哭泣的人。命运选择了左翼，直到最后。<page>抱歉！大战：致命打击即将来临。Fair Farm最后一集<page>我们的不幸落在了剩下的东西身上，我们终于聚集在这里，展示我们火的力量。<page>我们分担王国的痛苦，感受我们燃烧的贝壳，我们理解你们的痛苦和磨难。

original_en_text: Our song upon a silken thread.... Such beautiful sound, so long absent from our halls.<page>Keep safe our melody, good pilgrim. You shall likely be the last to receive it.
original_zh_text: 丝弦上的旋律啊……殿堂久违的天籁。<page>请妥善保存我们的旋律，你怕是最后一位听到此曲的了。
translated_text: This song is silk. There is nothing good in this room.<page>Good pilgrim, you may be the last one to do this.
secondary_translated_text: 这首歌是丝绸的。这个房间里没有什么好东西。<page>好朝圣者，你可能是最后一个这样做的人。

original_en_text: We would hear the melody of the Conductors, high in their gleaming towers.<page>They bearing the heaviest mantle, who would guide our land ever on to greatness.
original_zh_text: 我等欲闻执政指挥之旋律，萦绕辉光尖塔。<page>他们肩负千钧权柄，引领王国永续辉煌。
translated_text: From the lighthouse, you can hear the master's melody.<page>They will shoulder the heaviest weapons and make our land great.
secondary_translated_text: 从灯塔上，你可以听到大师的旋律。<page>他们将肩负起最重的武器，让我们的土地变得伟大。

original_en_text: A visitor? Now this is rare.<page>I must apologise for not rising to greet you. After an age spent sickly, I find myself unable to lift from this bedchamber.<page>I hope, good pilgrim, our Citadel has shown you the courtesy deserved of a bug devout.<hpage>I’ve borne its hospitality well enough, aged one...<page>Ahhh... My sympathies, pilgrim... We have fallen so far. And now, sadly, if you’ve come seeking aid or understanding, I fear I too shall disappoint. <page>Whatever you would ask, I have only my melody left to offer. It is a simple thing, the smallest of gifts, but perhaps more special now, for it has been rarely heard in these quietened times.
original_zh_text: 有访客？这倒是稀奇。<page>恕我不能起身相迎，卧于病榻多年，这把老骨头动不了啦。<page>朝圣者能到这里不容易，希望圣堡对你这虔信者有以礼相待。<hpage>已经领教过它的待客之道了，老人家……<page>唉……抱歉，圣堡已堕落至此。如果你想求助，怕是要让你失望了。<page>我能赠予你的只剩这首曲子。虽然微薄，但在这孤寂的时代也算珍品。
translated_text: Visitors? Today is not like this.<page>I'm sorry, I can't stand up and say hello, I'm terminally ill, I can't leave this room.<page>Dear pilgrims, may our cities show the courtesy of pious insects.<hpage>At the age of one, he was very satisfied with his hospitality.<page>Yes, right. Pilgrim, I have come this far, but unfortunately I am disappointed even when you seek help or understanding.<page>Whatever you want, I will only give you my song. Such a simple gift is small, but it may become more special now. I have never heard of it in a quiet time.
secondary_translated_text: 访客？今天不是这样的。<page>对不起，我无法站起来打招呼，我病得绝症，我不能离开这个房间。<page>亲爱的朝圣者，愿我们的城市表现出虔诚昆虫的礼貌。<hpage>一岁时，他对自己的热情好客感到非常满意。<page>是的，正确的。朝圣者，我已经走到了这一步，但不幸的是，即使你寻求帮助或理解，我也感到失望。<page>无论你想要什么，我只会给你我的歌。这样简单的礼物虽然小，但现在可能会变得更加特别。我在安静的时候从未听说过它。

original_en_text: If the weight of your sins bear down upon you, you may remain here with me in penitence, sister.
original_zh_text: 若你自觉罪孽深重，可留下与我一同忏悔。
translated_text: If your sins come upon you, repent with me!”
secondary_translated_text: 如果你的罪降临到你身上，请与我一起悔改！”

original_en_text: Ah.... your s-song. So long I’ve sat in silence. Tell me... are all songs played now as exquisite as this? Or has time made my hearing unrefined?<hpage>This art is new to me, and my skill is limited, but your appreciation is not unwelcome.<page>Ahh. The beauty of it. It is almost painful to my weary senses. Perhaps though, this pain is merely part of my penitence. <page>Play on, will you? I would join your tune. Just forgive me if my voice has become brutish.
original_zh_text: 啊……你的歌。沉寂太久，现在所有曲子都这般动听吗？还是我耳朵钝了？<hpage>我技艺粗浅，承蒙你不嫌弃。<page>这美感……刺痛我麻木的感官。或许这正是赎罪的一部分。<page>继续演奏，可以么？我想试着应和，尽管嗓音已经嘶哑。
translated_text: This song kept you silent for a long time. Can you tell me how good this song is?<hpage>This art is new to me, and my abilities are limited, but I don't welcome your evaluation.<page>Oh, yeah, right. This is so cool. Tiredness almost hurt me. This pain may be part of confession.<page>Keep playing, okay? Do you agree? Add your songs. I'm sorry, my voice was so rude.
secondary_translated_text: 这首歌让你沉默了很长时间。你能告诉我这首歌有多好听吗？<hpage>这门艺术对我来说是新的，我的能力有限，但我不欢迎你的评价。<page>哦，是的，对。这太酷了疲劳几乎伤害了我。这种痛苦可能是忏悔的一部分。<page>继续玩，好吗？你同意吗？添加您的歌曲。对不起，我的声音太粗鲁了。

original_en_text: You refuse to play our sacred melody! Why pause, Weaver-thing? Do you cower at the truths it may illuminate? Surely you are not the lesser sort that bows to fear?<hpage>When the moment calls, Vaultkeeper, I shall listen. For now, your task remains to keep the cylinder safe. And know, you shall answer to my blade if you fail.
original_zh_text: 你拒绝演奏圣歌！在害怕吗，织者？畏惧被照亮的真相？原来你也是怯懦之辈？<hpage>时机到了自然会听。现在你的任务是保管好音筒，若出了纰漏，我的针刃可不认虫。
translated_text: I refuse to play sacred melodies! "Why did you stop, bug? "Are you afraid of what will be revealed? "" Aren't you a scared child?”"<hpage>CSC, listen, your job now is to protect your gas bottles, and if you can't do that, you will be responsible for my sword.
secondary_translated_text: 我拒绝演奏神圣的旋律！“你为什么停下来，虫子？“你害怕会被揭露吗？“你不是一个害怕的孩子吗？”"<hpage>CSC，听着，你现在的工作是保护你的煤气瓶，如果你做不到，你将负责我的剑。

translated_text: In this poem, there is a blessing.
secondary_translated_text: 在这首诗里，有一种祝福。

original_en_text: For our base, we require the gelatinous Mossberry Stew. Its concoction is a druidic art, a jealously guarded secret of the moss-painted caverns deep below us.
original_zh_text: 基底需要苔莓浓汤。配方是沼地德鲁伊的不传之秘。
translated_text: At our base, we need a foam straw to make ice cream. Their mixture is Druze art, the secret hidden in the caves below us.
secondary_translated_text: 在我们的基地，我们需要一根泡沫吸管来制作冰淇淋。他们的混合物就是德鲁兹艺术，隐藏在我们下面洞穴中的秘密。

original_en_text: Sweet fruit that grows in moist environments. Its seeds are toxic to most creatures.
original_zh_text: 生长在潮湿环境中的甜味浆果，种子对大多数生物有毒。
translated_text: It is a sweet fruit that grows in humid environments. Seeds are toxic to most organisms.
secondary_translated_text: 它是一种生长在潮湿环境中的甜味水果。种子对大多数生物都有毒。

translated_text: Trump.
Paul's thoughts

original_en_text: Report of the Memorium and its maintenance.<br><br>“Containment fails. Memory lost. Excise outer. Maintain inner.<br>Shellwood stasis sustained - Remember.<br>Marrowlands stasis critical - Remember.<br>Verdanian environment exceeded - Destined to forget.”
original_zh_text: 忆廊维缮报告。<br><br>“封存溃败。记忆遗失。切除外区。维持内区。<br>甲木林封存稳定——须铭记。<br>髓骨地封存危急——须铭记。<br>翠庭生态失控——注定遗忘。”
translated_text: Souvenirs and their contents.<br><br>Stop failing. Externally delete memory loss. Stay at home. "<br>The stagnation of bark and trees continues.<br>Severe bone marrow arrest-remember.<br>In addition to the impressive atmosphere-destined to be forgotten. "

original_en_text: Essence of a being merged within. Silk will be restored when resting at a bench.

translated_text: The essence of existence disappeared and silk was found on the beach.
secondary_translated_text: 存在的本质消失了，海滩上发现了丝绸。

original_en_text: Metallic cylinder of Citadel make, etched with the melody of the Vaultkeepers.<br><br>The cylinder can be played in a gramophone.

original_en_text: Long burning rock from the base of Pharloom. Mined and used by the Citadel in its forgings.

secondary_translated_text: 农场的地板上有一块在城堡中挖掘出来的燃烧的石头，用于伪造。

original_en_text: One part of a cogwork heart, containing an intricate mechanism of wheels and regulators.
original_zh_text: 一个内含精密轮组结构的机心部件。
translated_text: It is part of the core of the transmission and has a complex mechanism consisting of wheels and controllers.
secondary_translated_text: 它是变速箱核心的一部分，具有由轮子和控制器组成的复杂机构。
