original_en_text: Singed parchment containing a pilgrim’s scrawl.<br><br>“My dear companions, all are gone now, devoured, scorched, fallen to exhaustion, or worse, seduced by the Haunting.”
original_zh_text: 烧焦的羊皮纸，一名朝圣者在上面留下了潦草的笔迹。<br><br>“同伴皆逝，或遭吞噬，或焚为灰烬，或力竭而亡，甚至......堕于丝咒。”

original_en_text: Sentence issued by the Citadel Ministers.<br><br>“Chosen of the Choir, by grace of our magnanimous Conductors you are granted mercy. When you exit that cage, an elder bug of sins absolved, you may rejoin our flock and feel our light, and never again shall your voice fall silent.”
original_zh_text: 圣堡大臣宣判的特赦令。<br><br>"圣咏团的选民，你因指挥家的宽宏获得赦免。走出牢笼，作为洗清罪孽的长者，重归我们的群体，永沐光明，歌喉永不沉寂。"

original_zh_text: 道路织者奇拉尔的雕像，像上刻有祷文。<br><br>“仁慈织者啊，您洞悉我们的罪过、甲壳的脆弱、歌喉的微弱，但仍施予庇护。心怀蝼蚁，何其伟大。”
translated_text: Sculpture, weaving sculptures on the street. I have a prayer book.<br><br>"Blessed are you, Mrs. Weaver, for you have seen our sins, our fragile shells, our weak voices. "
secondary_translated_text: 雕塑，街道上编织雕塑。我有一本祈祷书。<br><br>“韦弗夫人，你是祝福的，因为你看到了我们的罪恶、我们脆弱的外壳、我们微弱的声音。"

original_zh_text: 建筑师的旋齿钥匙。可用于开启圣堡工厂的小教堂。

secondary_translated_text: 带有建筑钥匙的教堂将被改造成开放式地下室。

original_en_text: Simple protective garb, expertly woven but showing signs of age.
original_zh_text: 工艺精湛的旧披风，提供基础防护。
translated_text: Simple protective clothing, well knitted but showing signs of aging.
secondary_translated_text: 简单的防护服，针织精良，但有老化迹象。

original_en_text: Retracted Weaver surveillance instrument. Once assembled, the device will allow observation over vast distances.  <br><br>The Farsight can be assembled in a home.
original_zh_text: 收起状态的织者监视设备。组装后可用于远距离观测。<br><br>遥观仪可在钟居内组装。
translated_text: After the watch is assembled and sold, it can be monitored remotely.<br><br>You can install Farsight at home.
secondary_translated_text: 手表组装并销售后，可以进行远程监控。<br><br>您可以在家安装Farsight。

translated_text: Common Letter (Common Letter)
Shell fragment (shell)
Return to the individual

original_en_text: Scrawled missive on tattered black rag.<br><br>“Defiler... Dark... Attend... Home... Wheel...”
original_zh_text: 黑色的破布上写满潦草的字迹。<br><br>“亵渎者...... 晦暗...... 赴约...... 轮子......”
translated_text: The letter was written on a piece of black cloth.<br><br>"We destroy them. Please join this forum in the dark. Bipod (Bipod)
secondary_translated_text: 这封信写在一块黑布上。<br><br>“我们摧毁他们。请在黑暗中加入这个论坛。两脚架（两脚架）

original_en_text: Beads carved from various materials, used as a measure of faith and traded as currency. Each is etched with a fine patterned design.
original_zh_text: 用不同材料雕刻的珠子，既作为信仰的象征又被用作流通货币。每颗表面都镌刻着精美的纹饰图案。
translated_text: Pearls are carved from a variety of materials and are used as a measure of faith and can be exchanged for money.
secondary_translated_text: 珍珠由各种材料雕刻而成，被用作信仰的衡量标准，可以换取金钱。

translated_text: He became stronger.

original_en_text: Enlivened heart of the Green Prince. Its beat is sharp and clear.
original_zh_text: 绿王子复苏的心脏，跳动急剧清晰。
translated_text: The heart of the Green Prince is full of vibrant life, and his jokes are clear and easy to understand.
secondary_translated_text: 绿王子的内心充满了活力，他的笑话清晰易懂。

translated_text: Children's nails

original_en_text: Vial gifted by the Chapel Maid, filled full with swirling soul.
original_zh_text: 教堂侍女赠予的小瓶，里面装着漩流状的灵魂。
translated_text: The church secretary gave him a pot full of spinning souls.
secondary_translated_text: 教堂秘书给了他一壶旋转的灵魂。

original_en_text: Brittle levitating rock, found throughout the fringes of Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 遍布纺络边缘地区的悬浮岩石，质地轻脆。
translated_text: The end of the cab is marked by a weak piston.
secondary_translated_text: 驾驶室末端有一个薄弱的活塞。

original_en_text: Black stone egg formed before the birth of Pharloom.<br><br>A relic from the ancient past. Highly prized by collectors of historical items.
original_zh_text: 纺络诞生前便已形成的黑色石卵。<br><br>远古时期的遗物，是古董收藏家梦寐以求的宝贝。
translated_text: Black stones were formed before the birth of pharaohs.<br><br>Ancient relics are highly valued by cultural collectors.
secondary_translated_text: 黑色石头形成于法老出生之前。<br><br>古代文物受到文化收藏家的高度重视。

translated_text: In the warehouse.

original_en_text: Enlivened heart of Nyleth. It beats faint and fast.
original_zh_text: 尼莱斯复苏的心脏，跳动轻盈快速。
translated_text: This activated Niels 'heart and made his pulse weak and rapid.
secondary_translated_text: 这激活了尼尔斯的心脏，使他的脉搏微弱而急促。

original_en_text: Key to a restored bell above Bellhart.
original_zh_text: 钟心镇上一座修葺完善的钟居的钥匙。
translated_text: Burkey turned to Burhart.
Oily shine.
Firth station
Items repaired
Hotels near The Kitchen in Moss
secondary_translated_text: The Kitchen in Moss附近酒店

translated_text: About Needle
Plasma (Plasma)

original_en_text: Finely crafted metal key, shaped to resemble a surgical implement.<br><br>Grants access to the Citadel’s Whiteward.
original_zh_text: 形似外科手术器械的精致钥匙。
translated_text: A metal wrench specially designed for surgical purposes.<br><br>Whitewood was allowed to enter the castle.
secondary_translated_text: 专门为手术目的设计的金属扳手。<br><br>怀特伍德被允许进入城堡。

translated_text: Poetry Pipeline

original_en_text: Contorted mass of ashen vine. Cries out incessantly.
original_zh_text: 灰藤扭曲成团，持续发出哀鸣。
translated_text: The gray grapes bent and he continued to cry.
secondary_translated_text: 灰葡萄弯曲了，他继续哭泣。

translated_text: About Clove

original_en_text: Carving of Atla, Weaver of time. A prayer is etched upon it.<br><br>“By grace of your example, and our history held full in mind, our song is yours, as your name is sacred. Weaver Atla, may you be praised eternal.”
original_zh_text: 时光织者阿特拉的雕像，像上刻有祷文。<br><br>“以您为榜样，我们铭记历史。颂歌献予您，使您圣名永存。织者阿特拉，愿您永沐荣光。”
translated_text: Fragment of Atlantis, fabric of time These words are written in prayer.<br><br>Our history lives in our hearts, and his name is sacred. See Atra, forever praise. "
secondary_translated_text: 亚特兰蒂斯的碎片，时间的结构这些话是写在祈祷中的。<br><br>我们的历史活在我们心中，他的名字是神圣的。看阿特拉，永远的赞美。"

translated_text: It smells like Paris.

original_en_text: Sermon of service, delivered by an ordained Vaultkeeper to acolytes in training.
original_zh_text: 侍奉布道，由受封的书库管理员向其信众宣讲。
translated_text: Advice to trainers of appointed deacons
secondary_translated_text: 向指定的残疾人培训员提供咨询意见

translated_text: Option
The soul of a young woman.
Hunter's Heart

original_en_text: Long sewing tool, uniquely balanced for combat. The blade is marked by time and use.
original_zh_text: 为战斗设计的特制长针，原身为纺织工具。刃身留有岁月的痕迹。
translated_text: Long seam tool has a unique balance and is suitable for combat. Time and purpose are engraved on your fingernails.
secondary_translated_text: 长缝工具具有独特的平衡性，适合战斗。时间和目标刻在你的指甲上。

translated_text: Materials
Option

original_en_text: Sacred melody of the Vaultkeepers, coveted and claimed by the pontiff below the Whispering Vaults.
original_zh_text: 书库管理员的圣歌，低语书库下方主教梦寐以求的旋律。
translated_text: The sacred melody of the guardians was called upon, and the Pope announced in a low voice.
secondary_translated_text: 守护者的神圣旋律被召唤，教皇低声宣布。

translated_text: game was up
What does cultural heritage mean?
Her shirt was torn.

original_en_text: Adornment strung with a large quantity of rosaries. Can be broken and the rosaries used to trade.
original_zh_text: 串有大量念珠的项链，拆解后取出的念珠可用于交易。
translated_text: It is a pearl inlaid with many pearls that can be broken and used in the pearl trade.
secondary_translated_text: 它是镶有许多珍珠的珍珠，可以破碎用于珍珠贸易。

original_en_text: Liquid lifeseed extracted from a ripe bud. Possesses regenerative qualities.
original_zh_text: 成熟花苞中提取的生命精华，具有再生功效。
translated_text: Liquid nails are extracted from mature branches, a reproductive quality.
secondary_translated_text: 液体指甲是从成熟的树枝中提取的，这是一种繁殖品质。

translated_text: This is the architect's key.

original_en_text: Carved child’s toy of a bug clad in leaves.
original_zh_text: 披叶虫子造型的儿童玩具。
translated_text: Children cut toys, and worms are only installed on leaves.
secondary_translated_text: 孩子们切割玩具，蠕虫只会安装在叶子上。

translated_text: Hidden Soul
Chain of roses.
Pink necklace
Pink necklace
superficial memory.

original_en_text: Common weapon of Pharloom, still in good condition despite long use. An expertly crafted metal rod with a sharpened tip.
original_zh_text: 纺络的常见武器，精制的金属杆配上锐利的尖端，历久弥新。
translated_text: Although the ordinary pistol in the model has been used for a long time, it is in good condition. The stick is made of metal and has a sharp end.
secondary_translated_text: 型号中的普通手枪虽然使用了很长时间，但状况良好。这根棍子由金属制成，末端锋利。

translated_text: The roses disappeared.
Are you sure?
Sell it.

original_en_text: Last surgery of Conductor Mizello, performed in Whiteward’s operating theatre.
original_zh_text: 指挥家米泽洛在白愈厅的手术室中进行的最后一场手术。
translated_text: The last thing Mi Zero did was go to Whitley's room.
secondary_translated_text: Mi Zero做的最后一件事就是去惠特利的房间。

translated_text: Silk Heart

original_en_text: Fine thread spun from the soul of its creator. Highly coveted for its remarkable strength and mystical properties. Used to heal wounds, extend life and weave powerful runes.
original_zh_text: 由其创造者的灵魂纺成的精细丝线，因其非凡的强度和神秘特性而备受珍视。可用于治愈伤口、延续生命，以及编织强力的符文。
translated_text: Matter is the structure of the creator's soul and is highly praised for its extraordinary power and mysterious nature. It is used to heal wounds, extend life and weave powerful runes.
secondary_translated_text: 物质是造物主灵魂的结构，因其非凡的力量和神秘的本质而受到高度赞扬。它用于治愈伤口、延长生命和编织强大的符文。

translated_text: Rosalie's

original_en_text: Map of Pharloom, partially filled out. Without a quill it cannot be updated.
original_zh_text: 沙克拉绘制的纺络局部地图。可使用羽毛笔更新地图以显示新发现的区域。
translated_text: Flamenco, partially filled. You can't update it unless you have a pen.
secondary_translated_text: 弗拉门戈，部分填满。除非您有笔，否则您无法更新它。

original_en_text: A frustrating fiend. They flee beneath the bone whenever I try to strike them down.
original_zh_text: 恼人的小恶魔，每当我挥针便钻入骸骨缝隙逃遁。
translated_text: Whenever I try to kill them, they hide under my bones.
secondary_translated_text: 每当我试图杀死它们时，它们就会躲在我的骨头下面。

translated_text: Captain Waiter

original_en_text: Is this abundance a sign of purity or greed? The way faith is measured in this land is curious indeed.
original_zh_text: 这般财富象征着虔信还是贪婪？多数虫肯定视此等囤积为罪孽。
translated_text: This wealth is nothing more than a symbol of purity or greed.
secondary_translated_text: 这种财富只不过是纯洁或贪婪的象征。

original_en_text: Once they summoned song from their subjects. Now they rise only to command an end to those unstrung.
original_zh_text: 昔日的乐章指挥者，如今只为剿灭清醒者而挥棒。
translated_text: There is a song about this. Now, they are serving those who have not yet finished.
secondary_translated_text: 有一首歌是关于这个的。现在，他们正在为那些尚未完成的人服务。

translated_text: as Sheikh Khan

original_en_text: Automatons of impeccable construction, welcoming entrants to their chamber with a display of deadly dance.
original_zh_text: 以致命舞姿迎接访客的精密自动机。
translated_text: The robot's structure is perfect and you will be welcomed into the room with the dance of death.
secondary_translated_text: 机器人的结构完美，你会被死亡之舞欢迎进入房间。

original_en_text: Mad matriarch of the Slab rarely seen outside her warren. From her all jailers are born and bred.
original_zh_text: 罪石牢狱的癫狂主宰，所有狱卒皆由其孕育。
translated_text: The crazy queen of Slanz is almost invisible outside her territory. All prisoners were born and raised.
secondary_translated_text: 斯兰兹的疯狂女王在她的领地之外几乎看不见。所有囚犯都是土生土长的。

original_en_text: Flight it possesses, but only just. It may lift from the stone, but those sad wings would never carry it far.
original_zh_text: 那对萎缩的翅膀勉强能使它们离地数尺，但没法飞多远。
translated_text: He has the ability to fly, but nothing else. It can fly with stones, but its sad wings will never fly far.
secondary_translated_text: 他有飞行能力，但没有其他能力。它可以带着石头飞翔，但它悲伤的翅膀永远飞不远。

translated_text: Pilgrim's guide.
Trobo （ Trobo ）

original_en_text: Mindless infant larva, coated in thick slime.
translated_text: The bodies of larvae without brains are usually covered with mucus.
secondary_translated_text: 没有大脑的幼虫的身体通常覆盖着粘液。

original_en_text: Chief and chaplain of the Stilkin, forever raging against the Citadel that chokes their caves and sees them suffer.
original_zh_text: 斯提金部族酋长兼祭司，对圣堡切齿痛恨——圣堡毁掉了斯提金部族的洞穴，令其族虫苦不堪言。
translated_text: Stirkin's chiefs and priests were angry at the castle, which still closed the cave and watched them suffer.
secondary_translated_text: 斯特尔金的酋长和牧师对城堡感到愤怒，城堡仍然关闭洞穴并看着他们受苦。

translated_text: Boran Services
Recommended (Recommended)

original_en_text: An essential bug if one ever hoped to navigate that dark maze of stacks and scrolls.
original_zh_text: 如果没有此虫引路，没有其他虫能在那个由书卷堆砌的黑暗迷宫中穿行。
translated_text: If you want to navigate through a dark maze of books and scrolls, this is an inevitable mistake.
secondary_translated_text: 如果你想在书和卷轴的黑暗迷宫中导航，这是一个不可避免的错误。

original_en_text: Child of Verdania, fully capable to fight despite its young age.
original_zh_text: 翠庭的幼童，虽年幼却战力完备。
translated_text: Although the children of Birdanha are young, they can fight.
secondary_translated_text: 虽然Birdanha的孩子很小，但他们可以战斗。

original_en_text: Their thick shroud leaves them sightless, yet it seems to matter little. They have no care for their own safety, wishing only to charge at those they sense as sinful.
original_zh_text: 厚罩使其目不能视，却仍疯狂冲击周围感知到的“罪人”。
translated_text: They don't worry about their safety, they just want to blame those who feel guilty.
secondary_translated_text: 他们不担心自己的安全，他们只想责怪那些感到内疚的人。

translated_text: Clive can talk.

original_en_text: Large, gelatinous drifter. Chases away threats by hurling its bulk around.
original_zh_text: 巨大的凝胶状漂浮生物。利用自己身体冲撞，驱赶威胁。
translated_text: This is a gel-like drift that increases the size of the threat and thus reduces it.
secondary_translated_text: 这是一种类似凝胶的漂移，会增加威胁的规模，从而减少威胁。

translated_text: Old man in the choir.

original_en_text: Aggressive fly of Pharloom’s lowlands. Rams prey with its hardbone mask.
original_zh_text: 纺络低地区域的暴脾气飞蝇，善于使用骨质头甲冲撞猎物。
translated_text: Moha in the Param Plain. They wore masks and went hunting.
secondary_translated_text: 帕拉姆平原的莫哈。他们戴着面具去打猎。

original_en_text: Blade maiden of a once renown warrior sect, survived long beyond the rest of her order.
original_zh_text: 纺络曾出现过一个赫赫有名的勇士宗派，而这位女针客就是其最后的幸存者。
translated_text: The infamous samurai Lady Blade has lived longer than any other cult.
secondary_translated_text: 臭名昭著的武士刀锋夫人的寿命比任何其他邪教都长。

translated_text: "Egham's servant.

original_en_text: Blindingly fast, winged warrior able to launch pointed pinions from its forelimbs.
original_zh_text: 能从前肢发射尖刺的极速飞翼勇士。
translated_text: Sharp feathers protrude from the forearms of the wings, allowing them to fire at incredible speeds.
secondary_translated_text: 锋利的羽毛从翅膀的前臂突出，使它们能够以令人难以置信的速度射击。

translated_text: Judge, judge.
The last judge
Bailey, the keeper

original_en_text: Leaping hunter of a bygone age. The swiftest of their sect, deftly skilled with spinning foreblades.
original_zh_text: 善用旋转刀刃的传奇猎手，曾以速度称霸整个派系。
translated_text: The most experienced soldier in your camp skillfully turns the sword forward.
secondary_translated_text: 您营地中最有经验的士兵熟练地将剑向前转动。

original_en_text: They seek to slay their only chance at survival. Alas, any words would fall useless. I have only my blade to offer response.
original_zh_text: 它们想要斩断族群最后的生机。我任何的言语劝解皆为徒劳，唯有利刃能终结这愚行。
translated_text: They seek their only chance of survival. God, nothing can go wrong.
secondary_translated_text: 他们寻求唯一的生存机会。天哪，什么都不会出错。

translated_text: Widow (Vovova)

original_en_text: They call out to warn their fellows at the smallest sense of threat. A successful hunt here means staying silent and hidden right up until the decisive strike.
original_zh_text: 稍有威胁迹象便会向同伴鸣叫示警。在此地成功捕猎的秘诀，在于无声潜行直至发动致命一击前的最后一刻。
translated_text: When you feel a slight threat, notify your partner. Here, successful hunting means staying silent until the decisive blow comes.
secondary_translated_text: 当您感到轻微威胁时，请通知您的伴侣。在这里，成功的狩猎意味着保持沉默，直到决定性的打击到来。

translated_text: I'm looking for a savior.

original_en_text: Though the Weavers have long passed from Pharloom, this servant still performs its function.
original_zh_text: 纺络的织者虽已绝迹，这位仆从仍恪守古老的职责。
translated_text: Pharaoh lost his clothes, but his servants did their duty.
secondary_translated_text: 法老失去了衣服，但他的仆人履行了职责。

original_en_text: Hard-shelled bug with a climber’s pin. Their pin, once aid, has become a weapon, though the bug is unrefined in its use.
original_zh_text: 身负硬壳的朝圣者，将攀爬用的长针作为武器，尽管使用手法粗陋。
translated_text: Lizard insects with sharp needles were once a help, now they are a weapon, but abuse is not perfect.
secondary_translated_text: 长着锋利针头的蜥蜴曾经是一种帮助，现在它们是一种武器，但虐待并不完美。

original_en_text: Huge ant hunter tasked to protect the stores and passages of its tribe.
original_zh_text: 守护部族仓库及通道的重甲巨蚁。
translated_text: The giant ant hunter's mission is to defend the tribe's shops and corridors.
secondary_translated_text: 巨型蚂蚁猎人的任务是保卫部落的商店和走廊。

original_en_text: Staunch and skilled bladebug of a once flourishing land lost to time.
original_zh_text: 失落王朝的精锐刀虫，双刃技法堪称艺术。
translated_text: In this once-prosperous country, powerful and experienced prostitutes have disappeared over time.
secondary_translated_text: 在这个曾经繁荣的国家，随着时间的推移，有权势、经验丰富的妓女已经消失。

original_en_text: Aged pilgrim, overgrown with lichen and moss.
original_zh_text: 浑身覆满地衣苔藓的老迈信徒，会从胃囊喷射苔藓团块攻击。
translated_text: Ancient pilgrims were full of moss and moss.
secondary_translated_text: 古代的朝圣者身上长满了苔藓和苔藓。

original_en_text: There is no finesse in its use of Silk. It consumes its slim supply only to amplify its force.
original_zh_text: 它对灵丝的运用毫无精妙可言，只是消耗那本就稀少的灵丝储备来增强自身的力量。
translated_text: We do not use silk technology! Eat small amounts of food to increase your strength.
secondary_translated_text: 我们不使用丝绸技术！吃少量食物来增强体力。

original_en_text: Steel horned floater, able to defend itself and its companions.
original_zh_text: 长有螺旋犄角的浮空甲虫，能够有效保卫自身与同伴。
translated_text: The steel capsule protects you and your satellite.
secondary_translated_text: 钢制胶囊保护您和您的卫星。

original_en_text: Tormented will of countless husks made manifest in a pit of Silk dregs.
original_zh_text: 灵丝残渣深坑中凝聚无数空壳的怨念集合体。
translated_text: Many unstable shells appeared in the ruins.
secondary_translated_text: 废墟中出现了许多不稳定的炮弹。

original_en_text: That they ever hoped to keep their domain clean... What futility.
original_zh_text: 妄图维持这片土地的洁净……何等徒劳。
translated_text: Keeping this place clean is a waste of time.
secondary_translated_text: 保持这个地方干净是浪费时间。

translated_text: Directed by: Fared Diver

original_en_text: I would very much like to feel their soft fur, if only they weren’t so hostile.
original_zh_text: 要不是它们现在对谁都充满敌意，我真想摸摸这身柔软的绒毛。
translated_text: If you are not hostile, you really want to feel soft.
secondary_translated_text: 如果你没有敌意，你真的想感觉柔软。

original_en_text: This kingdom appears more advanced in metalwork than my own ever was, in great part due to the natural heat source at its base. Working in such an environment is an impressive feat.
original_zh_text: 此地的冶金技术远超我的故国，全因地下天然热源的优势。能在如此高温环境中劳作生存，实为壮举。
translated_text: This natural area appears to be more metallurgical than mining, but this is mainly due to the heat source at the bottom.
secondary_translated_text: 这个自然区域似乎更像冶金而不是采矿，但这主要是由于底部的热源。

original_en_text: Aerial worker lost to Pharloom’s Haunting. Bears a pouch full with flintstone which they will fling at intruders.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒侵蚀的空中劳工，随身携带一个装满燧石的袋子，投掷燧石攻击入侵者。
translated_text: The passenger died from Palin's pain. The bear picked up a bag full of stones and threw it to the attacker.
secondary_translated_text: 这名乘客因佩林的痛苦而死亡。熊捡起一个装满石头的袋子，扔给袭击者。

original_en_text: Haughty thespian convinced that only dazzling performance can raise Pharloom from the throes of death.
original_zh_text: 坚信华丽演出能拯救纺络的傲慢演员。
translated_text: The great actor believed that only dramatic comedy could save Farrow from the pain of death.
secondary_translated_text: 这位伟大的演员相信，只有戏剧喜剧才能将法罗从死亡的痛苦中拯救出来。

translated_text: Lo Cleaner
Glyde,
Things to do near the Tour of Klovis
The fourth song

original_en_text: Hard-shelled insect common upon the surface of Shellwood Pond. Once a staple food for passing pilgrims.
original_zh_text: 甲木林池沼的硬壳水栖虫，曾是朝圣者途中的主要食物。
translated_text: A common hard-shelled insect that sits on the surface of shell-shaped ponds and is a staple food for pilgrims.
secondary_translated_text: 一种常见的硬壳昆虫，栖息在贝壳状池塘的表面，是朝圣者的主食。

original_en_text: Old knight consumed by black thread.
translated_text: The man was fascinated by a black line.
secondary_translated_text: 男人被一条黑线吸引住了。

original_en_text: I would not have guessed so large and marvelous a flea existed. I am pleased it saw sense before I had to strike a killing blow.
original_zh_text: 我未曾料想竟存在如此巨大的跳蚤。幸好它在最后关头恢复理智，免于我下杀手。
translated_text: No flea is big enough to make you happy to see the truth.
secondary_translated_text: 没有跳蚤大到足以让你高兴地看到真相。

original_en_text: A terrifying achievement of Pharloom, to build a construct so large and yet so nimble.
original_zh_text: 竟能建造出如此庞大却又灵巧非凡的构造，实乃纺络工造技艺巅峰之作。
translated_text: For Faro, building such a large and flexible building is a great achievement.
secondary_translated_text: 对于法罗来说，建造如此大且灵活的建筑是一项伟大的成就。

translated_text: Bagerman Group Company
The master's master.
Shit, shit!

original_en_text: Their rough, ridged shell grips tight to any surface. Even walls and roofs become pathways for these nimble bugs.
original_zh_text: 粗糙的带棱甲壳可攀附任何表面。峭壁和洞顶对它们来说都是畅通无阻的道路。
translated_text: Always adhere firmly to any surface with the expanded shell. Walls and ceilings can also serve as springboards for these cunning insects.
secondary_translated_text: 始终牢固地粘附在带有扩张外壳的任何表面上。墙壁和天花板也可以作为这些狡猾昆虫的跳板。

translated_text: Protective Equipment
Romania lost.

original_en_text: Nature distorted... This bug was born tiny and mild. The Citadel deformed it in futile hope it may sustain.
original_zh_text: 自然天性惨遭扭曲..……此虫原本小巧温顺，却被圣堡强行改造。它的改造者竟然妄想它能承受这种畸变……
translated_text: Bacteria are very small and nature is friendly. The castle twisted him and wanted him to continue.
secondary_translated_text: 细菌非常小，自然是友好的。城堡扭曲了他，希望他继续。

translated_text: Seton Scooter

original_en_text: They would make effective hunting companions, though even without the Haunting I suspect their loyalty would always remain to their clan.
original_zh_text: 它们是优秀的狩猎伙伴。就算没有丝咒作祟，我相信它们也会永远忠于自己的部族。
translated_text: They are efficient hunters, but their loyalty to the tribe will not last forever, even without ghosts.
secondary_translated_text: 他们是高效的猎人，但即使没有鬼魂，他们对部落的忠诚也不会永远持续下去。

translated_text: horse's.

original_en_text: Shell plated worm that lives beneath pools of shifting sand.
original_zh_text: 潜伏流沙之底的板甲蠕虫，突袭吞噬猎物。
translated_text: Insects live in soft sand lakes.
secondary_translated_text: 昆虫生活在柔软的沙湖中。

translated_text: Big Rabbit

original_en_text: Large male Driznit, ferocious and territorial. Fires its heavy coral mask at intruders.
original_zh_text: 领地意识强烈的雄性掷面虫，投掷其沉重的珊瑚面甲御敌。
translated_text: A large Deznit female has a strong and sharp silhouette. Shooting intruders with heavy coral masks.
secondary_translated_text: Deznit大型雌性拥有强壮而尖锐的轮廓。戴着沉重的珊瑚面具射杀入侵者。

original_en_text: With its wranglers long dead, the Moorwing stalked the towers of Greymoor, feasting on passing pilgrims and tenders alike.
original_zh_text: 自从其驯兽师死后，荒沼翼主常年盘踞在灰沼的众多高塔，猎食过往的朝圣者和居民。
translated_text: When the guards died, the swamps 'wings flew to the top of the Gremorta Tower to feed passing pilgrims and knights.
secondary_translated_text: 当警卫死后，沼泽的翅膀飞到格雷莫尔塔的顶部，为路过的朝圣者和骑士提供食物。

original_en_text: Hiding its tongue amongst fronds so similar... There is impressive style to this one’s trickery.
original_zh_text: 将捕食舌伪装在相似钟乳石间的策略，展现惊人的欺诈美学。
translated_text: Cover your tongue with this sheet. This man's style is very impressive.
secondary_translated_text: 用这张床单遮住你的舌头。这个男人的风格非常令人印象深刻。

original_en_text: Scissor-wielding bug charged to cut and spool fallen dregs of Silk for return to the Citadel above.
original_zh_text: 挥舞剪刀处理灵丝碎屑的工匠虫，处理好的灵丝会被送回圣堡。
translated_text: The insect shakes the fabric, cuts off the fallen silk portion, removes it, and puts it back on the top of the lock.
secondary_translated_text: 昆虫摇动织物，切下掉落的丝绸部分，将其取出，然后将其放回锁顶部。

translated_text: CogWork began to take off.

original_en_text: What seems at first a purely defensive mechanism may also be necessary to rid this creature of excess heat.
original_zh_text: 看似防御的行为，实为排出过量热量的必要生理机制。
translated_text: A clean external protection mechanism is also needed to eliminate this excess of bioterrorism.
secondary_translated_text: 还需要一个干净的外部保护机制来消除这种过度的生物恐怖主义。

translated_text: spiral shell

original_en_text: For his stern stewardship his legions seemed utterly loyal. For less combative bugs his would have been a hard rule.
original_zh_text: 其铁腕统治赢得了军团的绝对忠诚，但对非战斗种群来说则是暴政。
translated_text: Because of his tight control, his army seems completely loyal, and their rules are strict with the most aggressive bacteria.
secondary_translated_text: 由于他的严格控制，他的军队似乎完全忠诚，而且他们的规则对最具攻击性的细菌也很严格。

translated_text: Craig 's Cluster of Galaxies

original_en_text: Remains of a Citadel bug possessed by Silk dregs. The husk will lash out wildly with the many sharp pins caught inside its thread.
original_zh_text: 被灵丝残渣控制的圣堡残躯，用丝线中缠绕的尖针发动无序攻击。
translated_text: The remains of beetles and the threadlike remains of bullets will burn violently, and many sharp needles will pass through the thread.
secondary_translated_text: 甲虫的残骸和子弹的丝线残骸会猛烈燃烧，许多锋利的针会穿过丝线。

original_en_text: Altered servant of the Citadel’s Whiteward, responsible for the cremation of husks and the recycling of Silk from their shells.
original_zh_text: 白愈厅改造仆从，负责火化躯壳并回收灵丝。
translated_text: Servants at Whitewood Castle burn shells and recycle silk.
secondary_translated_text: 怀特伍德城堡的仆人焚烧贝壳并回收丝绸。

original_en_text: Short elder crawbug eagerly serving in their court.
original_zh_text: 热衷审判的矮小腐囊虫长老。
translated_text: The old crab works hard in court.
secondary_translated_text: 老螃蟹在法庭上努力工作。

translated_text: This is Sterling.

original_en_text: Theirs is the perfect shell for their duty, a wall of a warrior and an adept fighter. If I hope to claim their treasures, I must bring my best.
original_zh_text: 它们拥有攻防兼备的重型甲壳，能完美适配其守卫的差事。想要取得它们看守的宝物，必须做好全力以赴战斗的准备。
translated_text: Their shields are the perfect shell for completing tasks and high walls for skilled soldiers and soldiers. If you want to have your wealth, you must do the best you can. " "
secondary_translated_text: 他们的盾牌是完成任务的完美外壳，也是熟练士兵和士兵的高墙。如果你想拥有你的财富，你必须尽力而为。" "

translated_text: Water in the water.
golden coral

original_en_text: Their bells would once have rung with hope and mirth, lifting the spirits of any climbing companions. Sadly, those instruments have turned purely to combative use.
original_zh_text: 这些钟曾为众多朝圣者奏响希望与欢乐的乐章。而今却成了投向清醒者的凶器——仿佛要砸碎最后一丝未被腐蚀的理智。
translated_text: The servants were already filled with hope and joy, which strengthened the spirit of the climbers. Unfortunately, this tool is only used in combat.
secondary_translated_text: 仆人们已经充满了希望和喜悦，这增强了登山者的精神。不幸的是，这个工具仅用于战斗。

translated_text: Quality in vacuum
Fleet in the Forest
RIA (Memory)
Wash.

original_en_text: The way they skate along the water’s surface is so elegant. Surely it is a skill that can be learned? When time permits, I should attempt the task.
original_zh_text: 如此优雅的水面滑行技艺，或许可以通过练习掌握？待战事稍歇，我定要试试这 "凌波微步"。
translated_text: Skating on the water is fun, it's a skill that needs to be learned, isn't it? Actually? If I had time, I would do this.
secondary_translated_text: 水上滑冰很有趣，这是一项需要学习的技能，不是吗？实际上？如果我有时间，我会这样做。

original_en_text: A creature long familiar to me. I suspect that no matter how far I travel, if I descend deep enough they will always be there.
original_zh_text: 这种生物于我而言早已熟悉。无论我跋涉多远，只要深入足够的地底，它们必会如影随形。
translated_text: No matter how far you go, it will last forever.
secondary_translated_text: 无论你走多远，它都会永远存在。

original_en_text: When defeated, it splits into many smaller forms. Yet another remarkable creature of this land before the monarch.
original_zh_text: 击败后分裂为多个小型个体。圣堡崛起前，纺络土地上又一奇异而非凡的生灵。
translated_text: When it is defeated, it breaks down into many smaller forms. Before the monarch, this land was another unusual creature.
secondary_translated_text: 当它被击败时，它会分解成许多更小的形式。在君主之前，这片土地是另一种不同寻常的生物。

translated_text: Pilgrim's clock with wings

original_en_text: Winged insect with a flaky shell that perfectly mimics its environment.
original_zh_text: 拥有一副古怪甲壳的飞虫，能完美拟态周围环境。
translated_text: These insects are insects whose shells completely mimic the environment.
secondary_translated_text: 这些昆虫的外壳完全模仿环境。

translated_text: Tyk

original_en_text: Unnaturally overgrown Mossgrub, bred within the Citadel’s Memorium.
original_zh_text: 圣堡忆廊培育的变异苔原蠕虫。
translated_text: The castle's monuments are covered with unnatural foam.
secondary_translated_text: 城堡的纪念碑上覆盖着不自然的泡沫。

original_en_text: While these bothersome bugs are left free to forage, no loose rosary or trinket is safe.
original_zh_text: 只要这些可恶的虫子尚存，任何散落的念珠与宝物皆不得安宁。
translated_text: These pesky insects are free to eat food, but are safe without roses and free decorations.
secondary_translated_text: 这些讨厌的昆虫可以自由吃食物，但没有玫瑰和免费装饰品也是安全的。

original_en_text: Younger form of a Muckroach. Attacks prey by leaping from the water and snapping with its flexible jaws.
original_zh_text: 淤泥蟑螂的近亲变种，形态更类似于蛆虫。
translated_text: They jump out of the water, attack their prey, bending their chin into a soft chin.
secondary_translated_text: 它们跳出水面，攻击猎物，将下巴弯曲成柔软的下巴。

original_en_text: Elite former hunter acting as the final line of defence before their mother.
original_zh_text: 精锐的猎手，曾作为最后防线守卫它们的母亲。
translated_text: The former hunter is the last line of defense against his mother
secondary_translated_text: 这位前猎人是抵御母亲的最后一道防线

original_en_text: All are haunted here, the jailers and the jailed. Do they realise they will never leave this place? Or how long they have stayed already?
original_zh_text: 此处的狱卒与囚徒皆被丝咒侵蚀。它们可曾意识到自己将永远无法逃离此地？是否知道已经在这地方困了多久？
translated_text: Did you know that all prisoners and guards are not leaving this hellhole? How long have you been here?
secondary_translated_text: 你知道所有囚犯和看守都不会离开这个地狱吗？你来这里多久了？

translated_text: Minos

original_en_text: Such feeble creatures could only survive thanks to the rarity of predators in these super-heated caverns.
original_zh_text: 唯有在这缺乏天敌的高温洞穴中，如此脆弱的生物方能幸存。
translated_text: This fragile creature can survive in very high temperatures because there are few predators in these caves.
secondary_translated_text: 这种脆弱的生物可以在非常高的温度下生存，因为这些洞穴中几乎没有捕食者。

original_en_text: Fully grown mollusc able to unleash a gushing torrent of burning fluid from its back.
original_zh_text: 成年软体生物，能从背部喷射灼热流体洪流
translated_text: Mature seagulls spit hot liquid from their backs.
secondary_translated_text: 成熟的海鸥从背上吐出热液体。

original_en_text: By this swooping menace, a simple bug could be easily overcome. More dangerous still, they rarely attack alone.
original_zh_text: 对于其单个个体，尚可周旋，但它们鲜少单独行动。成群俯冲时，普通虫类极易被瞬间击溃。
translated_text: With this immersive threat, simple mistakes can be easily overcome. What's even more dangerous is that they hardly attack.
secondary_translated_text: 有了这种身临其境的威胁，简单的错误就可以轻松克服。更危险的是，它们几乎不发动攻击。

original_en_text: A common enough bug, though not to be underestimated. The acuteness of their other senses more than makes up for their lack of vision.
original_zh_text: 一种相当常见的虫子，但不可小觑——它们其他感官的敏锐完全弥补了视觉的缺陷。
translated_text: Although this is a very common mistake, it should not be underestimated. The acumen of other senses is enough to make up for the lack of vision.
secondary_translated_text: 虽然这是一个非常常见的错误，但也不应低估。其他感官的敏锐足以弥补视力的不足。

original_en_text: Darting predator that clings fast to roofs and outcrops, often summoned to aid its larger companions.
original_zh_text: 擅长攀附在岩顶或峭壁的飞镖猎手，常被其大型同伴叫来支援。
translated_text: Fast predators cling to roofs and protrusions, often seeking help from larger companions.
secondary_translated_text: 快速的掠食者紧贴屋顶和突出物，经常向体型较大的同伴寻求帮助。

original_en_text: Is it the Haunting that drove them to cackling madness, or was their unending toil the cause even before that?
original_zh_text: 究竟是丝咒导致了疯癫，还是在无尽苦役中早已精神失常？答案已无从考据。
translated_text: Do ghosts drive them crazy, or is this why they work endlessly?
secondary_translated_text: 鬼魂会让他们发疯吗？还是这就是他们无休止地工作的原因？

original_en_text: Short, nimble bug who uses barbed bolas to keep beasts corralled and caged.
original_zh_text: 矮小敏捷的饲育者，擅于使用带刺流星索圈养腐汁蟑螂。
translated_text: A small, cunning insect that can use a short bill to keep wild animals in cages
secondary_translated_text: 一种狡猾的小昆虫，可以用短嘴将野生动物关在笼子里

translated_text: big bag

original_en_text: Despite their youth, they are impressive opponents. It seems likely their tribe were trained for combat from birth.
original_zh_text: 虽然年轻却训练有素，显然它们从出生开始就被部族作为战士培养。
translated_text: Despite his youth, he was a very powerful enemy, and apparently his tribe had received combat training from the moment he was born.
secondary_translated_text: 尽管他很年轻，但他是一个非常强大的敌人，显然他的部落从他出生的那一刻起就接受了战斗训练。

translated_text: Beige, Beige.

original_en_text: Disciple of the Whispering Vaults, tasked to navigate its dim recesses to retrieve old scrolls.
original_zh_text: 低语书库的信徒，负责在幽暗的书库中搜寻古籍。
translated_text: The baron whispered to the treasurer that his task was to find the ancient wheel deep in the darkness.
secondary_translated_text: 男爵低声对财务主管说，他的任务是在黑暗深处找到古老的轮子。

original_en_text: This one’s strength was much enhanced by stolen soul. They are not the first who tried to hoard it, or to mould it towards such violent ends.
original_zh_text: 靠着窃取灵魂强化自己的力量，他并非第一个妄图驾驭此力的施暴者。
translated_text: The man's power was greatly increased by the stolen soul. They are not the first to accumulate them or try to push them towards such violent targets.
secondary_translated_text: 被窃取的灵魂大大增强了这个人的力量。他们并不是第一个积累它们或试图将它们推向如此暴力目标的人。

original_en_text: With all the refuse collapsing throughout their domain, the worker’s stiff shell would be essential if they held any hope to survive.
original_zh_text: 在废墟持续崩塌的领域，硬化甲壳成为他们最后的生存保障。
translated_text: Because all garbage in the area is collapsing, the workers 'sinks are crucial to their survival.
secondary_translated_text: 由于该地区所有垃圾都在倒塌，工人的水槽对他们的生存至关重要。

original_en_text: Civilisation encroaches from this kingdom’s crown, but the lowlands are still ruled by great beasts. Its roar stirs something deep within me, some primal instinct.
original_zh_text: 文明从王冠之地蔓延开来，但低地区域仍是野兽的疆域。它的咆哮唤醒了我血脉深处的某种原始悸动。
translated_text: Civilization has invaded the crown of the kingdom, but animals still dominate, and this rum evokes some of my primitive instincts.
secondary_translated_text: 文明已经入侵了王国的王冠，但动物仍然占主导地位，这杯朗姆酒唤起了我的一些原始本能。

original_en_text: The poor creature has lived a life too calm and coddled. It would not fare well in the world beyond its walls.
original_zh_text: 这可怜虫一生过于安逸，若离开高墙庇护必难存活。
translated_text: This little animal lives a quiet and comfortable life.
secondary_translated_text: 这个小动物过着安静舒适的生活。

original_en_text: Lithe, winged scouts frequently paired with their heavier brethren.
original_zh_text: 与重装部队配合作战的敏捷翼兵。
translated_text: Light reconnaissance aircraft are often used in conjunction with fully armed reconnaissance aircraft.
secondary_translated_text: 轻型侦察机通常与全副武装的侦察机配合使用。

translated_text: Funerals (Funerals)

original_en_text: Their throwing weapon is well-suited to the wide caverns they inhabit. These sly little bugs must have a keen claw for crafting.
original_zh_text: 其长索武器的高效性在栖居的宽阔洞窟中总能发挥到极致，这般狡诈的小虫竟也有颗巧匠之心。
translated_text: Their weapons are well suited to the huge cave they inhabit. This cunning little insect needs sharp claws.
secondary_translated_text: 他们的武器非常适合他们居住的巨大洞穴。这种狡猾的小昆虫需要锋利的爪子。

original_en_text: Toughened Kai capable of extending sharp spikes from within its shellsack.
original_zh_text: 甲囊中可弹出尖刺的硬化凯虫。
translated_text: K. K. Strong can stuff a sharp tip from his pocket into his helmet.
secondary_translated_text: K. K.斯特朗可以从口袋里塞进头盔里。

original_en_text: An impressive act of mimicry. To match so closely with its land, their clover caves must have sustained through generations uncounted.
original_zh_text: 与环境的契合程度，印证了千万年演化的精妙。
translated_text: Their three-leaf caves have existed for generations in order to adapt to the earth.
secondary_translated_text: 为了适应地球，他们的三叶洞穴已经存在了几代。

original_en_text: This bug is soft and clumsy, but to its fortune its home caves seem relatively free of effective predators. I wonder why that is.
original_zh_text: 这种虫子柔弱笨拙，所幸其栖息洞穴缺乏高效捕食者。此地的生态平衡奥秘值得探究。
translated_text: These insects are sweet and silly, but fortunately there are no effective predators in the cave.
secondary_translated_text: 这些昆虫又甜又傻，但幸运的是洞穴里没有有效的捕食者。

original_en_text: Towering iron automaton, driven by rotor and cog.
original_zh_text: 由齿轮驱动的巨型铁质自动机。
translated_text: A high-speed automatic railway vehicle driven by wheels and rotating gears.
secondary_translated_text: 由车轮和旋转齿轮驱动的高速自动铁路车辆。

original_en_text: Small bug that crafts a shell of sharpened coral. Spins its shell at rapid speed to cut through crust and bone.
original_zh_text: 用锋利珊瑚作为外壳的小型生物，旋转切割无往不利。
translated_text: Small insects can be made from sharp coral shells. Rotate the shell to separate the shell and bone.
secondary_translated_text: 小昆虫可以由锋利的珊瑚壳制成。旋转外壳以分离外壳和骨头。

original_en_text: Plump, plentiful drifter of a coral past.
original_zh_text: 昔日围绕珊瑚塔群居的漂浮生物。
translated_text: There was once a huge coral reef and a lot of rafting.
secondary_translated_text: 这里曾经有一个巨大的珊瑚礁和很多漂流。

translated_text: Body or reptile.

original_en_text: Far tougher for being matched inside their encrusted domain. They must have lived their whole lives within their tower, to command it so.
original_zh_text: 外壳比内部要坚硬太多。终生固守一地的生存方式，造就了独特的战斗形态。
translated_text: He spent his whole life in the tower.
Director: Reed, Reed

original_en_text: Tall bug charged to pile Silk dregs in preparation for respooling. Their sharp rake now doubles equally well as a stabbing weapon.
original_zh_text: 负责灵丝残渣回收的高个虫子，尖利的耙子现已成为它的武器。
translated_text: Large insects accumulate silk waste in preparation for disposal. Sharp hands can be used as knives.
secondary_translated_text: 大型昆虫积累丝绸废料，准备处理。锋利的手可以用作刀。

translated_text: Trablo
Louisa's man.
The people tortured by Trovel
secondary_translated_text: 被特罗维尔折磨的人们

original_en_text: Few creatures of that Silk stricken place would find nourishment enough to grow so large.
original_zh_text: 丝咒之地鲜有生物能获取足够养分长至此等体型。
translated_text: In areas flooded by silk, few organisms can find enough nutrients to grow to this size.
secondary_translated_text: 在丝绸泛滥的地区，很少有生物能够找到足够的营养来生长到如此大小。

original_en_text: Anguished spectre of lingering thread. Despite its ephemeral nature, strong strikes can dispel the Wraith for a time.
original_zh_text: 游荡的丝线怨魂，重击可将其暂时驱散。
translated_text: Although the lives of ghosts are naturally short-lived, they can be temporarily expelled with a single blow.
secondary_translated_text: 鬼魂的生命虽然天生短暂，但一击就可以暂时驱除。

original_en_text: A tragic fate for a once honourable bug. Those void soaked threads... Their physical might is nothing compared to the corruption they wreak upon a soul.
original_zh_text: 昔日荣光骑士的悲剧命运。这些沾染虚空的丝线，对灵魂的腐化远胜肉体摧残。
translated_text: Their physical strength is nothing compared to the soul erosion of wires buried in a vacuum.
secondary_translated_text: 与埋在真空中的电线的灵魂侵蚀相比，他们的体力根本算不上什么。

translated_text: Survey results (results)
The sisters separated.

original_en_text: The coldshard, even when destroyed it remembers its former shape. A remarkable material, and perhaps even more astonishing there seems life contained within it.
original_zh_text: 冰晶被毁后仍存有对其原形的记忆，这等材料特性已属非凡，更神奇的是其中似乎竟蕴含着生命？
translated_text: When the ice breaks, it still remembers its original shape. This is a rare substance, and perhaps more surprisingly, it seems to contain life.
secondary_translated_text: 当冰破裂时，它仍然记得它原来的形状。这是一种罕见的物质，也许更令人惊讶的是，它似乎含有生命。

original_en_text: The talent and intelligence of this construct goes far beyond others I have witnessed. They seem less built as a tool to serve than an attempt at life itself.
original_zh_text: 其智力远超我所见过的其他造物。它们似乎并非单纯作为工具而被打造，而更像是在追求生命的自我意识。
translated_text: The gifts and wisdom of this structure are far beyond any other structure I have ever seen, and it seems more seduced by life than by the tools of service.
secondary_translated_text: 这种结构的天赋和智慧远远超出了我见过的任何其他结构，而且它似乎更受生活的诱惑，而不是服务工具的诱惑。

original_en_text: In entering their domain, I freed these bugs to infest the greater vaults. They are a nuisance, and I have only myself to blame.
original_zh_text: 我闯入了这些虫子的领地，并释放了它们。如今它们已蔓延到了各个书库，这都是我一手造成的麻烦。
translated_text: After invading their territory, I infected my large breasts with this insect.
secondary_translated_text: 入侵他们的领土后，我用这种昆虫感染了我的大乳房。

original_en_text: Winged mite-beast, bred large to catch workers who once tried to flee their tasks.
original_zh_text: 精心培育出的巨型螨兽，用于追捕逃役工虫。
translated_text: Many animals are raised to capture workers fleeing work.
secondary_translated_text: 许多动物被饲养是为了捕捉逃离工作的工人。

translated_text: Gear

original_en_text: The way it darts in and out of the ground has an almost playful quality to it. An amusing and effective way to ambush prey.
original_zh_text: 从地面突然窜出的攻击方式，兼具实用性与趣味性。
translated_text: Entering and leaving the basement is an interesting feeling, a fun and effective way to observe the mine.
secondary_translated_text: 进入和离开地下室是一种有趣的感觉，是一种有趣且有效的观察矿井的方式。

original_en_text: Floral foe with a core shaped to mimic a mask. The core can be thrust forth to bludgeon unwary bugs.
original_zh_text: 花芯长得像恐怖面甲的阴险植物，会突然向外猛戳，重击那些缺乏警惕的虫子。
translated_text: Imitate the shape of the mask. Your mind may push a reckless mistake on you.
secondary_translated_text: 模仿面具的形状。你的思想可能会将一个鲁莽的错误强加给你。

translated_text: Roach Server

original_en_text: The servitor has been heavily damaged by time and the elements. Its actions have grown erratic. It seems no longer able to discern friend from foe.
original_zh_text: 岁月的侵蚀使这位仆从行为失常，似乎已经变得敌我不分。
translated_text: Their actions become unstable and there is no longer a distinction between enemies and allies.
secondary_translated_text: 他们的行动变得不稳定，敌人和盟友之间不再有区别。

original_en_text: A unique mask and impressive form. Now just another near forgotten specimen of this land before the monarch.
original_zh_text: 拥有独特的体型和面甲，本应成为传奇生物，如今却处于被遗忘的边缘。
translated_text: He is the forgotten champion of this country.
secondary_translated_text: 他是这个国家被遗忘的冠军。

original_en_text: These bugs work mainly as finders and foragers for the warriors of their tribe. Combat has not long been their nature.
original_zh_text: 主要负责探索和采集，本非战斗种族，最近才开始具有攻击性。
translated_text: These insects are mainly used by tribal soldiers as hunters and predators.
secondary_translated_text: 这些昆虫主要被部落士兵用作猎人和掠食者。

original_en_text: Pharloom shall quickly learn the curse of this substance. What benefits it provides can be swiftly outweighed.
original_zh_text: 纺络很快就会领教这种物质所带来的诅咒。它所赋予的好处，很快就会被更沉重的代价所掩盖。
translated_text: Eventually, the killer realized the curse of the substance. The benefits they provide will soon be rewarded.
secondary_translated_text: 最终，凶手意识到了这种物质的诅咒。他们提供的好处很快就会得到回报。

translated_text: Scout
Poconabin (Poconabin)

original_en_text: Puppet servant of the Citadel, suspended on strings of Silk. An early form of automaton, requiring extensive Silk to maintain its service.
original_zh_text: 由灵丝悬吊操控的傀儡，圣堡的仆从。一种早期形态的自动构造，需要大量的灵丝来维持其运作。
translated_text: The man's doll was hung in silk. The first machine required a large amount of silk to maintain.
secondary_translated_text: 这个人的娃娃挂在丝绸上。第一台机器需要大量的丝绸来维护。

original_en_text: Eternal defender of Shellwood Shrine. His pin and cymbal show many marks of their use.
original_zh_text: 甲木林圣所的永恒守卫者，佩针与钹尽显沧桑。
translated_text: Pines and pine trees are Mr. Sheppard's eternal guardians and are used for many purposes.
secondary_translated_text: 松树和松树是谢泼德先生永恒的守护者，有多种用途。

original_en_text: It is no wonder these constructs were cast. No mortal bug would last long inside that scorching place. Even my shell struggles to withstand its heat.
original_zh_text: 这些造物被投入使用是有原因的——没有凡虫能在那片炽热之地撑太久，就连我的甲壳也难以抵御那里的高温。
translated_text: It is no surprise that the palace is still under construction. Insects cannot survive for long in such a hot climate. The skin cannot tolerate heat.
secondary_translated_text: 毫不奇怪，宫殿仍在建设中。昆虫在如此炎热的气候下无法生存很长时间。皮肤无法忍受高温。

original_en_text: Fabled first Cloverstag of Verdania’s wilds. Commands the grass and leaves to aid its attack.
original_zh_text: 翠庭荒野传说中的苜鹿始祖，能号令草木协同作战。
translated_text: The first legend has to do with the dazzling shamrock desert. I prayed for grass and leaves to help me attack.
secondary_translated_text: 第一个传奇与耀眼的三叶草沙漠有关。我祈祷草和树叶帮助我进攻。

original_en_text: Disciple of the Choir, charged to maintain its perfect order, by sharp pin if necessary.
original_zh_text: 维护咏者团秩序的迅捷信徒，必要时以利针执法。
translated_text: The horn buttons are responsible for maintaining the perfect order, and a sharp razor can be used if needed.
secondary_translated_text: 喇叭按钮负责维持完美的秩序，如果需要，可以使用锋利的剃须刀。

original_en_text: When they do not hinder my path, I find their simple motion rather pleasant.
original_zh_text: 当它未阻挡前路时，笨拙的蠕动反而显得几分憨态可掬。
translated_text: Enjoy simple exercise while walking.
secondary_translated_text: 散步时享受简单的锻炼。

original_en_text: Holds an extensive supply of searing acid in a layered sack within its shell. The acid rains from its mouth upon any creature it sees as food.
original_zh_text: 它胃囊里的酸液储量足以蚀穿圣堡城墙，所幸那对退化的小眼睛总让攻击准头欠佳。
translated_text: The coating of shells contains a large amount of skin acid. The acid rain that comes out of your mouth falls on all living things you think are food.
secondary_translated_text: 贝壳的涂层含有大量的皮肤酸。从你嘴里喷出的酸雨落在所有你认为是食物的生物身上。

original_en_text: Heavy, hard-shelled worker, forever repairing the Citadel’s crumbling Underworks.
original_zh_text: 永不停歇修缮圣堡工厂的重甲劳工。
translated_text: Heavy industry workers are repairing underground works that permanently destroyed the castle.
secondary_translated_text: 重工业工人正在修复永久摧毁城堡的地下工程。

original_en_text: It has no means to defend itself. Its only hope for survival is to be mistaken for a plant.
original_zh_text: 生存的唯一希望，便是被误认作植物。除此之外，它们没有任何防御手段。
translated_text: He couldn't protect himself, and his only hope for survival was to replace him with a plant.
secondary_translated_text: 他无法保护自己，唯一的生存希望就是用植物取代他。

original_en_text: This one has allied themself with me, either as thanks for their saving or respect for one judged as equal. Whichever the reason, their fellowship is welcome.
original_zh_text: 这一只现在成了我的盟友，不知道是报救命之恩，还是单纯觉得我实力强大，但多个帮手总是好的。
translated_text: This man is with me to thank him for his redemption, or to respect those who are considered equal.
secondary_translated_text: 这个人和我在一起感谢他的救赎，或者尊重那些被认为平等的人。

original_en_text: Bugs like these crossed the caves to bring me to Pharloom. I cut down many before my capture. Then I had thought them minded and cunning. Now I can see the singular will that haunts them all.
original_zh_text: 正是这类虫子穿越洞穴将我带至纺络。被俘前我斩杀了许多，当时认为它们具备独立心智与狡诈。如今我明白是同一意志在支配它们全体。
translated_text: The worms passed through the cave in the rain until I was caught. They think they are fast and smart. Now I see a wish that surprises them.
secondary_translated_text: 蠕虫在雨中穿过洞穴，直到我被抓住。他们认为自己又快又聪明。现在我看到了一个让他们惊讶的愿望。

translated_text: Kakayao

original_en_text: Its sticky spit would no doubt make a useful crafting material if moulded fresh. Unfortunately, I cannot stop to experiment.
original_zh_text: 它们喷射的粘稠物质经过及时塑形，一定可以作为优质的制造材料。可惜我无暇采集实验。
translated_text: If it is recently formed, thick saliva is undoubtedly a useful material in the process. Unfortunately, we cannot stop this experience.
secondary_translated_text: 如果是最近形成的，那么浓稠的唾液无疑是该过程中有用的材料。不幸的是，我们无法阻止这种经历。

original_en_text: The smell from these jailers overwhelms my senses. I strongly doubt they have ever thought to bathe.
original_zh_text: 这些狱卒的恶臭令我窒息。我怀疑它们从未有过沐浴的概念。
translated_text: The smell of the guards made me lose consciousness, not wanting to swim.
secondary_translated_text: 警卫的气味让我失去了知觉，不想游泳。

original_en_text: A creature at its most basic. This one is no threat to me, or any other.
original_zh_text: 作为最基础的生命形态，它对我或任何生物都不构成威胁。
translated_text: This is one of the most basic institutions and does not pose a threat to me or anyone else.
secondary_translated_text: 这是最基本的制度之一，不会对我或其他任何人构成威胁。

original_en_text: Aged former pilgrim. Uses their wings to position above threats and crush them under their large shell.
original_zh_text: 年迈的前朝圣者，利用飞行优势从上方压制目标。
translated_text: Use your wings to put them under threat, then press them under the big shell.
secondary_translated_text: 用你的翅膀将它们置于威胁之下，然后将它们压在大壳下。

translated_text: Title: Sprint On Tone
Lowood.
"The Circle"

original_en_text: A bug once frail, pushed by twisted thread beyond its mortal limits.
original_zh_text: 灵丝撑开了它脆弱的甲壳，强行将这副残躯突破凡虫的限制。
translated_text: With the help of twisted lines, fragile insects push them to their limits.
secondary_translated_text: 在扭曲线的帮助下，脆弱的昆虫将它们推向了极限。

original_en_text: The threat of its exploding rear is an effective deterrent to predators, but the slightest jolt or fall can cause its premature end.
original_zh_text: 尾部爆炸威胁能威慑捕食者，但轻微碰撞就会导致其提前自毁。
translated_text: The threat of a tail explosion can effectively deter predators, but even a small collision or fall can end quickly.
secondary_translated_text: 尾部爆炸的威胁可以有效地阻止掠食者，但即使是小碰撞或坠落也可能很快结束。

original_en_text: To live only a single, bright moment... What would one feel? Is it glorious, or only despair? Or could it be both, mixed equal?
original_zh_text: 生命仅有瞬息的璀璨——它们会感到辉煌还是绝望？抑或是二者交织？
translated_text: Is it glory or despair to live in the brightest moment? Can you combine the two?
secondary_translated_text: 生活在最光明的时刻是荣耀还是绝望？你能将两者结合起来吗？

original_en_text: Though their mind is largely lost their skill with a chain has not been forgotten. Does the Haunting eternally bind a bug to the task it had in life?
original_zh_text: 锁链破空之声依旧精准狠厉——丝咒是否将生前的执念化作了死后的永恒苦役？
translated_text: Although their spirits had almost disappeared, their ability to use chains had not been forgotten. Can you turn this mistake into a lifetime's work?
secondary_translated_text: 虽然他们的灵魂几乎消失了，但他们使用锁链的能力并没有被遗忘。你能把这个错误变成一生的工作吗？

original_en_text: Angered, adult Beastfly with a weighty body and a thickened hardshell mask.
original_zh_text: 暴怒的成年兽蝇，身形沉重，戴着厚重面甲。
translated_text: An evil adult climbed into the sky wearing a huge thick mask.
secondary_translated_text: 一个邪恶的成年人戴着一个巨大的厚厚的面具爬上了天空。

original_en_text: Young, bony bug that can curl its body to form a ball.
original_zh_text: 能蜷缩成球形的小型骨虫。
translated_text: Young bone beetles can round their bodies into spheres.
secondary_translated_text: 年轻的骨甲虫可以将身体圆成球体。

translated_text: Father of Fire.
About Toz

original_en_text: So close to a perfect furred form... If only they’d been able to breed out the spines.
original_zh_text: 近乎完美的毛茸形态，唯有背刺未去除。改造自然的尝试总是难以尽善尽美。
translated_text: Close to perfect skin shape. If thorns could grow,
secondary_translated_text: 接近完美的皮肤形状。如果荆棘可以生长，

original_en_text: Bulky worm of the deepest depths. Lives in tight crevices and uses its weighty body to batter.
original_zh_text: 栖息狭窄裂隙的厚重蠕虫，以沉重身躯撞击敌人。
translated_text: The biggest thing is living in a narrow space and facing a heavy body.
secondary_translated_text: 最大的就是生活在狭窄的空间里，面对沉重的身体。

original_en_text: Crazed fanatic able to guide Pharloom’s haunted Silk by music played upon it.
original_zh_text: 癫狂的信徒，通过演奏音乐操控纺络的诅咒灵丝。
translated_text: Fans can control the eagle's silk ghost by playing music.
secondary_translated_text: 粉丝们可以通过播放音乐来控制老鹰的丝绸幽灵。

translated_text: Waltem (Waltem)
Clive

original_en_text: There is old anguish bound upon these threads, the result of countless cruel procedures.
original_zh_text: 这些丝线承载着古老痛楚，源自无数残酷改造手术。
translated_text: These clues are related to ancient suffering, the result of countless cruel procedures.
secondary_translated_text: 这些线索与古代的苦难有关，是无数残酷程序的结果。

original_en_text: Rare, enormous Skull Scuttler. The Marrow’s largest predator, and the most feared for its ferocious temperament.
original_zh_text: 罕见的巨型头骨潜行者，髓骨洞窟的顶级掠食者，以凶暴性情令凡虫闻风丧胆。
translated_text: The largest predator in the bone marrow is also the most dangerous because of its ferocious nature.
secondary_translated_text: 骨髓中最大的掠食者也是最危险的，因为其本性凶猛。

original_en_text: Full-grown former pilgrim serving the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 侍奉圣堡的前朝圣者，体型发生过异变。
translated_text: A man who grew up in a castle.
secondary_translated_text: 一个在城堡里长大的男人。

original_en_text: Lord and justice of Pharloom’s craws. Delivers death to condemned bugs with his steel-plated beak.
original_zh_text: 执掌腐囊虫庭生杀大权的审判者，用其镀钢长喙对有罪的虫子执行死刑。
translated_text: Pharaoh, the Lord of greed and justice, killed the evil insects with the help of iron mouth.
secondary_translated_text: 贪婪正义之王法老借助铁口杀死了邪恶的昆虫。

translated_text: I have a blank beard.
Fire pilot.

original_en_text: Rarely seen beetle that spends most of its life nestled deep in bone and rock. The Flintgems on its shell excrete an explosive powder.
original_zh_text: 深藏岩骨深处的稀有甲虫，甲壳嵌满燧晶并分泌爆炸性体液。
translated_text: The unusual beetle spends most of its time deep in bones and stones, while gems in the Kremlin's shell release explosive dust.
secondary_translated_text: 这种不寻常的甲虫大部分时间都在骨头和石头深处度过，而克里姆林宫外壳中的宝石则释放出爆炸性尘埃。

original_en_text: Disgusting both in manner and stench. I feel no remorse to see them felled.
original_zh_text: 它们浑身散发着腐殖质恶臭，甲壳缝隙间还粘着陈年血痂。每当那对复眼在牢狱阴影中亮起，连最凶悍的囚徒都会瑟缩墙角。
translated_text: I don't like the taste and shape of it, and I don't regret losing it.
secondary_translated_text: 我不喜欢它的味道和形状，也不后悔失去它。

translated_text: Pilgrims and wings.

original_en_text: Pharloom proves often the effectiveness of bells as weapons. Never before had I considered them as such.
original_zh_text: 纺络总在提醒我——钟亦可为兵器。只是从前，我从未想过这些圣器会被如此亵用。
translated_text: Farrow has repeatedly demonstrated the effectiveness of species as a weapon, but he never thought about it.
secondary_translated_text: 法罗一再证明物种作为武器的有效性，但他从未想过这一点。

translated_text: Spider's mother

original_en_text: Enormous tubular beast uniquely suited to living close to the void below.
original_zh_text: 适应虚空环境的管状巨兽。
translated_text: This huge tubular beast is perfect for living near the cave below.
secondary_translated_text: 这种巨大的管状野兽非常适合生活在下面的洞穴附近。

translated_text: Judge Talou

original_en_text: Old pilgrim carrying a heavy iron bell staff.
original_zh_text: 手持沉重铁制钟杖的年长领队，丝咒抹去了它昔日的权威。
translated_text: The old pilgrim held a heavy iron bar in his hand.
secondary_translated_text: 老朝圣者手里拿着一根沉重的铁棍。

translated_text: About pilots.
Flint Air Force (Flint)

original_en_text: If left to grow, these young bugs will fight for dominance until only one remains.
original_zh_text: 我曾目睹三只幼体将巢穴化作修罗场，最终胜者甲壳上插满兄弟的尖刺。这种养蛊式的成长，正是圣堡工厂默许的筛选机制。
translated_text: When young insects are forced to grow, they compete for an advantage until there is only one left.
secondary_translated_text: 当年幼的昆虫被迫生长时，它们会争夺优势，直到只剩下一个。

original_en_text: Living Silk commanding a dead shell... An affront to nature, and one all too common across Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 活灵丝操纵死躯壳……违背自然的造物，在纺络却司空见惯。
translated_text: Ordering dead shells with live ropes is an affront to nature and is also common in the Farem area.
secondary_translated_text: 用活绳订购死贝壳是对自然的侮辱，这种情况在法雷姆地区也很常见。

translated_text: Red cocktail
Shadow Loader
An attractive cup.
The world's panic.

original_en_text: Coiled nest of charged worms. Assaults intruders with bolts of crackling electricity.
original_zh_text: 带电蠕虫团，释放霹雳闪电攻击入侵者。
translated_text: A snake-shaped nest of insects carrying luggage. They use explosive lightning attacks.
secondary_translated_text: 携带行李的蛇形昆虫巢穴。他们使用爆炸性闪电攻击。

original_en_text: High caste bug, responsible for delivering sermons and leading prayer for those beyond the walls of the Whispering Vaults.
original_zh_text: 为低语书库墙外信众布道的高阶虫子。
translated_text: The upper-class worms are responsible for preaching and guiding the prayers of those beyond the wall of whispers.
secondary_translated_text: 上流社会的蠕虫负责说教和引导那些在低语之墙之外的人的祈祷。

translated_text: Surgeons,

original_en_text: Did he recognise my part played in this land’s void-strung state? If so, perhaps his judgment was not unfair. To these bugs I have brought much destruction.
original_zh_text: 若他知晓我与此地虚空缠结的关联，其裁决或许称得上公正——因我确实为腐囊虫族带来了毁灭。
translated_text: Do you know what role I play in this field? If this is the case, then your judgment is wrong.
secondary_translated_text: 你知道我在这个领域扮演什么角色吗？如果是这样，那么你的判断就错误了。

original_en_text: That incendiary material they carry is a natural wonder, with many potential applications. What a waste to carelessly throw it at me whenever I pass by.
original_zh_text: 其携带的燃烧材料堪称自然奇迹，具有多种潜在用途。每当路过就被随意投掷袭击，这等浪费行径实在令我扼腕。
translated_text: Warm materials are a natural wonder with many possibilities. Every time something like this happens, it makes no sense for you to accidentally throw me in.
secondary_translated_text: 温暖的材料是一种自然奇观，有多种可能性。每次发生这样的事情，你不小心把我扔进去是没有意义的。

translated_text: Food from cocoa

original_en_text: Not a frontline force, but in my assault upon their tower all emerge to see me stilled.
original_zh_text: 虽非主力部队，但当我进攻其高塔时，它们倾巢而出进行阻截，阵势不容小觑。
translated_text: It was not a front-line army, but when I attacked their towers, everyone showed up and saw me calm down.
secondary_translated_text: 这不是一支前线军队，但当我攻击他们的塔楼时，每个人都出现了，看到我冷静下来。

translated_text: Princess, princess.
Original name: The Craft
Sig. Wisp （ Wisp ）

original_en_text: A cowardly sort. They will try to remain at range to throw their sharp weapons. Best to rush them down and cut quick.
original_zh_text: 怯战而擅长投掷攻击。最佳策略是快速近身解决。
translated_text: This is a kind of cowardice. They tried to stop at the intersection and threw sharp weapons. Better cut it off immediately.
secondary_translated_text: 这是一种懦弱。他们试图在十字路口停下来并投掷锋利的武器。最好立即切断它。

original_en_text: Wide-masked aerial attacker trained to act as support for its grounded companions while remaining at range.
original_zh_text: 佩戴宽幅面甲的远程支援型飞行攻击者。
translated_text: Pilots wearing masks are trained to maintain autonomy by helping colleagues on the ground.
secondary_translated_text: 戴口罩的飞行员接受了通过帮助地面同事来保持自主性的培训。

original_en_text: Most likely this one’s true charge was to root out and condemn those not seen as sufficiently fervent.
original_zh_text: 表面传播教义，实为铲除异端的思想刽子手。
translated_text: Perhaps this person's real responsibility is to eradicate and condemn those who seem inactive.
secondary_translated_text: 也许这个人的真正责任是根除和谴责那些看似不活跃的人。

translated_text: Kaia

original_en_text: Old catcher over Shellwood Pond, bearing a longpin and stricken by the Haunting.
original_zh_text: 甲木林池塘的老迈捕手，手持长针，遭受丝咒之苦。
translated_text: The old receiver was attacked by a ghost in Sherwood's pond with a long needle in his hand.
secondary_translated_text: 老接球手在舍伍德的池塘里遭到鬼魂的袭击，鬼魂手里拿着一根长针。

translated_text: Abandoned master
Stillkin's Trap
Penaragon

original_en_text: Grizzled older roach tender weighted with a lasso of heavy chain.
original_zh_text: 心智迷失的老练饲育者，挥舞沉重锁链维持虫群秩序。
translated_text: The furry cockroach was tied to a heavy chain.
secondary_translated_text: 毛茸茸的蟑螂被绑在一根沉重的链子上。

original_en_text: These ones somehow learnt to call and guide the scorching Wisps that share their thicket. Whether through dominance or reverence is unclear.
original_zh_text: 这些家伙不知何故掌握了操控火灵之术。他们能随心所欲地召唤并指挥它们。
translated_text: These creatures have learned to summon and guide elves living in the jungle.
secondary_translated_text: 这些生物学会了召唤和引导生活在丛林中的精灵。

original_en_text: He carelessly seeded these caves with that cursed substance... His final fate seems fair reward for those efforts, yet I feel some sympathy. It is an alluring power.
original_zh_text: 他肆意播撒那种禁忌物质……最终结局可谓咎由自取，但我仍有些许同情。凡虫对力量的追寻时常令我感到唏嘘。
translated_text: His ultimate fate seems to be a just reward for those efforts, but I still sympathize with him.
secondary_translated_text: 他的最终命运似乎是对这些努力的公正回报，但我仍然同情他。

original_zh_text: 被珊瑚包裹的软壳生物。
translated_text: Spoilers are a soft shell, signed by Coral.
secondary_translated_text: 剧透是一个软壳，由Coral签名。

original_en_text: To pair with another is a base instinct, and one that brings some bugs great joy. I once sought similar union, but of my own mates none could match my lifespan.
original_zh_text: 与其他虫子结为伴侣是一种本能，是欢愉的来源。可惜我曾寻觅的伴侣都难敌岁月的变迁。
translated_text: Mating with others is a basic instinct and can also bring great pleasure to insects. I have sought such alliances before, but I have no partner who can match my life.
secondary_translated_text: 与他人交配是一种基本本能，也能给昆虫带来巨大的乐趣。我以前也寻求过这样的联盟，但我没有一个能与我的生活相匹配的伴侣。

original_en_text: Song queen of the Skarr and their most talented warrior.
original_zh_text: 斯卡尔一族的歌后，并且是族史上最具天赋的战士。
translated_text: Singer Skelin and his most talented boxer.
secondary_translated_text: 歌手Skelin和他最有才华的拳击手。

translated_text: As for coral reefs,

original_en_text: For one to love another so similar to themselves, is that selfless or vain?
original_zh_text: 爱慕镜像般的另一个自己，究竟是无私还是极致的虚荣？
translated_text: Is loving someone like you selfish or vain?
secondary_translated_text: 爱像你这样的人是自私还是虚荣？

original_en_text: A crude construct of my father’s fallen domain. Only a fool believes that void can be fashioned to do their bidding.
original_zh_text: 我父亲陨落国度的粗劣造物。只有愚者才会相信虚空可被驾驭。
translated_text: Only a fool can create a vacuum under his own command.
secondary_translated_text: 只有傻瓜才能在自己的指挥下制造真空。

translated_text: I am burning.
Bernanke.
Gaya
Shadilllad (English)
Not the first time.

original_en_text: Short-horned bug born with underdeveloped wings.
original_zh_text: 翅膀发育不全的短角虫。
translated_text: Short-horned insects basically have incomplete wings.
secondary_translated_text: 短角昆虫基本上有不完整的翅膀。

translated_text: Scar Card

original_en_text: Common bug wielding a set of old bells. The bug will fling the bells at anyone it deems still free.
original_zh_text: 挥舞旧钟的普通信徒，向未被丝咒侵蚀者投掷旧钟。
translated_text: An ordinary insect will ring an ancient bell. This mistake is a warning to those who still believe they are free.
secondary_translated_text: 一只普通的昆虫会敲响古老的钟声。这个错误是对那些仍然相信自己自由的人的警告。

original_en_text: Born with many tools I would once have desired for myself. Fortunately, I have trained hard around those limits.
original_zh_text: 天生具备我曾渴求的利器。所幸我通过苦练突破了自身局限。
translated_text: I was born with the necessary tools, and fortunately I worked within these limits.
secondary_translated_text: 我生来就拥有必要的工具，幸运的是我在这些限制内工作。

original_en_text: More bother than the bug themself are the countless traps they have already laid throughout their caves.
original_zh_text: 其洞穴内遍布的陷阱比这虫子本身更令我头疼。
translated_text: More confusing than the insects themselves are the many traps in the caves.
secondary_translated_text: 比昆虫本身更令人困惑的是洞穴中的许多陷阱。

translated_text: hydration
Peripheral observers

original_en_text: The lethality of these bugs is unexpected. Their bodies were never built for combat. The Haunting has altered their nature dramatically.
original_zh_text: 这些本非为战斗设计的虫子竟有致命的战力，看来丝咒显著地改变了其本质。
translated_text: The mortality rate of bacteria is unexpected, and their bodies are not designed to fight.
secondary_translated_text: 细菌的死亡率是出乎意料的，而且它们的身体并不是为了战斗而设计的。

translated_text: A little confession.

original_en_text: Docile bug whose wings mimic the grasses of the Far Fields. A common snack for larger predators.
original_zh_text: 温顺的飞虫，翅膀模拟原野草叶的模样。比它们大的生物基本都能把它们当作小零食来吃。
translated_text: Soft insects and wings imitate grass in the field. They feed on large carnivores
secondary_translated_text: 柔软的昆虫和翅膀模仿田野里的草。它们以大型食肉动物为食

original_en_text: Exhausted bug, grown sickly from the smog of the Underworks. The worker’s twistpins, once tools of repair, now serve as spun projectiles.
original_zh_text: 被工业废气侵蚀的抱病劳工，将维修旋针改造为投掷武器。
translated_text: Underground smoke infested helpless insects. Workers 'torsion pins were once used as maintenance tools and are now used as spinning balls.
secondary_translated_text: 地下烟雾侵扰着无助的昆虫。工人的扭转销曾经被用作维修工具，现在被用作旋转球。

original_en_text: Humbled prisoner serving their sentence for sin committed within the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 服刑中的卑微囚犯，曾在圣堡中犯下罪过。
translated_text: This humble prisoner disappeared in his city for the crimes he committed.
secondary_translated_text: 这位卑微的囚犯因所犯下的罪行在他的城市失踪。

original_en_text: Ancient heart of Shellwood, connected to all its living things.
original_zh_text: 维系甲木林万物联结的远古之心。
translated_text: Shadowwood's soul is connected to all living things.
secondary_translated_text: 影木的灵魂与万物相连。

original_en_text: Guide and ofttimes leader within the Citadel’s Choir.
original_zh_text: 圣堡咏者团的向导与常任领袖。
translated_text: He is the general manager and general manager of the Castle Choir.
secondary_translated_text: 他是城堡合唱团的总经理和总经理。

original_en_text: Poor of sight but possessing a keen sense of smell, it uses its bulk to charge at foreign scents. Remaining fierce so far into old age is an admirable trait.
original_zh_text: 虽视力极差却嗅觉敏锐，凭借庞大身躯冲撞陌生气味源。暮年仍保有此等凶性，着实值得敬佩。
translated_text: Their vision is poor, but they are very sensitive to odors and use their volume to absorb strange odors.
secondary_translated_text: 它们的视力很差，但对气味非常敏感，并利用它们的体积来吸收奇怪的气味。

original_en_text: Crawling insect with a sizzling bile sack in its abdomen.
original_zh_text: 腹部携带沸腾胆汁囊的爬行虫。
translated_text: Burns, Sistafira, choking throat in stomach
secondary_translated_text: 烧伤、西斯塔菲拉、胃部喉咙窒息

translated_text: Water from a rescue boat

original_en_text: If given a chance, this one will steal Silk from any significant source, including my own shell.
original_zh_text: 一旦有机会，它会从任何来源窃取灵丝——包括我的甲壳。
translated_text: If he was lucky, this man stole silk from important sources, including my shells.
secondary_translated_text: 如果幸运的话，这个人会从重要来源偷丝绸，包括我的贝壳。

original_en_text: Mindless sack filled with Plasmium. When broken the Plasmium can be consumed for its temporary benefits to health.
original_zh_text: 装满再生液体的活体炸弹。满载生质液的无智囊虫，打破后，可使用其生质液获得暂时性的生命值。
translated_text: A person without a brain is full of blood. Once the plasma breaks down, you can eat it because of its temporary health benefits.
secondary_translated_text: 没有大脑的人充满了血。一旦血浆分解，您就可以食用它，因为它对健康有暂时的好处。

original_en_text: More effective an opponent than would be guessed. The precarity of its winding domain can make even its simple assault a challenge.
original_zh_text: 在错综复杂的齿轮迷宫中，这些机械的每一次俯冲都如同死神挥镰。
translated_text: The enemy is more efficient than you think. The instability of the wound magnetic field makes simple attacks difficult.
secondary_translated_text: 敌人比你想象的更有效率。伤口磁场的不稳定性使得简单的攻击变得困难。

translated_text: Shellless (Shellless)

original_en_text: Elder Conchfly crowned with a huge coral horn. Once partnered with a mate, they will rarely be seen alone.
original_zh_text: 头戴珊瑚巨角的古老螺类，与伴侣终生形影不离。
translated_text: An ancient shell has a huge coral horn on its head. When I work with my partner, I don't feel lonely.
secondary_translated_text: 一个古老的贝壳的头部有一个巨大的珊瑚角。当我和我的伴侣一起工作时，我并不感到孤独。

translated_text: Leo Caraco

original_en_text: Drained yet dedicated labourer, wielding a coarse steel brush.
original_zh_text: 手持劣质钢刷的劳工，尽管身体已被苦役榨干，但仍孜孜不倦。
translated_text: He is a hard-working worker, holding a heavy pen in his hand.
secondary_translated_text: 他是一位勤奋的工人，手里拿着一支沉重的笔。

original_en_text: Fierce, strong and disciplined... yet these qualities do not protect them from the Haunting. Is such a fate inevitable in these lands?
original_zh_text: 勇猛强壮，且遵守纪律……连这样的战士都无法逃脱丝咒的侵蚀，难道纺络所有生物终将堕入此劫？
translated_text: They are strong, strong, and disciplined, but these qualities do not protect them from problems.
secondary_translated_text: 他们坚强、坚强、有纪律，但这些品质并不能保护他们免受问题的影响。

original_en_text: A form well suited for combat, lithe and fast. No surprise it seems to rank so high amongst its cult.
original_zh_text: 纤瘦迅捷的体态完美适配战斗，难怪能在教团中身居高位。
translated_text: Best for fighting, light, fast form. Not surprisingly, they occupy a high position in the cult.
secondary_translated_text: 最适合战斗，轻，快速的形式。毫不奇怪，他们在邪教中占据着很高的地位。

translated_text: (Il Thunder)

original_en_text: Winged ant hunter that strikes from the air with its bone lance.
original_zh_text: 使用骨制长矛的飞蚁猎手，擅长从空中发起突刺。
translated_text: Fighter jets attack ants with cannons in the air.
secondary_translated_text: 战斗机用空中加农炮攻击蚂蚁。

translated_text: The Queen of Sand

original_en_text: In my home caves, when once this substance was allowed to flourish, I saw similar aberrations. This is wonder tainted strong with revulsion.
original_zh_text: 在我故土的洞穴中，当这种物质开始蔓延时，我也目睹过类似的畸变。这是一种掺杂着强烈厌恶的“奇迹”。
translated_text: In my cave, we observe similar distortions when matter is allowed to flourish.
secondary_translated_text: 在我的洞穴里，当物质繁荣时，我们观察到类似的扭曲。

original_en_text: Furred bug beneath a heavy bell. It has grown too large to burrow, but in maturing has developed small wings.
original_zh_text: 毛茸茸的甲虫背负着沉重钟壳，胖得钻不进地洞，倒是长出了一对小翅膀。
translated_text: They are too big to enter the cave, but when they mature, they grow small wings.
secondary_translated_text: 它们太大了，无法进入洞穴，但当它们成熟时，它们会长出小翅膀。

original_en_text: Aerial bug of the Citadel, unarmed but for its short horn.
original_zh_text: 圣堡的飞行虫，仅凭短角作为武器。
translated_text: Flying insects have no hands, but their horns are short.

original_en_text: Adult Mossmir with a fully developed stinger and hardened hide.
original_zh_text: 成年苔翼虫，具备完全发育的毒刺与坚硬的外壳。
translated_text: Mature hair with hard skin

original_en_text: Motherhood is an instinct that can push creatures beyond what seems their natural limits. It turns even weaker beasts like these into formidable foes.
original_zh_text: 为母则刚的本能，总能使弱小的生物展现出骇人的攻击性。
translated_text: Motherhood is an instinct that pushes the body to its seemingly natural limits, turning weak animals into powerful enemies.
secondary_translated_text: 母性是一种本能，它将身体推向看似自然的极限，将软弱的动物变成强大的敌人。

original_en_text: The remains of an aged bug were housed at the pyre’s heart. The structure suggested they wished for immolation. If so, I have seen their wish granted.
original_zh_text: 一只年迈虫子的遗骸安放在火葬堆的中心。从构造上看，它们似乎希望通过自焚来进行献祭。若真如此，我想这一愿望已经实现。
translated_text: In the middle of a pile of trees, there is the body of an ancient insect. He wanted to burn her. If this is the case, you will find that your wish has been fulfilled.
secondary_translated_text: 在一堆树中间，有一具古老昆虫的尸体。他想烧死她，如果是这样，你会发现你的愿望已经实现了。

original_en_text: Skilled ant hunter bearing blade and armour fashioned from bone.
original_zh_text: 装备骨制武器及护甲的蚁族精锐。
translated_text: Skilled ant Hunters use knives and bone armor.
secondary_translated_text: 熟练的蚂蚁猎人使用刀和骨甲。

translated_text: Monfroy

original_en_text: To survive while storing so much searing fluid within... Before I would have believed it impossible, but Pharloom is home to many marvels.
original_zh_text: 体内存储巨量高温液体仍能存活……原以为不可能，但纺络本就充满奇迹。
translated_text: They accumulate large amounts of hot liquid in their bodies to survive. Once considered impossible, colonial houses are now the birthplace of many miracles.
secondary_translated_text: 它们在体内积聚大量的热液体以生存。殖民时期的房屋曾经被认为是不可能的，但现在却是许多奇迹的诞生地。

original_en_text: Choir commander of the High Halls, able to summon and command cogflies at a flick of their baton.
original_zh_text: 高庭咏者团统帅，挥动指挥棒即可召唤机枢蝇群。
translated_text: In the upper lobby, the choir leader can hold up a light ball and direct it.
secondary_translated_text: 在上层大厅，合唱团队长可以举起一个光球并指挥它。

translated_text: The wings of a skeleton
Pilgrim Hopper
Ancient pilgrims.
Hulk's pilgrimage

original_en_text: Masked coral drifter, grown larger than its more numerous companions.
original_zh_text: 古老的漂浮生物，体型远超同类。
translated_text: Coral's mask drifts higher than many of its satellites.
secondary_translated_text: 珊瑚的面具比它的许多卫星都高。

original_en_text: Many-legged insect fanatically obsessed with flame.
translated_text: Insects are attracted by fire.
About pilots.
The last ship.
hybrid excavator

original_en_text: Curiosity saw me answer their summons, but I shall not allow them to stall me long. I must work fast to fix my grand mistake.
original_zh_text: 好奇心驱使我响应他们的召唤，但我不会在此浪费时间——我需要尽快修正我酿成的大错。
translated_text: Funny, I got a phone call, but I can't keep you waiting too long. I must correct the mistake I have made as soon as possible.
secondary_translated_text: 有趣的是，我接到了电话，但我不能让你等太久。我必须尽快纠正我所犯的错误。

translated_text: Move, move.
Lantain's game

original_en_text: A revolting creature. My shell itches at their presence. In the pens where their numbers grow vast, I am forever on edge.
original_zh_text: 肮脏恶心的生物。光是它们的存在就让我甲壳发痒。在蟑群泛滥的养殖场中，我会时刻保持警惕。
translated_text: He was an evil creature, always nervous in his growing enclosure.
secondary_translated_text: 他是一个邪恶的生物，在不断增长的围栏里总是紧张不安。

translated_text: Keichle 。

original_en_text: Dancing around this simple creature as it charges back and forth is the sort of game I delighted in as a child. Alas, I now have more pressing matters to attend to.
original_zh_text: 我小时候就爱逗这种笨虫，在它身边闪转腾挪，看它来回乱撞可有意思了。唉，但我现在有更紧迫的事情要处理。
translated_text: While this simple creature was running, dancing was my favorite game as a child. "
secondary_translated_text: 当这个简单的生物奔跑时，跳舞是我小时候最喜欢的游戏。"

original_en_text: Theirs seems a sad, grueling task, serving their lifetime for a Citadel unseen.
original_zh_text: 它们的工作实属可悲的苦役，为那见不到的圣堡永世效劳。
translated_text: They seem to be a sad and complex profession that was once an invisible castle.
secondary_translated_text: 他们似乎是一个悲伤而复杂的职业，曾经是一座无形的城堡。

original_en_text: Airborne relative of the grounded Skull Scuttler, found only in the Marrow’s deepest, hottest caves.
original_zh_text: 头骨潜行者的飞虫近亲，髓骨洞窟深处灼热的洞穴独有。
translated_text: It is a close relative of confined asbestos and can only be found in the deepest and hottest caves in the bone marrow.
secondary_translated_text: 它是密闭石棉的近亲，只能在骨髓中最深、最热的洞穴中找到。

original_en_text: Theirs would be a high risk life, followed by a short, searing end.
original_zh_text: 这是份高危职业，它们的结局注定短暂而炽烈。
translated_text: Their lives are in danger and they will have a brief burning ending.
secondary_translated_text: 他们的生命处于危险之中，他们将有一个短暂的燃烧结局。

original_en_text: Placid native of Verdania. Its hide closely mimics the flora of its territory.
original_zh_text: 温顺的翠庭原生生物，其皮毛完美拟态栖息地的植被。
translated_text: Prassid was born in Vidanya. Imitate the skin of local plants.
secondary_translated_text: 普拉西德出生于维达尼亚。模仿当地植物的外皮。

original_en_text: They remorselessly eliminate any pilgrim or passerby deemed impure to their sight. The countless husks, strewn on paths beside them, tell of their conclusive decisions.
original_zh_text: 他们无情地消灭任何在他们眼中被视为不洁的朝圣者或过路者。堆积在路径旁的遗骸，无声控诉着所谓"净化"的残酷。
translated_text: They will not hesitate to exclude unclean pilgrims and pedestrians. Many bullets scattered on nearby streets let him know his decision.
secondary_translated_text: 他们会毫不犹豫地排除不干净的朝圣者和行人。附近街道上散落的许多子弹让他知道了自己的决定。

translated_text: Reduce your pipes.

original_en_text: Weak, afraid, and aware of the imminent end. I understand their desperation, but my death will not prevent the coming fall.
original_zh_text: 弱小、恐惧，知道终局将至。我懂得它们的绝望，可我的死并不能阻止即将到来的灾祸。
translated_text: I understand their despair, but my death will not stop next fall.
secondary_translated_text: 我理解他们的绝望，但我的死亡不会在明年秋天停止。

original_en_text: An inspired use of steam. I must remember its construction when designing future tools.
original_zh_text: 高温蒸汽在管腔内压缩爆鸣的声响，像极了垂死者的嘶吼。这种将杀戮伪装成清洁工程的设计，着实令人胆寒。
translated_text: We encourage twins. When we design future tools, we must consider their structure.
secondary_translated_text: 我们鼓励双胞胎。当我们设计未来的工具时，我们必须考虑它们的结构。

original_en_text: They know well their domain, lurking in wait in its byways and bogs, always ready to pounce.
original_zh_text: 它们深谙领地内的每处沼泽暗道，时刻准备伏击。
translated_text: They knew their territory well and guarded the streets and swamps in preparation for an attack.
secondary_translated_text: 他们非常了解自己的领土，并守卫街道和沼泽，为袭击做好准备。

original_en_text: Husk of an alchemist’s assistant granted false life by Plasmium.
original_zh_text: 被生质液赋予虚假生命的炼金术士助手的躯壳。
translated_text: Inside the shell of the alchemist's assistant, he gained false life from the plasma.
secondary_translated_text: 在炼金术士助手的壳内，他从等离子体中获得了虚假的生命。

original_en_text: The false mask alone is frightening enough to scare away smaller pests.
original_zh_text: 光凭这个惊悚的造型就能劝退不少胆小鬼。
translated_text: The mask itself prevents infection by small parasites.
secondary_translated_text: 口罩本身可以防止小寄生虫的感染。

original_en_text: In its natural state it would avoid potential predators, but Pharloom’s Haunting now compels it to aggression. Fortunately, its jaws are ill-suited for combat.
original_zh_text: 本性畏避掠食者，然而纺络的丝咒迫使其凶性毕露。幸好它们的颚钳钝拙，不善搏杀。
translated_text: In nature, they avoid potential predators, but when it comes to predators, they can become more aggressive.
secondary_translated_text: 在自然界中，它们会避开潜在的捕食者，但当涉及到捕食者时，它们会变得更具攻击性。

translated_text: Desnago (Desnago)

original_en_text: Returned to their home caves, this chef continued to devise delicacies too repulsive for any bug still sane.
original_zh_text: 回到故土的洞穴后，这位厨师依旧沉迷于研制那些令任何尚存理智的虫子都难以接受的料理。
translated_text: Back in the original cave, the bakers continue to cook delicious dishes, so much so that the insects always notice it.
secondary_translated_text: 回到原来的洞穴，面包师继续烹饪美味的菜肴，以至于昆虫总是注意到它。

translated_text: Three leaves are dancing

original_en_text: Hardened warrior lord of a bygone age, able to command the coral crust to his bidding.
original_zh_text: 能号令珊瑚甲壳的远古战主。
translated_text: Once upon a time, a powerful military commander could carry out orders and command coral reefs.
secondary_translated_text: 曾几何时，一位强大的军事指挥官可以执行命令并指挥珊瑚礁。

original_en_text: There seem no ranks in their domain, yet this one has risen above the rest. A station likely gained through intimidation and thuggery.
original_zh_text: 该领域本无等级制度，此虫却凭威胁与暴力手段上位。
translated_text: Although they seem to have no reputation in their own field, their reputation is better than others.
secondary_translated_text: 虽然他们在自己的领域似乎没有什么名气，但他们的名气比别人好。

original_en_text: Manic fencer who delights in battle.
translated_text: He is a man who likes to fight.
secondary_translated_text: 他是一个喜欢战斗的人。

original_en_text: Sightless burrower that reacts violently to the slightest sound.
original_zh_text: 失去视力却听觉敏锐的穴居虫类，最细微的声响也会引起它们激烈的反应。
translated_text: Blind cavemen react strongly to small noises.
secondary_translated_text: 盲人洞穴人对小噪音反应强烈。

original_en_text: Monarch of Pharloom, and the primal source of Silk.
original_zh_text: 纺络的君主，灵丝的源头。
translated_text: The birthplace of Pharaoh Sherkar

original_en_text: These bugs have been driven out of their vault’s recesses by Pharloom’s black collapse. They are a nuisance, and I have only myself to blame.
original_zh_text: 由于纺络的崩塌，这些虫子被驱赶出书库的深处。这都是我一手造成的麻烦。
translated_text: Black debris from the farm drives the insects away from the back of the chest. That's the problem, and I blame myself for it.
secondary_translated_text: 农场的黑色碎片将昆虫从胸部后部赶走。这就是问题所在，我为此责怪自己。

translated_text: About Gammond&Zayev
About Mosmeyer

original_en_text: Flying bone mite that lives near magma. Roasts its prey by spitting scorching tar.
original_zh_text: 栖息在熔岩区的飞行螨虫，喷射高温焦油灼烧猎物。
translated_text: Bone mites live near magma. Spit out hot resin and burn food.
secondary_translated_text: 骨螨虫生活在岩浆附近。吐出热树脂并烧焦食物。

original_en_text: Plentiful pest with a sharp proboscis and a belly full of bile.
original_zh_text: 体内充满胆汁的群居蝠虫，死亡时剧烈爆炸。
translated_text: There are many parasites, pointed noses and a stomach full of bile.
secondary_translated_text: 寄生虫很多，鼻子尖，胃里充满了胆汁。

original_en_text: Small arachnid found in many crevices and caves throughout Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 纺络的岩缝和洞穴里常见的小型蜘蛛。
translated_text: Small spiders have been found in the Faro Valley and in many caves.
secondary_translated_text: 在法鲁山谷和许多洞穴中都发现了小蜘蛛。

original_en_text: Large worm mutated heavily by Plasmium. The creature has become fused to the roof of its cave, no longer able to move freely.
original_zh_text: 受生质液感染而变异的大型蠕虫。这只生物已与所处洞穴的洞顶融合，失去了自由移动的能力。
translated_text: The types of parasites vary from parasite to parasite. The organisms melted at the top of the cave and were no longer able to move freely.
secondary_translated_text: 寄生虫的类型因寄生虫而异。生物体在洞穴顶部融化，不再能够自由移动。

original_en_text: Its training resembles my own, favouring fast strikes and rapid movement. Once a hunter, perhaps?
original_zh_text: 战斗风格与我的技巧相似，崇尚速攻战术。或许它们曾经也是猎手？
translated_text: Just like my training. I like to shoot quickly and move quickly.
secondary_translated_text: 就像我的训练一样。我喜欢射击快，动作快。

original_en_text: What exceptional senses it possesses. It detects me with ease, even when not a single sound is made.
original_zh_text: 感知极为敏锐，哪怕分毫响动都能惊动它。
translated_text: What a wonderful feeling. You can find it easily without noise.
secondary_translated_text: 多么美妙的感觉啊。您可以很容易地找到它，没有噪音。
