original_en_text: Young masked worm that delights in ambushing intruders within its tunnels.
original_zh_text: 热衷隧道伏击的面甲蠕虫幼体。
translated_text: Young masked insects like to grow bad guys in tunnels.
secondary_translated_text: 年轻的蒙面昆虫喜欢在隧道里培育坏人。

original_en_text: Small automaton built to work, without complaint, in the scorching heat of the Underworks’ Cauldron.
original_zh_text: 为圣堡工厂内大熔釜的酷热环境打造的小型自动机。勤勤恳恳，任劳任怨。
translated_text: Small self-driving machines are designed to run without complaint even in the high temperatures of refrigerators.
secondary_translated_text: 小型自动驾驶机器的设计即使在冰箱的高温下也可以毫无抱怨地运行。

original_en_text: Elder overseers of the Deep Docks, responsible for the oversight and punishment of lesser workers.
original_zh_text: 深坞地区的监工，负责监管与惩戒低级别工人。
translated_text: Senior management at Shenzhen Central Terminal will supervise and punish lower-level workers.
secondary_translated_text: 深圳中心航站楼的高级管理人员将对下级工人进行监督和处罚。

original_en_text: Drifting creature with a wide coral mask and hard proboscis to stab its prey.
original_zh_text: 戴着宽大珊瑚面甲的漂流生物，使用坚硬的长喙攻击自投罗网的猎物。
translated_text: Plankton uses huge coral masks and long hard noses to chew food.
secondary_translated_text: 浮游生物使用巨大的珊瑚面具和又长又硬的鼻子来咀嚼食物。

translated_text: I am Caracas.
Gonzalez/Raza

original_en_text: The feeder’s curled pin looks designed to keep ravenous roaches at bay, and the tender from turning into the meal.
original_zh_text: 那柄弯钩长针的设计堪称精妙— 既能防止饥渴的蟑螂反将饲主当作美餐，又可随时给不听话的 "宠物" 放血。
translated_text: The needles covered in beetles seem to prevent greedy beetles from becoming prey.
secondary_translated_text: 被甲虫覆盖的针叶似乎可以防止贪婪的甲虫成为猎物。

translated_text: Tsang's Plasma

original_en_text: A creature born of a bug’s desperate hope for strength. Few possess the skill to call the void, and of those that can, none possess the means to tame it.
original_zh_text: 某只虫子在绝望中极度渴求力量，诞生出了此造物。能召唤虚空的虫子已寥寥无几，而在它们之中，更无虫子能真正驯服虚空。
translated_text: Few people have the ability to create a vacuum, and those with power do not have the ability to tame the vacuum.
secondary_translated_text: 很少有人有能力创造真空，而有权力的人也没有能力驯服真空。

original_en_text: Dark-furred bug protecting itself with a spiked coral nut.
original_zh_text: 以带刺珊瑚坚果自卫的深色绒毛甲虫。
translated_text: Dark-haired insects protect themselves with short coral fruits.
secondary_translated_text: 黑发昆虫用短珊瑚果实保护自己。

original_en_text: Thick-plated scuttler that prefers high places.
original_zh_text: 偏好占据制高点的厚甲虫，从口中倾泻灼热酸雨。
translated_text: Scots love big people.
Seth, keeper of the temple.

original_en_text: Drained worker on the verge of collapse. Consumed by the Haunting, they continue to work far beyond their mortal limits.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒侵蚀的濒死劳工，超越生理极限持续劳作。
translated_text: Helpless workers are on the verge of collapse. They are angry at the chaos and continue to push their limits.
secondary_translated_text: 无助的工人正处于崩溃边缘。他们对混乱感到愤怒，并继续挑战自己的极限。

original_en_text: Cunning bug that hunts with darts fashioned from stake and bile.
original_zh_text: 用尖桩与胆汁制作毒镖的狡诈虫子。
translated_text: They use arrows made of nails and bile to hunt hidden insects.
secondary_translated_text: 他们使用指甲和胆汁制成的箭来捕猎隐藏的昆虫。

original_en_text: The void that will claim all things... In the barbed forms it chooses its nature can be seen clear.
original_zh_text: 吞噬万物的虚空本质，于此狰狞形态显露无遗。
translated_text: Their nature is reflected in the shape of the spine they choose.
secondary_translated_text: 它们的性质反映在它们选择的脊柱形状上。

original_en_text: Cogwork construct forged primarily for the Core’s protection. Bears a shield and poke-pin, and possesses a lethal understanding of their use.
original_zh_text: 持盾佩枪的核心守卫机械，具备战术应变能力。
translated_text: The structure of the device is mainly used to protect the core. He picked up the shield and needle, and he understood his fatal purpose.
secondary_translated_text: 该装置的结构主要用于保护核心。他拿起盾牌和针头，明白了自己的致命目的。

translated_text: New diary.
Stolen paintings.
Nils

original_en_text: Small bony bug that favours dark tunnels. Can expand its spiked carapace to ward against attacking predators.
original_zh_text: 喜欢待在阴暗隧道的硬壳虫，遇到危险时会突然炸开背刺。
translated_text: Little bugs who love tunnels. Its sharp shell can expand to avoid predators.
secondary_translated_text: 喜欢隧道的小虫子。它锋利的外壳可以膨胀以躲避捕食者。

translated_text: The horns of a rhinoceros.

original_en_text: Their sharp cleaning implement is as filthy as the rest of the place. They only layer grime on grime.
original_zh_text: 他们的清洁工具与周遭同样污秽，这样打扫只会越来越脏。
translated_text: Their sharp cleaning tools are as dirty as anywhere else. They just layer the soil on the soil surface.
secondary_translated_text: 他们锋利的清洁工具和其他地方一样脏。他们只是在土壤表面铺上土壤。

original_en_text: High standing insect of the Choir, bearing a bow. This elite Reed has been trained and fed beyond its smaller fellows.
original_zh_text: 圣咏团中地位崇高的虫子，持弓而立。比起普通的簧片战士，这位精英成员受过更严格的训练，也享有更丰盛的供养。
translated_text: The insect was standing on a bow, holding the bow in its hand. In addition to their little friends, this elite team also trains and educates them.
secondary_translated_text: 昆虫站在一把弓上，手里拿着弓。除了他们的小朋友之外，这个精英团队还培训和教育他们。

original_en_text: It lies low to the ground, perhaps out of reverence for its task, but can spring up suddenly to attack. Its shear makes for a deadly weapon with surprising reach.
original_zh_text: 那柄形似剪枝钳的武器，既能精准剥离甲壳中的灵丝脉络，也能在瞬间绞碎试图逃逸的灵魂残片。
translated_text: You may be lying on the floor, fulfilling your mission, but suddenly they attack you. His organization is an amazingly lethal weapon.
secondary_translated_text: 你可能躺在地板上，完成你的使命，但突然他们攻击你。他的组织是一个惊人的致命武器。

original_en_text: Small automaton with a shielded shell, intended to carry loads of dangerous flintflame.
original_zh_text: 配备防护甲壳的小型自动机，负责运输危险的燧焰。
translated_text: Small automatic device with hazardous flame transport protective casing
secondary_translated_text: 带有危险火焰运输保护壳的小型自动装置

original_en_text: They too seek the spectre at the Haunting’s heart, though I fear that foe would pose a challenge beyond their mortal limits.
original_zh_text: 他们同样在寻找那丝咒之源的幽魂——只是我担心，我们共同的敌人是超越凡虫极限的存在，恐怕不是他们所能应对的。
translated_text: They are still searching for ghosts in their hearts, but they fear that these enemies may pose challenges that transcend national boundaries.
secondary_translated_text: 他们仍在寻找心中的鬼魂，但他们担心这些敌人可能会带来超越国界的挑战。

original_en_text: Defeat {0} more to complete the hunter’s notes.
original_zh_text: 再击败{0}只以解锁猎手的笔记。
translated_text: He lost.{0}Add content as hunter notes.
secondary_translated_text: 他输了。{0}按照猎人的注释添加内容。

translated_text: The woman in memory.

original_en_text: Nesting creature that fuses its face with sharpened coral.
original_zh_text: 将面部与珊瑚融为一体的巢居生物。
translated_text: Creatures in the nest mix their faces with sharp coral.
secondary_translated_text: 巢穴中的生物将它们的脸与锋利的珊瑚混在一起。

original_en_text: The moss looks to grow even inside their stomach, which the pilgrim spits at foes in compressed gobs. A foul form of offence.
original_zh_text: 苔藓甚至在其胃囊内滋长，被压缩成团的腐殖质带着刺鼻腥气——这恐怕是纺络最肮脏的远程武器。
translated_text: Moss appears to grow on hilltops, and pilgrims spit on enemies, forming compressed mucus.
secondary_translated_text: 苔藓似乎生长在山顶，朝圣者向敌人吐口水，形成压缩粘液。

original_en_text: Rare automaton intended to perform the ringing of bells and cymbals in the depths of the Core.
original_zh_text: 专为敲击钟钹设计的稀有自动机。
translated_text: This is a rare machine that can ring and chime bells.
secondary_translated_text: 这是一款罕见的可以敲钟和敲钟的机器。

original_en_text: Disciple of the Choir, elevated above other pilgrims, and forced to cowl their face forever more.
original_zh_text: 蒙面的高阶信徒，地位远超普通朝圣者。
translated_text: Horned clowns are always more humble than other pilgrims.
secondary_translated_text: 角小丑总是比其他朝圣者更谦虚。

original_en_text: Pharloom’s structures seem almost built for them. The endless corners and cracks, so perfect for mites to burrow and nest.
original_zh_text: 纺络的建筑结构仿佛为其量身打造，这里有无尽的角落和缝隙供螨虫打洞筑巢。
translated_text: The pharaohs 'buildings were mainly built for them. Endless corners and cracks are ideal for mite nests.
secondary_translated_text: 法老的建筑主要是为他们建造的。无尽的角落和裂缝是理想的螨巢。

original_en_text: Flighted creature formed from coldshard. If shattered it will quickly reform.
original_zh_text: 由冰晶碎片构成的飞行生物，破碎后可以迅速重组。
translated_text: Flying creatures are made from cold garbage and can be rebuilt once destroyed.
secondary_translated_text: 飞行生物是由冰冷的垃圾制成的，一旦被摧毁就可以重建。

original_en_text: In every land, creatures find new and surprising ways to disguise themselves. One must be wary always.
original_zh_text: 不论在哪一片土地上，万物皆有巧妙的伪装法门，行走此间当时刻保持警觉。
translated_text: In every country, creatures find new and surprising ways to disguise themselves. One should always be vigilant.
secondary_translated_text: 在每一个国家，生物都找到了新的和令人惊讶的方式来伪装自己。我们应该时刻保持警惕。

original_en_text: Aggressive winged bug of the lowlands. When angered, it rapidly whips its bladed tail as a weapon.
original_zh_text: 低地区域的暴躁飞虫，一生气就把带刃的尾巴甩成风车。
translated_text: When they cause insect attacks in lowlands, they immediately use blades and tails as weapons.
secondary_translated_text: 当它们在低地引起昆虫袭击时，它们会立即使用刀片和尾巴作为武器。

original_en_text: Young ant hunter wielding sickles carved from teeth. Will often call for aid if danger comes close.
original_zh_text: 使用兽牙镰刀的年轻蚁族猎手，遇险时会呼叫支援。
translated_text: The young ant hunter was deceived. When danger comes, they often seek help.
secondary_translated_text: 年轻的蚂蚁猎人被欺骗了。当危险来临时，他们经常寻求帮助。

original_en_text: Overgrown elder, able to spawn burning bubbles from within its coral-cased shell.
original_zh_text: 与珊瑚融合的长老巨虫，能从甲壳内喷发炽热气泡。
translated_text: Once infected, BlackBerry produces burning bubbles in its coral shell.
secondary_translated_text: 一旦被感染，黑莓手机的珊瑚壳就会产生燃烧的气泡。

translated_text: The Prime Minister announced... ...

original_en_text: Imposing old insect nesting in the heights of Shellwood. Her command of twig and branch ensured no pilgrim ever survived within her territory.
original_zh_text: 盘踞甲木林高处的碎裂者女王，掌控树丛枝干屠尽领地内所有朝圣者。
translated_text: His control of the army ensured that there were no pilgrims in his territory.
secondary_translated_text: 他对军队的控制确保了他的领土上没有朝圣者。

original_en_text: This bug’s fusion with the crust-growth... It seems intentional, though I imagine the union is far from comfortable.
original_zh_text: 这种融合看似自主选择，但其过程必定充满痛苦。
translated_text: The fusion of worms and the growth of shells. It seems intentional, but I don't think the union is happy with it.
secondary_translated_text: 蠕虫的融合和贝壳的生长。这似乎是故意的，但我认为工会对此并不满意。

original_en_text: Born and built only to work until time stiffens its limbs. Perhaps it is mercy this construct knows nothing of the freedom it lacks.
original_zh_text: 生来只是为了劳作，直到岁月令它四肢僵硬。也许它对自己所缺失的自由一无所知，这反倒是一种仁慈。
translated_text: They were born and forced to work until time hardened their hands and feet, and perhaps the structure did not know that the freedom they did not have was benevolent.
secondary_translated_text: 他们出生并被迫工作，直到时间硬化了他们的手脚，也许结构并不知道他们所没有的自由是仁慈的。

translated_text: About moss
Ma 'am, let's go!

original_en_text: Warrior cartographer of a tribe from Pharloom’s edge. Her skills in battle could challenge the kingdom’s best.
original_zh_text: 纺络边陲部落的勇士制图师，其战力在纺络可谓数一数二。
translated_text: He is a map warrior from the Border Farm Tribe with enough fighting ability to challenge the pinnacle of the kingdom.
secondary_translated_text: 他是边境农场部落的地图战士，拥有足够的战斗能力，可以挑战王国的巅峰。

translated_text: Cogwork crawler

original_en_text: Once one of Pharloom’s favoured bugs, and yet their domain and their shells would have been the first to fall to the Haunting.
original_zh_text: 曾经纺络的荣光加身者，却成为首批丝咒受害者。
translated_text: Once again, dear insect, its fields and bark, fell into the hands of a ghost for the first time.
secondary_translated_text: 亲爱的昆虫，它的田地和树皮，再次第一次落入鬼魂手中。

original_en_text: Hidden amongst their tower’s matching crust, these smaller bugs would have survived and thrived.
original_zh_text: 这些小虫子依靠伪装得以繁衍生息。
translated_text: These small insects are hidden in the shell of the tower and can survive and reproduce.
secondary_translated_text: 这些小昆虫隐藏在塔的壳中，可以生存和繁殖。

original_en_text: This one lived long and fed much. The wood will be much safer for their slaying.
original_zh_text: 她存活久远且吞噬无数，诛杀她将使丛林安全倍增。
translated_text: Better to kill them in the forest.
secondary_translated_text: 最好在森林里杀死它们。

translated_text: I started shouting.

original_en_text: They once teemed around their tower, in numbers immense. It is a rare chance to witness such a bountiful display of life.
original_zh_text: 其数量曾经可谓铺天盖地。目睹此等生命奇观的机会已越发稀少。
translated_text: They gathered around the tower, a precious opportunity to escape the luxurious life.
secondary_translated_text: 他们聚集在塔楼周围，这是逃离奢华生活的宝贵机会。

translated_text: Cocktails in Caracas

original_en_text: Burrower that nests in the Bellvein and seeks out hard bells to protects its soft body.
original_zh_text: 在钟脉内部打洞栖息的毛球状虫类，专门找硬钟壳当作盔甲。
translated_text: Neanderthals discovered hard peaks and built nests on dolphins to protect their soft bodies.
secondary_translated_text: 尼安德特人发现了坚硬的山峰，并在海豚身上筑巢来保护它们柔软的身体。

original_en_text: It is easy to be caught off-guard by the ricocheting trajectory of its flung mask, especially in tight corners.
original_zh_text: 投掷面甲的反弹轨迹难以预判。在狭窄空间尤其需要提防其袭击。
translated_text: Especially in close shots, it is easy to lose trace of the mask he drew.
secondary_translated_text: 尤其是在近距离拍摄时，很容易失去他画的面具的痕迹。

original_en_text: Time allowed their shell to grow thick, all the better for battering their targets.
original_zh_text: 岁月让它们的甲壳变得厚重，能更轻易地猛击目标。
translated_text: Time will thicken their shell and will attach itself to higher goals.
secondary_translated_text: 时间会刺穿他们的外壳，并将自己附着在更高的目标上。

translated_text: Independent chef
Doctor. Katz.

original_en_text: Arachnid that nestles within dark holes in cavern roofs. Pounces on prey from far above.
original_zh_text: 隐藏在洞顶暗处的蜘蛛，擅长从高处一跃而下，偷袭猎物。
translated_text: Spiders live in black holes at the top of the cave, flying towards distant prey.
secondary_translated_text: 蜘蛛生活在洞穴顶部的黑洞中，向远处的猎物飞去。

translated_text: Tag: Kindle

original_en_text: A monster in the classic form of tales from youth. Its slaying was done as much by my fierce travelling companion as by myself.
original_zh_text: 童谣所述的经典魔物形态。此次诛杀多靠了我那勇猛的旅伴。
translated_text: A typical young monster, killed by me and my terrible companions. "
secondary_translated_text: 一个典型的年轻怪物，被我和我可怕的同伴杀死了。"

translated_text: Mother Matt

original_en_text: Passively waits for prey to blunder into its path. A technique that should not necessarily be derided. Whatever is effective is best.
original_zh_text: 静静等待猎物误入其攻击范围。看似消极的捕猎方式，往往能收获意外成效。
translated_text: He passively waited when local thunder suddenly attacked his road. Technology should not be cut. The most efficient people are the best.
secondary_translated_text: 当当地的雷声突然袭击他的道路时，他被动地等待着。技术不应该被削减。最有效率的人是最好的。

original_en_text: My unique shell can resist the darker deformations of this substance, but even I have limits...
original_zh_text: 我的甲壳虽能抵抗此物质带来的畸变，但承受力终有极限。
translated_text: My unique outer layer resists the dark deformation of this material, but it also has limitations.
secondary_translated_text: 我独特的外层抵抗这种材料的黑暗变形，但它也有局限性。

original_en_text: Screeching scavenger dyed black in mourning at their land’s collapse.
original_zh_text: 大地倾覆之际，绝望哀叫的黑色食腐虫。
translated_text: When the floor fell, the screaming funeral people were painted black.
secondary_translated_text: 当地板掉下来的时候，尖叫的送葬者被涂成了黑色。

translated_text: Air wing (air area)

original_en_text: Amazingly, the creature carries the void’s black liquid in its stomach, violently spraying it forth if threatened.
original_zh_text: 神奇的是，它竟能将虚空黑液储于胃中，受威胁时剧烈喷吐攻击。
translated_text: Surprisingly, the creature's abdomen is filled with black liquid, and when threatened, it vomits violently.
secondary_translated_text: 令人惊讶的是，这种生物的腹部充满了黑色液体，当受到威胁时，它会猛烈呕吐。

original_en_text: A critical member of the larger flock. Without them present the Kai would be fast driven to extinction by larger predators.
original_zh_text: 它们是族群存续的关键——当凯旋转尖角筑起防御阵时，连髓骨洞窟的暴君都要暂避锋芒。
translated_text: Without them, they would soon be extinct by large predators.
secondary_translated_text: 如果没有它们，它们很快就会被大型掠食者灭绝。

original_en_text: Strong bug replete with rosaries. If angered they will whip their strings in a ceaseless onslaught.
original_zh_text: 缠满念珠的强壮虫子，发怒时会挥舞珠串猛攻。
translated_text: Powerful insects are full of roses. If I get angry, I will keep working.
secondary_translated_text: 强大的昆虫充满了玫瑰。如果我生气了，我就会继续工作。

original_en_text: To subsist on the sickly water in this fetid environment it spits out the most toxic elements. Over generations, this former survival technique has turned into an effective hunting tool.
original_zh_text: 过滤毒液的生存机制经代际演化，成为高效的狩猎手段。
translated_text: Remove the most toxic elements to survive in such a difficult environment. After generations of efforts, this survival technology has become an effective hunting tool.
secondary_translated_text: 去除最有毒的元素才能在如此困难的环境中生存。经过几代人的努力，这项生存技术已成为有效的狩猎工具。

translated_text: Do you have shortcomings?
Huge pomegranate seeds.
Written by Horn Psales

original_en_text: Far more hostile than their younger companions but seemingly less likely to roam far from their nest.
original_zh_text: 看似凶暴，实为恋巢的保守派。
translated_text: They are more hostile than their younger companions, but rarely leave the nest.
secondary_translated_text: 它们比年轻的同伴更具敌意，但很少离开巢穴。

translated_text: Course Corner

original_en_text: Depressed thespian, consumed by the melancholy of a collapsing world.
original_zh_text: 被世界的崩解压垮的消沉演员。
translated_text: The depressed actor is shrouded in the darkness of world collapse.
secondary_translated_text: 这位抑郁的演员被世界崩溃的黑暗所笼罩。

original_en_text: Once exulted chef, exiled from the Citadel for repeated culinary crimes.
original_zh_text: 曾经备受赞誉的大厨，却因屡次触犯烹饪禁忌而被逐出圣堡。
translated_text: A gay chef has been kicked out of the castle for a series of cooking violations.
secondary_translated_text: 一名同性恋厨师因一系列烹饪违规行为而被赶出城堡。

original_en_text: Feeble servant of the Underworks with a long twistpin and hard shell.
original_zh_text: 手持长柄旋针的虚弱硬甲劳工。
translated_text: The weak servant wore shawls and hard blankets.
secondary_translated_text: 虚弱的仆人披着披肩和硬毯子。

original_en_text: Starved servant of the Slab, bearing a hooked longpin.
original_zh_text: 饥肠辘辘的罪石牢狱仆从，手持钩形长针。
translated_text: The hungry stone servant held a long needle in his hand.
secondary_translated_text: 饥饿的石奴手里拿着一根长针。

translated_text: Lana's leaves

original_en_text: Spherical, winged automaton housing many sharp spikes.
original_zh_text: 装载尖刺的球型飞行自动机，防御功能存疑。
translated_text: Machine gun with spherical wings and many sharp spikes inside.
secondary_translated_text: 机关枪，有球形翅膀，里面有许多锋利的尖刺。

original_en_text: Their plump, round shape makes them well-suited for target practice. Difficult to resist testing my aim on them...
original_zh_text: 圆滚滚的身材十分适合用作靶子，不拿来练手都可惜……
translated_text: It is thick and round, making it a perfect choice for shooting practice. "It's hard to resist the test of my goals. "
secondary_translated_text: 它又厚又圆，是射击练习的完美选择。“很难抗拒我目标的考验。"

original_en_text: Elder Drapefly grown big from age and consumption. Its heavy body allows it to hit much harder than its younger companions.
original_zh_text: 年迈体硕的帷虫，沉重的身躯赋予其强劲的冲击力。
translated_text: Old ships grow with age and effort, and heavy hulls may be more difficult to fight against than younger friends.
secondary_translated_text: 旧船随着年龄和努力而成长，沉重的船体可能比年轻的朋友更难对抗。

translated_text: Wine.

original_en_text: Final arbiter of the Blasted Steps, tasked to ensure only the sinless ever step beyond the Grand Gate.
original_zh_text: 蚀阶的最终裁决者，确保唯有无罪者能跨越巨扉圣门。
translated_text: The task of the ultimate mediator in the bombing phase is to ensure that only innocent people get through the gate.
secondary_translated_text: 爆炸阶段最终调解人的任务是确保只有无辜者才能通过大门。

original_en_text: This one chose to embrace the doom to come. I shall not share such easy surrender.
original_zh_text: 他选择臣服于灾难的降临，我绝不会效仿这种懦弱行径。
translated_text: He was determined to accept his destiny, and I gave up easily.
secondary_translated_text: 他决心接受自己的命运，而我却轻易放弃了。

translated_text: Watch eater

original_en_text: Gentle glider of Mount Fay. Its downy wings and cowl allow it to resist even the most cutting cold.
original_zh_text: 费耶山的温顺滑翔者，其绒翼可抵御极寒。
translated_text: Soft mountain plants with soft wings and belts can withstand the coldest cold.
secondary_translated_text: 柔软的山地植物，有柔软的翅膀和带子，可以抵御最寒冷的寒冷。

original_en_text: Heavy, hard-shelled charger relying on weight and strength.
translated_text: Heavy duty rigid loaders depend on weight and strength.
secondary_translated_text: 重型刚性装载机取决于重量和强度。

original_en_text: This one’s husk held a masterful talent, to weave Silk into blazing runes. Throughout my life, I have seen runes woven for many tasks. Was she the first to hone such skills?
original_zh_text: 其躯壳曾掌握将灵丝编织为燃烧符文的绝技。纵观我毕生所见的各类符文，她或是这项技艺的开山鼻祖？
translated_text: Human beings have the gift of weaving chains of fire. I have seen many dragons in my life. Is this your first time learning this technology?
secondary_translated_text: 人类有编织火链的天赋。我一生中见过很多龙。这是您第一次学习这项技术吗？

translated_text: What does ghost mean?

original_en_text: This one disturbs me... There is something in its simplicity. Do I almost feel fear?
original_zh_text: 这东西令我感到不安……其纯粹性中蕴含某种诡异的特质。我竟然感到一丝恐惧？
translated_text: She was worried about them. Are you afraid of this simplicity?
secondary_translated_text: 她很担心他们。你害怕这种简单吗？

translated_text: The choir applauded.
"I am disappointed with the jury.

original_en_text: Myth made real in memory. The creature seemed completely at one with the flora around it. Did it ever truly exist as I have seen it?
original_zh_text: 传说中的生物在忆境中成为了现实，与周遭植物浑然一体。我所见到的一切，真的曾经存在过吗？
translated_text: Myths are truth in memory. The creature appears to be completely integrated with the surrounding plants. It exists, as you can see.
secondary_translated_text: 神话就是记忆中的真理。这种生物似乎与周围的植物完全融为一体。正如你所看到的，它存在。

original_en_text: Simple. Graceful. Another fine bug lost forever from these lands.
original_zh_text: 简约而优雅。又一个永远从这片土地消失的美丽物种。
translated_text: Another strange insect has disappeared from the earth forever.
secondary_translated_text: 另一种奇怪的昆虫从地球上永远消失了。

translated_text: Tyrant Skelton

original_en_text: His desire to see Pharloom saved may have been well intentioned, but he seemed quite happy for others to die upon the stage in pursuit of his goal.
original_zh_text: 他拯救纺络的愿望或许出于善意，但为实现目标似乎乐于目睹他人在舞台上殒命。
translated_text: He may want to save his farm, but he is happy that others died instantly to advance his career.
secondary_translated_text: 他可能想拯救他的农场，但他很高兴其他人为了推进他的职业生涯而立即死去。

translated_text: Gavido (Gavido)

original_en_text: Brave worker carrying unstable flintflame and wearing a heavy bell to protect against potential ignition.
original_zh_text: 运输燧焰的工虫。燧焰性质不稳定，所以它们需要佩戴重型防爆钟罩。
translated_text: Brave workers carry unstable flammable substances and wear heavy bells to prevent burns.
secondary_translated_text: 勇敢的工人携带不稳定的易燃物质，并佩戴沉重的铃以防止烧伤。

original_en_text: Its bright gems could be used to make beautiful, but short-lived jewellery. An amusing idea for a gift... or a trap.
original_zh_text: 每次甲壳碰撞都会迸发火星，这使得它们的巢穴成了行走的火药库。
translated_text: Shiny jewelry can be used to make beautiful but lasting jewelry.
secondary_translated_text: 闪亮的珠宝可以用来制作美丽但持久的珠宝。

original_en_text: Small burrowing ant, servant to the larger Skarr.
original_zh_text: 为大型斯卡尔蚁服务的小个子掘地工。
translated_text: Ants and servants of the big skeleton are in a small cave.
secondary_translated_text: 大骷髅的蚂蚁和仆人在一个小洞穴里。

original_en_text: Heavy, hairy jailer responsible for capturing sinners and punishing prisoners.
original_zh_text: 厚重的多毛蝇虫，负责抓捕罪犯和惩戒囚犯。
translated_text: They are a heavy, soft guard, catching criminals and punishing prisoners.
secondary_translated_text: 他们是一支沉重而软弱的警卫，抓捕罪犯并惩罚囚犯。

original_en_text: Small fluttering creature capable of defending itself with its small stinger.
original_zh_text: 小型飞虫，使用自身毒刺进行攻击。
translated_text: This little flying creature can protect itself with a small needle.
secondary_translated_text: 这种小飞行生物可以用一根小针保护自己。

original_en_text: Agile bug of Pharloom, its higher functions have been lost to the Haunting.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒夺去神智的敏捷朝圣者，仅存扑跃攻击的本能。
translated_text: The lack of flexibility of headlamps leads to confusion and loss of advanced functions.
secondary_translated_text: 前灯缺乏灵活性导致混乱和高级功能丧失。

translated_text: Clean colors with Cogwork

original_en_text: Old warrior guarding the border of their domain, stiffened by time and awoken by song.
original_zh_text: 守卫疆界的沧桑老将，因古老歌谣而苏醒。
translated_text: Border Patrol veterans wake up singing in mild weather.
secondary_translated_text: 边境巡逻队退伍军人在温和的天气里唱歌醒来。

original_en_text: More dangerous in the moment of its explosive and corrosive death than it ever was in life.
original_zh_text: 其死亡瞬间的腐蚀性爆炸远比生前更具威胁。
translated_text: Explosive and corrosive moments of death are more dangerous than any other moment in life.
secondary_translated_text: 爆炸性和腐蚀性的死亡时刻比生命中的任何其他时刻都更危险。

original_en_text: The core member of a powerful order, trained fearless and faithful. Theirs was a kingdom of warriors, one built upon their blades.
original_zh_text: 作为精锐战团的骨干成员，经受了严酷的训练，无畏且忠诚。它们建立的刀锋王朝，正是尚武精神的巅峰体现。
translated_text: The leading members of powerful cults are well-trained, brave and loyal. Their kingdom is a kingdom of warriors, built on their bones, they are the strongest.
secondary_translated_text: 强大邪教的主要成员训练有素、勇敢、忠诚。他们的王国是一个战士的王国，建立在他们的骨头上，他们是最强大的。

translated_text: Minister of Finance.
Grate Read

original_en_text: If the woody hide is shattered, the bug will still bravely, foolishly try to attack.
original_zh_text: 它们至死都坚信那截空心木茎是神赐的圣枪——可悲的勇气，或是可敬的愚忠？
translated_text: Even if a cow tears a tree, insects will attack it boldly and foolishly.
secondary_translated_text: 即使牛撕裂了一棵树，昆虫也会大胆而愚蠢地攻击它。

original_en_text: Young acolyte raised in the darkest vaults, destined to ascend to the rank of Scrollreader.
original_zh_text: 低语书库培育的诵经者接班人。
translated_text: Young disciples, raised among the darkest treasures, are destined to be promoted among parchment readers.
secondary_translated_text: 年轻的弟子在最黑暗的宝藏中长大，注定会在羊皮纸读者中得到晋升。

translated_text: Nufamou City

original_en_text: Learned disciple of the Choir charged to maintain the Citadel’s Memorium.
original_zh_text: 受命维护圣堡忆廊的博学咏者团信徒。
translated_text: A talented choir student is responsible for protecting the castle's monuments.
secondary_translated_text: 一位才华横溢的合唱团学生负责保护城堡的纪念碑。

original_en_text: Heart of the Haunting, long lulled to slumber and desperate to wake. The higher being’s threads stretched throughout Pharloom, snaring its bugs and driving them to madness and discord.
original_zh_text: 丝咒的核心，长久沉眠却渴求苏醒。她的丝线遍布纺络，诱使这片土地上的虫子陷入疯狂。
translated_text: The mind is a ghost, a long sleep, longing to wake up. Children of advanced life walk in the rain, turning off insects and leading them to fight madness.
secondary_translated_text: 心灵是鬼魂，沉睡，渴望醒来。生活先进的孩子们在雨中行走，驱除昆虫，带领他们与疯狂作斗争。

original_en_text: Vigorous old knight and their noble companion, working together to see their lands cut free from haunted madness.
original_zh_text: 精力充沛的老骑士与他忠诚的同伴。他们并肩作战，誓要将自己的家园从丝咒的疯狂中解救出来。
translated_text: An old spiritual knight and a noble companion work together to liberate the earth from the madness of ghosts.
secondary_translated_text: 一位古老的精神骑士和一位高贵的同伴共同努力，将地球从鬼魂的疯狂中解放出来。

original_en_text: Winged insect that feeds upon moss and lichen in the caves above Bone Bottom.
original_zh_text: 栖息于骸底镇上方洞窟的飞虫，以苔藓地衣为食。
translated_text: A winged insect that feeds on moss and bites the vacuum under the bones
secondary_translated_text: 一种有翼的昆虫，以苔藓为食，咬骨头下的真空

original_zh_text: 监工兄弟 西格尼斯&格隆
translated_text: Brother signal&Importance of Gron
secondary_translated_text: 兄弟信号&格伦的重要性

translated_text: Playing Camellite

original_en_text: Mournful creature tasked alone to expel the Citadel’s choking refuse. Their talent with a longpin is unmatched.
original_zh_text: 独自清理圣堡秽物的哀伤生物，长针技艺登峰造极。
translated_text: A brave creature's task is to clear the castle of impressive garbage alone. His talent as a long-range soldier is unmatched.
secondary_translated_text: 勇敢的生物的任务就是独自清理城堡中令人印象深刻的垃圾。他作为远程士兵的天赋是无与伦比的。

original_en_text: They ceaselessly churn through rock and bone without ever seeming to rest. Do they have a destination? Or are they compelled to dig forever deeper?
original_zh_text: 它们似乎永远不知疲倦地向下挖掘。究竟是有目的地前进，还是被迫永无止境地穿行？
translated_text: They moved constantly between stones and bones, never seeming to rest.
secondary_translated_text: 他们不断地在石头和骨头之间移动，似乎从未休息过。

original_en_text: Obese offshoot of Muckroaches, born of the Citadel’s exhaust smog. The winged roach’s sagging stomach is filled with sizzling bile.
original_zh_text: 圣堡废气催生的肥胖蟑螂变种，鼓胀的腹部储存着沸腾胆汁。
translated_text: A beetle, a big branch, flew out of the castle drain, his weak stomach filled with hissing and bile.
secondary_translated_text: 一只甲虫，一根大树枝，从城堡的排水沟里飞出来，他虚弱的胃里充满了嘶嘶声和胆汁。

translated_text: Malores.

original_en_text: Ancient Weaver condemned for a transgression lost to time.
original_zh_text: 远古时期因某项重罪被囚禁的古老织者。
translated_text: An ancient craftsman is accused of committing the crime of being lost in time.
secondary_translated_text: 一位古代工匠被指控犯下迷失时间罪。

original_en_text: A fine shot with its sharp mask. Its aggression has no ill effect on its aim.
original_zh_text: 面甲投掷精准异常，暴戾的性情并未损耗其分毫准度。
translated_text: Beautiful photos, beautiful masks, aggression will not affect the target
secondary_translated_text: 美丽的照片，美丽的面具，攻击性不会影响目标

translated_text: The stress of the day.

original_en_text: Seeming soft, but hiding a sharp surprise. Any larger predator attempting a bite would learn a pointed and painful lesson.
original_zh_text: 看似柔软实则暗藏杀机，掠食者的撕咬只会换来锥心之痛。
translated_text: This chewing may seem comfortable, but it hides a sharp surprise. The big predator who tried to ask has learned a difficult and painful lesson.
secondary_translated_text: 这种咀嚼可能看起来很舒服，但它隐藏着一种尖锐的惊喜。试图询问的大掠食者得到了艰难而痛苦的教训。

original_en_text: Not a bug but a projection of another’s will cast in smog and Silk.
original_zh_text: 烟雾与灵丝交织的意志投影，并非实体生物。
translated_text: Not the insects, but others were thrown into the smoke and silk.
secondary_translated_text: 不是昆虫，而是其他昆虫被扔进烟雾和丝绸中。

translated_text: They escaped from the well.

original_en_text: Broken construct built by Weavers past, able to fire a focused beam of silklight to carve halls and chambers through ice and bone.
original_zh_text: 破损的古织者装置，能聚集并发射灵丝光束凿穿冰体和骸骨，通常用来开凿厅室。
translated_text: Once destroyed, Weaver's buildings were able to radiate concentrated air from Marseille through ice and bone-carved salt and rooms.
secondary_translated_text: 一旦被毁，韦弗的建筑就能够通过冰、骨雕盐和房间辐射来自马赛的浓缩空气。

translated_text: Deep Dibs about

original_en_text: Short-lived sprite born of flickering flame.
original_zh_text: 闪烁火焰孕育出的精灵，其生命往往转瞬即逝。
translated_text: A fleeting soul was born in a bright flame.
secondary_translated_text: 一个转瞬即逝的灵魂在明亮的火焰中诞生。

original_en_text: Slow drifting bug with a heavy top shell. The bug reacts little to threats, even those that could claim its life.
original_zh_text: 顶覆厚重甲壳的漂浮虫，行动迟缓，对致命威胁也都反应微弱。
translated_text: Insects have heavy skin. This loophole has little response, even if it is a threat to life.
secondary_translated_text: 昆虫的皮肤很厚。即使对生命构成威胁，这个漏洞也几乎没有得到回应。

original_en_text: Bell-clad bug responsible for mining the deeper, treacherous depths below their docks.
original_zh_text: 负责开采深坞下方危险矿区的虫子，身覆钟甲。
translated_text: Guardians are responsible for digging deeper and more dangerous depths under the dock.
secondary_translated_text: 守护者负责在码头下挖掘更深、更危险的深处。

original_en_text: Toothy growth that lives on cave roofs. Wraps wayward bugs with its long tongue and drags them up to be consumed.
original_zh_text: 栖身洞顶的齿舌生物，用拟态长舌诱捕猎物。
translated_text: On the roof of the cave lies a toothed plant with its long tongue wrapped in evil insects.
secondary_translated_text: 洞穴的屋顶上躺着一种有齿的植物，长长的舌头上包裹着邪恶的昆虫。

original_en_text: Fine winged flyer that survives in flocks.
translated_text: Irish Pilot Team

original_en_text: Long dormant centipede, awoken and enraged by Pharloom’s crumbling collapse.
original_zh_text: 长期蛰伏的远古蜈蚣，因纺络的崩塌而苏醒、暴怒。
translated_text: During his long sleep, Mukad woke up angry at the pharaoh's fall.
secondary_translated_text: 在漫长的睡眠中，穆卡德对法老的陨落感到愤怒。

translated_text: Sagra (Sagra)

original_en_text: Erratic, flying pest that nests in rags and curtains.
original_zh_text: 寄居在破布和帷幔中的飞虫，居无定所。
translated_text: An unstable and volatile parasite that nests in fabrics or tents.
secondary_translated_text: 一种不稳定且不稳定的寄生虫，在织物或帐篷中筑巢。

translated_text: Zeus did it.

original_en_text: Once a hunter purely for food, now they hunt unthinking and unending.
original_zh_text: 曾是只为果腹而捕猎的猎手，如今却在丝咒驱使下沦为永不停歇的屠夫。
translated_text: In the past, they hunted in search of food, but now they hunt without thinking.
secondary_translated_text: 过去，他们狩猎是为了寻找食物，但现在他们不假思索地狩猎。

original_en_text: So light they can rest atop still water’s surface. An elegant bug indeed.
original_zh_text: 轻盈得能栖于静水表面，确为优雅之虫。
translated_text: This means you can live in plenty of light and quiet water, which is a serious mistake.
secondary_translated_text: 这意味着您可以生活在充足的光线和安静的水中，这是一个严重的错误。

translated_text: Steel man.

original_en_text: Its form is absurd... Surely it should not be able to hold itself in the air? The noxious gases in its stomach must provide its levity.
original_zh_text: 如此畸形的躯体竟能悬空？想必是腹中毒气提供了浮力。
translated_text: This shape is ridiculous. Is it really in the air? The toxic gas in his stomach should give him a feeling of relief.
secondary_translated_text: 这个形状太荒谬了。它真的在空气中吗？他胃里的有毒气体应该会让他松一口气。

original_en_text: Once roused, the bug will crash its steely shell into walls, floors and foes.
original_zh_text: 被惊动后，会以钢甲撞击墙壁、地面与敌人。
translated_text: When you wake up, insects will crush walls, floors, and enemies will dig out steel shells.
secondary_translated_text: 当你醒来时，昆虫会压碎墙壁、地板，敌人会挖出钢壳。

translated_text: 《 Iron Man 》

original_en_text: Elder crawbug serving in a sacred ceremony.
original_zh_text: 参与神圣仪式的腐囊虫长老。
translated_text: Old crabs serve in sacred rituals.
secondary_translated_text: 老螃蟹参加神圣的仪式。

translated_text: Speech by the Personal Envoy
Pilgrims are on pilgrimage.

original_en_text: Agile bug, and one of few hardy pilgrims to have reached the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 成功抵达圣堡的敏捷朝圣者。
translated_text: This cunning insect is also one of the few tenacious pilgrims to reach the castle.
secondary_translated_text: 这种狡猾的昆虫也是为数不多的到达城堡的顽强朝圣者之一。

original_en_text: Their use of a pin shows hard training. Their use of Silk, unfurled from a spool held close, shows skill far beyond standard bugs.
original_zh_text: 其刺针技法明显是经过严格训练，近身灵丝轴的操控技艺更是远超普通虫子。
translated_text: By using silk on nearby scrolls, they demonstrated a technology that goes well beyond standard worms.
secondary_translated_text: 通过在附近的卷轴上使用丝绸，他们展示了一项远远超出标准蠕虫的技术。

original_en_text: Gilded guardian of the Blasted Steps, bearing a cymbal and mallet.
original_zh_text: 镇守蚀阶的金甲守卫，用钹和木槌处决"不洁者"。
translated_text: He had a gold guard, an explosive ladder, a hammer and a hammer.
secondary_translated_text: 他有一个金卫、一个爆炸梯、一把锤子和一把锤子。

original_en_text: A rare, calmer bug of Bilewater, survives its hazardous surroundings by hiding as a plant.
original_zh_text: 腐汁泽罕见的温顺虫子，在危险的环境中拟态植物，得以生存。
translated_text: Rare soft-bile bacteria can survive in dangerous environments hidden in plants.
secondary_translated_text: 罕见的软胆汁细菌可以在隐藏在植物体内的危险环境中生存。

original_en_text: Bug forged of iron, rotor and cog. The automaton works tirelessly to maintain the Core that houses it.
original_zh_text: 由齿轮与转子构成的铁质自动机，不知疲倦维护着机枢核心。
translated_text: Loss of iron, rotating discs and teeth. The robot has been working non-stop to maintain its core.
secondary_translated_text: 铁、旋转盘和牙齿的损失。机器人一直在不停地工作以维持其核心。

original_en_text: Starved pack bug with an insatiable appetite. Despite their tough hide and pungent meat, roaches breed rapidly so are sometimes farmed for food.
original_zh_text: 贪婪的群居害虫，甲壳坚硬，虫肉腥臭，却因繁殖力超强被圈养作为为食物来源。
translated_text: Hunger cannot satisfy your appetite. Although beetles have hard and spicy skin, they reproduce quickly, sometimes even for food.
secondary_translated_text: 饥饿无法满足你的胃口。尽管甲虫的皮肤又硬又辣，但它们繁殖速度很快，有时甚至可以作为食物。

translated_text: News in the newspaper.
A bystander of the shadow

original_en_text: They cling fast to the shells of other bugs, destroying any hope for concentration or comfort.
original_zh_text: 它们紧附其他虫子的外壳，彻底摧毁宿主的专注力与安宁。
translated_text: They attack the shells of other insects, destroying hopes of concentration and comfort.
secondary_translated_text: 它们攻击其他昆虫的外壳，摧毁了集中注意力和舒适的希望。

original_en_text: Pointed, darting insect that builds a hardy hive from Shellwood’s dried bark.
original_zh_text: 以甲木林干树皮筑巢的尖刺飞虫。
translated_text: Rooted insects use the bark of tree trunks to build sturdy nests.
secondary_translated_text: 有根的昆虫利用树干的树皮建造坚固的巢穴。

original_en_text: Full-sized mite of the Citadel cloaked in an old curtain.
original_zh_text: 披挂破旧幕帘的圣堡巨型螨虫。
translated_text: The castle's old tents are covered with life-size mites.
secondary_translated_text: 城堡的旧帐篷上布满了真人大小的螨虫。

translated_text: about the moon
Nitrates.

original_en_text: A snapping surprise on first encounter, though one easily avoided once aware.
original_zh_text: 初次遭遇的惊险过后，便再难构成威胁。
translated_text: You'll be surprised when you first meet, but once you write it down, it's easy to avoid.
secondary_translated_text: 当你们第一次见面时你会感到惊讶，但一旦你写下来，就很容易避免了。

translated_text: Sodium phosphate.
Sculley,

original_en_text: His tracks and traps... It should have been obvious from the start, this old hunter sought to draw me in. But what reason drove him to test himself so brutally? That answer I suspect I shall never know.
original_zh_text: 早该察觉他的踪迹与陷阱……但这老猎手对自己进行如此残酷试炼的原因，看来是无从得知了。
translated_text: From the beginning, it was obvious that an old hunter was trying to seduce me, but what was that? What does he want to do that he does so badly? Don't answer me.
secondary_translated_text: 从一开始，很明显有一个老猎人试图引诱我，但那是什么？他想做什么却做得这么糟糕？别回答我。

original_en_text: Brutish cook responsible for dicing Muckroach meat into edible portions.
original_zh_text: 粗鲁的厨子，负责将淤秽蟑螂肉切分成便于食用的分量。
translated_text: The barbaric cook ate the meat of the beetle.
secondary_translated_text: 野蛮的厨师吃了甲虫的肉。

original_en_text: Flighted automaton, responsible for repairing and extending the Core.
original_zh_text: 负责维修扩建核心的飞行自动机，简单攻击暗藏杀机。
translated_text: The mission is to repair and expand the aircraft's atomic nucleus.
secondary_translated_text: 任务是修复和扩大飞机的原子核。

original_en_text: Giant roller of the lowlands. Its ridged hide will crush smaller creatures beneath it.
original_zh_text: 在低地区域横冲直撞的巨型生物，带棱甲的躯体能轻易碾碎小型生物。
translated_text: The broad, low rib-shaped skin crushed the small creatures below.
secondary_translated_text: 宽阔而低矮的肋骨状皮肤碾压了下面的小生物。

original_en_text: Shell of a small bug possessed by Silk dregs. The husk will stretch its Silk to form a crude, crushing wheel.
original_zh_text: 被灵丝残渣附身的小型甲虫躯壳，伸展灵丝形成粗糙碾压轮。
translated_text: The body of the little insect is attached to its body with a piece of silk, which then expands to form a broken wheel.
secondary_translated_text: 小昆虫的身体用一块丝绸固定在身体上，然后丝绸膨胀形成一个破碎的轮子。

original_en_text: Rag-winged adult crawbug bearing a scavenged pin.
original_zh_text: 翅膀破烂的腐囊成虫，使用捡来刺针作为武器。
translated_text: Crabs have thick wings and predatory heads
secondary_translated_text: 螃蟹有厚厚的翅膀和掠食性的头

translated_text: The irony is.

original_en_text: I have not yet seen the bell this automaton is designed to ring, nor do I ever wish to hear it. Such a clamour would no doubt be unpleasant to experience.
original_zh_text: 它们机械臂摆动的节奏暗合圣咏旋律，若真让这些击钹者齐聚奏响终章，恐怕整个机枢核心都会在共振中崩塌。
translated_text: I have never seen the bell designed by this robot, and I don't want to hear it.
secondary_translated_text: 我从未见过这个机器人设计的钟声，也不想听到它。

translated_text: In Palestine.

original_en_text: If allowed the opportunity, these creatures will grow into a form larger and more oppressive.
original_zh_text: 此刻脆弱，却是未来灾祸的种子。放任其成长将成为巨大威胁。
translated_text: Given the opportunity, these organisms would evolve into larger, more repressive forms.
secondary_translated_text: 如果有机会，这些生物会进化成更大、更压抑的形式。

original_en_text: He offered fair warning and challenge, a duel in the purest sense. I admire his honour, and his skill.
original_zh_text: 他向我发起了正式的挑战，那是一场最纯粹的决斗。我敬佩他的荣誉感，也钦佩他的技艺。
translated_text: This is a warning, a challenge, and technically a battle.
secondary_translated_text: 这是一个警告、一个挑战，从技术上讲也是一场战斗。

original_en_text: Insect formed to imitate a branch, born with sharp, retractable horns atop its head.
original_zh_text: 头部配备可收缩尖角的拟态树枝虫。
translated_text: Insects imitate branches with sharp horns on their heads.
secondary_translated_text: 昆虫模仿头上有尖角的树枝。

original_en_text: Small, soft bug that uses the hard skulls of the Marrow for protection and disguise.
original_zh_text: 小型软体虫，利用髓骨洞窟内硬质头骨作为自己的护甲和伪装。
translated_text: The small, soft insect protected it with a hard skull and turned it into a mummy.
secondary_translated_text: 这种柔软的小昆虫用坚硬的头骨保护它，并将它变成了木乃伊。

original_en_text: When roosting, it would look convincingly plant-like. In flight, its bulbous body quickly ruins the ruse.
original_zh_text: 停栖时，双翼能完美伪装成远野的草叶。但这小聪明总在飞行时露出破绽——它膨大的腹部让伪装功亏一篑。
translated_text: When you see it, it looks like a plant. During his flight, his sphere quickly destroyed the technology.
secondary_translated_text: 当你看到它时，它看起来像一棵植物。在他的飞行过程中，他的球体很快摧毁了这项技术。

translated_text: Hey, hey, hey! "I don't know.
Battery model

original_en_text: Cloth-covered crawler with sharpened forelimbs. Lives and breeds in dark places.
original_zh_text: 栖息暗处的爬虫，身覆布料，前肢锐利。
translated_text: Reptiles are covered in cloth, have horns on their forelegs, and grow and reproduce in their nuclei.
secondary_translated_text: 爬行动物被布覆盖，前腿上有角，在细胞核中生长和繁殖。

translated_text: Wing (wing)

original_en_text: The cost of so much grandeur... Did I peer closely enough into the foundations of my own kingdom?
original_zh_text: 辉煌背后的代价……我是否也曾如此审视过自己王国的根基？
translated_text: Have you ever seen the foundation of the kingdom?

original_en_text: Stout adult crawbug bearing several short pins.
original_zh_text: 手持短刺的矮胖腐囊成虫。
translated_text: Adults with short needles.
Value,

original_en_text: Greed will always see some bugs swell above their kin.
original_zh_text: 贪婪终会导致膨胀，这是所有生物共通的教训。
translated_text: Greedy people always see mistakes spread to their colleagues.
secondary_translated_text: 贪婪的人总是看到错误蔓延到同事身上。

original_en_text: This graceful ruler once possessed skill to rival my own. At her youthful peak, her voice united all Skarr in her service.
original_zh_text: 这位优雅的统治者曾拥有与我匹敌的武艺。在她巅峰时期，其歌喉能让所有斯卡尔蚁族臣服效命。
translated_text: Such a leader has been able to compare to me, and his youthful voice sums up the entire scale.
secondary_translated_text: 这样的领导者能够与我相比，他年轻的声音概括了整个规模。

original_en_text: False fly with a rune etched shell. A tortured mix of soul and void is caged within.
original_zh_text: 外壳刻有符文的飞虫形装置，内部囚禁着灵魂与虚空的痛苦混合物。
translated_text: A fake fly with the letters "Rooney" in its shell is trapped in a cage of pain and soul emptiness.
secondary_translated_text: 一只壳上写着“鲁尼”字母的假苍蝇被困在痛苦和灵魂空虚的笼子里。

original_en_text: Suction creature surviving on the thick slime that coats its caves.
original_zh_text: 依赖洞壁浓稠粘液维生的吸附生物。
translated_text: The body of the person you want to pursue is based on mucus that covers the cave.
secondary_translated_text: 你想要追求的人的身体是基于覆盖洞穴的粘液。

original_en_text: Tall roach tender charged to feed Muckroaches on a lean diet of maggot gruel.
original_zh_text: 负责用蛆虫糊喂养腐汁蟑螂的高瘦饲育者。
translated_text: Large beetles need to extract red meat from the worm's meat.
secondary_translated_text: 大型甲虫需要从蠕虫肉中提取红肉。

original_en_text: Tiny, soft creature that armours itself using the hard, hollow growths of Shellwood.
original_zh_text: 用甲木林硬质空茎武装自身的脆弱飞虫。
translated_text: Small, soft creatures protect hard plants like shells.
secondary_translated_text: 柔软的小生物像贝壳一样保护坚硬的植物。

original_en_text: Taken by Pharloom’s Haunting, the bug is now capable of little more than prayer and aggression.
original_zh_text: 丝咒侵蚀了它们的理智，如今这些虫子只剩祷告与攻击的本能。
translated_text: In Farham's ghost, insects can only pray and attack.
secondary_translated_text: 在法勒姆的鬼魂中，昆虫只能祈祷和攻击。

translated_text: Grovel and the Pilgrims

original_en_text: Oversized bug, briefly consumed by anger after its long time caged.
original_zh_text: 长期囚禁后暴怒的巨型跳蚤。
translated_text: The singing insect was kept in a cage for a long time and suffered from anger.
secondary_translated_text: 这只会唱歌的昆虫被关在笼子里很长一段时间，并饱受愤怒之苦。

original_en_text: From the outset, theirs was a hopeless task. Those wild lands could never be replicated within a space so artificial.
original_zh_text: 从最初这就是徒劳之举——自然的荒野绝无可能在虫子造出的空间刻意复现。
translated_text: From the beginning, her mission was desperate. He will not be reborn in an artificial universe.
secondary_translated_text: 从一开始，她的使命就绝望了。他不会在人造宇宙中重生。

original_zh_text: 低地地区的游荡者，绒毛下暗藏钢刺并具备远程发射能力。
translated_text: Low-quality injections.

original_en_text: Wriggling young grub that lives in darkness.
translated_text: A dog crawled in the dark

original_en_text: Their procedures with Silk may have prolonged life within the Citadel, but they unknowingly gifted many minds to the monarch.
original_zh_text: 他们的灵丝手术虽维系了圣堡的生命，却无意中将所有心智献予了君主。
translated_text: Silk may have extended the life of the castle, but he unknowingly conveyed many ideas to the monarch.
secondary_translated_text: 丝绸可能延长了城堡的寿命，但他在不知不觉中向君主传达了许多想法。

original_en_text: Floral foe that reacts instinctively to movement nearby. Spits pellets of crackling pollen that burst on impact.
original_zh_text: 对周围动静极其敏感的植物，能够喷射噼啪作响的花粉弹。
translated_text: Opponents will instinctively respond to the shutdown, releasing balls of pollen and exploding on impact.
secondary_translated_text: 对手会本能地对关闭做出反应，释放花粉球并在撞击时爆炸。

translated_text: You must confess.
Fadedone
Belingge
Second sentry.

original_en_text: In contests of speed against strength, I have seen the swift more often triumphant, a lesson I have taken to my own heart.
original_zh_text: 见证这以快制胜的案例，更坚定了我对敏捷的追求。
translated_text: For me, Swift won more speed and power races, and that was a lesson.
secondary_translated_text: 对我来说，斯威夫特赢得了更多的速度和力量竞赛，这是一个教训。

translated_text: This is the lowest level of Loft.
Pound Catcher
We share.

original_en_text: Pilgrim endowed with large wings, carrying a brace of iron bells.
original_zh_text: 配备一对铁钟的飞行朝圣者。
translated_text: Pilgrims have huge wings and an iron bell.
secondary_translated_text: 朝圣者有巨大的翅膀和一个铁钟。

translated_text: Lance and sketon.

original_en_text: In my youth, I envied all bugs with wings. I even fancied I might grow a pair... I have since learned better. Accept the limitations of one’s body... and augment with tools as needed.
original_zh_text: 年少时，我曾一度羡慕生来便有翅膀的虫族，甚至曾幻想自己也能长出一对来……如今我已明白，接受身体上的限制，并学会用工具弥补缺陷才是正途。
translated_text: When I was a kid, I was jealous of bugs. I want to be a couple. Since then, I have learned better. Accept the limitations of your body. Add tools if necessary.
secondary_translated_text: 当我还是个孩子的时候，我嫉妒虫子。我想成为一对。从那时起，我学到了更好的东西。接受你身体的局限性。如有必要，添加工具。

original_en_text: Devious ambusher that poses as a fossil.
original_zh_text: 伪装成化石的狡诈伏击者。
translated_text: The clown is a fossil.
He's a ghost.

original_en_text: This bug bears a spool of Silk, which they flail to attack. Though somewhat crude, theirs is a technique much reminiscent of Weavers. I wonder who taught them such a use?
original_zh_text: 这只虫子携带着一轴灵丝，并挥舞它进行攻击。动作虽略显粗糙，但竟带着几分织者的神韵。不知是谁教会了它这样使用灵丝？
translated_text: It's a bit complicated for an insect to grab a roll of silk and shake it, but the technology seems to be a painting. Who can tell me how to use it?
secondary_translated_text: 昆虫抓住一卷丝绸并摇晃它有点复杂，但这项技术似乎就像一幅画。谁可以告诉我如何使用它？

original_en_text: Her presence would once have maintained the wood’s fragile order, allowing the safe passage of bugs across its branches.
original_zh_text: 昔日的她维持领域内脆弱的平衡，护佑虫子们安然通行其枝干。
translated_text: Their presence supports the fragile order of the forest, allowing insects to safely pass through branches.
secondary_translated_text: 它们的存在支撑了森林脆弱的秩序，使昆虫能够安全地穿过树枝。

translated_text: There are many pilgrims here.

original_en_text: Though generally passive, their sharp masks can cause injury if carelessly blundered into.
original_zh_text: 虽性情温顺，但若冒失冲撞其锋利面甲仍会受伤。
translated_text: It is usually passive, but if entered into a sharp mask, it can cause harm.
secondary_translated_text: 它通常是被动的，但如果进入锋利的面具，可能会造成伤害。

translated_text: Termites can fly.

original_en_text: I like her. For her willingness to teach and her spirit still strong, despite a long age spent solitary... she has my respect.
original_zh_text: 我欣赏她——甘于传授技艺，孤寂长年也未磨灭斗志，值得尊敬。
translated_text: He lived alone for a long time, but he was worried because he loved teaching and had a strong heart.
secondary_translated_text: 他独居很长一段时间，但他很担心，因为他热爱教学，而且有一颗坚强的心。

translated_text: They damaged the ship.

original_en_text: They held long at their vigil, far beyond the age of their brethren, yet still when roused they swung their blade with remarkable ease.
original_zh_text: 他们戍边的年岁就能远超同辈寿命，苏醒时仍能挥动利刃，动作流畅自如。
translated_text: They were older than my brother, but when they woke up, they measured a little with their fingers.
secondary_translated_text: 他们比我哥哥大，但当他们醒来时，他们用手指量了一点。

original_en_text: Long-horned beast of Pharloom’s lowlands. Relies on its horn both to impale and to wrench the ground beneath it, flinging dangerous debris.
original_zh_text: 纺络低地的长角巨兽，依赖长角穿刺敌人并掘起地面制造危险碎片云。
translated_text: Lowland Fanham 's Long Horns: When he discovered his horn, he dug a hole in the ground and threw dangerous debris.
secondary_translated_text: 低地范纳姆的长角：当他发现自己的角时，他在地上挖了一个洞，并投掷了危险的碎片。

original_en_text: Could their actions be called skill? I see only a crude mangling of meat. Yet I wonder, before the Haunting snared their minds was it any different?
original_zh_text: 这般行径怎能称为厨艺？我只见到对血肉的粗暴摧残。它在丝咒侵蚀前，或许不会像现在这样粗鄙行事？
translated_text: Do you consider your actions to be technical? But he didn't know that before the Ghost Kingdom, everything changed.
secondary_translated_text: 您认为您的行为是技术性的吗？但他不知道，在幽灵王国之前，一切都变了。

original_en_text: Darting warrior with sharpened forelimbs and heightened senses.
original_zh_text: 前肢尖利且感官强化的迅捷战士。
translated_text: The bow has a sharp arm and keen sensitivity.
secondary_translated_text: 弓有锋利的手臂和敏锐的敏感性。

original_en_text: Mighty percussive disciple of the Choir, wielding a mallet and a Silk spool to wrap and enhance their attacks.
original_zh_text: 圣咏团的打击乐信徒，挥舞槌棒，并利用灵丝轴强化它们的攻击。
translated_text: Followers of a powerful attack choir use hammers and silk reptiles to intensify their attacks.
secondary_translated_text: 强大的攻击合唱团的追随者使用锤子和丝绸爬行动物来加强攻击。

original_en_text: Dual princes of old Verdania, beloved by their subjects for their grace and for the ballet of death they delivered upon outsiders.
original_zh_text: 昔日翠庭王国的双生王子，以恩典治国，深受子民爱戴。对于不怀好意的外来者，他们会为其献上一支死亡芭蕾。
translated_text: Ancient Verdania's parents, princes, were loved by his subjects for his illiteracy and death ballet, and were found to have no name.
secondary_translated_text: 古代维尔达尼亚的父母是王子，他们因文盲和死亡芭蕾而受到臣民的喜爱，但被发现没有名字。

original_en_text: Huge and soft, a fantastic combination ruined by their haunted aggression.
original_zh_text: 明明是个蓬松的大毛球，可惜被丝咒搞得见谁都想撞两下。
translated_text: A big, soft, beautiful complex, but it was ruined by the ghost's aggression.
secondary_translated_text: 一个又大又软又美丽的综合体，但它被鬼魂的侵略毁了。

translated_text: Pengnei funnel

original_en_text: On uneven terrain their union of flight and range can prove a challenge even for me.
original_zh_text: 崎岖地形中，其飞行阵列的配合连我也需谨慎应对。
translated_text: The combination of flying on desert terrain and autopilot was also a challenge for me.
secondary_translated_text: 在沙漠地形上飞行和自动驾驶仪的结合对我来说也是一个挑战。

original_en_text: They toiled incessantly for the Citadel, their shells bent and greyed, and now the kingdom’s curse means not even death can relieve them.
original_zh_text: 他们为圣堡鞠躬尽瘁直至甲壳弯折灰败，如今连死亡都无法终结这诅咒。
translated_text: They worked hard for the castle, its shell became bent and gray, and the curse of the kingdom, even death, could not release them.
secondary_translated_text: 他们为城堡努力工作，城堡的外壳变得弯曲、灰色，王国的诅咒，甚至死亡，都无法释放他们。

original_en_text: Destroying the hives will limit their presence in the wood. Useful to me now, as I pass along the branches. Dangerous in time for the wood’s order. Even a small disruption can tip a fragile balance.
original_zh_text: 摧毁蜂巢会限制它们在林中的活动。对我而言，这在穿行丛林时十分有用。但从长远来看，即便是微小的干扰，也可能打破丛林脆弱的生态平衡。
translated_text: The destruction of bees limits their presence in the forest and I need it when I walk on branches. This is a dangerous moment, Command Tree. Even the smallest injury can upset a fragile balance.
secondary_translated_text: 蜜蜂的破坏限制了它们在森林中的存在，当我走在树枝上时，我需要它。这是一个危险的时刻，命令树。即使是最小的伤害也会打破脆弱的平衡。

original_en_text: It has no true mind, and yet fights effectively, adjusting its strategy to my movements. Where exactly are its thoughts written?
original_zh_text: 当它用盾牌格挡我的织针突刺，同时以刁钻角度刺出长枪时，我仿佛在与某个沉睡在齿轮中的古老剑客对决。
translated_text: I'm not sure, but the fight is effective, so I'll adjust my strategy based on my movements.
secondary_translated_text: 我不确定，但战斗是有效的，所以我会根据我的动作调整策略。

original_en_text: A bug born entirely of thread. Much Silk would have been needed to see her sustained. A fragile form of life, but life nonetheless.
original_zh_text: 完全由灵丝编织而成的虫子。维持这种丝造生命需耗费海量的灵丝资源，虽形态脆弱却真实鲜活。
translated_text: It requires a lot of silk to move. It is a fragile creature, but it is life.
secondary_translated_text: 它需要大量的丝绸才能移动。它是一种脆弱的生物，但它就是生命。

translated_text: Welcome to your arrival.

original_en_text: Individually they offer little challenge, but their numbers are surely vast, and most remain hidden.
original_zh_text: 单只不足为惧，但其庞大族群多潜藏暗处，如同阴影永难根除。
translated_text: Personally, the problems they face are few, but their numbers are certainly large and most are still hidden.
secondary_translated_text: 就我个人而言，他们面临的问题很少，但数量肯定很大，而且大多数仍然是隐藏的。

original_en_text: A lucky bug to be able to grow old. Pharloom’s roads take most much earlier.
original_zh_text: 能在纺络活到这样的年纪堪称奇迹，只可惜这份长寿化作了更持久的折磨。
translated_text: Filan's path, lucky worms can grow old and move quickly.
secondary_translated_text: 菲兰的道路上，幸运的蠕虫可以变老并迅速行动。

original_en_text: Huge flighted creature formed from coldshard.
original_zh_text: 由冰晶碎片构成的巨型飞行生物。
translated_text: Flying creatures, made from cold garbage.
secondary_translated_text: 会飞的生物，由冷垃圾制成。

original_en_text: She has lived a mere fraction of my lifetime and yet her rings prove a ferocious match. As gifted a warrior as I have ever encountered, and one I am fortunate to call a friend.
original_zh_text: 她的年岁不过我生命的一小段，但她的战环却展现出凶狠的实力。她是我所遇过最出色的战士之一，很庆幸能和她成为朋友。
translated_text: I have only lived a small part of my life, but her ring is perfect. The most talented soldiers I have ever met are those who have the privilege of calling me a friend.
secondary_translated_text: 我只度过了生命中的一小部分，但她的戒指却是完美的。我见过的最有才华的士兵是那些有幸称我为朋友的士兵。

original_en_text: Sheer bulk makes for an effective weapon, but requires much sustenance. This creature would have spent most of its time eating. An acceptable life for some.
original_zh_text: 庞大的身躯是它们致命的武器，但也需要大量营养来维持。这种生物绝大多数时间都在进食，倒也活得纯粹。
translated_text: Drain cleaning is an effective weapon, but it requires a lot of support. Animals eat themselves most of the time. For some people, this is an acceptable life.
secondary_translated_text: 排水沟清洁是一种有效的武器，但需要大量的支持。动物大多数时候都会吃自己。对于某些人来说，这是一种可以接受的生活。

original_en_text: These ones grow large, yet I have never observed them eating, or sleeping. They seem such simple bugs... but I suspect they are not truly our cousins.
original_zh_text: 体型虽庞大，却从未见其进食或休眠。看似普通的虫子……实则与我们并非同类。
translated_text: He grew up, but I never saw him eat or sleep.
secondary_translated_text: 他长大了，但我从未见他吃饭或睡觉。

original_en_text: Huge, hardbone bug that lives within and travels through the veins of old bells across Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 居住在古钟里并穿梭于纺络广阔钟脉里的骨甲大块头。
translated_text: A huge physical worm lives in the container of an ancient autumn bell, passing through autumn.
secondary_translated_text: 一只巨大的实体蠕虫生活在古代秋钟的容器中，穿过秋天。

original_en_text: Winged devout of the Citadel, carrying a brace of gilded bells.
original_zh_text: 圣堡的带翼信徒，背负一对镀金巨钟作战。
translated_text: He flew proudly across the castle, carrying a golden bell.
secondary_translated_text: 他拿着一个金钟自豪地飞过城堡。

original_en_text: This one would make a perfect pet, but for the freezing temperatures it requires for comfort.
original_zh_text: 本可成为完美的宠物，但其生存需依赖刺骨的低温。
translated_text: This will make it a great animal, but it should be comfortably cold.
secondary_translated_text: 这将使它成为一种伟大的动物，但它应该舒适地寒冷。

original_en_text: These creatures look to have been bred deliberately in watery pens. If they are food to be, their scent suggests they must taste vile.
original_zh_text: 刻意养殖的水栖变种，若作食用，其恶臭已昭示其滋味堪忧。
translated_text: If it is the food of the future, then the smell suggests it is terrible.
secondary_translated_text: 如果它是未来的食物，那么气味表明它很糟糕。

original_en_text: Their skill once saw them chosen, and I can plainly see why. They would have lived and trained only for this duty.
original_zh_text: 它们的高超技艺我已亲身体会，必然是终生磨练只为履行职责。
translated_text: I know why I chose their skills.
secondary_translated_text: 我知道我为什么选择他们的技能。

original_en_text: For this bug to have survived Pharloom’s climb it must have teamed with stouter companions. I cannot imagine it succeeding alone.
original_zh_text: 单凭自身的力量，这虫子绝无可能攀越纺络的天堑，成功进入圣堡。想必曾与更强壮的伙伴互为倚仗。
translated_text: Insects must survive as they climb onto the farm and must cooperate with more powerful companions.
secondary_translated_text: 昆虫必须在爬上农场时生存下来，并且必须与更强大的同伴合作。

original_en_text: Did this one grow large thanks to the Citadel’s excess, or was its formidable size the reason it ever survived to reach this place?
original_zh_text: 这家伙的巨大体型是因圣堡的恩赐而异变，还是正因其巨大体型才得以存活至此？
translated_text: The size of the castle increases with the number of castles, or does its grandeur still exist, so it comes here?
secondary_translated_text: 城堡的规模随着城堡的数量而增加，还是它的宏伟仍然存在，所以它就来到了这里？

original_en_text: Though surely fierce, the skull it bears looks taken from an even larger beast. If not for the bones as proof, I would scarcely believe bugs could grow to such scale.
original_zh_text: 它头顶的骷髅战盔竟取自更庞大的生物——若非有骸骨为证，我简直难以相信世间存在如此巨虫。
translated_text: There is no doubt that the skull is ferocious, but it appears to have been removed by a larger animal. Without skeletal evidence, it is difficult to believe that the worm has reached this size.
secondary_translated_text: 毫无疑问，这个头骨很凶猛，但它似乎是被更大的动物移走的。如果没有骨骼证据，很难相信这种蠕虫已经达到如此大小。

translated_text: Farid
Silk sniper
Dentist model.

original_en_text: Two cogwork bugs, and yet the soul seemed singular? A sad, yet masterful imitation of life, imbued inside shells of iron.
original_zh_text: 两只自动机虫却共享单一灵魂？这是栖身于铁壳内的生命仿品，展现出精湛的制造技艺，却难掩其悲哀的命运。
translated_text: You have two gears, but your soul seems to be one. It is full of iron.
secondary_translated_text: 你有两个齿轮，但你的灵魂似乎是一个。它充满了铁。

translated_text: Plastic.

original_en_text: Heavy insect that lives near large bodies of water. Its weighty body is best avoided.
original_zh_text: 栖息大型水域附近的笨重昆虫，遇到最好绕道而行。
translated_text: Insects live near large objects. Avoid heavy objects.
secondary_translated_text: 昆虫生活在大型物体附近。避免重物。

translated_text: "Kilick said.

original_en_text: Drifting bug disguised as a flower. Disperses crackling clouds of pollen if threatened.
original_zh_text: 伪装成花朵的漂浮生物，遇到威胁时会释放噼啪作响的花粉云自卫。
translated_text: Floating insects disguise themselves as flowers and emit clouds of pollen when they are in danger.
secondary_translated_text: 漂浮的昆虫将自己伪装成花朵，并在遇到危险时释放出花粉云。

original_en_text: Dense knot of husks bound tight by void soaked Silk.
original_zh_text: 由虚空浸染的灵丝捆缚的躯壳，密集成团。
translated_text: The surviving shell knots were tightly tied together with silk and immersed in the sky.
secondary_translated_text: 幸存下来的贝壳结用丝绸紧紧地绑在一起，沉浸在天空中。

translated_text: Worker Cog
Tugboat (Japanese)

original_en_text: A smart hunter learns to wait long in ambush, always ready to strike the first blow.
original_zh_text: 优秀的猎手都懂得：耐心蹲点，一击必杀。
translated_text: Smart hunters learn to wait long and be ready to fire the first shot at any time.
secondary_translated_text: 聪明的猎人学会等待很长时间，并随时准备发射第一枪。

original_en_text: Grazing creature with sharp senses that nimbly retreats from danger.
original_zh_text: 感官敏锐的食草生物，遇到危险会灵活撤退。
translated_text: Herbivores who are late can flexibly retreat from danger.
secondary_translated_text: 迟到的食草动物可以灵活地撤离危险。

original_en_text: Tiny, timid creatures that huddle in flocks and flee at the first hint of danger.
original_zh_text: 胆小的小型群居生物，一旦察觉到危险便四散奔逃。
translated_text: Shy little animals gather and run away when in danger.
secondary_translated_text: 遇到危险时，害羞的小动物会聚集起来逃跑。

original_en_text: Lost in the madness of the Haunting, they still commanded the endless excavation of their caves.
original_zh_text: 即便深陷丝咒癫狂，仍持续号令无休止的矿洞挖掘。
translated_text: They are lost in ghostly madness, digging endless caves.
secondary_translated_text: 他们迷失在幽灵般的疯狂中，挖掘无尽的洞穴。

translated_text: Directed by: Julie Crowe

original_en_text: They rarely relax, always alert for potential danger, even deep in their own territory. To defeat them my focus must match their own.
original_zh_text: 就算在其领地深处，他们仍保持高度警戒。要想击败他们，我的专注力必须达到与其相当的水平。
translated_text: They will not relax and remain vigilant in case of possible dangers. If we want to defeat them, we have to be very careful. "
secondary_translated_text: 他们不会放松并保持警惕，以防可能出现的危险。如果我们想击败他们，我们就必须非常小心。"

original_en_text: Steam shooting automaton, forged to clean the Cogwork Core and keep it free of infestation.
original_zh_text: 喷射蒸汽清洁机枢核心的自动机。
translated_text: Steam jet engines have been modified to clean sugar cores and protect them from intrusion.
secondary_translated_text: 蒸汽喷气发动机经过改造，以清洁糖核并保护它们免受入侵。

translated_text: Bell Beast

original_en_text: Sticky young fly, born and grown in service to the Slab.
original_zh_text: 自幼服务于罪石牢狱的黏腻幼蝇。
translated_text: Young sticky fruit flies are used as warehouses, so they are born and reproduce.
secondary_translated_text: 年轻的粘果蝇被用作仓库，因此它们出生和繁殖。

translated_text: Friday the Pendels
The wooden bee.
Suggestions for complaints

original_en_text: This mindless bug seems to sense only through its tendrils, yet despite that simplicity it still poses a serious threat.
original_zh_text: 虽只能凭借触须感知外界，这种虫子仍可以构成极大的威胁。
translated_text: Despite its simplicity, the brainless insect seems to be a serious threat, but it seems to stand out only because of its curly beard.
secondary_translated_text: 尽管它很简单，这种无脑昆虫似乎是一个严重的威胁，但它似乎只是因为它的卷曲胡须而脱颖而出。

translated_text: acidic acid; acidic acid;
Brutal skeleton.

original_en_text: Basic bug of Pharloom, laid low upon the ground.
translated_text: Insects that fall on the ground live in the ground.
secondary_translated_text: 落在地上的昆虫生活在地下。

original_en_text: I am fond of simple, effective traps such as this bug’s extendable spikes. An unwary predator would be skewered clean through.
original_zh_text: 我很欣赏它这一招，简单有效。莽撞的捕食者肯定会被它的背刺一击穿透。
translated_text: I like simple but effective traps, such as this false expansion point.
secondary_translated_text: 我喜欢简单但有效的陷阱，比如这个虚假的扩张点。

original_en_text: Short pilgrim that uses their long horn to launch upon threats.
original_zh_text: 用长角将自己弹射向敌人的矮小朝圣者。
translated_text: The young pilgrim threatened them with a trombone.
secondary_translated_text: 年轻的朝圣者用长号威胁他们。

original_en_text: Thick-set bug consumed by haunted thread. Uses their solid frame to crush others.
original_zh_text: 被诅咒之丝缠裹的壮硕老者，用沉重甲壳碾压敌人。
translated_text: Thick installation worms are consumed by speaker cables. Destroy others with a strong body.
secondary_translated_text: 扬声器电缆消耗厚厚的安装蠕虫。用强大的身体摧毁他人。

original_en_text: Fur covered crawler with a series of sharp spikes along its back.
translated_text: A hairy reptile with thorns on its back.
secondary_translated_text: 一种毛茸茸的爬行动物，背上有刺。

original_en_text: Burrowing worm that uses its many blunted teeth to dig through even the hardest bone.
original_zh_text: 拥有密集钝齿的穴居虫类，极其坚硬的骨质层也能被它们钻透。
translated_text: Head worms have many blunt teeth that can pierce even the hardest bones.
secondary_translated_text: 头蠕虫有许多钝齿，甚至可以刺穿最硬的骨头。

original_en_text: With this one vanquished, I hope to have sped the end for that jail and its distasteful order.
original_zh_text: 击败她或将加速那座监狱与其恶心秩序的终结。
translated_text: I hope this failure will accelerate the end of prisons and their hateful order.
secondary_translated_text: 我希望这次失败将加速监狱及其可恶秩序的终结。

original_en_text: Gelatinous coral drifter of simple mind and placid demeanour.
original_zh_text: 思维简单的凝胶状珊瑚生物，性情温和。
translated_text: Gum Coral expressed a simple and moderate view.
secondary_translated_text: 口香糖珊瑚表达了简单温和的观点。

original_en_text: Totem and god, built and worshipped by the Burning Bugs.
original_zh_text: 焚身信徒建造并敬奉的图腾神像。
translated_text: It was built and worshipped by totems, gods and burning insects.
secondary_translated_text: 它是由图腾、神灵和燃烧的昆虫建造和崇拜的。

translated_text: Driznica Village

original_en_text: Skittish scrambler of the Far Fields. Its antennae resemble stalks of grass to aid in camouflage.
original_zh_text: 远野地区极易受惊的爬虫，触须能够伪装成草茎。
translated_text: There is a flaw hidden in the distance. Moisture is similar to grass stems and helps camouflage it.
secondary_translated_text: 远处隐藏着一个缺陷。水分类似于草茎，有助于伪装它。

original_en_text: Infant fly, freshly hatched. At this age the soft, blind fly is little more than a bother.
original_zh_text: 刚破卵的盲眼软体幼蝇，不过是些烦扰的小东西。
translated_text: The little fly has just grown up. At this age, soft and blind flies can get bored.
secondary_translated_text: 小苍蝇刚刚长大。在这个年纪，柔软而盲目的苍蝇可能会感到无聊。

translated_text: Original name: Tonbow

original_en_text: Tall creature with sharp senses. Defends its herd with powerful legs and a sharp-tipped mask.
original_zh_text: 感官敏锐的生物，以尖角面甲与强健后肢守护族群。
translated_text: It is a very sexy creature that protects cows with strong feet and a sharp mask.
secondary_translated_text: 这是一种非常性感的生物，用强壮的脚和锋利的面具保护奶牛。

translated_text: Bad necklace.

original_en_text: Cruel physician of Whiteward, responsible for operations and modifications on the Citadel’s bugs.
original_zh_text: 白愈厅的残酷医者，负责对圣堡甲虫实施手术与改造。
translated_text: Witthold, a cruel doctor, is responsible for manipulating and changing worms.
secondary_translated_text: 维特霍尔德是一位残酷的医生，负责操纵和改变蠕虫。

original_en_text: The huge Judge likely stood through countless generations, never defeated, never wavering in their charge.
original_zh_text: 这庞然裁决者已矗立无数世代，未尝败绩，坚守职责从未动摇。
translated_text: This great judge may have never been defeated by countless generations.
secondary_translated_text: 这位伟大的法官可能从未被无数代人打败过。

original_en_text: These bugs look to have spent every waking moment at their work. Grim, endless labour in service of the unseen Citadel above.
original_zh_text: 这些虫子似乎将全部生命投入劳作。为自己从未见过的圣堡执行着阴郁无边的苦役。
translated_text: I will work tirelessly to serve the invisible rocks above.
secondary_translated_text: 我将不懈地工作，为上面看不见的岩石服务。

translated_text: Timiron.
Wait, wait.
Perseo

original_en_text: Despite the Haunting of its shell, it has not been overcome with aggression. Its desire to flee remains too strong.
original_zh_text: 即使甲壳被丝咒侵蚀，其强烈的逃生本能依然压制住了被赋予的攻击性。
translated_text: Despite its beautiful shell, it was not conquered by invaders.
secondary_translated_text: 尽管它的外壳很漂亮，但它并没有被入侵者征服。

original_en_text: Coral hulk with a dense shell, bred to immense size by the Citadel’s Memorium.
original_zh_text: 被圣堡忆廊催生至庞然体型的珊瑚厚甲虫。
translated_text: Shards of coral covered by shells climb onto the giant coral on the castle monument.
secondary_translated_text: 被贝壳覆盖的珊瑚碎片爬到城堡纪念碑上的巨大珊瑚上。

translated_text: Kalanidato
Skull Tracker
Pilgrim's clock

original_en_text: Sturdy bug lost to the Haunting. Rolls at threats with no care for its own discomfort.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒侵蚀的健壮虫子。滚动碾压构成威胁的一切，无视自身痛楚。
translated_text: Powerful worms are destroyed by ghost worms. Don't worry about feeling uncomfortable when faced with threats.
secondary_translated_text: 强大的蠕虫被幽灵蠕虫摧毁。不要担心在面临威胁时感到不舒服。

original_en_text: Tiny empty creature, barely a bug. Swallows its prey whole and sucks their nutrients until nothing remains.
original_zh_text: 微型的虚无生物，几乎算不上是虫子。吞噬猎物至渣滓都不剩。
translated_text: It's a small creature-not an insect. They completely absorb food and absorb nutrients until there is no food left.
secondary_translated_text: 这是一种小生物--不是昆虫。它们完全吸收食物并吸收营养，直到没有食物剩下。

translated_text: Inadequately trained employees

original_en_text: Quite a beautiful creature. In my own kingdom’s court, it would have been highly favoured as an ornamental pet.
original_zh_text: 如此美丽的生物。若在我故国的宫廷，定会成为贵族追捧的装饰性宠物。
translated_text: They are very popular as decorative animals in the gardens of my kingdom.
secondary_translated_text: 它们作为我王国花园中的装饰动物非常受欢迎。

original_en_text: There is surprising strength hidden in their thin, elegant limbs. It would be a pleasure to ride upon it...
original_zh_text: 优雅纤细的后肢中蕴含强大的力量，若能驯服必是绝佳坐骑。
translated_text: He has slender smooth arms and incredibly powerful feet and enjoys riding horses.
secondary_translated_text: 他拥有修长光滑的手臂和令人难以置信的有力的脚，喜欢骑马。

original_en_text: Whatever admiration I had for its fleecy down is spoilt by its disturbing mask... and its steely spines.
original_zh_text: 蓬松绒毛的吸引力被其阴森气质与钢刺彻底破坏。
translated_text: His admiration for feathers was destroyed by his strange mask and steel spine.
secondary_translated_text: 他对羽毛的崇拜被他奇怪的面具和钢脊柱摧毁了。

translated_text: Burning insects.

original_en_text: Cymbal bearing worker of the Deep Docks. Pans the hauls of smokerock to find traces of more precious minerals.
original_zh_text: 深坞持钹工人，筛选烟岩中的珍贵矿物残渣。
translated_text: Looking for traces of more valuable minerals, an iconic ship rocks a series of rocks on a deep anchor.
secondary_translated_text: 为了寻找更有价值的矿物的痕迹，一艘标志性的船只在深锚上摇动了一系列岩石。

original_en_text: Sticky mollusc that defends itself by spraying burning fluid from growths on its back.
original_zh_text: 通过背部凸起喷射燃烧体液的防御型软体生物。
translated_text: Sticky mollusks protect themselves by flushing hot fluid from their backs.
secondary_translated_text: 粘稠的软体动物通过冲走背部的热液体来保护自己。

original_en_text: This one is pretty, but not as soft as first it seems. The plant it mimics is flaked and coarse, and the bug’s coat shares similar texture.
original_zh_text: 看似柔美实则粗粝，与其拟态植物的质感完全一致。
translated_text: It's beautiful, but not as sweet as it looks at first. The plants are very thick, and the shells of insects have similar textures.
secondary_translated_text: 它很漂亮，但不像一开始看起来那么甜。植物非常厚实，昆虫的外壳也有相似的纹理。

original_en_text: Low level worker lost to Pharloom’s Haunting. Instinct keeps them at their task, though in much simpler fashion than before.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒侵蚀的低级劳工，仍凭本能重复着旧日工作。
translated_text: Instinctively, it was easier for them to do the job than before.
secondary_translated_text: 本能地，他们比以前更容易完成这项工作。

original_en_text: Something in their assault reminds me of my own skill, though their talents are born purely of instinct. My technique is formed from hard training.
original_zh_text: 攻击套路和我有几分相像。不过他们靠的是祖传本能，我则是勤学苦练。
translated_text: "His offense reminds me of my skills, but his talent is purely instinctive.
secondary_translated_text: “他的进攻让我想起了我的技术，但他的天赋纯粹是本能。

original_en_text: Certain tools and skills can pierce its defences. I should adjust my strategy as needed.
original_zh_text: 正面硬撼绝非明智之举——只有特定的工具和技艺能撕开它的防御。
translated_text: You can use different tools and skills to break through defenses, and your strategy must be adjusted as needed.
secondary_translated_text: 你可以使用不同的工具和技能来突破防御，而且你的策略必须根据需要进行调整。

translated_text: Shirley's grandma.
Prepare a carpet for the chef.

original_en_text: Bug charged to catch dregs of Silk that fall from the Citadel. Will attack with its staff if provoked.
original_zh_text: 专职收集圣堡掉落灵丝碎屑的劳工，受干扰时会挥杖攻击。
translated_text: The instigator's task was to collect silk remains that fell from the castle and attack them with sticks.
secondary_translated_text: 煽动者的任务是收集从城堡上掉下来的丝绸残骸，并用棍棒攻击它们。

original_en_text: Similar bugs would gnaw away at unguarded food supplies in my homeland. As a child, I would hunt them, eager to make use of myself and test my skills.
original_zh_text: 我的故土也有类似的飞虫，它们会啃食未加看守的食物补给。年少时我经常猎杀它们，既为守护食物也为试炼技艺。
translated_text: These insects can infect our food without protection. When I was a kid, I wanted to chase them, live for myself, and test my abilities.
secondary_translated_text: 这些昆虫可以在没有保护的情况下感染我们的食物。当我还是个孩子的时候，我想追逐他们，为自己而活，测试我的能力。

original_en_text: Automaton built in the shape of a scuttling bug. Its back contains retractable pins, intended to cut song cylinders free of any obstruction.
original_zh_text: 仿造爬虫外形的自动机，背部探针可切除阻塞音筒的障碍物。
translated_text: The robot is shaped like a flying insect and has an extended thorn in front of it that is designed to cut curved pipes without obstacles.
secondary_translated_text: 该机器人的形状像一只会飞的昆虫，前面有一根延伸的刺，旨在无障碍地切割弯曲的管道。

translated_text: The gloves are open.

original_en_text: Uses their steel-bristled pin to scrub the soot from vents and pipes.
original_zh_text: 以钢鬃尖刺清理管道煤灰的劳工。
translated_text: To remove dust from vents and ducts, use steel screws.
secondary_translated_text: 要清除通风口和管道中的灰尘，请使用钢螺丝。

original_en_text: Huge, yet stealthy Skarr. An expert trapper and master of the undergrowth.
original_zh_text: 精通丛林陷阱的斯卡尔猎手，身形庞大却又善于潜行。
translated_text: Huge but hidden pictures.

original_en_text: Lashing fragments of pure darkness, shaped into sharpened tentacles.
original_zh_text: 由纯粹黑暗凝聚而成的尖锐触手。
translated_text: Attack sharp fragments of pure darkness, forming tentacles.
secondary_translated_text: 攻击纯粹黑暗的尖锐碎片，形成触手。

translated_text: Farm (Agriculture)
Gear in dance

original_en_text: Soft bug beneath a huge, horned skull. Charges at intruders to protect its territory and its smaller companions.
original_zh_text: 顶着怪兽头骨的软体虫，为保护地盘和自身柔软的内部，常对入侵者进行无差别冲锋。
translated_text: Below the skull is a large, soft insect with long horns. The invaders must protect their territory and their little partners.
secondary_translated_text: 头骨下方是一种又大又软的昆虫，长着长角。入侵者必须保护他们的领土和他们的小伙伴。

original_en_text: Common winged bug of the lowlands. Generally docile, but will attack if threats come close.
original_zh_text: 低地区域常见的温顺飞虫，不过被惹急了也会攻击来犯者。
translated_text: Insects usually live in low-altitude areas. They usually remain silent, but attack when a threat approaches.
secondary_translated_text: 昆虫通常生活在低海拔地区。他们通常保持沉默，但在威胁逼近时发动攻击。

original_en_text: Foul creatures birthed into servitude. Their plight elicits no sympathy from me.
original_zh_text: 这些可悲的生物从蛹中钻出的瞬间，就被烙上了终生奴役的印记——但它们啃噬死囚腐肉时发出的欢快嗡鸣，实在让人难以怜悯。
translated_text: The unclean creature was born a slave, and her situation did not arouse my sympathy.
secondary_translated_text: 这个不洁的生物生来就是奴隶，她的处境并没有引起我的同情。

original_en_text: The Haunting has stolen some important part of these bugs, yet still they attempt their former task. Until, that is, they sense my presence...
original_zh_text: 它们机械地重复着筛矿动作，直到感应到活物气息——那一刻，铜钹便化作呼啸的断头刃。
translated_text: Haunted stole many of these bugs, but looking at previous challenges, I felt my presence.
secondary_translated_text: Haunted窃取了许多这些错误，但看看之前的挑战，我感觉到了我的存在。

translated_text: Disperse it.
Yuma, my master.

original_en_text: Mutated young worm infected with Plasmium. The new form displays potent regenerative skill.
original_zh_text: 受生质液感染而变异的蠕虫幼体。其新形态展现出强大的再生能力。
translated_text: Mutated larvae suddenly infected by malaria parasite.
secondary_translated_text: 变异幼虫突然感染疟原虫。

translated_text: Jerick's mother.

original_en_text: Its core is filled with fine mechanisms, but that alone should not produce such a convincing mimic of life. Silk must also be used to animate this artifice, though exactly how I am not sure.
original_zh_text: 当灵丝顺着齿轮缝隙游走时，这台机器竟发出类似心跳的震颤——圣堡匠人究竟将多少生命奥秘编织进了这些钢铁躯壳？
translated_text: Its core is full of complex mechanisms, but that doesn't make the life simulator itself so attractive. We need to use silk to activate this technology, but that's not how we use it.
secondary_translated_text: 它的核心充满了复杂的机制，但这并没有让生命模拟器本身如此有吸引力。我们需要使用丝绸来激活这项技术，但这不是我们使用它的方式。

original_en_text: Its shell gives it the advantage of surprise, but also forces it into a slender, brittle shape that cannot withstand a heavy attack.
original_zh_text: 拟态外壳带来突袭优势，但纤细脆弱的体型难以承受重击。
translated_text: Its shell gives it unexpected benefits, but also gives it a long, fragile appearance that cannot withstand violent attack.
secondary_translated_text: 它的外壳给了它意想不到的好处，但也给了它一种漫长而脆弱的外观，无法承受暴力攻击。

original_en_text: Predatory plant with a powerful jaw shaped to resemble a lily pad.
original_zh_text: 伪装成睡莲的捕食性植物，拥有强有力的颚部。
translated_text: Predator, jaw as hard as lily
secondary_translated_text: 捕食者，下巴硬得像百合花

translated_text: Smoke screen (Hisk)
Photo by Coylmaega

original_en_text: Airborne pest, less common than its grounded siblings. Attacks with sharp fangs if agitated.
original_zh_text: 其陆行同类的飞行变种，较为稀少。受到刺激时会使用利齿攻击。
translated_text: Airborne parasites are more common than similar parasites in the soil. When he wakes up, he attacks with his sharp teeth.
secondary_translated_text: 空气传播的寄生虫比土壤中的类似寄生虫更常见。当他醒来时，他会用锋利的牙齿攻击。

original_en_text: The souls of so many bugs, obsessed with Silk, consumed by it. Their pain shall forever remain in that pit. Even I do not possess strength enough to cleanse it.
original_zh_text: 无数沉溺灵丝终被吞噬的灵魂，其苦痛将永远禁锢在这坑里。纵使是我也无力净化。
translated_text: The souls of many insects are occupied and swallowed by silk, and their pain remains in their holes forever.
secondary_translated_text: 许多昆虫的灵魂被丝绸占领和吞噬，它们的痛苦永远留在它们的洞里。

original_en_text: Silk-spun child possessed by the void.
original_zh_text: 被虚空侵蚀的灵丝造物。
translated_text: The spinner is empty.

original_en_text: Shell-plated worm found only in the deepest depths. Seems to survive despite consuming no food or liquid.
original_zh_text: 仅存于最深处的甲壳蠕虫，无需进食或饮水仍能存活。
translated_text: A cancer worm was found in the deepest part of her body and she apparently survived without eating food or fluids.
secondary_translated_text: 在她身体的最深处发现了一种癌虫，她显然在没有吃食物或液体的情况下幸存下来。

translated_text: About Al Horistán
For readers:

original_en_text: Trap setting bug carrying a pouch of sharpened long-stakes.
original_zh_text: 携带尖锐长木桩布置陷阱的虫子。
translated_text: The insect that grabbed him had a long, sharp bag.
secondary_translated_text: 抓住他的昆虫有一个又长又尖的袋子。

translated_text: Directed by: Doran Lord

original_en_text: Aged female mite, grown larger and stronger than most of its kin.
original_zh_text: 年迈的雌性螨虫，体型力量都远超同类。
translated_text: Older females are bigger and stronger than other species.
secondary_translated_text: 年长的雌性比其他物种更大、更强壮。

original_en_text: Mass of old masks swollen and animated by writhing void.
original_zh_text: 由纠缠的虚空驱动而膨胀、复活的一团古老面甲。
translated_text: Many old masks are caused by cracks crawling and expanding.
secondary_translated_text: 许多旧口罩是由于裂缝爬行和扩张造成的。

original_en_text: Pernicious looter found all over Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 在纺络全境四处劫掠的卑劣盗虫。
translated_text: There are planes everywhere.

original_en_text: Small bug, shackled and cowled for sin committed within the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 戴着镣铐，被蒙住头部的圣堡罪徒。
translated_text: Baga was handcuffed and forced to wear a veil for crimes committed in the castle.
secondary_translated_text: 巴加因在城堡中犯下的罪行而被戴上手铐并被迫戴上面纱。

original_en_text: Flighty insect that lives beside still waters.
original_zh_text: 栖息静水边的敏感飞虫。
translated_text: Light insects that live near calm waters.
secondary_translated_text: 生活在平静水域附近的轻型昆虫。

original_en_text: Its form is certainly based on bugs found outside the Citadel. In my own craftwork, I too often look to nature for inspiration.
original_zh_text: 那对仿生复眼能精准识别音筒纹路，探针起舞时溅起的火花，竟在钢壁上刻出类似灵丝符文的痕迹。
translated_text: Its shape is based on insects naturally found outside the castle. In my art, I often paint nature.
secondary_translated_text: 它的形状基于城堡外自然发现的昆虫。在我的艺术中，我经常画自然。

translated_text: Cream (cream)

original_en_text: Birth equipped this one well. In its assault it becomes its own projectile.
original_zh_text: 它们生来就是活体投掷物——将整个身躯化作飞矛，用长角贯穿目标。
translated_text: That man's arm was born to be his projection in attack.
secondary_translated_text: 那个人的手臂生来就是他攻击时的投射。

original_en_text: Their heavier bells armour them well against my strikes, but against that oppressive heat... can they help at all?
original_zh_text: 它们厚重的钟甲可以抵挡我的针刃，但在酷热环境中恐怕难有作为。
