translated_text: Their heavy slaves will protect them from my blows, but they will also protect them from the heat and steam.
secondary_translated_text: 他们沉重的奴隶会保护他们免受我的打击，但他们也会保护他们免受高温和蒸汽的影响。

original_en_text: A rare built bug within these ailing lands. Most pilgrims’ shells seem small by comparison. What nourishment did they discover to grow so large?
original_zh_text: 在纺络这片病恹恹的土地上，这般体型的虫子实属罕见。与它们相比，其他朝圣者的外壳简直孱弱如卵。它们究竟吞食了什么，才能膨胀至此等体型？
translated_text: This is a rare insect in sick soil. At the same time, most pilgrims 'shells appear very small. What are the important nutrients?
secondary_translated_text: 这是病态土壤中的一种罕见昆虫。与此同时，大多数朝圣者的贝壳看起来很小。重要的营养素有哪些？

original_en_text: With a softer shell than most, they would have relied on their athleticism to survive.
original_zh_text: 甲壳柔软脆弱，全靠昔日矫健的身手生存。
translated_text: Because shells are softer than most people, they can only survive on their own ability to move.
secondary_translated_text: 由于贝壳比大多数人都软，因此它们只能依靠自己的移动能力生存。

translated_text: insect catcher

original_en_text: Common crawler that lives beneath sand.
translated_text: Reptiles living on the beach.
secondary_translated_text: 生活在海滩上的爬行动物。

translated_text: Written by Finch Bitter
It's shelf.
Flying animals

original_en_text: Silk and shells corrupted. That void seeks now to claim this land whole. These poor shells are only the beginning.
original_zh_text: 灵丝与甲壳皆遭腐蚀，虚空正逐步蚕食这地界，这些可怜的甲壳不过是开端。
translated_text: Silk and shells are corrosive. Now they are trying to conquer this land.
secondary_translated_text: 丝绸和贝壳有腐蚀性。现在他们正试图征服这片土地。

original_en_text: Screeching scavenger that roosts high in caverns and preys on passing pilgrims.
original_zh_text: 盘踞洞顶的食腐飞虫，惯用群体战术袭击朝圣者。
translated_text: Screaming hunters live in caves, taking advantage of passing pilgrims.
secondary_translated_text: 尖叫的猎人住在洞穴里，利用路过的朝圣者。

original_en_text: Insect formed to imitate a branch, capable of remaining perfectly still for long periods, but unexpectedly swift when roused.
original_zh_text: 能长期静止拟态成树枝，受惊时发动闪电突袭。
translated_text: Insects that mimic branches remain completely stationary for long periods of time, but they can wake up at an alarming rate.
secondary_translated_text: 模仿树枝的昆虫在很长一段时间内保持完全静止，但它们可能会以惊人的速度醒来。

original_en_text: This larger form carries so much weight it can barely move from its place.
original_zh_text: 庞大身躯使其几乎无法离开原位。
translated_text: This huge shape is so heavy that it is almost impossible to remove it from your shape.
secondary_translated_text: 这个巨大的形状非常重，几乎不可能将其从形状中删除。

translated_text: This is Scroll.

original_en_text: Small construct built by Weavers past, brought to life through Silk runes threaded within.
original_zh_text: 远古织者铸造的小型装置，通过灵丝符文赋予生命。
translated_text: Weaver's small past structure has been restored through a silk corridor leading to the interior.
secondary_translated_text: 韦弗过去的小结构通过通往内部的丝绸走廊进行了修复。

original_en_text: The less these gruesome bugs breed, the better.
original_zh_text: 这种烦扰的虫子繁殖得越少越好。
translated_text: The less these terrible insects reproduce, the better.
secondary_translated_text: 这些可怕的昆虫繁殖得越少越好。

original_en_text: Gilded servant of the Whispering Vaults, born to read and recall the near endless scrolls of prayer.
original_zh_text: 低语书库的金袍仆从，专司诵读那些浩繁无尽的经文。
translated_text: The golden servant in the room whispered infinite prayers to read and remember.
secondary_translated_text: 房间里的金仆人低声念着无限的祈祷，以阅读和记住。

translated_text: Squid bird

original_en_text: I cannot decipher its function to the greater Core. Is it built for defence? If so, its passivity seems far from optimal.
original_zh_text: 这些悬浮铁球会在入侵者靠近时突然爆开尖刺，但过于迟缓的反应速度，让它们更像布满锈迹的装饰品。
translated_text: Can we decipher its greatest impact on nuclear defense? If this is the case, this passivity is imperfect.
secondary_translated_text: 我们能否破译它对核防御的最大影响？如果是这样，那么这种被动性就是不完美的。

original_en_text: If not for the spikes, I would think it an appealing bug.
original_zh_text: 若没有尖刺，我会觉得它笨拙可爱。
translated_text: If there were no fingers, I think it would be a fascinating mistake.
secondary_translated_text: 如果没有手指，我认为这将是一个迷人的错误。

original_en_text: Hovering pest with a hollowed proboscis able to spit gobs of sizzling bile.
original_zh_text: 通过中空口器喷射胆汁的悬浮虫。
translated_text: Parasites that live on empty stems can spit out bile.
secondary_translated_text: 寄生在空茎上的寄生虫可以吐出胆汁。

original_en_text: This surface dweller is free of Silk. Its nature remains its own. The monarch’s influence must only have stretched below it.
original_zh_text: 这地表生物未被丝咒侵蚀，看来圣堡君主的控制尚未延伸至此。
translated_text: The inhabitants of this land are not silk. Your heart is your share. The king has less influence.
secondary_translated_text: 这片土地上的居民不是丝绸。你的心就是你的份。国王的影响力较小。

original_en_text: Did they ever truly understand those inscrutable scrolls? Or is it all merely pretence, an endless act to maintain their order’s station within the Citadel?
original_zh_text: 他们是否真的理解那些晦涩的经文？还是说，这一切不过是伪装，一场无休止的表演，只为维持他们在城堡中的地位？
translated_text: Do you really know this mystery? Or should it be an infinite view to maintain the order and status of the castle?
secondary_translated_text: 你真的知道这个谜团吗？还是应该以无限的视角来维持城堡的秩序和地位？

translated_text: Coral House/ Coral House

original_en_text: Its assault... like a young bug’s toy turned deadly. Could I, in time, fashion a spinning tool to match?
original_zh_text: 其攻击如同将孩童的玩具变成致命武器，或许我能制作类似原理的纺织工具？
translated_text: It's like a little insect turning into a deadly toy. Can you create a rotating instrument in time?
secondary_translated_text: 这就像一只小昆虫变成了致命的玩具。你能及时制作出旋转乐器吗？

original_en_text: Though grey with age, their frayed form suggested a being strung from Silk, one who welcomed a decisive end in combat over a slow decline.
original_zh_text: 苍老的躯壳布满灵丝束痕。比起缓慢凋零，它更渴求战死的终局。
translated_text: His appearance, torn by age, is the decisive conclusion of a silk man facing a slow-descending battle.
secondary_translated_text: 他的外表因年龄而撕裂，是丝绸人面临缓慢下降的战斗的决定性结论。

translated_text: Great master.

original_en_text: Infant form of the more formidable Craggler.
original_zh_text: 酸蚀巨螯的幼年形态，通过同类相残争夺成长机会。
translated_text: Kruger's most powerful son.
secondary_translated_text: 克鲁格最有权势的儿子。

original_en_text: Either its size has made it fearless or the Haunting has removed its sense of self-preservation.
original_zh_text: 要么是巨大的体型给了它勇气，要么是丝咒把它怕死的本性麻痹了。
translated_text: Either your shape scares you, or your attachment makes you lose your sense of self-protection.
secondary_translated_text: 要么你的形状让你害怕，要么你的依恋让你失去自我保护感。

original_en_text: Barely a bug, and possessing only basic thought, yet instinct alone proved enough to turn it deadly.
original_zh_text: 几乎算不上虫子，只有最基本的思维。然而，其攻击的本能已足够致命。
translated_text: This is a basic idea, not a mistake, but it turns out that instinct can be fatal.
secondary_translated_text: 这是一个基本想法，不是错误，但事实证明，本能可能是致命的。

translated_text: Sparks of the spiral (English)

original_en_text: Bursts forth at movement sensed close, and will consume any object or bug careless enough to fall into its maw.
original_zh_text: 当流沙开始诡谲涌动时，你只剩半次心跳的时间逃离那张深渊巨口。
translated_text: When they hear movements nearby, they explode, accidentally eat objects or insects, and eventually fall into their stomachs.
secondary_translated_text: 当它们听到附近的动静时，它们就会爆炸，不小心吃掉物体或昆虫，最终落入它们的胃里。

original_en_text: Pointed scurrier posing as plant life.
original_zh_text: 伪装成植物的带刺疾行者。
translated_text: Spiders imitate plants.

original_en_text: Verminous pest, common throughout the dark corners of Greymoor.
original_zh_text: 灰沼阴暗角落滋生的害虫。
translated_text: Parasites often appear in the dark corners of Grimmore.
secondary_translated_text: 寄生虫经常出现在格里莫的黑暗角落。

original_en_text: Its fur is thick and silky. Sadly, lost to its Haunting, I shall never safely be able to touch it.
original_zh_text: 厚实丝绒般的皮毛令人神往，可惜其受丝咒侵蚀，再难安全抚触。
translated_text: Her skin is thick and soft. Unfortunately, she will never be safe because she will not be touched.
secondary_translated_text: 她的皮肤又厚又软。不幸的是，她永远不会安全，因为她不会被触摸。

translated_text: Hawk Hooker
Favorite wings

original_en_text: Her body seemed a Weaver’s, but her mask had been forcibly removed, and her own Silk was bound useless by heavy pins lodged through her spine.
original_zh_text: 她身形似织者，但面甲被强行剥离，脊背打入的重钉也使其灵丝失效。
translated_text: Her body looked like a frame, but the mask was forcibly removed and the silk was tied together by heavy thorns and inserted into the spine.
secondary_translated_text: 她的身体看起来像一个框架，但面具被强行摘下，丝绸被沉重的荆棘绑在一起，插入脊柱。

original_en_text: Fierce and fast, and defending their lands even from birth. These are children to be proud of.
original_zh_text: 凶猛迅捷，自出生起就守卫故土，是值得骄傲的后裔。
translated_text: He is strong and agile, protecting his country from birth.
secondary_translated_text: 他坚强而敏捷，从出生起就保护着他的国家。

original_en_text: Like fabric somehow sprung to life. Its pelt is perfectly matched to the rags it infests.
original_zh_text: 外色颜色与寄居的布料完美融合，就像被赋予生命的织物。
translated_text: But somehow, it will replicate. The skin fits perfectly into infected tissue.
secondary_translated_text: 但不知何故，它会复制。皮肤完全适合感染的组织。

original_en_text: Its wings are quite small compared to its bulk. Perhaps it uses the warm air of these fiery lands to help stay airborne. Clever, if so.
original_zh_text: 翅膀小身体胖，估计是利用这片炽热地带的热气流飞起来的——还挺聪明。
translated_text: The wings are very small relative to their size, so it's wise to use hot air from the warm earth to hold the air.
secondary_translated_text: 翅膀相对于其尺寸来说非常小，因此明智的做法是使用来自温暖地球的热空气来容纳空气。

original_en_text: Gold ranked disciple of the Choir and direct servant to the Citadel’s Conductors.
original_zh_text: 圣咏团的高阶信徒，圣堡指挥家的直系仆从。
translated_text: The golden disciples of the local choir are subordinate to the local commander.
secondary_translated_text: 当地合唱团的金徒隶属于当地指挥官。

original_en_text: The large bell seems to signify them as once leader of a climbing troupe, though the Haunting has erased that former authority.
original_zh_text: 那柄铭刻朝圣路线的钟杖曾是领袖象征，如今却成了敲碎追随者颅骨的凶器。
translated_text: The huge slaves seem to indicate that they were once leaders of the climbing team, but their obsession has wiped out their former authority.
secondary_translated_text: 这些巨大的奴隶似乎表明他们曾经是登山队的领导者，但他们的痴迷已经抹去了他们以前的权威。

original_en_text: Avoiding their ambush is a good test of my senses, and my ability to rapidly retaliate.
original_zh_text: 规避其伏击是对感知力的考验，快速反击能力同样关键。
translated_text: Avoiding an ambush was a good test of my emotions and ability to fight quickly.
secondary_translated_text: 避免伏击是对我情绪和快速战斗能力的很好考验。

original_en_text: To quell the mother’s rage, and see this kingdom saved, I will claim her back. This one... the dark shall not take.
original_zh_text: 为了平息苍白之母的暴怒、拯救这个王国，我必夺回这个孩子的本心——绝不容许虚空将她吞噬。
translated_text: I returned my mother to me to alleviate my anger and save the kingdom.
secondary_translated_text: 我把母亲还给了我，以缓解我的愤怒并拯救王国。

translated_text: frigate flight
The lost race

original_en_text: Cogwork knight of Pharloom, once protector of its pilgrims, and master of the scissor blade.
original_zh_text: 曾护卫朝圣者的机械骑士，如今双刃剪成为致命凶器。
translated_text: Armed autumn knights are guardians of pilgrims and spice merchants.
secondary_translated_text: 武装秋季骑士是朝圣者和香料商人的守护者。

original_en_text: <page>No. Not their enemy, and their prisoner not through malice. I am Eva, a thing... difficult to describe, a child of Weavers, yet not quite their kin...<hpage>How strange. That description could fit me as well as yourself. <page>Child of Weavers?... And not? I can detect your Weaver strain, yet you are different from them, and from me, a shifting, blended thing? What are you creature?<page>Step closer, lady, that my senses would better understand your nature.
original_zh_text: <page>不是，也并非因为罪行囚禁。我叫伊娃，是……有点复杂，是织者后裔但又不完全是……<hpage>真奇妙。这番描述同样适用于我。<page>你也是织者后裔？……但又不是？我能感知你的织者血统，但你既不同于他们，也不同于我，一个流动的混合体？你究竟是什么？<page>请靠近些，女士，方便我感知你的本质。
translated_text: <page>Neither his enemies nor prisoners were Weaver's children, but neither were his parents.<hpage>This is really weird. This description is perfect for you.<page>INVC textile products have many options, but... ... You are not like them, you are not like me, you are evolving and mixing, what kind of creature are you?<page>The closer you get, the more you understand how I feel. "
secondary_translated_text: <page>他的敌人和囚犯都不是韦弗的孩子，但他的父母也不是。<hpage>这真的很奇怪。这个描述非常适合您。<page>INVC纺织产品有很多选择，但是. ...你不像他们，你不像我，你正在进化和混合，你是什么样的生物？<page>你离得越近，你就越了解我的感受。"

original_en_text: Lady, still my senses resound. You seem so far beyond the bounds of a bug.<page>Permit me to gaze again upon your nature, that I may offer clarity.
original_zh_text: 女士，我的感知再度震颤。您已远远超过凡虫界限。<page>请允许我再次深入感知，才好仔细说明
translated_text: My emotions are always resonating. It seems that you have overcome this mistake.<page>If you look at your nature again, I will give you the final answer.
secondary_translated_text: 我的情绪总是引起共鸣。看来你已经克服了这个错误。<page>如果你再看看你的本性，我会给你最终的答案。

original_en_text: Lady? So you live, still. This is good... I had felt the conflict commence, pale hearts ablaze, and the sudden well of darkness after.<hpage>I am sorry, Eva. I had hoped to slay the monarch, and was near achieving that goal, but the situation has become... complicated. Now, all of Pharloom threatens to fall.<page>But I can sense it in you, lady. You have not yielded to despair, so some hope must still remain?<hpage>...Slim hope, I suspect. But true, there may yet be a way through this disaster. I shall pursue that goal with whatever strength remains.<page>Then allow me to continue to aid you as I can... Mine might be a small contribution, but I shall provide it eagerly.
original_zh_text: 女士？你还活着，真是太好了……我早已感受到冲突的爆发，苍白之心熊熊燃烧，而后是突如其来的黑暗深渊。<hpage>抱歉，伊娃。我本希望斩杀君主，几乎就要达成目标，但情况变得……复杂了。如今整个纺络都濒临倾覆。<page>但我能从你身上感受到，女士。你仍未屈服于绝望，是否意味着尚存一线希望？<hpage>……希望渺茫。但确实，或许仍有办法化解这场灾难。我将用残存之力追寻这个目标。<page>那么请允许我继续尽力协助你……虽只是微薄之力，但我必倾心奉献。
translated_text: Madam? So you're still alive, everything is fine, everything is fine, I feel conflict, my pale heart is burning, and then suddenly, the dark abyss begins.<hpage>I'm sorry, I wanted to kill King Eve, but what happened? The situation has become more and more complex, and now the entire Paham is in danger of collapse.<page>"I'm sorry, miss, but if you weren't desperate, would you still have hope?”<hpage>... Maybe our hope is faint, maybe we have a way to overcome this disaster, and we will do everything we can to achieve this goal.<page>Our contribution may be small, but we will try our best to serve you.
secondary_translated_text: 夫人？所以你还活着，一切都很好，一切都很好，我感到冲突，我苍白的心在燃烧，然后突然间，黑暗的深渊开始了。<hpage>对不起，我想杀死伊芙王，但发生了什么？情况变得越来越复杂，现在整个帕哈姆都面临崩溃的危险。<page>“对不起，小姐，如果你不绝望，你还会有希望吗？”<hpage>...也许我们的希望渺茫，也许我们有办法克服这场灾难，我们将尽一切努力实现这个目标。<page>我们的贡献可能很小，但我们会尽力为您服务。

original_en_text: Incredible... Your nature is so unlike a mortal bug’s. Yours is malleable, transitory. It is a marvelous thing, worth my long life to behold.<page>With what power I possess, I may still be able to aid you further.
original_zh_text: 不可思议……你的本质异于凡虫。流动，嬗变，真是奇妙，是我前所未见的存在。<page>以我的力量，或许可以助你更上一层。
translated_text: Incredible... ... Its properties are very different from those of human worms. Your clothes are small, plastic. Worth seeing it in my life.<page>If I had the power, I could help you more.
secondary_translated_text: 令人难以置信的... ...它的性质与人类蠕虫的性质有很大不同。你的衣服很小，是塑料的。值得在我的生活中看到它。<page>如果我有力量，我可以帮助你更多。

original_en_text: <hpage>Eva, I am seeking a tool, told to be somewhere in this structure. It is a snare device of Weaver make. Do you know of it?<page>I may, lady. Search over from here, on side where the moss meets the nest. There, my mothers built their tools, all traps and bindings. Small things, but tests for larger forms.<page>I still remember their thoughts as they worked, their desperation, and their hunger. Another hopeless attempt to wrest their freedom. All ended in failure, of course.
original_zh_text: <hpage>伊娃，我在寻找织者制造的陷阱装置。你知道在哪么？<page>有点印象。您可以去青苔与巢穴交界处搜寻，母亲们曾在那制造工具。虽是些小玩意，却是为了更大的图谋。<page>我还记得她们制作时的思绪，那份绝望与饥渴，又一次争夺自由的徒劳尝试。当然，终归失败。
translated_text: <hpage>Eva, I was looking for a tool in that building.<page>- Look at the intersection of beetles and nests. Mothers create tools, traps and limitations. This is a small issue, but it is being experienced in a larger way.<page>I still remember his thoughts on work, despair and hunger, a futile attempt to deprive him of his freedom.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>伊娃，我正在那栋楼里寻找工具。<page>- 看看甲虫和巢穴的交汇处。母亲创造工具、陷阱和限制。这是一个小问题，但正在以更大的方式经历它。<page>我仍然记得他对工作、绝望和饥饿的想法，这是徒劳的试图剥夺他的自由。

original_en_text: Ain’t you come a long way, bellringer! Granting wishes, saving bugs, even rousing my sullen family to act!<page>The snare is set above, our power bound along its thread. To your sight it may seem a crude thing, but there’s fair strength to it... enough to quell a god.<hpage>You and your family have done me well, sir. I shall prove your faith in the meeting ahead.<page>Aye. Bring your best, bellringer. Call forth our great pale god. Cut her weak, then drive the beast down atop the snare.<page>Contact made will stir the snare alight, but only your needle’s song will awaken the spell in full. When that moment arrives, you’ll see it clear.
original_zh_text: 敲钟者，你这一路可够折腾！祈愿、救虫，连我那些沉默的同族都让你说动了！<page>陷阱已在上方布好，我们的力量都缠在丝线上。看着简陋，但威力足够……连神都能制住。<hpage>你们一族对我多次相助，我必将不负所托。<page>那就好，敲钟者，拿出真本事。把那苍白之神引出来，先削弱她，再逼到陷阱上方。<page>触碰陷阱就会激活丝线，但只有你的织针之乐能彻底唤醒术式。时机一到，你自然明白。
translated_text: You've come a long way, Barry. Wake up unfortunate family members, fulfill your wishes, avoid mistakes, and take action!<page>This is a trap to which our power is connected. He may seem impolite, but he has considerable power.<hpage>You and your family have been very kind to me.<page>"Be your best character, Belinger, and pray the great God to reduce your strength and capture the beast.<page>The trap is activated by touch, but only the tip of the needle can fully awaken the spell.
secondary_translated_text: 你已经走了很长的路，巴里。唤醒不幸的家人，实现愿望，避免错误，采取行动！<page>这是一个与我们的力量相连的陷阱。他可能看起来不礼貌，但他有相当大的权力。<hpage>你和你的家人对我非常好。<page>“做你最好的角色，贝林格，祈祷伟大的上帝减少你的力量并捕获野兽。<page>陷阱是通过触摸激活的，但只有针头才能完全唤醒咒语。

original_en_text: <page>Lady, please. Permit me to look upon your nature, that I may offer clarity...
original_zh_text: <page>女士，请允许我深入感知，才好仔细说明……
translated_text: <page>Let's examine its essence and clarify it.
secondary_translated_text: <page>让我们来审视它的本质并澄清它。

original_en_text: Incredible... Your nature is so unlike a mortal bug’s. Yours is malleable, transitory. It is a marvelous thing, worth my long life to behold.<page>If in your travels you are able to further evolve, return to me. With what power I possess, I may be able to aid you further.<hpage>Thank you, Eva. If my nature expands as you say, I shall return.
original_zh_text: 不可思议……你的本质异于凡虫。流动，嬗变，真是奇妙，是我前所未见的存在。<page>如果旅途中你再度进化，请回来找我。以我的力量，或许可以助你更上一层。<hpage>多谢，伊娃。若我本质确实再度进化，我会回来找你。
translated_text: Incredible... ... Its nature is completely different from human nature. Your little plasticity is an incredible phenomenon that deserves to be impressed throughout my long life.<page>If you can make progress on your journey, come back to me.<hpage>Thanks Eve! When my true nature is spread, as you said, I will come back.
secondary_translated_text: 令人难以置信的... ...它的本质与人性完全不同。你的小可塑性是一种令人难以置信的现象，值得在我漫长的一生中留下深刻的印象。<page>如果你能在旅途中取得进展，请回到我身边。<hpage>谢谢伊芙！当我的本性被传播时，正如你所说，我就会回来。

original_en_text: <hpage>I have known your kind before, sir. Yours is a tribe that works and trades in power, and I am about to extinguish its prime source.<hpage>Once this is done, will you truly delight in a land so bereft?<page>Aye, well... My family’s marks are all over that trap. And we’ve spent a hard age avoiding the gaze of our god.<page>If we earned it now, after such open opposition... that’s a bleak conclusion none of us’d care for.<page>Now! My job’s done. S’time your grand business began! We’ll be wishin’ victory to you, bellringer, for all our sakes!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我曾见过你的同族。你们一族专门兜售力量，而我正要掐灭这力量的源头。<hpage>事成之后，这力量真空的世界真能让你们感到高兴？<page>哈……陷阱上现在全是家族徽记，我们也躲那苍白之神半辈子了。<page>要是现在因为公然反抗栽了……这种憋屈结局谁受得了？<page>好了！我活儿干完了。该你大显身手了！敲钟者，你可一定要赢啊，都指望着你呢！
translated_text: <hpage>Your tribe is a tribe full of work and power negotiations, and I am working to eliminate the reasons for this.<hpage>When this is all over, will I truly be happy on earth where I have lost loved ones? "<page>Our house is closed and it is difficult to escape the eyes of God.<page>After national opposition, if we win now, it will be a sad conclusion that no one will care.<page>Come on, now! It's time to start a great career. Let us all ring the bell and wish victory!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>你们的部落是一个充满工作和权力谈判的部落，我正在努力消除造成这种情况的原因。<hpage>当这一切结束时，我在失去亲人的地球上真的会幸福吗？"<page>我们的房子关闭了，很难逃脱上帝的眼睛。<page>在全国反对之后，如果我们现在赢了，那将是一个没有人关心的悲伤结局。<page>快点，现在！是时候开始伟大的职业生涯了。让我们大家敲响钟声，祝愿胜利！

original_en_text: <hpage>You see one’s nature, Eva? It is a skill far beyond bugs.<page>One not without cost. My sight perceives a bug only through the imprint upon their soul. <hpage>You speak of their crest? That signifier of a bug’s essence and their invisible yoke born through a lifetime.<page>Crest? Yes, the old Weaver term. A simple word to attempt description of something so profound.<page>But wait. Your own nature... Is it?...<page>Lady, permit me to look deeper still, that I may offer clarity...
original_zh_text: <hpage>伊娃，你能洞见本质？这等技艺远超虫类。<page>自然是有代价的。我需透过灵魂印记窥视生灵。<hpage>你是指纹章？那象征虫民全部存在与无形枷锁的标记？<page>纹章？对，织者用的古称，试图以简单词汇描述深邃之物。<page>等等，你的本质……莫非……<page>女士，请允许我深入感知，才好仔细说明……
translated_text: <hpage>Have you ever seen human nature? Mistakes are the ability to transcend mistakes.<page>My eyes can only see traces of insect souls.<hpage>Are you in Winnipeg? It symbolizes the nature and invisible chain of life of insects.<page>Christina's? In Weaver, this is an ancient term that can be summarized in one word.<page>You are waiting for your nature, the truth.<page>It can provide deeper understanding and clearer information.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>你见过人性吗？错误是超越错误的能力。<page>我的眼睛只能看到昆虫灵魂的痕迹。<hpage>您在温尼伯吗？它象征着昆虫的本质和无形的生命链。<page>克里斯蒂娜的？在韦弗身上，这是一个可以用一个词概括的古老术语。<page>你正在等待你的本性，真相。<page>它可以提供更深入的理解和更清晰的信息。

translated_text: "The view.

original_en_text: Lady, Pharloom’s time grows short. If you are able to further expand your nature, I urge you return to me.<page>Any power I possess, I shall grant it for your aid.<hpage>My thanks, Eva. If my nature expands as you say, I shall return.
original_zh_text: 女士，纺络时日无多。若你能进一步突破自身极限，请务必回到我身边。<page>我拥有的任何力量，都将为你所用。<hpage>感激不尽，伊娃。若真如你所言突破极限，我定会回来。
translated_text: If your time in the Faroe Islands is short and if you can further spread nature, I suggest you come back to me.<page>Whatever you have, I will use it to help you.<hpage>Thanks Eve! When my true nature is spread, as you said, I will come back.
secondary_translated_text: 如果您在法罗群岛的时间很短，如果您可以进一步传播自然，我建议您回到我身边。<page>无论你有什么，我都会用它来帮助你。<hpage>谢谢伊芙！当我的本性被传播时，正如你所说，我就会回来。

translated_text: Eve's location.

original_en_text: Stay back, twisted leech! Even lodged within another’s shell, your ravenous nature shines clear.<page>You shall not defoul this chamber, nor claim my soul. Begone!
original_zh_text: 退后，扭曲的寄生物！即便寄居他者躯壳也藏不住贪婪本性。<page>休想玷污此地，更别妄图吞噬我的灵魂。滚开！
translated_text: "Come back, the bow is broken. Even in the shell of others, the greedy nature shines.<page>I can't take away your room, I can't take away your soul, run!
secondary_translated_text: “回来吧，弓坏了。即使在别人的壳里，贪婪的本性也会闪闪发光。<page>我不能夺走你的房间，我不能夺走你的灵魂，快跑！

original_en_text: Lady... Incredible... Your nature is so unlike a mortal bugs. Yours is malleable, transitory. It is a marvelous thing. Worth my long life to behold.<page>Unbound one, though we know each other little, permit me to ask a selfish request.<hpage>Your talent has provided a great benefit, Eva. What is it you desire of me?<page>Only to have my own soul, my own memories, bound within your shell... As you have done with those others throughout these lands.<page>I would not define as a crest within you, but my small strength may still grant a final boon.<hpage>You ask to be subsumed? Know your mind would cease to be, in any independent sense.<page>To be united with one unbound... This is the kind of escape I once prayed for, though the weight of ages had almost made me forget.<page>Lady, would you grant me this request?
original_zh_text: 女士……不可思议……你的本质异于凡虫。流动，嬗变，真是奇妙，是我前所未见的存在。<page>无羁者啊，虽然相交尚浅，但我仍想提出一个自私请求。<hpage>你帮了我很多，伊娃。你想要什么？<page>请您将我的灵魂与记忆缚于您的壳中，就像您其他生物所做的那样。<page>虽然称不上是纹章，但或许能为您献上最后一份微薄馈赠。<hpage>你想被我吞噬？你要知道，那意味着独立意识将不复存在。<page>我明白，但自愿如此。能与无羁者合而为一……是我昔日渴求的解脱，尽管岁月让我几乎遗忘。<page>亲爱的女士，您愿意成全我吗？
translated_text: Madam... Incredible... ... Their properties are completely different from those of insects. My little plastic it's so big. I am grateful for my long life<page>We free people make selfish demands that we don't know about.<hpage>Eva's talent gives us a huge advantage. What do you want me to do?<page>I cling to your shell and have my soul and memories, just as you are anywhere on earth.<page>Although I have not designated it as a symbol of your soul, my little power can still bring you the greatest blessings.<hpage>Do you want to join them? You know, your thoughts no longer exist independently, you are no longer in the same place.<page>Working with people without disabilities has always been a refuge in my prayers, but under the pressure of time, I almost forgot.<page>Do you agree to this request? " "
secondary_translated_text: 夫人...令人难以置信的... ...它们的性质与昆虫完全不同。我的小塑料太大了。我感谢我的长寿<page>我们自由的人提出我们不知道的自私要求。<hpage>伊娃的才华给我们带来了巨大的优势。你想让我做什么？<page>我紧紧抓住你的壳，拥有我的灵魂和记忆，就像你在地球上的任何地方一样。<page>虽然我没有将它指定为你灵魂的象征，但我的小小力量仍然可以给你带来最大的祝福。<hpage>你想加入他们吗？你知道，你的思想不再独立存在，你不再在同一个地方。<page>与无残疾人一起工作一直是我祈祷的避难所，但在时间的压力下，我几乎忘记了。<page>您同意此请求吗？" "

original_en_text: Lady, you are a multitude within a single shell. A being truly unbound. To aid your growth has proved a grand task, even for one as limited as me.<page>As my last act, permit me to ask a final, selfish request.<hpage>Your talents have provided great benefit, Eva. What is it you desire of me?<page>Only to have my own soul, my own memories, bound within your shell... As you have done with those others throughout these lands.<page>I would not define as a crest within you, but my small strength may still grant a final boon.<hpage>You ask to be subsumed? Know your mind would cease to be, in any independent sense.<page>I know. And still I seek it, gladly. To be united with one unbound... This is the kind of escape I once prayed for, though the weight of ages had almost made me forget.<page>Dear Lady, would you grant me this request?
original_zh_text: 女士，您这具躯壳中存在万千可能，是真正无拘无束的存在。能助您成长，是我的荣幸。<page>最后，请允许我提出自私的请求。<hpage>你帮了我很多，伊娃。你想要什么？<page>请您将我的灵魂与记忆缚于您的壳中，就像您其他生物所做的那样。<page>虽然称不上是纹章，但或许能为您献上最后一份微薄馈赠。<hpage>你想被我吞噬？你要知道，那意味着独立意识将不复存在。<page>我明白，但自愿如此。能与无羁者合而为一……是我昔日渴求的解脱，尽管岁月让我几乎遗忘。<page>亲爱的女士，您愿意成全我吗？
translated_text: In the shell of a truly free person, there are many people who can help you grow, but for someone as limited as me.<page>Generally speaking, I hope.<hpage>Eva, your gift gives you a great advantage.<page>I cling to your shell and have my soul and memories, just as you are anywhere on earth.<page>Although I have not designated it as a symbol of your soul, my little power can still bring you the greatest blessings.<hpage>Do you want to join them? Know that your mind no longer exists independently and you are no longer in the same place.<page>As time went on, her prayer escape was almost forgotten, but this was her prayer escape.<page>Dear friends, do you agree to this request?
secondary_translated_text: 在一个真正自由的人的壳里，有很多人可以帮助你成长，但对于像我这样的人来说是有限的。<page>总的来说，我希望。<hpage>伊娃，你的天赋给了你很大的优势。<page>我紧紧抓住你的壳，拥有我的灵魂和记忆，就像你在地球上的任何地方一样。<page>虽然我没有将它指定为你灵魂的象征，但我的小小力量仍然可以给你带来最大的祝福。<hpage>你想加入他们吗？要知道你的思想不再独立存在，你不再在同一个地方。<page>随着时间的推移，她的祈祷逃避几乎被遗忘了，但这就是她的祈祷逃避。<page>亲爱的朋友们，您同意这个请求吗？

original_en_text: Who’s there? Has someone come to free me? Or are you here to bring my end? <hpage>I am Hornet, prisoner, only a traveller and not here to slay you.<hpage>What cause sees you caged in these ruins of Weavers past? Were you their enemy?
original_zh_text: 谁在那儿？是来解救我的？还是来取我性命的？<hpage>我名为大黄蜂，只是一名旅者，无意取你性命。<hpage>你为何被囚于织者遗迹？你曾是他们的敌人？
translated_text: Who is he? Who is helping you? Or do you want to break up with me? "<hpage>I was confused. I was a prisoner, just a traveler. "<hpage>What caught you in the ruins of Weaver? Are you our enemy?
secondary_translated_text: 他是谁？谁在帮你？还是你想和我分手"<hpage>我很困惑。我是一名囚犯，只是一名旅行者。"<hpage>是什么让你陷入韦弗废墟？你是我们的敌人吗？

original_en_text: Lady, my senses resound. You have grown further beyond the bounds of a bug.<page>Permit me to gaze again upon your nature, that I may offer clarity.
original_zh_text: 女士，我的感知在震颤。你已远超凡虫界限。<page>请允许我再次深入感知，才好仔细说明……
translated_text: Your growth is heading in the wrong direction.<page>If you look at your nature again, I will give you the final answer.
secondary_translated_text: 你的成长正朝着错误的方向发展。<page>如果你再看看你的本性，我会给你最终的答案。

original_en_text: <hpage>How did you come to be sealed here, Eva? <page>Lady, you mistake. What seems a cage is as much my shell as the form inside.<page>I was born within this space. To leave would be my death, an uninspired end, though one I’ve sometimes wished would come.<page>I am unique, you see. My mothers shared the curse of their tribe, to conceive a child is a painful, near impossible task. <hpage>I know the curse well, Eva, for I am also its victim, and spawn of one who managed to overcome its limits. <hpage>Are you too an attempt to defy that cruel constraint?<page>A flawed attempt. A life spun from rune and shell, sustained only by its cage. My thoughts may mimic a Weavers, but my senses are my own.<page>Over time, that difference brought only distance between us.
original_zh_text: <hpage>伊娃，你为何会被困在这里？<page>女士误会了。这囚笼也是我的躯壳，与其中的形体并无差异。<page>我诞生于这里，离开意味着消亡，虽然有时也渴求这平淡结局。<page>我很特殊，母亲们承受着族群诅咒，生育子嗣近乎不可能。<hpage>我很了解这诅咒，伊娃。因为我也是受害者，更是突破禁忌的产物。<hpage>想必你也是对抗这残酷枷锁的尝试？<page>是失败的尝试。符文与甲壳铸就的生命，只能靠囚笼维系。我虽能模仿织者，但终究不是织者。<page>久而久之，这份差异使我们渐行渐远。
translated_text: <hpage>How did you get here, Eva?<page>What looks like a cell is my outer shell, my inner shape.<page>It started with my death, a somewhat exciting ending, but sometimes I hoped it would come.<page>I'm unique, aren't I? Do you see this? The mother swears that pregnancy is as painful as a tribe and almost impossible.<hpage>Because I am also a victim, the descendant of someone who exceeded my limits.<hpage>Can he endure such a difficult situation?<page>Life, made up of runes and shells, can only be preserved within us. My heart can imitate fabric, but my emotions are me.<page>Over time, these differences will bring us closer.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>你怎么来的伊娃<page>看起来像细胞的东西是我的外壳，我的内部形状。<page>它开始于我的死亡，一个有点令人兴奋的结局，但有时我希望它会来。<page>我很独特，不是吗？你看到这个了吗？母亲发誓怀孕就像部落一样痛苦，几乎不可能。<hpage>因为我也是受害者，是超越我极限的人的后裔。<hpage>他能忍受如此困难的处境吗？<page>生命由符文和贝壳组成，只能保存在我们内心。我的心可以模仿布料，但我的情感就是我。<page>随着时间的推移，这些差异会让我们更加亲密。

original_en_text: By your grace, I am at last broken from my fate.<hpage>Gladly I accept your union, Eva. No longer shall you suffer eternity alone.
original_zh_text: 蒙您恩典，我终于能挣脱宿命。<hpage>我欣然接受与你的联结，伊娃。你不必再承受永恒的孤寂。
translated_text: Thanks to you, I am finally on my own path.<hpage>I'm so happy to marry Eva, I can't live alone forever.
secondary_translated_text: 多亏了你，我终于走上了自己的道路。<hpage>我很高兴嫁给伊娃，我不能永远独自生活。

original_en_text: Come no closer! I sense the forbidden blood coursing through you, that which grows and reshapes the world in its own vulgar image.<page>Whether it was imbibed willingly or not, none shall be allowed into this chamber while so afflicted. Begone!
original_zh_text: 站住！我能感知到你体内流淌的禁忌之血，那以粗鄙之形生长并重塑世界的秽物。<page>无论你是否自愿沾染此血，凡受其侵蚀者皆不得踏入这里。速速离开！
translated_text: Run, run, run! You can feel the blood of taboos flowing through your body, growing into a vulgar image and rebuilding the world.<page>At this painful moment, no one can enter this room, whether it is desirable or not.
secondary_translated_text: 快跑快跑你可以感觉到禁忌的血液在你的身体中流淌，成长为粗俗的形象，重建世界。<page>在这个痛苦的时刻，无论是否愿意，任何人都不能进入这个房间。

original_en_text: Lady, if in your travels you are able to further expand your nature, return to me. With what power I possess, I may be able to aid you further.<hpage>If my nature expands as you say, Eva, I shall return.
original_zh_text: 女士，如果你的本质再度进化，请回来找我。以我的力量，或许能助你更上一层。<hpage>若我本质确实再度进化，我会回来找你。
translated_text: Woman, if you can expand your nature on the journey, come to me, and I can use my strength to help you more.<hpage>Eve, when my nature expands, as you said, I will come back.
secondary_translated_text: 女人，如果你能在旅途中扩展你的本性，就来找我吧，我可以用我的力量来更多地帮助你。<hpage>伊芙，当我的本性扩展时，正如你所说，我就会回来。

original_en_text: Lady, would you think again upon my last request? To be bound amidst your shimmering soul?<page>I understand it is a selfish thing to ask, and I will hold no ill will if you reject.
original_zh_text: 女士，可愿重新考虑我的请求？让我融入你璀璨魂灵？<page>我明白这是个自私的请求，若您拒绝我也绝无怨言。
translated_text: Can I modify my last request? Are you trapped in your intelligent soul?<page>I understand you are selfish, and I understand there is nothing wrong with you in denying it.
secondary_translated_text: 我可以修改我的上一个请求吗？你是否被困在你智慧的灵魂中？<page>我明白你很自私，我明白你否认这一点并没有什么错。

original_en_text: <hpage>I am sorry, Eva. I cannot grant you this. At least, not yet.<hpage>Yours is a mind strong and strange. That union could prove dangerous to my identity.<page>I understand, Lady. I will be here, if ever you reconsider.
original_zh_text: <hpage>抱歉，伊娃。我不能答应你，至少现在不行。<hpage>你的心智强大而奇异，联结恐怕会危及我的存在。<page>我明白，女士。希望您能改变心意，我会永远在此等候。
translated_text: <hpage>"I'm sorry, Eva, but I can't promise. At least not now.<hpage>His heart is strong and strange, and this combination is dangerous to my character.<page>"I'm here, if you know.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>“我很抱歉，伊娃，但我不能保证。至少现在不是。<hpage>他的心坚强而奇怪，这种结合对我的性格是危险的。<page>“我在这里，如果你知道的话。

original_en_text: Thank you for playing the demo.
original_zh_text: 试玩版体验结束，感谢您的游玩！
translated_text: Thank you very much for your introduction.

secondary_translated_text: 和平是你的信仰和努力的结构。

original_zh_text: 待你醒来，挣裂千丝缠茧——

original_en_text: A beast’s nature bare to all.

original_en_text: Lift your voices. Know our grace.
translated_text: "Please hold up your voice, so that I may know your grace.
secondary_translated_text: “请保持你的声音，这样我就可以知道你的恩典。

original_en_text: Bug born of Pharloom. You have been chosen.<br> May our Citadel’s holy gilding harden your soft shell.<page>Stand eternal as our arbiter, that no bug bearing sin shall step within our sacred halls.
original_zh_text: 纺络的虫民，你们已被选中，<br>愿圣堡的鎏金淬硬你们的软壳。<page>作为审判官永远伫立，使罪孽之徒永不得踏入圣殿。
translated_text: This is a battery born in Faro. You have been chosen.<br>Let the golden holy city of our city cover its soft shell.<page>Like the eternal mediator, evil insects never trample on the temple.
secondary_translated_text: 这是一个在法罗诞生的电池。你被选中了。<br>让我们城市的金色圣城盖上柔软的外壳。<page>就像永恒的中保一样，邪恶的昆虫从不践踏寺庙。

original_en_text: A rune-scroll depicting void given form.
original_zh_text: 描绘虚空化形的符文卷轴
translated_text: The scroll of the moon represents a vacuum.

original_en_text: Sisters, spiders, watch these waters flow,<br>Cleansing, Binding, as Silk from shell,<br>Memories of our kingdom calm.
original_zh_text: 姊妹，蛛族，观此净水长流。<br>涤荡，缠缚，如壳中抽丝，<br>抚平王国的记忆褶皱。
translated_text: "Brothers, spiders, look at the water.<br>It is pure and swims like silk extracted from tree bark.<br>Our memory of the kingdom is peaceful.
secondary_translated_text: “兄弟们，蜘蛛们，看看水。<br>它是纯净的，像从树皮中提取的丝绸一样游动。<br>我们对王国的记忆是平静的。

original_en_text: At the seventh bell toll, send:<br>Thirty measures, four beats Smokerock,<br>Eight beats Sweetsmelt,<br>Mark of fealty, all workers.<page>At the ninth bell toll, send:<br>Twenty measures, two beats Smokerock,<br>Seven beats Sweetsmelt,<br>Mark of fealty, all workers.<page>
original_zh_text: 七钟响时运送：<br>三十节又四奏烟岩，<br>及八奏甜熔渣。<br>全体劳工需示忠诚。<page>九钟响时运送：<br>二十节又两奏烟岩，<br>及七奏甜熔渣。<br>全体劳工需示忠诚。<page>
translated_text: Seventh bullet:<br>Four of the 30 people broke their walking sticks.<br>Hit eight people.<br>This is loyalty to all employees.<page>Ninth strike<br>Of the 20 strategies, two defeated Slok.<br>Seven of them won the trophy.<br>It is a symbol of loyalty to every employee.<page>
secondary_translated_text: 第七颗子弹：<br>30人中有4人折断了手杖。<br>击中八个人。<br>这就是对所有员工的忠诚。<page>第九次罢工<br>在20个策略中，有两个击败了斯洛克。<br>其中七人赢得了奖杯。<br>它是对每个员工忠诚的象征。<page>

translated_text: Audience Map
Map of life.
Underground map.

original_en_text: When three fonts weep, our sacred shrine shall rise.
original_zh_text: 三眼泪泉涌流，圣坛自当升起。
translated_text: After saying these three sentences, the temple rose.
secondary_translated_text: 说完这三句话，寺庙就起来了。

original_en_text: Damned are we! The lingered few bound still to suffer. Cursed thrice by Pharloom, to wait, to watch, to cry our anguish.<page>No more! We say! No more! We cry! We all have wailed and wept. Fair Pharloom’s fall has come at last. Its end we now accept.
original_zh_text: 万众受难！幸存者仍受折磨。纺络三度诅咒加身——苦候，守望，哀哭不休，<page>到此为止！我在此宣言！到此为止！我在此高呼！我们已流尽血泪。荣光纺络终将陨落，我们应接受终局。
translated_text: Shit, shit! We were cursed three times for our fall, but we waited, watched, and cried in pain.<page>There is nothing more! Let's talk about this! No more! He cried! We all cried, we all cried. The "farm" collapsed. Now we accept the ending.
secondary_translated_text: 妈的，妈的！我们因跌倒而被诅咒了三次，但我们等待、观看，痛苦地哭泣。<page>仅此而已！我们好好谈谈！不再！他哭了！我们都哭了，我们都哭了。“农场”倒塌了。现在我们接受结局。

original_en_text: Litany of the Worker<br>May we catch the dregs and never tire,<br>May we clean the dregs and never hunger,<br>May we spool the dregs and never falter.
original_zh_text: 劳工祷词<br>愿我们滤渣不倦。<br>愿我们清秽不饥。<br>愿我们纺线不怠。
translated_text: The staff continued reading.<br>He will never get tired of dirty things.<br>Remove the dirt and never be hungry.<br>I don't eat dust or drink alcohol.
secondary_translated_text: 工作人员继续阅读。<br>他永远不会厌倦肮脏的东西。<br>清除污垢，永远不会挨饿。<br>我不吃灰尘也不喝酒。

original_en_text: Oath of the Whiteward<br>While song must be sung, none may falter.<br>Infirmity. Sickness. Death.<br>All are banished from our Citadel.
original_zh_text: 白愈厅誓言<br>歌不可辍，虫不可怠。<br>孱弱、病痛、死亡——皆逐出圣堡。
translated_text: White Oath<br>I sing, but no one cares.<br>Died of disease.<br>They were all kicked out of the castle.
secondary_translated_text: 白色誓言<br>我唱歌，但没有人在乎。<br>病死。<br>他们都被赶出了城堡。

original_en_text: Penitent, Fourth of the Fourth.<br>Guilty of the sins of infirmity, sickness.<br>Penance by swallowing.<br>Absolution granted after death.<page>Penitent, Twelfth of the First.<br>Guilty of an unnamed sin.<br>Penance by casting.<br>Absolution not granted.
original_zh_text: 罪者，第四组第四号。<br>犯孱弱、病痛之罪。<br>处以吞刑。<br>死后得赦。<page>罪人，第一组第十二号。<br>犯未名之罪。<br>处以流放。<br>不予赦免。
translated_text: Fourth confession<br>From weakness and disease.<br>Spit it out.<br>Forgiveness after death.<page>Confession, twelve.<br>An unknown crime has occurred.<br>I swear I am guilty.<br>Without forgiveness,
secondary_translated_text: 第四次忏悔<br>免受虚弱和疾病的影响。<br>吐出来<br>死后的宽恕。<page>忏悔，十二。<br>发生了一起未知的犯罪事件。<br>我发誓我有罪。<br>没有宽恕，

original_en_text: Penitent, Eighth of the Twelfth.<br>Guilty of the sin of irreverence.<br>Penance by chaining.<br>Absolution granted after death.<page>Penitent, Second of the Fourth.<br>Guilty of the sin of dissonance.<br>Penance by silencing.<br>Absolution granted after death.
original_zh_text: 罪者，第十二组第八号。<br>犯不敬之罪。<br>处以锁刑。<br>死后得赦。<page>罪者，第四组第二号。<br>犯杂音之罪。<br>处以禁言。<br>死后得赦。
translated_text: Confession on December 8<br>Being rude to others is a sin.<br>I'll explain it in prison.<br>Forgiveness after death.<page>Volume 4: Regret<br>As I said before, I disagree with me.<br>Confess silently.<br>Forgiveness after death.
secondary_translated_text: 12月8日认罪<br>对别人粗鲁是一种罪过。<br>我会在监狱里解释的。<br>死后的宽恕。<page>第四卷：遗憾<br>就像我之前说的，我不同意。<br>默默忏悔。<br>死后的宽恕

original_en_text: Remains of a Muckroach crushed by falling rock.
original_zh_text: 蟑螂被落石碾压后的残渣。
translated_text: The beetle's body crashed into the falling rock.
secondary_translated_text: 甲虫的身体撞在了落下的岩石上。

original_en_text: Anguished Aura<br>Eight masks hard, swirled soul enraged.<br>Twelve aknids flat, all juices strained.<page>Six pilgrims living, hung long to drain.
original_zh_text: 苦痛灵氛<br>八具硬质旋魂怒面。<br>十二只阿克尼，榨尽汁液。<page>六名活祭朝圣者，悬吊沥干。
translated_text: You will suffer.<br>8 Their faces are hard, their hearts are angry.<br>Collect the 12 acne nuts and filter all the juice.<page>Six pilgrims are still alive, waiting for their wishes.
secondary_translated_text: 你会受苦的。<br>8他们的脸很硬，他们的心很愤怒。<br>收集12个痤疮坚果并过滤所有汁液。<page>六名朝圣者仍然活着，等待着他们的愿望。

original_zh_text: 带有外科标志的苍白锁具。
translated_text: The white key is the symbol of the operation.
This symbol represents most organizations.

translated_text: Project Chart (Item Chart)
Bolter's whisper

original_en_text: Their shells are ours. Their souls are ours.<br>Our hate is forever.
original_zh_text: 他们的躯壳是我们的，他们的灵魂是我们的。<br>我们的恨意永世不灭。
translated_text: Their souls are ours, and their shells are ours.<br>Hate is eternal.
secondary_translated_text: 他们的灵魂是我们的，他们的躯壳也是我们的。<br>仇恨是永恒的。

original_en_text: Containment fails. Memory lost. Excise outer. Maintain inner.<br>Shellwood stasis sustained - Remember.<br>Marrowlands stasis critical - Remember.<br>Verdanian environment exceeded - Destined to forget.
original_zh_text: 封存溃败。记忆遗失。切除外区。维持内区。<br>甲木林封存稳定——须铭记。<br>髓骨地封存危急——须铭记。<br>翠庭生态失控——注定遗忘。
translated_text: Avoid making mistakes. Memory loss is eliminated from the outside. I'm still at home.<br>The stagnation of bark and trees continues.<br>Severe bone marrow arrest-remember.<br>In addition to the impressive atmosphere-destined to be forgotten.
secondary_translated_text: 避免犯错误。记忆丧失从外部消除。我还在家里。<br>树皮和树木的停滞仍在继续。<br>严重的骨髓骤停-记住。<br>除了令人印象深刻的氛围之外，注定会被遗忘。

original_en_text: Here is established, by holy consent of the Conductors,<br>The Memorium of Pharloom.<br><br>What Is Remembered Is Never Lost.
original_zh_text: 经指挥家神圣授权，<br>于此建立纺络忆廊。<br><br>铭记者永存不灭。
translated_text: With the consent of the driver,<br>Hotels near Farroom Memorial<br><br>Memories will never disappear.
secondary_translated_text: 经司机同意，<br>Farroom Memorial附近酒店<br><br>记忆永远不会消失。

original_en_text: A rune depicting paths away from Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 描绘离开纺络通路的符文。
translated_text: Ron was relieved of his guilt.
secondary_translated_text: 罗恩免除了他的负罪感。

original_en_text: Due to unacceptably high injury and unsanctioned deaths, Ventrica travel shall henceforth be denied to all.<br> For Pharloom eternal, a bug who serves must never die.
original_zh_text: 鉴于伤亡过甚并且非授命死亡，即日起禁止所有虫民使用圣脉枢管。<br>永恒纺络需要活着的仆从。
translated_text: Travel to Madagascar will be banned due to the unacceptable number of casualties.<br>In Lighthouse, persistent service errors do not disappear.
secondary_translated_text: 由于伤亡人数不可接受，前往马达加斯加的旅行将被禁止。<br>在Lighthouse中，持续的服务错误不会消失。

original_en_text: Pilgrim<br>Spare a song for those who lay here silent.<br>By strength abandoned, they fell before the final ascent.
original_zh_text: 朝圣者<br>为长眠于此的无声者歌一曲罢。<br>力竭而堕，未竟登攀。
translated_text: About pilots.<br>Leave a song for those who are silent.<br>They lost their strength and fell before making their final climb.
secondary_translated_text: 关于飞行员。<br>给沉默的人留下一首歌。<br>他们失去了力量，在进行最后一次攀登之前摔倒了。

translated_text: Abyss Map

original_en_text: <hpage>I understand now... The steel child’s servant grew bold...<hpage>I know what the fleeing bug seeks to call, and their etchings here suggest clear clues to where. <hpage>What they attempt is dangerous, stupid. It can only end badly. I must hurry if I’m to stop this.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我现在明白了……钢铁之子的手下越来越大胆……<hpage>也知道那只逃亡的虫子想召唤什么，这些刻痕明确指出了地点。<hpage>愚蠢又危险的做法，不会有好下场。得赶紧阻止。
translated_text: <hpage>Now, I know that the boys at home have become brave.<hpage>This is the so-called "escaping insect", and this work gives us a clear clue.<hpage>Their efforts are dangerous and useless. The results were terrible. If you want to stop it, you have to hurry.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>现在，我知道家里的男孩们都变得勇敢了。<hpage>这就是所谓的“逃跑的昆虫”，这项工作给了我们明确的线索。<hpage>他们的努力是危险且无用的。结果很糟糕。如果你想阻止它，你就得快点。

original_en_text: An old rune displaying the design for a Weaver weapon.
original_zh_text: 残破的织者武器设计图。
translated_text: Old racing car with chassis design.
secondary_translated_text: 带有底盘设计的老式赛车。

translated_text: Open deeper channels.

original_en_text: Sister, spider, sat between salt and stone,<br>Build those tools of brilliant mind imagined,<br>Aid us when our Silk has waned.
original_zh_text: 姊妹，蛛族，坐于盐石之间，<br>铸造智械奇器，<br>助我们于灵丝枯竭之时。
translated_text: The sisters crawled between salt and stone.<br>Virtual brain tools<br>If the silk falls off, please help me.
secondary_translated_text: 姐妹俩在盐和石头之间爬行。<br>虚拟大脑工具<br>如果丝绸脱落，请帮助我。

original_en_text: An old stone gate with a simple keyhole.
original_zh_text: 带有简易锁孔的古石门。
translated_text: An ancient tower gate with a simple opening.
secondary_translated_text: 一座古老的塔门，开口简单。

original_en_text: Sister, spider, husk bound to branch,<br>Watch over these bugs, passing safe,<br>Warded by fear,<br>No longer your meal.
original_zh_text: 姊妹，蛛族，缚枝之壳，<br>庇佑这些过客安然。<br>以恐惧为甲，<br>不再化作食粮。
translated_text: Sisters, spiders, shells on branches,<br>To recognize these mistakes and overcome them confidently,<br>Accept their fears,<br>This is no longer your food.
secondary_translated_text: 姐妹、蜘蛛、树枝上的贝壳，<br>为了认识到这些错误并自信地克服它们，<br>接受他们的恐惧，<br>这不再是你的食物。

original_en_text: Bug born of Pharloom. You have been chosen.<br> May our Citadel’s holy gilding harden your soft shell.<page>Stand eternal as our arbiter, that no bug bearing sin shall ever step within our sacred halls.
original_zh_text: 纺络的虫民，你们已被选中，<br>愿圣堡的鎏金淬硬你们的软壳。<page>作为审判官永远伫立，使罪孽之徒永不得踏入圣殿。
translated_text: This is a battery born in Faro. You have been chosen.<br>Let the golden holy city of our city cover its soft shell.<page>Like our judges, we are always in the temple, without bugs, without sin.
secondary_translated_text: 这是一个在法罗诞生的电池。你被选中了。<br>让我们城市的金色圣城盖上柔软的外壳。<page>就像我们的法官一样，我们总是在寺庙里，没有虫子，没有罪恶。

original_en_text: I have departed to pay my respects at the graves within the great wood.<br>- Pinmaster Plinney
original_zh_text: 我去密林深处的墓园祭拜先灵<br>——针匠普林尼
translated_text: I saw a tomb in the woods.<br>Il Bens Pliny
secondary_translated_text: 我在树林里看到一个坟墓。<br>本斯·普林尼

translated_text: Do you have a map?

original_en_text: Penitent, First of the First.<br>Guilty of the sin of apostasy.<br>Penance by constriction.<br>Absolution denied.
original_zh_text: 罪人，第一组第一号。<br>犯背信之罪。<br>处以束刑。<br>永不赦免。
translated_text: The first is the confessor.<br>Sinful disobedience,<br>Understand boundaries.<br>Forgiveness is denial.
secondary_translated_text: 首先是忏悔者。<br>罪恶的不服从，<br>了解界限。<br>宽恕就是否认。

original_en_text: Weaver, in eighth part, last of their line, frail with age.<br>Tracked and taken in Sandsea Waste.<br>Seven Choristors, nine Envoys lost to task.
original_zh_text: 第八代织者，末裔，年迈体衰。<br>于沙海荒原追捕擒获。<br>折损七名圣咏使徒，九名特使。
translated_text: Weaver, the last member of the family, grew increasingly frail as he grew older.<br>Sandy Creek Wilderness San Francisco<br>The seven commandments and the nine apostles failed.
secondary_translated_text: 韦弗是家里的最后一个成员，随着年龄的增长，他变得越来越虚弱。<br>桑迪溪荒野旧金山<br>七诫和九使徒失败了。

translated_text: Magnetic appearance.

original_en_text: Cloth and materials that could be fashioned into additional pockets.
original_zh_text: 可缝制附加口袋的布料。
translated_text: Fabrics and materials can make pockets extra.
secondary_translated_text: 面料和材料可以让口袋变得额外。

original_en_text: Sister, spider, husk bound to moss,<br>Watch over these bugs born low,<br>Raised up by fervour fostered,<br>Born and caught within our web unknowing.
original_zh_text: 姊妹，蛛族，缚苔之壳。<br>庇佑这些卑微生物。<br>养育于狂热之中，<br>生于罗网而不自知。
translated_text: Sisters, spiders, shells, tied to moss,<br>Beware of insects.<br>Grow up with passion<br>We are born unconscious and trapped in a net.
secondary_translated_text: 姐妹、蜘蛛、贝壳，绑在苔藓上，<br>小心昆虫。<br>充满激情成长<br>我们生来就无意识，被困在网里。

original_en_text: Sister, spider, if seeking commune with the creature atop this mount, take the climb above as test, a challenge beyond even our setting.<page>Upon that summit gained, and creature hailed, know it shall choose what gift to grant, with death as likely as insight.
original_zh_text: 姊妹，若欲觐见此山巅之物，须攀登试炼之径，其险犹胜我等所设。<page>登顶谒见之时，须知其所赐或为顿悟，或为死期。
translated_text: If you want to communicate with your sisters, spiders and these mountain creatures, try the creatures above.<page>When it reaches its peak, the creature feels happy, knows what gift to give, and through perception, death becomes possible.
secondary_translated_text: 如果您想与您的姐妹、蜘蛛和这些山地生物交流，请尝试上面的生物。<page>当它达到顶峰时，生物会感到快乐，知道该赠送什么礼物，通过感知，死亡成为可能。

original_en_text: Hate for their light. Hate for their pins. For their waste poured thick and endless.<page>Fill your hearts with hate, for power has now been claimed, and with it we shall punish.
original_zh_text: 憎其光辉，恨其刺针。怒其秽流无尽<br>以恨意填膺，因权柄已夺，吾等将施以惩戒。
translated_text: I don't like lights, I hate pins, their shit always comes out.<page>A heart full of hatred. Because power is private, we punished them.
secondary_translated_text: 我不喜欢灯，我讨厌别针，它们的屎总是会冒出来。<page>一颗充满仇恨的心。因为权力是私人的，我们惩罚了他们。

original_en_text: Here we honour the seed that sprung the wood. <page>By her grace may all bugs pass safe to join us and our song.
original_zh_text: 此地敬奉孕育森林的种子。<page>承其恩泽，万虫皆可安然穿行，共奏圣歌。
translated_text: We are here to pay tribute to the seeds we planted.<page>We thank everyone for your kindness and hope that all insects can return safely to join our music.
secondary_translated_text: 我们来这里是为了向我们播种的种子致敬。<page>我们感谢大家的善意，并希望所有昆虫都能安全返回加入我们的音乐。

translated_text: A decadent behavioral map
A complete eruption of volcanic rock.
This is a blank sheet of paper.

original_en_text: Daughter of a distant land...<br>We who remained have waited long...<br>Bind our strength to yours...<br>Reclaim the future of our haunted kingdom...
original_zh_text: 远疆之女啊……<br>我们残存者久候……<br>愿以残力附汝身……<br>夺回这缠魂国度的未来……
translated_text: Daughter of a distant country<br>People here have been waiting for a long time.<br>Increase our strength and your strength.<br>Rebuilding the future of the Ghost Kingdom.
secondary_translated_text: 遥远国家的女儿<br>这里的人们已经等了很长时间了。<br>增强我们和你们的力量。<br>重建幽灵王国的未来。

original_en_text: If the haunted continue their work, leave them be! Only those who frustrate production shall be removed.
original_zh_text: 受丝咒侵蚀者若仍旧劳作，勿扰！唯怠工者当除。
translated_text: If the ghost is still working, let it go! Eliminate interruptions in production.
secondary_translated_text: 如果鬼魂还在工作，就让它走吧！消除生产中断。

original_en_text: An inert automaton with an empty chest.
original_zh_text: 胸腔空置的休眠自动机。
translated_text: Automation from an empty box

original_en_text: On the eighth harvest, send:<br>Fifty measures, nine beats dregthread, spooled,<br>Fourteen measures dregthread, twined,<br>Oath of fealty, all workers.<page>On the twelfth harvest, send:<br>Forty measures dregthread, spooled,<br>Two beats fine thread, twined,<br>Oath of fealty, all workers.<page>
original_zh_text: 第八次收成时运送：<br>五十节又九奏卷线渣，<br>十四节编线渣。<br>全体劳工需立忠誓。<page>第十二次收成时运送：<br>四十节卷线渣，<br>两奏精编丝线。<br>全体劳工需立忠誓。<page>
translated_text: If this is the eighth harvest, please send:<br>Thread Dregg 50 Bar, 9 hours<br>Article 14 Drug trafficking<br>They are all loyal.<page>In Episode 12, please send the following information:<br>With 40 measuring wires, coils<br>There are two lines,<br>Our employees all swear an oath of loyalty.<page>
secondary_translated_text: 如果这是第八次收获，请发送：<br>Thread Dregg 50 Bar，9小时<br>第十四条贩毒<br>他们都很忠诚。<page>在第12集中，请发送以下信息：<br>带有40根测量线、线圈<br>有两行，<br>我们的员工都宣誓忠诚。<page>

original_en_text: In the air. The water. Everywhere.<br>Inside their shells. Twisted inside. Guts.<page>Tightest around heart. Pulsing rhythm.<br>Sick. Alive. Dead?<br>Something worse.<page>Deeper. Must look deeper.
original_zh_text: 空气中，水流中，无处不在。<br>甲壳内，脏器间，扭曲盘踞。<page>紧缚心脏，搏动如歌。<br>病态，鲜活，死寂？<br>某种更糟的存在。<page>需深究……再深究……
translated_text: There is water everywhere in the air.<br>In silk. His heart is changing. Value, value<page>Typhus is around your heart.<br>Is he sick or dead?<br>I'm sorry.<page>A thorough investigation is needed.
secondary_translated_text: 空气中到处都是水。<br>丝绸的。他的心正在改变。价值，价值<page>斑疹伤寒就在你的心头。<br>他是病了还是死了？<br>不好意思<page>需要进行彻底的调查。

original_en_text: A bucket overflowing with smouldering Flintstone.
translated_text: A pile of primitive fossils.

original_en_text: Pilgrim<br>This settlement welcomes all who step the holy path.<br>May you ease your shell within, that your strength renewed can carry you higher.
original_zh_text: 朝圣者<br>此镇欢迎任何踏入圣途者。<br>愿您在此养精蓄锐，登攀更高处。
translated_text: About pilots.<br>We welcome all those who follow God's path.<br>Give your heart a rest and your new power will lift you to higher heights.
secondary_translated_text: 关于飞行员。<br>我们欢迎所有追随上帝道路的人。<br>让你的心休息一下，你的新力量会让你达到更高的高度。

original_en_text: Weaver of Pharloom.<br>By grace you warded. By thread you healed.<br>For your favour, eternal, we offer our song.
original_zh_text: 纺络的织者啊<br>您以恩赐庇护，以丝线疗愈。我们献永恒之歌，报答您的垂青。
translated_text: Wine of Light<br>May God bless you and heal you.<br>For your love and eternity, we sing for you.
secondary_translated_text: 光明之酒<br>愿上帝保佑你并治愈你。<br>为了你的爱和永恒，我们为你歌唱。

translated_text: How to expand your toolkit?

original_en_text: A crude map of the Underworks.
translated_text: Project Underground
This is an ancient regulatory system.
secondary_translated_text: 这是一个古老的监管体系。

original_en_text: O, great land whose flame doth falter!<br>Whose choir, conductors, all doth fail,<page>Observe! Take heart! That spark still burning,<br>Yon butterfly of crimson grace,<page>All bells shall peal, and voices raise,<br>When brave Trobbio steps, at last, upon the stage!
original_zh_text: 啊，辽阔疆土，其焰渐熄！<br>圣咏团与指挥皆已倾颓。<page>且看！且振作！星火犹存——<br>那优雅的绯红蝶影，<page>万钟齐鸣，众声高亢。<br>待勇者特罗比奥终登台！
translated_text: O earth, lower your fire!<br>Both the captain and commander failed.<page>Look at me! Put your hands on me! The flames are still burning.<br>Dark red butterfly.<page>Every bell rings, every sound rings.<br>Finally, a brave trophy on the stage!
secondary_translated_text: 大地啊，降低你的火！<br>船长和指挥官都失败了。<page>看着我！把手放在我身上！火焰仍在燃烧。<br>深红色蝴蝶。<page>每一个钟声都响，每一个声音都响。<br>终于，舞台上有了勇敢的奖杯！

original_en_text: Erase our fear,<br>Eliminate our desire,<page>To suffer no more,<br>Void, cleanse us.
original_zh_text: 抹除恐惧，<br>涤净欲念，<page>苦难终止，<br>虚空啊，净化吾等。
translated_text: Their fear grew.<br>In order to get rid of his desires,<page>To stop the pain.<br>Vacuum cleaning.
secondary_translated_text: 他们的恐惧与日俱增。<br>为了摆脱欲望，<page>为了停止疼痛。<br>吸尘器清洁。

original_en_text: I have departed to scale Pharloom’s frigid mount. If any bug exists brave enough to match my pin’s fatal resolve, then climb and face me upon its stormward side.<br>- Pinstress
original_zh_text: 我将攀登纺络寒峰。若有虫愿意成全遗志，持针之决意者，请至风暴面峰顶相会。<br>——针姬
translated_text: I began to climb towards the beacon of the iceberg, and if an insect decided to match my fate, I would climb somewhere in the storm and they would face me.<br>"Princess, princess!
secondary_translated_text: 我开始爬向冰山的灯塔，如果一只昆虫决定与我的命运相匹配，我就会爬到暴风雨中的某个地方，它们就会面对我。<br>“公主，公主！

original_en_text: Flickering Flame<br>Five masks swirled soul, brought and broiled.<br>Four stones rage-baked, crushed powder coarse.<page>Three shells fresh from pilgrims fallen, to contain and age.
original_zh_text: 摇曳焰方<br>五具旋魂面甲，炙烤研磨。<br>四枚怒火焙石，碾作粗粉。<page>三副朝圣鲜壳，用以封存陈化。
translated_text: "Lightning of Fire"<br>Five masks that can be rotated and worn to burn souls.<br>He will burn your stones and crush your dust.<page>Three shells that had just fallen from the hands of the pilgrims were sealed and collapsed.
secondary_translated_text: “火之闪电”<br>五个可以旋转和佩戴来燃烧灵魂的面具。<br>他会烧毁你的石头，碾碎你的灰尘。<page>刚刚从朝圣者手中掉落的三枚炮弹被密封并倒塌。

original_en_text: Weaver, in eighth part, last of their line, mortally wounded.<br>Tracked and taken in the Blackbarrens.<br>Four Choristors, one Reed lost to task.
original_zh_text: 第八代织者，末裔，重伤濒死。<br>于黑荒原追捕擒获。<br>折损四名圣咏者，一名战士。
translated_text: Weaver suffered a fatal injury at the end of the eighth round.<br>Black picture<br>Four commanders, including Reid, died in the line of duty.
secondary_translated_text: 韦弗在第八轮结束时受了致命伤。<br>黑画面<br>包括里德在内的四名指挥官因公殉职。

original_en_text: A machine displaying a model of the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 展示圣堡结构的机械模型。
translated_text: Machines that display gender models.

original_en_text: <hpage>The second spot marked by the child of steel. This camp too was used by their vassal, and another rite was conducted here, this one incomplete. <hpage>The action was clearly taken in haste. Did they believe themself pursued? The etchings here are crude, but the words are disturbing... and desperate.
original_zh_text: <hpage>钢铁之子标记的第二处地点。他们的仆从也在这里进行过仪式，但没完成。<hpage>行动如此匆忙，难道是怕被追杀？刻的字歪歪扭扭，内容让人不安……且绝望。
translated_text: <hpage>Men also used this field to do another ritual, but this time it was not completed.<hpage>Do you think they will be persecuted? The cutting here is rough, but there it is very uncomfortable.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>人们还利用这块田地进行另一种仪式，但这次没有完成。<hpage>你认为他们会受到迫害吗？这里的切割很粗糙，但那里却很不舒服。

original_en_text: Cloth and incendiary materials that could be fashioned into an explosive weapon.
original_zh_text: 可制成爆燃武器的布料与易燃物。
translated_text: Clothing and flame chambers that can be used as explosive weapons
secondary_translated_text: 可用作爆炸性武器的衣服和火焰室

original_en_text: Shellplates and cogs that could be fashioned into a flying automaton.
original_zh_text: 可组装飞行自动机的壳板与齿轮。
translated_text: We can use drugs and equipment to build flying robots.
secondary_translated_text: 我们可以用药物和设备来制造飞行机器人。

original_en_text: In silence your voice,<br>In darkness your form,<page>We higher who see you seeking,<br>Our shells yearn for your embrace.
original_zh_text: 静默即汝声，<br>晦暗即汝形。<page>吾等高瞻汝之追寻，<br>甲壳渴求汝之怀抱。
translated_text: Silence of the soul,<br>In the darkness, in its form,<page>When a great man sees you,<br>I'm hungry in your arms.
secondary_translated_text: 灵魂的沉默，<br>在黑暗中，以它的形式，<page>当一个伟人看到你时，<br>我在你怀里很饿。

original_en_text: -ilgrim<br>You who have held tight to faith have been carried far.<br>This station shall offer brief rest to those devout.
original_zh_text: 朝圣者<br>虔信之虫方能抵达此远境。<br>此站给予诚心者片刻安歇。
translated_text: English.<br>I think she was kidnapped.<br>This place provides some rest for the pious.
secondary_translated_text: 英语<br>我认为她被绑架了。<br>这个地方为虔诚的人提供了一些休息的地方。

original_en_text: Half-spawn of a distant land...<br>Within this cage I have waited...<br>Let my strength be bound to yours...<br>Reclaim the future of our accursed kingdom...
original_zh_text: 异乡的半血之子啊……<br>我在此笼中久候……<br>愿以残力附汝身……<br>夺回这诅咒国度的未来……
translated_text: Half of them come from remote areas.<br>Wait in the cage.<br>With my strength and your strength<br>Restoring the future of the cursed kingdom.
secondary_translated_text: 其中一半来自偏远地区。<br>在笼子里等着。<br>用我的力量和你的力量<br>恢复被诅咒王国的未来。

original_en_text: Child, I have answered the call to climb. I rise to join our elders in that holy place far above. May you, in time, grow strong enough to meet us there.
original_zh_text: 孩子，我已应召攀登，将赴上方圣地与前辈们相聚。愿你成长强健，来日同聚。
translated_text: I was invited to climb the mountain. I got up and went to the distant sanctuary with the elders. Be strong and join us!
secondary_translated_text: 我被邀请去爬山。我站起来，和长辈们一起去了遥远的避难所。坚强起来，加入我们！

original_en_text: An old map of the Putrified Ducts.
translated_text: Old map of rotten pipes.

original_en_text: This low, her gaze escaped.<br>Prepare, sisters. Weave hope anew.<br>That we might break free this accursed web born of our naive foundation.
original_zh_text: 此处卑微隐秘，逃出她的视线。<br>准备吧，姊妹。重织希望。撕破这由我等天真所结的诅咒之网。
translated_text: She was short and her eyes were insensitive.<br>Brothers and sisters, get ready to rebuild hope.<br>You can be freed from the cursed network born on a pure basis.
secondary_translated_text: 她很矮，眼睛也很迟钝。<br>兄弟姐妹们，准备好重建希望。<br>您可以从纯粹诞生的被诅咒的网络中解放出来。

original_en_text: An ornate door closed with a simple lock.
translated_text: The door was locked tightly with a simple lock.
secondary_translated_text: 门被一把简单的锁紧紧地锁着。

translated_text: What does cogwork mean?

original_en_text: Pilgrim<br>Accept the judgment of the rise beyond,<br>That all who stand at Pharloom’s holy crest prove pure of will and want.
original_zh_text: 朝圣者<br>接受至高审判的洗礼。<br>凡欲立于纺络之巅者，当证心志纯净。
translated_text: About pilots.<br>Accept the judgment of transcending the rise.<br>Anyone wearing the crown of sin is pure will and desire.
secondary_translated_text: 关于飞行员。<br>接受超越崛起的判断。<br>任何戴着罪恶王冠的人都是纯粹的意志和欲望。

translated_text: Do you have a map?

original_en_text: Two children born entwined, apart,<br>Two children marked to rule,<page>They danced, they sang, proved blades beyond,<br>But none forgot their birth,<br>For lovers born on beat exact shall be forever cursed.
original_zh_text: 双子缠绕共生，命运连结，<br>双子共掌权柄，注定称王，<page>舞若惊鸿，歌撼四座，剑技超群，<br>但出身不可磨灭，<br>同卵双生之爱侣，诅咒永世缠身。
translated_text: The two children were connected at birth.<br>Both minors were guilty.<page>They danced and sang to prove that the Lama was there.<br>No one will forget his birth.<br>For a person who is born with rhythm, accuracy is always a curse.
secondary_translated_text: 两个孩子出生时就有联系。<br>两名未成年人都有罪。<page>他们又舞又唱，以证明喇嘛就在那里。<br>没有人会忘记他的出生。<br>对于一个天生就有节奏的人来说，准确性永远是一个诅咒。

translated_text: Memorial Hall Map

original_en_text: Great bugs! You who weep as your kingdom fades,<br>join me upon the Stage.<br> Together, we shall enflame the passion of Pharloom!
original_zh_text: 伟大的虫民！为王国衰颓而泣者。<br>请至剧台与我相会。<br>共燃纺络之激情！
translated_text: Error! Your kingdom will fall apart and you will cry.<br>Please come on the stage with me.<br>Let us share your passion for Lighthouse!
secondary_translated_text: 错误！你的王国会崩溃，你会哭泣。<br>请和我一起上台。<br>让我们分享您对灯塔的热情！

translated_text: Swinging role.

original_en_text: <hpage>This location was marked by the steel child. This camp is old, but still shows clear evidence of an attempt at a rite.<hpage>Whatever the vassal hoped to achieve here seems to have failed. The other marked locations may provide more clues to its intent.
original_zh_text: <hpage>这是钢铁之子标记的地点。营地虽然老旧，但明显有试图举行仪式的痕迹。<hpage>无论仆从想做什么，似乎是失败了。其他标记点或许会有更多线索。
translated_text: <hpage>The camp is ancient, but there is clear evidence of attempts to hold rituals.<hpage>Everything I hoped for failed. The positions of other constellations will give you hints of your intentions.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>该营地很古老，但有明显的证据表明有人试图举行仪式。<hpage>我所希望的一切都失败了。其他星座的位置会给你暗示你的意图。

original_en_text: Weaver, in quarter part, last of their line, staked to service.<br>Tracked and taken beneath the City of Steel.<br>Eight Choristors, twelve Envoys lost to task.
original_zh_text: 第四代织者，末裔，强制服役。<br>于钢铁之城地下追捕擒获。<br>折损八名圣咏使徒，十二名特使。
translated_text: Fourth (Weber) serves the last row.<br>Photo of Tiecheng.<br>Of the 12 rings, 8 failed to complete the task.
secondary_translated_text: 第四名（韦伯）发球最后一排。<br>铁城的照片。<br>12个环中，8个环未能完成任务。

translated_text: CogWorkCaremap

original_en_text: By our Citadel’s glory, you treasured devout may bask brief in its holy light.
original_zh_text: 沐浴圣堡荣光，虔信者可暂享圣辉。
translated_text: Let your sacred people bathe in your light and shine through the glory of our precious city.
secondary_translated_text: 让您神圣的人民沐浴在您的光芒中，闪耀着我们宝贵城市的荣耀。

translated_text: Coral Room.

original_en_text: A husk with a map of the Slab etched upon its shell.
original_zh_text: 一具甲壳刻有罪石牢狱地图的尸骸
translated_text: You will find a piece of paper inside.
secondary_translated_text: 你会发现里面有一张纸。
